
-----title
西安（万年） (出生地)
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='da8f7e054f864ea6a46be4c41784be7d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("da8f7e054f864ea6a46be4c41784be7d");'><span id='da8f7e054f864ea6a46be4c41784be7d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=779&endYear=786')">779-786年</a>，1-8岁</div><div id='da8f7e054f864ea6a46be4c41784be7d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=779&endYear=779')">779年2月</a>　是年，出生于长安万年县靖安坊。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=780&endYear=781')">780-781年</a>　在长安。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=782&endYear=782')">782年</a>　在长安。元稹母亲郑氏约此时开始掌管家事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=783&endYear=783')">783年</a>　在长安。韦丛生，其母裴氏卒，丛由庶母段氏抚养。元稹大姐嫁陆翰，翰时为太平县主簿。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=784&endYear=784')">784年</a>　在长安。七月，“崔莺莺”（不确）生。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=785&endYear=785')">785年</a>　在长安。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=786&endYear=786')">786年</a>　叔元宵卒。父元宽卒，“外诸翁”郑云逵撰元宽墓志。遭丧遇灾，家贫，有议卖府邸者，元秬阻之。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='ae6035ed7c29486393e97d45df330d4e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ae6035ed7c29486393e97d45df330d4e");'><span id='ae6035ed7c29486393e97d45df330d4e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=798')">793-798年</a>，15-20岁</div><div id='ae6035ed7c29486393e97d45df330d4e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>　约本年冬，元稹赴长安参加礼部明经科考试。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>　入居靖安坊旧宅。本年或稍后，胡灵之亦来长安，居永寿寺，与元稹为邻，二人常一起出游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=794&endYear=794')">794年</a>　元稹两经及第。开始守选。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=794&endYear=794')">794年</a>　寓居长安开元观（一名清都观），有诗。接触道教和佛教。作品：《清都夜境》<div id='poem_6942' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6942' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6942")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6942_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6942_0'>① 自此至秋夕，并年十六至十八时诗。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6942'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6942'>夜久<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6942", 6942, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>连观</span>静，斜月何晶荧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6942'>寥天如碧玉，历历缀华星。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6942'>楼榭自阴映，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6942", 6942, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>云牖</span>深冥冥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6942'>纤埃悄不起，玉砌寒光清。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6942'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6942", 6942, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>栖鹤</span>露微影，枯松多怪形。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6942'>南厢俨容卫<span class='inlineComment2'>（容卫：古代之仪仗、侍卫。）</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6942", 6942, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>音响</span>如可聆。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6942'>启圣发空洞<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，朝真趋广庭<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6942'>闲开蕊珠殿<span class='inlineComment2'>（蕊珠殿：见卷2《青云驿》注。）</span>，暗阅<span id='poem_sentence_7_6942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6942'>屏气动方<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作万）</span>息<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，凝神心自灵。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6942'>悠悠车马上<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，浩思安得宁。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6942'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_6942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6942'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6942_0'>⑴ 启圣：开启睿智。任昉《齐禅梁文》：“驭物资贤，登庸启圣。”空洞：道教语，谓化生元气之太虚之境。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6942_0'>⑵ 朝真：道家、道教谓修炼养性之术。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6942_1'>⑶ 气：原作“风”，据杨本、马本、全诗及文意改。蜀本作“飞”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6942_0'>⑷ 马上：原作“上马”，据蜀本、杨本、全诗及文意改。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6942_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=794&endYear=794')">794年</a>　是年，结交李宗闵、庾敬休、辛丘度，与其共游处，有诗。作品：《寄思玄子诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（诗共二十首（已亡佚））</span><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_40_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_6777'>乐章轻<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(11079, id='poem_sentence_42_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_6777'>星移逐西顾，风暖助东巡。<div id='poem_sentence_43_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_6777'>浴德留汤谷，蒐畋过渭滨。<div id='poem_sentence_44_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_6777'>沸天雷殷殷，匝地毂辚辚。<div id='poem_sentence_45_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_6777'>沃土心逾炽，豪家礼渐湮。<div id='poem_sentence_46_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_6777'>老农羞荷锸，贪贾学垂绅。<div id='poem_sentence_47_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_6777'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_6777", 6777, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>曲艺</span>争工巧，彫机变组紃。<div id='poem_sentence_48_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_6777'>青凫连不解，红粟朽相因。<div id='poem_sentence_49_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_6777'>山泽长孳货，梯航竞献珍。<div id='poem_sentence_50_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_6777'>翠毛开越巂，龙眼弊<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作敞）</span>瓯闽。<div id='poem_sentence_51_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_6777'>玉馔薪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_6777", 6777, id='poem_sentence_53_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_6777'>班女恩移赵，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_6777", 6777, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>思王</span>赋感甄。<div id='poem_sentence_54_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_6777'>辉光随顾步，生死属摇唇。<div id='poem_sentence_55_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_6777'>世族功勋久，王姬宠爱亲。<div id='poem_sentence_56_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_6777'>街衢连甲第，冠盖拥朱轮。<div id='poem_sentence_57_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_6777'>大道垂珠箔，当垆踏锦茵。<div id='poem_sentence_58_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_6777'>轩车隘南陌，钟磬满西邻。<div id='poem_sentence_59_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_60_6777'>出入张公子，骄奢<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7786, "poem_sentence_60_6777")'>石季伦</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_60_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_61_6777'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_6777", 6777, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>鸡场</span>潜介羽，马埒并扬尘。<div id='poem_sentence_61_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_6777'>韬袖誇狐腋，弓弦尚鹿𦟘。<div id='poem_sentence_62_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_6777'>紫绦牵白犬，绣䪜被<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作锦鞯覆）</span>花骃。<div id='poem_sentence_63_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_64_6777'>箭倒南山虎，鹰擒东郭㕙。<div id='poem_sentence_64_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_65_6777'>翻身迎过雁，劈肘<span id='poem_sentence_66_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_67_6777'>桥桃矜马鹜，倚顿数牛犉<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作金银）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_67_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_68_6777'>齑斗冬中韭，羹怜远处莼。<div id='poem_sentence_68_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_76_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_77_6777'>王师才<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作方）</span>业业，暴卒已䖜䖜。<div id='poem_sentence_79_6777'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_6777", 6777, "Clauses/158/Comments/0")'>陵园</span>深暮景，霜露下秋旻。<div id='poem_sentence_79_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_80_6777'>凤阙悲巢鵩，鹓行乱野麇。<div id='poem_sentence_80_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_81_6777'>华林荒茂草，寒竹碎贞筠。<div id='poem_sentence_81_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_82_6777'>村落空垣坏，城隍旧井堙。<div id='poem_sentence_82_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_83_6777'>破船沉古渡，战鬼聚阴燐。<div id='poem_sentence_83_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_84_6777'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_6777", 6777, "Clauses/168/Comments/0")'>振臂</span>谁相应，攒眉独不伸。<div id='poem_sentence_84_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_85_6777'>毁容怀赤绂，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_6777", 6777, "Clauses/171/Comments/0")'>混迹</span>戴黄巾。<div id='poem_sentence_85_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_86_6777'>木梗随波荡，桃源敩隐沦。<div id='poem_sentence_86_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_87_6777'>弟兄书信断，鸥鹭往来驯。<div id='poem_sentence_87_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_88_6777'>忽遇山光澈，遥瞻海气真。<div id='poem_sentence_88_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_89_6777'>秘图推废主，后圣合经纶。<div id='poem_sentence_89_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_90_6777'>野杏浑休植，幽兰不复纫。<div id='poem_sentence_90_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_91_6777'>但惊心愤愤，谁恋水粼粼。<div id='poem_sentence_91_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_92_6777'>尽室离深洞，轻桡荡小䑳。<div id='poem_sentence_92_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_93_6777'>殷勤题白石，怅望出青蘋。<div id='poem_sentence_93_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_94_6777'>梦寐平生在，经过处所新。<div id='poem_sentence_94_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_95_6777'>阮郎迷里巷，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(270, "poem_sentence_95_6777")'>辽鹤</span>记城闉。<div id='poem_sentence_95_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_96_6777'>虚过休明代，旋为朽病身。<div id='poem_sentence_96_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_97_6777'>劳生常矻矻，语旧苦谆谆。<div id='poem_sentence_97_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_98_6777'>晚岁多衰柳，先秋愧大椿。<div id='poem_sentence_98_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_99_6777'>眼前年少客，无复昔时人。<div id='poem_sentence_99_6777_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_100_6777'></div><div id='poem_sentence_100_6777_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年</a>　在长安，元稹或代人作文。作品：《论裴延龄表》《又论裴延龄表》<div id='poem_1372438' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372438' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372438?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论裴延龄表</a><span class='authorDate'>（795年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372438")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372438_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372438'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372438'>臣某言。臣昨二十五日宰臣伏宣圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372438_comment'></div>以陆贽败官罪状。不可书于诏命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372438_comment'></div>陛下慈仁爱人。恩宥愚直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372438_comment'></div>仍令后有所见。得以上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372438_comment'></div>臣忝职谏司。不胜大幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372438_comment'></div>臣等前所上表。言陆贽等得罪之由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372438_comment'></div>起于谗构。此皆延龄每自倡言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372438_comment'></div>以弄威宠。及奉宣示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372438_comment'></div>奸诈乃明。陆赞久在禁垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372438_comment'></div>复典枢要。今之谴责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372438_comment'></div>固出圣衷。窃以李克励志恤人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372438_comment'></div>勤身奉职。惠爱之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372438_comment'></div>洽于细微。顷以公事之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372438_comment'></div>与延龄相敌。未贬之月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372438_comment'></div>延龄亦以语人。谗搆之端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372438_comment'></div>群情是惑。臣闻大臣之体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372438_comment'></div>出于谗辞。安可持密勿之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372438_comment'></div>为忿怒之柄。朝廷侧目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372438_comment'></div>远迩摇心。百官素不能亲附延龄者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372438_comment'></div>屏气私门。不知自保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372438_comment'></div>陛下圣德下照。物无所遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372438_comment'></div>岂独厚于一夫。而乃薄于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372438_comment'></div>伏惟发诚谨中官。备问闾里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372438_comment'></div>有言延龄无罪。李克有过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372438_comment'></div>臣实微眇。敢逃天诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372438_comment'></div>李克覆族亡家。于臣何害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372438_comment'></div>事关大本。不敢自私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372438_comment'></div>延龄奸计万殊。方司邦赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372438_comment'></div>必能公用财贿。阴结匪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372438_comment'></div>则他时之过。彰闻路绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372438_comment'></div>伏以贞观遗训。日经宸心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372438_comment'></div>去其邪谋。以慰天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372438_comment'></div>幸甚幸甚。臣不胜恳迫之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372438_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1372438_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1372439' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372439' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372439?labeling=true' target='_blank'>又论裴延龄表</a><span class='authorDate'>（795年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372439")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372439_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372439'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372439'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372439_comment'></div>间者陛下亲授臣以直言之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372439_comment'></div>又命臣以言责之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372439_comment'></div>奉职以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372439_comment'></div>未尝忘死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372439_comment'></div>誓将忠恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372439_comment'></div>上答镕造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372439_comment'></div>窃以裴延龄亏损圣德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372439_comment'></div>渎乱典章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372439_comment'></div>逞其心欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372439_comment'></div>以蝥毒黎元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372439_comment'></div>恣其苛刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372439_comment'></div>以动摇边鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372439_comment'></div>弄陛下爵位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372439_comment'></div>以公授私人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372439_comment'></div>盗陛下威权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372439_comment'></div>以诱胁忠善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372439_comment'></div>贤愚注耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372439_comment'></div>朝野同辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372439_comment'></div>臣固不敢饰其繁文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372439_comment'></div>再扰聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372439_comment'></div>所以昼夜感愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372439_comment'></div>不能自宁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372439_comment'></div>以陛下执刑赏之柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372439_comment'></div>不僭在人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372439_comment'></div>延龄狡诈公行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372439_comment'></div>曾不为念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372439_comment'></div>伏见去年十二月五日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372439_comment'></div>度支讨管李玘配流播州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372439_comment'></div>张勋配流崖州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372439_comment'></div>仍各决六十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372439_comment'></div>斯则延龄自快怒心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372439_comment'></div>曲遂其状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372439_comment'></div>陛下听之以诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372439_comment'></div>谓为当举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372439_comment'></div>峻其所罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372439_comment'></div>用直群司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372439_comment'></div>罪名及加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372439_comment'></div>冤声大振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372439_comment'></div>陛下深鉴其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372439_comment'></div>诏命中留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372439_comment'></div>曾不旬朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372439_comment'></div>驰闻海内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372439_comment'></div>使远方之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372439_comment'></div>疑陛下明有所壅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372439_comment'></div>令无必行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372439_comment'></div>奸以陷君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372439_comment'></div>孰任其咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372439_comment'></div>傥二人独决延龄之手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372439_comment'></div>死不得言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372439_comment'></div>化理之失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372439_comment'></div>岂不重乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372439_comment'></div>陛下常以登闻之鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372439_comment'></div>置之于庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372439_comment'></div>必欲人情纤微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372439_comment'></div>不滞于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372439_comment'></div>比来或事系度支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372439_comment'></div>衔冤上诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372439_comment'></div>皆不即验问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372439_comment'></div>尽付延龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372439_comment'></div>缧囚衣冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372439_comment'></div>攘夺孤贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372439_comment'></div>身不足偿其怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372439_comment'></div>家无以应其求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372439_comment'></div>怨痛内缄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372439_comment'></div>谁与为理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372439_comment'></div>矰缴盈路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372439_comment'></div>动而见拘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372439_comment'></div>咫尺天门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372439_comment'></div>不敢上诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372439_comment'></div>延龄之威益炽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372439_comment'></div>疲人之苦日深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372439_comment'></div>陛下以延龄为贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372439_comment'></div>言者皆妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372439_comment'></div>不若明白其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372439_comment'></div>昭示万方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372439_comment'></div>使延龄无辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372439_comment'></div>辨之何害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372439_comment'></div>傥凶恶滋蔓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372439_comment'></div>郁于人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372439_comment'></div>决之不时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372439_comment'></div>所伤岂细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372439_comment'></div>臣实寒心销肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372439_comment'></div>用是为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372439_comment'></div>伏惟俯鉴众情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372439_comment'></div>召臣问状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372439_comment'></div>有一非据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372439_comment'></div>罪在面欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372439_comment'></div>臣不胜迫切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_88_1372439_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6909' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6909?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春晚寄杨十二兼呈赵八<span class='inlineComment2'>（时杨生馆于赵氏）</span></a><span /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6909_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6909'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7937, "poem_allusion_6909")'>双南金</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6909_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6909'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6909'>蒙蒙竹树深，帘牖多清阴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6909_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6909'>避日坐林影，馀花委芳襟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6909_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6909'>倾尊就<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6909", 6909, id='poem_sentence_3_6909_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6909'>广庭备幽趣，复对商山岑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6909_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6909'>独此爱时景，旷怀云外心。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6909_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6909'>迁莺恋嘉木，求友多好音<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6909_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6909'>自无琅玕实<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，安得莲花簪<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6909_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6909'>寄之二君子，希见<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7937, "poem_sentence_8_6909")'>双<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6909", 6909, "Clauses/17/Comments/2")'>南金</span></span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6909_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6909'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_6909_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6909'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6909_0'>⑴ 商山：山名，在今陕西省商州市东，秦汉之际四皓曾隐居于此，以隐逸著名。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6909_0'>⑵ “迁莺”二句：迁升飞翔之黄莺。《诗·小雅·伐木》：“出自幽谷，迁于乔木。嘤其鸣矣，求其友声。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6909_0'>⑶ 琅玕实：古代神话传说中一种仙树名琅玕，其果实似珠。《山海经·海内西经》：“服常树，其上有三头人，伺琅玕树。”郭璞注：“琅玕子似珠。”此处形容美好之资质。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6909_0'>⑷ 莲花簪：道士之服。《蜀梼杌》卷上：“嫔妃妾妓皆衣道服，莲花冠，髽髻为乐，夹脸连额，渥以朱粉，曰醉妆。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6909_0'>⑸ 双南金：美称杨十二与赵八。南金，南方所产之优质铜。《诗·鲁颂·泮水》：“元龟象齿，大赂南金。”毛传：“南谓荆、扬也。”郑玄笺：“荆、扬之州，贡金三品。”孔颖达疏：“金即铜也。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6909_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　贞元十年至十二年间，在长安作《与杨十二李三早入永寿寺看牡丹》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6745' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6745' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6745?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与杨十二李三早入永寿寺看牡丹</a><span class='authorDate'>（796年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_6745'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6745'>晓入白莲宫<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，琉璃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6745", 6745, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>花界</span>净<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6745'>开敷多喻草<sup id='poem_sentence_4_6745'>笼处彩云合，露湛红珠莹。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6745'>结叶影自交，摇风光不定。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6745'>繁华有时节，安得保全盛。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6745'>色见尽浮荣，希君了真性<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6745'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_6745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6745'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6745_0'>⑴ 白莲宫：东晋释慧远于庐山东林寺，与慧永、慧持、刘遗民、雷次宗等，结社精修念佛三昧，誓愿往生西方净土，又掘地植白莲，故称白莲社。后因称佛寺为白莲宫。此指永寿寺。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6745_0'>⑵ 琉璃：佛教以七宝庄严形容净界，琉璃即七宝之一。花界：莲花界之省称，此指永寿寺。清厉荃《事物异名录·佛释·佛寺》：“《白六帖》：花界、花宫……皆佛寺名。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6745_0'>⑶ 开敷：指开花。敷，布，开。多喻草：指牡丹。佛教常以花草树木示人佛理。《妙法莲华经》卷三《药草喻品》佛告摩诃迦叶及诸大弟子语：“如彼草木，所禀各异，佛以此喻，方便开示，种种言辞，演说一法。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6745_0'>⑷ 真性：佛教谓人本来就具有之不妄不变之心体。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6745_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　贞元十年至十二年间，在长安作《春余遣兴》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6907' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6907' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6907?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春馀遣兴</a><span class='authorDate'>（796年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6907")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6907_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6907'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6907'>春去日渐迟，庭空草偏长。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6907'>馀英间初实，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6907", 6907, "Clauses/3/Comments/2")'>雪絮</span>萦蛛<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作珠）</span>网<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6907'>好鸟多息阴，新篁已成响<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6907'>帘开斜照入，树袅游丝上。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6907'>绝迹念物闲，良时契心赏。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6907'>单衣颇新绰，虚室复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6907", 6907, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>清敞</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6907'>置酒奉亲宾，树萱自怡养<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6907'>笑倚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6907", 6907, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>连枝花</span>，恭扶瑞藤杖。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6907'>步屧恣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6907", 6907, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>优游</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，望山多气象。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6907'>云叶遥卷舒，风裾<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作裙）</span>动萧爽。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6907'>簪缨固烦杂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，江海徒浩荡<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6907'>野马笼赤霄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，无由负<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6907", 6907, "Clauses/23/Comments/1")'>羁鞅</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6907'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_6907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6907'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6907_1'>⑴ 雪絮：即柳絮。南朝宋刘义庆《世说新语·言语》：“谢太傅寒雪日内集，与儿女讲论文义。俄而雪骤，公欣然曰：‘白雪纷纷何所似？’兄子胡儿曰：‘撒盐空中差可拟。’兄女曰：‘未若柳絮因风起。’公大笑乐。”后因以“雪絮”称柳絮。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6907_0'>⑵ “新篁”句：谓风过竹苗簌簌作声。新篁，初发梢叶之竹苗。《字汇·竹部》：“篁，竹苗也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6907_0'>⑶ 树萱：种植萱草。萱，俗称金花菜。《说文·草部》：“萱，令人忘忧草也。萱或从宣。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6907_0'>⑷ 步屧：行走，漫步。屧，木屐。《广韵·帖韵》：“屧，屐也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6907_0'>⑸ 簪缨：古代官吏之冠饰。簪是联冠于发之长针，缨是系冠颔下之带子，此借指仕宦。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6907_0'>⑹ 江海：隐士之居处。《庄子·刻意》：“就薮泽，处闲旷，钓鱼闲处，无为而已矣。此江海之士，避世之人。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6907_0'>⑺ 野马：野外蒸腾之水气。《庄子·逍遥游》：“野马也，尘埃也，生物之以息相吹也。”郭象注：“野马者，游气也。”成玄英疏：“此言青春之时，阳气发动，遥望泽薮之中，犹如奔马，故谓之野马也。”一说野马即尘埃。唐玄应《一切经音义》卷三“野马”孙星衍校正：“或问：‘游气何以谓之野马？’答云：‘马，特塺字假音耳。野马，言野尘也。’”赤霄：极高之天空。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6907_0'>⑻ 羁鞅：驾驭牲口之用具。羁，马络头。鞅，架在牛脖上之器具。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6907_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　贞元十年至十二年间，在长安作《忆云（灵）之》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6752' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6752' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6752?labeling=true' target='_blank'>忆云之</a><span class='authorDate'>（796年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6752")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6752_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6752'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6752'>为鱼实爱泉，食辛宁避蓼<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6752'>人生既相合，不复论<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6752", 6752, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>窕窕</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（窕窕：远离貌，睽违貌。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6752'>沧海良有穷，白日非长皎。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6752'>何事一<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作二）</span>人心<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，各在四方表<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6752'>泛若逐水萍，居为附松茑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6752'>流浪随所之，萦纡牵所绕。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6752'>百龄颇跼促，况复迷寿夭。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6752'>芟发君已衰<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，冠岁予非小<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6752'>娱乐不及时，暮年壮心少。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6752'>感此幽念绵，遂为长悄悄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6752'>中庭草木春，历乱递相扰。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6752'>奇树花冥冥，竹竿凤袅袅。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6752'>幽芳被兰径，安得寄天杪<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6752'>万里潇湘魂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>，夜夜南枝鸟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6752'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_6752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6752'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6752_0'>⑴ 蓼：指水蓼，一年生草本植物，生浅水中，味辛辣，亦称辣蓼。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6752_1'>⑵ 一：原作“二”，据蜀本、杨本、董本、全诗改。一人谓二人亲密无间如同一人。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6752_0'>⑶ 四方表：四方极远之地。表，外面。唐玄应《一切经音义》卷二引《三苍》：“表，外也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6752_0'>⑷ 松茑：即松萝、女萝，参卷1《兔丝》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6752_0'>⑸ 芟发：头发脱落。芟，除草，割。《说文·草部》：“芟，刈草也。”此借指脱落。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6752_0'>⑹ 冠岁：古代男子长至一定年龄，行加冠之礼，表示成人。具体加冠年龄，因时代不同而异。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6752_0'>⑺ 悄悄：心忧。《诗·邶风·柏舟》：“忧心悄悄，愠于群小。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6752_0'>⑻ 天杪：天际。《广雅·释诂一》：“杪，末也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6752_0'>⑼ 潇湘魂：皇英二女与舜帝离别之魂。李白《远别离》：“远别离，古有皇英之二女，乃在洞庭之南，潇湘之浦。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6752_0'>⑽ 南枝鸟：《古诗十九首·行行重行行》：“胡马依北风，越鸟巢南枝。”因借喻思念故乡。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6752_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　贞元十年至十二年间，在长安作《别李三》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6835' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6835' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6835?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别李三</a><span class='authorDate'>（796年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6835")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6835_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6835'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(563, "poem_allusion_6835")'>知我贫</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6835_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6835'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6835'>阶蓂附瑶砌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6835", 6835, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>丛兰</span>偶芳藿<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6835'>高位良有依，幽姿亦相托。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6835'>鲍叔<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(563, "poem_sentence_2_6835")'>知我贫</span>，烹葵不为薄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6835'>半面契始终<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，千金比然诺<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6835'>人生系时命，安得无苦乐。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6835'>但感游子颜，又值馀英落。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6835'>苍苍秦树云，去去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6835", 6835, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>缑山鹤</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6835'>日暮分手归，杨花满城郭。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6835'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_6835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6835'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6835_0'>⑴ 蓂：古代传说中一种瑞草。《竹书纪年》卷上《帝尧陶唐氏》：“又有草荚（夹）阶而生，月朔（阴历初一）始生一荚，月半而生十五荚。十六日以后，日落一荚，及晦（月末）而尽。月小则一荚焦而不落，名曰蓂荚，一曰历荚。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6835_0'>⑵ 藿：香草名，即藿香，多年生芳香草木，茎叶可入药。《广韵·铎韵》：“藿，香草。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6835_0'>⑶ “鲍叔”二句：《史记·管晏列传》（卷六二）：“管仲夷吾者，颍上人也。少时常与鲍叔牙游，鲍叔知其贫。管仲贫困，常欺鲍叔，鲍叔终善遇之，不以为言……管仲曰：‘吾始困时，尝与鲍叔贾，分财利多自与，鲍叔不以我为贪，知我贫也；吾尝为鲍叔谋事而更穷困，鲍叔不以我为愚，知时有利不利也；吾尝三仕三见逐于君，鲍叔不以我为不肖，知我不遭时也；吾尝三战三走，鲍叔不以我为怯，知我有老母也；公子纠败，召忽死之，吾幽囚受辱，鲍叔不以我无耻，知我不羞小节而耻功名不显于天下也。生我者父母，知我者鲍子也。”葵，葵菜。元王祯《农书》卷八：“葵为百菜之主，备四时之馔，本丰而奈旱，味甘而无毒……子若根则能疗疾，咸无弃材，诚蔬茹之上品，民生之资助也。”《诗·豳风·七月》：“七月烹葵及菽。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6835_0'>⑷ “半面”句：谓交往虽浅而交情不浅。《后汉书·应奉传》“奉少聪明”李贤注引三国吴谢承《后汉书》：“奉年二十时，尝诣彭城相袁贺，贺时出行闭门，造车匠于内开扇出半面视奉，奉即委去。后数十年于路见车匠，识而呼之。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6835_0'>⑸ “千金”句：谓坚守信用，不轻易许诺。《史记·季布栾布列传》：“得黄金百斤，不如得季布一诺。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6835_0'>⑹ 缑山鹤：旧题汉刘向《列仙传·王子乔》：“王子乔者，周灵王太子晋也。好吹笙，作凤凰鸣。游伊洛之间，道士浮丘公接以上嵩高山。三十馀年后，求之于山上，见桓良曰：‘告我家：七月七日待我于缑氏山巅。’至时，果乘白鹤驻山头，望之不得到，举手谢时人，数日而去。”缑山，即缑氏山，在今河南省偃师市。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6835_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=796')">796年</a>　贞元十年至十二年间，在长安作《秋夕远怀》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6917' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6917' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6917?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋夕远怀</a><span class='authorDate'>（796年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6917")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6917_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6917'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6917'>旦夕天气爽，风飘叶渐轻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6917'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6917", 6917, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>星繁</span>河汉白，露逼衾枕清。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6917'>丹鸟月中灭<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，莎鸡床下鸣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6917'>悠悠此怀抱，况复多远情。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6917'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6917'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6917_0'>⑴ 丹鸟：萤火虫之别名。晋崔豹《古今注·鱼虫》：“萤火，一名丹良，一名丹鸟，食蚊蚋。”《大戴礼记·小夏正》：“八月，丹鸟羞白鸟。丹鸟也者，谓丹良也；白鸟也者，谓蚊蚋也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6917_0'>⑵ 莎（shā）鸡：虫名，又名络纬，俗称纺织娘。《诗·豳风·七月》：“六月莎鸡振羽。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6917_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", id='poem_title_1372484_0'>① 丁申文书上尚书省按之辞云虽误可行用</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372484'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372484'>文奏或差。本虞行诈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372484_comment'></div>此例可办。必有原情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372484_comment'></div>苟异因缘之奸。则矜过误之罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372484_comment'></div>丁也方将计簿。忽谬正名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372484_comment'></div>曾不戒于爰毫。遂见尤为起草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372484_comment'></div>然以法存按省。误有等差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372484_comment'></div>倘以百为千。比赐缣而难赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372484_comment'></div>若当五而四。纵阙马而何伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372484_comment'></div>苟殊鱼鲁相悬。宜恕甲由未远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372484_comment'></div>按其非是。虽怀三豕之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372484_comment'></div>诉以可行。难书一字之贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372484_comment'></div>请诸会府。弃此小瑕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372484_comment'></div>非愚诉人。在法当尔。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372485?labeling=true' target='_blank'>易家有归藏判<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372485")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372485_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1372485_0'>① 甲为处士家畜归藏易常以七八为占邻人告其左道不伏</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372485'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372485'>四营成易。本用穷神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372485_comment'></div>三代演图。孰云疑众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372485_comment'></div>甲志敦素履。学洞青囊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372485_comment'></div>不言非圣之书。忽招诬善之告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372485_comment'></div>虽九六布卦。我则背于周经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372485_comment'></div>而七八为占。尔盍观于殷道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372485_comment'></div>且穆姜遇艮。足徵麟史之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372485_comment'></div>尼父得坤。亦验归藏之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372485_comment'></div>以斯偿责。可用质疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372485_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1372485_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1372486' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372486' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372486?labeling=true' target='_blank'>修堤请种树判<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372486")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372486_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1372486_0'>① 乙修堤毕复请种树功价有司以为不急之务乙固请营缮令诸候水堤内不得造小堤及人居其堤内外各五步并堤上种榆柳杂树若堤内窄狭地种拟充堤堰之用</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372486'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372486'>善防既毕。固合程功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372486_comment'></div>柔木载施。亦将补败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372486_comment'></div>乙之亟请。谁谓过求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372486_comment'></div>隐椎之役虽终。列树之思尚切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372486_comment'></div>有司见阻。无备实难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372486_comment'></div>苟吝养材之资。盖非长利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372486_comment'></div>远求为揵之用。岂不重劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372486_comment'></div>当有取于缮完。顾何烦于艺植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372486_comment'></div>且十年可待。五步足徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372486_comment'></div>防在未萌。著之先甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372486_comment'></div>因而致用。庶无瓠子之灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372486_comment'></div>言之不从。恐累匏瓜之系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372486_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1372486_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1372487' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372487' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372487?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夜绩判<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372487")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372487_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1372487_0'>① 得县申岁十月入人里胥使妇人相从夜绩每月课四十五功听其歌咏行人善之徇于路按察禁之太师以失职致词</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372487'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372487'>天回地旋。阳生阴息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372487_comment'></div>玉衡指孟冬之野。促绩鸣寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372487_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372487", 1372487, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>金昴</span>临短景之昏。厥人当隩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372487_comment'></div>相彼同色<span class='inlineComment2'>（疑作邑）</span>。懋哉惟时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372487_comment'></div>戒坐塾之里胥。稽其既入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372487_comment'></div>率同巷之众妇。绩以相从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372487_comment'></div>素绪霜柔。其纷如于永漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372487_comment'></div>红光炎上。俱省费于馀辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372487_comment'></div>夜兼功以日多。日存课而年最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372487_comment'></div>若廉叔之劝蜀。襦裤兴讴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372487_comment'></div>类古公之居豳。茅绹斯诵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372487_comment'></div>故令风俗翕习。家室乃宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372487_comment'></div>有未得其所然。或心伤而发咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372487_comment'></div>则摽梅求吉。编王化之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372487_comment'></div>采芑怀征。列雅章之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372487_comment'></div>行人掌乎宣布。载在搜扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372487_comment'></div>得咏言于此邦。将遐徇以遒迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372487_comment'></div>太师典乐。允被克谐之恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372487_comment'></div>按察观风。何为失职之禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372487_comment'></div>先王制法。宁罚有词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372487_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1372487_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1372488' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372488' class='poemTitle id='poem_title_1372488_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1372488_0'>① 乙于田中种树邻长责其妨五谷乙乃不伏</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372488'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372488'>百草丽地。在物虽佳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372488_comment'></div>五稼用天。于人尤急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372488_comment'></div>乙姑勤树事。颇害农收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372488_comment'></div>列植有昧于环庐。播穑遂妨于终亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372488_comment'></div>虽椅桐梓漆。或备梓人之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372488_comment'></div>而黍稷稻梁。宜先后稷之穑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372488_comment'></div>苟亏冒陇。焉用成蹊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372488_comment'></div>纵有念于息阴。岂可侔于望岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_title_1372489_0'>① 戊为营田使申屯田官考课违常限省司不收辞云待农事毕方知殿最</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372489'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372489'>要会有期。诚宜献状。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1372489_comment'></div>三时罔害。然有别于耗登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372489_comment'></div>五稼未终。安可议其诛赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_content_1372490'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372490'>感物而动。乐容以和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372490_comment'></div>苟气志愤兴。则琴音猛起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372490_comment'></div>既彰蓄憾。讵爽明言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372490_comment'></div>详季札之观风。尚分理乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372491_comment'></div>授舞鹤之声。青阳忽生于南吕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372491_comment'></div>鼓能气至。艺与天同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372491_comment'></div>且异反常之妖。何伤应感而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372491_comment'></div>恶夫典乐。曾是滥科。<div class='inline' id='poem_content_1372492'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372492'>声乐皆具。以奉常尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372492_comment'></div>名位不同。则难踰节。<div class='inline' id='poem_title_1372496_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1372496_0'>① 诏赐蕃官宴有司不以弓矢驱鸟鸢御史劾之词云非祭祀之事</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372496'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372496'>蛮夷麇至。洁牛羊以宴私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372496_comment'></div>弓矢载张。备鸟鸢之钞盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372496_comment'></div>苟馈食而则尔。岂荐飨之独然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372496_comment'></div>况乎要服在庭。舌人委体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372496_comment'></div>方示怀于犒饮。胡废职于驱除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372496_comment'></div>且宾主恪恭。须防坠鼠之秽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372496_comment'></div>牲牢备礼。宁无攫肉之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372496_comment'></div>曾是阙于弦弧。复何徵于击豕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372496_comment'></div>周礼尽在。既专分鸟之司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372496_comment'></div>陈力自乖。宜惮乘骢之劾。<div class='inline' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　贞元十七、十八年间在长安作有《牡丹二首》，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6253' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6253' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　贞元十七、十八年间在长安作有《刘颇诗》，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6474' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6474' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6474?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刘颇诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（802年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6474")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6474_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6474'>昌平人刘颇，其上三世有义烈，颇少落行阵。二十解属文，举进士科试不就，负气，狭路间病罂车蔽柩，尽碎之，罄囊酬直而去。南归唐州，为吏所轧，势不支，气屈。自火其居，出契书投火中，繇是以气闻。予闻风四五年而后见，因以诗许之。</div><div id='poem_preface_6474_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6474'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6474'>一言感激士，三世义忠臣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年3月</a>　在长安中平判科第四等，礼部侍郎权德舆知贡举。署秘书省校书郎。与白居易交游密切，与李建结交。韦夏卿改太子判宾客。有文。作品：《毁方瓦合判》<div id='poem_1372494' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372494' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372494?labeling=true' target='_blank'>毁方瓦合判<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（803年3月）</span><span class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372494'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372494'>教以就贤。虽无黩下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372494_comment'></div>俾其容众。则在毁方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372494_comment'></div>太学以将务发蒙。宜先屈已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372494_comment'></div>君子不器。须怀虚受之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372494_comment'></div>至人无方。何必自贤于物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372494_comment'></div>爰因善诱。式念思恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372494_comment'></div>将戒同尘之诚。遂申合土之誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372494_comment'></div>况卑以自牧。仲尼尝述于为儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372494_comment'></div>礼贵用和。子张亦非于拒我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372494_comment'></div>义存无傲。道在可嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_6591' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6591' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6591?labeling=true' target='_blank'>恭王故太妃挽歌词二首<span class='inlineComment2'>（校书郎时作）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（805年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6591")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6591_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6591'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6591'>燕姞贻天梦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，梁王尽孝思<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6591_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6591'>虽从魏诏葬<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，得用汉藩<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作官）</span>仪<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6591_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6591'>曙月残光敛，寒箫度曲迟<span class='inlineComment2'>（度曲：按曲谱演奏。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6591_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6591'>平生奉恩地，哀挽欲何之。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6591_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6591'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6591_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6591'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6591_0'>⑴ “燕姞”句：《左传·宣公三年》：“郑文公有贱妾曰燕姞，梦天使与己兰，曰：‘余为伯鯈。余，尔祖也，以是为而子，以兰有国香，人服媚之如是。’既而文公见之，与之兰而御之。辞曰：‘妾不才，幸而有子。将不信，敢徵兰乎？’公曰：‘诺！’生穆公，名之曰兰。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6591_0'>⑵ “梁王”句：南朝梁武帝萧衍著《孝思赋》，中有“至如献岁发挥，春日载阳，木散百华，草列众芳。对乐时而无欢，乃触目而感伤。朱明启节，白日朝临，木低甘果，树接清阴。不愉悦于怀抱，唯罔极而缠心。”宣扬孝亲之旨。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6591_0'>⑶ “虽从”句：《乐府诗集·相和歌辞六·铜雀台》宋郭茂倩题解：“《邺都故事》曰：‘魏武帝遗命诸子曰：吾死之后，葬于邺之西岗上，与西门祠相近，无藏珠玉珍宝，馀香可分诸夫人，不命祭吾。妾与伎人，皆著铜雀台，台上施六尺床，下繐帐，朝晡上酒脯粻糒之属。每月朝十五，辄向帐前作伎，汝等时登台，望吾西陵墓田。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6591_1'>⑷ “得用”句：汉潘勖《册魏公九锡文》：“魏国置丞相以下群卿百僚，皆如汉初诸王之制。”汉蔡邕《独断》：“汉制，皇子封为王者，其实古诸侯也。周末诸侯或称王，而汉天子自以皇帝为称，故以王号加之，总名诸侯王。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6591_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6592' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6592' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6592?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span id='poem_sentence_0_6592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6592'>雪云埋陇合，箫鼓望城还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6592_0'>⑵ “仪表”句：谓恭王之母可为宗室诸女性之榜样。河间，指河间王孝恭。《新唐书·宗室传赞》（卷七八）：“至河间之功，江夏之略，可谓宗室标的者也。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6592_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年1月2日</a>　与李绅、庾敬休同游曲江，有诗。作品：《永贞二年正月二日上御丹凤楼赦天下予与李公垂庾顺之闲行曲江不及盛观》<div id='poem_6197' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6197' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6197'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6197'>春来饶梦慵朝起，不看千官拥御楼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6197_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　永贞二年正月二日以后改元和，历名永贞，止元旦一日，元稹以其时事作诗。作品：《永贞历》<div id='poem_6506' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6506' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6506?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贞元<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作永贞）</span>历<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6506")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6506_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6506_1'>① 是岁秋八月，太上改元永贞，传位今皇帝。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6506'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6506'>象魏才颁历<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6506", 6506, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>龙镳</span>已御天<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6506'>犹看后元历<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，新署永贞年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6506'>半岁光阴在，三朝礼数迁<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6506'>无因书简册，空得咏诗篇。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6506'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6506'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6506_0'>⑴ 象魏：古代宫门外两边高耸之楼观，其下常为悬布法令之所。《淮南子·俶真训》：“神游魏阙之下。”高诱注：“魏阙，王者门外阙也，所以悬教民之书于象魏也。嵬嵬高大，故曰魏阙。”颁历：古代前年年末颁布次年所行之新历。《旧唐书·职官二》：“每年预造来年历颁于天下。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6506_0'>⑵ “龙镳”句：谓皇帝驾崩。《新唐书·德宗纪》：“（贞元）二十一年正月癸巳，皇帝崩于会宁殿，年六十四。”龙镳，仙人之坐骑。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6506_0'>⑶ 后元历：德宗在位时所颁布之历法，即贞元历。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6506_0'>⑷ “半岁”二句：贞元二十一年正月初一至二十三日为德宗朝，正月二十三日至八月初四为顺宗朝，八月初四以后为宪宗朝。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6506_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　宪宗下诏讨刘辟，元稹代人作表。作品：《论讨刘贼表》<div id='poem_1372451' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372451' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372451?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论讨贼表</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1372451'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372451'>臣伏见贼辟有不庭之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372451_comment'></div>陛下尚覆露以待之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372451_comment'></div>此诚陛下罪已泣辜之仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372451_comment'></div>微臣何足以识之哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372451_comment'></div>然臣闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372451_comment'></div>天之所以为天者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372451_comment'></div>以其能化物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372451_comment'></div>物之性不一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372451_comment'></div>故天之道有和煦震曜之异焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372451_comment'></div>始其生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372451_comment'></div>动之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372451", 1372451, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>幽伏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372451_comment'></div>被之以春阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372451_comment'></div>扇之以仁风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372451_comment'></div>润之以膏雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372451_comment'></div>则百果草木之柔者顺者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372451_comment'></div>油然而生矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372451_comment'></div>及夫勾曲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372451", 1372451, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>角觡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372451_comment'></div>坚本顽心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372451_comment'></div>凝者滞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372451_comment'></div>幽者蛰者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372451_comment'></div>扇之以和煦而不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372451_comment'></div>润之以膏雨而不滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372451_comment'></div>则必迅之以雷震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372451_comment'></div>曜之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372451", 1372451, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>威赫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372451_comment'></div>然后顽滞之心改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372451_comment'></div>幽蛰之气宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372451_comment'></div>岂天之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372451_comment'></div>仁于彼而厉于此乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372451_comment'></div>化与不化之异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372451_comment'></div>是以蚩尤之乱作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372451_comment'></div>黄帝铸五兵以杀绝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372451_comment'></div>共工之行恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372451_comment'></div>虞舜揭五刑以放死之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372451_comment'></div>岂不欲梦华胥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1372451", 1372451, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>舞干</span>羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372451_comment'></div>而跻之于仁寿哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372451_comment'></div>盖不可化也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372451_comment'></div>及夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1372451", 1372451, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>舞干</span>而适至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372451_comment'></div>因垒而来归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372451_comment'></div>此又物之可化者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372451_comment'></div>岂黄帝虞舜文王之德有优劣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372451_comment'></div>盖蚩尤共工苗人崇人罪有深浅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372451_comment'></div>今陛下法天之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372451_comment'></div>与物为春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372451_comment'></div>凡在生成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372451_comment'></div>孰不<span id='poem_sentence_45_1372451_comment'></div>天将弃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372451_comment'></div>寘蟊贼于其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372451_comment'></div>假蝼蚁以为聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372451_comment'></div>忠臣孝子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372451_comment'></div>思得食其肉而快其心久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372451_comment'></div>陛下犹耸之以名爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372451_comment'></div>导之以训诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372451_comment'></div>崇之以宠章而不至。<div id='poem_sentence_56_1372451_comment'></div>人人不胜其愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372451_comment'></div>有司不忍其威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372451_comment'></div>是以违陛下<span id='poem_sentence_63_1372451_comment'></div>善则善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372451_comment'></div>其如天下之愤何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372451_comment'></div>其如天下之愤何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372451_comment'></div>臣愿陛下可有司之奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372451_comment'></div>法皇天之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372451_comment'></div>与公卿大臣议斩叛吊人之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372451_comment'></div>以快天下人人之愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372451_comment'></div>实天下幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372451_comment'></div>微臣无任恳悃嫉恶之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1372451_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　春，与白居易居华阳观，闭户累月，揣摩时事，以备制举考试。李绅、李宗闵亦时相过从。裴垍曾予指导。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年4月13日</a>　参加制举考试，作文。作品：《才识兼茂名于体用策一道》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年4月</a>　登才识兼茂明于体用科，考策官为韦贯之、张弘靖。授左拾遗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年5月</a>　“外诸翁”京兆尹郑云逵卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年7月</a>　太上皇唐顺宗葬于丰陵，有诗记之。作品：《顺宗至德大圣大安孝皇帝挽歌词三首》<div id='poem_6582' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6582' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6582?labeling=true' target='_blank'>顺宗至德大圣大安孝皇帝挽歌词三首<span class='inlineComment2'>（左拾遗时作）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（806年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6582")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6582_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6582'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6582'>不改延洪祚，因成揖让朝<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6582'>讴歌同戴启<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6582", 6582, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>遏密</span>共思尧<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6582'>雨露施恩广，梯航会葬遥<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6582'>号弓那独切<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，曾感昔年招<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6582'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6582'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6582_0'>⑴ “不改”二句：贞元二十一年正月，顺宗即位后，仍沿用贞元年号。八月庚子，立太子李纯为帝，自称太上皇。辛丑，方改元永贞。顺宗退位，实迫于无奈，元稹于此有所讳饰。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6582_0'>⑵ “讴歌”句：夏禹晚年，把治国天下之大权交给自己的儿子启。数年之后，启治理国家甚有政绩，深受人民拥戴，在夏禹死后就继承了王位。贞元二十一年七月，顺宗之子李纯以皇太子勾当军国政事，次月顺宗内禅，李纯即位，是为唐宪宗。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6582_0'>⑶ 遏密：指皇帝崩后停止举乐。《尚书·舜典》：“帝乃殂落，百姓如丧考妣，三载四海遏密八音。”孔传：“遏，绝；密，静。”孔颖达疏：“四海之人，蛮夷戎狄，皆绝静八音而不复作乐。”此处指居皇帝丧期间。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6582_0'>⑷ 梯航：梯山航海之省，谓长途跋涉。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6582_0'>⑸ 号弓：《史记·封禅书》载：黄帝采首阳山之铜，铸鼎荆山下。鼎成，有龙迎黄帝上天，后宫从之者七十馀人。小臣不得上，攀其龙髯，髯拔，坠黄帝弓，抱弓持髯而泣。此因指顺宗崩殂。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6582_0'>⑹ 昔年招：元稹元和元年中制举，此次制举乃据永贞元年二月顺宗所下诏书举行，故举人为先朝所徵。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6582_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6583' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6583' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6583?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（806年7月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6583_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6583'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6583'>前春文祖庙，大舜嗣尧登<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6583_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6583'>及此踰年感，还因是月崩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6583_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6583'>寿缘追孝促，业在继明兴。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6583_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6583'>俭诏同今古<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，山川绕灞陵<span class='inlineComment2'>（灞陵：见卷5《西还》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6583_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6583'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6583_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6583'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6583_0'>⑴ “前春”二句：谓贞元二十一年正月，顺宗继承德宗之位而登基。文祖庙，文祖之说，诸家不一。《尚书·舜典》：“受终于文祖。”孔传：“文祖者，尧文德之祖庙。”此指唐王室之祖庙。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6583_0'>⑵ “还”句：顺宗正月即位，正月崩殂。《旧唐书·顺宗纪》：“贞元二十一年正月癸巳，德宗崩。丙申，（顺宗）即位于太极殿。……元和元年正月……甲申，太上皇（顺宗）崩于兴庆宫之咸宁殿，享年六十四岁。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6583_0'>⑶ “俭诏”句：顺宗即位后，下诏罢宫市，放宫女三百人及教坊女妓六百人，天下诸道除正敕率税外诸色榷税并宜禁断除上供外不得别有进奉等，其尚俭作风，颇类汉文帝。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6583_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6584' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6584' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6584?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（806年7月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6584_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6584'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6584'>七月悲风起<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，凄凉万国人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6584_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6584'>羽仪经巷内<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，辒𨍇转城闉<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6584_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6584'>暝色依陵早，秋声入辂新。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6584_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6584'>自嗟同草木，不识永贞春<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6584_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6584'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6584_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6584'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6584_0'>⑴ 七月：《旧唐书·顺宗纪》：元和元年“秋七月壬申，（顺宗）葬于丰陵。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6584_0'>⑵ 羽仪：以羽毛为饰之旌旗等，此指送葬之仪仗。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6584_0'>⑶ 辒𨍇：丧车。《韩非子·内储说上》：“载驩，宋太宰，夜使人曰：‘吾闻数夜有乘辒车至李史门者，谨为我伺之。’”陈奇猷集释引尹桐阳曰：“《说文》：‘辒，卧车也。’后以载丧，因为丧车之称。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6584_0'>⑷ “不”句：《旧唐书·顺宗纪》：八月“宜改贞元二十一年为永贞元年。”而次年又改元元和，故永贞无“春”。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6584_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年7月</a>　议迁庙之礼，作文。作品：《迁庙议状》<div id='poem_1372482' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372482' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372482?labeling=true' target='_blank'>迁庙议</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372482")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372482_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372482'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372482'>谨按礼官以顺宗至德大圣大安孝皇帝神主升祔。则中宗大和大圣大昭孝皇帝神主为代数当迁之庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372482_comment'></div>议者云。中宗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372482", 1372482, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>复辟</span>中兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372482_comment'></div>当为百代<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372482", 1372482, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>不迁之庙</span>。台省官等又议云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372482_comment'></div>则天为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372482", 1372482, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>居摄</span>。则中宗非中兴之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372482_comment'></div>不得为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372482", 1372482, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>不迁之庙</span>。以愚所裁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372482_comment'></div>皆非得礼之中也。案礼官与台省官等议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372482_comment'></div>但以为中宗非中兴。故不得为不迁之宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372482_comment'></div>曾不知虽实为中兴。亦不得为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372482", 1372482, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>不迁之庙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372482_comment'></div>何则。祖有功而宗有德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372482_comment'></div>盖谓始有功者为祖。始有德者为宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372482_comment'></div>非谓后代有功有德者尽为祖宗也。礼纬云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372482_comment'></div>唐虞立二昭二穆。与太祖之庙为五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372482_comment'></div>夏不立太祖之庙。四庙而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372482_comment'></div>至后代以禹为宗。亦立五庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372482_comment'></div>其馀仲康复厥位。少康代寒浞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372482_comment'></div>岂非嗣夏中兴哉。并无祖宗之号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372482_comment'></div>至殷以契为始祖。初立五庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372482_comment'></div>后代以汤为宗。遂立六庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372482_comment'></div>太戊武丁之徒。虽有中宗高宗之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372482_comment'></div>盖子孙加之懿号而已。亦无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372482", 1372482, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>不祧</span>之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372482_comment'></div>周人以后稷为始祖。后代又祖文王而宗武王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372482_comment'></div>遂立七庙。唐虞夏殷周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372482_comment'></div>虽立庙之数不同。其实亲亲之庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372482_comment'></div>皆以四为准。礼记王制云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372482_comment'></div>天子七庙。三昭三穆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372482_comment'></div>与太祖之庙七。盖后稷文武三庙为不迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372482_comment'></div>其馀成康已降。尽为祧庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372482_comment'></div>故周礼守祧注云。先公之祧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372482_comment'></div>祔于后稷之庙。先王之祧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372482_comment'></div>祔于文武之庙。若以为后代有功有德者尽为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1372482", 1372482, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>不迁之庙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372482_comment'></div>则成康刑措。宣王中兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372482_comment'></div>平王东周之始王。并无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1372482", 1372482, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>不祧</span>之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372482_comment'></div>岂非有功有德哉。盖以为七庙之数既定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372482_comment'></div>若亲尽之庙不毁。则亲亲之昭穆无所设矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372482_comment'></div>故不得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1372482", 1372482, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>不祧</span>耳。至汉承秦灭学之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372482_comment'></div>诸儒不通大义。匡衡贡禹之徒遂建议云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372482_comment'></div>高帝为太祖。孝文为太宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372482_comment'></div>孝武为世宗。孝宣为中宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372482_comment'></div>惠景已下为迁庙。适值汉祚不永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372482_comment'></div>昭成已降。德不逮于四君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372482_comment'></div>向若汉有八百之祚。继德之君有若孝文孝武者七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372482_comment'></div>尽为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1372482", 1372482, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>不迁之庙</span>。岂可后代遂不祀其祖祢哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372482_comment'></div>不经之言。孰甚于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372482_comment'></div>又有以七庙之外。别立祖宗之庙为说者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372482_comment'></div>以理推之。尤为不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372482_comment'></div>假如圣朝以景皇帝为太祖。神尧大圣大光孝皇帝为高祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372482_comment'></div>文武大圣大广孝皇帝为太宗。别列昭穆之庙六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372482_comment'></div>合<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1372482", 1372482, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>不迁之庙</span>为九。盖以为积厚者流泽广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372482_comment'></div>故以增亲亲之庙六矣。夫传无穷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372482_comment'></div>为万代计。国家以圣生圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372482_comment'></div>以明继明。无非有德之宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372482_comment'></div>尽为有功之祖。则百祖千宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372482_comment'></div>尽居别庙。于礼又可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372482_comment'></div>必若俟其褒贬。然后定祧迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372482_comment'></div>则是臣子有轻议之非。万代无可传之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372482_comment'></div>考殷周则无据。言情理则两乖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372482_comment'></div>考古宜今。孰云可者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372482_comment'></div>曷若削汉朝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1372482", 1372482, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>不经之说</span>。徵殷周可久之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372482_comment'></div>从亲尽则迁之常规。为万代不朽之定制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372482_comment'></div>不易亲亲之祀。终无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1372482", 1372482, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>惑惑</span>之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372482_comment'></div>诚一王之盛典也。谨议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372482_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_61_1372482_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年7月</a>　盩厔尉权摄昭应县白居易作诗寄元稹、李翱，元稹酬和。作品：《酬乐天》<div id='poem_6999' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6999' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6999?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬乐天<span class='inlineComment2'>（时乐天摄尉，予为拾遗。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（806年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6999")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6999_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6999'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6999'>放鹤在深水，置鱼在高枝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6999'>升沈或异势，同谓非所宜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6999'>君为邑中吏，皎皎鸾凤姿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6999'>顾我何为者，翻侍白玉墀<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6999'>昔作芸香侣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，三载不暂离。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6999'>逮兹忽相失，旦夕梦魂思。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6999'>崔嵬骊山顶，宫树遥参差。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6999'>祗得两相望，不得长相随。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6999'>多君岁寒意<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，裁作秋兴诗。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6999'>上言<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作有）</span>风尘苦，下言时节移。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6999'>官家事拘束，安得携手期。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6999'>愿为云与雨，会合天之垂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6999'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_6999_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6999'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6999_0'>⑴ “翻侍”句，谓在朝中任左拾遗。白玉墀：宫殿前之白石台阶。</div></div><div
