class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6999_0'>⑵ 芸香侣：指贞元十九年至二十一年元白二人同校书秘省。芸香，花叶香气浓郁，可用之驱蠹书之虫，故以之称富于藏书之秘书省。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6999_0'>⑶ 多：赞赏，赞同。岁寒意：环境改变而能保持旧有节操之意。《论语·子罕》：“子曰：‘岁寒，然后知松柏之后凋也。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6999_0'>⑷ 天之垂：犹天涯。垂，边缘，后作陲。《说文·土部》：“垂，远边也。”朱骏声通训定声：“书传皆以陲为之。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6999_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年8月13日</a>　延英昭对。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　是年，上书言政事。作品：《论西戎表》《献事表》《论教书本》《论谏职表》《论追制表》<div id='poem_1372452' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372452' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372452?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论西戎表</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372452")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372452_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372452'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372452'>蒙恩顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372452_comment'></div>窃见陛下患戎之意深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372452_comment'></div>自贞元以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372452_comment'></div>国家所以甘亿兆之费于塞下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372452_comment'></div>盖以犬戎有侵轶之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372452_comment'></div>而边人思守御之利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372452_comment'></div>然而河湟之地日削。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372452_comment'></div>田莱之业日空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372452_comment'></div>塞下之人日亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372452_comment'></div>戎狄之心日炽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372452_comment'></div>若此非他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372452_comment'></div>不得备之之术也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372452_comment'></div>且臣闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372452_comment'></div>君之命帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372452_comment'></div>帅之命将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372452_comment'></div>将之使卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372452_comment'></div>犹心之使臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372452_comment'></div>臂之使指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372452_comment'></div>然后敌可擒而军可制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372452_comment'></div>今之屯戍者则不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372452_comment'></div>众其城堡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372452_comment'></div>异其师长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372452_comment'></div>获一马则图功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372452_comment'></div>虏一戎则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372452", 1372452, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>告捷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372452_comment'></div>至于屠县道掠万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372452_comment'></div>则曰力弱不足以应敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372452_comment'></div>援寡不足以摧凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372452_comment'></div>苟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1372452", 1372452, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>谨闲</span>缮完不失其守者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372452_comment'></div>则朝廷议赏之不给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372452_comment'></div>又孰肯摧锋刃冒殊死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372452_comment'></div>而出入于系虏哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372452_comment'></div>此又非他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372452_comment'></div>众分力散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372452_comment'></div>而责师之刑无所加也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372452_comment'></div>而又加之以为农者不教战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372452_comment'></div>屯聚者不兼农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372452_comment'></div>寇至则卒伍被甲而乘城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372452_comment'></div>野人空弮以应敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372452_comment'></div>此又耕战之术不修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372452_comment'></div>而屯聚之方太逸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372452_comment'></div>今夫邠岐汧陇之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372452_comment'></div>皆后稷公刘之所理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372452_comment'></div>土宜植物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372452_comment'></div>人务稼穑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372452_comment'></div>陛下诚能使本道节制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372452_comment'></div>广于荒隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372452_comment'></div>大建屯田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372452_comment'></div>塞下诸军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372452_comment'></div>除使令守防之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372452_comment'></div>一切出之于野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372452_comment'></div>限人名田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372452_comment'></div>复其租入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372452_comment'></div>然后因其阡陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372452_comment'></div>制之闾井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372452_comment'></div>因其卒伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372452_comment'></div>树之师长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372452_comment'></div>固其塍堑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372452_comment'></div>以备不虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372452_comment'></div>犬戎适至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372452_comment'></div>则有连阡接畛之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372452_comment'></div>戎骑才归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372452_comment'></div>则复耰锄穫耨之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372452_comment'></div>若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372452_comment'></div>则曩时之聚食者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372452_comment'></div>尽归之于服勤之农矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372452_comment'></div>前此之系虏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372452_comment'></div>尽化为守御之兵矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372452_comment'></div>三五年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372452_comment'></div>塞下有相因之粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372452_comment'></div>边人无侵轶之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372452_comment'></div>陛下又董之以良帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372452_comment'></div>威之以必刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372452_comment'></div>则彼琐琐之戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372452_comment'></div>陛下将署其君长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372452_comment'></div>征其牛羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372452_comment'></div>奴虏以擒之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372452_comment'></div>蝼蚁以攘之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372452_comment'></div>又何必询王恢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372452_comment'></div>使苏武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372452_comment'></div>用晁错。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372452_comment'></div>访娄敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372452_comment'></div>而后复河湟称即叙哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372452_comment'></div>此备戎之大略也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372452_comment'></div>方今犹有急于此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372452_comment'></div>臣敢冒昧殊死而言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372452_comment'></div>臣闻善奕棋者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372452_comment'></div>将劫其棋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372452_comment'></div>必固其羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372452_comment'></div>是以敌可杀而地不危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372452_comment'></div>今庸蜀有犬吠之惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372452_comment'></div>南蛮绝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1372452", 1372452, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>贡诚</span>之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372452_comment'></div>陛下又辍边将以统问罪之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372452_comment'></div>脱或蜂虿相完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372452_comment'></div>尚稽天讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372452_comment'></div>兵连不解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372452_comment'></div>绵夏涉秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372452_comment'></div>则犬戎乘衅启心之日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372452_comment'></div>陛下其图之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372452_comment'></div>臣无任恳款忧边之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1372452_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1372440' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372440' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372440?labeling=true' target='_blank'>献事表</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372440")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372440_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372440'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372440'>臣闻理乱之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372440_comment'></div>各有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372440", 1372440, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>萌象</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372440_comment'></div>二者无门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372440_comment'></div>在君上启之而巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372440_comment'></div>所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372440", 1372440, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>萌象</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372440_comment'></div>岂有他哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372440_comment'></div>容直言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372440_comment'></div>广视听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372440_comment'></div>躬勤庶务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372440_comment'></div>委信大臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372440_comment'></div>使左右近习者不敢蔽疏远之臣庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372440_comment'></div>此理之象也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372440_comment'></div>此而不理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372440_comment'></div>万无一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372440_comment'></div>大臣不亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372440_comment'></div>直言不进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372440_comment'></div>抵忌讳者杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372440_comment'></div>犯左右者刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372440_comment'></div>与一二近习者决事于深宫之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372440_comment'></div>群臣莫得参筹画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372440_comment'></div>此乱之萌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372440_comment'></div>此而不乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372440_comment'></div>亦万无一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372440_comment'></div>是以古者人君即位之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372440_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1372440", 1372440, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>萌象</span>未见之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372440_comment'></div>必有狂直敢言之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372440_comment'></div>抵忌讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372440_comment'></div>献危言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372440_comment'></div>在上者苟或宥而容之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372440_comment'></div>激而进之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372440_comment'></div>则天下之君子望风而悦曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372440_comment'></div>彼之狂而犹容于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372440_comment'></div>上之人其欲来天下之士乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372440_comment'></div>吾之道可以行矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372440_comment'></div>其小人竦利而喜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372440_comment'></div>彼之直可以得幸于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372440_comment'></div>吾将直言以徼利可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372440_comment'></div>由是天下之贤不肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372440_comment'></div>各以所忠贡言于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372440_comment'></div>上下之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372440_comment'></div>霈然而通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372440_comment'></div>得失之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372440_comment'></div>幽远必达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372440_comment'></div>合天下之智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372440_comment'></div>理万物之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372440_comment'></div>人人乐得其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372440_comment'></div>戴其上如赤子之亲慈母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372440_comment'></div>虽欲诱之为乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372440_comment'></div>其可得乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372440_comment'></div>臣故曰容直言广视听而不理者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372440_comment'></div>万无一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372440_comment'></div>及夫进计者入而不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372440_comment'></div>直言者戮而不容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372440_comment'></div>则天下之君子自谋于心曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372440_comment'></div>与其言且不用而身为戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372440_comment'></div>吾宁危行言逊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372440_comment'></div>以保其终乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372440_comment'></div>其小人择利而喜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372440_comment'></div>君之所恶者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372440_comment'></div>拂心逆耳之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372440_comment'></div>吾将苟顺是非以事之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372440_comment'></div>由是进见者草而不内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372440_comment'></div>言事者寝而不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372440_comment'></div>若此则十步之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372440_comment'></div>不得见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372440_comment'></div>朝廷之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372440_comment'></div>不得闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372440_comment'></div>而况于天下之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372440_comment'></div>四方之远乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372440_comment'></div>故曰聋瞽之君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372440_comment'></div>非无耳目也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372440_comment'></div>盖左右前后者屏蔽之不使视听尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372440_comment'></div>此而不乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372440_comment'></div>其可得哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372440_comment'></div>昔太宗文皇帝初即位时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372440_comment'></div>天下之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372440_comment'></div>莫有谏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372440_comment'></div>唯孙伏伽尝以小事特谏于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372440_comment'></div>文皇帝大悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372440_comment'></div>厚赐田宅以勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372440_comment'></div>自是言事者惟惧乎言不直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372440_comment'></div>谏不极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372440_comment'></div>不能激文皇帝之盛意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372440_comment'></div>曾不以触龙鳞犯忌讳为不可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372440_comment'></div>于是房杜王魏之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372440_comment'></div>议可否于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372440_comment'></div>天下四方之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372440_comment'></div>言得失于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372440_comment'></div>不四三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372440_comment'></div>而天下大理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372440_comment'></div>岂文皇独运聪明于上哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372440_comment'></div>盖亦群下各尽其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372440_comment'></div>以宣扬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_92_1372440", 1372440, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>发畅</span>于天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372440_comment'></div>且夫乐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_93_1372440", 1372440, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>全安</span>而恶戮辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372440_comment'></div>古今之情一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372440_comment'></div>岂独贞观之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372440_comment'></div>轻犯忌讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372440_comment'></div>而不恶戮辱哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372440_comment'></div>盖文皇激而进之之功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372440_comment'></div>喜顺从而怒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1372440", 1372440, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>謇犯</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372440_comment'></div>亦古今之情一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372440_comment'></div>岂独文皇甘逆耳而怒从心哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372440_comment'></div>盖以顺从之利轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372440_comment'></div>而危亡之祸大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372440_comment'></div>无穷之业重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372440_comment'></div>而奉己之事微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372440_comment'></div>思为子孙垂不朽建永安之计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372440_comment'></div>为后嗣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372440_comment'></div>其可顺一朝之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372440_comment'></div>而轻用文皇之天下乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372440_comment'></div>累圣传序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372440_comment'></div>于今垂二百年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372440_comment'></div>莫不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_112_1372440", 1372440, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>率由</span>斯道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372440_comment'></div>致俗和平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1372440_comment'></div>况陛下以上圣之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1372440_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_115_1372440", 1372440, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>绍复</span>前统。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372440_comment'></div>即位之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372440_comment'></div>天下惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372440_comment'></div>罪叔文之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372440_comment'></div>而凶邪之党散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1372440_comment'></div>悬惠琳之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1372440_comment'></div>而悖乱之气消。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1372440_comment'></div>发承光之诈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1372440_comment'></div>而假威之孽除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1372440_comment'></div>反焦陂<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作陵）</span>之田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1372440_comment'></div>而蒸庶之情感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1372440_comment'></div>其馀涤瑕缓死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1372440_comment'></div>薄赋恤人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1372440_comment'></div>赐帛耆年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1372440_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_129_1372440", 1372440, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>旌闾</span>孝悌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1372440_comment'></div>修废学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1372440_comment'></div>建义仓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1372440_comment'></div>莫不曲被殊私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1372440_comment'></div>覃于有截。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1372440_comment'></div>斯皆陛下上法尧舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1372440_comment'></div>近法太宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1372440_comment'></div>致理之萌形见者数十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1372440_comment'></div>岂臣庸劣一二而能明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1372440_comment'></div>然而臣窃复孜孜咄咄有所未决者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1372440_comment'></div>独以陛下即位巳来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1372440_comment'></div>既周岁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1372440_comment'></div>百辟卿士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1372440_comment'></div>至于天下四方之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1372440_comment'></div>曾未有献一计进一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1372440_comment'></div>受陛下伏伽之赏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1372440_comment'></div>左右前后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1372440_comment'></div>拾遗补阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1372440_comment'></div>亦未有奏一封执一谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1372440_comment'></div>受陛下激而进之之劝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1372440_comment'></div>设谏鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1372440_comment'></div>置<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_150_1372440", 1372440, "Clauses/150/Comments/0")'>匦函</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1372440_comment'></div>曾未闻雪一冤决一事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1372440_comment'></div>明陛下无幽不察之意者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1372440_comment'></div>若臣等备位谏列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1372440_comment'></div>名为供奉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1372440_comment'></div>旷日弥年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1372440_comment'></div>不得召见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1372440_comment'></div>每就位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1372440_comment'></div>屏气鞠躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1372440_comment'></div>不敢仰视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1372440_comment'></div>又安暇议得失献可否哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1372440_comment'></div>供奉官尚尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1372440_comment'></div>又况于疏远之臣庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1372440_comment'></div>虽有特达不群之智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1372440_comment'></div>思欲自效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1372440_comment'></div>其路何阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1372440_comment'></div>遂使凡今之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1372440_comment'></div>以谏鼓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_167_1372440", 1372440, "Clauses/167/Comments/0")'>匦函</span>为虚器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1372440_comment'></div>谓拾遗补阙为冗员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1372440_comment'></div>臣窃思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1372440_comment'></div>以陛下之睿博宏深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1372440_comment'></div>励精求理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1372440_comment'></div>岂或入而不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1372440_comment'></div>言而不用哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1372440_comment'></div>盖群下因循不能有所发明之罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1372440_comment'></div>且臣思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1372440_comment'></div>今之备召见承顾问者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1372440_comment'></div>独一二执政而巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1372440_comment'></div>每一对扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1372440_comment'></div>不及俄顷之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1372440_comment'></div>议天下之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1372440_comment'></div>臣窃料之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1372440_comment'></div>恭承圣问仰谢宠光之不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1372440_comment'></div>又安暇陈理乱议教化哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1372440_comment'></div>其馀琐琐有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1372440_comment'></div>或时一召见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1372440_comment'></div>言薄书之出入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1372440_comment'></div>计钱榖之登降不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1372440_comment'></div>又安足置牙齿间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1372440_comment'></div>臣窃惟陛下以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_189_1372440", 1372440, "Clauses/189/Comments/0")'>景命</span>惟新之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1372440_comment'></div>何如贞观致理之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1372440_comment'></div>当贞观致理之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1372440_comment'></div>以房杜王魏匡辅之智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1372440_comment'></div>而犹上封进计者荐至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1372440_comment'></div>献可替否者日闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1372440_comment'></div>今陛下当致理之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1372440_comment'></div>在四方多虞之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1372440_comment'></div>然而言事进计者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1372440_comment'></div>终岁无一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1372440_comment'></div>岂非群下因循窃位之罪乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1372440_comment'></div>若臣稹者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1372440_comment'></div>禀性驽钝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1372440_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_202_1372440", 1372440, "Clauses/202/Comments/0")'>昧然</span>无识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1372440_comment'></div>然以当陛下临御之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1372440_comment'></div>首陛下策贤之科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1372440_comment'></div>擢授谏司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1372440_comment'></div>恩迈常品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1372440_comment'></div>若复默默与在位者处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1372440_comment'></div>则臣莫大之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1372440_comment'></div>亦迈于常品矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1372440_comment'></div>辄敢冒昧殊死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1372440_comment'></div>件奏十事于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1372440_comment'></div>一曰教太子以崇邦本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1372440_comment'></div>二曰封宗王以固磐石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1372440_comment'></div>三曰出宫人以消水旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1372440_comment'></div>四曰嫁诸女以遂人伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1372440_comment'></div>五曰无时召宰相以讲庶政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1372440_comment'></div>六曰序次对百辟以广聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1372440_comment'></div>七曰复正衙奏事以示躬亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1372440_comment'></div>八曰许方幅纠弹以慑奸佞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1372440_comment'></div>九曰禁非时贡献以绝诛求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1372440_comment'></div>十曰省出入畋游以防衔蹶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1372440_comment'></div>凡此十者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1372440_comment'></div>设使言之而是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1372440_comment'></div>是而见用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1372440_comment'></div>非臣之福也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1372440_comment'></div>天下之福也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1372440_comment'></div>苟或言之而非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1372440_comment'></div>非而见罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1372440_comment'></div>乃臣之分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1372440_comment'></div>亦臣之愿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1372440_comment'></div>无任恳悃奋激效节爱时之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1372440_comment'></div>谨诣东上阖门奏表并事件以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1372440_comment'></div>臣稹诚惶诚恐顿首顿首死罪死罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1372440_comment'></div>谨言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_234_1372440_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1372453' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372453' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372453?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论教本书</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372453")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372453_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372453'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372453'>臣伏见陛下降明诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372453_comment'></div>修废学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372453_comment'></div>增冑子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372453_comment'></div>选司成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372453_comment'></div>大哉尧之为君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372453_comment'></div>伯夷典礼夔教冑子之深旨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372453_comment'></div>然而事有万万急于此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372453_comment'></div>敢冒死而言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372453_comment'></div>臣闻诸贾生曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372453_comment'></div>三代之君仁且久者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372453_comment'></div>教之然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372453_comment'></div>诚哉是言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372453_comment'></div>且夫周成王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372453_comment'></div>人之中才也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372453_comment'></div>近管蔡则谗入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372453_comment'></div>有周召则义闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372453_comment'></div>岂可谓天聪明哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372453_comment'></div>然而克终于道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372453_comment'></div>得不谓教之然耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372453_comment'></div>始其为太子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372453_comment'></div>未生胎教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372453_comment'></div>既生保教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372453_comment'></div>太公为之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372453_comment'></div>周公为之傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372453_comment'></div>召公为之保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372453_comment'></div>伯禽唐叔与之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372453_comment'></div>礼乐诗书为之习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372453_comment'></div>目不得阅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1372453", 1372453, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>淫艳</span>妖诱之色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372453_comment'></div>耳不得闻优笑凌乱之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372453_comment'></div>口不得习<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1372453", 1372453, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>操断</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1372453", 1372453, "Clauses/29/Comments/1")'>击搏</span>之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372453_comment'></div>居不得近<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1372453", 1372453, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>容顺</span>阴邪之党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372453_comment'></div>游不得恣追禽逐兽之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372453_comment'></div>玩不得有遐异僻绝之珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372453_comment'></div>凡此数者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372453_comment'></div>非谓备之于前而不为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372453_comment'></div>亦将不得见而为之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372453_comment'></div>及其长而为君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372453_comment'></div>血气既定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372453_comment'></div>游习既成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372453_comment'></div>虽有放心快已之事日陈于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372453_comment'></div>固不能夺巳成之习巳定之心矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372453_comment'></div>则彼忠直道德之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372453_comment'></div>固吾之所习闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372453_comment'></div>陈之者有以谕焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372453_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1372453", 1372453, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>回佞</span>庸违之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372453_comment'></div>固吾之所积惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372453_comment'></div>谄之者有以辨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372453_comment'></div>人之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372453_comment'></div>莫不欲耀其所能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372453_comment'></div>而党其所近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372453_comment'></div>苟将得志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372453_comment'></div>则必快其所蕴矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372453_comment'></div>物之性亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372453_comment'></div>是以鱼得水而游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372453_comment'></div>马逸驾而走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372453_comment'></div>鸟乘风而翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372453_comment'></div>火得薪而炽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372453_comment'></div>此皆物之快其所蕴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372453_comment'></div>今夫成王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372453_comment'></div>所蕴道德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372453_comment'></div>所近圣贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372453_comment'></div>是以举其近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372453_comment'></div>则周公左而召公右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372453_comment'></div>伯禽鲁而太公齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372453_comment'></div>快其蕴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372453_comment'></div>则兴礼乐而朝诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372453_comment'></div>措刑罚而美教化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372453_comment'></div>教之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372453_comment'></div>可不谓信然哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372453_comment'></div>及夫秦则不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372453_comment'></div>灭先王之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372453_comment'></div>曰将以愚天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372453_comment'></div>黜师保之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372453_comment'></div>曰将以明君臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372453_comment'></div>胡亥之生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372453_comment'></div>诗书不得闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372453_comment'></div>圣贤不得近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372453_comment'></div>彼赵高者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372453_comment'></div>诈宦之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1372453", 1372453, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>戮人</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372453_comment'></div>而傅之以残忍戕贼之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372453_comment'></div>且日恣睢天下以为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372453_comment'></div>莫见其面以为尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372453_comment'></div>是以天下之人未尽愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372453_comment'></div>而胡亥固巳不能分兽畜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372453_comment'></div>赵高之威慑天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372453_comment'></div>而胡亥巳自幽于深宫矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372453_comment'></div>彼李斯者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372453_comment'></div>秦之宠丞相也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372453_comment'></div>因谗冤死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372453_comment'></div>无以自明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372453_comment'></div>而况于疏远之臣庶乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372453_comment'></div>若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372453_comment'></div>则秦之亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372453_comment'></div>有以致之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372453_comment'></div>汉高承之以兵革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372453_comment'></div>汉文守之以廉谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372453_comment'></div>卒不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1372453", 1372453, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>苏复</span>大训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372453_comment'></div>是以景武昭宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372453_comment'></div>天资甚美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372453_comment'></div>才可以免祸乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372453_comment'></div>哀平之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372453_comment'></div>则不能虞篡弑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372453_comment'></div>然而惠帝废易之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372453_comment'></div>犹赖羽翼以胜其邪心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372453_comment'></div>是后有国之君议教化者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372453_comment'></div>莫不以兴廉举孝设学崇儒为意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372453_comment'></div>曾不知教化之不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372453_comment'></div>自贵者始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372453_comment'></div>略其贵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372453_comment'></div>教其贱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372453_comment'></div>无乃邻于倒置乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372453_comment'></div>洎我太宗文皇帝之在藩邸以至于为太子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372453_comment'></div>选知道德者十八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372453_comment'></div>与之游习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1372453_comment'></div>即位之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1372453_comment'></div>虽宴游饮食之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372453_comment'></div>若十八人者实在其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372453_comment'></div>上失无不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372453_comment'></div>下情无不达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372453_comment'></div>不四三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1372453_comment'></div>而名高<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_120_1372453", 1372453, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>盛古</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1372453_comment'></div>岂一日二日而致是乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1372453_comment'></div>游习之渐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1372453_comment'></div>贞观巳还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1372453_comment'></div>师傅之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1372453_comment'></div>皆宰相兼领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1372453_comment'></div>其馀宫僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1372453_comment'></div>选亦甚重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1372453_comment'></div>马周以位高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1372453_comment'></div>恨不得为司议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1372453_comment'></div>此其验也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1372453_comment'></div>文皇之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1372453_comment'></div>渐疏贱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1372453_comment'></div>至于母后临朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1372453_comment'></div>剪弃王族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1372453_comment'></div>当中睿二圣危难之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1372453_comment'></div>虽有骨鲠敢言之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1372453_comment'></div>既不得在调护保安之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1372453_comment'></div>终不能措扶卫之一词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1372453_comment'></div>而令匠胡安金藏剖腹以明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1372453_comment'></div>岂不大哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1372453_comment'></div>兵兴以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1372453_comment'></div>兹弊尤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1372453_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_143_1372453", 1372453, "Clauses/143/Comments/0")'>师资</span>保傅之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1372453_comment'></div>非疾废眊瞆不任事者为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1372453_comment'></div>即休戎罢帅不知书者处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1372453_comment'></div>至于友谕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_146_1372453", 1372453, "Clauses/146/Comments/0")'>赞议</span>之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1372453_comment'></div>疏冗散贱之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1372453_comment'></div>甚者搢绅耻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1372453_comment'></div>夫以匹夫之爱其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1372453_comment'></div>犹求明哲慈惠之师以教之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1372453_comment'></div>直谅多闻之友以成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1372453_comment'></div>岂天下之元子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1372453_comment'></div>而可以疾废眊瞆不知书者为之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1372453_comment'></div>疏冗散贱不适用者为之友乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1372453_comment'></div>此何不及上古之甚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1372453_comment'></div>近制宫僚之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1372453_comment'></div>往往以沉滞僻老之儒充侍直侍读之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1372453_comment'></div>而又疏弃斥远之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1372453_comment'></div>越月踰时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1372453_comment'></div>不得召见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1372453_comment'></div>彼又安能傅成道德而保养其躬哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1372453_comment'></div>臣以为积此弊者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1372453_comment'></div>岂不以皇天眷佑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1372453_comment'></div>祚我唐德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1372453_comment'></div>以舜继舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1372453_comment'></div>以尧继尧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1372453_comment'></div>传陛下十一圣矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1372453_comment'></div>莫不生而神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1372453_comment'></div>长而仁圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1372453_comment'></div>以是为屑屑习仪者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1372453_comment'></div>故不之省耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1372453_comment'></div>臣独以为于列圣之谋则可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1372453_comment'></div>计无穷之业以传后嗣则不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1372453_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_174_1372453", 1372453, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>脱或</span>万代之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1372453_comment'></div>有若周成王之中才者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1372453_comment'></div>而又生于深宫优笑之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1372453_comment'></div>无周召保助之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1372453_comment'></div>则将不能知喜怒哀乐之所自矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1372453_comment'></div>况稼穑之艰难乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1372453_comment'></div>今陛下以上圣之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1372453_comment'></div>肇临海内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1372453_comment'></div>是天下之人倾耳注目之日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1372453_comment'></div>特愿陛下思成王训导之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1372453_comment'></div>念文皇游习之渐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1372453_comment'></div>选重师保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1372453_comment'></div>慎简宫寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1372453_comment'></div>皆用博厚宏深之儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1372453_comment'></div>而又练达机务者为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1372453_comment'></div>更进迭见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1372453_comment'></div>日就月将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1372453_comment'></div>因令皇太子洎诸王定齿冑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_191_1372453", 1372453, "Clauses/191/Comments/0")'>讲业</span>之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1372453_comment'></div>行严师问道之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1372453_comment'></div>至德要道以成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1372453_comment'></div>撤膳记过以警之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1372453_comment'></div>血气未定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1372453_comment'></div>则辍禽色之娱以就学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1372453_comment'></div>圣质既备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1372453_comment'></div>则资游习之善以宏德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1372453_comment'></div>此所谓一人元良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1372453_comment'></div>万国以贞之化也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1372453_comment'></div>岂直修废学选司成而足伦匹其盛哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1372453_comment'></div>而又俾则百王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1372453_comment'></div>莫不幼同师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1372453_comment'></div>长同术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1372453_comment'></div>识君道之素定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1372453_comment'></div>知天伦之自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1372453_comment'></div>然后选用贤良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1372453_comment'></div>树为藩屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1372453_comment'></div>出则有晋郑鲁卫之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1372453_comment'></div>入则有东牟朱虚之强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1372453_comment'></div>盖所谓宗子维城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1372453_comment'></div>犬牙磐石之势也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1372453_comment'></div>又岂与夫魏晋以降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1372453_comment'></div>囚贼其兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1372453_comment'></div>而自剪其本枝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1372453_comment'></div>同年而语乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1372453_comment'></div>微臣窃不自揆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1372453_comment'></div>思为陛下建永永无穷之长算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1372453_comment'></div>辄敢冒昧殊死而言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1372453_comment'></div>臣稹谨奏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_220_1372453_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1372450' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372450' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372450?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论谏职表</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372450")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372450_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372450'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372450'>臣闻先王之制禄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372450_comment'></div>居其位而不行其职者诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372450_comment'></div>是以上无虚授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372450_comment'></div>下不隐情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372450_comment'></div>臣窃观今之备位素餐不得其职者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372450_comment'></div>莫过于臣辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372450_comment'></div>臣闻太宗文皇帝时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372450_comment'></div>王圭魏徵为谏官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372450_comment'></div>文皇虽宴游寝食之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372450_comment'></div>王魏实在其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372450_comment'></div>用至于文皇发一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372450_comment'></div>则王魏善之而后出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372450_comment'></div>举一事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372450_comment'></div>则王魏虑之而后行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372450_comment'></div>以文皇之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372450_comment'></div>合王魏之智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372450_comment'></div>是以举无遗事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372450_comment'></div>言有典常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372450_comment'></div>文皇犹以为视听之未广也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372450_comment'></div>因命三品以上入议军国大政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372450_comment'></div>必遣谏官一人随入以参验之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372450_comment'></div>当是之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372450_comment'></div>司股肱耳目之任者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372450_comment'></div>有君臣之义焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372450_comment'></div>有父子之恩焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372450_comment'></div>有朋友之欢焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372450_comment'></div>是以否无不替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372450_comment'></div>可无不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372450_comment'></div>不四三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372450_comment'></div>而天下大理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372450_comment'></div>蛮夷君长带刀入侍者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372450_comment'></div>不可胜计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372450_comment'></div>岂干戈征伐之所致乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372450_comment'></div>盖拥蔽之患销。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372450_comment'></div>而幽远之情达也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372450_comment'></div>若此然后可以称天子之诤臣矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372450_comment'></div>近之司谏诤者则不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372450_comment'></div>大不得备召见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372450_comment'></div>次不得参时政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372450_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1372450", 1372450, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>排行</span>就列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372450_comment'></div>累累而巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372450_comment'></div>且臣闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372450_comment'></div>谏官之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372450_comment'></div>曰左右前后拾遗补阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372450_comment'></div>大则廷议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372450_comment'></div>小则上封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372450_comment'></div>近年已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372450_comment'></div>正衙不奏事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372450_comment'></div>庶官罢廷对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372450_comment'></div>若此则不见遗阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372450_comment'></div>补拾何阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372450_comment'></div>不得敷陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372450_comment'></div>廷议安设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372450_comment'></div>其所谓举谏职者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372450_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1372450", 1372450, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>唯独</span>诰令有不便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372450_comment'></div>除授有不当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372450_comment'></div>则奏一封执一见而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372450_comment'></div>以臣思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372450_comment'></div>君臣之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372450_comment'></div>论列是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372450_comment'></div>讽谕于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1372450", 1372450, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>未形</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372450_comment'></div>筹画于至密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372450_comment'></div>尚不能回至尊之盛意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372450_comment'></div>备谗慝之巧言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372450_comment'></div>而况于既行之诰令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372450_comment'></div>已命之除授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372450_comment'></div>然后奏一封执一见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372450_comment'></div>思欲收丝纶之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372450_comment'></div>回日月之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372450_comment'></div>信无裨于万一矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372450_comment'></div>至使凡今之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372450_comment'></div>以上封进计为妄动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372450_comment'></div>拾遗补阙为冗员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372450_comment'></div>以此称供奉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372450_comment'></div>与王圭魏徵为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1372450", 1372450, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>等列</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372450_comment'></div>臣虽至愚能不自愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372450_comment'></div>且陛下若以为臣等无所裨补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372450_comment'></div>不足参侍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372450_comment'></div>固不当假以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1372450", 1372450, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>名器</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372450_comment'></div>立之于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372450_comment'></div>苟以为务广聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372450_comment'></div>稍关理道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372450_comment'></div>又不当屏弃疏贱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372450_comment'></div>使至于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372450_comment'></div>伏愿陛下许臣于延英候对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372450_comment'></div>召臣一见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372450_comment'></div>赐以温颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372450_comment'></div>使臣得尽愚恳之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372450_comment'></div>备陈谏官之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372450_comment'></div>苟或言有可采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372450_comment'></div>得裨陛下万分之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372450_comment'></div>是臣千载之一时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372450_comment'></div>如或言不诣理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372450_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_93_1372450", 1372450, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>尘黩</span>圣聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372450_comment'></div>则臣自寘刑书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372450_comment'></div>以谢谬官之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372450_comment'></div>亦臣之所以甘心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372450_comment'></div>无任恳款发愤效职忘躯之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372450_comment'></div>谨诣东上閤门奉表以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1372450_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1372449' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372449' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372449?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论追制表</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372449")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372449_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372449'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372449'>臣闻令之必行于下者信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372449_comment'></div>令苟不信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372449_comment'></div>患莫大焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372449_comment'></div>今陛下初临宇内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372449_comment'></div>务切黎元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372449_comment'></div>至于牧守字人之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372449_comment'></div>所宜详择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372449_comment'></div>苟未得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372449_comment'></div>不当虚授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372449_comment'></div>苟或任使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372449_comment'></div>不可屡迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372449_comment'></div>臣窃见近除宁州刺史论傪虔州刺史高宏本通州刺史豆卢靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372449_comment'></div>曾不涉旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372449_comment'></div>并已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372449", 1372449, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>追制</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372449_comment'></div>又以杜兼为苏州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372449_comment'></div>行未半途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372449_comment'></div>复改郎署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372449_comment'></div>臣不知谁请于陛下而授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372449_comment'></div>谁请于陛下而追之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372449_comment'></div>追之是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372449_comment'></div>则授之非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372449_comment'></div>授之是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372449_comment'></div>则追之非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372449_comment'></div>以非为是者罚必加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372449_comment'></div>然后人不敢轻其举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372449_comment'></div>以是为非者罪必及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372449_comment'></div>然后下不敢用其私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372449_comment'></div>此先王所以不令而人从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372449_comment'></div>不言而人信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372449_comment'></div>岂异事哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372449_comment'></div>率是道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372449_comment'></div>今陛下如纶之令朝降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372449_comment'></div>反污之诏夕施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372449_comment'></div>纷纷纭纭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372449_comment'></div>无所归咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372449_comment'></div>臣窃恐陛下之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372449_comment'></div>未能取信于朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372449_comment'></div>而况于取信天下乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372449_comment'></div>臣伏愿陛下徵举者之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372449_comment'></div>察追者之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372449_comment'></div>若举者之词直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372449_comment'></div>则请而追之者不得无过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372449_comment'></div>若追之者理胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372449_comment'></div>则举而授之者不得无辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372449_comment'></div>赏罚是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372449_comment'></div>所宜明当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372449_comment'></div>况陛下肇临黎庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372449_comment'></div>教化惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372449_comment'></div>诰令之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372449_comment'></div>四方所仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372449_comment'></div>小有得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372449_comment'></div>天下必闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372449_comment'></div>臣实庸愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372449_comment'></div>谬居谏列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372449_comment'></div>职当言责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372449_comment'></div>不敢偷安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372449_comment'></div>苟有所裨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372449_comment'></div>万死无恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372449_comment'></div>无任愚迫恳款之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1372449_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　秋，有感秋之诗。作品：《秋堂夕》《含风夕》<div id='poem_6918' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6918' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6918?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋堂夕</a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6918")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6918_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6918'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1373, "poem_allusion_6918")'>孙登</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6918_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6918'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6918'>炎凉正回互，金火郁相乘<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6918'>云雷时<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作暗）</span>交构，川泽方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6918", 6918, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>蒸腾</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6918'>清风一朝胜，白露忽已凝<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6918'>草木<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6918", 6918, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>凡气</span>尽<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，始见天地澄。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6918'>况此秋堂夕，幽怀旷无朋。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6918'>萧条帘外雨，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6918", 6918, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>倏闪</span>案前灯。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6918'>书卷满<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6918", 6918, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>床席</span>，蟏蛸悬复升<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6918'>啼儿屡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6918", 6918, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>哑咽</span>，勌僮时寝兴<span class='inlineComment2'>（寝兴：睡下与起床。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6918'>泛览昏夜目，咏谣畅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6918", 6918, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>烦膺</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6918'>况吟获麟章<span class='inlineComment2'>（获麟章：参卷2《青云驿》注。）</span>，欲罢久不能。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6918'>尧舜事已远<span class='inlineComment2'>（事：卢本作“去”。）</span>，丘道安可胜<span class='inlineComment2'>（丘道：孔丘之道，即儒家之道。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6918'>蜉蝣不信鹤<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，蜩鴳肯窥鹏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6918'>当年且不偶，没<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作殁）</span>世何必称。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6918'>胡为揭闻见，褒贬贻爱憎。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6918'>焉用汨其泥<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，岂在清如冰。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6918'>非白又非黑，谁能点青蝇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6918'>处世苟无闷，佯狂道非弘。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6918'>无言被人觉，予亦笑<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1373, "poem_sentence_17_6918")'>孙登</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6918'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_6918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6918'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6918_0'>⑴ “金火”句：古人以为，西方属秋属金，南方属夏属火，夏秋之交，为金火交替之时。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6918_0'>⑵ 露：原作“云”，据蜀本、杨本、董本、马本、类苑、胡本、全诗及文意改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6918_0'>⑶ 凡气：犹言重浊之气。夏天气浊，秋天气清，秋天降临，故云凡气尽。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6918_0'>⑷ 蟏蛸：蜘蛛之一种，即蟢子，古人以为喜兆。《诗·豳风·东山》：“伊威在室，蟏蛸在户。”孔颖达疏：“蟏蛸，长踦，一名长脚，荆州河内人谓之喜母，此虫来著人衣，当有亲客至，有喜也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6918_0'>⑸ “蜉蝣”句：生涯短暂之蜉蝣，不相信世上有长寿之鹤之存在。蜉蝣，虫名，生存期极短。《诗·曹风·蜉蝣》：“蜉蝣之羽，衣裳楚楚。”毛传：“蜉蝣，渠略也，朝生夕死。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6918_0'>⑹ “蜩鴳”句：《庄子·逍遥游》：“有鸟焉，其名为鹏，背若泰山，翼若垂天之云，抟扶摇羊角而上者九万里，绝云气，负青天，然后图南，且适南冥也。斥鴳笑之曰：‘彼且奚适也，我腾跃而上不过数仞而下，翱翔蓬蒿之间，此亦飞之至也。而彼且奚适也？’此小大之辨也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_6918_0'>⑺ 汩其泥：搅浑泥沙。《楚辞·渔父》：“屈原既放……屈原曰：‘举世皆浊我独清，众人皆醉我独醒，是以见放。’渔父曰：‘圣人不凝滞于物而能与世推移，世人皆浊，何不淈其泥而扬其波；众人皆醉，何不餔其糟而歠其酾，何故深思高举，自令放为？”淈通汩。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6918_0'>⑻ “非白”二句：汉王充《论衡·累害》：“青受尘，白取垢。青蝇所污，常在练素。”青蝇点素喻小人谗害好人。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6918_0'>⑼ 孙登：字公和，三国汲郡共县（今河南卫辉市）人，无家属，居北山土窟之中，好读《易》，弹一弦琴。旋居宜阳山，善啸。文帝使阮籍往观，与语，不应。嵇康从之游三年，问其所图，终不答。将别，谓康曰：“子才多识寡，难免乎于今之世矣。”事见《三国志·魏书·王粲传》附《嵇康传》裴松之注引《晋阳秋》、《晋书·阮籍传》。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6918_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6836' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6836' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6836?labeling=true' target='_blank'>含风夕<span class='inlineComment2'>（此后拾遗时作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（806年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6836")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6836_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6836'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6836'>炎昏勌烦久，逮此含风夕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6836'>夏服稍轻清，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6836", 6836, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>秋堂</span>已岑寂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6836'>载欣凉宇旷<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，复念佳辰掷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6836'>络纬惊岁功<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，顾我何成绩。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6836'>青荧微月钩，幽晖洞阴魄。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6836'>水镜涵玉轮<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，若见渊泉璧<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6836'>参差帘牖重，次第笼虚白。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6836'>树影满空床，萤光缀深壁。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6836'>怅望牵牛<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作牛斗）</span>星，复为经年隔<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6836'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6836", 6836, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>露网</span>袅风珠，轻河泛遥碧。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6836'>讵无深秋夜<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，感此乍<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作年）</span>流易<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6836'>亦有迟暮年，壮年良自惜。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6836'>循环切中肠<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>，感念<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作今）</span>追往昔<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6836'>接瞬无停阴<span class='inlineComment2'>（接瞬：眨眼之间。）</span>，何言问陈积。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6836'>馨香推蕙兰，坚贞谕松柏。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6836'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_6836", 6836, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>生物</span>固有涯，安能比金石。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6836'>况兹百龄内，扰扰纷众役。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6836'>日月东西驰，飞车无留迹。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6836'>来者良未穷，去矣定奚适。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6836'>委顺在物为<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>，营营复何益。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6836'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_6836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6836'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6836_0'>⑴ 载：用在句子开头，表示强调，无意。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6836_0'>⑵ 络纬：即莎鸡，俗称纺织娘，其振羽作响，犹如纺织之声，故称。岁功，一年之收穫。《诗·豳风·七月》：“六月莎鸡振羽。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6836_0'>⑶ “水”句：水面平静如镜，月亮倒映水中，有如玉轮。玉轮，指月亮。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6836_0'>⑷ 渊泉：深泉。《礼记·郊特牲》：“周人尚臭，灌用鬯臭。郁合鬯。臭阴达于渊泉。灌以圭璋，用玉气也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6836_0'>⑸ “怅望”二句：传说牵牛织女分处银河两岸，每岁七月七夕，喜鹊搭桥，方得相逢一次。牵牛，原作“牛斗”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗及文意改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6836_0'>⑹ （一作稠景）。（秋夜：原作“稠景”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗及文意改）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6836_1'>⑺ 乍：原作“年”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗改。张相《诗词曲语辞汇释》卷一：“乍，犹恰也；正也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6836_0'>⑻ 肠：原作“感”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗及文意改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6836_1'>⑼ 念：原作“今”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_6836_0'>⑽ 物为：泯灭心灵，如物无知，听凭上天之安排。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6836_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年5月</a>　至长安后，作文弹奏山南西道于两税外加配驿草，节度使裴玢罚一月俸，刺史罚一季俸，仍令元和四年后禁断。作品：《弹奏山南西道两税外草状》<div id='poem_1372474' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372474' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372474?labeling=true' target='_blank'>弹奏山南西道两税外草状</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372474")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372474_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372474'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372474'>山南西道管内州府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372474_comment'></div>每年两税外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372474_comment'></div>配率供驿禾草共四万六千四百七十七围。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372474_comment'></div>每围重二十斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372474_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1372474'>兴元府二万围。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372474_comment'></div>内五千围每年折徵价钱充使司杂用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372474_comment'></div>每围一百二十文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372474_comment'></div>据元和三年使牒减免不徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372474_comment'></div>馀一万五围见徵率<span class='inlineComment2'>（洋州一万五千围。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372474_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1372474'>利州一万一千四百七十七围。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372474_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1372474'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372474_comment'></div>访闻前件州府每年两税外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372474_comment'></div>加配驿草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372474_comment'></div>遂于路次州县检勘文案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372474_comment'></div>据谕后使牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372474_comment'></div>并称准旧例于两税外科配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372474_comment'></div>又牒山南西道观察处置等使裴玢勘得报称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372474_comment'></div>自建中元年已后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372474_comment'></div>每年随税据贯配率前件禾草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372474_comment'></div>将供驿用者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372474_comment'></div>伏准元和元年已后三度赦文每年旨条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372474_comment'></div>两税留州留使钱外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372474_comment'></div>加率一钱一物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372474_comment'></div>州府长吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372474_comment'></div>并以枉法赃论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372474_comment'></div>又准今年二月三日制节文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372474_comment'></div>诸道两税外榷率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372474_comment'></div>比来制敕处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372474_comment'></div>非不丁宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372474_comment'></div>如闻或未遵行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372474_comment'></div>尚有欺弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372474_comment'></div>永言奉法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372474_comment'></div>事理当然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372474_comment'></div>申敕长吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372474_comment'></div>明加禁断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372474_comment'></div>如刺史承使牒于界内榷率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372474_comment'></div>□加惩责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372474_comment'></div>仍委御史台及出使郎中官御史访察闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372474_comment'></div>□伏以前件草并是两税外徵率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372474_comment'></div>准制合勒本道明□□□□州府长吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372474_comment'></div>仍令节级科处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372474_comment'></div>勘择得实以前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372474_comment'></div>剑南东川详覆使监察御史元稹奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372474_comment'></div>谨具如前。</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1372474_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　在长安，代御史中丞李夷简作谢官表。作品：《代李中丞谢官表》<div id='poem_1372444' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372444' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年6月</a>　与次兄万年县丞元秬别，白居易因故未能送行。有诗。作品：《东台去》<div id='poem_6446' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6446' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6757'>万古阅行人，行人几人老。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6757'>顾我倦行者，息阴何不早<sup class='reference class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6936' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6936?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄隐客</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_6936_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6936'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6936'>我年三十二，鬓有八九丝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6936'>非无官次第，其如身早衰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6936'>况逢多士朝<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，贤俊若布棋。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6936'>班行次第立，朱紫相参差<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6936'>谟猷密勿进<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，羽檄纵横驰<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6936'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6936", 6936, id='poem_sentence_8_6936'>小官仍不了，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6936", 6936, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>谴夺</span>亦已随。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6936'>时或不之弃，得不自弃之。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6936'>陶君喜不遇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，顾我复何疑。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6936'>潜书周隐士，白云今有期<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6936'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_6936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6936'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6936_0'>⑴ 多士：众多贤士。《尚书·多方》：“猷告尔有方多士，暨殷多士。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6936_0'>⑵ 朱紫：红色官服与紫色官服。唐制，服色以散阶论，五品以上服绯，三品以上服紫。《旧唐书·舆服志》：“贞观四年又制，三品已上服紫，五品已上服绯。”绯即朱色。此代指高官。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6936_0'>⑶ 谟猷：谋略。密勿：见卷2《阳城驿》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6936_0'>⑷ 羽檄：《史记·韩信卢绾列传》：“陈豨反，邯郸以北皆豨有，吾以羽檄征天下兵，未有至者，今唯独邯郸中兵耳。”裴骃集解：“魏武帝《奏事》曰：‘今边有小警，辙露檄插羽，飞羽檄之意也。’推其言，则以鸟羽插檄书，谓之羽檄，取其急速若飞鸟也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6936_0'>⑸ “监察”句：《唐六典·御史台》：“监察御史十人，正八品上。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6936_0'>⑹ 陶君：指陶渊明，古代著名隐士，因不为五斗米折腰，遂挂冠而去。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6936_0'>⑺ “白云”句：意谓归隐有日。南朝齐陶弘景《诏问山中何所有赋诗以答》：“山中何所有？岭上多白云。只可自怡悦，不堪持赠君。”孔稚桂《北山移文》谓周颙离开钟山后，使“青松落荫，白云谁侣？”</div></div></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年3月</a>　西归长安途中，有《春鸠》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6908' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6908' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6908?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春鸠</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6908")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6908_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6908'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6908'>春鸠与百舌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，音响讵同年<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6908_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6908'>如何一时语，俱得春风怜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6908_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6908'>犹知化工<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作造物）</span>意<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，当春不生蝉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6908_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6908'>免教争叫噪，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6908", 6908, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>沸渭</span>桃花前。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6908_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6908'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6908_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6908'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6908_0'>⑴ 百舌：亦名反舌、伯劳，羽毛茶褐色，嘴尖爪锐，鸣声圆滑多变化。《淮南子·说山训》：“人有多言者，犹百舌之声。”高诱注：“百舌，鸟名，能易其舌效百鸟之声，故曰百舌也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6908_0'>⑵ 讵：岂，难道。同年：同年而语之省，谓相提并论。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6908_1'>⑶ 化工：原作“造物”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗改。指自然之造化者。语出汉贾谊《鵩鸟赋》：“且夫天地为炉兮，造化为工。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6908_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年3月</a>　西归长安途中，有《旅眠》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6332' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6332' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_0_6332_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6332'>夜眠兼客坐，同在火炉床。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6332_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　宪宗包庇宦官，贬元稹江陵士曹参军。白居易、李绛、崔群上疏谏止，无果。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　离京赴任，与白居易相遇于街衢，居易命弟送行，并赠诗一轴，供其在途讽诵。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='d3b8c990c0bf471684236f16b95f22c1_label'><a href='javascript:
