ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年2月</a>　至长安。睹靖安坊旧宅荒凉之象，伤之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年2月</a>　怀念裴垍。游寺观。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　在长安，与白居易等游城南。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　结交秘书郎卢拱，有诗。拟编选张籍古乐府、李绅新歌行、卢拱及杨巨源律诗、窦巩及元宗简绝句为《元白往还诗集》，事未成而元白左降。作品：《酬卢秘书（并序）》<div id='poem_6730' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6730' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6730?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬卢秘书</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6730")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6730_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6730'>予自唐归京之岁，秘书郎卢拱作喜遇白赞善学士诗二十韵，兼以见贻。白诗酬和先出，予草蹙末暇。皇频有致师之挑（卢频有致师之挑），故篇末不无愤辞。其次用本韵，习然也。</div><div id='poem_preface_6730_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6730'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6730'>偶有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6730", 6730, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>冲天</span>气，都无处世才。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6730_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6730'>未容荣路稳，先蹋祸机开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6730_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6730'>分久沉荆掾，惭经厕柏台。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6730_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6730'>理推愁易惑，乡思病难裁。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6730_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6730'>夜伴吴牛喘，春惊朔雁回。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6730_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年1月</a>　在长安任膳部员外郎。向宰相令狐楚献诗二百首，楚深称赏，有文记之。宰相令狐楚为宪宗山陵使，元稹为判官。作品：《上令狐相公诗启》<div id='poem_1372509' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372509' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372509?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上令狐相公诗启</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372509")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372509_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372509'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372509'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372509_comment'></div>某初不好文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372509_comment'></div>徒以仕无他歧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372509_comment'></div>强由科试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372509_comment'></div>及有罪谴弃之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372509_comment'></div>自以为废滞潦倒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372509_comment'></div>不复以文字有闻于人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372509_comment'></div>曾不知好事者抉摘刍芜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372509_comment'></div>尘黩尊重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372509_comment'></div>窃承相公特于廊庙间道某诗句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372509_comment'></div>昨又面奉教约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372509_comment'></div>令献旧文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372509_comment'></div>战汗悚踊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372509_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>惭忝</span>无地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372509_comment'></div>某始自御史府谪官于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372509_comment'></div>今十馀年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372509_comment'></div>閒诞无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372509_comment'></div>遂用力于诗章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372509_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>日益月滋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372509_comment'></div>有诗向千馀首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372509_comment'></div>其间感物寓意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372509_comment'></div>可备矇瞽之讽达者有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372509_comment'></div>词直气粗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372509_comment'></div>罪戾是惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372509_comment'></div>固不敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>陈露</span>于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372509_comment'></div>唯杯酒光景间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372509_comment'></div>屡为小碎篇章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372509_comment'></div>以自吟畅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372509_comment'></div>然以为律体卑痹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372509_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>格力</span>不扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372509_comment'></div>苟无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>姿态</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372509_comment'></div>则陷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>流俗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372509_comment'></div>常欲得思深语近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372509_comment'></div>韵律调新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372509_comment'></div>属对无差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372509_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>风情</span>自远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372509_comment'></div>然而病未能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372509_comment'></div>江湘间多有新进小生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372509_comment'></div>不知天下文有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>宗主</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372509_comment'></div>妄相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>仿效</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372509_comment'></div>而又从而失之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372509_comment'></div>遂至于支离褊浅之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372509_comment'></div>皆目为元和诗体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372509_comment'></div>某又与同门生白居易友善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372509_comment'></div>居易雅能为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372509_comment'></div>就中爱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>驱驾</span>文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372509_comment'></div>穷极声韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372509_comment'></div>或为千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372509_comment'></div>或为五百言律诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372509_comment'></div>以相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>投寄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372509_comment'></div>小生自审不能有以过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372509_comment'></div>往往戏排旧韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372509_comment'></div>别创新词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372509_comment'></div>名为次韵相酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372509_comment'></div>盖欲以难相挑耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372509_comment'></div>江湘间为诗者复相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>仿效</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372509_comment'></div>力或不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372509_comment'></div>则至于颠倒语言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372509_comment'></div>重复首尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372509_comment'></div>韵同意等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372509_comment'></div>不异前篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372509_comment'></div>亦目为元和诗体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372509_comment'></div>而司文者考<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>变雅</span>之由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372509_comment'></div>往往归咎于稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372509_comment'></div>尝以为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>雕虫小事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372509_comment'></div>不足以自明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372509_comment'></div>始闻相公记忆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372509_comment'></div>累旬以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372509_comment'></div>实惧粪土之墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372509_comment'></div>庇以大厦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372509_comment'></div>使不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>摧坏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372509_comment'></div>实为版筑者之娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372509_comment'></div>辄缮写古体歌诗一百首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372509_comment'></div>百韵至两韵律诗一百首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372509_comment'></div>合为五卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372509_comment'></div>奉启跪陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372509_comment'></div>或希<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>构厦</span>之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372509_comment'></div>一赐观览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372509_comment'></div>知小生于章句中栾栌榱桷之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372509_comment'></div>尽曾量度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372509_comment'></div>则十馀年之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>邅回</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372509_comment'></div>不为无用矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372509_comment'></div>词旨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>琐劣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372509_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>冒黩</span>尊严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372509_comment'></div>伏候刑书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372509_comment'></div>不敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1372509", 1372509, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>逃让</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372509_comment'></div>死罪死罪。</div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1372509_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年2月</a>　约二月，迁祠曹员外试知制诰。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年2月</a>　寒食，有预宴会，留诗。作品：《寒食日毛空路示侄晦及从简》<span class='inlineComment2'>（从简为元秬子。）</span>《别孙村老人》<div id='poem_6372' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6372' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6372?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寒食日毛空路示侄晦及从简</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6372")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6372_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6372'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6372'>我昔孩提从我兄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，我今衰白尔初成。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6372'>分明寄取原头路<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，百世长须此路行<span class='inlineComment2'>（寄取一作记取）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6372'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6372'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6372_0'>⑴ 兄：指元秬，元稹同父异母之次兄，元和十四年卒于元稹虢州长史之官舍。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6372_0'>⑵ 寄：胡本、钱校、全诗一作作“记”。原：指咸阳县奉贤乡洪渎原，元稹祖茔之所在。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6372_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6239' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6239' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6239?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别孙村老人<span class='inlineComment2'>（寒食日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（820年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6239")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6239_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6239'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6239'>年年渐觉老人稀，欲别孙翁泪满衣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6239_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6239'>未死不知何处去，此身终向此原归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6239_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6239'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6239_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年5月</a>　元稹迁祠部郎中、知制诰，赐绯鱼袋。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年5月</a>　唐宪宗归葬景陵，有诗记之。作品：《宪宗章武孝皇帝挽歌词三首》<div id='poem_6552' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6552' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6552?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宪宗章武孝皇帝挽歌词三首<span class='inlineComment2'>（膳部员外时作）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（820年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6552")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6552_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6552'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6552'>国付重离后，身随十圣仙<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6552'>北辰移帝座<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，西日到虞泉<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6552'>方丈言虚设<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，华胥事眇然<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6552'>触鳞曾在宥<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，偏哭堕髯前<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6552'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6552'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6552_0'>⑴ “国付”二句：指唐宪宗传帝位于唐穆宗后仙驾而去。重离，《易·离》：“明两作离，大人以继明照于四方。”孔颖达疏：“明两作离者，离为日，日为明。”《离》卦为离上离下相重，故以之指太阳。古代又以皇帝喻日，故亦称皇帝为重离。十圣：指唐宪宗之前十代皇帝，即高祖李渊、太宗李世民、高宗李治、中宗李显、睿宗李旦、玄宗李隆基、肃宗李亨、代宗李豫、德宗李适、顺宗李诵。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6552_0'>⑵ 北辰：指北极星。《论语·为政》：“子曰：‘为政以德，譬如北辰，居其所而众星共之。”《尔雅·释天》：“北极谓之北辰。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6552_0'>⑶ 虞泉：即虞渊，相传为极西之水域，日落其中。《淮南子·天文训》：“日至于虞渊，是为黄昏。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6552_0'>⑷ 方丈：古代传说中三神山之一。晋王嘉《拾遗记·高辛》：“三壶则海中三山也。一曰方壶，则方丈也；二曰蓬壶，则蓬莱也；三曰瀛壶，则瀛州也。形如壶器。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6552_0'>⑸ 华胥：《列子·黄帝》：“【黄帝】昼寝，而梦游于华胥氏之国……其国无帅长，自然而已；其民无嗜欲，自然而已。不知乐生，不知恶死，故无夭殇；不知亲己，不知疏物，故无爱憎；不知背逆，不知向顺，故无利害。都无所爱惜，都无所畏忌。……黄帝既寤，怡然自得。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6552_0'>⑹ 触鳞：谓触犯皇帝之怒。《韩非子·说难》：“夫龙之为虫也柔，可狎而骑也。然其喉下有逆鳞径尺，若人有婴之者，则必杀人。人主亦有逆鳞，说者能无婴人主之逆鳞，则几矣。”在宥：《庄子·在宥》：“闻在宥天下，不闻治天下。”郭象注：“宥使自在则治，治之则乱也。”成玄英疏：“宥，宽也；在，自在也。……《寓言》云：闻诸贤圣任物自在宽宥，即天下清谧。”此指宽宥。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6552_0'>⑺ 堕髯：指宪宗仙逝而去。参下文“鼎湖弓”。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6552_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6553' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6553' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6553?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（820年5月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6553_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6553'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6553'>天宝遗馀事<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，元和盛圣功。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6553'>二凶枭帐下，三叛斩都中<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6553'>始服沙陁虏，方吞逻逤戎<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6553'>狼星如要射<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，犹有鼎湖弓<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6553'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6553'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6553_0'>⑴ “天宝”句：指唐玄宗天宝年间，朝政紊乱，最终导致安史之乱，自此藩镇跋扈不臣。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6553_0'>⑵ 杨惠琳，李师道传首京师，刘辟、李锜、吴元济腰斩都市</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6553_0'>⑶ （沙陀、突厥，自元和初，始通中国）。（逻逤：唐时吐蕃之都城，故阯在今西藏自治区拉萨市。此借指吐蕃）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6553_0'>⑷ 狼星：星名。《史记·天官书》：“其东有大星曰狼，狼角变色，多盗贼。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6553_0'>⑸ 鼎湖弓：《史记·封禅书》（卷二八）：“黄帝采首山铜，铸鼎于荆山下。鼎既成，有龙垂胡髯下迎黄帝，黄帝上骑，群臣后宫从。上者七十馀人，龙乃上去。馀小臣不得上，乃悉持龙髯，龙髯拔堕，堕黄帝之弓。百姓仰望，黄帝既上天，乃抱其弓与胡髯号，故后世因名其处曰鼎湖，其弓曰乌号。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6553_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6554' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6554' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6554?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（820年5月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6554_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6554'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6554'>月落禁垣西，星攒晓仗齐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6554'>风传宫漏苦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，云拂羽仪低。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6554'>路隘车千两<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，桥危马万蹄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6554'>共嗟封石检<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，不为报功泥<span class='inlineComment2'>（功泥：参卷2《谕宝二首》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6554'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6554'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6554_0'>⑴ 宫漏：古代宫中计时之器具，用铜壶滴漏，故称宫漏。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6554_0'>⑵ 两：计算车乘之单位，后作“辆”。《诗·召南·鹊巢》：“之子于归，百两御之。”毛传：“百两，百乘也。”孔颖达疏：“《风俗通》以为车有两轮，马有四匹，故车称两，马称匹。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6554_0'>⑶ 石检：古代封禅时，置于封禅坛方石旁用以封玉检之石条。《后汉书·祭祀志上》：“建武三十二年正月……议封禅所使用，有司奏当用方石再累置坛中，皆方五尺，厚一尺，用玉牒书藏方石……又用石检十枚，列于石旁，东西各三，南北各二，皆长三尺，广一尺，厚七寸……检用金缕五周，以水银和金以为泥。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6554_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　夏，代令狐楚作状。作品：《为令狐相国谢赐金石凌红雪状》<div id='poem_1372467' class='_poem'><div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　六七月间，代令狐楚作状。作品：《为令狐相公谢回一子官与第状》<br /><a href="javascript: class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372454_comment'></div>恐失人神之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372454_comment'></div>臣等谬居荣近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372454_comment'></div>冒死上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372454_comment'></div>伏乞特罢宸游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372454_comment'></div>曲回天眷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372454_comment'></div>稍待升平之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372454_comment'></div>别卜游幸之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372454_comment'></div>则云亭之禅可登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372454_comment'></div>崆峒之驾非远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372454_comment'></div>岂必驱驰一往。<div id='poem_sentence_53_1372454_comment'></div>胜境未周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372454_comment'></div>圣躬徒倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372454_comment'></div>臣等无任恳迫忘躯之至。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，议论穆宗闰正月所下之诏，有文记之。作品：《钱货议状》<div id='poem_1372480' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372480' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372480?labeling=true' target='_blank'>浙东论罢进海味状<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>钱货议状</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372480")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372480_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372480'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372480'>奉进止。当今百姓之困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372480_comment'></div>众情所知。减税则国用不充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372480_comment'></div>欲依旧则人困转甚。皆由货轻钱重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372480_comment'></div>徵税暗加。宜令百寮各陈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>意见</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372480_comment'></div>以革其弊。右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372480_comment'></div>闰正月十七日。宰相奉宣进止如前者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372480_comment'></div>臣以为当今百姓之困。其弊数十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372480_comment'></div>不独在于钱货徵税之谓也。既圣问言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372480_comment'></div>又以为黎庶之重困。不在于赋税之闇加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372480_comment'></div>患在于剥夺之不已。钱货之轻重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372480_comment'></div>不在于议论之不当。患在于法令之不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372480_comment'></div>今天下赋税一法也。厚薄一概也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372480_comment'></div>然而廉能莅之则生息。贪愚莅之则败伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372480_comment'></div>盖得人则理之明验也。岂徵税暗加之谓乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372480_comment'></div>自岭已南。以金银为货币。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372480_comment'></div>自巴已外。以盐帛为交易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372480_comment'></div>黔巫溪峡。大抵用水银朱砂缯帛巾帽以相市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372480_comment'></div>然而前人以之理。后人以之扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372480_comment'></div>东郡以之耗。西郡以之赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372480_comment'></div>又得人则理之明验也。岂钱重货轻之谓乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372480_comment'></div>自国家置两税以来。天下之财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372480_comment'></div>限为三品。一曰上供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372480_comment'></div>二曰留使。三曰留州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372480_comment'></div>皆量出以为入。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>定额</span>以给资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372480_comment'></div>然而节将有进献以市国恩者。有赂遗以买私名者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372480_comment'></div>有藏镪滞帛以贻子孙者。有高楼广榭以炽第宅者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372480_comment'></div>彼之俸入有常也。公私有分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372480_comment'></div>此何从而得之。又国家置度支转运以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372480_comment'></div>一则管盐以易货。一则受财以轻费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372480_comment'></div>近制有年进月进之名。有正至三节之献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372480_comment'></div>彼之管盐有常也。受财有数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372480_comment'></div>此又何从而得之。且百姓国家之百姓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372480_comment'></div>货财国家之货财也。不足则取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372480_comment'></div>有馀则舍之。在我而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372480_comment'></div>又何必授之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>重柄</span>。假之利权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372480_comment'></div>徇彼之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>徼恩</span>。成我之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>怨府</span>哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372480_comment'></div>今陛下初临亿兆。首问群寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372480_comment'></div>诚能禁藩镇大臣不时之献。罢度支转运别进之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372480_comment'></div>绝赂遗之私。节侈靡之俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372480_comment'></div>峻风宪之举。深赃罪之刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372480_comment'></div>精覈考课之条。慎选字人之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372480_comment'></div>若此则不减税而人安。不改法而人理矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372480_comment'></div>至于古今言钱币之轻重者熟矣。或更大钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372480_comment'></div>或放私铸。或龟或贝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372480_comment'></div>或皮或刀。或禁埋藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372480_comment'></div>或禁销燬。或禁器用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372480_comment'></div>或禁滞积。皆可以救一时之弊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372480_comment'></div>然而或损或益者。盖法有行不行之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372480_comment'></div>臣不敢远徵古證。窃见元和以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372480_comment'></div>初有公私器用禁铜之令。次有交易钱帛兼行之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372480_comment'></div>近有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>积钱</span>不得过数之限。每更守尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372480_comment'></div>则必有用钱不得加除之榜。然而铜器备列于公私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372480_comment'></div>钱帛不兼于卖鬻。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>积钱</span>不出于墙垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372480_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>欺滥</span>遍行于市井。亦未闻鞭一夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372480_comment'></div>黜一吏。赏一告讦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372480_comment'></div>坏一蓄藏岂法不便于时耶。盖行之不至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372480_comment'></div>陛下诚能采古今救弊之方。施赏罚必行之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372480_comment'></div>则圣祖仁宗之法制何限。前贤后智之议论何穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372480_comment'></div>岂待愚臣盗窃古人之见。自称革弊之术哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372480_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。伏听敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372480_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1372480_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，重议杨子陵所上之奏，有文记之。作品：《中书省议赋税及铸钱等状》<div id='poem_1372471' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372471' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372471?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中书省议赋税及铸钱等状<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372471")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372471_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1372471_0'>① 中书门下奏据杨于陵等议状请天下两税榷酒盐利等悉以布帛丝绵等物充税一切不徵见钱者</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372471'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372471'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372471_comment'></div>据中书门下状称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372471_comment'></div>应徵两税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372471_comment'></div>起元和十六年已后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372471_comment'></div>并配端匹斤两之物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372471_comment'></div>以为税额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372471_comment'></div>不用计钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372471_comment'></div>令其折纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372471_comment'></div>仍约元和十五年徵纳布帛等估回计者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372471_comment'></div>伏以两税不纳见钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372471_comment'></div>百姓诚为稳便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372471_comment'></div>或虑土宜不等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372471_comment'></div>恐须更有商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372471_comment'></div>请令天下州县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372471_comment'></div>有山野溪洞无布帛丝绵之处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372471_comment'></div>得以九谷百货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372471_comment'></div>一物已上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372471_comment'></div>但堪本处交易<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>用度</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372471_comment'></div>并许折纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372471_comment'></div>便充留州留使钱数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372471_comment'></div>仍令依当处堪纳两税匹段及杂货估价计折输纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372471_comment'></div>给用之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372471_comment'></div>并不得令有加揖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372471_comment'></div>臣等又见比来州县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372471_comment'></div>缘不纳见钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372471_comment'></div>抑令小户数人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372471_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>并合</span>共成端匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372471_comment'></div>期会来往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372471_comment'></div>费扰倍多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372471_comment'></div>今请天下州县有贫下户两税数少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372471_comment'></div>情愿输纳见钱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372471_comment'></div>亦任稳便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372471_comment'></div>若此则上无抑配之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372471_comment'></div>下有乐输之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372471_comment'></div>以兹折中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372471_comment'></div>实谓得宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372471_comment'></div>又据中书门下状称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372471_comment'></div>盐利酒利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372471_comment'></div>本以榷率计钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372471_comment'></div>有殊两税之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372471_comment'></div>不可除去钱额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372471_comment'></div>但合纳见钱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372471_comment'></div>亦请令折纳时估匹段者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372471_comment'></div>伏以粜盐价钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372471_comment'></div>自有本使收管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372471_comment'></div>不要州县<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>条流</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372471_comment'></div>至于榷酒利钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372471_comment'></div>虽则名目不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372471_comment'></div>其实出于百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372471_comment'></div>今天下十分州府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372471_comment'></div>九分是随两税均配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372471_comment'></div>其中一分置店沽酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372471_comment'></div>盖是分外诛求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372471_comment'></div>一则厚取疲人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372471_comment'></div>二则严刑检下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372471_comment'></div>上供既有定数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372471_comment'></div>馀利并入使司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372471_comment'></div>事实烦苛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372471_comment'></div>法非画一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372471_comment'></div>今请天下州府<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>榷酒钱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372471_comment'></div>一切据贯配入两税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372471_comment'></div>仍取两贯已上户均配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372471_comment'></div>两贯已下户不在配限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372471_comment'></div>先有置店沽酒处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372471_comment'></div>并请勒停。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372471_comment'></div>若此则赋敛无名额之烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372471_comment'></div>贫富有等差之异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372471_comment'></div>人知定准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372471_comment'></div>吏绝因缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372471_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372471_comment'></div>以此为便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372471_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_1372471'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372471_comment'></div>据中书门下状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372471_comment'></div>欲令诸道公私铜器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372471_comment'></div>各纳节度团练等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372471_comment'></div>令本处军人镕铸其铸本请以留州留使钱年支未用物充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372471_comment'></div>待一年后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372471_comment'></div>铸铜器尽勒停。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372471_comment'></div>其州府有出铜铅可以广铸处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372471_comment'></div>每年与本充铸者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372471_comment'></div>臣等<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>约计</span>天下百姓有铜器<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/80/Comments/1")'>用度</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372471_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>分数</span>无多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372471_comment'></div>散纳诸使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372471_comment'></div>斤两盖寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372471_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>创置</span>炉冶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372471_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>器具</span>颇繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372471_comment'></div>一年勒停。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372471_comment'></div>并是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>废物</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372471_comment'></div>军人既未<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>素习</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372471_comment'></div>镕铸亦恐甚难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372471_comment'></div>又每年留州留使钱额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372471_comment'></div>本约一年<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>用度</span>支留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372471_comment'></div>若待铸得新钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372471_comment'></div>然遣当州给用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372471_comment'></div>必恐百事久阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372471_comment'></div>不应时须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372471_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372471_comment'></div>请令诸使诸州一切在所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372471_comment'></div>许百姓以铜器折纳税钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372471_comment'></div>并度支给价收市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372471_comment'></div>每年每季。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372471_comment'></div>随便近有监冶处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372471_comment'></div>据数送纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372471_comment'></div>所冀炉冶无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_103_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>创置</span>之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372471_comment'></div>工匠有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_104_1372471", 1372471, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>素习</span>之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372471_comment'></div>不烦铸本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372471_comment'></div>自有利宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372471_comment'></div>其州府出铜铅可广铸处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372471_comment'></div>请委诸道有铜铅处长吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372471_comment'></div>各言利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372471_comment'></div>具状申陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372471_comment'></div>参酌众情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372471_comment'></div>然议可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372471_comment'></div>以前据中书门下奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1372471_comment'></div>请令中书门下两省重议可否奏闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1372471_comment'></div>臣等谨议如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372471_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372471_comment'></div>伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_117_1372471_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，作墓志铭。作品：《唐故京兆府盩厔县尉元君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1372523' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372523' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372523?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故京兆府盩厔县尉元君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372523")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372523_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372523'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372523'>唐盩厔县尉讳某字某姓元氏。于有魏昭成皇帝为十四世孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372523_comment'></div>曾曰尚食奉御某。祖曰绵州长史赠太子宾客某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372523_comment'></div>父曰都官郎中岳州刺史某。母曰某望阎夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372523_comment'></div>妻曰陇西李氏女。子曰某曰某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372523_comment'></div>女曰某。君始以荫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372523", 1372523, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>入仕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372523_comment'></div>四仕为盩厔尉。丁太夫人忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372523_comment'></div>遂不复仕。享年五十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372523_comment'></div>以疾殁于衢州。元和十五年四月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372523_comment'></div>归祔于咸阳县之某乡某里。君少孤力学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372523_comment'></div>通五经书。善鼓琴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372523_comment'></div>能为五言七言近体诗。事亲愉愉然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372523_comment'></div>终身不忘婴儿之慕。奉兄恭恭然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372523_comment'></div>若童子之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372523", 1372523, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>爱敬</span>。临弟侄妻子煦煦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372523_comment'></div>穷年无愠厉。居官以谨廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372523_comment'></div>贞顺而仁爱。寮友之悍诞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372523", 1372523, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>鄙异</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372523_comment'></div>游于君。则必怡然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372523_comment'></div>无自疑于我矣。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372523_comment'></div>总是数者。非古之所谓淑人君子欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372523_comment'></div>不寿不达。命适然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372523_comment'></div>是月二十一日。犹子晦跪于予曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372523_comment'></div>某日孤子震襄祔事。请铭于季父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372523_comment'></div>由是铭。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372523_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1372523'>或仁而夭。或鄙而寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372523_comment'></div>天乎不识。人乎安究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372523_comment'></div>我之北原。五世其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372523_comment'></div>子子孙孙。前后左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372523_comment'></div>殁有令人。乃克来祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372523_comment'></div>斯焉克终。亦又何疚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372523_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1372523_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，代人作状。作品：《贺将诞日德音状》<div id='poem_1372470' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372470' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372470?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺降诞日德音状</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372470")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372470_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372470'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372470'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372470_comment'></div>臣等伏奉今日敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372470_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372470", 1372470, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>降诞</span>之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372470_comment'></div>奉迎皇太后宫中上寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372470_comment'></div>获申欢慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372470_comment'></div>宜集百寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372470_comment'></div>及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372470", 1372470, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>外命妇</span>进名贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372470_comment'></div>皇太后仍御光顺门内殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372470_comment'></div>与百寮相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372470_comment'></div>便永为常式者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372470_comment'></div>伏以降圣嘉辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372470_comment'></div>承天令节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372470_comment'></div>新恩肇降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372470_comment'></div>品汇咸休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372470_comment'></div>皇太后念枢星之祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372470_comment'></div>重游甲观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372470_comment'></div>群执事排阊阖而入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372470_comment'></div>尽唱赓歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372470_comment'></div>同沾就日之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372470_comment'></div>实庆溥天之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372470_comment'></div>况百官承式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372470_comment'></div>万岁传声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372470_comment'></div>永为利见之规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372470_comment'></div>弥荷无穷之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372470_comment'></div>臣等谬参枢务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372470_comment'></div>亲奉德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372470_comment'></div>庆忭之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372470_comment'></div>倍万常品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372470_comment'></div>无任鼓舞欢呼之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1372470_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，议论穆宗闰正月所下之诏，有状。作品：《钱重物轻议》<div id='poem_1372481' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372481' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372481?labeling=true' target='_blank'>钱重物轻议</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372481")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372481_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372481'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372481'>右。臣伏见中书门下牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372481_comment'></div>奉进止。以钱重物轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372481_comment'></div>为病颇甚。宜令百寮各随所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372481_comment'></div>作利害状类会奏闻者。臣备位有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372481_comment'></div>谬总邦计。权物变弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372481_comment'></div>职分所当。固合经心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372481_comment'></div>自思上达。岂宜待问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372481_comment'></div>方始启谋。臣伏以作法于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372481_comment'></div>必求适中。苟非济众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372481_comment'></div>是作不臧。所以夙夜寘怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372481_comment'></div>重难其术。伏奉制旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372481_comment'></div>旁采庶寮。臣实有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372481_comment'></div>敢不知愧。既不早思所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372481_comment'></div>上沃圣聪。今乃备数庶官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372481_comment'></div>肩随奏议。无乃失有司奉职之体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372481_comment'></div>负尸位素餐之责。况道谋孔多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372481_comment'></div>是用不集。盈庭之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372481_comment'></div>自古所知。至于业广即山税徵谷帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372481_comment'></div>发公府之朽贯。禁私室之滞藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372481_comment'></div>使泉流必通。物定恒价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372481_comment'></div>群议所共。指事皆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372481_comment'></div>但在陛下行之。有司遵守利害之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372481_comment'></div>自足可徵。若使将广引古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372481_comment'></div>诞饰词辩。有齐画饼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372481_comment'></div>无益国经。恐重空文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372481_comment'></div>不敢轻议。谨议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372481_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1372481_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，议举县令，有文。作品：《中书省议举县令状》<div id='poem_1372472' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372472' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372472?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中书省议举县令状<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372472")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372472_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1372472_0'>① 元和十五年八月日中书舍人臣武儒衡等奏驾部郎中知制诰臣李宗闵中书舍人臣王起库部郎中知制诰臣牛僧孺祠部郎中知制诰臣元稹</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372472'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372472'>吏部重奏举荐县令节文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372472_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1372472'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372472_comment'></div>吏部以停年课资之格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372472_comment'></div>取宰邑字人之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372472_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372472", 1372472, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>公干</span>强白者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372472_comment'></div>拘以考浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372472_comment'></div>疾废耄聩者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372472_comment'></div>得在选中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372472_comment'></div>倒置是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372472_comment'></div>无甚于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372472_comment'></div>朝廷将欲渐去其弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372472_comment'></div>所以特设举荐之科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372472_comment'></div>明诏既行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372472_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372472", 1372472, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>起请</span>寻下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372472_comment'></div>有司再议釐革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372472_comment'></div>何以取信于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372472_comment'></div>据吏部云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372472_comment'></div>增加新户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372472_comment'></div>开垦荒田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372472_comment'></div>已是考课旧条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372472_comment'></div>狱绝系囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372472_comment'></div>冤人申雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372472_comment'></div>亦是正途常事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372472_comment'></div>举寮吏不法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372472_comment'></div>恐生告讦之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372472_comment'></div>有利益公家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372472_comment'></div>又未指陈其目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372472_comment'></div>选授者例无异绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372472_comment'></div>尚得四考<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1372472", 1372472, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>守常</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372472_comment'></div>举荐者纵未殊尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372472_comment'></div>岂可二年便罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372472_comment'></div>今请但行连坐举主之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372472_comment'></div>不必更依吏部分外条件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372472_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372472_comment'></div>见任官及处士散试官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372472_comment'></div>并请停集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372472_comment'></div>且起家散试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372472_comment'></div>固有才能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372472_comment'></div>见任他官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372472_comment'></div>何妨抚字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372472_comment'></div>若皆限其资历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372472_comment'></div>即与常选何殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372472_comment'></div>今请除见任县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372472_comment'></div>其馀并令赴集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372472_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372472_comment'></div>检勘榜样。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372472_comment'></div>剥放程式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372472_comment'></div>及试书判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372472_comment'></div>并请准平选人例处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372472_comment'></div>若此则案牍之吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372472_comment'></div>得肆奸欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372472_comment'></div>书判虽工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372472_comment'></div>何关政术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372472_comment'></div>有同减选赴集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372472_comment'></div>岂是特举与官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372472_comment'></div>今请应举荐人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372472_comment'></div>量纳文状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372472_comment'></div>便令注拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372472_comment'></div>亦不在剥放及试书判之限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372472_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372472_comment'></div>并请注破碎之县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372472_comment'></div>责其效实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372472_comment'></div>本举良能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372472_comment'></div>冀蒙优奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372472_comment'></div>皆居破碎之处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372472_comment'></div>恐同<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1372472", 1372472, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>贬降</span>之条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372472_comment'></div>以前数件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372472_comment'></div>盖恐不可施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372472_comment'></div>伏请但依<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1372472", 1372472, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>起请</span>节文处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372472_comment'></div>仍请据今年县令员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372472_comment'></div>先尽举荐人数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372472_comment'></div>留有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372472_comment'></div>然后许注拟平选人等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372472_comment'></div>冀将允当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372472_comment'></div>同前五舍人同署。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1372472_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，元稹参奉唐穆宗，得用奉赠，作文。作品：《告赠皇考黄妣文》<div id='poem_1372540' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372540' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372540?labeling=true' target='_blank'>告赠皇考皇妣文</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372540")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372540_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372540'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372540'>嗣子稹等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372540_comment'></div>谨以常馔嘉蔬之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372540_comment'></div>敢昭告于皇考赠右散骑常侍皇妣赠荥阳郡太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372540_comment'></div>今皇帝二月五日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372540_comment'></div>泽被幽显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372540_comment'></div>小子稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372540_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372540", 1372540, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>参奉</span>班荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372540_comment'></div>得用封赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372540_comment'></div>越七月二十八日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372540_comment'></div>乃诏先夫人曰荥阳郡太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372540_comment'></div>洎八月之九日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372540_comment'></div>复诏先府君曰右散骑常侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372540_comment'></div>祗命陨越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372540_comment'></div>哀号不逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372540_comment'></div>追念<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372540", 1372540, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>顾复</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372540_comment'></div>若亡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1372540", 1372540, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>生次</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372540_comment'></div>惟积洎稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372540_comment'></div>幼遭闵凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372540_comment'></div>积未成童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372540_comment'></div>稹生八岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372540_comment'></div>蒙騃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1372540", 1372540, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>孩稚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372540_comment'></div>昧然无识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372540_comment'></div>遗有清白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372540_comment'></div>业无樵苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372540_comment'></div>先夫人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1372540", 1372540, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>备极</span>劳苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372540_comment'></div>躬亲养育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372540_comment'></div>截长补败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372540_comment'></div>以御<span id='poem_sentence_28_1372540_comment'></div>以给晡旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372540_comment'></div>依倚舅族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372540_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1372540", 1372540, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>分张</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1372540", 1372540, "Clauses/31/Comments/1")'>外姻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372540_comment'></div>奉祀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1372540", 1372540, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>免丧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372540_comment'></div>礼无遗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372540_comment'></div>始亡兄集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372540_comment'></div>得尉兴平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372540_comment'></div>然后衣服饮食之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372540_comment'></div>粗有准常。<div "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>备至</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372540_comment'></div>不肖乃立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372540_comment'></div>积初一命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372540_comment'></div>重罗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1372540", 1372540, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>缨裳</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372540_comment'></div>迁换因循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372540_comment'></div>遂阶荣位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372540_comment'></div>大有车马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372540_comment'></div>丰有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1372540", 1372540, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>俸秩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372540_comment'></div>书扇虽存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372540_comment'></div>旧老已尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372540_comment'></div>顾是所有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372540_comment'></div>将焉用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372540_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372540_comment'></div>生我者父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372540_comment'></div>享此者妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372540_comment'></div>勤悴者兄嫂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372540_comment'></div>优馀者婢仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372540_comment'></div>追孝不过于一奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372540_comment'></div>荐宠不过于扬名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372540_comment'></div>哀哀劬劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372540_comment'></div>亦又何报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372540_comment'></div>摧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1372540", 1372540, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>殒裂</span>。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372540_comment'></div>痛毒肝心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372540_comment'></div>伏惟尚飨。</div><div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372448' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372448?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为萧相谢追赠祖父祖妣亡父表</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_1_1372448_comment'></div>臣某中谢。臣祖臣父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372448_comment'></div>或勋或贤。义著族姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372448_comment'></div>名书<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372448_comment'></div>实愧仲弓之德。自陛下遣臣待罪宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372448_comment'></div>不能有以匡逮圣明。龌龊知惭。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372293_comment'></div>式示等威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372293_comment'></div>盖以劳之小大为上下也。</div><div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，圣上追封李逢吉母王氏，起草诰命。作品：《追封李逢吉母王氏等》<div id='poem_1372305' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372305' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_1_1372305_comment'></div>贫则有啜菽之欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372305_comment'></div>仕则有捧檄之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372305_comment'></div>离则有陟圯之叹。<div onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1372305", 1372305, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>追锡</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372305_comment'></div>何以达情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372305_comment'></div>检校吏部尚书使持节襄州刺史李逢吉母赠平阳郡太夫人王氏等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372305_comment'></div>皆朕公卿之母也。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372305_comment'></div>简想徽猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372305_comment'></div>用宏封邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372305_comment'></div>式光子道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372305_comment'></div>以盛母仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372305_comment'></div>可依前件。</div><div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372283' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372283?labeling=true' target='_blank'>令狐楚等加阶制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372283_comment'></div>臣体君命。数名等威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372283_comment'></div>上下以两。昔汉丞相金印紫绶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372283_comment'></div>黄扉黑轓。亦所以异车服于百辟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372283_comment'></div>今朕宰相阶级不称。甚无谓焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372283_comment'></div>守门下侍郎同中书门下平章事赐紫金鱼袋令狐楚。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372283", 1372283, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>端慎</span>严恪。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1372283_comment'></div>守而不失。守中书侍郎同中书门下平章事赐紫金鱼袋萧俛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372283_comment'></div>深敏敬恭。寤寐思理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372283_comment'></div>伏蒲焚稿。知无不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372283_comment'></div>守中书侍郎同中书门下平章事赐紫金鱼袋段文昌。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372283", 1372283, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>坦易</span>坚白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372283_comment'></div>风雨有常。推贤举能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372283_comment'></div>如恐不及。咨汝三后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372283_comment'></div>弼子一人。汝为股肱耳目以赉子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372283_comment'></div>予敷心腹肾肠以告汝。汝其一乃志以奉上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372283_comment'></div>周乃惠以接下。敬乃事以临官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372283_comment'></div>是三者孙叔敖尝用之于楚矣。位愈高而□愈戴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372283_comment'></div>禄愈厚而人愈怀。夫以朕之不敏不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372283_comment'></div>尚克用济。实赖吾二三臣朝夕之诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372283_comment'></div>诗云。无言不酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372283_comment'></div>无德不报。爰因进等之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372283_comment'></div>用申<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1372283", 1372283, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>交警</span>之词。各竭乃诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372283_comment'></div>同底于道。康天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372283_comment'></div>平泰阶。而后越级之赐行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372283_comment'></div>兹谓叙常。非以为报。<div class='inline' href='/Writing/1372382?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授郑涵尚书考功郎中冯宿刑部郎中制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372382")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372382_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372382'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372382'>敕。二帝三王之所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1372382", 1372382, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>仁声</span>无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372382_comment'></div>绩用明而刑罚当也。尚书郎专是两者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372382_comment'></div>畴将若予。佥曰前国子博士充史馆修撰郑涵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372382_comment'></div>文无害。可以彰善恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372382_comment'></div>守歙州刺史冯宿。思无邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372382_comment'></div>可以尽哀敬。庶尹百吏之能否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372382_comment'></div>四海九州之性命。用汝参断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372382_comment'></div>汝其戒之。夫刻则害善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372382_comment'></div>放则利淫。滞则不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372382_comment'></div>流则自挠。惟是四者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372382_comment'></div>时考之难。亟则失情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372382_comment'></div>缓则留狱。深则碍恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372382_comment'></div>纵则生奸。惟是四者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372382_comment'></div>时行之难。八者不乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372382_comment'></div>然后可以有志于理矣。朕所注意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372382_comment'></div>尔其尽心。涵可考功郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372382_comment'></div>宿可刑部郎中。馀并如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372382_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1372382_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《元藇杭州刺史等》。<div id='poem_1372403' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372403' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372403?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授元藇<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作舆）</span>等馀杭等州刺史制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372403")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372403_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372403'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372403'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372403_comment'></div>饶州刺史元藇等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372403_comment'></div>自天子至于侯甸男邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372403_comment'></div>大小之势不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372403_comment'></div>子育黎元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372403_comment'></div>其揆一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372403_comment'></div>是以郎官出宰百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372403_comment'></div>牧守入为三公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372403_comment'></div>此所以前代称理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372403_comment'></div>近俗偷末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372403_comment'></div>倒置是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372403_comment'></div>省寺以地望自高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372403_comment'></div>郡县以势卑自劣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372403_comment'></div>盘牙不解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372403_comment'></div>稂莠不除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372403_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1372403", 1372403, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>比比</span>有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372403_comment'></div>患由此起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372403_comment'></div>今馀杭钟离新安顺政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372403_comment'></div>三有财用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372403_comment'></div>一邻戎狄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372403_comment'></div>将有所授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372403_comment'></div>每难其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372403_comment'></div>以藇之理课甄明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372403_comment'></div>以宏度之奏议<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372403", 1372403, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>详允</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372403_comment'></div>以元亮之学古从政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372403_comment'></div>以公逵之守道立身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372403_comment'></div>佥命为邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372403_comment'></div>庶可胜残而去杀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372403_comment'></div>敬奉诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372403_comment'></div>用慰煢独。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372403_comment'></div>可依前件。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1372403_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《赵真长等加官制》。<div id='poem_1372411' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372411' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372411?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赵真长等加官制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_0_1372411'>敕。臣藩洎逢吉尚书于陵所请剑南西川节度判官某官赵真长等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372411_comment'></div>皆以文学政事。得参公选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372411_comment'></div>观其列状。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372411", 1372411, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>尉荐</span>甚勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372411_comment'></div>人各有志。朕无不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372411_comment'></div>矧以羊祜之风流尽在。文翁之学校复兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372411_comment'></div>咨尔真长等。无替令猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372411_comment'></div>勉当毗赞。淮河之师旅近息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372411_comment'></div>荆江之赋入素殷。咨尔应等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372411_comment'></div>无瘝厥官。以扰生聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372411_comment'></div>各扬乃职。用副朕怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372411_comment'></div>真长可行某官。依前充职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372411_comment'></div>应可某官。充户部巡官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372411_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372411", 1372411, href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《齐煚饶州刺史王堪澧州刺史》。<div id='poem_1372402' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372402' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372402'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372402'>敕。尚书刑部郎中齐煚岳州刺史王堪等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372402_comment'></div>隶江之西。饶为沃野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372402_comment'></div>澧亦旁荆之剧郡。而鄱阳有镕银撷茗之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372402_comment'></div>俗用剽轻。政无刑威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372402_comment'></div>盗贼多有。沅湘间沉怨抑激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372402_comment'></div>有屈原遗风。吏无廉平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372402_comment'></div>人用愁苦。惟尔煚洎堪等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372402_comment'></div>皆践台阁。亟历名部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372402_comment'></div>号为良能。俾分<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1372402", 1372402, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>两地</span>之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372402_comment'></div>伫听二天之谚。煚可使持节饶州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372402_comment'></div>堪可使持节澧州刺史。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372289_comment'></div>实我元舅。寅亮朕躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372289_comment'></div>傅师洎肇。共司子言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372289_comment'></div>发扬书命。倰贰教官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372289_comment'></div>长财善物。证居环尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372289_comment'></div>夜警昼巡。堪致厥政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372289_comment'></div>时惟旧老高阳而下五十有六人。分命内外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372289_comment'></div>祗勤于理。越二月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372289_comment'></div>发<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372289", 1372289, ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《授杜叔良左领军卫大将军制》》。<div id='poem_1372327' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372327' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1372327'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372327'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372327_comment'></div>十二卫大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372327_comment'></div>典掌禁旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372327_comment'></div>张皇六师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372327_comment'></div>犹藩垣之捧宸极也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372327_comment'></div>为任不细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372327_comment'></div>是以出则授以弧矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372327_comment'></div>驱犬羊于虏庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372327_comment'></div>入则委以爪牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372327_comment'></div>领貔貅于魏阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372327_comment'></div>中外递用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372327_comment'></div>佥谓恩荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372327_comment'></div>前朔方灵盐定远等城节度副大使知节度事观察处置押蕃落等使元从奉天定难功臣开府仪同三司检校工部尚书兼灵州大都督府长史大夫上柱国安定郡王食邑三千户杜叔良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372327_comment'></div>将门之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372327_comment'></div>不坠弓裘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372327_comment'></div>颇阅诗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372327_comment'></div>素明韬略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372327_comment'></div>顷以五原近寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372327_comment'></div>御侮才难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372327_comment'></div>遂俾驱攘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372327_comment'></div>实资毅勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372327_comment'></div>星霜屡换。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372327_comment'></div>节制斯勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372327_comment'></div>虽不立奇功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372327_comment'></div>而无忘慎固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372327_comment'></div>尚多毗倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372327_comment'></div>乃命徼巡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372327_comment'></div>勉服新恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372327_comment'></div>以彰前效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372327_comment'></div>可骠骑大将军行左领军卫大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372327_comment'></div>元从功臣勋封如故。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1372327_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《李光颜加阶》。<div id='poem_1372287' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372287' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372287?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李光颜加阶制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372287")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372287_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372287'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372287'>门下。朕闻有天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372287_comment'></div>道德仁义以为理。城郭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372287", 1372287, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>沟池</span>以为固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372287_comment'></div>故曰不教人战。是谓弃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372287_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372287", 1372287, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>有备无患</span>。可以应卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372287_comment'></div>此先王驱攘戎狄保障黎元之大略也。五原居有夏灵庆之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372287_comment'></div>当蛇豕豺狼之突。将扼咽喉之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372287_comment'></div>爰命腹心之臣。厥有成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372287_comment'></div>宜膺茂典。邠宁庆等州节度观察处置等使金紫光禄大夫检校司空兼邠州刺史上柱国武威郡开国公李光颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372287_comment'></div>气敌三军。心师百行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372287_comment'></div>有卞庄之勇。守之以仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372287_comment'></div>有日磾之诚。济之以武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372287_comment'></div>叱咤则风云回合。閒宴则樽俎周旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372287_comment'></div>盖文武之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372287", 1372287, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>令才</span>。真古今之良将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372287_comment'></div>是以淮蔡之役。百胜功高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372287_comment'></div>青齐之师。一面居最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372287_comment'></div>朕以萧关尚警。马岭犹虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372287_comment'></div>五饵之诈可羞。百雉之城爰度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372287_comment'></div>先是属役。每难其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372287_comment'></div>惟尔良能。果谐予愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372287_comment'></div>程功而不愆于素。讫事而不劳于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372287_comment'></div>比命有司。褒乃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1372287", 1372287, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>实力</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372287_comment'></div>佥曰古诸侯勋德优盛。则就加特进以宠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372287_comment'></div>我国家封植崇重。有朝请一字以异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372287_comment'></div>子嘉乃勤。兼用两者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372287_comment'></div>兹谓上赏。尔惟钦哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372287_comment'></div>可特进。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372287_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1372287_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《赠裴行立左散骑常侍》。<div id='poem_1372311' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372311' class='poemTitle class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372311_comment'></div>才唯艰哉。而况于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372311", 1372311, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>镇定</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372311", 1372311, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>远荒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372311_comment'></div>经略逋寇。毗倚方切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372311_comment'></div>曷彰悯悼。故朝散大夫持节桂州刺史兼御史中丞裴行立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372311_comment'></div>积德之门。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372284", 1372284, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>宪考</span>集大命于朕躬。宅忧昏逾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372284_comment'></div>罔克攸济。惟尔俛屡赞大仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372284_comment'></div>以诏予一人。惟尔文昌作策度以道扬末命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372284_comment'></div>俾小子审训弗违。时乃之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372284_comment'></div>王功曰勋。兹用报汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372284_comment'></div>尚克<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372284", 1372284,
