class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372285_comment'></div>所以褒有德也。朝议大夫守门下侍郎同中书门下平章事上骑都尉袭徐国公赐紫金鱼袋萧俛等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372285_comment'></div>外抚四夷。内顺百度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372285_comment'></div>同德比义。以尧舜之道事予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372285_comment'></div>厥惟懋哉。遂行益地之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372369_comment'></div>昔我太宗文皇帝以魏徵为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372369", 1372369, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>人镜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372369_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372369", 1372369, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>奸胆</span>形于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372369_comment'></div>逆耳闻于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372369_comment'></div>及徵没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372369_comment'></div>而犹叹过失之不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372369_comment'></div>夫以朕之不敏不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372369_comment'></div>托于人上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372369_comment'></div>月环其七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372369_comment'></div>而善恶蔑闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372369_comment'></div>岂谏争之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372369_comment'></div>未尽规于不德耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372369_comment'></div>朕甚惧焉。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372369_comment'></div>谦而逾光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372369_comment'></div>命汝弼予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372369_comment'></div>式冀无过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372369_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372369_comment'></div>宋景公一诸侯耳。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372325' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372325?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授张籍秘书郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372325_comment'></div>传云。王泽竭而诗不作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372325_comment'></div>又曰。采诗以观人风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372325_comment'></div>斯亦警予之一事也。以尔籍雅尚古文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372325_comment'></div>不从流俗。切磨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372325", 1372325, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>讽兴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372325_comment'></div>有政经。而又居贫宴然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372325_comment'></div>廉退不竞。俾任石渠之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372325_comment'></div>思闻木铎之音。可守秘书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372325_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1372325_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《论倚忻州刺史》。<div id='poem_1372407' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372407' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372407?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授论倚忻州刺史制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372407")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372407_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372407'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372407'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372407_comment'></div>前使持节守忻州刺史赐紫金鱼袋论倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372407_comment'></div>日者议镇之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372407_comment'></div>例皆甄奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372407_comment'></div>有吏姚泌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372407_comment'></div>早闻其勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372407_comment'></div>因以泌为忻州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372407_comment'></div>会泌隐恶彰败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372407_comment'></div>不终其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372407_comment'></div>司空度上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372407_comment'></div>前刺史倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372407_comment'></div>忻人怀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372407_comment'></div>复换他守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372407_comment'></div>人用不协。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372407_comment'></div>遂仍命尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372407_comment'></div>以便于忻。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《崔蔇等检都官员外郎兼侍御史》。<div id='poem_1372426' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372426' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_6_1372333_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1372333_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《陈谏循州刺史》。<div id='poem_1372409' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372409' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《赠田弘正母郑氏等》。<div id='poem_1372303' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372303' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_1372303_comment'></div>生我劬劳。欲报之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372303_comment'></div>昊天罔极。子欲养而亲不待之词也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372303_comment'></div>朕有臣宏正等。皆社稷之臣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372303_comment'></div>或寄重股肱。或亲连肺腑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372303_comment'></div>而克忠于国。克孝于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372303_comment'></div>歌康公念母之诗。感日磾见图而泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372303_comment'></div>朕方推广孝。以阐大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372303_comment'></div>乃诏有司。深惟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1372303", class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372303_comment'></div>惟号之美。何用光于窀穸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372303_comment'></div>永锡尔类。予何爱焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372303_comment'></div>呜呼。子为列岳之崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372303_comment'></div>母用追封之礼。亦可谓生荣死哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372303_comment'></div>孝子事亲之终也。惟尔钦哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372303_comment'></div>无或失坠。可依前件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372303_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1372303_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_16_1372298_comment'></div>终无内顾之忧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372298_comment'></div>由此妇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372298_comment'></div>今愬积行累功。<div id='poem_sentence_21_1372298_comment'></div>名列<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1372298", 1372298, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>上台</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372298_comment'></div>而韦氏犹彝章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372298_comment'></div>未尝开国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372298_comment'></div>甚不称也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372298_comment'></div>因愬大名之邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372298_comment'></div>式建小君之号。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《刘师老授右司郎中制》。<div id='poem_1372380' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372380' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1372297'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372297'>敕。故成德军节度镇冀深赵等州观察处置等使金紫光禄大夫检校尚书左仆射赠侍中王承宗母燕国太夫人吴氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372297_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372297", 1372297, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>鲁文在手</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372297", 1372297, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>燕梦徵兰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372297_comment'></div>道以匡夫。仁而训子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372297_comment'></div>教日磾竭诚之操。义必资忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372297_comment'></div>戒陈婴自大之心。明于处顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372297_comment'></div>是以承宗辞代之际。承元领务之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372297_comment'></div>或辍哭以据床。每形言于忧国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372297_comment'></div>人知趣向。道实光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372297_comment'></div>宜受进封之恩。用表贯霜之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372297_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1372297_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《柏耆授尚书兵部员外郎制》。<div id='poem_1372385' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372385' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_0_1372385_comment'></div>朕闻亟迁则彝伦斁。滞赏则劳臣怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372385_comment'></div>兼用两者。谓之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372385", class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372385_comment'></div>周历兹任。岂无意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372385_comment'></div>元和中。盗杀丞相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372385_comment'></div>疾伤议臣。齐冀之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372385_comment'></div>交以祸端相嫁。耆自青溪窖中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372385_comment'></div>提转丸捭阖之书。驰于诸镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372385_comment'></div>使承宗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372385", 1372385, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>疑否</span>隔塞。一朝豁然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372385_comment'></div>纳质献地。克终于善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372385_comment'></div>承宗既没。承元授事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372385_comment'></div>耆又将朕教告。命于承元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372385_comment'></div>万众无哗。一方底定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372385_comment'></div>此而不录。将何以劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372385_comment'></div>凡百多士。无忘急病之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372385_comment'></div>可守尚书兵部员外郎。赐绯鱼袋。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《授裴向左散骑常侍制》。<div id='poem_1372368' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372368' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372368?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授裴向左散骑常侍制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1372368'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372368'>敕。周文王侍从之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372368_comment'></div>无可使结袜者。我知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372368_comment'></div>左右前后。无非令人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372368_comment'></div>朕以将壮之年。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372368", 1372368, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>臣妾</span>天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372368_comment'></div>司其忿懥。其在于持重温良之士以鉴之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372368_comment'></div>前陕虢等州都防御观察处置等使中散大夫守陕州大都督府长史赐紫金鱼袋裴向。搢绅之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372368_comment'></div>言其闺门之行。仅至于衣无常主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372368_comment'></div>儿无常父矣。推是为政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372368_comment'></div>仁何远乎。是以发自王畿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372368_comment'></div>至于陕服。多历年所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372368_comment'></div>终无尤违。每移孝友之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372368_comment'></div>以惩强暴之俗。甘棠之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372368_comment'></div>廉让兴焉。子欲用为垂珰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372368", 1372368, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>夹乘</span>之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372368_comment'></div>以代吾盘盂韦弦之戒。不亦可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372368_comment'></div>可守左散骑常侍。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372368_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1372368_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《李拭授宗正卿等》。<div id='poem_1372372' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372372' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_1372372_comment'></div>明皇而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372372_comment'></div>其属未远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372372_comment'></div>诸王在閤。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1372372_comment'></div>长幼秩序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372372_comment'></div>尽委之于大宗正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372372_comment'></div>苟非能贤。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1372372_comment'></div>主宗之盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372372_comment'></div>绰有馀裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372372_comment'></div>而执事者又曰。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1372372_comment'></div>不敢虚位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372372_comment'></div>佥以虔度文学儒素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372372_comment'></div><span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372372_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1372372", 1372372, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>挺直</span>不挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372372_comment'></div>以之代拭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372372_comment'></div>允谓其良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372372_comment'></div>仍假左貂之冠。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1372372_comment'></div>拭可检校左散骑常侍兼宗正卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372372_comment'></div>虔度可守殿中监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372372_comment'></div>馀如故。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1372372_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《授杜元颖户部侍郎依前翰林学士制》。<div id='poem_1372365' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372365' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372365?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授杜元㯋户部侍郎依前翰林学士制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1372365'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372365'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372365_comment'></div>朝散大夫守中书舍人充翰林学士护军赐紫金鱼袋杜元㯋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372365_comment'></div>昔我宪宗章武皇帝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372365", 1372365, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>熏灼</span>威明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372365_comment'></div>兵定八极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372365_comment'></div>大索俊乂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372365_comment'></div>以徵谋猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372365_comment'></div>其在禁林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372365_comment'></div>尤集贤彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372365_comment'></div>越正月夕庚子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372365_comment'></div>将弃倦勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372365_comment'></div>付朕末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372365_comment'></div>乃诏元㯋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372365_comment'></div>佑予冲人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372365_comment'></div>以导扬丕训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372365_comment'></div>尔亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372365", 1372365, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>祗奉</span>顾命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372365_comment'></div>咨授<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作援）</span>旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372365_comment'></div>辅釐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372365", 1372365, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>哀忧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372365_comment'></div>俾克依据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372365_comment'></div>是夜而六宫承式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372365_comment'></div>厥明而百吏受遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372365_comment'></div>草定<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1372365", 1372365, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>法仪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372365_comment'></div>兹实赖汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372365_comment'></div>官不称事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372365_comment'></div>予怀歉然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372365_comment'></div>而又词源<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1372365", 1372365, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>奥深</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372365_comment'></div>机用周敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372365_comment'></div>授之以诏而益办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372365_comment'></div>扣之以疑而益明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372365_comment'></div>慎独以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1372365", 1372365, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>修身</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372365_comment'></div>推诚以事朕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372365_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1372365", 1372365, class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372365_comment'></div>予以国士待<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作遇）</span>汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372365_comment'></div>汝以忠臣报予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372365_comment'></div>效乃肺肝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372365_comment'></div>司朕耳目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372365_comment'></div>可守尚书户部侍郎知制诰。<div id='poem_sentence_44_1372365_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《授李绛检校右仆射兼兵部尚书制》。<div id='poem_1372363' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372363' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372363?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授李绛检校右仆射兼兵部尚书制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_0_1372363'>敕。中大夫守御史大夫赐紫金鱼袋李绛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372363_comment'></div>昔先皇帝诲予小子曰。尧时有神羊在廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372363_comment'></div>屈轶指佞。汝知之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372363_comment'></div>夫邪正在人。焉有异物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372363_comment'></div>朕有臣李绛。犹汉臣之汲黯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372363_comment'></div>我百岁后。尔其用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372363_comment'></div>为神羊屈轶。斯可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372363_comment'></div>予小子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372363", 1372363, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>铭镂</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372363", 1372363, "Clauses/14/Comments/1")'>丕训</span>。夙夜求思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372363_comment'></div>是用致理之初。□付授邦宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372363_comment'></div>且欲吾丞相以降。皆卑下之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372363_comment'></div>以示<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372363", 1372363, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>优遇</span>。朕亦常命安其步武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372363_comment'></div>无为屑屑之仪。而绛屡以疾辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372363_comment'></div>不宁其职。又焉敢以劳倦之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372363_comment'></div>烦先帝旧臣。昔晋仆射何季元病足求免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372363_comment'></div>犹命坐家视事。张子儒拜大司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372363_comment'></div>仍令兼录尚书。则卧理不独专于郡符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372363_comment'></div>端右可以旁绥戎政。由古道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372363_comment'></div>尔其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1372363", 1372363, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>处议</span>持平。勉居喉舌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372363_comment'></div>慎所观听。为人司南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372363_comment'></div>可检校尚书右仆射兼兵部尚书。散官勋封如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372363_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1372363_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《青州道渤海授金吾将军等放还蕃》。<div id='poem_1372281' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372281' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372281?labeling=true' target='_blank'>青州道渤海慎能至王侄大公则等授金吾将军放还蕃制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372281'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372281'>敕。慎能至王侄大公则等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372281_comment'></div>洲东之国。知义之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372281_comment'></div>与华夏同风者。尔辈是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372281_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372281", 1372281, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>冒越</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372281", 1372281, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>深阻</span>。和会于庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372281_comment'></div>予嘉乃诚。命以崇秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372281_comment'></div>用奋威卫。保尔恩荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372281_comment'></div>无怠无违。永作藩服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372281_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1372281_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《韩皋吏部尚书赵宗儒太常卿制》。<div id='poem_1372361' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372361' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_1_1372361_comment'></div>或几乎息矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372361_comment'></div>礼乐之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372361_comment'></div>又安能施设于俗化哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372361_comment'></div>是以选贤与能之柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372361_comment'></div>或碍于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372361", 1372361, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>胥徒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372361_comment'></div>冠婚丧祭之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372361_comment'></div>不行于卿士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372361_comment'></div>蠹理害教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372361_comment'></div>斯孰甚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372361_comment'></div>改而更张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372361_comment'></div>我则未暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372361_comment'></div>就为之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372361_comment'></div>其在于选任素重之望以镇之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372361_comment'></div>金紫光禄大夫检校尚书右仆射韩皋银青光禄大夫守吏部尚书赵宗儒等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372361_comment'></div>仕宦台阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372361_comment'></div>周环六僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372361_comment'></div>或三四朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372361_comment'></div>或五十载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372361_comment'></div>新进趋风之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372361_comment'></div>更至迭处于将相间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372361_comment'></div>而皋等精义不渝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372361_comment'></div>物务尤劲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372361_comment'></div>事朕小子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372361_comment'></div>犹吾祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372361_comment'></div>肆予冲人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372361_comment'></div>庭实彪炳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372361_comment'></div>夫铨镜万品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372361_comment'></div>不无<span id='poem_sentence_34_1372361_comment'></div>非子敢知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372361_comment'></div>祗听法仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372361_comment'></div>庶用咨禀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372361_comment'></div>换保傅之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372361_comment'></div>仍端揆之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372361_comment'></div>唯恐不多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372361_comment'></div>无以优异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372361_comment'></div>皋可检校尚书右仆射兼吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372361_comment'></div>宗儒可守太子少傅兼太常卿事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372317_comment'></div>是以置野庐以劳其勤。委舌人以通其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372317_comment'></div>始于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372317", class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372317_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1372317_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372316'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372316'>敕。某等各以贵宝会于明庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372316_comment'></div>既饮食以劳之。又爵秩以遣之。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《赠郑馀庆太保》。<div id='poem_1372309' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372309' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1372309'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372309'>敕。朕闻仲尼殁而鲁公诔之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372309_comment'></div>柳庄死而卫灵请往。夫以区区鲁卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372309_comment'></div>而犹念贤臣硕德也如是。况朕小子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372309_comment'></div>获承祖宗。实赖一二元老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372309_comment'></div>朝夕教诲。以仪刑于四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372309_comment'></div>天胡不仁。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372309", 1372309, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>遽尔</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372309", 1372309, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>歼夺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372309_comment'></div>而今而后。谁其屏余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372309_comment'></div>故金紫光禄大夫检校司徒兼太子少师上柱国荥阳郡开国公食邑二千户郑馀庆。始以衣冠礼乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372309_comment'></div>行于山东。馀力文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372309_comment'></div>遂成儒学。出入清近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372309_comment'></div>盈五十年。再任台衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372309_comment'></div>屡分戎律。凡所剧职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372309_comment'></div>无不践更。贵而能贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372309_comment'></div>卑以自牧。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372309", 1372309, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>謇直</span>行于台阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372309_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372309", 1372309, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>焚书</span>逸礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372309_comment'></div>尽可口传。古史旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372309_comment'></div>如因心匠。朕方咨禀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372309_comment'></div>庶罔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1372309", 1372309, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>昏逾</span>。神将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1372309", 1372309, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>祝予</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372309_comment'></div>痛悼何及。乞言既阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372309_comment'></div>赠典宜加。追书保养之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372309_comment'></div>用彰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1372309", 1372309, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>明允</span>之德。可依前件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372309_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1372309_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《追封宋若华（莘）》。<div id='poem_1372315' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372315' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_26_1372315_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《白居易授尚书主客郎中知制诰》。<div id='poem_1372370' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372370_comment'></div>俾之详考今古。周知物情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372370_comment'></div>而朝议郎行尚书司门员外郎白居易。州里举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372370_comment'></div>有司升甲科。元和初对诏称旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372370_comment'></div>翱翔翰林。蔼然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372370", 1372370, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>直声</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372370_comment'></div>留在人口。朕尝视其词赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372370_comment'></div>甚喜与相如并处一时。由是召自南宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372370_comment'></div>序补郎位。会牛僧孺以御史丞解制诰职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372370_comment'></div>可守尚书主客郎中知制诰。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372370_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1372370_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《授萧祐兵部郎中制》。<div id='poem_1372334' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372334' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1372334'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372334'>敕。兵部郎中佐夏官理邦国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372334_comment'></div>以平不若。辨九法九伐之重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372334_comment'></div>稽五兵五楯之众寡。非践更台阁从容闻望者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372334_comment'></div>不在兹位。流品既清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372334_comment'></div>选任弥重。朝议郎守尚书考功郎中上护军赐绯鱼袋萧祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372334_comment'></div>才行忠信。达于予闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372334_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372334", 1372334, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>课吏</span>陟明。诞若攸职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372334_comment'></div>拾青紫于儒术。擅金石之挥毫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372334_comment'></div>允谓贤能。宜当慰荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372334_comment'></div>可守尚书兵部郎中。散官勋赐如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372334_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1372334_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href='/Writing/1372386?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授高釴守起居郎依前充史馆修撰何士乂尚书水部员外郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372386'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372386'>敕。行而不息者时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372386_comment'></div>久而不可泯者书也。微史氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372386_comment'></div>吾其面墙于尧舜禹汤之事矣。尚书郎亦有会计奏议之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372386_comment'></div>非博达精究之才。其可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372386", 1372386, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>充备</span>兹选乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372386_comment'></div>高釴何士乂等。富有文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372386_comment'></div>因而命釴。视其所以。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372386_comment'></div>足见书词。俾伺朕之起居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372386_comment'></div>遂编之于简牍。不亦详且实耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372386_comment'></div>而士乂亦以久次当迁。移补郎位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372386_comment'></div>士乂可尚书水部员外郎。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372386_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1372386_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《王永太常博士》。<div id='poem_1372393' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372393' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《卢士玫权知京兆尹制》。<div id='poem_1372374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372374_comment'></div>诚以为海内法式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372374_comment'></div>自京师始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372374_comment'></div>辇毂之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372374_comment'></div>盗贼为先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372374_comment'></div>尹正非人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372374_comment'></div>则贤不肖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372374", 1372374, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>阿枉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372374_comment'></div>奏覆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372374", 1372374, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>隔塞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372374_comment'></div>则上下不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372374_comment'></div>假之恩威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372374_comment'></div>用詟豪右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372374_comment'></div>具官卢士玫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372374_comment'></div>自居郎署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372374_comment'></div>执政者言其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1372374", 1372374, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>温重</span>不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372374_comment'></div>守法<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1372374", 1372374, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>专固</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372374_comment'></div>副内史事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372374_comment'></div>物议归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372374_comment'></div>日者景陵将建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372374_comment'></div>龟筮有时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372374_comment'></div>予心怛然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372374_comment'></div>惧不克济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372374_comment'></div>尔尝倅职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372374_comment'></div>应其供求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372374_comment'></div>和而不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372374_comment'></div>俭而不隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372374_comment'></div>竣于巳事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372374_comment'></div>朕甚嘉焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372374_comment'></div>试命元僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372374_comment'></div>亦既不挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372374_comment'></div>今圜丘甫及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372374_comment'></div>庆泽将施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372374_comment'></div>攘剽椎埋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372374_comment'></div>必有幸生之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372374_comment'></div>案牍卒吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372374_comment'></div>亦当因缘为奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372374_comment'></div>公费则多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372374_comment'></div>而利不下究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372374_comment'></div>惟是数者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372374_comment'></div>尔司其忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372374_comment'></div>为尔正名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372374_comment'></div>无吝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1372374", 1372374, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>操剸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372374_comment'></div>可权知京兆尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372374_comment'></div>馀如故。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1372374_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《吉旼京兆府渭南县令》。<div id='poem_1372413' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372413' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372413?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授吉旼京兆府渭南县令制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372413'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372413'>敕。前河南府登封县令吉旼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372413_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372413", 1372413, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>畿邦</span>之宰。任得其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372413_comment'></div>盖有以乂我黎庶。足以张吾京师也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372413_comment'></div>自辇毂在镐。洛务轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372413_comment'></div>长令之善康东人者。往往移隶内史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372413_comment'></div>今京兆尹季同。以旼有干蛊之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372413_comment'></div>流闻于西。遂陈换县之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372413_comment'></div>无替字人之术。可守京兆府渭南县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372413_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1372413_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《赠楚继吾制》。<div id='poem_1372313' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372313' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1372313'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372313'>敕。故容州本营经略招讨左押衙兼行营中军兵马使检校太子詹事楚继吾故廉州古邱营镇将试殿中监卫宏本等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372313_comment'></div>比以荒服不虔。侵掠县道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372313_comment'></div>乃诏毅勇。为人驱攘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372313_comment'></div>而继吾等奋不顾身。深入巢穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372313_comment'></div>豺狼虽殪。蜂虿误加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372313_comment'></div>方闻振臂之雄。忽有归元之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372313_comment'></div>其帅具上其功伐。请议褒崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372313_comment'></div>言念云亡。尤用悯悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372313_comment'></div>不有异等。孰以劝忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372313_comment'></div>特追有土之荣。用明死政之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372313_comment'></div>继吾可赠使持节都督容州诸军事容州刺史。宏本可赠使持节都督邕州诸军事邕州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_content_1372400'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372400'>敕。朝散大夫守京兆尹上骑都尉元佑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372400_comment'></div>风俗之薄厚。由长吏之所尚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372400_comment'></div>闻尔佑以甲乙科为校书郎。甚有名誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372400_comment'></div>一朝以先臣不幸为黜。而自晦其身者二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372400_comment'></div>何其为子之多也。自历朝序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372400_comment'></div>仁声益彰。不杂风尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372400_comment'></div>而徽猷遂远。洋州近郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372400_comment'></div>美恶足以流京师。将以慈惠廉让之道长理之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372296_comment'></div>抱子弄孙之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372296_comment'></div>贵贱之大情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372296_comment'></div>朕以四海奉皇太后于南宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372296_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372296", 1372296, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>问安</span>之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372296_comment'></div>诸女侍侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372296_comment'></div>螽斯之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372296_comment'></div>上慰慈颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372296_comment'></div>鸤鸠之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372296_comment'></div>内怀均养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372296_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372296", 1372296, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>出阁</span>未期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372296_comment'></div>而汤沐先施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372296_comment'></div>分封有据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372296_comment'></div>宜加美号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372296_comment'></div>以表令仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372296_comment'></div>可依前件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372296_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1372296_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《高允恭授尚书户部郎中判度支案制》。<div id='poem_1372383' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372383' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372383?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授高允恭尚书户部郎中判度支案制</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372383")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372383_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372383'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372383'>敕。行刑部员外郎飞骑尉高允恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372383_comment'></div>书云。明德慎罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372383_comment'></div>明犹慎之。况朕不德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372383_comment'></div>兹用省于有司之狱。莫不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372383", 1372383, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>伏念</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372383", 1372383, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>隐悼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372383_comment'></div>周知物情。惟尔允恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372383_comment'></div>告我<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372383", 1372383, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>祥刑</span>。罔不率协。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372383_comment'></div>稽尔明效。陟于他曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372383_comment'></div>大比生齿之书。仍掌折毫之牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372383_comment'></div>戎车方驾。物力未丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372383_comment'></div>剖滞应期。斯任不细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372383_comment'></div>推尔惟吝之意。罔或失财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372383_comment'></div>用尔无害之文。以惩刻下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372383_comment'></div>吝不欲过。过则不终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372383_comment'></div>文不欲繁。繁则不逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372383_comment'></div>率是二者。时维厥中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372383_comment'></div>可守尚书户部郎中判度支案。散官勋如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372383_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1372383_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《李立则检校虞部员外郎知盐铁东都留后》。<div id='poem_1372423' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372423' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372423'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372423'>敕。李立则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372423_comment'></div>国有移用之职曰转运使。每岁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372423", 1372423, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>传置</span>货贿于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372423_comment'></div>其大都要邑之中。则委吏以专留事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372423_comment'></div>洛之间。盖其一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372423_comment'></div>而柳公绰言尔强白干举。吏难其伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372423_comment'></div>乞以台省官假借恩荣。俾专剧务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372423_comment'></div>勉服所职。无忘谨廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372423_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1372423_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，知制诰，起草《镇圭赋》。<div id='poem_1372266' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372266' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372266?labeling=true' target='_blank'>镇圭赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（以王者端拱四维镇宁为韵依次用）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372266")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372266_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372266'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372266'>天子之镇圭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372266_comment'></div>十有二寸其长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372266_comment'></div>义在抚十有二州之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372266_comment'></div>而为亿兆之王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372266_comment'></div>圭比德焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372266_comment'></div>所以表特达之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372266_comment'></div>镇大名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372266_comment'></div>有以示弹压之强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372266_comment'></div>以之徵守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372266_comment'></div>则有土之臣至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372266_comment'></div>以之恤患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372266_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372266", 1372266, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>受灾</span>之地康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372266_comment'></div>当宁无为于南面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372266_comment'></div>朝日有事于东方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372266_comment'></div>会百辟而执之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372266_comment'></div>班五瑞于来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372266_comment'></div>作山龙之端表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372266_comment'></div>我则清光皎然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372266_comment'></div>杂蒲谷以成行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372266_comment'></div>尔则鞠躬如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372266_comment'></div>想夫彤闱乍晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372266_comment'></div>碧砌生寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372266_comment'></div>当玉座而高居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372266_comment'></div>状中峰之冠瑶岫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372266_comment'></div>透炉烟而迥出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372266_comment'></div>意秋月之压云端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372266_comment'></div>是以圣后矜持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372266_comment'></div>庶寮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1372266", 1372266, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>瞻重</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372266_comment'></div>映冕旒则璿枢星缀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372266_comment'></div>间黼黻而琼枝花拥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372266_comment'></div>岂独使威仪可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372266_comment'></div>亦以明社稷有奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372266_comment'></div>美哉圣人之制器也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372266_comment'></div>靡不有类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372266_comment'></div>锐上以象天。<div id='poem_sentence_65_1372266_comment'></div>安于道而万物宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372266_comment'></div>亦尝三复斯名矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372266_comment'></div>所以表道德之惟馨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372266_comment'></div>若此则君为道之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372266_comment'></div>器乃道之形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372266_comment'></div>苟能据于道而依于德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372266_comment'></div>亦可以执无名之璞而逍遥乎大庭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1372266_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，次韵酬唱张籍《谢裴司空寄马》一诗。作品：《酬张秘书因寄马赠诗》<div id='poem_6676' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6676' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6676?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬张秘书因寄马赠诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6676")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_6676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6676'>四蹄荀距藏虽尽，六尺须头见尚惊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6676_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，与杨巨源、白居易酬唱，留诗。作品：《内状诗寄杨白二员外》<div id='poem_6440' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6440' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6440")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6440_comment'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6440'>南省郎官<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作中）</span>谁待诏，与君将向世间行。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6440'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6440_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，有诗。作品：《崔徽歌并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（（残））</span><div id='poem_6937' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6937' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6937?labeling=true' target='_blank'>崔徽歌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6937")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6937_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6937_0'>① 崔徽，河中府娼也。裴敬中以兴元幕使蒲州，与徽相从累月。敬中便还，崔以不得从为恨，因而成疾。有丘夏善写人形，徽托写真寄敬中曰：“崔徽一旦不及画中人，且为郎死。”发狂卒。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6937'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6937'>崔徽本不是娼家，教歌按舞娼家长。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6937_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6937'>使君知有不自由，坐在头时立在掌。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6937_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6937'>有客有客名丘夏，善写仪容得艳姿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6937_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6937'>为徽持此寄敬中，以死报郎为终始。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6937_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6937'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6937_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　是年，与杨巨源唱和。作品：《第三岁日咏春风凭杨员外寄长安柳》<div id='poem_6362' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6362' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6362?labeling=true' target='_blank'>第三岁日咏春风凭杨员外寄长安柳</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年1月</a>　正月，侍宿南郊，向穆宗献赋。作品：《郊天日五色赋》<div id='poem_1372268' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372268' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372268_comment'></div>天锡予以灵瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372268_comment'></div>是何祥而何吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372268_comment'></div>臣拜稽首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372268_comment'></div>敢言其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372268_comment'></div>陛下乘五位而出震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372268_comment'></div>迎五帝而郊天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372268_comment'></div>五方腾其粹气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372268_comment'></div>故云五色以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372268", 1372268, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>相宣</span>。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372268_comment'></div>鸟跂而凤翼翩翩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372268_comment'></div>羽盖凝而轩皇暂驻。<div class='inline' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1372268", 1372268, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>摛锦</span>之相连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372268_comment'></div>观之者无小无大。<div class='inline' class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1372268", 1372268, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>昭布</span>于公侯卿士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372268_comment'></div>莫不称万岁者三。<div id='poem_sentence_37_1372268_comment'></div>于是载笔氏书百辟之词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372268_comment'></div>郁郁纷纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372268_comment'></div>庆霄之云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372268_comment'></div>古有尧舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372268_comment'></div>幸得以为君。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372268_comment'></div>云胡为而五色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372268_comment'></div>来尔群后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372268_comment'></div>举尔众职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372268_comment'></div>因五行以修五事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372268_comment'></div>由五常以厚五德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372268_comment'></div>正五刑以去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1372268", 1372268, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>五虐</span>。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372268_comment'></div>补天者虽欲抑之而不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372268_comment'></div>吞笔者安可寝之而无赋。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年1月</a>　正月，侍宿南郊，太阳两旁出现半环形的光圈，乃祥瑞之兆，有状记之。作品：《辨日旁瑞气状》<div id='poem_1372455' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372455' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372455?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辨日旁瑞气状<span class='inlineComment2'>（今月二日日旁瑞气）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（821年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372455")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372455_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372455'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372455'>右。奉宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372455_comment'></div>某日日上有横赤气。五色鲜明黄润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372455_comment'></div>日两边各有嘉气。内赤外青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372455_comment'></div>宰臣称贺。云是五色云见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372455_comment'></div>不知是否者。谨按乙巳占。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372455_comment'></div>有赤气横在日上谓之戴。其分当有益土进爵推戴人君之象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372455_comment'></div>又人君当立王侯。封建亲戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372455_comment'></div>以为福佑之徵。窃见其日除王潜郭钊田布等官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372455_comment'></div>则陛下凡有举措。尽合天心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372455_comment'></div>微臣所引占书。悉皆期验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372455_comment'></div>伏请以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372455", 1372455, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>戴气</span>宣付史官。不可误书五色云见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372455_comment'></div>又云。青赤短小在日旁谓之珥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372455_comment'></div>微曲向日谓之抱。珥者缨珥之象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372455_comment'></div>天子有喜。兼有和亲之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372455_comment'></div>又当拜将。抱者扶抱向就之象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372455_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1372455", 1372455, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>邻国</span>臣佐来降。天子有喜贺之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372455_comment'></div>子孙之庆。臣下忠诚辅主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372455_comment'></div>国中欢喜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1372455", 1372455, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>和合</span>。今非狄和亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372455_comment'></div>西戎通好。时者承元请命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372455_comment'></div>其日三将同升。万姓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372455", 1372455, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>欢呼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372455_comment'></div>四方来贺。亦可谓陛下凡有举措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372455_comment'></div>尽合天心。微臣所引占书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372455_comment'></div>悉皆明验。伏乞亦以抱珥宣付史官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372455_comment'></div>不可误书五色云见。以前件图籍作载如右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372455_comment'></div>伏以五色庆云。盖是小瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372455_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1372455", 1372455, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>戴气</span>抱珥。所谓殊祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372455_comment'></div>宰臣忽遽之间。未暇精究其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372455_comment'></div>此皆陛下礼行郊庙。诚达神祗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372455_comment'></div>展百拜而忘疲。入九室而流涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372455_comment'></div>近臣兴感。上帝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1372455", 1372455, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>垂休</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372455_comment'></div>克呈捧日之祥。以展动天之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372455_comment'></div>微臣同沾侍从。别感恩慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372455_comment'></div>方当鼓舞之时。恨不叫呼而贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372455_comment'></div>然臣以为陛下特宣手敕宰臣云。今月二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372455_comment'></div>卿等所言日旁五色云见。参验图书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372455_comment'></div>盖是戴珥之象。此皆祖宗积庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372455_comment'></div>特示子孙之祥。岂冲昧微诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372455_comment'></div>能致昊穹之贶。宜令有司择日告庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372455_comment'></div>上以奉高祖无穷之祐。次以报宪宗有截之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372455_comment'></div>诞告华夷。并令<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1372455", 1372455, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>知悉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372455_comment'></div>若此则陛下感通之德。巳见九霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372455_comment'></div>推让之风。将光万叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372455_comment'></div>烂然宸翰。手敕以示于宰臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372455_comment'></div>焕乎天文。撰诏自生于圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372455_comment'></div>事超万古。道冠百王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372455_comment'></div>伏惟天恩。密赐裁察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372455_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1372455_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年1月</a>　知制诰，为穆宗起草《沂国公魏博德政碑》。<div id='poem_1372517' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372517' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372517?labeling=true' target='_blank'>沂国公魏博德政碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1372517'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372517'>陛下以元年正月壬戌诏臣稹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372517_comment'></div>朕有臣宏正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372517_comment'></div>自魏入镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372517_comment'></div>魏人思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372517_comment'></div>因守臣愬状其德政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372517_comment'></div>乞文于碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372517_comment'></div>尔司予言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372517_comment'></div>其文以付。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372517_comment'></div>臣拜稽首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372517_comment'></div>退而奏书于陛下曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372517_comment'></div>始安禄山以玄宗四十三年盗幽州兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372517_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372517", 1372517, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>劫击</span>郡县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372517_comment'></div>踰关据京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372517_comment'></div>天下<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372517", 1372517, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>掉挠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372517_comment'></div>肃宗征之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372517_comment'></div>海内甫定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372517_comment'></div>而夹河五十馀州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372517_comment'></div>或服或叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372517_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1372517", 1372517, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>更立</span>迭夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372517_comment'></div>废置征伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372517_comment'></div>朝觐赋入之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372517_comment'></div>皆自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1372517", 1372517, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>为意</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372517_comment'></div>五纪四宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372517_comment'></div>容受隐忍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372517_comment'></div>田承嗣始有魏博相卫贝澶之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372517_comment'></div>承嗣卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372517_comment'></div>以其地传兄子悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372517_comment'></div>悦传绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372517_comment'></div>绪传季安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372517_comment'></div>既而季安<span "Clauses/29/Comments/1")'>淫骄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372517_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1372517", 1372517, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>风勃</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1372517", 1372517, "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>蛊蠹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372517_comment'></div>发则喜杀左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372517_comment'></div>渐及于骨肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372517_comment'></div>往往顾妻子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372517_comment'></div>安用此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372517_comment'></div>由是内外<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1372517", 1372517, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>惴悸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372517_comment'></div>妻元氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372517_comment'></div>因人不忍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372517_comment'></div>移置他所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372517_comment'></div>馀一月乃卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372517_comment'></div>是岁先皇帝元和之七年八月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372517_comment'></div>季安子怀谏始十馀岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372517_comment'></div>众袭故态。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372517_comment'></div>名为副大使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372517_comment'></div>而家臣蒋士则逆虐用事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372517_comment'></div>士众不分服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372517_comment'></div>日夜相告曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372517_comment'></div>田中丞兴博大孝敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372517_comment'></div>于军谨廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372517_comment'></div>读儒家书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372517_comment'></div>好言君臣事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372517_comment'></div>傥可依倚为将帅乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372517_comment'></div>闻者皆踊跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372517_comment'></div>一朝牙旗下<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作丁）</span>众来捧附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372517_comment'></div>兴仆地不肯起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372517_comment'></div>众亦不肯去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372517_comment'></div>乃大言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372517_comment'></div>尔辈即欲用吾语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372517_comment'></div>能不杀副大使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372517_comment'></div>且许吾取天子恩泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372517_comment'></div>洗汝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1372517", 1372517, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>痕秽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372517_comment'></div>使千万众知君臣父子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372517_comment'></div>从我乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372517_comment'></div>皆曰诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372517_comment'></div>遂杀蒋士则等十数人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372517_comment'></div>以兴知留后事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372517_comment'></div>移怀谏于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372517_comment'></div>明年归之朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372517_comment'></div>盖七年之十月四日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372517_comment'></div>兴乃图六州之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1372517", 1372517, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>地域</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372517_comment'></div>籍其人与三军之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1372517", 1372517, id='poem_sentence_72_1372517_comment'></div>尽献于先帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372517_comment'></div>先帝诏兴以工部尚书长魏博相卫贝澶之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372517_comment'></div>仍敕司封郎中知制诰裴度使于兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372517_comment'></div>且以钱一百五十万缗赐其军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372517_comment'></div>曲赦管内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372517_comment'></div>使百姓一年勿复事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372517_comment'></div>问<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1372517", 1372517, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>耆羸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372517_comment'></div>赈乏困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372517_comment'></div>褒殛诛之不以法者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372517_comment'></div>魏之人相喜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372517_comment'></div>归天子乃如是耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372517_comment'></div>兴又悉取魏之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1372517", 1372517, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>僭服</span>异器人臣所不当为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372517_comment'></div>斥去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372517_comment'></div>先帝曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372517_comment'></div>兴吾六州善心者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372517_comment'></div>田兴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372517_comment'></div>使兴宏吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1372517", 1372517, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>至正</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372517_comment'></div>不亦可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372517_comment'></div>因名曰宏正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372517_comment'></div>先是魏诸宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372517_comment'></div>犹<span id='poem_sentence_105_1372517_comment'></div>士吏工贾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372517_comment'></div>限其往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372517_comment'></div>人多惧愁。<div id='poem_sentence_110_1372517_comment'></div>魏之人又相喜曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372517_comment'></div>人之生不当如是耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372517_comment'></div>滑以<span id='poem_sentence_116_1372517_comment'></div>皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372517_comment'></div>坏吾地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372517_comment'></div>役吾人。<div id='poem_sentence_121_1372517_comment'></div>宏正曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1372517_comment'></div>魏于滑信彼此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1372517_comment'></div>朝廷何异焉。<div id='poem_sentence_125_1372517_comment'></div>以教人让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1372517_comment'></div>魏俗丕变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1372517_comment'></div>先帝多之。<div id='poem_sentence_204_1372517_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_205_1372517", 1372517, "Clauses/205/Comments/0")'>始初</span>山东<span class='link' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1372517_comment'></div>可以为谦矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1372517_comment'></div>谦法仁孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1372517_comment'></div>资之以忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1372517_comment'></div>不曰德政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1372517_comment'></div>谓之何哉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1372460_comment'></div>恩生望外。事出宸衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372460_comment'></div>铭镂骨肌。难酬雨露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372460_comment'></div>臣伏以陛下所以令臣与宏正立碑。盖欲遣魏博及镇州将吏等并知宏正首怀忠义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372460_comment'></div>以致功勋。臣若苟务文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372460_comment'></div>广徵经典。非唯将吏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372460", 1372460, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>不会</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372460_comment'></div>亦恐宏正未详。虽临四达之衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372460_comment'></div>难掩万人之口。臣所以效马迁史体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372457_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372457", 1372457, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>颁衣</span>焕目。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372457", 1372457, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>光扬</span>之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372457_comment'></div>微臣无任抃跃惭惶之至。况臣素守疏愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372457_comment'></div>不敢保全躯命。岂谓恩光转至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372457_comment'></div>睿泽逾深。出自宸衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372457_comment'></div>选居近地。便令入院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372457_comment'></div>当日召见天颜。口敕授官。<div class='inline'
