id='poem_sentence_0_1372461_comment'></div>臣面奉圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372461_comment'></div>令臣写录杂诗进来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372461_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下学深江海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372461_comment'></div>文动星辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372461_comment'></div>乙夜观书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372461_comment'></div>秋风咏赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372461_comment'></div>微臣入院之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372461_comment'></div>学士等盛传陛下亲批贺雨一章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372461_comment'></div>体备鸾皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372461_comment'></div>思深珠玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372461_comment'></div>臣虽不得目睹宸翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372461_comment'></div>臣实窃得心念圣言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372461_comment'></div>既仰烛龙之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372461_comment'></div>难逞聚萤之照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372461_comment'></div>欲为陈献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372461_comment'></div>益自惭惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372461_comment'></div>况臣九岁学诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372461_comment'></div>少经贫贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372461_comment'></div>十年谪宦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372461_comment'></div>备极恓惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372461_comment'></div>凡所为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372461_comment'></div>多因感激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372461_comment'></div>故自古风诗至古今乐府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372461_comment'></div>稍存寄兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372461_comment'></div>颇近<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1372461", 1372461, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>讴谣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372461_comment'></div>虽无作者之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372461_comment'></div>粗中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1372461", 1372461, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>遒人</span>之采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372461_comment'></div>自律诗百韵至于两韵七言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372461_comment'></div>或因友朋戏投。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372461_comment'></div>或因悲欢自遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372461_comment'></div>既无六义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372461_comment'></div>皆出一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372461_comment'></div>词旨繁芜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372461_comment'></div>倍增惭恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372461_comment'></div>今谨随状陈进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372461_comment'></div>无任战汗屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1372461_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年2月</a>　李建卒，元稹为其撰墓志铭。作品：《唐故中大夫尚书刑部侍郎上柱国陇西县开国男赠工部尚书李工（建）墓志铭》<div id='poem_1372526' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372526' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372526?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故中大夫尚书刑部侍郎上柱国陇西县开国男赠工部尚书李公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372526")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372526_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372526'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372526'>按李发事魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372526_comment'></div>为横野将军申国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372526_comment'></div>十一世而生有唐绥州刺史明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372526_comment'></div>明生太子中允进德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372526_comment'></div>进德生昌明令珍玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372526_comment'></div>珍玉生雅州别驾赠礼部尚书震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372526_comment'></div>公即尚书第三子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372526_comment'></div>讳建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372526_comment'></div>字杓直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372526_comment'></div>始以进士第二人试校秘书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372526_comment'></div>判容州招讨事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372526_comment'></div>复调为本官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372526_comment'></div>会德宗皇帝选文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372526_comment'></div>公被荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372526_comment'></div>上问少信臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372526_comment'></div>皆曰闻而不之面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372526_comment'></div>唯宰相郑珣瑜对曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372526_comment'></div>臣为吏部侍郎时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372526_comment'></div>以文入官当校秘书者八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372526_comment'></div>其书则驰他人书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372526_comment'></div>建不驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372526_comment'></div>故独得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372526_comment'></div>上嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372526_comment'></div>使居翰林中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372526_comment'></div>就拜左拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372526_comment'></div>会德宗皇帝崩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372526_comment'></div>郓帅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1372526", 1372526, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>擅师</span>于曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372526_comment'></div>诏归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372526_comment'></div>公不肯与姑息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372526_comment'></div>时王叔文恃幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372526_comment'></div>异公意不随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372526_comment'></div>卒用公意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372526_comment'></div>郓果帖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372526_comment'></div>后一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372526_comment'></div>司直给事府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372526_comment'></div>会朝廷以观察防御事授路恕治于鄜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372526_comment'></div>恕即日就公求自贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372526_comment'></div>降拜六而后许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372526_comment'></div>诏赐五品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372526_comment'></div>供奉殿中以贰焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372526_comment'></div>会恕复取不宜为宾者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372526_comment'></div>公罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372526_comment'></div>归为殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372526_comment'></div>有诏天下俟三节来献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372526_comment'></div>先是襄帅均<span class='inlineComment2'>（裴均）</span>献在邸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372526_comment'></div>亟相命俟节以献之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372526_comment'></div>公力争不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372526_comment'></div>意作谬官诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372526_comment'></div>寻为员外比部郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372526_comment'></div>转兵部吏部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372526_comment'></div>始命由文由部而仕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372526_comment'></div>岁得调。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372526_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1372526", 1372526, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>编类</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1372526", 1372526, "Clauses/52/Comments/1")'>条式</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372526_comment'></div>以便观者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372526_comment'></div>罢成劳书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372526_comment'></div>凡成否之状急一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372526_comment'></div>人皆便之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372526_comment'></div>迁本曹郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372526_comment'></div>换兵部郎中知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372526_comment'></div>丞相视草时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372526_comment'></div>微有窜益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372526_comment'></div>遂不复出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372526_comment'></div>乐为少京兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372526_comment'></div>会仲兄尚书逊被口语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372526_comment'></div>上疏明白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372526_comment'></div>出刺澧州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372526_comment'></div>入以亚太常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372526_comment'></div>于礼部中覈贡士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372526_comment'></div>用已鉴取文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372526_comment'></div>选用多荐说者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372526_comment'></div>遂为礼部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372526_comment'></div>迁刑部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372526_comment'></div>权于吏部郎众品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372526_comment'></div>一夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372526_comment'></div>无他恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372526_comment'></div>而奄忽将尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372526_comment'></div>举族环之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372526_comment'></div>请召咒妖巫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372526_comment'></div>摇首若不欲者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372526_comment'></div>寡嫂至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372526_comment'></div>敛衣若礼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372526_comment'></div>竟不克言而遂薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372526_comment'></div>年五十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372526_comment'></div>是岁长庆元年之二月二十有三日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372526_comment'></div>上为之一日不视事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372526_comment'></div>以工部尚书追命之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372526_comment'></div>后四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372526_comment'></div>祔先君于凤翔府某县某乡某里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372526_comment'></div>实五月之二十有五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372526_comment'></div>夫人渭源县君房氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372526_comment'></div>容州济之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372526_comment'></div>在太尉琯为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1372526", 1372526, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>犹孙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372526_comment'></div>生五男。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372526_comment'></div>长曰讷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372526_comment'></div>始二十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372526_comment'></div>朴恪悫硕次第焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372526_comment'></div>二女皆十年而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372526_comment'></div>长于议论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372526_comment'></div>用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1372526", 1372526, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>体识</span>为文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372526_comment'></div>于朋友间好尽言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372526_comment'></div>然而未尝以胜负形喜愠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372526_comment'></div>进退之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372526_comment'></div>几微不苟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372526_comment'></div>受官法与操行牢不夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372526_comment'></div>亦未尝皎皎自辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372526_comment'></div>性<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_105_1372526", 1372526, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>洁廉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372526_comment'></div>而沓贪有才者皆进之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372526_comment'></div>考行取友甚峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372526_comment'></div>能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_108_1372526", 1372526, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>铢两</span>人伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372526_comment'></div>而滔滔者莫见其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_109_1372526", 1372526, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>厚薄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372526_comment'></div>终肯延荐人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372526_comment'></div>常为讳避其短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372526_comment'></div>善承受得丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372526_comment'></div>故没身无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_113_1372526", 1372526, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>诞叹</span>之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1372526_comment'></div>没之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1372526_comment'></div>会上合百辟宴御史吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372526_comment'></div>骤闻其丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372526_comment'></div>闻者皆怛然爱惜无异词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372526_comment'></div>公始校秘书时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372526_comment'></div>与同省郎白居易元稹定死生分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1372526_comment'></div>至是稹与白哭泣不自胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1372526_comment'></div>且相谓曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1372526_comment'></div>杓直常自言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1372526_comment'></div>在江陵时无衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1372526_comment'></div>赖伯兄造焦劳营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1372526_comment'></div>为纵两弟游学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1372526_comment'></div>不数年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1372526_comment'></div>与仲兄逊举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1372526_comment'></div>并世为公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1372526_comment'></div>而伯兄先杓直没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1372526_comment'></div>今杓直复不以疾闻于许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1372526_comment'></div>一旦发其丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1372526_comment'></div>其兄何如哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1372526_comment'></div>许信至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1372526_comment'></div>果诲其犹子讷曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1372526_comment'></div>尔父有不朽行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1372526_comment'></div>宜得知者铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1372526_comment'></div>吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_137_1372526", 1372526, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>悲挠</span>不忍为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1372526_comment'></div>尔其告若父之执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1372526_comment'></div>子讷遂来告曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1372526_comment'></div>为志且铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1372526_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1372526_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_142_1372526'>日出入安归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1372526_comment'></div>今日之日是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1372526_comment'></div>前日耶非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1372526_comment'></div>君去此安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1372526_comment'></div>念君梦君兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1372526_comment'></div>是君也非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1372526_comment'></div>之死信冥冥兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1372526_comment'></div>安用铭此为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1372526_comment'></div>死而尚可识兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1372526_comment'></div>鱼膏大夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1372526_comment'></div>安忍观此词。</div><div id='poem_sentence_152_1372526_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年2月</a>　李建卒，有诗记之。作品：《与乐天同葬杓直》<div id='poem_6169' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6169' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6169?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与乐天同葬杓直</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6169")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6169_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6169'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6169'>元伯来相葬<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，山涛誓抚孤<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6169'>不知他日事，兼得似君无。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6169'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6169_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6169'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6169_0'>⑴ “元伯”句：《后汉书·范式传》：“范式字巨卿……与汝南张劭为友。劭字元伯……式仕为郡功曹。后元伯寝疾笃……寻而卒……式便服朋友之服，投其葬日，驰往赴之。式未及到，而丧已发引，既至圹，将窆，而柩不肯进。其母抚之曰：‘元伯，岂有望邪？’遂停柩移时，乃见有素车白马，号哭而来。其母望之曰：‘是必范巨卿也。’巨卿既至，叩丧言曰：‘行矣元伯！死生路异，永从此辞。’会葬者千人，咸为挥涕。式因执绋而引，柩于是乃前。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6169_0'>⑵ “山涛”句：山涛字巨源，与嵇康、阮籍等善，为竹林七贤之一。《晋书·山涛传》：“康后坐事，临诛，谓子绍曰：‘巨源在，汝不孤矣。’”其后山涛举绍为秘书丞。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6169_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年3月</a>　与李绅、李德裕劾钱徽取士不公。诏王起、白居易重试。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年4月</a>　郑朗、裴撰等覆落，钱徽、李宗闵、杨汝士皆远贬。为穆宗起草《戒励风俗德音》。<div id='poem_1372436' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372436' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372436?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戒励风俗德音</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372436")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372436_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372436'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372436'>朕闻昔者卿大夫相与让于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372436_comment'></div>士庶人相与让于列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372436_comment'></div>周成王刑措不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372436_comment'></div>汉文帝耻言人过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372436_comment'></div>真<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372436", 1372436, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>理古</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372436_comment'></div>朕甚慕焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372436_comment'></div>中代以还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372436_comment'></div>争端斯起。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1372436_comment'></div>自非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372436", 1372436, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>责实循名</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372436_comment'></div>不能彰善瘅恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372436_comment'></div>故孝宣必有告讦及下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372436_comment'></div>光武不以诡辞遽行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372436_comment'></div>语称讪上之非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372436_comment'></div>律有匿名之禁。<div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372462'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372462_comment'></div>臣今月二日进京西京北图一面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372462_comment'></div>山川险易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372462_comment'></div>细大无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372462_comment'></div>犹虑幅尺高低。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372462_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372462", 1372462, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>阅览</span>有烦于睿鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372462_comment'></div>屋壁施设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372462_comment'></div>俯仰颇劳于圣躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372462_comment'></div>寻于古今图籍之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372462_comment'></div>纂撰京西京北图经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372462_comment'></div>共成四卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372462_comment'></div>所冀衽席之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372462_comment'></div>欹枕而郡邑可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372462_comment'></div>游幸之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372462_comment'></div>倚马而山川尽在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372462_comment'></div>又太和公主下嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372462_comment'></div>伏恐圣虑念其道远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372462_comment'></div>臣今具录天德城以北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372462_comment'></div>至回鹘衙帐已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372462_comment'></div>食宿井泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372462_comment'></div>附于图经之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372462_comment'></div>并别写一本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372462_comment'></div>与图经序谨同封进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372463_comment'></div>未敢进状候对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372463_comment'></div>其京西京北镇烽戍道路等图并序。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年7月</a>　进呈《京西京北州镇烽戌道路等图》，有状。与穆宗关系日益密切，穆宗经常与其密谋。作品：《进西北边图状》《京西京北州镇烽戌道路等图并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（（亡佚））</span><div id='poem_1372463' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372463' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372463?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进西北边图状<span class='inlineComment2'>（京西京北州镇烽戍道路等图一面）</span></a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372463'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372463_comment'></div>臣先画圣唐西极图三面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372463_comment'></div>草本并毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372463_comment'></div>伏候面自奏论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372463_comment'></div>方拟进呈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372463_comment'></div>前月十一日于思政殿面奉圣旨云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372463_comment'></div>诸家所进河陇图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372463_comment'></div>勘验皆有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372463", 1372463, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>差异</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372463_comment'></div>并检寻近日烽镇城堡不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372463_comment'></div>令臣所画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372463_comment'></div>稍须精详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372463_comment'></div>伏缘臣先画西极图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372463_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372463", 1372463, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>疆界</span>阔远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372463_comment'></div>郡国繁多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372463_comment'></div>若烽镇馆驿尽言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372463_comment'></div>即山川榜帖太密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372463_comment'></div>恐烦圣览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372463_comment'></div>不甚分明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372463_comment'></div>愚臣数日之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372463_comment'></div>别画一京西京北州镇烽戍道路等图已毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372463_comment'></div>纤毫必载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372463_comment'></div>尺寸无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372463_comment'></div>若边上奏报烟尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372463_comment'></div>陛下便可坐观处所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372463_comment'></div>若欲验臣此图与诸家所进何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372463_comment'></div>伏乞圣明于南衙及北军中召取一久任边将者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372463_comment'></div>或于中使内有经过边上校熟者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372463_comment'></div>宣示其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372463_comment'></div>辨别精粗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372463_comment'></div>不敢妄加增减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372463_comment'></div>其圣唐西极图三本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372463_comment'></div>伏缘经略意大事须面自陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372463_comment'></div>伏恐次及降诞务繁。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年8月10日</a>　在翰林院，有文记之。作品：《翰林承旨学士记》<div id='poem_1372515' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372515' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372515?labeling=true' target='_blank'>翰林承旨学士厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年8月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372515")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372515_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372515'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372515'>旧制学士无得以承旨为名者。应对顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372515_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372515", 1372515, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>参会</span>旅次。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372515", 1372515, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>班第</span>以官为上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372515_comment'></div>宪宗章武孝皇帝以永贞元年即<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372515", 1372515, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>大位</span>。始命郑公絪为承旨学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372515_comment'></div>位在诸学士上。居在东第一閤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372515_comment'></div>乘舆奉郊庙。辄得乘厩马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372515_comment'></div>自浴殿由内朝以从。揭鸡竿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372515_comment'></div>布大泽。则升丹凤之西南隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372515_comment'></div>外宾客进见于麟德。则止直禁中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372515_comment'></div>以俟大礼。大<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1372515", 1372515, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>诰令</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372515_comment'></div>大废置。丞相之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1372515", 1372515, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>密画</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372515_comment'></div>内外之密奏。上之所甚注意者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372515_comment'></div>莫不专受<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372515", 1372515, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>专对</span>。他人无得而参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372515_comment'></div>非自异也。法不当言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372515_comment'></div>用是十七年间。由郑至杜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372515_comment'></div>十一人而九参大政。其不至者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372515_comment'></div>卫公诏及门而返。事适然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372515_comment'></div>至于张。则弄相印以俟其病间者久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372515_comment'></div>卒不兴。命也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372515_comment'></div>若此。则安可以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1372515", 1372515, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>昧陋</span>不肖之稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372515_comment'></div>继居九丞相二名卿之后乎。俛仰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372515", 1372515, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>瞻睹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372515_comment'></div>如遭大宾。每自诲其心曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372515_comment'></div>以若之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1372515", 1372515, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>不俊</span>不明。而又使欲恶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1372515", 1372515, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>欹曲</span>攻于内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372515_comment'></div>且决事于冥冥之中。无暴扬报效之虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372515_comment'></div>遂忿行私易也。然而阴潜之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372515_comment'></div>必有记善恶之馀者。以君父之遇若如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372515_comment'></div>而犹举枉措直。可乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372515_comment'></div>使若之心。忽而为他人尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372515_comment'></div>数若之所为。而终不自愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372515_comment'></div>斯可矣。昔鲁共王馀画先贤于屋壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372515_comment'></div>以自警临。我以十一贤之名氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372515_comment'></div>岂直自警哉。由是谨述其迁授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372515_comment'></div>书于座隅。长庆元年八月十日记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372515_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1372515_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，感翰林东合前小松，留诗。作品：《题翰林东合前小松》<div id='poem_6422' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6422' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6422?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题翰林东閤前小松</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6422")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6422_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6422'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6422'>檐碍修鳞亚<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，霜侵簇翠黄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6422'>唯馀入琴韵，终待舜弦张<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6422'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6422'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6422_0'>⑴ 鳞：龙鳞，形容松树树皮斑驳貌。王维《访吕逸人》：“闭户著书多岁月，种松皆老作龙鳞。”亚：见卷3《茅舍》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6422_0'>⑵ 舜弦：指五弦琴。相传为舜帝所创，故云。《礼记·乐记》：“昔者舜作五弦之琴，以歌《南风》。”张：乐器上弦。引申为弹奏。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6422_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年9月</a>　薛戎卒，元稹为其撰神道碑。作品：《唐故越州刺史兼御史中丞浙江东道观察等使赠左散骑常侍河东薛公神道碑文铭》<div id='poem_1372521' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372521' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372521?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故越州刺史兼御史中丞浙江东道观察等使赠左散骑常侍河东薛公神道碑文铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372521")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372521_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372521'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372521'>天下万族。言多大冠冕人物者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372521_comment'></div>凡八姓。薛其一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372521_comment'></div>自晋安西将军懿避寇汾阴。后世子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372521_comment'></div>遂与裴氏柳氏为河东三著姓。近世诸薛群从<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>伯季</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372521_comment'></div>死丧犹相功缞者数十人。迭居中外<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>要秩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372521_comment'></div>皆邠州刺史宝允之二世三世孙。公讳戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372521_comment'></div>字元夫。父曰湖州长史赠刑部尚书同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372521_comment'></div>母曰赠某郡太夫人陆氏。尚书景融女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372521_comment'></div>祖曰河南县令赠给事中缣。河南于邠州为季子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372521_comment'></div>刑部五男。乂终郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372521_comment'></div>丹终<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>宾客</span>。拥终御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372521_comment'></div>公实刑部府君第某子。今尚书兵部侍郎集贤殿学士放于公为季弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372521_comment'></div>公初不乐为吏。徒以家世多贵富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372521_comment'></div>门户当有持之者。会两弟相继举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372521_comment'></div>皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>中选</span>。公自喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372521_comment'></div>遂入阳羡山。年四十馀不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372521_comment'></div>李衡为刺史。能以礼下公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372521_comment'></div>及衡观察江西。求公为幕中宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372521_comment'></div>公许衡。衡迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372521_comment'></div>复为观察使齐映乞自佐。映卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372521_comment'></div>河南观察使李巽遽辟之。未几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372521_comment'></div>福建观察使柳冕奏署书下。诏公判冕观察府中事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372521_comment'></div>累迁殿中侍御史。冕俾公摄行泉州刺史事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372521_comment'></div>时贞元中。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>宠重</span>方镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372521_comment'></div>方镇喜自用。不用朝廷法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372521_comment'></div>公在郡用朝廷法。不用冕所自用者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372521_comment'></div>冕恶之。先是宦者薛盈珍谮马总为泉州别驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372521_comment'></div>冕谕公陷总。总无罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372521_comment'></div>公不忍陷。冕怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372521_comment'></div>并囚之。值冕病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372521_comment'></div>俱得脱。公由总以义闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372521_comment'></div>冕卒。阎济美代冕使福建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372521_comment'></div>复请公副团练事。始受五品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372521_comment'></div>济美使浙东。公亦随副之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372521_comment'></div>转侍御史。给事中穆质有直气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372521_comment'></div>爱公称于朝。因拜尚书刑部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372521_comment'></div>改河南令。王师出征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372521_comment'></div>以中贵人护诸将。州府吏迎迓馆谷畏不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372521_comment'></div>持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>畚斸</span>于道路者相接。唯公境内按故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372521_comment'></div>道途无所役。且制阛阓无得授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372521_comment'></div>留守卒坏公制。公命寘诸狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372521_comment'></div>留守怒。遣将率徒略出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372521_comment'></div>公不与卒致留守。诸市人皆赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372521_comment'></div>迁衢州刺史。到所部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372521_comment'></div>视前刺史所为皆便俗。公忻然无所改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372521_comment'></div>不周月而政就。移刺湖州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372521_comment'></div>其最患人者。荻塘河水潴淤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372521_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>逼塞</span>不能负舟。公浚之百馀里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372521_comment'></div>改刺常州。不累月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372521_comment'></div>遽刺越州。仍以御史中丞观察团练浙东西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372521_comment'></div>所部郡皆禁酒。官自为垆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372521_comment'></div>以酒禁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>坐死</span>者。每岁不知数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372521_comment'></div>而产生祠祀之家。受酒于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372521_comment'></div>皆醨伪滓坏。不宜复进于杯棬者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372521_comment'></div>公即日奏罢之。旧制包橘之贡取于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372521_comment'></div>未三贡鬻者。罪且死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372521_comment'></div>公命市贡之鬻者无所禁。旬月之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372521_comment'></div>越俗无馀弊。朝廷宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372521_comment'></div>积累岁不迁。长庆元年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372521_comment'></div>以疾自去。九月庚申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372521_comment'></div>薨于苏州之私第。始生岁丁亥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372521_comment'></div>至是七十五年矣。天子废视朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372521_comment'></div>使使者赠赗。赙祭临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372521_comment'></div>且以左散骑常侍追加焉。十一月庚申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372521_comment'></div>洎夫人韦氏葬偃师河南府君之墓左。公后娶李夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372521_comment'></div>亦又殁于天。子曰沂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372521_comment'></div>始九岁。洽次之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372521_comment'></div>有女四人。皆及其嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372521_comment'></div>公始以隐者心为吏。不尚约束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372521_comment'></div>不求名誉。人人便安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372521_comment'></div>尤恶苛杂。为郡时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372521_comment'></div>有善归之所部县。为镇时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372521_comment'></div>有善归之所部郡。是以在郡在镇时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372521_comment'></div>无灼灼可惊者。既去人思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372521_comment'></div>赋敛多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/148/Comments/0")'>饶裕</span>人。然而俭于用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372521_comment'></div>予视其库庾案牍盈羡无逋负。予在中书时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372521_comment'></div>公既殁。浙东使上公所羡之财<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/153/Comments/0")'>贯缗</span>积帛之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372521_comment'></div>凡三十有九万。则其去他郡也可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372521_comment'></div>惜乎今之人扬善政者少。公既不自称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372521_comment'></div>人亦莫能尽知公之所以理。至于脱马总之祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372521_comment'></div>抗居守之略。弛酒禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372521_comment'></div>市贡橘。惠施于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372521_comment'></div>而殁而盈羡。皆予之适知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372521_comment'></div>非公之不能有以多于此也。性<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/167/Comments/0")'>诚厚</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/167/Comments/1")'>温重</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372521_comment'></div>然而欢爱亲戚。及为大官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372521_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/170/Comments/0")'>远近</span>多归之。衣食婚嫁之外无馀财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372521_comment'></div>一旦尽所有分遗亲戚曰。吾病矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372521_comment'></div>尔辈各为归去资。亲戚故旧皆哭泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372521_comment'></div>尽散去。及公去越之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372521_comment'></div>徒御不过数十人。观者嗟叹多出涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372521_comment'></div>公为河南令。余以御史理东台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372521_comment'></div>自是熟公之所为。又尝与公季弟放为南北曹侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372521_comment'></div>公殁矣。非我<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_92_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/185/Comments/0")'>传信</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372521_comment'></div>孰当传焉。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372521_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_94_1372521'>婉婉邠州。厥生九子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372521_comment'></div>子又生孙。实大以祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372521_comment'></div>祉延于公。有浙之东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372521_comment'></div>仲氏临汝。季氏南宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372521_comment'></div>门户有赫。有赫斯融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372521_comment'></div>我禄斯美。我族斯丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372521_comment'></div>朋旧亲戚。羁离困穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372521_comment'></div>无远无迩。有来斯雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372521_comment'></div>公之丧矣。族亦瘁止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372521_comment'></div>分散舟车。各自乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372521_comment'></div>有今之季。悲哀不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372521_comment'></div>前年孟亡。今年仲死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372521_comment'></div>抚视遗孤。瞻望<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_106_1372521", 1372521, "Clauses/213/Comments/0")'>坟垒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372521_comment'></div>何以推之。古今同此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372521_comment'></div>贻之斯文。以永来祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372521_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_109_1372521_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《谢御札状》。<div id='poem_1372459' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372459' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372459?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢御劄状<span class='inlineComment2'>（御劄二十三字）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372459")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372459_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372459'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372459'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372459_comment'></div>泰伦重晏至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372459_comment'></div>宣赐臣前件御劄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372459_comment'></div>其中圣旨云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372459_comment'></div>镇州逆乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372459_comment'></div>枉害忠良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372459_comment'></div>若与元翼镇州节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372459_comment'></div>即是舍贼之门者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372459_comment'></div>伏以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1372459", 1372459, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>睿算</span>若神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372459_comment'></div>圣慈犹父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372459_comment'></div>视凶狡之搆乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372459_comment'></div>义在克清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372459_comment'></div>念台辅之衔冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372459_comment'></div>期于必报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372269_comment'></div>传式在先朝时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372269_comment'></div>尝为监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372269_comment'></div>会孙革以⿸<span class='inlineComment2'>（广毁）</span>牧竞田之狱来上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372269_comment'></div>朝廷意其未具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372269_comment'></div>复命传式理之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372269_comment'></div>不能精求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372269_comment'></div>尽以前却。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1372269_comment'></div>当革非心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372269_comment'></div>无因故态。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372269_comment'></div>过而不改。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1372384_comment'></div>副其丞者。是选尤难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372384_comment'></div>而御史丞僧孺。首以朝议郎守尚书户部郎中判度支案飞骑尉高允恭闻于予曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372384_comment'></div>允恭始以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372384", 1372384, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>儒家</span>子。能文入官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372384_comment'></div>在监察御史时。分务东台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372384_comment'></div>无所顾虑。为刑部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372384_comment'></div>能守训典。复以人曹郎佐掌邦计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372384_comment'></div>悬石允釐。挠而不烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372323_comment'></div>绝不复出。朕甚异焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372323_comment'></div>去岁以来。比命御史丞为宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372323_comment'></div>盖欲慰荐人之不敢为也。尔等或以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372323", 1372323, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>吏最</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372304_comment'></div>柔以睦姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372304_comment'></div>明于训子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372304_comment'></div>惟嫔之礼。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1372304_comment'></div>优于孟母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372304_comment'></div>庆钟嗣子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372304_comment'></div>皆我荩臣。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1372304_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《追封王璠母李氏等》制。<div id='poem_1372308' id='poem_sentence_2_1372308_comment'></div>生愿为人兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372308_comment'></div>欲奉养之日长也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372308_comment'></div>若此则及子之贵。<div onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372308", 1372308, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>罢社</span>之痛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372308_comment'></div>可依前件。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1372308_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《裴誗检校尚书库部郎中充河阳节度判官》制。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《追封王潜母齐国大长公主》制。<div id='poem_1372307' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372307' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372307?labeling=true' target='_blank'>追封王潜母齐国大长公主制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372307'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372307'>敕。检校兵部尚书王潜母赠晋国大长公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372307_comment'></div>于朕祖宗之姑姊妹也。始以肃雍之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372307_comment'></div>下嫁于公侯。淑问怡声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372307_comment'></div>礼无违者。训其爱子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372307_comment'></div>有过严君。不因恩泽以求郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372307_comment'></div>每致忠贞而事主。使勤富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372307_comment'></div>戒斁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372307", 1372307, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>廉能</span>。郁为勋臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372307_comment'></div>实资圣善。徽猷尽在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372307_comment'></div>典礼宜加。犹狭平阳之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372307_comment'></div>式广营邱之地。克宣朕命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372307_comment'></div>用慰潜心。可赠齐国大长公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372307_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1372307_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《裴武授司农卿》制。<div id='poem_1372373' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372373' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372373?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授裴武司农卿制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372373")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372373_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372373'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372373'>敕。农天下之本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372373_comment'></div>故国有九列。而司农氏居其一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372373_comment'></div>前代非牟融之循理。康成之儒学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372373_comment'></div>不在兹选。今海内无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372373_comment'></div>思与公卿等树立根柢。以制四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372373_comment'></div>是用外选方伯之善职者。入补兹任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372373_comment'></div>谓之恩荣。具官裴武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372373_comment'></div>予闻其先始以孝友。书其国籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372373_comment'></div>其后累有丞相。为唐名臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372373_comment'></div>贤彦因仍。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1372373", 1372373, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>代济</span>不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372373_comment'></div>武亦嗣其忠孝。益炽家声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372373_comment'></div>郁为元僚。所至称理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372373_comment'></div>尝居内史。屡入正卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372373_comment'></div>自华至荆。无非剧地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372373_comment'></div>钤辖豪右。衣食茕嫠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372373_comment'></div>严而不残。仁而有制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372373_comment'></div>镇定南服。予方赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372373_comment'></div>而亟请来朝。因求内任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372373_comment'></div>嘉其恋我。难夺乃诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372373_comment'></div>假以秩宗之荣。用制国泉之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372373_comment'></div>费而不屈。尔其勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372373_comment'></div>可检校礼部尚书兼司农卿。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372373_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1372373_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《刘士泾授太仆卿制》。<div id='poem_1372375' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372375' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372375?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授刘士泾太仆卿制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1372375'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372375'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372375_comment'></div>卿寺甚重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372375_comment'></div>不易其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372375_comment'></div>其或以勋以亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372375_comment'></div>以报以劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372375_comment'></div>又何爱焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372375_comment'></div>检校大理少卿驸马都尉刘士泾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372375_comment'></div>去岁西戎跳入泾上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372375_comment'></div>京师戒严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372375_comment'></div>朕慨然有思廉颇李牧之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372375_comment'></div>而习事者言尔父司空之在泾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372375_comment'></div>筑平凉等八城一堡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372375_comment'></div>堑保定平原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372375_comment'></div>使泾人益树麦禾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372375_comment'></div>以复后稷公刘之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372375_comment'></div>十有六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372375_comment'></div>犬戎不敢东顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372375_comment'></div>朕闻其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372375_comment'></div>思见其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372375_comment'></div>果有令子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372375_comment'></div>在吾懿亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372375_comment'></div>与之讨论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372375_comment'></div>自亦奇士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372375_comment'></div>铺陈将略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372375_comment'></div>殊有父风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372375_comment'></div>访其班资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372375_comment'></div>则曰亚诸卿之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372375_comment'></div>尝十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372375_comment'></div>今乃除其忧服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372375_comment'></div>命以大僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372375_comment'></div>岂惟报尔先臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372375_comment'></div>荣吾戚里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372375_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《授韩皋尚书左（右）仆射制》。<div id='poem_1372319' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372319' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372319?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授韩皋尚书左仆射制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372319")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372319_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372319'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372319'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372319_comment'></div>夫一邑之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372319_comment'></div>而犹资老者之智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372319_comment'></div>用壮者之决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372319_comment'></div>况朝廷之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372319_comment'></div>得不以耆年重望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372319_comment'></div>居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372319", 1372319, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>表正</span>之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372319_comment'></div>以仪刑百辟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372319_comment'></div>惟尔金紫光禄大夫检校尚书右仆射兼吏部尚书韩皋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372319_comment'></div>始以直言事代宗皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372319_comment'></div>司谏诤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372319_comment'></div>复以文章政术事德宗皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372319_comment'></div>为舍人中丞京兆尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372319_comment'></div>在顺宗宪宗时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372319_comment'></div>出领藩方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372319_comment'></div>入备卿长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372319_comment'></div>逮予小子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372319_comment'></div>历事五君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372319_comment'></div>勤亦至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372319_comment'></div>而又处<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372319", 1372319, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>权近</span>之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372319_comment'></div>未尝以恩幸自宠于一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372319_comment'></div>当趣向之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372319_comment'></div>终不以薄厚见窥于众目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372319_comment'></div>岂所谓徐公之行已有常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372319_comment'></div>而诗人之风雨不改耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372319_comment'></div>日者铨覈群才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372319_comment'></div>兼劳揆务。<div id='poem_sentence_29_1372319_comment'></div>正名端揆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372319_comment'></div>俾绝积薪之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372319_comment'></div>且明尚齿之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372319_comment'></div>凡百庶僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372319_comment'></div>无忘咨禀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372319_comment'></div>可守尚书左仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372319_comment'></div>馀如故。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1372319_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《授赵宗儒尚书左仆射制》。<div id='poem_1372362' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372362' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1372362'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372362'>敕。银青光禄大夫守太子少傅兼判太常卿事赵宗儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372362_comment'></div>昔叔。孙通徒以绵蕝草具之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372362_comment'></div>遂获封侯之赏。况朕始见天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372362_comment'></div>初朝祖宗。哀励祗严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372362_comment'></div>不克是惧。惟尔肇自清庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372362_comment'></div>逮于还官。赞导法仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372362_comment'></div>踰于四百。俛伏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372362", 1372362, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>趋数</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372362_comment'></div>讫无尤违。夫何叔孙可用是比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372362_comment'></div>顾朕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1372362", 1372362, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>冲昧</span>。实赖老成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372362_comment'></div>不有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1372362", 1372362, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>甄升</span>。孰明勤尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372362_comment'></div>奉常正秩。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372362", 1372362, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>左揆</span>兼荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372362_comment'></div>六乐九仪。兴替在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372362_comment'></div>无忘勖率。以厚人伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372362_comment'></div>可检校尚书左仆射兼太常卿。散官勋如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372362_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1372362_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《授王播刑部尚书诸道盐铁转运等使制》。<div id='poem_1372364' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372364")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372364_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372364'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372364'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372364_comment'></div>汉诸儒议盐铁者百辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372364_comment'></div>终莫能罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372364_comment'></div>以其均口赋利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372364_comment'></div>则贵贱尽征于王府矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372364_comment'></div>而国家岁漕关东之粟帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372364_comment'></div>以实京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372364_comment'></div>亦重事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372364_comment'></div>并是两者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372364_comment'></div>非才勿居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372364_comment'></div>剑南西川节度副大使知节度事中散大夫检校户部尚书兼成都尹御史大夫赐紫金鱼袋王播。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372364_comment'></div>昔我宪宗章武皇帝枭琳于夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372364_comment'></div>擒辟于蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372364_comment'></div>缚锜于吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372364_comment'></div>而又继之以元济师道之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372364_comment'></div>十五年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372364_comment'></div>盖烦费矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372364_comment'></div>然而资用饶而人不加赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372364_comment'></div>朕甚异焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372364_comment'></div>谋及耆艾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372364_comment'></div>以求其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372364_comment'></div>皆曰蜀帅播是时司筦榷者八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372364_comment'></div>忠而能勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372364_comment'></div>善于其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372364_comment'></div>先皇帝咨访委遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372364_comment'></div>用之不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372364_comment'></div>下竭其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372364_comment'></div>而上专其任也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372364_comment'></div>是用徵自益部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372364_comment'></div>授之刑曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372364_comment'></div>复以旧务烦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372364_comment'></div>式所以藉尔奉力之熟耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372364_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372364_comment'></div>知人则哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372364_comment'></div>宪考能之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372364_comment'></div>顾兹不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372364_comment'></div>敢有贰事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372364_comment'></div>尔其追奉先眷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372364_comment'></div>佐予冲人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372364_comment'></div>忠尽始终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372364_comment'></div>以服休命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372364_comment'></div>可守刑部尚书充诸道盐铁转运等使。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《授王陟监察御史充西川节度判官制》。<div id='poem_1372342' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372342' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_1372342_comment'></div>得与上台比伦。其或馈饷务繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372342_comment'></div>参画礼重。亦得辍自他职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372342_comment'></div>副其所求。尔等或以政闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372342_comment'></div>或以艺举。守臣上请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372342_comment'></div>信不予欺。各竭乃诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372342_comment'></div>以修厥绩。可依前件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372342_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1372342_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《沈传师授中书舍人制》。<div id='poem_1372366' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372366_comment'></div>书云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372366_comment'></div>臣作朕股肱耳目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372366_comment'></div>言天下不可一人理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372366_comment'></div>今国家崇建执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372366_comment'></div>以任股肱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372366_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372366", 1372366, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>妙选</span>侍臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372366_comment'></div>实司耳目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372366_comment'></div>股肱良则心膂正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372366_comment'></div>耳目审则视听明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372366_comment'></div>苟非端人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372366_comment'></div>何以近我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372366_comment'></div>而朝议郎守尚书兵部郎中知制诰充翰林学士上护军赐紫金鱼袋沈传师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372366_comment'></div>洁静精微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372366_comment'></div>风流儒雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372366_comment'></div>名因道胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372366_comment'></div>信在言前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372366_comment'></div>谦而愈光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372366_comment'></div>卑以自牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372366_comment'></div>专对无不达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372366_comment'></div>群居若不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372366_comment'></div>而又焕有文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372366_comment'></div>发为辞诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372366_comment'></div>使吾禁中无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372366", 1372366, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>漏露</span>之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372366_comment'></div>而朕语言与三代同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372366_comment'></div>勤亦至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372366_comment'></div>事我满岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372366_comment'></div>命汝即真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372366_comment'></div>勉竭乃诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372366_comment'></div>以辅台德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372366_comment'></div>可守中书舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372366_comment'></div>依前翰林学士。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《授刘总守司徒兼侍中天平军节度使制》。<div id='poem_1372349' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372349' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1372349'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372349'>门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372349_comment'></div>百谷所以朝巨海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372349_comment'></div>海不疑其贰于我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372349_comment'></div>五岳所以镇厚地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372349_comment'></div>地不畏其轧于已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372349_comment'></div>故山泽之气上腾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372349_comment'></div>天应之则为云为雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372349_comment'></div>台辅之精下降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372349_comment'></div>君得之则称帝称皇。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372349_comment'></div>垂千万代之竹帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372349_comment'></div>非我独断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372349_comment'></div>安能遽行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372349_comment'></div>某官刘总。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372349_comment'></div>生知礼乐。<div id='poem_sentence_20_1372349_comment'></div>本仁祖义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372349_comment'></div>学弄之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372349_comment'></div>画地而壁垒势成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372349_comment'></div>言兵之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372349_comment'></div>聚米而山川形具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372349_comment'></div>象贤秉哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372349_comment'></div>脱俗遗荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372349_comment'></div>慕清净以为宗。<div id='poem_sentence_39_1372349_comment'></div>求奉浮图之真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372349_comment'></div>愿弃全燕之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372349_comment'></div>诚嘉素尚。<div id='poem_sentence_44_1372349_comment'></div>岂君父之能舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372349_comment'></div>朕惟邹鲁之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372349_comment'></div>郓实居多。<div id='poem_sentence_49_1372349_comment'></div>施之美化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372349_comment'></div>岂无众善之因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372349_comment'></div>革其非心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372349_comment'></div>宁失大雄之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372349_comment'></div>是用正名台座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372349_comment'></div>重委藩方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372349_comment'></div>尔其张我四维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372349_comment'></div>敷我五教。<div
