id='poem_sentence_58_1372349_comment'></div>露蝉冕以行春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372349_comment'></div>宜体夔龙之令图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372349_comment'></div>勿徇巢由之独行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372349_comment'></div>可守司徒兼侍中使持节郓州诸军事守郓州刺史充天平军节度郓曹濮等州观察处置等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372349_comment'></div>散官勋封如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372349_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_64_1372349_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《处分幽州德音》制。<div id='poem_1372435' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372435' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372435?labeling=true' target='_blank'>处分幽州德音</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372435")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372435_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372435'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372435'>昔我玄宗明皇帝得姚元崇宋璟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372435_comment'></div>使之铺陈大法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372435_comment'></div>以和人神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372435_comment'></div>而又益之以张说苏颋嘉贞九龄之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372435_comment'></div>皆能始终弥缝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372435_comment'></div>不失纪律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372435_comment'></div>四十年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372435_comment'></div>海内<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372435", 1372435, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>滋殖</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372435_comment'></div>风俗谨朴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372435_comment'></div>君臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1372435", 1372435, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>平宁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372435_comment'></div>人无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372435", 1372435, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>争端</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372435_comment'></div>而卿大夫羞以赃罪鞫人于圣代矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372435_comment'></div>况伺察乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372435_comment'></div>由是网漏吞舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372435_comment'></div>视盗不谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372435_comment'></div>寇羯乘衅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372435_comment'></div>勃为妖氛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372435_comment'></div>天下持兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372435_comment'></div>垂七十载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372435_comment'></div>朕因眇末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372435_comment'></div>获承祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372435_comment'></div>分不得见四方无姑息之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372435_comment'></div>而九有复升平之境矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372435_comment'></div>上帝念我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372435_comment'></div>赉予忠贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372435_comment'></div>尽献提封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372435_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1372435", 1372435, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>恢缵</span>旧服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372435_comment'></div>使辽阳八州之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372435_comment'></div>重睹开元之仪者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372435_comment'></div>则予侍中总之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372435_comment'></div>名藩厚位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372435_comment'></div>予何爱焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372435_comment'></div>刘总巳极上台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372435_comment'></div>仍移重镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372435_comment'></div>兄弟子侄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372435_comment'></div>各授官荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372435_comment'></div>大将宾寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372435_comment'></div>亦皆超擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372435_comment'></div>管内州县官吏肃存古者二百馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372435_comment'></div>悉是刘总选任材能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372435_comment'></div>久令假摄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372435_comment'></div>并与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1372435", 1372435, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>正授</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372435_comment'></div>用奖勤劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372435_comment'></div>尚念幽将士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372435_comment'></div>夙著勋庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372435_comment'></div>易帅之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372435_comment'></div>谅宜优锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372435_comment'></div>共赐钱一百万贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372435_comment'></div>以内库及户部见在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1372435", 1372435, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>匹段</span>支送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372435_comment'></div>充赏给幽州卢龙并瀛漠等州将士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372435_comment'></div>又念八州之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372435_comment'></div>九赋用殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372435_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1372435", 1372435, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>庆泽</span>旁流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372435_comment'></div>所宜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1372435", 1372435, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>沾贷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372435_comment'></div>其管内八州百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372435_comment'></div>并宜给复一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372435_comment'></div>仍令给事中薛存庆往彼宣慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372435_comment'></div>亲谕朕怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372435_comment'></div>州县之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372435_comment'></div>或有残破偏甚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372435_comment'></div>委宏靖量事便宜优恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372435_comment'></div>务令存立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372435_comment'></div>刘总素以清静理人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372435_comment'></div>固当开释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372435_comment'></div>尚恐自罹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1372435", 1372435, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>禁网</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372435_comment'></div>亦念哀矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372435_comment'></div>管内见禁囚徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372435_comment'></div>罪无轻重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372435_comment'></div>并宜赦免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372435_comment'></div>大将及判官等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372435_comment'></div>虽巳颁官爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372435_comment'></div>而或虑阙遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372435_comment'></div>宜委宏靖具名衔闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372435_comment'></div>如有父母在者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372435_comment'></div>别具上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372435_comment'></div>当加优恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372435_comment'></div>朕以刘总父子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372435_comment'></div>并立战功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372435_comment'></div>永言将吏之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372435_comment'></div>虑有没于王事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372435_comment'></div>当道从前巳来官吏将士等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372435_comment'></div>或忠义可嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372435_comment'></div>身巳沦没者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372435_comment'></div>委宏靖条录闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372435_comment'></div>当加追赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372435_comment'></div>平时旧老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372435_comment'></div>始见胡尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372435_comment'></div>复睹朝仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372435_comment'></div>得无悽抃遐想。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372435_comment'></div>抚其儿稚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372435_comment'></div>自此免于兵锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372435_comment'></div>言念及兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372435_comment'></div>用加优给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372435_comment'></div>管内有高年茕独。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372435_comment'></div>或疾瘵不能自存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372435_comment'></div>委宏靖差官就问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372435_comment'></div>量给粟帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372435_comment'></div>管内州县官吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372435_comment'></div>有奉职清强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372435_comment'></div>惠及百姓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372435_comment'></div>委宏靖具事迹奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372435_comment'></div>当与量加进改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372435_comment'></div>燕赵之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372435_comment'></div>古多奇士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372435_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_104_1372435", 1372435, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>隗台</span>如在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372435_comment'></div>代岂乏贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372435_comment'></div>如有隐于山谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372435_comment'></div>退在丘园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372435_comment'></div>行义素高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372435_comment'></div>名节可尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372435_comment'></div>或才兼文武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372435_comment'></div>卓然可奖者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372435_comment'></div>亦委宏靖具名荐闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372435_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1372435_comment'></div>古人云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1372435_comment'></div>安不忘危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372435_comment'></div>魏徵对太宗以守成之不易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372435_comment'></div>兹朕小子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372435_comment'></div>抑又何知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372435_comment'></div>而镇冀克和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1372435_comment'></div>幽燕复古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1372435_comment'></div>慄慄夙夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1372435_comment'></div>不遑安宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1372435_comment'></div>实惟祖宗之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1372435_comment'></div>尚赖股肱之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1372435_comment'></div>咨尔辅弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1372435_comment'></div>至于方岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1372435_comment'></div>尔当勉于姚宋之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1372435_comment'></div>予亦无忘于天宝之戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1372435_comment'></div>宣示中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1372435_comment'></div>宜体朕怀。</div><div id='poem_sentence_130_1372435_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《颜岘右赞善大夫》制。<div id='poem_1372396' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372396' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372396?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授颜岘右赞善大夫制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372396")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372396_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372396'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372396'>敕。安邑解县两池搉盐巡官监察御史里行颜岘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372396_comment'></div>古者公卿之子。代为公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372396_comment'></div>所以贵贵也。况贤者之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372396_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372396", 1372396, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>死政</span>之孤。宁系班资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372396_comment'></div>以碍升奖。惟尔岘尝与从父太师深犯蜂虿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372396_comment'></div>毒螫之下。太师没焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372396_comment'></div>尔之不回。幸而能脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372396_comment'></div>终超逆地。来谒奉天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372396_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1372396", 1372396, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>列圣</span>念功。访求太师之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372396_comment'></div>有司<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1372396", 1372396, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>昧蔽</span>。不以尔闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372396_comment'></div>今朕将建东朝。深思<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372396", 1372396, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>赞谕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372396_comment'></div>异时使朕爱子知忠孝之道。如尔岘吾何患焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372396_comment'></div>可守太子右赞善大夫。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372396_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1372396_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《戒励风俗德音》制。<div id='poem_1372436' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372436' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372436?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戒励风俗德音</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372436")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372436_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372436'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372436'>朕闻昔者卿大夫相与让于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372436_comment'></div>士庶人相与让于列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372436_comment'></div>周成王刑措不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372436_comment'></div>汉文帝耻言人过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372436_comment'></div>真<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372436", 1372436, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>理古</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372436_comment'></div>朕甚慕焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372436_comment'></div>中代以还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372436_comment'></div>争端斯起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372436_comment'></div>掩抑其言则专蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372436_comment'></div>诱掖其说则欺诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372436_comment'></div>自非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372436", 1372436, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>责实循名</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372436_comment'></div>不能彰善瘅恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372436_comment'></div>故孝宣必有告讦及下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372436_comment'></div>光武不以诡辞遽行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372436_comment'></div>语称讪上之非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372436_comment'></div>律有匿名之禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372436_comment'></div>皆所以防<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372436", 1372436, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>三至</span>之毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372436_comment'></div>重<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1372436", 1372436, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>两造</span>之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372436_comment'></div>是以爵人于朝则皆劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372436_comment'></div>刑人于市则皆惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372436_comment'></div>罪有归而赏当事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372436_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1372436", 1372436, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>末俗</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1372436", 1372436, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>偷巧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372436_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1372436", 1372436, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>内荏</span>外刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372436_comment'></div>卿大夫无进思尽忠之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372436_comment'></div>多退有后言之谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372436_comment'></div>士庶人无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1372436", 1372436, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>切磋琢磨</span>之益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372436_comment'></div>多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1372436", 1372436, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>销铄</span>浸润之谗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372436_comment'></div>进则谀言谄笑以相求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372436_comment'></div>退则群居杂处以相议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372436_comment'></div>留中不出之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372436_comment'></div>盖发其阴私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372436_comment'></div>公论不容之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372436_comment'></div>实生于朋党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372436_comment'></div>擢一官则曰恩皆自我。<div class='inline' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372350' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372350?labeling=true' target='_blank'>许刘总出家制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372350_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372350'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372350'>门下。朕闻西方有金仙子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372350_comment'></div>自著书云。昔我于无量劫中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372350_comment'></div>舍国城妻子。以求法要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372350_comment'></div>朕尝闻其语。未见其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372350_comment'></div>安知股肱之间。目验兹事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372350_comment'></div>脱身羁网。诚乐所从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372350_comment'></div>舍我絷维。能无永叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372350_comment'></div>遂其高尚。良用怃然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372350_comment'></div>具官刘总五岳孕灵。三台降瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372350_comment'></div>位兼将相。代袭勋庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372350_comment'></div>视轩冕若浮云。弃妻孥犹脱屣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372350_comment'></div>屡陈章表。恳愿舍家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372350_comment'></div>勉喻再三。终然不夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372350_comment'></div>朕又移之重镇。宠以上公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372350_comment'></div>莫顾中人之情。遂超开士之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372350_comment'></div>于戏。张良却粒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372350_comment'></div>尚想高踪。范蠡登舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372350_comment'></div>空瞻遗象。功留鼎鼐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372350_comment'></div>誓著山河。长存鱼水之欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372350_comment'></div>勿忘香火之愿。宜赐法号大觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372350_comment'></div>仍赐僧腊五十夏。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1372350", 1372350, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>主者施行</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372350_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1372356_comment'></div>早从军府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372356_comment'></div>儒学之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372356_comment'></div>自此知兵。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372432' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372432?labeling=true' target='_blank'>批宰臣请上尊号第四表</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372432")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372432_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372432'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372432'>朕以月正元日祗见于九庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372432_comment'></div>对越于上元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372432_comment'></div>千官在前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372432_comment'></div>万乘居后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372432_comment'></div>睹声名文物之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372432_comment'></div>望城社宫阙之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372432_comment'></div>尚念高祖太宗艰难于经营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372432_comment'></div>德宗宪考殷忧于缵服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372432_comment'></div>惧不克荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372432_comment'></div>以羞前人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372432_comment'></div>寅畏严恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372432_comment'></div>式冀无过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372432_comment'></div>而燕赵底定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372432_comment'></div>戎獯和宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372432_comment'></div>实惟列圣之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372432_comment'></div>焉敢自大其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372432_comment'></div>左右辅弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372432_comment'></div>庶尹师长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372432_comment'></div>猥以鸿名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372432_comment'></div>愿加薄德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372432_comment'></div>三诏执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372432_comment'></div>抑而不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372432_comment'></div>物议愈坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372432_comment'></div>予衷未信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372432_comment'></div>四陈章表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372432_comment'></div>备列古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372432_comment'></div>且曰告虔之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372432_comment'></div>宁忘继志。<div class='inline' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372538' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372538?labeling=true' target='_blank'>幽州平告太庙祝文</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_1_1372538_comment'></div>付唐养理。高祖太宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372538_comment'></div>奉顺天纪。玄宗平宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372538_comment'></div>六合同轨。物盛而微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372538_comment'></div>墉崇则毁。网漏鲸鲵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372538_comment'></div>隙开蝼蚁。幽燕狼顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372538_comment'></div>齐赵虎视。割据封壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372538_comment'></div>传序孙子。不贡不觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372538_comment'></div>自卒自始。圣父披攘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372538_comment'></div>震骇波委。擒灭斩除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372538_comment'></div>如运支指。冀方独迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372538_comment'></div>再伐再巳。碣石是徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372538_comment'></div>承诏唯唯。逮臣寡昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372538_comment'></div>虔奉先旨。洞照诚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372538_comment'></div>涤濯痕耻。承元云奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372538_comment'></div>总亦风靡。悉率赋舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372538_comment'></div>尽献州里。不命一将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372538_comment'></div>不戮一士。不费一金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372538_comment'></div>不亡一矢。五纪逆命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372538_comment'></div>一朝如砥。实天垂休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372538_comment'></div>实圣垂祉。敢荐成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372538_comment'></div>以永千纪。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372538_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1372538_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href='/Writing/1372418?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李归仙兼镇州右司马制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1372418'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372418'>敕。成德军节度衙前马步都知兵马使检校右散骑常侍使持节澶州刺史兼御史大夫充本州防御使李归仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372418_comment'></div>去岁成德换帅之际。人皆效忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372418_comment'></div>惟尔职在辕门。位兼符竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372418_comment'></div>司武故事。兼可<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372418", 1372418, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>理戎</span>。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《授刘悟检校司空幽州节度使制》。<div id='poem_1372353' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372353' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372353?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授刘悟检校司空幽州节度使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372353")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372353_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372353'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372353'>门下。朕闻将星明则英豪用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372353_comment'></div>灵旗指则氛祲销。劲草可以受<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372353", 1372353, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>疾风</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372353_comment'></div>盘根然后见利器。苟非处剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372353_comment'></div>何以用长。况幽并少年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372353_comment'></div>燕赵奇士。居常以紫骝自骋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372353_comment'></div>失意则白刃相雠。将领斯难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372353_comment'></div>是先才杰。昭义军节度副大使知节度事泽潞磁邢洺等州观察制置使金紫光禄大夫检校尚书右<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作左）</span>仆射兼潞州大都督府长史御史大夫上柱国彭城郡王食邑三百户刘悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372353_comment'></div>天与忠诚。人推敬让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372353_comment'></div>蕴孟贲之勇。不以力闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372353_comment'></div>避廉颇之强。使之心服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372353_comment'></div>是以居危邦以智勉。临大节以功高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372353_comment'></div>尝见委于先朝。屡作藩于右地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372353_comment'></div>朕以辽阳巨镇。自我康宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372353_comment'></div>姑欲抚之以仁。然后示之以礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372353_comment'></div>而守臣婴疾。幕吏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372353", 1372353, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>擅权</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372353_comment'></div>挠政行私。亏恩剥下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372353_comment'></div>过为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372353", 1372353, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>箠楚</span>。妄作威棱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372353_comment'></div>不均飨士之羊。徒养乘轩之鹤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372353_comment'></div>致滋扰<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作挠）</span>变。职此之由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372353_comment'></div>不有将才。孰惩儿戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372353_comment'></div>敷求朕志。深谓汝谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372353_comment'></div>是用拔奇。式冀宣力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372353_comment'></div>帖以亚相。宠之上公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372353_comment'></div>俾光十乘之行。以壮三军之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372353_comment'></div>可检校司空兼幽州大都督府长史御史大夫充幽州卢龙军节度副大使知节度事观察处置押奚契丹两蕃经略卢龙等使。散官勋封如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372353_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1372353_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《批刘悟谢上表》。<div id='poem_1372433' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372433' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372433?labeling=true' target='_blank'>批刘悟谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372433")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372433_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372433'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372433'>朕闻上党亦天下之劲兵。昔者李抱真用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372433_comment'></div>一举破朱滔。再举蹙田悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372433_comment'></div>训养十万。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372433", 1372433, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>威声</span>殷然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372433_comment'></div>人到于今。号为良将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372433_comment'></div>夫以卿之勇义才略。犹将远慕韩彭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372433_comment'></div>区区抱真。夫岂难继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372433_comment'></div>况以克融庭凑之狂脆小贱。比朱滔田悦之炽大结连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372433_comment'></div>是犹以孩婴而校<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372433", 1372433, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>贲育</span>也。蜂蚁相聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372433_comment'></div>其能久乎。卿宜密运谟猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372433_comment'></div>明宣号令。避强击惰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372433_comment'></div>取暴抚羸。勿争蛇豕之锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372433_comment'></div>宜得鲸鲵之首。再图麟阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372433_comment'></div>永焕缣缃。无为他人所先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372433_comment'></div>当使功居第一。策勋在近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372433_comment'></div>勿复为劳。所谢知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372433_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1372433_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《授刘悟昭义军节度使制》。<div id='poem_1372354' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372354' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372354?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授刘悟昭义军节度使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372354")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372354_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372354'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372354'>门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372354_comment'></div>昔潢池骤变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372354_comment'></div>则龚遂亟行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372354_comment'></div>河内去思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372354_comment'></div>而寇恂来复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372354_comment'></div>所以顺人情而急<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372354", 1372354, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>时病</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372354_comment'></div>况鸡泽衡漳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372354_comment'></div>附于上党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372354_comment'></div>控带河洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372354_comment'></div>扼束燕赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372354_comment'></div>其土瘠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372354_comment'></div>其人劲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372354_comment'></div>养理训习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372354_comment'></div>尤所重难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372354_comment'></div>而幽州卢龙军节度使检校司空刘悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372354_comment'></div>前临是邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372354_comment'></div>其政方睦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372354_comment'></div>甲兵完利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372354_comment'></div>师徒具严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372354_comment'></div>刑当罪而人不冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372354_comment'></div>赏当功而财不费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372354_comment'></div>军政威而非虐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372354_comment'></div>吏道察而不苛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372354_comment'></div>州里行信让之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372354_comment'></div>乡曲除<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1372354", 1372354, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>武断</span>之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372354_comment'></div>方将久次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372354_comment'></div>以惠斯人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372354_comment'></div>而难起幽陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372354_comment'></div>救深焚溺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372354_comment'></div>辍于既理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372354_comment'></div>与彼惟新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372354_comment'></div>乘轩才及于邢郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372354_comment'></div>妖彗忽生于冀分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372354_comment'></div>空沉台座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372354_comment'></div>未辨魁渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372354_comment'></div>予怀震惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372354_comment'></div>物听倾骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372354_comment'></div>校其远迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372354_comment'></div>当有后先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372354_comment'></div>遂驻腹心之雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372354_comment'></div>以供<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1372354", 1372354, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>臂指</span>之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372354_comment'></div>复还龙节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372354_comment'></div>再息棠阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372354_comment'></div>勉受新恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372354_comment'></div>无移<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1372354", 1372354, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>旧贯</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372354_comment'></div>可依前检校司空兼潞州大都督府长史兼御史大夫昭义军节度副大使知节度事泽潞磁邢洺等州观察使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372354_comment'></div>勋封如故。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1372354_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《授杨元卿泾原节度使制》。<div id='poem_1372358' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372358' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372358?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杨元卿泾原节度使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372358")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372358_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372358'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372358'>门下。士之捐妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372358_comment'></div>冒白刃。忠于许国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372358_comment'></div>勇于忘家。贡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372358", 1372358, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>先见之明</span>于群疑之际者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372358_comment'></div>大则书竹帛以示后。次则建<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372358", 1372358, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>麾棨</span>以临戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372358_comment'></div>功不见图。则劳者何劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372358_comment'></div>忠不见赏。则悖者何诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372358_comment'></div>聿求其人。用激尔类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372358_comment'></div>守右金吾卫将军权勾当左街事杨元卿。衣冠贵冑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372358_comment'></div>文武长材。尝求三略之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372358_comment'></div>耻学一夫之敌。是以陷豺狼之穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372358_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372358", 1372358, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>履尾</span>甚危。蓄鹰鹘之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372358_comment'></div>卑飞待击。请分金以间楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372358_comment'></div>愿奉璧以伐虞。身以智全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372358_comment'></div>家因义丧。诛蔡之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372358_comment'></div>实有力焉。及典方州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372358_comment'></div>尤彰绩效。自居环尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372358_comment'></div>益茂勋勤。西旅未平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372358_comment'></div>实资良帅。拔于不次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372358_comment'></div>式伫奇功。尔其辟我土疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372358_comment'></div>谨我封守。视我士卒如尔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372358_comment'></div>攘我夷狄如尔雠。勉竭乃诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372358_comment'></div>以敷朕意。珥貂持简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372358_comment'></div>用示<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1372358", 1372358, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>兼荣</span>。可朝散大夫检校左散骑常侍使持节泾州诸军事兼泾州刺史御史大夫充四镇北庭行军兼泾原等州节度观察处置等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372358_comment'></div>勋赐如故。主者施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372358_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1372358_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《王进岌冀州刺史》制。<div id='poem_1372406' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372406' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372406?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授王进岌冀州刺史制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372406")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372406_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372406'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372406'>敕。元从奉天定难功臣行右羽林军大将军兼御史大夫王进岌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372406_comment'></div>冀方陶尧之所理也。其俗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372406", 1372406, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>质强</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372406_comment'></div>有古人遗风。兵兴已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372406_comment'></div>习为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372406", 1372406, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>奋武</span>之地。非勇毅仁隐之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372406_comment'></div>不能兼牧其氓。以尔战伐居多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372406_comment'></div>班资已重。副朕兹选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372406_comment'></div>必有可观。夫理乱绳唯缓之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372406_comment'></div>龚遂之政也。忠信可以服<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372406", 1372406, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>暴强</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372406_comment'></div>仲尼之言也。率是两者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372406_comment'></div>以临其人。吾无忧于千里之内矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372406_comment'></div>式兼亚相。周贲外台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372406_comment'></div>可开府仪同三司使持节行冀州刺史兼御史大夫充本州团练守捉使。功臣勋封如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372406_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1372406_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《授田布魏博节度使制》。<div id='poem_1372357' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372357' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372357?labeling=true' target='_blank'>起复田布魏博节度等使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372357")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372357_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372357'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372357'>门下。经曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372357_comment'></div>父母之雠不同天。虽及匹夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372357_comment'></div>而犹寝苫枕干。以期必报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372357_comment'></div>是以子胥不徇伍奢之死。卒能发既藏之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372357_comment'></div>鞭不义之尸。取贵春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372357_comment'></div>垂名万古。而况于身登将坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372357_comment'></div>父死人手。家雠国耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372357_comment'></div>并在一门。当怀尝胆之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372357_comment'></div>岂俟绝浆之礼。金革无避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372357_comment'></div>其在斯乎。前四镇北庭行军兼泾原节度使检校右<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作左）</span>散骑长侍御史大夫田布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372357_comment'></div>咨尔先臣。惟国元老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372357_comment'></div>首自河朔。来朝帝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372357_comment'></div>而又东取青齐。北讨燕赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372357_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372357", 1372357, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>提挈</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372357", 1372357, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>义旅</span>。勤劳王家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372357_comment'></div>冒白刃而不疑。推赤心而自信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372357_comment'></div>属冀方求帅。余所重难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372357_comment'></div>辍自大名。付兹巨镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372357_comment'></div>而中台暗折。上将妖侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372357_comment'></div>蟊贼潜寘于腹心。豺狼勃兴于肘腋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372357_comment'></div>人神愤痛。朝野惊嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372357_comment'></div>深轸予怀。誓擒元恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372357_comment'></div>以尔布诗书并习。忠孝两全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372357_comment'></div>尝用魏师。克征淮孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372357_comment'></div>素行恩信。共著勋庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372357_comment'></div>岂无奋激之图。为报寇雠之党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372357_comment'></div>且魏之诸将。由尔父而崇高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372357_comment'></div>魏之三军。蒙尔父之仁爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372357_comment'></div>昔既同其美利。今岂忘其深冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372357_comment'></div>尔其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1372357", 1372357, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>淬砺</span>勇夫。敬恭义士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372357_comment'></div>一饭之饱。必同于卒伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372357_comment'></div>一毫之费。必用于干矛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372357_comment'></div>非算画勿萌于心。非军旅勿宣于口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372357_comment'></div>居则席稿。寒则抱冰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372357_comment'></div>以丧礼处之。若哀心感者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372357_comment'></div>必有为横身刎颈。感智捐躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372357_comment'></div>下报营魂。旁清丑类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372357_comment'></div>于戏。至诚可托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372357_comment'></div>稔恶难逃。矧彼凶狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372357_comment'></div>去将安往。墨缞居体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372357_comment'></div>元纛在前。提鼓执金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372357_comment'></div>无忘哀敬。可起复宁远将军守右金吾卫大将军员外同正员检校工部尚书兼魏州大都督府长史御史大夫充魏博等州节度观察处置等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372357_comment'></div>勋赐如故。主者施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372357_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1372357_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《招讨镇州制》。<div id='poem_1372348' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372348' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372348?labeling=true' target='_blank'>加裴度镇州四面招讨使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372348")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372348_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372348'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372348'>门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372348_comment'></div>传云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372348_comment'></div>死者不可复生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372348_comment'></div>刑者不可复续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372348_comment'></div>是以先王斩一支指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372348_comment'></div>杀一犬彘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372348_comment'></div>莫不伏念隐悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372348_comment'></div>至于旬时决而行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372348_comment'></div>盖不得巳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372348_comment'></div>予于镇人亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372348_comment'></div>伏念俟其悛革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372348_comment'></div>讵止旬时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372348_comment'></div>前命相臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372348_comment'></div>招怀抚谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372348_comment'></div>矜其诖误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372348_comment'></div>示以生门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372348_comment'></div>期于尽脱网罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372348_comment'></div>岂欲驱之陷阱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372348_comment'></div>而豺狼当道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372348_comment'></div>荆棘牵衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372348_comment'></div>虽欲归之于仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372348_comment'></div>厥路无由而至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372348_comment'></div>况王师压境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372348_comment'></div>义勇争先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372348_comment'></div>朕每抑其锋铓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372348_comment'></div>未忍覆其巢穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372348_comment'></div>是犹爱稂莠而伤稼穑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372348_comment'></div>养痈疽以溃肌肤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372348_comment'></div>独怀儿女之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372348_comment'></div>虑失祖宗之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372348_comment'></div>今上台居镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372348_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1372348", 1372348, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>算画</span>无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372348_comment'></div>操晋阳之利兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372348_comment'></div>驱屈产之良马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372348_comment'></div>举河东义成之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372348_comment'></div>合沧景泽潞之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372348_comment'></div>当元翼授命之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372348_comment'></div>乘田布雪冤之顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372348_comment'></div>举毛拾芥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372348_comment'></div>其易可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372348_comment'></div>兼用恩威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372348_comment'></div>尚存招致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372348_comment'></div>宜令河东节度使裴度充镇州四面招讨使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372348_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372348_comment'></div>以一城之卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372348_comment'></div>敌天下之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372348_comment'></div>徇猖獗之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372348_comment'></div>抗君父之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372348_comment'></div>吾哀尔辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372348_comment'></div>死实无名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372348_comment'></div>苟能自新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372348_comment'></div>亦冀容汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372348_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1372348_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《授牛元翼深翼州节度使制》。<div id='poem_1372359' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372359' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372359?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授牛元翼深冀等州节度使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372359")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372359_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372359'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372359'>门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372359_comment'></div>鹰隼击则妖鸟除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372359_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372359", 1372359, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>弧弓</span>张则天狼灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372359_comment'></div>汤沐具而虮虱相吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372359_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372359", 1372359, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>针石</span>炽而痈疽立溃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372359_comment'></div>苟得韩卢而示之狡兔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372359_comment'></div>则可备俎豆而俟脯醢矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372359_comment'></div>复何忧于越逸乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372359_comment'></div>夫将者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372359_comment'></div>亦虮虱之汤沐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372359_comment'></div>而渠魁之韩卢也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372359_comment'></div>我得之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372359_comment'></div>又何患焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372359_comment'></div>检校右散骑常侍深州刺史牛元翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372359_comment'></div>挺生河朔之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372359_comment'></div>迥钟海岳之秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372359_comment'></div>幼为儿戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372359_comment'></div>营垒已成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372359_comment'></div>长学神枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372359_comment'></div>风云谙晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372359_comment'></div>众推然诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372359_comment'></div>已任安危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372359_comment'></div>善用奇兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372359_comment'></div>尤精技击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372359_comment'></div>陈安之矛丈八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372359_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1372359", 1372359, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>颜高</span>之弓六钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372359_comment'></div>或山立于军前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372359_comment'></div>或肉飞于马上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372359_comment'></div>而又谦能养勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372359_comment'></div>孝以资忠虽胆力过人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372359_comment'></div>而心诚许国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372359_comment'></div>自常山作沴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372359_comment'></div>上将罹灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372359_comment'></div>恸哭辕门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372359_comment'></div>誓清妖孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372359_comment'></div>羽书三奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372359_comment'></div>驿骑四驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372359_comment'></div>上请庙谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372359_comment'></div>旁徵邻援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372359_comment'></div>指期斩叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372359_comment'></div>尅已图功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372359_comment'></div>断自予衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372359_comment'></div>开怀用尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372359_comment'></div>夫以尔之材力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372359_comment'></div>而取彼之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1372359", 1372359, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>凶残</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372359_comment'></div>是犹以火焚枯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372359_comment'></div>以石压卵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372359_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1372359", 1372359, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>虫臂拒辙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372359_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1372359", 1372359, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>鸡肋</span>承拳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372359_comment'></div>万万相殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372359_comment'></div>破之必矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372359_comment'></div>而况于镇之黎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372359_comment'></div>皆朕之赤子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372359_comment'></div>尔之部曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372359_comment'></div>即镇之<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_55_1372359_comment'></div>怀尔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1372359", 1372359, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>椒兰</span>之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372359_comment'></div>吾知此辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372359_comment'></div>谁不革心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372359_comment'></div>尔其寒者衣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372359_comment'></div>饥者食之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372359_comment'></div>无废室庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372359_comment'></div>无害<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1372359", 1372359, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>农稼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372359_comment'></div>苟获戎首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372359_comment'></div>置之稿街。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372359_comment'></div>下以报忠臣之冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372359_comment'></div>上以告先帝之庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372359_comment'></div>则蚩蚩从乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372359_comment'></div>予又何诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372359_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372359_comment'></div>杀人盈城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372359_comment'></div>尔其深戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372359_comment'></div>孥戮誓众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372359_comment'></div>朕不忍言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372359_comment'></div>再换蝉冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372359_comment'></div>新持武节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372359_comment'></div>恩不虚授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372359_comment'></div>尔其敬之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372359_comment'></div>可检校右散骑常侍充深冀等州节度观察等使。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1372359_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《秋分日祭百神文》。<div id='poem_1372546' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372546' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372546?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋分日祭百神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372546")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372546_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372546'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372546'>维长庆元年岁次辛丑八月甲子朔十八日辛巳。皇帝遣通议大夫行内侍省常侍赐紫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1372546", 1372546, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>金鱼袋</span>李某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372546_comment'></div>祭于百神之灵。朕奄宅万有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372546_comment'></div>亭毒品类。日月所照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372546_comment'></div>永思和宁。上极于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372546_comment'></div>下蟠于地。包山绝海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372546_comment'></div>穷冥入元。至于毛鳞裸羽之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372546_comment'></div>咸秩无文。以祛不若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372546_comment'></div>秋序始肃。时将顺成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372546_comment'></div>且报且祈。用举常祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372546_comment'></div>罔害嘉谷。以贻神羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372546_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1372546_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《加裴度幽镇两道招抚使制》。<div id='poem_1372347' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372347' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372347?labeling=true' target='_blank'>加裴度幽镇两道招抚使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372347")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372347_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372347'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372347'>门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372347_comment'></div>夫以区区秦伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372347_comment'></div>而犹念晋国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372347_comment'></div>曰其君是恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372347_comment'></div>其人何罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372347_comment'></div>况朕均养亿兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372347_comment'></div>为之君亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372347_comment'></div>燕人冀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372347_comment'></div>皆吾乳哺而育之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372347_comment'></div>安忍以豺狼驱胁之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372347_comment'></div>绝其飞走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372347_comment'></div>尽致网罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372347_comment'></div>止行犯命之诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372347_comment'></div>是用开其一面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372347_comment'></div>河东节度观察处置等使金紫光禄大夫守司空兼门下侍郎同中书门下平章事太原尹北都留守上柱国晋国公食邑三千户裴度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372347_comment'></div>昔者区域之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372347_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372347", 1372347, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>蜂蚁</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372347", 1372347, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>巢聚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372347_comment'></div>蔡有逆孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372347_comment'></div>齐有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1372347", 1372347, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>狡童</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372347_comment'></div>厥初图征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372347_comment'></div>疑议满野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372347_comment'></div>不惧不惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372347_comment'></div>挺然披攘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372347_comment'></div>苟无司南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372347_comment'></div>允罔能济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372347_comment'></div>佑我宪考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372347_comment'></div>为唐神宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372347_comment'></div>实惟股肱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372347_comment'></div>运用心力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372347_comment'></div>肆朕小子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372347_comment'></div>蒙受景灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372347_comment'></div>冀服于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372347_comment'></div>燕平于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372347_comment'></div>而抚驭失理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372347_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1372347", 1372347, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>盘牙</span>复生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372347_comment'></div>求思弭宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372347_comment'></div>中夜有得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372347_comment'></div>国有元老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372347_comment'></div>夫何患焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372347_comment'></div>用是急宣恳恻之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372347_comment'></div>就加招抚之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372347_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372347_comment'></div>顷者师道元济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372347_comment'></div>乘累代袭授之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372347_comment'></div>藉山东结连之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372347_comment'></div>以丞相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1372347", 1372347, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>布画</span>于千里之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372347_comment'></div>使诸将持重于四封之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372347_comment'></div>而犹刘悟裂蛇豕之驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372347_comment'></div>李祐溃鲸鲵之腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372347_comment'></div>盖顺逆之情异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372347_comment'></div>而忠孝之道明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372347_comment'></div>况彼幽镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372347_comment'></div>无名暴征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372347_comment'></div>以丞相进观其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372347_comment'></div>以诸将齐奋其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372347_comment'></div>斧锧之刑坐迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372347_comment'></div>椒兰之气外薰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372347_comment'></div>谁不自爱其生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372347_comment'></div>焉能与乱同死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372347_comment'></div>度宜开怀缓带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372347_comment'></div>以待其归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372347_comment'></div>可依前守司空兼门下侍郎同中书门下平章事河东节度使充幽镇两道招抚使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372347_comment'></div>馀如故。</div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1372347_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《加裴度镇州四面招讨使制》。<div id='poem_1372348' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372348' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372348?labeling=true' target='_blank'>加裴度镇州四面招讨使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372348")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372348_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372348'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372348'>门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372348_comment'></div>传云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372348_comment'></div>死者不可复生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372348_comment'></div>刑者不可复续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372348_comment'></div>是以先王斩一支指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372348_comment'></div>杀一犬彘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372348_comment'></div>莫不伏念隐悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372348_comment'></div>至于旬时决而行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372348_comment'></div>盖不得巳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372348_comment'></div>予于镇人亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372348_comment'></div>伏念俟其悛革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372348_comment'></div>讵止旬时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372348_comment'></div>前命相臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372348_comment'></div>招怀抚谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372348_comment'></div>矜其诖误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372348_comment'></div>示以生门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372348_comment'></div>期于尽脱网罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372348_comment'></div>岂欲驱之陷阱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372348_comment'></div>而豺狼当道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372348_comment'></div>荆棘牵衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372348_comment'></div>虽欲归之于仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372348_comment'></div>厥路无由而至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372348_comment'></div>况王师压境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372348_comment'></div>义勇争先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372348_comment'></div>朕每抑其锋铓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372348_comment'></div>未忍覆其巢穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372348_comment'></div>是犹爱稂莠而伤稼穑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372348_comment'></div>养痈疽以溃肌肤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372348_comment'></div>独怀儿女之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372348_comment'></div>虑失祖宗之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372348_comment'></div>今上台居镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372348_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1372348", 1372348, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>算画</span>无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372348_comment'></div>操晋阳之利兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372348_comment'></div>驱屈产之良马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372348_comment'></div>举河东义成之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372348_comment'></div>合沧景泽潞之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372348_comment'></div>当元翼授命之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372348_comment'></div>乘田布雪冤之顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372348_comment'></div>举毛拾芥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372348_comment'></div>其易可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372348_comment'></div>兼用恩威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372348_comment'></div>尚存招致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372348_comment'></div>宜令河东节度使裴度充镇州四面招讨使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372348_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372348_comment'></div>以一城之卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372348_comment'></div>敌天下之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372348_comment'></div>徇猖獗之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372348_comment'></div>抗君父之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372348_comment'></div>吾哀尔辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372348_comment'></div>死实无名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372348_comment'></div>苟能自新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372348_comment'></div>亦冀容汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372348_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1372348_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《加乌重胤检校司徒制》。<div id='poem_1372351' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372351' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1372351'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372351'>门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372351_comment'></div>古之命将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372351_comment'></div>莫不登诸斋坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372351_comment'></div>告于郊庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372351_comment'></div>分其阃限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372351_comment'></div>推其车毂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372351_comment'></div>非所以宠异崇大而姑息之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372351_comment'></div>盖先王之懋典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372351_comment'></div>授之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1372351", 1372351, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>专柄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372351_comment'></div>然后迁延者必罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372351_comment'></div>选懦者必惩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372351_comment'></div>式所以使恩威并流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372351_comment'></div>而人人无辞于赏罚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372351_comment'></div>横海军节度沧德棣等州观察处置等使银青光禄大夫检校司空使持节沧州诸军事兼沧州刺史御史大夫上柱国邠国公食邑三千户乌重允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372351_comment'></div>尝以怀汝之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372351_comment'></div>南伐叛蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372351_comment'></div>博大持重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372351_comment'></div>不要奇胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372351_comment'></div>不用鈇钺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372351_comment'></div>不严刁斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372351_comment'></div>举必乐信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372351_comment'></div>战必尅期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372351_comment'></div>寇雠知其仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372351_comment'></div>士卒怀其惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372351_comment'></div>枭獍就执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372351_comment'></div>第其勋庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372351_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1372351", 1372351, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>坐树不言</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372351_comment'></div>而图功甚大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372351_comment'></div>先皇帝分命水土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372351_comment'></div>换其旌旄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372351_comment'></div>俾廉于沧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372351_comment'></div>以长横海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372351_comment'></div>幽镇既乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372351_comment'></div>人心或摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372351_comment'></div>师众无哗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372351_comment'></div>而汤池自固者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372351_comment'></div>重允盖有之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372351_comment'></div>而又明于斥堠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372351_comment'></div>善揣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1372351", 1372351, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>敌情</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372351_comment'></div>动静以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372351_comment'></div>兹实赖汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372351_comment'></div>是用升其秩序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372351_comment'></div>以大威声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372351_comment'></div>进位上公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372351_comment'></div>式光戎律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372351_comment'></div>此所以慰荐尔之忠力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372351_comment'></div>尔其勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372351_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372351_comment'></div>甘之誓曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372351_comment'></div>用命赏于祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372351_comment'></div>不用命戮于社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372351_comment'></div>朕奉祖宗而守社稷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372351_comment'></div>其能私赏罚于天下乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372351_comment'></div>赏既不俟于成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372351_comment'></div>罚固难期于后效矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372351_comment'></div>若惊之宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372351_comment'></div>无忘戒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372351_comment'></div>可检校司徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372351_comment'></div>依前充横海军节度使。</div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1372351_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《赠乌重胤父承玭等》制。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《范季睦授尚书仓部员外郎》制。<div id='poem_1372389' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372389' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372389?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授范季睦尚书仓部员外郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1372389'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372389'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372389_comment'></div>权知仓部员外郎判度支案范季睦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372389_comment'></div>野有饿殍不知发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372389_comment'></div>狗彘食人之食不知检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372389_comment'></div>此经常之失政也。<div "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>新熟</span>之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372389_comment'></div>岂宜无备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372389_comment'></div>乃诏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1372389", 1372389, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>执事</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372389_comment'></div>聿求其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372389_comment'></div>乘我<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372389", 1372389, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>有秋</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372389_comment'></div>佥曰季睦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372389_comment'></div>副予虚怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372389_comment'></div>汝其往哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372389_comment'></div>予用训汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372389_comment'></div>夫廉贾五之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372389_comment'></div>不争之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372389_comment'></div>出纳必吝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372389_comment'></div>有司之常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372389_comment'></div>贰上下之价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372389_comment'></div>则茫昧者受弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372389_comment'></div>杂苦良之货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372389_comment'></div>则豪右者受赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372389_comment'></div>惟一惟公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372389_comment'></div>乃罔不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372389_comment'></div>惟平惟实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372389_comment'></div>乃罔不吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372389_comment'></div>尔其戒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372389_comment'></div>无替朕命。<div id='poem_sentence_32_1372389_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《杜载监察御史》制。<div id='poem_1372425' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372425' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372425?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授杜载监察御史制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372425")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372425_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372425'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372425'>敕。杜载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372425_comment'></div>西旅违言。侵坑县道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372425_comment'></div>虽有备无患。而予心惕然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372425_comment'></div>惟尔载奉捷潜奏。乘驿以奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372425_comment'></div>吉语亟来。人用胥悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372425_comment'></div>念<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372425", 1372425, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>驱攘</span>之略。诚在将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372425_comment'></div>奖飞驰之劳。宜加<span
