ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《授王播中书侍郎平掌事兼盐铁使制》。<div id='poem_1372427' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372427' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372427?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授王播中书侍郎同平章事使职如故制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372427")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372427_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372427'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372427'>门下。昔萧何用新造之汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372427_comment'></div>而能调发<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372427", 1372427, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>子弟</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372427", 1372427, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>完补</span>败亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372427_comment'></div>使关东粮馈不绝者。以其尽得秦之图籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372427_comment'></div>而周知其众寡也。我国家乘十一圣之区宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372427_comment'></div>提亿兆人之生齿。而曰不能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372427", 1372427, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>足食足兵</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372427_comment'></div>朕甚懵焉。得非调阴阳抚夷夏者不欲侵货泉之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372427_comment'></div>而主会计校盈虚者不得参邦国之重乎。今将兼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372427_comment'></div>允在能者。诸道盐铁转运等使大中大夫守刑部尚书骑都尉太原县开国男赐紫金鱼袋王播。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372427_comment'></div>在德宗时以对诏入仕。践更台阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372427_comment'></div>由御史中丞大京兆尹掌。县官盐铁为春官尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372427_comment'></div>乃长巴髳。以控蛮蜑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372427_comment'></div>尽称厥职。达于予闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372427_comment'></div>洎诏徵还。便殿与语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372427_comment'></div>得所未得。闻所未闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372427_comment'></div>昭然发矇。几至前席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372427_comment'></div>重委<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1372427", 1372427, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>操剸</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1372427", 1372427, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>铓刃</span>益精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372427_comment'></div>国有羡财。而人不加赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372427_comment'></div>东师在野。物力萧然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372427_comment'></div>不有主张。孰能戡济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372427_comment'></div>是用命尔作相。仍以旧务因之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372427_comment'></div>尔其西备戎羌。东定燕冀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372427_comment'></div>内实九府。外丰万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372427_comment'></div>百度群伦。罔不在尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372427_comment'></div>于戏。典谟训诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372427_comment'></div>行之具存。邪正是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372427_comment'></div>知之孔易。予唯以不敏不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372427_comment'></div>故用尔为股肱耳目。又安能以一二戒诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372427_comment'></div>垂之空言。尔其自励于尔心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372427_comment'></div>无令观听者论尔于乡校。可依前件守中书侍郎同中书门下平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372427_comment'></div>依前充诸道盐铁转运等使。散官勋封赐如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372427_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1372427_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《批王播谢官表》。<div id='poem_1372434' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372434' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372434?labeling=true' target='_blank'>批王播谢官表</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372434")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372434_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372434'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372434'>朕闻有众不言弱。有地不言贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372434_comment'></div>是以管夷吾用区区之齐。而诸侯九合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372434_comment'></div>今朕四海之大。亿兆之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372434_comment'></div>独不能擒庭凑克融。而曰物力先困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372434_comment'></div>朕甚惑焉。况高祖太宗之法令具存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372434_comment'></div>德宗宪考之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372434", 1372434, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>旧章</span>犹在。制诰比下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372434_comment'></div>选拔日闻。较量轻重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372434_comment'></div>勤恤仁隐。而室闾益耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372434_comment'></div>县道益贫。职业坏隳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372434_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1372434", 1372434, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>程品</span>差戾。议论讲贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372434_comment'></div>殊无古风。岂朕听之不聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372434_comment'></div>而股肱耳目莫得宣其效也。先皇帝以卿有廓庙之画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372434_comment'></div>倚以为相。眇朕小子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372434_comment'></div>得而用之。卿宜勉竭诚怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372434_comment'></div>副兹嘉属。无为龊龊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372434_comment'></div>以伤先帝之明。所谢知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372434_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1372434_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《授牛元翼成德军节度使制》。<div id='poem_1372360' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372360' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372360?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授牛元翼成德军节度使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372360")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372360_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372360'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372360'>门下。王庭凑山东一叛卒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372360_comment'></div>非有席勋籍宠之资。强大结连之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372360_comment'></div>一朝驱朕赤子。弄吾甲兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372360_comment'></div>是犹以羊将狼。其下必当溃其心腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372360_comment'></div>而犹越月踰时。莫见舂其喉者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372360_comment'></div>岂非常山无帅。赵子弟未有所归耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372360_comment'></div>翕而受之。我有长画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372360_comment'></div>检校右散骑常侍深冀等州节度观察等使牛元翼。燕赵间号为飞将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372360_comment'></div>望其旗帜者。莫不风靡雨散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372360_comment'></div>图其战伐。不可胜书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372360_comment'></div>而又忠孝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372360", 1372360, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>谨廉</span>。慈仁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372360", 1372360, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>和惠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372360_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372360", 1372360, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>爱养</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372360", 1372360, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>士伍</span>。均如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372360", 1372360, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>鸤鸠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372360_comment'></div>镇之三军。争在麾下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372360_comment'></div>自领深冀。殷若雷霆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372360_comment'></div>居四战之中。坚一城之守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372360_comment'></div>以少击众。以智料愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372360_comment'></div>鼓角不惊。而梯冲自陨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372360_comment'></div>人愿为用。寇不敢前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372360_comment'></div>扫吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1372360", 1372360, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>氛烟</span>。舍此安往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372360_comment'></div>前所谓我有长画。莫若命尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372360_comment'></div>以来镇人。是用益以二州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372360_comment'></div>超之八座。帅我成德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372360_comment'></div>廉其四封。尔宜来者怀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372360_comment'></div>迷者谕之。老者视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372360_comment'></div>幼者抚之。狂者遏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372360_comment'></div>逆者绝之。惟是六者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372360_comment'></div>尔其懋哉。可镇州大都督成德军节度使镇深冀赵等州观察处置等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372360_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1372360_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《杨嗣复授尚书兵部郎中》制。<div id='poem_1372381' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372381' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372381?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授杨嗣复权知尚书兵部郎中制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372381")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372381_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372381'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372381'>敕。吏部郎中杨嗣复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372381_comment'></div>官天下之文武。重事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372381_comment'></div>兵部郎中二员。一在侍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372381_comment'></div>不居外省。旁求其一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372381_comment'></div>颇甚难之。而执事者皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372381_comment'></div>近以文章词赋之士为名辈。由此者坐至公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372381_comment'></div>娴达宪章。用是稀少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372381_comment'></div>而吏曹郎嗣复。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372381", 1372381, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>州里</span>秀异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372381_comment'></div>议论宏博。宜其以所长自多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372381_comment'></div>然而操剸吏事。细大无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372381_comment'></div>用副虚求。允谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372381", 1372381, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>宜称</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372381_comment'></div>尔其试守兹任。为予<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372381", 1372381, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>简稽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372381_comment'></div>苟能修明。旋议<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372381", 1372381, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>超陟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372381_comment'></div>可权知兵部郎中。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372381_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1372381_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《授郑仁弼检校祠部员外充横海判官制》。<div id='poem_1372340' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372340' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372340?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授郑仁弼检校祠部员外充横海判官等制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372340'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372340'>敕。郑仁弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372340_comment'></div>诸侯辟士。古实有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372340_comment'></div>近制二千石以上。乘轺车者则开幕选才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372340_comment'></div>由古道也。仁弼等有劳参画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372340_comment'></div>重允以闻。威等著称词华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372340_comment'></div>䎖亦致请台省。茂膺兼命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372340_comment'></div>式示恩荣。无忘切磨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372340_comment'></div>用副匡益。可依前件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372340_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1372340_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《赠韩愈父仲卿尚书吏部侍郎》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《元宗简授京兆少尹制》。<div id='poem_1372379' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372379' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372379?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授元宗简权知京兆少尹刘约行尚书司门员外郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372379")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372379_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372379'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372379'>敕。元宗简刘约等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372379_comment'></div>叙彝伦。节浮竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372379_comment'></div>必在于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372379", 1372379, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>迁次</span>有准。以崇廉让之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372379_comment'></div>是以置具员。限资考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372379_comment'></div>而犹幸得贪求之士。不绝于埃尘间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372379_comment'></div>今古之常也。闻尔等端静廉雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372379_comment'></div>行浮于名。非公事未尝至于卿相之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372379_comment'></div>何其自持之优也。内史贰秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372379_comment'></div>重而不烦。中台诸郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372379_comment'></div>清而无杂。各勉荣授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372379_comment'></div>无移素风。宗简可权知京兆少尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372379_comment'></div>约可行尚书司门员外郎。并散官勋赐如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372379_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1372379_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《班肃授尚书司封员外郎》制。<div id='poem_1372387' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372387' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372387?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授班肃尚书司封员外郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372387")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372387_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372387'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372387'>敕。朝议郎前坊州刺史赐绯鱼袋班肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372387_comment'></div>驰竞之徒。能于寒暑之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372387_comment'></div>不以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372387", 1372387, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>忧畏</span>移其薄厚之道者鲜矣。闻尔为祠部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372387_comment'></div>值吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372387", 1372387, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>黜奸</span>之日。游其门者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372387_comment'></div>莫不跧窜奔迸。惧罹其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372387_comment'></div>唯尔安分不渝。进退<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372387", 1372387, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>有素</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372387_comment'></div>搢绅之论。有以多之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372387_comment'></div>复尔中台。以厚吾俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372387_comment'></div>勉慎其始。无轻所从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372387_comment'></div>可行尚书司封员外郎。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372387_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1372387_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《韩察明州刺史等》制。<div id='poem_1372404' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372404' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372404_comment'></div>久于史职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372404_comment'></div>皆著能名。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372404_comment'></div>引而伸之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372404_comment'></div>然后可以忧人之忧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372404_comment'></div>尔其勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372404_comment'></div>可依前件。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1372404_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《加陈楚检校左仆射制》。<div id='poem_1372355' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372355' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372355?labeling=true' target='_blank'>加陈楚检校左仆射义武军节度使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372355")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372355_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372355'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372355'>门下。昔楚师多寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372355_comment'></div>楚子巡而抚之。士皆如挟纩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372355_comment'></div>明号令之可以动人也。由是天以雷震苏蛰气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372355_comment'></div>兵以鼓鼙作战力。高官重秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372355_comment'></div>可以兴起人之壮心我无爱焉。加以戎师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372355_comment'></div>亦所以作万夫之气。而增一鼓之雄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372355_comment'></div>义成军节度使检校工部尚书陈楚。茂昭之甥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372355_comment'></div>酷似其舅。总齐义武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372355_comment'></div>于今六年。以两郡之赋舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372355_comment'></div>备三军之供费。民不劳耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372355_comment'></div>而兵能缮完。政有经矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372355_comment'></div>今辽阳冀方。纷乱交虐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372355_comment'></div>楚实间居于此。其勤可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372355_comment'></div>自非国之千城。物之利器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372355_comment'></div>安能为我保障。芟夷寇雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372355_comment'></div>欲将激其茂勋。夫何吝于好爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372355_comment'></div>加之左揆。以盛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372355", 1372355, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>中权</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372355_comment'></div>苟有庸功。岂无后命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372355_comment'></div>于戏。书云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372355_comment'></div>功懋懋赏。言其当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372355_comment'></div>传曰。舍爵策勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372355_comment'></div>言其速也。今则寇未平而进律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372355_comment'></div>馘方献而先恩。吾于将臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372355_comment'></div>可谓无所负也。苟不自效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372355_comment'></div>其如法何。可检校左仆射使持节定州诸军事兼定州刺史充义武军节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372355_comment'></div>散官勋封如故。主者施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372355_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1372355_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　在翰林院，起草《赠陈宪忠衡州刺史》制。<div id='poem_1372312' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372312' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_5_1372415_comment'></div>而南海尤居剧地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372415_comment'></div>旧制辄得临莅诸管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372415_comment'></div>参酌庶务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372415_comment'></div>兹惟郡僚温等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372415_comment'></div>受知于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372415_comment'></div>为报不易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372415_comment'></div>勤尽检白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372415_comment'></div>可以无瑕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372415_comment'></div>可依前件。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1372415_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　元和十五年至长庆元年间起草《剑南西川节度使下将士叙勋》制，姑系于此。<div id='poem_1372294' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372294' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372294?labeling=true' target='_blank'>剑南西川节度使下将士史宪等叙勋制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1372294'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372294'>门下。剑南西川节度使下准制叙勋将士朝议大夫试太子家令上护军史宪等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372294_comment'></div>蜀形胜之地也。南控蛮蜑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372294_comment'></div>西扼戎羌。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372294", 1372294, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>厉禁</span>之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372294_comment'></div>实赖汝三千八百六十有六人之力。使之必报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372294_comment'></div>并赐崇勋。各懋乃诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372294_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372294", 1372294, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>勖率</span>以敬。可结前件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372294_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1372294_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　元和十五年至长庆元年间起草《王迪贬永州司马》制，姑系于此。<div id='poem_1372274' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372274' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_1372274_comment'></div>据其赃罪。合寘重条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372274_comment'></div>言事者以为伐蔡之时。陷其家属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372274_comment'></div>适遭蜂虿。并为鲸鲵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372274_comment'></div>尚念尔于兹。当从末减。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　元和十五年至长庆元年间起草《王悦昭武校尉行左千牛备身》制，姑系于此。<div id='poem_1372275' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372275' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_7_1372277_comment'></div>付以密命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372277_comment'></div>巳事而复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372277_comment'></div>终无漏言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372278_comment'></div>内捍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372278", 1372278, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>郊圻</span>。外攘夷狄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372278_comment'></div>故吾特命礼乐诗书之上将。俾为长城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372278_comment'></div>立监临戎。亦慎兹选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372278_comment'></div>以尔自更事任。巳著公方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372278_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372278", 1372278, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>端介</span>而不失人心。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372278", 1372278, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>谦和</span>而能宣朕命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372278_comment'></div>宠以将军之号。仍加内省之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372278_comment'></div>复职旧藩。勉终前效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372278_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1372278_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　元和十五年至长庆元年间起草《邵常政内侍省内谒者监》制，姑系于此。<div id='poem_1372279' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372279' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372279?labeling=true' target='_blank'>邵常政等可内侍省内谒者监制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_5_1372279_comment'></div>绩效甄明者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372279_comment'></div>必择其良能而分命焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372279_comment'></div>而不离于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1372279", 1372279, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>荣近</span>矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372279_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　元和十五年至长庆元年间起草《宋常春等内仆局令》，姑系于此。<div id='poem_1372280' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372280' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372280?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋常春等可内侍省内仆局令制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372280")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372280_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372280'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372280'>敕。近制选<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1372280", 1372280, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>内臣</span>之善于其职者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372280_comment'></div>监视诸镇。盖所以将我腹心之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372280_comment'></div>达于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372280", 1372280, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>爪牙</span>之士也。宣义郎行内侍宋常春等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372280_comment'></div>皆以谨信多才。得参侍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372280_comment'></div>更掌上府。尤见吏能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372280_comment'></div>守官无毫发之暇。励巳有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372280", 1372280, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>冰霜</span>之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372280_comment'></div>迹其声实。可备监临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372280_comment'></div>汝其往哉。予用训尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372280_comment'></div>夫处众莫若顺。犯众则不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372280_comment'></div>约身莫若廉。奉身则不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372280_comment'></div>推是两者。引而伸之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372280_comment'></div>然后入可以近天子之光。出可以护将军之旅矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372280_comment'></div>罔或失坠。以贻后艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372280_comment'></div>勉当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372280", 1372280, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>柱国</span>之荣。无忘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372280", 1372280, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>立表</span>之誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372280_comment'></div>全实可宣德郎行内侍省宫闱局令员外置同正员。常春可徵仕郎内侍省内仆局令员外置同正员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372280_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1372280_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　元和十五年至长庆元年间起草《郑氏封才人》制，姑系于此。<div id='poem_1372295' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372295' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372295?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郑氏封才人制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372295_comment'></div>将听鸡鸣之诗。岂惟鱼贯之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372295_comment'></div>郑氏山东令族。海内良家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372295_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1372295_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　元和十五年至长庆元年间起草《授罗让工部员外郎制》，姑系于此。<div id='poem_1372321' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372321' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1372321'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372321'>敕。义成军前度支判官朝议郎检校刑部员外郎兼侍御史上柱国赐绯鱼袋罗让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372321_comment'></div>昔陶宏景一代高人。始愿四十为尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372321_comment'></div>而犹不遂。国朝选署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372321_comment'></div>尤用其良。以尔让敏而好学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372321_comment'></div>直而能温。甲乙亟登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372321_comment'></div>班资历践。顷将军辟士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372321_comment'></div>权资孙楚之坐筹。今曹府抡材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372321_comment'></div>复奖马宫之射策。无忘辨护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372321_comment'></div>以宣程品。日省月试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372321_comment'></div>用劝百工。可尚书工部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372321_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1372321_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　元和十五年至长庆元年间起草《授嗣虢王溥等少仆少卿制》，姑系于此。<div id='poem_1372324' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372324' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_0_1372324_comment'></div>昔我宪宗章武皇帝法尧睦族。深惟本枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372324_comment'></div>乃诏执事曰。伯父叔季幼子童孙在属籍者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372324_comment'></div>逢可守袁王府长史。馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372324_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1372324_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a id='poem_sentence_3_1372326_comment'></div>谦能养勇。明以资忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372326_comment'></div>卑飞翕翼于未击之前。痛心疾首于见危之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372326_comment'></div>常<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作能）</span>擒狡猾。克定妖氛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372326_comment'></div>行赏计功。屡升荣级。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372326_comment'></div>朕爱其忠厚。难以外迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372326_comment'></div>稍移娄胃之间。不失爪牙之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372326_comment'></div>为吾守禁。勉尔干城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372326_comment'></div>可检校兵部尚书兼左卫上将。依前充皇城使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372338_comment'></div>尹正务重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372338_comment'></div>自掾属巳下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372338_comment'></div>至于邦畿之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372338_comment'></div>往往选署以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372338_comment'></div>从而可之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372338_comment'></div>亦委任责成之义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372338_comment'></div>以尔等或理谋居最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372338_comment'></div>或保任称能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372338_comment'></div>将委剧曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372338_comment'></div>亦专近邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372338_comment'></div>各懋乃职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372338_comment'></div>用酬尔知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372338_comment'></div>可依前件。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1372338_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　元和十五年至长庆元年间起草《授萧睦凤州周载渝州刺史制》，姑系于此。<div id='poem_1372341' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372341' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372341?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授萧睦凤州周载渝州刺史制</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372341")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372341_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372341'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372341'>敕。前剑南三川榷盐判官殿中侍御史内供奉萧睦前知盐铁转运山南东道院事殿中侍御史周载等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372341_comment'></div>由文学古。施于有政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372341_comment'></div>三验所至。莫非良能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372341_comment'></div>河池近藩。南平东险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372341_comment'></div>绥戎阜俗。必藉长才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372341_comment'></div>副我虚求<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作怀）</span>。牧兹凋瘵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372341_comment'></div>事时农劝。用节人安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372341_comment'></div>三年有成。惟乃之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372341_comment'></div>睦可凤州刺史。载可渝州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372341_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1372341_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　元和十五年至长庆元年间起草《授卢㟧监察里行宣州判官制》，姑系于此。<div id='poem_1372343' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372343' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372343'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372343'>敕。卢㟧等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372343_comment'></div>宣城重地。较缗之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372343_comment'></div>岁不下百馀万。管干剧职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372343_comment'></div>灵盐近戎。分务简僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372343_comment'></div>不易宜称。尔等研究儒术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372343_comment'></div>修明政经。勉慎所从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372343_comment'></div>以承其长。可依前件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372343_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1372343_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　元和十五年至长庆元年间起草《授杨进亳州长史制》，姑系于此。<div id='poem_1372344' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372344' class='poemTitle class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372344_comment'></div>奸谋指日。忠告先期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372344_comment'></div>俾无赪尾之灾。实赖赤心之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372344_comment'></div>虽居禁卫。未免食贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372344_comment'></div>言念前劳。宜沾厚秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372344_comment'></div>式佐郡府。仍壮军容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372344_comment'></div>尚旌扑灭之功。以示优崇之赏。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　元和十五年至长庆元年间起草《于季友授右羽林将军制》，姑系于此。<div id='poem_1372377' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372377' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_1372377_comment'></div>佽飞超乘挽强之士在焉。董之以威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372377_comment'></div>待之以信。分八含之众寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372377_comment'></div>均二广之劳逸。不吴不扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372377_comment'></div>不掉不挫。皆将军之命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372377_comment'></div>是以李大亮上直禁中。而文皇甘寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372377_comment'></div>则心腹爪牙之任。斯不细矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372377_comment'></div>以尔季友。时予旧姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372377_comment'></div>念往兴怀。度才思用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372377_comment'></div>荣以<span id='poem_sentence_1_1372401_comment'></div>大理寺专狱犴。视刑书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372401_comment'></div>我国家生人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372401", 1372401, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>司命</span>也。任非其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372401_comment'></div>为患不细。前鄜坊丹延等州观察判官侍御史内供奉赐绯鱼袋袁重光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372265_comment'></div>悠扬绿水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372265_comment'></div>讶合浦之同归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372265_comment'></div>缭绕青霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372265_comment'></div>环五星之一气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372265_comment'></div>望明月而宛转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372265_comment'></div>感潜鲛之歔欷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372265_comment'></div>若非象照乘之珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372265_comment'></div>安能忘在齐之味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372265_comment'></div>其始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372265_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1372265", 1372265, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>长言</span>逦迤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372265_comment'></div>度曲缠绵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372265_comment'></div>吟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1372265", 1372265, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>断章</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1372265", 1372265, "Clauses/27/Comments/1")'>离离</span>若间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372265_comment'></div>引<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1372265", 1372265, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>妙啭</span>而一一皆圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372265_comment'></div>小大虽伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372265_comment'></div>离朱视之而不见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372265_comment'></div>唱和相续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372265_comment'></div>师乙美之而谓连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372265_comment'></div>当其拂树弥长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372265_comment'></div>凌风乍直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372265_comment'></div>意出弹者与高音而臻极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372265_comment'></div>及夫属思渐繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372265_comment'></div>因声屡有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372265_comment'></div>想无胫者随促节而奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372265_comment'></div>以洞彻为精英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372265_comment'></div>比瑕疵于能否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372265_comment'></div>次第其韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372265_comment'></div>且<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1372265", 1372265, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>殷勤</span>于士衡之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372265_comment'></div>上下其音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372265_comment'></div>谓低昂于游女之手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372265_comment'></div>窈窕远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372265_comment'></div>徘徊<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1372265", 1372265, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>绎如</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372265_comment'></div>髣髴成象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372265_comment'></div>玲珑构虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372265_comment'></div>频寄词于章句之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372265_comment'></div>愿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1372265", 1372265, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>连光</span>于咳唾之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372265_comment'></div>清而且圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372265_comment'></div>直而不散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372265_comment'></div>方同累丸之重叠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372265_comment'></div>岂比沉泉之撩乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372265_comment'></div>惧无知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372265_comment'></div>初悯默于暗投。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372265_comment'></div>善则返之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372265_comment'></div>乃因循于旧贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372265_comment'></div>美<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1372265", 1372265, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>清泠</span>而发越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372265_comment'></div>忆辉光之璀璨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372265_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1372265", 1372265, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>始终</span>虽异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372265_comment'></div>细大靡殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372265_comment'></div>中规矩于圆折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372265_comment'></div>成条贯以萦纡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372265_comment'></div>似是而非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372265_comment'></div>赋湛露则方惊缀冕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372265_comment'></div>有声无实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372265_comment'></div>歌芳树而空想垂珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372265_comment'></div>美恶难掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372265_comment'></div>前后不踰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372265_comment'></div>亦比抡材而至者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372265_comment'></div>岂独善歌之谓乎。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1372265_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　元和十五年至长庆元年间起草《封乌重胤妻张氏邓国夫人制》，姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年10月</a>　裴度弹劾元稹结交宦官，元稹罢学士，出为工部侍郎，有诗。作品：《自责》<div id='poem_6220' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6220' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6220?labeling=true' target='_blank'>自责</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_6220'>他时得见牛常侍，为尔君前捧佩刀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6220'></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年12月</a>　李景俭贬漳州刺史，元稹作诗别之。作品：《别毅郎》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　冬，刘禹锡迁夔州刺史，或出于元稹之提携。元稹亲承圣旨，令隐王建《宫词》。传令狐楚表荐张裕，元稹抑之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　是年，有感事之诗。作品：《感事三首》<div id='poem_6382' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6382' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6382?labeling=true' target='_blank'>感事三首<span class='inlineComment2'>（此后并是学士时作）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6382")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6382_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6382'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6382'>为国谋羊舌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，从来不为身。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6382'>此心长自保，终不学张陈<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6382'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6382'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6382_0'>⑴ “为国”句：谓自己忠诚报国，不谋私利。羊舌，复姓羊舌氏。《通志·氏族志》：“或言羊舌氏，姓季名果。有人盗杀羊而遗其头，不敢不受，受而埋之。后盗事发，词连季氏，乃据而示之，此明己不食，惟舌存而已。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6382_0'>⑵ 张陈：张耳、陈馀之并称。二人均为大梁名士，彼此为刎颈之交，但在楚汉之争中，发生权势冲突，陈馀最终死于张耳之手。事详《史记·张耳陈馀列传》（卷八九）。后因以为同阵营者因权势而成仇之典。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6382_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6383' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6383' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6383?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6383_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6383'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6383'>自笑心何劣，区区辨所冤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6383_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6383'>伯仁虽到死，终不向人言<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6383_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6383'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6383_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6383'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6383_0'>⑴ “伯仁”二句：周顗，字伯仁，晋元帝时为仆射，与王导交厚。永昌元年，导之堂兄江州刺史王敦起兵反，导赴阙待罪。顗于元帝前为导辩护，帝纳其言而导不知。及敦入朝，问导如何处置顗，导不对，敦遂杀顗。后导知顗曾救己，流涕曰：“吾虽不杀伯仁，伯仁由我而死。幽冥之中，负此良友！”事详《晋书·周顗传》。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6383_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6384' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6384' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6384?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　是年，有《长庆宫辞》一诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（（亡佚））</span><div id='poem_6173' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6173' class='poemTitle class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6606?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄赠薛涛<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6606")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6606_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6606_0'>① 稹闻西蜀薛涛有辞辩，及为监察使蜀，以御史推鞫，难得见焉。严司空潜知其意，每遣薛往，洎登翰林，以诗寄之。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6606'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6606'>锦江<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6606", 6606, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>滑腻</span>蛾眉秀，幻出文君与薛涛。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6606'>言语巧偷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6606", 6606, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>鹦鹉舌</span>，文章分得凤皇毛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6606'>纷纷辞客多停笔，个个公卿欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6606", 6606, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>梦刀</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6606'>别后相思隔烟水，菖蒲花发五云高。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6606'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6606_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_6606'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(6606)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年2月</a>　王廷凑、朱克融围牛元翼于深州，官军三面救之，财竭力尽，竟无成功。元稹劝穆宗罢兵。韩愈冒险选慰王廷凑，元稹为之担忧。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年2月</a>　崔植罢为刑部尚书，元稹同平章事。白居易为元稹草谢官表。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年3月</a>　与李绅同荐庞严为翰林学士。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年3月</a>　左骁卫上将军张奉国卒，元稹为其撰墓志铭。作品：《唐故开府仪同三司检校兵部尚书兼左骁卫上将军充大内皇城留守御史大夫上柱国南阳郡王赠某官碑文铭》<div id='poem_1372520' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372520' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372520?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故开府仪同三司检校兵部尚书兼左骁卫上将军充大内皇城留守御史大夫上柱国南阳郡王赠某官碑文铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372520")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372520_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372520'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372520'>南阳王姓张氏。讳奉国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372520_comment'></div>本名子良。以某年月日薨于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372520_comment'></div>其子岌哭于其党曰。唐制三品以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372520_comment'></div>殁既葬。碑于墓以文其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372520_comment'></div>我父当得碑。家且贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372520_comment'></div>无以买其文。卿大夫谁我肯哀者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372520_comment'></div>由是因其舅捧南阳王所受制诰凡八通。历抵卿大夫之为文者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372520_comment'></div>予与焉。予故闻南阳王忠功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372520_comment'></div>每义之。然其请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372520_comment'></div>明日。子岌状其故闻官阀以告曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372520_comment'></div>我南阳西鄂人。我高祖盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372520_comment'></div>左武卫将军闲厩使。我曾祖兰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372520_comment'></div>朝散大夫沙州别驾。我祖景春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372520_comment'></div>朝请大夫太仆少卿。我父南阳王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372520_comment'></div>太仆府君之第某子也。少学读经史子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372520_comment'></div>至古今成败之言。尤所穷究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372520_comment'></div>遂贯穿于神枢鬼藏之间。而尽得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>擒纵</span>弛张之术矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372520_comment'></div>大历末。始以戎服事郭汾阳于邠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372520_comment'></div>建中中。以骑五百讨希烈于蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372520_comment'></div>遭太夫人丧。号叫请罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372520_comment'></div>遂克<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>终制</span>。仆射张建封以寿帅移于徐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372520_comment'></div>始以涡口三城授于我。仆射殁而徐师乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372520_comment'></div>子乘乱以自立。王不忍讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372520_comment'></div>以师二万归于润。德宗异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372520_comment'></div>诏召至京。授侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372520_comment'></div>复职于浙西。就加御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372520_comment'></div>又加国子祭酒。是元和之元年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372520_comment'></div>二年。李锜叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372520_comment'></div>王擒之以献。加检校工部尚书兼右金吾卫将军御史大夫上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372520_comment'></div>进封南阳郡王。食实封一百五十户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372520_comment'></div>遂锡嘉名。寻迁检校刑部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372520_comment'></div>充振武麟胜等州节度营田观察处置等使。复以刑部尚书兼左金吾卫将军御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372520_comment'></div>历左龙武统军鸿胪卿。就加检校兵部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372520_comment'></div>转左骁卫上将军。充大内皇城留守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372520_comment'></div>以疾薨。寿八十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372520_comment'></div>特诏赠某官。我南阳郡夫人熊氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372520_comment'></div>祖元皓。皇朝礼部尚书左金吾卫将军进国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372520_comment'></div>岌与嵩。南阳夫人之二子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372520_comment'></div>嵩任某官。岌以某官夺丧制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372520_comment'></div>葬以某年月日于某地。岌不肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372520_comment'></div>能言先将军之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>职官</span>。而不能知先将军之勋业矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372520_comment'></div>乞为碑。予按仆射张建封以贞元十六年薨于徐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372520_comment'></div>徐人立其子愔求命。南阳王不义其所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372520_comment'></div>以涡之众尽弃去。由是泗濠之守皆据郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372520_comment'></div>愔不能令卒帖徐。由南阳王之断其臂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372520_comment'></div>元和之二年。润帅锜求觐京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372520_comment'></div>既许之。不克觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372520_comment'></div>辱中贵人。杀其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>臣寮</span>以令下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372520_comment'></div>杨帅锷以叛告。朝廷甚忧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372520_comment'></div>初锜筦盐于润有年矣。削虐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>暴狠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372520_comment'></div>其下甚畏之。而库庾之藏以亿计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372520_comment'></div>润之师故南韩晋公之所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>教训</span>。弩劲剑利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372520_comment'></div>号为难当。是时初定蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372520_comment'></div>兵始散。物力未完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372520_comment'></div>加诛于锜。甚难之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372520_comment'></div>宪宗皇帝不得已下诛诏。不浃日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372520_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>露章</span>自润曰。十月十二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372520_comment'></div>锜就擒。从乱者无遗馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372520_comment'></div>问其状。则曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372520_comment'></div>锜既叛。以是月十一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372520_comment'></div>命南阳王田少卿李奉仙率锐众以图池。南阳王喜养士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372520_comment'></div>又能为逆顺言。明日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372520_comment'></div>与二将誓所部回讨。锜城守不敢出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372520_comment'></div>环其城。是夕攻愈急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372520_comment'></div>锜众<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>坏散</span>。缒于城下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372520_comment'></div>遂就擒。自是南阳王勋名显于代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372520_comment'></div>性<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/132/Comments/0")'>卑顺</span>不伐。在振武时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372520_comment'></div>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>检俭</span>同士卒劳苦。居馀官皆谨慎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>专至</span>如不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372520_comment'></div>在朝廷十馀年。似无功能者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372520_comment'></div>未尝图进取。薨之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372520_comment'></div>家甚贫。几无以葬其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372520_comment'></div>天子怜之。废视朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372520_comment'></div>赙布帛。给班剑鼓吹以葬之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372520_comment'></div>呜呼。举三十年为言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372520_comment'></div>其间至将相者凡百数。耳目相远之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372520_comment'></div>非其子孙能识其姓名者。十不能一二焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372520_comment'></div>若南阳王缚锜弃愔。全徐完润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372520_comment'></div>自取爵位。以贻不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372520_comment'></div>无几希矣。碑于其墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372520_comment'></div>不亦宜乎。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372520_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_80_1372520'>在昔徐帅。知于南阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372520_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/162/Comments/0")'>付授</span>兵柄。涡俾为防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372520_comment'></div>徐丧其帅。徐人恃强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372520_comment'></div>强以愔嗣。不归其丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372520_comment'></div>我欲尽殄。愔亦与亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372520_comment'></div>不忍自我。焚其构堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372520_comment'></div>我或不去。愔童必猖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372520_comment'></div>猖甚则蹶。其能久长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372520_comment'></div>乃挈万众。宾于邻疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372520_comment'></div>愔果惴惴。不假不狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372520_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/180/Comments/0")'>逮及</span>终殁。全归其吭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372520_comment'></div>润锜待我。不踰于行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372520_comment'></div>一日叛诞。肆其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_92_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/185/Comments/0")'>昏荒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372520_comment'></div>我乃遽取。归之天王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372520_comment'></div>非不可杀。示人不戕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372520_comment'></div>报愔以惠。报锜以常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372520_comment'></div>称示<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1372520", 1372520, "Clauses/192/Comments/0")'>厚薄</span>。俾之相当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372520_comment'></div>克勇克义。不伐不扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372520_comment'></div>铭于墓石。以永无疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372520_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_99_1372520_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　春，李景俭以元稹之故，迁楚州刺史，改少府少监。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年5月</a>　李赏受李逢吉指使，诬告元稹欲遣人刺杀裴度，诏韩皋、郑覃、李逢吉按验，无状，而元稹与于方合谋使牛元翼事因之公开。京兆尹刘遵古遣吏潜逻元稹宅，元稹奏之，刘遵古被罚俸一月。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年6月</a>　为工部侍郎、同中书门下平章事时撰有墓志铭，姑系于此。作品：《故中书令赠太尉沂国公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1372525' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372525' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372525?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故中书令赠太尉沂国公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372525")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372525_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372525'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372525'>长庆二年某月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372525_comment'></div>司礼氏持第一品幰弩已下备卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372525_comment'></div>椎钲鼓鸣铙箫笳笛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372525_comment'></div>前导我沂国公洎某国夫人某氏合葬于某县某乡某里某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372525_comment'></div>先是沂国嗣子肇乞予铭墓石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372525_comment'></div>按沂国公姓田氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372525_comment'></div>讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372525_comment'></div>字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372525_comment'></div>平州卢龙人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372525_comment'></div>曾祖璟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372525_comment'></div>官至郑州别驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372525_comment'></div>祖延恽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372525_comment'></div>官至安东都护府司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372525_comment'></div>沂国既贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372525_comment'></div>赠尚书右仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372525_comment'></div>父庭玠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372525_comment'></div>官至银青光禄大夫相州刺史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372525_comment'></div>沂国既贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372525_comment'></div>累赠至司空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372525_comment'></div>公本讳兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372525_comment'></div>司空第某子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372525_comment'></div>幼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1372525", 1372525, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>敏隽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372525_comment'></div>年十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372525_comment'></div>为魏博衙前都知兵马使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372525_comment'></div>自是魏剧地剧职尽更之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372525_comment'></div>由太子宾客沂国公累加殿中御史侍御史中丞秘书监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372525_comment'></div>元和七年同节度副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372525_comment'></div>步射之众皆隶焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372525_comment'></div>魏帅季安卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372525_comment'></div>子怀谏始十馀岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372525_comment'></div>恶辈树之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372525_comment'></div>不累月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372525_comment'></div>魏法大坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372525_comment'></div>一旦万众相叫噪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372525_comment'></div>皆曰田中丞当为帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372525_comment'></div>公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372525_comment'></div>叱叱止止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372525_comment'></div>众曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372525_comment'></div>何谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372525_comment'></div>公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372525_comment'></div>尔辈牵制孺子犹一累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372525_comment'></div>吾焉能受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372525_comment'></div>尔辈即欲受吾使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372525_comment'></div>用我乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372525_comment'></div>皆曰诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372525_comment'></div>公曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372525_comment'></div>孺子之家敢有辱者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372525_comment'></div>擅杀人者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372525_comment'></div>掠财者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372525_comment'></div>天子未命敢有言吾麾节者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372525_comment'></div>讫吾世敢有不从吾忠孝者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372525_comment'></div>汝辈可乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372525_comment'></div>皆曰可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372525_comment'></div>公乃状其事于先帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372525_comment'></div>先帝大悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372525_comment'></div>降工部尚书魏博相卫贝澶六州节度支度营田观察处置制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372525_comment'></div>刻节以授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372525_comment'></div>而又赐缗钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372525_comment'></div>赦死罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372525_comment'></div>复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1372525", 1372525, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>租入</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372525_comment'></div>公乃献地图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372525_comment'></div>编<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1372525", 1372525, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>口籍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372525_comment'></div>修职贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372525_comment'></div>上吏员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372525_comment'></div>凡魏之废置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372525_comment'></div>不关于有司者悉罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372525_comment'></div>军司马已下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372525_comment'></div>皆请命于廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372525_comment'></div>然后斩暴乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372525_comment'></div>叙劳旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372525_comment'></div>除<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1372525", 1372525, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>僭异</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372525_comment'></div>弛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1372525", 1372525, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>禁闭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372525_comment'></div>家家始以灯火相会聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372525_comment'></div>亲戚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1372525", 1372525, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>吉凶</span>通吊问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372525_comment'></div>出入封无所诘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372525_comment'></div>魏之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372525_comment'></div>老者闻见平时多出涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372525_comment'></div>少者不知所以然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372525_comment'></div>百辟四方皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1372525", 1372525, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>奉贺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372525_comment'></div>明年锡嘉名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372525_comment'></div>又明年加仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372525_comment'></div>十三年子布功于蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372525_comment'></div>加司空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372525_comment'></div>十四年帅师克东平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372525_comment'></div>加司徒平章宰相事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372525_comment'></div>八月朝京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372525_comment'></div>乞侍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372525_comment'></div>先帝付以山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372525_comment'></div>加侍中实封以遣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372525_comment'></div>十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372525_comment'></div>会上新即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372525_comment'></div>成德表帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372525_comment'></div>上曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372525_comment'></div>非吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_93_1372525", 1372525, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>勋贤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372525_comment'></div>莫可入者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372525_comment'></div>转中书令以往焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372525_comment'></div>是日命子布节度河阳以张之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372525_comment'></div>公既入镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372525_comment'></div>去就事法犹在魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372525_comment'></div>魏之人相与立石乞文于陛下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372525_comment'></div>陛下诏臣稹为文以付之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372525_comment'></div>先是瀛之乐寿博野入于镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372525_comment'></div>公乃奏归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372525_comment'></div>长庆元年七月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372525_comment'></div>幽州乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372525_comment'></div>公即日命将悉帅麾下集于境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372525_comment'></div>镇人初受制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372525_comment'></div>未惯用于王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372525_comment'></div>是月二十八日潜作乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372525_comment'></div>公薨于师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372525_comment'></div>年至五十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372525_comment'></div>天子震悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372525_comment'></div>罢五日朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372525_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_113_1372525", 1372525, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>册赠</span>太尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1372525_comment'></div>下诏徵天下兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1372525_comment'></div>且命子布脱缞绖总魏师以自报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372525_comment'></div>兵势未合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372525_comment'></div>布冤愤自杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372525_comment'></div>遂罢讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372525_comment'></div>三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1372525_comment'></div>镇人归其丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1372525_comment'></div>诏葬有加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1372525_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1372525_comment'></div>魏之法虐切疑忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1372525_comment'></div>诸将以才多死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1372525_comment'></div>公既故为刺史子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1372525_comment'></div>又多才好读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1372525_comment'></div>识理乱形势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1372525_comment'></div>孝友信义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1372525_comment'></div>士众多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_129_1372525", 1372525, "Clauses/129/Comments/0")'>附服</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1372525_comment'></div>官望已重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1372525_comment'></div>不宜免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1372525_comment'></div>然而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_132_1372525", 1372525, "Clauses/132/Comments/0")'>晦养</span>谨慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1372525_comment'></div>不下二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1372525_comment'></div>讫无祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1372525_comment'></div>用是建大勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1372525_comment'></div>更大镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1372525_comment'></div>模样声名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1372525_comment'></div>施于后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1372525_comment'></div>身以忠殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1372525_comment'></div>子以孝殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1372525_comment'></div>累累在坟下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1372525_comment'></div>如公几何人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1372525_comment'></div>公若干男。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1372525_comment'></div>若干女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1372525_comment'></div>子布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1372525_comment'></div>终魏博节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1372525_comment'></div>子肇。<div id='poem_sentence_149_1372525_comment'></div>某将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1372525_comment'></div>子某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1372525_comment'></div>某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1372525_comment'></div>子某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1372525_comment'></div>某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1372525_comment'></div>女邵氏某氏妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1372525_comment'></div>近世勋将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1372525_comment'></div>尤贵富者言李郭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1372525_comment'></div>然而汾阳西平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1372525_comment'></div>犹不得父子并世为节制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1372525_comment'></div>公与子布同日登将坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1372525_comment'></div>诸子洎伯季。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1372525_comment'></div>龟緺金银。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1372525_comment'></div>被腰佩者十数人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1372525_comment'></div>不亦多乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1372525_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1372525_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_166_1372525'>忠乎仁乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1372525_comment'></div>可以用于彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1372525_comment'></div>而不可用于此乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1372525_comment'></div>何魏人之不我以异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1372525_comment'></div>而镇人之不与我为徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1372525_comment'></div>化苌宏而为血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1372525_comment'></div>辨青旂于苇蒲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1372525_comment'></div>感异物之先兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1372525_comment'></div>岂人力之能图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1372525_comment'></div>送横之客歌薤露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1372525_comment'></div>吁嗟沂公今已乎。</div><div id='poem_sentence_176_1372525_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年6月</a>　与裴度俱罢相，出为同州刺史兼长春宫使，李逢吉渔人得利，同平章事。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='32907bf3ba034b98ab04d7add354f77d_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=829&endYear=829')">829年</a>　赴京途中疑遇腾珦，有诗，姑系于此。作品：《赠致仕滕庶子先辈》<span class='inlineComment2'>（（疑伪））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=829&endYear=829')">829年</a>　岁杪，至长安。冬，裴淑生子，名道护。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年1月</a>　除检校户部尚书、兼鄂州刺史、御史大夫、武昌节度使。诏下，妻裴淑不乐，元稹以诗慰之，裴淑亦以诗相答。作品：《赠柔之》<div id='poem_6691' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6691' class='poemTitle id='poem_content_6691'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6691'>穷冬到乡国，正岁别京华。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6691_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6691_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6691'>嫁得浮云婿，相随即是家。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6691_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
宝鸡（天兴）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='f801ed005f0b44a8914cab2a76c7f86b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f801ed005f0b44a8914cab2a76c7f86b");'><span id='f801ed005f0b44a8914cab2a76c7f86b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=786&endYear=793')">786-793年</a>，8-15岁</div><div id='f801ed005f0b44a8914cab2a76c7f86b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=786&endYear=786')">786年</a>　为减少家庭开支，郑氏携元积、元稹赴凤翔，依靠舅族。郑氏亲自教育元积、元稹。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=787&endYear=787')">787年</a>　在凤翔，丁父忧。从姨兄胡灵之学诗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=788&endYear=788')">788年</a>　在凤翔，丁父忧。借书求学，以陆翰为师。识从姨兄吴士矩、吴士则。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=789&endYear=789')">789年</a>　在凤翔。父服已除。此后，常与胡灵之、吴士矩等游宴，自负擅长酒令，放浪形骸。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=790&endYear=790')">790年</a>　在凤翔。郑云逵为秘书少监。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=791&endYear=791')">791年</a>　在凤翔。约本年或稍后与吴士矩分散。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=792&endYear=792')">792年</a>　在凤翔。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=793')">793年</a>　冬以前，在凤翔。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
合阳（夏阳）
-----detail

id='poem_sentence_22_1372529_comment'></div>以谏废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372529_comment'></div>在隋为兵部尚书昌平公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372529_comment'></div>以忠进。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1372529_comment'></div>降五世而生我皇考府君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372529_comment'></div>府君讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372529_comment'></div>以四教垂子孙。<div id='poem_sentence_32_1372529_comment'></div>学次之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372529_comment'></div>政成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372529_comment'></div>当乾元广德之间。<div
