1372529, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>环岁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372529_comment'></div>或未<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1372529", 1372529, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>浃时</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372529_comment'></div>而五命自天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372529_comment'></div>非夫公不来则人不苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372529_comment'></div>公不迁则善不耸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372529_comment'></div>何是之速也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372529_comment'></div>董方书奏议者凡八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372529_comment'></div>其在比部郎中也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372529_comment'></div>宗人得罪有不察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372529_comment'></div>夫玉与珉类而不杂者屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372529_comment'></div>我府君为虢州别驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372529_comment'></div>累迁舒王府长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372529_comment'></div>至则悬车息宴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372529_comment'></div>浩如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372529_comment'></div>尝著百叶书要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372529_comment'></div>以萃群言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372529_comment'></div>秘牒一开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372529_comment'></div>则万卷皆废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372529_comment'></div>由□惧夫百氏之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372529_comment'></div>一归于我囿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372529_comment'></div>所不乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372529_comment'></div>故世莫得传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372529_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372529_comment'></div>盛德大业至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372529_comment'></div>不峻其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372529_comment'></div>不流其化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372529_comment'></div>时哉时哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372529_comment'></div>我外祖睦州刺史荥阳郑公讳济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372529_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1372529", 1372529, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>官族</span>甲天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372529_comment'></div>我太夫人圣善仪六姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372529_comment'></div>训子妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372529_comment'></div>以悯默罚婢仆佣保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372529_comment'></div>以庄厉为鞭笞用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372529_comment'></div>至于儿稚不能名夏楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372529_comment'></div>而嗃嗃于他门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372529_comment'></div>肆我伯姊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372529_comment'></div>穆其严风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372529_comment'></div>柔以慈旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372529_comment'></div>于人有加矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372529_comment'></div>生十四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372529_comment'></div>遂归于吴郡陆翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372529_comment'></div>翰国朝左侍极兼右相敦信之元孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372529_comment'></div>临汝令泌之元子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372529_comment'></div>魏出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372529_comment'></div>魏之先文贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372529_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1372529", 1372529, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>匡君</span>之大德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372529_comment'></div>翰少孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372529_comment'></div>事亲以至行立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372529_comment'></div>释褐太平主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372529_comment'></div>我姊由是而归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372529_comment'></div>逮陆君之宰夏阳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372529_comment'></div>事姑垂二十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372529_comment'></div>姑爱之若慈母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372529_comment'></div>妇敬之若严君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372529_comment'></div>虽母兄之馈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372529_comment'></div>不授于姑则不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372529_comment'></div>而况于私其财乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372529_comment'></div>闺门之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372529_comment'></div>未尝以往复之言闻婢仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372529_comment'></div>而况于相色乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372529_comment'></div>及太夫人之沈痼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372529_comment'></div>夫人亦不利行作有年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372529_comment'></div>然而药不尝于口则不进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372529_comment'></div>衣不出于手则不献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372529_comment'></div>冬之夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372529_comment'></div>夏之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372529_comment'></div>环侍其侧者周二三岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372529_comment'></div>衣不释体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372529_comment'></div>倦不形色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372529_comment'></div>曾不以己之疾为瘉矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372529_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372529_comment'></div>闵之养其亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372529_comment'></div>方于此何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372529_comment'></div>吾不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372529_comment'></div>至于陆君之在疚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372529_comment'></div>克哀敬以终之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1372529_comment'></div>旧疾暴加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1372529_comment'></div>不数日而衅作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372529_comment'></div>陆君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_116_1372529", 1372529, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>縻职</span>他县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372529_comment'></div>至则无及矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372529_comment'></div>将诀之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372529_comment'></div>子号女泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1372529_comment'></div>问其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_120_1372529", 1372529, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>遗训</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1372529_comment'></div>则曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1372529_comment'></div>吾幼也辞家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1372529_comment'></div>报亲日短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1372529_comment'></div>今则已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1372529_comment'></div>不见吾亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1372529_comment'></div>亲乎亲乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1372529_comment'></div>西望而绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1372529_comment'></div>痛夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1372529_comment'></div>孝于亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1372529_comment'></div>敬于姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1372529_comment'></div>顺于夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1372529_comment'></div>友于兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1372529_comment'></div>辞世之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1372529_comment'></div>母不获抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1372529_comment'></div>夫不及决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1372529_comment'></div>兄不得临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1372529_comment'></div>弟不得侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1372529_comment'></div>天乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_138_1372529", 1372529, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>淑善</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1372529_comment'></div>反以为罪乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1372529_comment'></div>二女曰燕曰迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1372529_comment'></div>两男师道峤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1372529_comment'></div>夫人兄沂兄秬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1372529_comment'></div>弟积弟稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1372529_comment'></div>或游远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1372529_comment'></div>或守官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1372529_comment'></div>或归养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1372529_comment'></div>皆不克会葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1372529_comment'></div>陆君先是职于使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1372529_comment'></div>又不克董丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1372529_comment'></div>从父季廙以二子襄事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1372529_comment'></div>礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1372529_comment'></div>我尊夫人有命于小子稹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1372529_comment'></div>吾大惧夫馨香之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1372529_comment'></div>莫炽于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1372529_comment'></div>尔其识之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1372529_comment'></div>是用衔恤陨涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1372529_comment'></div>篆铭于圹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1372529_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1372529_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_159_1372529'>呜呼有唐陆氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1372529_comment'></div>孝夫人元氏之墓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_160_1372529_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='dac16596c6aa4dbc90c5e0c47511e239_label'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年8月</a>　与吕炅同宿于东都陶化坊，相互唱和。作品：《赠吕三校书》<div id='poem_6686' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6686' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6686?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠吕三校书<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6686")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6686_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6686_0'>① 与吕校书同年科第，后为别七年。元和己丑岁八月，偶于陶化坊会宿。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_sentence_3_6686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6686'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6686_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年9月</a>　韦丛庶母段氏卒于洛阳，元稹为其撰墓志铭。作品：《唐左千牛韦佩段氏墓志铭》<div id='poem_1372530' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372530' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372530?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐左千牛韦佩母段氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372530")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372530_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372530'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372530'>唐少保赠仆射韦公幼子左千牛佩。母曰武威段氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372530_comment'></div>故衢州司田参军岌之第二女也。其四代祖褒国公扬州都督赠辅国大将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372530_comment'></div>生曾祖宣州长史讳宏圭。生大父鄜州刺史讳怀本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372530_comment'></div>先是仆射裴夫人早世。女抱子幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372530_comment'></div>思所以仁之者。命主养之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372530_comment'></div>始长安令至于都留守。持门户主婚嫁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372530_comment'></div>殆十五岁。当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372530", 1372530, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>贵大</span>之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372530_comment'></div>处谦谦之势。然而不怨不德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372530_comment'></div>礼得其宜。信难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372530_comment'></div>今仆射丧益不失。非盛勋烈之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372530_comment'></div>其孰能如此哉。元和四年九月十九日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372530_comment'></div>暴疾终于履信第。享年四十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372530_comment'></div>定其年十二月二日。葬于河南县龙门乡之午桥村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372530_comment'></div>凡韦氏之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372530", 1372530, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>族姻</span>闻其丧。莫不亲者悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372530_comment'></div>疏者叹。不亦善处其身哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372530_comment'></div>故仆射诸子洎诸女。皆服兄弟之母服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372530_comment'></div>而哀有加焉。始予亡妻生不月而先夫人殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372530_comment'></div>免水火之灾。成习柔之性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372530_comment'></div>用至于妆栉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1372530", 1372530, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>针组</span>书诫琴瑟之事无遗训。诚有以赖焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372530_comment'></div>是以予妻之言于予曰。离则思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372530_comment'></div>思则梦。梦则悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372530_comment'></div>疾则泣。恋恋然予不知其异所亲矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372530_comment'></div>诀予之际。切以始终于敬为托焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372530_comment'></div>今日之志其终乎。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372530_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1372530'>母以子贵。贵必因人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372530_comment'></div>人本乎祖。祖盛厥勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372530_comment'></div>昔我稚室。没怀其仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372530_comment'></div>仁莫之报。没而有云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372530_comment'></div>今复泯矣。报之斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372530_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1372530_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年10月</a>　遣家人葬韦丛于咸阳县奉贤乡洪渎原，有诗。请韩愈、沈传师书墓志铭。作品：《空屋题》<div id='poem_6549' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6549' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>魂车</span>昨夜回。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6549'></div><div id='poem_6551' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6551' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6551?labeling=true' target='_blank'>城外回谢子蒙见谕</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年10月）</span><span class='reference inlineComment2'>⒁</sup>，柔发难久黫<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒂</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6785'>折支望车乘<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒃</sup>，支痛谁置患。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6785'>奇哉乳臭儿，绯紫绷被间<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒄</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6785'>渐大官渐贵，渐富心渐悭。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6785'>闹装辔头𧤾<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒅</sup>，静拭腰带斑。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6785'>鹞子绣线𩏪<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒆</sup>，狗儿金油<span class='inlineComment2'>（去声）</span>镮<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒇</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6785'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_6785", 6785, "Clauses/56/Comments/1")'>香汤</span>洗骢马<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(21)</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_6785", 6785, "Clauses/57/Comments/1")'>翠篾</span>笼白鹇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(22)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6785'>月请公主封<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(23)</sup>，冰受天子颁<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(24)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6785'>开筵试歌舞，别宅宠妖娴。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6785'>坐卧摩绵<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作锦）</span>褥<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(25)</sup>，捧拥綟丝鬟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(26)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6785'>旦夕不相离，比翼若飞𪈿。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6785'>而我亦何苦，三十身已鳏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(27)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6785'>愁吟心骨颤，寒卧支体𤸷<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(28)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6785'>居处虽幽静，尤悔少愉懒<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(29)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6785'>不如周道士，鹤岭临钟湾<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(30)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6785'>绕院松瑟瑟，通畦水潺潺。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6785'>阳坡自寻蕨<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(31)</sup>，村沼看沤菅<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(32)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_38_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6785'>穷通两未遂，营营真老闲。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6785'></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_6785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6785'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6785_0'>⑴ 食柏：传说服食柏树叶与果实，可以延年或成仙。旧题汉刘向《列仙传·赤须子》（卷下）：“赤须子……好食松实、天门冬、石脂，齿落更生”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6785_0'>⑵ 辛、庾：辛指辛丘度，行大。白居易《代书诗一百韵》自注：“辛大丘度，性迂嗜酒”；庾指庾敬休，字顺之，南阳新野（今属河南）人，与元稹有姻懿关系。参拙著《元稹年谱新编》贞元十年谱文。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6785_0'>⑶ 访：原作“放”，据蜀本、卢本及何焯校改。羸孱：瘦弱之人，此为元稹自称之谦辞。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6785_0'>⑷ 科目：指唐代分科选拔官吏之名目。清顾炎武《日知录·科目》：“唐制，取士之科，有秀才，有明经，有进士，有俊士，有明法，有明字，有明算，有一史，有三史，有开元礼，有道举，有童子；而明经之别，有五经，有三经，有学究一经；有三礼，有三传；有史科。此岁举之常选也。其天子自诏曰制举……见于史者凡五十馀科，故谓之科目。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6785_0'>⑸ 阓与阛：阓，市之门；阛，绕市之墙。《广雅·释宫》：“阛，道也。”王念孙疏證：“案，阛为市垣，阓为市门，而市道即在垣及闸之内，故亦得阛阓之名。”此泛指喧闹之市区。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6785_0'>⑹ 公卿关：唐代科举，举子往往需求助于当权者，使为之称扬，如过道关口，故云。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6785_0'>⑺ 穿杨：形容箭术高明。《史记·周本纪》：“楚有养由基者，善射者也。去柳叶百步而射之，百发而百中之。左右观者数千人，皆曰善射。”此喻指科举及第。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_6785_1'>⑻ 詀諵：低声碎语貌。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_6785_0'>⑼ 齧指：咬指头，形容极为痛心。痛瘝：疾苦，病痛。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6785_0'>⑽ 昏帅：指剑南东川节度使严砺。严砺曾擅没管内将士、官吏、百姓及前资寄住等庄、宅、奴婢及两税外加徵钱米等。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_6785_0'>⑾ 殷：赤黑色。《左传·成公二年》：“自始合，而矢贯余手及肘，余折以御，左轮朱殷，岂敢言病？”杜预注：“殷，音近烟，今人谓赤黑色为殷色。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_6785_0'>⑿ 分司：唐制，中央官吏在东都任职，称分司。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_6785_0'>⒀ 锾：古代重量单位，一说为六两，一说为十铢二十五分之十三，一说为六两大半两。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_22_6785_0'>⒁ 道心：即菩提心。菩提乃梵文之音译，意译为“觉”“智”等，指对佛教根本精义之觉悟，旧译借用《老》、《庄》术语，称之为“道”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_22_6785_0'>⒂ 黫：黑色。《史记·天官书》：“黫然黑色甚明。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_6785_0'>⒃ 折支：弯腰。支，同“肢”。《正字通·支部》：“支，与肢通，人四体也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_24_6785_0'>⒄ “绯紫”句：指因门荫而得高官。绯紫，红色与紫色之官服。唐制，散官五品以上服绯，三品以上服紫。此泛指高官所穿之官服。绷被：襁褓。绷，同“绷”，包裹婴儿之小被。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_26_6785_0'>⒅ 闹装：明王骥德《古本西厢记》：“盖闹装犹杂装之谓。”辔头：马龙头。𧤾：同“觼”，系辔之有舌环。《说文·角部》：“觼，环之有舌者。”桂馥义證：“觼，系辔之环也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_27_6785_0'>⒆ 𩏪：鹞子身上用丝线织成之饰物。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_27_6785_1'>⒇ 镮：泛指圆圈形物体，亦作“环”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_28_6785_0'>(21) 骢马：青白色错杂之名马，古代御史之所乘。《后汉书·桓典传》：“【典】辟司徒袁隗府，举高第，拜侍御史。是时宦官秉权，典执政无所回避。常乘骢马，京师畏惮，为之语曰：‘行行且止，避骢马御史。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_28_6785_0'>(22) 白鹇：鸟名，又称银雉，雄鸟之冠及下体纯蓝黑色，上体及两翼白色，故名。萧颖士《白鹇赋序》：“白鹇，羽族之幽奇，素质黑章，爪觜纯丹，体备冠距，颇类夫鸡翟，神貌清闲。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_6785_0'>(23) （一作俸）。（“月”句：《唐六典·公主邑司》：“公主邑司官各掌主家财货出入、田园徵俸之事。”请：告诉。《尔雅·释诂上》：“请，告也。”封：卢本、杨本、全诗一作“俸”）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_6785_0'>(24) “冰受”句：古代帝王夏天赏赐贵重宠臣冰块，以示恩宠。《大戴礼记·夏小正》：“颁冰：颁冰也者，分冰以授大夫也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_6785_1'>(25) 绵：纪事、季本一作“锦”。卢校“疑锦”，似是。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_6785_0'>(26) 綟丝鬟：黄黑色发髻，此借指年轻女性仆人。綟，用荩草染成之颜色，黑黄而近绿。《急就篇》卷二：“缥綟绿纨，皂紫石延。”颜师古注：“綟，苍艾色。东海有草，其名曰䓞，以染此色，因名綟云。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_33_6785_0'>(27) 鳏：男子无妻。《释名·释亲属》：“无妻曰鳏。鳏，昆也。昆，明也。愁悒不寐，目恒鳏鳏然也，故其字从鱼，鱼目恒不闭者也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_34_6785_0'>(28) 五闲切，又渠云切，痹也。《素问·五常政大论》：“皮𤸷肉苛，筋脉不利。”张隐庵集注引张介宾曰：“𤸷痹而重也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_35_6785_0'>(29) 愉懒：懈怠。愉，同“偷”；懒，同“懒”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_36_6785_0'>(30) 鹤岭：缑氏山之岭，在今河南偃师市境内，王子乔成仙后曾乘鹤于此短暂驻留。参卷5《别李三》注。潼：蜀本、杨本、董本、全诗作“钟”，似是。钟湾，疑亦在河南偃师境内。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_38_6785_0'>(31) 蕨：多年生草本植物，长在山野，嫩叶可食，俗称蕨菜。《诗·召南·草虫》：“陟彼南山，言采其蕨。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_38_6785_0'>(32) 沤菅：水浸茅草，使之柔韧。菅，多年生草本植物，茎长二三尺，古代用以编盖房顶。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6785_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　居洛阳，有乐府诗。作品：《望云骓马歌（并序）》<div id='poem_6939' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6939' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6939?labeling=true' target='_blank'>望云骓马歌</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6939")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6939_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6939'>德宗皇帝以八马幸蜀，七马道毙，唯望云骓来往不顿。贞元中，老死天厩，臣稹作歌以记之。</div><div id='poem_preface_6939_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6939'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2300, "poem_allusion_6939")'>五丁力尽</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3021, "poem_allusion_6939")'>七圣心迷</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6939_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6939'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6939'>忆昔先皇幸蜀时，八马入谷七马疲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6939'>肉绽筋挛四蹄脱，七马死尽无马骑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6939'>天子蒙尘天雨泣，巉岩道路淋漓湿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6939'>峥嵘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6939", 6939, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>白草</span>眇难期，謥洞黄泉安可入<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6939'>朱泚围兵抽未尽，怀光寇骑追行及<span class='inlineComment2'>（兴元元年二月，李怀光反）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6939'>嫔娥相顾倚树啼，鹓鹭无声仰天立。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6939'>圉人初进望云骓，彩色憔悴众马欺。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6939'>上前<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6939", 6939, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>喷吼</span>如有意，耳尖卓立节踠奇。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6939'>君王试遣回胸臆，撮骨锯牙骈两肋。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6939'>蹄悬四跼<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作矩）</span>脑<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作胫）</span>颗方，胯耸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6939", 6939, "Clauses/19/Comments/1")'>三山</span>尾株<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作扶）</span>直。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6939'>圉人畏诮仍相惑，此马无良空有力。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6939'>频频齧掣辔难施，往往<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6939", 6939, "Clauses/23/Comments/1")'>跳趫</span>鞍<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作骑）</span>不得。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6939'>色沮声悲仰天诉，天不遣言君未识。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6939'>亚身受取白玉羁<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作鞍）</span>，开口衔将紫金勒。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6939'>君王自此方敢骑，似遇良臣久悽恻。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6939'>龙腾鱼鳖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_6939", 6939, "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>啅然</span>惊<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作咸震惊）</span>，骥朌<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作肸）</span>驴骡少颜色。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6939'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3021, "poem_sentence_16_6939")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_6939", 6939, "Clauses/32/Comments/1")'>七圣</span>心迷</span>运方厄，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2300, "poem_sentence_16_6939")'>五丁力尽</span>路犹窄。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6939'>橐它<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作驼）</span>山上斧刃堆，望秦岭下锥头石。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6939'>五六百里真符县，八十四盘青山驿。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6939'>掣开流电有辉光，突过浮云无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_6939", 6939, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>朕迹</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6939'>地平险<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作隘）</span>尽施黄屋，九九属车十二纛。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6939'>齐映前导引骓头，严震迎号抱骓足。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6939'>路傍垂白天宝民，望骓礼拜见骓哭。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6939'>皆言<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作云）</span>玄宗当时无此马，不免骑骡来幸蜀。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　居洛阳，除夕夜，有诗。作品：《除夜》<div id='poem_6580' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6580' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6580?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除夜</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6580")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6580_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6580'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6580'>忆昔岁除夜，见君花烛前。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6580_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6580'>今宵祝文上，重叠叙新年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6580_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6580'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6580", 6580, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>闲处</span>低声哭，空堂背月眠。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6580_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6580'>伤心小儿女，撩乱火堆边。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6580_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6580'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6580_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　元稹分务东台时，曾作文弹劾武宁军节度使王绍，姑系于此。作品：《论转牒事》<span class='inlineComment2'>（杨军《元稹集编年笺注》中系为元和五年（810）所作。）</span><div id='poem_1372477' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372477' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372477?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论转牒事</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372477")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372477_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372477'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372477'>据武宁军节度使王绍六月二十七日违敕擅牒路次州县馆驿。供给当道故监军孟升进丧柩赴上都勾当部送军将官健驴马等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372477_comment'></div>转牒白一道。谨具如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372477_comment'></div>又得东都都亭驿状报。前件丧柩人马等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372477_comment'></div>准武宁军节度转牒。祇供今月二十三日未时到驿宿者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372477_comment'></div>伏准前后制敕。入驿须给正券。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372477_comment'></div>并无转牒供拟之例。况丧柩私行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372477_comment'></div>不合擅入馆驿停止。及给递乘人夫等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372477_comment'></div>当时追得都勾当押衙赵伾到责状称。孟监军去六月十四日身亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372477_comment'></div>至七月五日蒙本使差押领神柩到上都。领得转牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372477_comment'></div>累路州县。并是馆驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372477_comment'></div>供熟食草料人夫牛等。又状称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372477_comment'></div>其监军只是亡日闻奏。更不别奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372477_comment'></div>只是本使仆射发遣。亦别无敕追者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372477_comment'></div>谨检兴元元年闰十月十四日敕。应缘公事乘驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372477_comment'></div>一切合给正券。比来或闻诸州诸使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372477_comment'></div>妄出食牒。烦扰馆驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372477_comment'></div>自今已后。除门下省东都留守及诸州府给券外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372477_comment'></div>馀并不得辄入馆驿。宜委诸道观察使及所在州县切加捉捕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372477_comment'></div>如违犯。请资官所在勒留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372477_comment'></div>具名闻奏。馀并量事科决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372477_comment'></div>仍具给牒所由牒中书门下者。又准元和二年四月十五日敕节文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372477_comment'></div>诸道差使赴上都奏事。及押领进奉官并部领诸军防秋军资钱物官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372477_comment'></div>及边军合于度支请受军资粮料等官。并在给券。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372477_comment'></div>馀并不得给。如违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372477_comment'></div>本道专知判官录事参军。并准兴元元年十二月十七日敕处分者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372477_comment'></div>谨详前后敕文。并不令丧柩入驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372477_comment'></div>及转牒州县祇供。今月二十四日已牒河南府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372477_comment'></div>并不令供给人牛及熟食草料等。仍牒都亭驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372477_comment'></div>画时发遣出驿。并追得本道牒到在台收纳讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372477_comment'></div>右件谨具如前。伏以凶柩入驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372477_comment'></div>秽触典常。转牒祗供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372477_comment'></div>违越制敕。正仆射位崇端揆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372477_comment'></div>合守朝章。徇苟且之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372477_comment'></div>紊经制之法。给长行人畜甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372477_comment'></div>劳传递牛夫颇多。弊缘路之疲人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372477_comment'></div>奉一朝之私惠。恐须明罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372477_comment'></div>以励将来。伏准前后敕文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372477_comment'></div>给券违越。并合申牒中书门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372477_comment'></div>不敢别状弹奏。伏乞特有科绳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372477_comment'></div>其本判官等。准敕并合节级科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372477_comment'></div>附谨具事由如前。伏听处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372477_comment'></div>具状上中书门下。谨录状上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372477_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1372477_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　元稹分务东台时，曾作文议论时事，姑系于此。作品：《论浙西观察使封仗决杀县令事》<span class='inlineComment2'>（杨军《元稹集编年笺注》中系为元和五年（810）所作。）</span><div id='poem_1372476' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372476' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372476?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论浙西观察使封杖决杀县令事<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372476")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372476_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1372476_0'>① 浙西观察使润州刺史韩皋去年七月封杖决湖州安吉县令孙澥四日致死</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372476'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372476'>右。御史台奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372476_comment'></div>得东台状。访闻有前件事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372476_comment'></div>先牒湖州勘得报称。孙澥先准使牒差摄乌程县令日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372476_comment'></div>判状追村正沈朏。不出正帖不用印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372476_comment'></div>奉观察使七月十六日牒。决孙澥臀杖十下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372476_comment'></div>仍差衙前虞候安士文监决第三等杖。二十二日安士文到科决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372476_comment'></div>孙澥官忝字人。一邑父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372476_comment'></div>白状追摄。过犯绝轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372476_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1372476'>科罚所施。合是本州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372476_comment'></div>且观察使职在六条访察。事有不法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372476_comment'></div>即合具状奏闻。封杖决人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372476_comment'></div>不知何典。数日致死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372476_comment'></div>又托以痢疾。为念冤魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372476_comment'></div>有伤和气。其湖州刺史受命专城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372476_comment'></div>过于畏懦。受使司军将科决县令致死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372476_comment'></div>寝而不言。并请准科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372476_comment'></div>以明典宪。其诸道观察使辄封杖决巡内官吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372476_comment'></div>典法无文。伏望严加禁断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372476_comment'></div>庶使遐方士子。免有衔冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372476_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1372476'>敕。封杖决人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372476_comment'></div>殊非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1372476", 1372476, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>文法</span>。因此致死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372476_comment'></div>有足矜嗟。韩皋备历中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372476_comment'></div>合尊典宪。有此乖越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372476_comment'></div>良所怃然。罚一月俸料。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372476_comment'></div>据决孙澥月日。是旧刺史辛秘离任之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372476_comment'></div>新刺史范传正未到之时。俱无愆尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372476_comment'></div>不可议罚。馀依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372476_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1372476_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　元稹分务东台时，曾作文关心民生，姑系于此。作品：《为河南百姓诉车状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（杨军《元稹集编年笺注》中系为元和五年（810）所作。）</span><div id='poem_1372478' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372478' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372478?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为河南百姓诉车</a><span /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372478_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372478'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372478'>河南府应供行营般粮草等车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372478_comment'></div>准敕粮料使牒共雇四千三十五乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372478_comment'></div>每乘每里<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372478", 1372478, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>脚钱</span>三十五文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372478_comment'></div>约计从东都至行营所八百馀里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372478_comment'></div>钱二千八文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372478_comment'></div>共给盐利虚估匹段。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372478_comment'></div>绢一匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372478_comment'></div>约估四千已上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372478_comment'></div>时估七百文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372478_comment'></div>䌷一匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372478_comment'></div>约估五千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372478_comment'></div>时估八百文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372478_comment'></div>约计二十八千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372478_comment'></div>得䌷绢共六匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372478_comment'></div>折当实钱四千五百已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372478_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1372478'>五百乘准敕供怀州已来载草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372478_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1372478'>右件草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372478_comment'></div>准元敕令于河次收贮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372478_comment'></div>待河开<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1372478", 1372478, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>般运</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372478_comment'></div>送至行营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372478_comment'></div>绩准度支奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372478_comment'></div>令差河南郑滑河阳等道车共一千乘般载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372478_comment'></div>今据每车彊弱相兼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372478_comment'></div>用牛四头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372478_comment'></div>每头日食草各三束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372478_comment'></div>计一十二束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372478_comment'></div>从武德界至行营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372478_comment'></div>约六百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372478_comment'></div>车行一十二日程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372478_comment'></div>往来二十四日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372478_comment'></div>并停住约三十馀日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372478_comment'></div>计每车须食草三百六十束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372478_comment'></div>料及人粮在外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372478_comment'></div>若自赍持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372478_comment'></div>每车更须四乘车别载缘路粮草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372478_comment'></div>若于累路旋买。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372478_comment'></div>计一千车每顿须买草六千馀束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372478_comment'></div>州县店肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372478_comment'></div>必无祗供得办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372478_comment'></div>况今年河路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372478_comment'></div>元不甚冻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372478_comment'></div>及至装车般载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372478_comment'></div>至发时已是来年正月上旬已后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372478_comment'></div>即水路自然去得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372478_comment'></div>只校旬日之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372478_comment'></div>实恐虚成其弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372478_comment'></div></div><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372478_comment'></div>亦合得春水路般载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372478_comment'></div>以前两件车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372478_comment'></div>准敕并令和雇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372478_comment'></div>今据度支河阴匹段十乘估价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372478_comment'></div>召雇一乘不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372478_comment'></div>令府司还是据户科配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372478_comment'></div>百姓悉皆愿去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372478_comment'></div>亦须草木尽化为牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372478_comment'></div>然后可充给头数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372478_comment'></div>十分发得一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372478_comment'></div>即来岁春农必当尽废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372478_comment'></div>百姓见坐流亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372478_comment'></div>河南府既然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372478_comment'></div>即郑滑河阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372478_comment'></div>亦是小处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372478_comment'></div>假使凶竖即擒伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_1372545' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372545' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372545?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭亡妻韦氏文</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372545_comment'></div>叙官阀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372545_comment'></div>志德行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372545_comment'></div>具哀词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372545_comment'></div>陈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372545", 1372545, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>荐奠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372545_comment'></div>皆生者之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372545_comment'></div>于死者何有哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372545_comment'></div>然而死者为不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372545_comment'></div>故圣人有无知□□呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372545_comment'></div>死而有知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372545_comment'></div>岂夫人而不知予之心乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372545_comment'></div>尚何言哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372545_comment'></div>且曰人必有死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372545_comment'></div>死何足悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372545_comment'></div>死且不悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372545_comment'></div>则寿夭贵贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372545_comment'></div>缞麻哭泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372545_comment'></div>藐尔<span 1372545, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>顺耳</span>而声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372545_comment'></div>便心而使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372545_comment'></div>亲戚骄其意。<div id='poem_sentence_28_1372545_comment'></div>非女子之幸耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372545_comment'></div>逮归于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372545_comment'></div>始知贱贫。<div id='poem_sentence_33_1372545_comment'></div>然而不悔于色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372545_comment'></div>不戚于言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372545_comment'></div>他人以我为拙。<div id='poem_sentence_38_1372545_comment'></div>夫人以我为适道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372545_comment'></div>捐昼夜于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1372545", 1372545, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>朋宴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372545_comment'></div>夫人以我为狎贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372545_comment'></div>隐于幸中之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372545_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372545_comment'></div>成我者朋友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372545_comment'></div>恕我者夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372545_comment'></div>有夫如此其感也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372545_comment'></div>非夫人之仁耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372545_comment'></div>呜呼歔欷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372545_comment'></div>恨亦有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372545_comment'></div>始予为吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372545_comment'></div>得禄甚微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372545_comment'></div>以日前之戚戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372545_comment'></div>每相缓以前期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372545_comment'></div>纵斯言之可践。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372545_comment'></div>奈夫人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1372545", 1372545, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>已而</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372545_comment'></div>况携手于千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372545_comment'></div>忽分形而独飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372545_comment'></div>昔惨悽于少别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372545_comment'></div>今永逝与终离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372545_comment'></div>将何以解予怀之万恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372545_comment'></div>故前此而言曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372545_comment'></div>死犹不悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372545_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372545_comment'></div>惟神尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_64_1372545_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　本年，校书郎李绅作《新题乐府》，元稹见而选和之。已生白发。已萌“休退之心”。误传元稹使东川时与薛涛恋爱。作品：《和李校书新题乐府十二首》<div id='poem_6861' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6861' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6861?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和李校书新题乐府十二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>上阳白发人</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6861")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6861_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6861'>余友李公垂贶余乐府新题二十首，雅有所谓，不虚为文。余取其病时之尤急者，列而和之，盖十二而已。昔三代之盛也，士议而庶人谤，又曰：「世理则词直，世忌则词隐。」余遭理世而君盛圣，故直其词以示后，使夫后之人，谓今日为不忌之时焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_6861_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6861'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4092, "poem_allusion_6861")'>花鸟使</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6861_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6861'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6861'>天宝年中<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4092, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6861", 6861, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>墨诏</span>求嫔御，走上高楼半酣醉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6865'>一朝燕贼乱中国，河湟没<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作忽）</span>尽空遗丘。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6865'>开远门前万里堠，今来蹙到行原州<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6865'>去京五百而近何其逼，天子县内半没为荒陬。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6865'>西凉之道尔阻脩，连城边将但高会，每听此曲能不羞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_6865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6865'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6865_0'>⑴ 平时开远门外立堠云：去安西九千九百里，以示戎人不为万里行，其就盈故矣</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6865_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_6865'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(6865)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><div id='poem_6868' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6868' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6868?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6868'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6868'>吾闻黄帝鼓清角，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6868", 6868, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>弭伏</span>熊罴舞玄鹤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6868'>舜持干羽苗革心，尧用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6868", 6868, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>咸池</span>凤巢阁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6868'>大夏濩武皆象功，功多已讶玄功薄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6868'>汉祖过沛亦有歌，秦王破阵非无作。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6868'>作之宗庙见艰难，作之军旅传糟粕。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6868'>明皇度曲多新态，宛转侵淫<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作摇）</span>易沈著。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6868'>赤白桃李取花名，霓裳羽衣号天落。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6868'>雅弄虽云已变乱，夷音未得相参错。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6868'>自从胡骑起烟尘，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6868", 6868, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6868", 6868, "Clauses/19/Comments/1")'>胡乐</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（音洛）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6868'>火凤声沈多咽绝，春莺啭罢长萧索。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6868'>胡音胡骑与胡妆，五十年来竞纷泊。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6867' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6867?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span>驯犀<sup class='reference id='poem_title_6867_0'>① 李传云：“贞元丙子岁，南海来贡，至十三年冬，苦寒，死于苑中。”</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6867'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2572, "poem_allusion_6867")'>渡江之橘</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6867_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6867'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6867'>建中之初放驯象，远归林邑近交广。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6867'>兽返深山鸟搆巢，鹰雕鹞鹘无羁鞅。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6867'>贞元之岁贡驯犀，上林置圈官司养。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6867'>玉盆金栈非不珍，虎啖狴牢鱼食网。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6867'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2572, "poem_sentence_4_6867")'>渡江之橘</span>踰汶貉，反时易性安能长。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6867'>腊月北风霜雪深，蜷跼鳞身遂长往。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6867'>行地无疆费传驿，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6867", 6867, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>通天</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6867", 6867, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>异物</span>罹幽枉。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6867'>乃知养兽如养人，不必人人自敦奖。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6867'>不扰则得之于理，不夺有以多于赏。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6867'>脱衣推食衣食之，不若男耕女令纺。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6867'>尧民不自知有尧，但见安闲聊击壤。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6867'>前观驯象后驯<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作观）</span>犀，理国其如指诸掌。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6867'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_6867_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6863' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6863' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6863?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span>立部伎<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6863_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6863_0'>① 李传云：“太常选坐部伎，无性识者退入立部伎。又选立部伎，无性识者退入雅乐部，则雅乐可知矣。”李君作歌以讽焉。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6863'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(627, "poem_allusion_6863")'>夷齐饿</span>　<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_0_6863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6863'>太宗庙乐传子孙，取类群凶阵初破。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6863'>戢戢攒枪霜雪耀，腾腾击鼓云<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作风）</span>雷磨。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6863'>初疑遇敌身启行，终象由文士宪左。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6863'>昔日高宗常立听，曲终然后临玉座。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6863'>如今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6863", 6863, id='poem_sentence_7_6863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6863'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6863", 6863, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>顷向</span>圜丘见郊祀，亦曾正旦亲朝贺。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6863'>太常雅乐备宫悬，九奏未终百寮惰。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6863'>惉滞难令<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4494, onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6863", 6863, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>聋昧</span>人，岂是先王作之过。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 太常丞宋沇传汉中王旧说云：“明皇虽雅好度曲，然而未尝使蕃汉杂奏。天宝十三载，始诏道调法曲与胡部新声合作，识者异之，明年禄山叛。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6863_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6872' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6872' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6872?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span>骠国乐<span class='inlineComment2'>（李传云：贞元辛巳岁，始来献）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6872_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6872'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6872'>骠之乐器头象驼，音声不合十二和。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6872'>促舞跳趫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6872", 6872, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>筋节</span>硬，繁辞变乱名字讹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6872'>千弹万唱皆咽咽，左旋右转空傞傞。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6872'>俯地呼天终不会，曲成调变当如何。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6872'>德宗深意在柔远，笙镛不御停娇<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作嫔）</span>娥。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6872'>史馆书为朝贡传，太常编入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6872", 6872, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>鞮靺</span>科。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6872'>古时陶尧作天子，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6872", 6872, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>逊遁</span>亲听康衢歌。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6872'>又遣遒人持木铎，遍采讴谣天下过。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6872'>万人有意皆洞达，四岳不敢施烦苛。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6872'>尽令区中击壤块，燕及海外覃恩波。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6872'>秦霸周衰古官废，下堙上塞王道颇。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6872'>共矜异俗同声教，不念齐民方荐瘥。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6872'>传称鱼鳖亦咸若，苟能效此诚足多。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6872'>借如牛马未蒙泽，岂在抱瓮滋鼋鼍。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6872'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_6872", 6872, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>教化</span>从来有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_6872", 6872, "Clauses/28/Comments/1")'>源委</span>，必将泳海先泳河。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6872'>是非倒置自古有，骠兮骠兮谁尔诃。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6872'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_6872_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6869' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6869' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6869?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span>胡旋女<span class='inlineComment2'>（李传云：“天宝中，西国来献。”）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6869_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6869'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6869'>天宝欲末胡欲乱，胡人献女能胡旋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6869'>旋得明王不觉迷，妖胡奄到长生殿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6869'>胡旋之义世莫知，胡旋之容我能传。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6869'>蓬断霜根羊角疾，竿戴朱盘火轮炫。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6869'>骊珠迸珥逐飞<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作龙）</span>星，虹<span class='inlineComment2'>（音降）</span>晕轻巾掣流电。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6869'>潜鲸暗噏笡<span class='inlineComment2'>（残谢反）</span>波海<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作海波）</span>，回风乱舞当空霰。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6869'>万过其谁辨终始，四座安能分背面。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6869'>才人观者相为言，承奉君恩在圜变。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6869'>是非好恶随君口，南北东西逐君眄。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6869'>柔软依身著<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作看）</span>佩带，裴回绕指同环钏。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6869'>佞臣闻此心计回，荧惑<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作惑乱）</span>君心君眼眩。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6869'>君言似曲屈为<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作如）</span>钩，君言好直舒为箭。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6869'>巧随清影触处行，妙<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作好）</span>学春莺百般啭。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6869'>倾天侧地用君力，抑塞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_6869", 6869, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>周遮</span>恐君见。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6869'>翠华南幸万里桥，玄宗始悟坤维转<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6869'>寄言旋目与旋心，有国有家当共谴。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6869'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_6869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6869'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_6869_0'>⑴ 《纬书》曰：“僧一行尝奏明皇曰：‘陛下行幸万里，圣祚无疆。’故天宝中，岁幸洛阳，冀充盈数。及上幸蜀，至万里桥，乃叹谓左右曰：‘一行之奏其是乎？’”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6869_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_6869'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(6869)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><div id='poem_6870' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6870' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6870?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span>蛮子朝<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6870_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6870_0'>① 李传云：“贞元末，蜀川始通蛮国。”</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6870'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6870'>西南<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6870", 6870, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>六诏</span>有遗种，僻在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6870", 6870, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>荒陬</span>路寻壅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6870'>部落<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6870", 6870, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>支离</span>君长贱，比诸夷狄为幽冗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6870'>犬戎彊盛频侵削，降有愤心战无勇。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6870'>夜防抄盗保深山，朝望烟尘上高冢。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6870'>鸟道绳桥来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6870", 6870, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>款附</span>，非因慕化因危<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作为）</span>悚。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6870'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6870", 6870, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>清平官</span>系<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作击）</span>金呿嵯，求天叩地持双珙<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作拱）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6870'>益州大将韦令公，顷实遭时定汧陇。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6870'>自居剧镇无他绩，幸得蛮来固恩宠。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6870'>为蛮开道引蛮朝，迎<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作接）</span>蛮送蛮常继踵。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6870'>天子临轩四方贺，朝廷无事唯端拱。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6870'>漏天走马春雨寒，泸水飞蛇瘴烟重。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6870'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6870", 6870, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>椎头</span>丑类除忧患，尰足役夫劳汹涌。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6870'>匈奴互市岁不供，云蛮通好辔长駷。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6870'>戎王养马渐多年，南人耗悴西人恐。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6870_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6870'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_6870_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6871' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6871' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6871?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十一 </span>缚戎人<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6871_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6871_0'>① 近制：西边每擒蕃囚，例皆传置南方，不加剿戮，故李君作歌以讽焉。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6871'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4993, "poem_allusion_6871")'>冤禽</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6871_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6871'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6871'>边头大将差健卒，入抄禽生快于鹘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6871'>但逢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6871", 6871, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>赪面</span>即捉来，半是边人半戎羯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6871'>大将论功重多级，捷书飞奏何超忽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6871'>圣朝不杀谐至仁，远送炎方示微<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作惩）</span>罚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6871'>万里虚劳肉食费，连头尽被毡裘暍。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6871'>华裀重席卧腥臊，病犬愁鸪声<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6871", 6871, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>咽嗢</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6871'>中有一人能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6871", 6871, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>汉语</span>，自言家本长城<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作安）</span>窟。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6871'>少<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作小）</span>年随父戍安西，河渭瓜沙眼看没。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6871'>天宝未乱犹<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作前）</span>数载，狼星四角光蓬勃。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6871'>中原祸作边防危，果有豺狼四来伐。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6871'>蕃马臕成正翘健，蕃兵肉饱争唐突。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6871'>烟尘乱起无亭燧，主帅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6871", 6871, id='poem_sentence_12_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6871'>阴森神庙未敢依，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_6871", 6871, id='poem_sentence_14_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6871'>平明蕃骑四面走，古墓深林尽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_6871", 6871, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>株榾</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6871'>少壮为俘头被髡，老翁留居足多刖。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6871'>乌鸢满野尸狼藉，楼榭成灰墙突兀。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6871'>暗水溅溅入旧池，平沙漫漫铺明月。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6871'>戎王遣将来安慰，口不敢言心咄咄。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6871'>供进腋腋御叱般，岂料穹庐拣肥腯。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6871'>五六十年消息绝，中间盟会又猖獗。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6871'>眼穿东日望尧云，肠断正朝梳汉发<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6871'>近年如此思汉者，半为老病半埋骨。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6871'>常<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作向）</span>教孙子学乡音，犹话平时好城阙。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6871'>老者傥尽少者壮，生长蕃中似蕃悖。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6871'>不知祖父皆汉民，便恐为蕃心矻矻。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6871'>缘边饱喂十万众，何不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_6871", 6871, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>齐驱</span>一时发。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6871'>年年但捉两三人，精卫衔芦塞溟渤。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6871'></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_6871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6871'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_22_6871_0'>⑴ 延州镇李如暹，蓬子将军之子也。尝没西蕃，及归，自云：“蕃法惟正岁一日，许唐人没蕃者服衣冠。”如暹当此日，悲不自胜，遂与蕃妻密定归计</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6871_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6866' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6866' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6866?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十二 </span>阴山道<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6866_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6866_0'>① 李传云：“元和二年，有诏悉以金银酬回纥马价。”</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6866'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5618, "poem_allusion_6866")'>良造</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6866_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6866'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6866'>年年买马阴山道，马死阴山帛空耗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6866'>元和天子念女工，内出金银代<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6866", 6866, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>酬犒</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6866'>臣有一言昧死进，死生甘分荅恩焘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6866'>费财为马不独生，耗帛伤工有他盗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6866'>臣闻平时七十万匹马，关中不省闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6866", 6866, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>嘶噪</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6866'>四十八监选龙媒，时贡天庭付<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_5_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6866'>如今坰野十无一，尽在飞龙相践暴。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6866'>万束刍茭供旦暮，千钟菽粟长牵漕。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6866'>屯军郡国百馀镇，缣缃岁奉春冬劳。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6866'>税户逋逃例<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6866", 6866, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>摊配</span>，官司折纳仍贪冒。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6866'>挑纹变䌰力倍费，弃旧从新人所好。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6866'>越縠缭绫织一端，十匹素缣功未到。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6866'>豪家富贾踰常制，令族清<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作亲）</span>班无雅操。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6866'>从骑爱奴丝布衫，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_6866", 6866, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>臂鹰</span>小儿云锦韬。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6866'>群臣利己要差僭，天子深衷空悯悼。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6866'>绰立花塼鹓凤行，雨露恩波几时报。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6866'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_6866_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　元和四年以前在洛阳曾与卢真相互酬答，有诗，姑系于此。作品：《答子蒙》<div id='poem_6948' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6948' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6948?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答子蒙</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6948")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6948_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6948'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6948'>报卢君，门外雪纷纷。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6948'>纷纷门外雪，城中鼓声绝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6948'>强梁御史人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6948", 6948, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>觑步</span>，安得夜开沽酒户。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6948'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_6948_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年1月</a>　在洛阳，为监察御史分务东台。向韩愈索要辛夷花，有诗。作品：《辛夷花》<div id='poem_6846' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6846' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6846?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辛夷花<span class='inlineComment2'>（问韩员外）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6846")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6846_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6846'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6846'>问君辛夷花，君言已斑駮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6846_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6846'>不畏辛夷不烂开，顾我<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6846", 6846, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>筋骸</span>官束缚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6846_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6846'>缚遣推囚名御史，狼藉囚徒满田地。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6846_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6846'>明日不推缘国忌，依前不得花前醉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6846_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6846'>韩员外家好辛夷，开时乞取三两枝。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6846_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6846'>折枝为赠君莫惜，纵君不折风亦吹。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6846_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6846'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_6846_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　因卢真而与卢元辅唱和。作品：《卢十九子蒙吟卢七员外洛川怀古六韵命予和》<div id='poem_6701' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6701' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6701?labeling=true' target='_blank'>卢十九子蒙吟卢七员外洛川怀古六韵命余和</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_6701'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6701'>闻道卢明府，闲行咏洛神。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6701_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6701'>浪圆疑靥笑，波斗忆眉嚬。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6701_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6701'>蹀躞桥头马，空濛水上尘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6701_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6701'>草芽犹犯雪，冰岸欲消春。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6701_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6701'>寓目终无限，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6701", 6701, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>通辞</span>未有因。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6701_comment'></div></div><div
