id='poem_sentence_6_6701_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　元稹伏庚寅之诏，作赋。作品：《奉制试乐为御赋》<div id='poem_1372264' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372264' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372264?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉制试乐为御赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（以和乐行道之本为韵依次用）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372264")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372264_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372264'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372264'>臣伏奉庚寅之诏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372264_comment'></div>天子以乐为御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372264_comment'></div>其义则那。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372264_comment'></div>臣以为引重任者无御不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372264_comment'></div>播盛德者非乐而何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372264_comment'></div>蟠乎地而际乎天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372264_comment'></div>周流既超于马力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372264_comment'></div>发乎迩而应乎远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372264_comment'></div>驰声亦倍于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1372264", 1372264, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>銮和</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372264_comment'></div>喻之为至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372264_comment'></div>此实居多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372264_comment'></div>大道既移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372264_comment'></div>则舞行象成于覆载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372264_comment'></div>小戎或驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372264_comment'></div>则琴音决胜于驺歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372264_comment'></div>故圣王取彼驩然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372264_comment'></div>喻诸沃若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372264_comment'></div>制其节奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372264_comment'></div>戒乎行作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372264_comment'></div>听祈招之什。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372264_comment'></div>冀绝迹于奔车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372264_comment'></div>赋盘游之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372264_comment'></div>俾虑危于朽索。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372264_comment'></div>是以南薰驰而虞德盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372264_comment'></div>北里骋而殷道恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372264_comment'></div>控海内当并骛于勋华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372264_comment'></div>执人柄岂争功于良乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372264_comment'></div>斯御也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372264_comment'></div>动无险阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372264_comment'></div>发自和平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372264_comment'></div>周旋罔害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372264_comment'></div>欢爱则行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372264_comment'></div>止之而优游灵府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372264_comment'></div>推之而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1372264", 1372264, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>浃洽</span>寰瀛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372264_comment'></div>非劳辕轭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372264_comment'></div>但布茎英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372264_comment'></div>陋乎足迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372264_comment'></div>运以精诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372264_comment'></div>尔或驰驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372264_comment'></div>难期于无灾无害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372264_comment'></div>我之步骤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372264_comment'></div>乃在于大鸣小鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372264_comment'></div>故曰得禽而诡遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372264_comment'></div>不如率兽以仁声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372264_comment'></div>且跋涉者疲于山川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372264_comment'></div>条畅者格乎穹昊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372264_comment'></div>慕入律而百蛮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1372264", 1372264, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>麇至</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372264_comment'></div>锡有功而诸侯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1372264", 1372264, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>轨道</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372264_comment'></div>岂出户庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372264_comment'></div>非专<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1372264", 1372264, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>击考</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372264_comment'></div>乘六气之辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372264_comment'></div>哂六辔之徒施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372264_comment'></div>鼓八风而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372264_comment'></div>知八骏之非宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372264_comment'></div>于是屏造父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372264_comment'></div>命后夔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372264_comment'></div>或无声而至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372264_comment'></div>或<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1372264", 1372264, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>先进</span>以道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372264_comment'></div>岂独周域中而利其衔策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372264_comment'></div>亦将肥天下而沦乎肤肌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372264_comment'></div>若此则宇宙盖由乎一马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372264_comment'></div>牵制尽在于四维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372264_comment'></div>虽质文<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1372264", 1372264, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>更变</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372264_comment'></div>而公共操持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372264_comment'></div>莫不得之者昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372264_comment'></div>失之者损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372264_comment'></div>俗化清而鞭扑废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372264_comment'></div>和顺积而车书混。<div id='poem_sentence_69_1372264_comment'></div>播盛德者乐为之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372264_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下推是心而居其奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372264_comment'></div>臣徒欲贡所闻而安敢窥其阃。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1372264_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6756", 6756, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>顶戴</span>头上头。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 时物：应时之作物。外奖：外在之激励。《文选·谢灵运〈拟魏太子邺中集诗·王粲〉》：“沮漳自可美，客心非外奖。”李善注：“奖，劝也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6756_0'>⑵ “神恬”句：古代养生理论认为，津液储蓄则精神饱满，津液外泻则生机衰竭。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6756_0'>⑶ 风车：传说中凭风而行之神车。野马：见卷四《春馀遣兴》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6756_0'>⑷ 陆浑：原指今甘肃敦煌一带，春秋时秦晋二国使居于其地之“允姓之戎”迁居伊川，以陆浑名之。汉置县，五代废，故城在今河南省嵩县东北。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6756_0'>⑸ 灵都：即灵都观。《太平寰宇记·河南道五·王屋县》（卷五）：“灵都观，在县东三十里。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6756_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　与卢真等集刘氏馆，有诗。作品：《刘氏馆集隐客归和子元及之子蒙晦之》<div id='poem_6789' -----title
周至（盩厔）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='08900f3971294a738ff1d6b2f80498bf_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("08900f3971294a738ff1d6b2f80498bf");'><span id='08900f3971294a738ff1d6b2f80498bf_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>，31岁</div><div id='08900f3971294a738ff1d6b2f80498bf' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年3月7日</a>　自长安出发，经骆谷道。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年3月</a>　过骆口驿，见白居易、崔韶、李逢吉、王质夫题名与题诗，拂拭赏叹，留恋久之，有诗。作品：《使东川·骆口驿二首》<div id='poem_6270' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6270' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6270?labeling=true' target='_blank'>使东川<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序，此后并御史时作。）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>骆口驿二首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6270")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6270_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6270_0'>① 东壁上有李二十员外逢吉、崔二十二侍御韶使云南题名处，北壁有翰林白二十二居易题拥石关云开雪红树等篇，有王质夫和焉，王不知是何人也。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6270'>元和四年三月七日，予以监察御史使东川，往来鞍马间，赋诗凡三十二章。秘书省校书郎白行简为予手写为东川卷，今所录者，但七言绝句长句耳。起骆口驿，尽望驿台，二十二首云。</div><div id='poem_preface_6270_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6270'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6270'>邮亭壁上数行字，崔李题名<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6270", 6270, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>王白</span>诗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6270_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6270'>尽日无人共言语，不离墙下至行时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6270_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6270'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6270_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6271' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6271' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6271?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>骆口驿二首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年3月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6271_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6271_0'>① 东壁上有李二十员外逢吉、崔二十二侍御韶使云南题名处，北壁有翰林白二十二居易题拥石关云开雪红树等篇，有王质夫和焉，王不知是何人也。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6271'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6271'>二星徼外通<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6271", 6271, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>蛮服</span>，五夜灯前草御文。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6271'>我到东川恰相半，向南看月北看云。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6271'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6271_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年3月</a>　过青山驿，有诗。作品：《使东川·邮亭月》<div id='poem_6268' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6268' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6268?labeling=true' target='_blank'>使东川<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup> 邮亭月<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>②</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6268")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6268_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6268_0'>① 并序，此后并御史时作。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6268_1'>② 于骆口驿，见崔二十二题名处。数夜后，于青山驿玩月，忆得崔生好持确论，每于宵话之中，常曰：“人生昼务夜安，步月閒行，吾不与也。”言讫，坚卧，他人虽千百其词，难动摇矣。至是怆然，思此题，因有献。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6268'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6268'>君多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6268", 6268, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>务实</span>我多情，大抵偏嗔步月明。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6268_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6268'>今夜山邮与蛮嶂，君应坚卧我还行。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6268_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6268'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6268_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='poem_sentence_0_6950_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6950'>文君新寡乍归来，羞怨春风不能哭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6950_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6950'>我从相识便相怜，但是花丛不回目。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6950_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6950'>去年春别湘水头，今年夏见青山曲<span id='poem_sentence_4_6950_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6950'>愿为朝日早相暾，愿作轻风暗相触。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6950_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6950'>尔<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作乐）</span>踯躅，我向通州尔幽独。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6950_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6950'>可怜今夜宿青山，何年却向青山宿。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6950_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6950'>山花渐暗月渐明，月照空山满山绿。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6950_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6950'>山空月午夜无人，何处知我颜如玉。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6950_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6747'>秾姿秀色人皆爱，怨媚羞容我偏别。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6747_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6747'>说向闲人人不听，曾向乐天时一说。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6747_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6747'>昨来谷口先相问，及到山前已消歇。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6747_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6747", 6747, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>山枇杷</span>，尔托深山何太拙。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6747_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='authorDate'>（809年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6262")'>元稹</a></span><br class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6262_1'>② 往岁与乐天曾于郭家亭子竹林中，见亚枝红桃花半在池水。自后数年，不复记得。忽于褒城驿池岸竹间见之，宛如旧物，深所怆然。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6262'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6262'>平阳池上亚枝红，怅望山邮事事同。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6262'>还向万竿<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作茎）</span>深竹里，一枝浑卧碧流中。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6262'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6262_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在褒城，遇故人黄明府，见窦群去年题诗，题诗“应好池”。有诗。作品：《黄明府诗》<div id='poem_6716' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6716' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6716?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄明府诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6716")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6716_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6716'>小年曾于解县连月饮酒，予常为觥录事。曾于窦少府厅中，有一人后至，频犯语令，连飞十二觥，不胜其困，逃席而去，醒后问人，前虞乡黄丞也，此后绝不复知。元和四年三月，予奉使东川。十六日至褒城东数里，遥望驿亭。前有大池，楼榭甚盛。逡巡，有黄明府见迎，瞻其形容，彷佛似识，问其前衔，即曩时之逃席黄丞也（即曩日逃席黄丞也）。说向前事，黄生惘然而寤，因馈酒一槽，舣舟请予同载。予不免其意（予不违其意），与之尽欢。遍问座隅山川，则曰：又褒次其右（遍问褒阳山水，则褒姒所奔之城在其左，诸葛所征之路在其右。）。感今怀古，作黄明府诗云。</div><div id='poem_preface_6716_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6716'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6716'>少年曾痛饮，黄令苦飞觥。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6716'>席上当时走，马前今日迎。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6716'>依稀迷姓氏，积渐识平生。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6716'>故友身皆远，他乡眼暂明。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6716'>便邀连榻坐，兼共榜船行。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6716'>酒思临风乱，霜棱埽<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作拂）</span>地平。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6716'>不堪深浅酌，贪怆古今情。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6716'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6716", 6716, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>逦迤</span>七盘路，坡陁数丈城。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6716'>花疑褒女笑，栈想武侯征。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6716'>一种埋幽石，老闲<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>千载名。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6716'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_6716_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6716'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6716_0'>⑴ 《纪事》作“空闻”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6716_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>复西行，有诗。作品：《使东川·清明日》<span class='inlineComment2'>（据《两千年中西历对照表》知清明当在农历三月十七日左右。）</span><div id='poem_6275' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6275' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6275?labeling=true' target='_blank'>使东川<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup> 清明日<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>②</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年3月）</span><span class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6275_1'>② 行至汉上，忆与乐天、知退、杓直、拒非、顺之辈同游。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6275'><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　时兴元尹、山南西道节度使为郑馀庆。元稹与之唱和，有诗。作品：《荥阳郑公以稹寓居严茅有池塘之胜寄诗四首因有意献》<div id='poem_6563' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6563' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6563?labeling=true' target='_blank'>荥阳郑公以稹寓居严茅有池塘之胜寄诗四首因有意献</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　在兴元疗疾。作品：《献荥阳公诗五十韵（并启）》<div id='poem_6720' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6720' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6720?labeling=true' target='_blank'>献荥阳公诗五十韵<span class='inlineComment2'>（并启）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（816年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6720")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6720_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6720'>并启：启。今月十七日，公会儒于便庑。稹亦谬容末席，公出棠树之首章，且识其目曰：客有前进士韦张在宋来会学，由我而下，联为五言以美之。诸生怗怗竦竦，各尽词以献公。公则举其摧敌，推案析理，次至数联，应若前定，诸儒有不安者，随为刮削，变嫫为妍。不废暮而珠贯成就。瑕不可掩者，稹六联耳，退而自咎，且盛公之所为，因而次用所联翩贤等五十一字，合为一诗。止咏公之词业力翰，洎生徒学校之事而已也，其于勋位崇懿在国籍，族地清甲编世家，政事德美播讴谣，俭仁慈爱被亲戚，非小儒造次之所尽。大凡受褊狭者不可以语大，持杯棬而承澍雨，自满而止，又安能测其霶沛所至哉。惶恐无任，俯伏待罪，谨以启陈。不宣，谨启。</div><div id='poem_preface_6720_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6720'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(267, id='poem_sentence_20_6720'>驱驾雷霆走，铺陈锦绣鲜。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6720'>清机登穾奥，流韵溢山川。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6720'>墨客膺潜服，谈宾膝误前。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6720'>张鳞定<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_6720", 6720, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>摧败</span>，折角反矜怜。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6720'>句句推<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_6720", 6720, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>琼玉</span>，声声播管弦。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6720'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_6720", 6720, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>纤新</span>撩造化，澒洞斡陶甄。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6720'>卫磬琤鍧极，齐竽僭滥偏。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6720'>空虚惭炙輠，点窜许怀铅。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6720'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_6720", 6720, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>惫色</span>秋来草，哀吟雨后蝉。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6720'>自伤魂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_6720", 6720, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>惨沮</span>，何暇思幽玄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6720'>喜到樽罍侧，愁亲几案边。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6720'>菁华知竭矣，肺腑尚求旃。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6720'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_6720", 6720, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>抵滞</span>浑成醉，徘徊转慕膻。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6720'>老叹才渐少，闲苦病<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_6720", 6720, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>相煎</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6720'>瓦砾难追琢，刍荛分弃捐。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6720'>漫劳成恳恳，那得美娟娟。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6720'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_6720", 6720, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>拙劣</span>仍非速，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_6720", 6720, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>迂愚</span>且异专。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6720'>移时停笔砚，挥景乏戈鋋。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6720'>仪舌忻犹在，舒帷誓不褰。<div id='poem_sentence_38_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6720'>会将连<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_6720", 6720, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>献楚</span>，深耻谬游燕。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6720'>蒲有临书叶，韦充读易编。<div id='poem_sentence_40_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_6720'>沙须披见宝，经拟带耕田。<div id='poem_sentence_41_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_6720'>入雾长期闰，持朱本望研。<div id='poem_sentence_42_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_6720'>轮辕呈曲直，凿枘取方圆。<div id='poem_sentence_43_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_6720'>呼吸宁徒尔，沾濡岂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_6720", 6720, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>浪然</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_44_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_6720'>过箫资响亮，随水涨沦涟。<div id='poem_sentence_45_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_6720'>惜日看圭短，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1829, "poem_sentence_46_6720")'>偷光</span>恨壁坚。<div id='poem_sentence_46_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_6720'>勤勤彫朽木，细细导蒙泉。<div id='poem_sentence_47_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_6720'>传癖今应甚，头风昨已痊。<div id='poem_sentence_48_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_6720'>丹青公旧物，一为变<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_6720", 6720, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>蚩妍</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_49_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_6720'></div><div id='poem_sentence_50_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6720'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_6720_0'>⑴ 稹病疟二年，求医在此，荥阳公不忍，归之瘴乡</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6720_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　郑馀庆“会儒于便庑”，元稹参与其事，献诗于郑馀庆。作品：《献荥阳公诗五十韵（并启）》《奉和荥阳公离筵作》<div id='poem_6720' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6720' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6720?labeling=true' target='_blank'>献荥阳公诗五十韵<span class='inlineComment2'>（并启）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（816年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6720")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6720_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6720'>并启：启。今月十七日，公会儒于便庑。稹亦谬容末席，公出棠树之首章，且识其目曰：客有前进士韦张在宋来会学，由我而下，联为五言以美之。诸生怗怗竦竦，各尽词以献公。公则举其摧敌，推案析理，次至数联，应若前定，诸儒有不安者，随为刮削，变嫫为妍。不废暮而珠贯成就。瑕不可掩者，稹六联耳，退而自咎，且盛公之所为，因而次用所联翩贤等五十一字，合为一诗。止咏公之词业力翰，洎生徒学校之事而已也，其于勋位崇懿在国籍，族地清甲编世家，政事德美播讴谣，俭仁慈爱被亲戚，非小儒造次之所尽。大凡受褊狭者不可以语大，持杯棬而承澍雨，自满而止，又安能测其霶沛所至哉。惶恐无任，俯伏待罪，谨以启陈。不宣，谨启。</div><div id='poem_preface_6720_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6720'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(267, "poem_allusion_6720")'>骏骨</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(766, "poem_allusion_6720")'>祖逖后施鞭</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1463, "poem_allusion_6720")'>招徐稚</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1829, "poem_allusion_6720")'>偷光</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2120, "poem_allusion_6720")'>戴冯避席</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6720_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6720'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6720'>郑驿骑翩翩，丘门子弟贤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6720'>文翁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6720", 6720, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>开学</span>日，正礼骋途年<span class='inlineComment2'>（张秀才正暮，荥阳公首荐登第也）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6720'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(267, "poem_sentence_2_6720")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6720", 6720, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>骏骨</span></span>黄金买，英髦绛帐延。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6720'>趋风皆蹀足，侍坐各差肩。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6720'>解榻<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1463, "poem_sentence_4_6720")'>招徐稚</span>，登楼引仲宣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6720'>凤攒题字扇，鱼落讲经筵。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6720'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6720", 6720, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>盛气</span>河包济，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6720", 6720, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>贞姿</span>岳柱天。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6720'>皋夔当五百，邹鲁重三千。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6720'>科斗翻腾取，关雎教授先<span class='inlineComment2'>（荥阳公寮吏生徒受诗有百数）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6720'>篆垂朝露滴，诗缀夜珠联。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6720'>逸礼多心匠，焚书旧口传。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6720'>陈遵修尺牍，阮瑀让飞笺。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6720'>中的颜初启，抽毫踵未旋。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6720'>森罗万木合，属对百花全。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6720'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_6720", 6720, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>词海</span>跳波涌，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_6720", 6720, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>文星</span>拂坐悬。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6720'>戴冯遥避席，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(766, "poem_sentence_15_6720")'>祖逖后施鞭</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6720'>西蜀凌云赋，东阳咏月篇。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6720'>劲芟鳌足断，精贯虱心穿。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6720'>浩汗神弥王，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_6720", 6720, /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=816&endYear=816')">816年</a>　冬，献文于权德舆。作品：《上兴元权尚书启》<div id='poem_1372508' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372508' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372508'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372508'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372508_comment'></div>某闻周诸侯生桓文时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372508_comment'></div>而不列于盟会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372508_comment'></div>则夷狄之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372508_comment'></div>以其微不能自达于盟主也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372508_comment'></div>元和以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372508_comment'></div>贞元而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372508_comment'></div>阁下主文之盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372508_comment'></div>馀二十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372508_comment'></div>某亦盗语言于经籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372508_comment'></div>卒未能效互乡之进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372508_comment'></div>甚自羞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372508_comment'></div>自陛下以环梁十六州之地授阁下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372508_comment'></div>麾盖铁棨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372508_comment'></div>元纛青旌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372508_comment'></div>晨<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作泉）</span>鱼符竹信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372508_comment'></div>车朱左右轓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372508_comment'></div>府置军司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372508_comment'></div>以上官属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372508_comment'></div>刻节而总制之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372508_comment'></div>则某实为环内之州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372508_comment'></div>而又移族谒医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372508_comment'></div>在阁下治所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372508_comment'></div>私心欢欣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372508_comment'></div>愿改前耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372508_comment'></div>然而吏通之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372508_comment'></div>有言通之州幽阴险蒸瘴之甚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372508_comment'></div>私又自怜其才命俱困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372508_comment'></div>恐不能复脱于通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372508_comment'></div>由是生心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372508_comment'></div>悉所为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372508_comment'></div>留置友善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372508_comment'></div>冀异日善恶不忘于朋类耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372508_comment'></div>筐箧之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372508_comment'></div>遂无遗馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372508_comment'></div>方创新词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372508_comment'></div>以须供贽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372508_comment'></div>不幸疮痍暴侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372508_comment'></div>手足沉废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372508_comment'></div>恐一旦神弃其形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372508_comment'></div>终不得自进于阁下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372508_comment'></div>因用官通已来所作诗及常记忆者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372508_comment'></div>共五十首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372508_comment'></div>又文书中得迁庙议移史官书戡难纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372508_comment'></div>并在通时叙诗一章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372508_comment'></div>次为卷轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372508_comment'></div>封用上献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372508_comment'></div>尘黩尊重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372508_comment'></div>帖伏回遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372508_comment'></div>谨以启陈不宣。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年</a>　元和十二年间在兴元作《生春》，姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_content_6445'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6445'>眼前明月水，先入汉江流。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_7008'>去去我移马，迟迟君过桥。<div id='poem_sentence_14_7008_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_7008'>云势正横壑，江流初满槽<span class='inlineComment2'>（江槽，楚语）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_7008_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_7008'>持此慰远道，此之为旧交<span class='inlineComment2'>（此：杨本作“比”。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_7008_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_7008'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_7008_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_7008'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_7008_0'>⑴ 百足：马陆之别称，体长而稍扁，长寸馀，由许多环节构成，各节有足一至二对，即使截为两截，头尾仍能各自行走。晋张华《博物志》卷二：“百足，一名马蚿，中断成两段，其头尾各异行而去。”参李时珍《本草纲目·虫四·马陆》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_7008_0'>⑵ 商羊：传说中鸟名，据云大雨前常屈一足起舞。《孔子家语·辩政》：“齐有一足之鸟，飞集于宫朝下，止于殿前，舒翅而跳。齐侯大怪之，使使聘鲁问孔子。孔子曰：‘此鸟名曰商羊，水祥也。昔童儿有屈其一脚，振讯两眉而跳，且谣曰：天将大雨，商羊鼓舞。今齐有之，其应至矣。急告民趋治沟渠，修堤防，将有大水为灾。’顷之大霖，雨水溢泛。”翘翘：高出貌，出群貌。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_7008_0'>⑶ 方寸：指心。心处胸中方寸之间，故云。《列子·仲尼篇》：“文挚乃命龙叔背明而立，文挚自后向明而望之，既而曰：‘嘻！吾见子之心矣，方寸之地虚矣。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_7008_0'>⑷ “异布”句：火浣布即石棉布，遇火而不燃，古代产自僻远之地，被视为珍异之物。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_7008_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_7011' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_7011' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/7011?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬独孤二十六送归通州<span class='inlineComment2'>（此后至和乐天三首，并用本韵。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（817年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_7011")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_7011_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_7011'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(465, "poem_allusion_7011")'>苏门啸</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_7011_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_7011'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_7011'>再拜捧兄赠，拜兄珍重言。<div id='poem_sentence_0_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_7011'>我有平生志，临别将具论。<div id='poem_sentence_1_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_7011'>十岁慕倜傥，爱白不爱昏。<div id='poem_sentence_2_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_7011'>宁爱寒切烈，不爱旸温暾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_7011'>二十走猎骑，三十游海门<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_7011'>憎兔跳趯趯，恶鹏黑翻翻<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_7011'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_7011", 7011, "Clauses/12/Comments/1")'>鳌钓</span>气方壮<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_7011", 7011, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>鹘拳</span>心颇尊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_7011'>下观<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_7011", 7011, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>鬇鬡</span>辈，一扫冀不存。<div id='poem_sentence_7_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_7011'>名冠壮士籍，功酬明主恩。<div id='poem_sentence_8_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_7011'>不然合<span class='inlineComment2'>（音閤）</span>身弃，何况身上痕。<div id='poem_sentence_9_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_7011'>金石有销烁，肺腑无寒温。<div id='poem_sentence_10_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_7011'>分画久已定，波涛何足烦。<div id='poem_sentence_11_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_7011'>尝希<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(465, "poem_sentence_12_7011")'>苏门啸</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，讵厌巴树猿<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_7011'>瘴水徒浩浩，浮云亦轩轩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_7011'>长歌莫长叹，饮斛莫饮樽。<div id='poem_sentence_14_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_7011'>生为醉乡客，死作达士魂。<div id='poem_sentence_15_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_7011'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_7011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_7011'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_7011_0'>⑴ 海门：指长江入海处，润州（今江苏省镇江市）附近长江中有海门山。《古今图书集成·职方典》卷七二五《镇江府》：“焦山在郡城东九里大江中，与金山并峙……山之馀支东出分峙于鲸波弥淼中，曰海门山。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_7011_0'>⑵ “恶鹏“句：参卷4《赋得鱼登龙门》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_7011_0'>⑶ 鳌钓：《列子·汤问》：渤海之东有五山，无所连著，常随波上下不得驻。仙圣苦之，诉于帝，帝恐流于西极，乃命禺强使巨鳌十五举首而载之，迭为三番，六万岁一交焉，五山始峙。而龙伯之国有大人，举足不盈数步而暨五山之所，一钓而连六鳌，合负而归其国，灼其骨以数焉。于是岱舆、员峤二山流于北极，沈于大海。后因喻举止豪迈。鳌，海中大鳖。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_7011_0'>⑷ 鹘拳：即拳鹘，搏击苍鹰。鹘，见卷1《兔丝》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_7011_0'>⑸ 苏门啸：《晋书·阮籍传》：“籍尝于苏门山遇孙登，与商略终古及栖神通气之术，登皆不应。籍因长啸而退，至半岭，闻有声若鸾凤之音，响乎岩谷，乃登之啸也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_7011_0'>⑹ 巴树猿：北魏郦道元《水经注·江水》：“自三峡七百里中，两岸连山，……每至晴初霜旦，林寒涧肃，常有高猿长啸，属引凄异，空谷传响，哀转久绝。故渔者歌曰：‘巴东三峡巫峡长，猿鸣三声泪沾裳。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_7011_0'>⑺ 轩轩：飞动貌，飞举貌。《文选·王粲〈赠蔡子笃〉》：“潜鳞在渊，归雁载轩。”李善注：“轩，飞貌。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_7011_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
旺苍（嘉川）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='4b8876428c2745b7ab34cbed1f39b066_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4b8876428c2745b7ab34cbed1f39b066");'><span id='4b8876428c2745b7ab34cbed1f39b066_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>，31岁</div><div id='4b8876428c2745b7ab34cbed1f39b066' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年3月</a>　至嘉川驿。月夜追忆与李建、白居易、白行简、李复礼、庾顺之游曲江，有诗。作品：《使东川·江楼月》<div id='poem_6514' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6514' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6514?labeling=true' target='_blank'>使东川<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup> 江楼月<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>②</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6514")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6514_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6514_0'>① 并序，此后并御史时作。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6514_1'>② 嘉川驿望月，忆杓直、乐天、知退、拒非、顺之数贤，居近曲江，閒夜多同步月。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6514'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6514'>嘉陵江岸驿楼中，江在楼前月在空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6514_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6514'>月色满床兼满地，江声如鼓复如风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6514_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6514'>诚知远近皆三五，但恐阴晴有异同。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6514_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6514'>万一帝乡还洁白<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作皎洁）</span>，几人潜傍杏园东。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6514_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6514'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6514_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

id='poem_content_6412'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6412'>五上两漫天，因师忏业缘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6412_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
剑阁（剑门）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='fe50068de7ef48c4ba777af8b5f82218_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fe50068de7ef48c4ba777af8b5f82218");'><span id='fe50068de7ef48c4ba777af8b5f82218_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>，31岁</div><div id='fe50068de7ef48c4ba777af8b5f82218' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>　至剑门，有诗。作品：《使东川·惭问囚》<div id='poem_6516' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6516' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6516?labeling=true' target='_blank'>使东川<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup> 惭问囚<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>②</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6516")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6516_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6516_0'>① 并序，此后并御史时作。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6516_1'>② 蜀门夜行忆与顺之在司马鍊师坛上话出处时</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6516'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6516'>司马子微坛上头，与君深结白云俦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6516'>尚平村落拟连买，王屋山泉为别游。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6516'>各待陆浑求一尉，共资三径便同休。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6516'>那知今日蜀门路，带月夜行缘问囚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6516'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6516_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
三台（郪县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='76e6e2f4098f4c33a0bed235385d7c34_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("76e6e2f4098f4c33a0bed235385d7c34");'><span id='76e6e2f4098f4c33a0bed235385d7c34_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=809&endYear=809')">809年</a>，31岁</div><div id='76e6e2f4098f4c33a0bed235385d7c34' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>复西南行，至东川治所梓州，有诗。作品：《使东川·好时节》<div id='poem_6263' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6263' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6263?labeling=true' target='_blank'>使东川<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup> 好时节</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6263")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6263_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6263_0'>① 并序，此后并御史时作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6263'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6263'>身骑骢马峨眉下，面带霜威卓氏前。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6263_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6263'>虚度东川好时节，酒楼元被蜀儿眠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6263_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6263'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6263_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在梓州，弹奏故剑南东川节度使严砺等“擅没管内将士、官吏、百姓及前资寄往等庄宅奴婢”及“于两税外加征钱、米及草”等，作文。弹劾取得部分胜利。此举得百姓好评，亦使朋砺者切齿。作品：《弹奏剑南东川节度使状》<div id='poem_1372473' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372473' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372473?labeling=true' target='_blank'>弹奏剑南东川节度使状</a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372473")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372473_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372473'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372473'>剑南东川详覆使言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372473_comment'></div>故剑南东川节度观察处置等使严砺在任日擅没管内将士官吏百姓及前资寄住等庄宅奴婢今于两税外加徵钱米及草等谨件如后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372473_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1372473'>严砺擅籍没管内将士官吏百姓及前资寄住涂山甫等八十八户庄宅共一百二十二所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372473_comment'></div>奴婢共二十七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372473_comment'></div>并在诸州项内分析。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372473_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1372473'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372473_comment'></div>臣伏准前后制敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372473_comment'></div>令出使御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372473_comment'></div>所在访察不法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372473_comment'></div>具状奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372473_comment'></div>臣昨奉三月一日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372473_comment'></div>令往剑南东川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372473_comment'></div>详覆泸州监官任敬仲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>赃犯</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372473_comment'></div>于彼访闻严砺在任日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372473_comment'></div>擅没前件庄宅奴婢等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372473_comment'></div>至今月十七日详覆事毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372473_comment'></div>追得所没庄宅奴婢文案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372473_comment'></div>及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>执行</span>案典耿琚马元亮等检勘得实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372473_comment'></div>据严砺元和二年正月十八日举牒云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372473_comment'></div>管内诸州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372473_comment'></div>应经逆贼刘辟重围内并贼兵到处所有应接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372473_comment'></div>及投事西川军将州县官所由典正前资寄住等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372473_comment'></div>所犯虽该霈泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372473_comment'></div>庄田须有所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372473_comment'></div>其有庄宅奴婢桑柘钱物斛㪷邸店碾硙等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372473_comment'></div>悉皆搜检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372473_comment'></div>勘得涂山甫等八十八户案内并不经<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>验问</span>虚实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372473_comment'></div>亦不具事职名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372473_comment'></div>便收家产没官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372473_comment'></div>其时都不闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372473_comment'></div>所收资财奴婢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372473_comment'></div>悉皆货卖破用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372473_comment'></div>及配充作坊驱使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372473_comment'></div>其庄宅桑田元和二年三年租课。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372473_comment'></div>严砺并已徵收支用讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372473_comment'></div>臣伏准元和元年十月五日制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372473_comment'></div>西川诸军诸镇刺史大将及参佐官吏将健百姓等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372473_comment'></div>应被<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>胁从</span>补署职官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372473_comment'></div>一切不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372473_comment'></div>又准元和二年正月三日赦文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372473_comment'></div>自今日已前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372473_comment'></div>大逆缘坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372473_comment'></div>并与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>洗涤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372473_comment'></div>况前件人等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372473_comment'></div>悉是东川将吏百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372473_comment'></div>及寄住衣冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372473_comment'></div>与贼党素无管属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372473_comment'></div>贼军奄至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372473_comment'></div>暂被<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>胁从</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372473_comment'></div>狂寇既平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372473_comment'></div>再蒙恩荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372473_comment'></div>严砺公违诏命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372473_comment'></div>苟利资财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372473_comment'></div>擅破八十馀家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372473_comment'></div>曾无一字闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372473_comment'></div>岂惟剥下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372473_comment'></div>实谓欺天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372473_comment'></div>其庄宅等至今被使司收管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372473_comment'></div>臣访闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>本主</span>并在侧近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372473_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>控告</span>无路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372473_comment'></div>渐至流亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372473_comment'></div>伏乞圣慈勒本道长吏及诸州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372473_comment'></div>招缉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>疲人</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372473_comment'></div>一切<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>却还</span>产业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372473_comment'></div>庶使孤穷有托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372473_comment'></div>编户再安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372473_comment'></div>其本判官及所管刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372473_comment'></div>仍乞重加贬责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372473_comment'></div>以惩奸欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372473_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_69_1372473'>严砺又于管内诸州元和二年两税钱外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372473_comment'></div>加配百姓草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372473_comment'></div>共四十一万四千八百六十七束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372473_comment'></div>每束重一十一斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372473_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_73_1372473'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372473_comment'></div>臣伏准前后制敕及每岁旨条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372473_comment'></div>两税留州使钱外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372473_comment'></div>加率一钱一物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372473_comment'></div>州府长吏并同枉法计赃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372473_comment'></div>仍令出使御史访察闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372473_comment'></div>又准元和三年赦文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372473_comment'></div>大辟罪已下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372473_comment'></div>蒙恩涤荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372473_comment'></div>惟官典犯赃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372473_comment'></div>不在此限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372473_comment'></div>臣访闻严砺加配前件草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372473_comment'></div>准前月日追得文案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372473_comment'></div>及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>执行</span>案典姚孚检勘得实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372473_comment'></div>据严砺元和二年七月二十一日举牒称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372473_comment'></div>管内邮驿要草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372473_comment'></div>于诸州秋税钱上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372473_comment'></div>每贯加配一束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372473_comment'></div>至三年秋税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372473_comment'></div>又准前加配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372473_comment'></div>计当上件草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372473_comment'></div>臣伏准每年旨条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372473_comment'></div>馆驿自有正科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372473_comment'></div>不合于两税钱外擅有加徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372473_comment'></div>况严砺元和三年举牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372473_comment'></div>已云准二年旧例徵收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372473_comment'></div>必恐自此相承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372473_comment'></div>永为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_100_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>疲人</span>重困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372473_comment'></div>伏乞勒本道长吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372473_comment'></div>严加禁断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372473_comment'></div>本判官及刺史等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372473_comment'></div>伏乞准前科责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372473_comment'></div>以息诛求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372473_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_106_1372473'>严砺又于梓遂两州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372473_comment'></div>元和二年两税外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372473_comment'></div>加徵钱共七千贯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372473_comment'></div>米共五千石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372473_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_110_1372473'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372473_comment'></div>臣伏准前月日追得文案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372473_comment'></div>及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_112_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/112/Comments/0")'>执行</span>案典赵明志检勘得实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372473_comment'></div>据严砺元和二年六月举牒称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1372473_comment'></div>绵剑两州供元和元年北军<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_114_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>顿递</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1372473_comment'></div>费用倍多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372473_comment'></div>量于梓遂两州秋税外加配上件钱米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372473_comment'></div>添填绵剑两州<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_117_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>顿递</span>费用者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372473_comment'></div>臣又牒勘绵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372473_comment'></div>得报称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1372473_comment'></div>元和二年军资钱米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1372473_comment'></div>悉准旧额徵收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1372473_comment'></div>尽送使讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1372473_comment'></div>并不曾交领得梓遂等州钱米添填<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_123_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>顿递</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1372473_comment'></div>亦无尅折当州钱米处者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1372473_comment'></div>臣又牒勘剑州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1372473_comment'></div>得报称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1372473_comment'></div>元和元年所供<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_127_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/127/Comments/0")'>顿递</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1372473_comment'></div>侵用百姓腹内两年夏税钱四千二十三贯三文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1372473_comment'></div>使司今于其年军资钱内尅下讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1372473_comment'></div>其米即用元和元年米充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1372473_comment'></div>并不侵用二年军资米数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1372473_comment'></div>使司亦不曾支梓州遂州钱米充填者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1372473_comment'></div>臣伏念绵剑两州供顿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1372473_comment'></div>自合准敕优矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1372473_comment'></div>梓遂百姓何辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1372473_comment'></div>擅令倍出租赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1372473_comment'></div>况所徵钱米数内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1372473_comment'></div>惟尅下剑州军资钱四千二十三贯三文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1372473_comment'></div>其馀钱米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1372473_comment'></div>并是严砺加徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1372473_comment'></div>别有支用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1372473_comment'></div>其本判官及梓州遂州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1372473_comment'></div>悉合科处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1372473_comment'></div>以例将来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1372473_comment'></div>擅收没涂山甫等庄宅奴婢及于两税外加配钱米草等本判官及诸州刺史名衔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1372473_comment'></div>并所收<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_146_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/146/Comments/0")'>色目</span>。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_293_1372473_comment'></div>抚事论情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_294_1372473_comment'></div>岂宜免戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_295_1372473_comment'></div>但以罪非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_296_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/296/Comments/0")'>首坐</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_296_1372473_comment'></div>法合会恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_297_1372473_comment'></div>亦以恩后加徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_298_1372473_comment'></div>又已去官停职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_299_1372473_comment'></div>俾从宥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_300_1372473_comment'></div>重此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_301_1372473", 1372473, "Clauses/301/Comments/0")'>典常</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_301_1372473_comment'></div>其恩后加徵草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_302_1372473_comment'></div>及柳蒙陶锽李怤张平邵膺陈当刘文翼等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_303_1372473_comment'></div>宜各罚两月俸料。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_304_1372473_comment'></div>仍书下考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_305_1372473_comment'></div>馀并释放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_306_1372473_comment'></div>牒至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_307_1372473_comment'></div>准敕故牒。</div><div id='poem_sentence_308_1372473_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1372473'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_169_1372473_0'>⑴ 元和二年三万一千七百九十三束元和三年四万四千一百六十束</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_176_1372473_0'>⑵ 元和二年二万四千五百三束元和三年二万五千四百八十二束</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_180_1372473_0'>⑶ 元和二年三万八千九十三束元和三年五万五百九十五束</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_183_1372473_0'>⑷ 元和二年九千三十九束元和三年一万二千七百七十八束</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1372473_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在梓州，有诗。作品：《山枇杷花二首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（（已亡佚））</span><div id='poem_6747' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6747_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6747'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(779, "poem_allusion_6747")'>汉武眼穿</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6747_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6747'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6747'><span id='poem_sentence_2_6747_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6747'>紧搏<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作缚）</span>红袖欲支颐，慢解绛囊初<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_8_6747_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6747'>说向闲人人不听，曾向乐天时一说。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6747_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_6831' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6831' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6831?labeling=true' target='_blank'>西州院<span class='inlineComment2'>（东川官舍）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（809年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6831")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6831_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6831'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6831'>自入西州院，唯见东川城。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6831_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6831'>今夜城头月，非暗又非明。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6831_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6831'>文案床席满，卷舒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6831", 6831, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>赃罪</span>名。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6831_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6831'>惨悽且烦勌，弃之阶下行。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6831_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6831'>怅望天回转<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，动摇万里情。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6831_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6831'>参辰次第出<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，牛女颠倒倾<sup "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>鸦鸦</span>相唤惊。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6831_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6831'>墙上杜鹃鸟，又作思归鸣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6831_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6831'>以彼撩乱思，吟为幽怨声。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6831_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6831'>吟罢终不寝，鼕鼕复铛铛。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6831_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6831'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_6831_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6831'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6831_0'>⑴ 天回转：即银河回转，由于地球之自转，银河始终自西向东移动。此谓夜已深。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6831_0'>⑵ 参辰：参星与辰星，分别于酉时与卯时出现于天空之西方与东方，出没各不相见。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6831_0'>⑶ 牛女：星座名，指牵牛星与织女星。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6831_0'>⑷ “杜鹃”二句：见卷1《思归乐》注。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6831_comment'></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
河南

id='poem_sentence_10_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6749'>排房似缀珠<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，欲啼红脸泪。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6749'>冷饮空腹杯，因成日高醉。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6749'>酒醒闻<span class='link'
