id='poem_sentence_38_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6749'>召见不须臾，憸庸已猜忌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒆</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6749'>朝陪香案班<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒇</sup>，暮作风尘尉<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(21)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_40_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_6749'>去岁又登朝，登为柏台吏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(22)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_41_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_6749'>台官相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_6749", 6749, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>束缚</span>，不许放情志。<div id='poem_sentence_42_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_6749'>寓直劳送迎<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(23)</sup>，上堂烦避讳。<div id='poem_sentence_43_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_6749'>分司在东洛<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(24)</sup>，所职尤不易。<div id='poem_sentence_44_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_6749'>罚俸得西归，心知受朝庇。<div id='poem_sentence_45_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_6749'>常山攻小寇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(25)</sup>，淮右择良帅<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(26)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_46_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_6749'>国难身不行，劳生欲何为。<div id='poem_sentence_47_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_6749'>吾兄谙性灵，崔子同<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_6749", 6749, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>臭味</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_48_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_6749'>投此挂冠词<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(27)</sup>，一生还自恣。<div id='poem_sentence_49_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_6749'></div><div id='poem_sentence_50_6749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6749'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6749_0'>⑴ 醲：厚。《广雅·释诂三》：“醲，厚也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6749_0'>⑵ 曲江：在今陕西西安市南，秦为宜春苑，汉为乐游原，有河水曲折盘桓，故名。隋文帝以其名不正，更名芙蓉苑，唐复名曲江。开元中复加疏凿，为长安游赏胜地。《唐两京城坊考》卷三：“曲江，龙华寺之南有流水屈曲，谓之曲江……南即紫云楼、芙蓉苑，西即杏园、慈恩寺。花卉周环，烟水明媚，都人游赏……以为盛观。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6749_0'>⑶ 慈恩寺：在长安晋昌坊，今西安市南郊。《唐两京城坊考》卷三：“大慈恩寺，隋无漏寺之地，武德初废。贞观二十二年十二月二十四日，高宗在春宫，为文德皇后立为寺，故以慈恩为名。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6749_0'>⑷ 杏园：在长安通善坊，故阯在今陕西西安市南郊大雁塔南。每年春，赐新及第进士宴饮于此。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6749_0'>⑸ 排房：指杏树枝头排列成行之花房。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_6749_0'>⑹ 饭钟：指寺院中僧徒提示进餐之钟声。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6749_0'>⑺ 既：尽，完。《广雅·释诂一》：“既，尽也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_6749_0'>⑻ 九华观：在长安朱雀门街之西第一街街西自北向南之第二坊通义坊，开元十八年（730）唐睿宗女蔡国公主舍宅所立。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_6749_0'>⑼ 三条隧：泛指京都之纵横大道。隧，《诗·大雅·桑柔》：“大风有隧，有空大谷。”毛传：“隧，道也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_21_6749_0'>⑽ 旬休：古代官吏每十天休假一天，称旬休。《唐会要·休假》（卷八二）：“永徽三年二月十一日，上以天下无虞，百司务简，每至旬假，许不视事，以与百僚休沐。”韦应物《休暇日访王侍御不遇》：“九日驰驱一日闲。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_21_6749_0'>⑾ 春赐：春天以朝廷或皇帝之名义赏赐权贵之物。寒食过后取榆火以赐贵近，即其类也。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_24_6749_0'>⑿ 寝兴：见本卷《秋堂夕》注。此泛指日常起居。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_27_6749_0'>⒀ 倾盖：车上之伞盖靠在一起。《史记·鲁仲连邹阳列传》：“谚曰：‘白头如新，倾盖如故。’何则？知与不知也。”司马贞索隐引《志林》曰：“倾盖者，道行相遇，軿车对语，两盖相切，小欹之，故曰倾。”亦指初次相逢或订交。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_6749_0'>⒁ 犯声：指词曲变调。宋陈旸《乐书·犯调》（卷一六四）：“乐府诸曲，自古不用犯声，以为不顺也。唐自天后末年，剑气入浑脱，始为犯声之始。剑气，宫调；浑脱，角调。以臣犯君，故有犯声。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_6749_0'>⒂ 变筹：即在律令中使用“改令”手段以变换酒令。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_33_6749_0'>⒃ 投盘：即骰盘，唐代酒令之一，用于活跃酒筵气氛。白居易《东南行一百韵》自注：“骰盘、卷白波、莫走、鞍马，皆当时酒令。”皇甫松《醉乡日月》载骰子令云：“聚十只骰子齐掷，自出手之人，依采饮焉。‘堂印’，本采人劝合席；‘碧油’，劝掷外三人。骰子聚于一处，谓之‘酒星’，依采聚散。骰子令中，改易不过三章，次改鞍马令，不过一章。又有旗幡令、闪擪令、抛打令。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_33_6749_0'>⒄ 生狞：犹言狰狞，凶恶、凶狠之意。摄：代理，兼理。《广韵·叶韵》：“摄，兼也。”觥使：宴席上掌管行酒之人。参卷11《痁卧闻幕中诸公征乐会饮因有戏呈三十韵》自注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_38_6749_0'>⒅ 拾遗：古官名。唐武则天垂拱元年（685）始置左、右拾遗二员，从八品上，分隶中书、门下，掌供奉讽谏，为士人之清选。此指拾遗之职责拾遗补阙。元稹元和元年官左拾遗。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_39_6749_0'>⒆ 憸庸：奸佞无能之辈。憸，《说文·心部》：“憸，憸诐也。憸利于上，佞人也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_40_6749_0'>⒇ 香案班：朝班。香案，放置香炉烛台之条桌。《新唐书·仪卫志上》：“朝日，殿上设黼扆、蹑席、熏炉、香案。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_40_6749_0'>(21) 风尘尉：指河南县尉。元稹元和元年九月由左拾遗出为河南县尉。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_41_6749_0'>(22) 柏台吏：指监察御史。元和元年四年二月除监察御史。柏台，御史台之别称。《汉书·朱博传》（卷八三）载汉代御史台列植柏树，故称。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_43_6749_0'>(23) 寓直：寄宿于其他官署当值，后泛指夜间于官署值班。唐李匡乂《资暇集》卷中谓“寓直”二字始于潘岳《秋兴赋》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_44_6749_0'>(24) 分司：见本卷《台中鞫狱忆开元观旧事呈损之兼赠周兄四十韵》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_46_6749_0'>(25) “常山”句：指讨伐成德军节度使王承宗。元和四年十月，王承宗反，朝廷以吐突承璀为镇州招讨宣慰使。常山，即镇州，成德军节度使之治所。《元和郡县图志·恒州（镇州）》（卷一七）：“汉高帝三年，韩信东下井陉，击破陈馀、赵王歇，以钜鹿之北境置恒山郡，因恒山为名，后避文帝讳，改曰常山。两汉恒山太守皆理于元氏，晋理于真定，即今常山故城是也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_46_6749_0'>(26) 淮右：即淮西。元和四年十一月，淮西节度使吴少诚卒，吴少阳擅杀少诚之子而代立，朝廷发兵讨之。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_49_6749_0'>(27) 挂冠：晋袁宏《后汉纪·光武帝纪五》：“（逢萌）闻王莽居摄，子宇谏，莽杀之。萌会友人曰：‘三纲绝矣，祸将及人。’即解衣冠，挂东都城门，将家属客于辽东。”又，南朝梁陶弘景，于齐高帝作相时，曾被引为诸王侍读。家贫，求作县令不得，乃脱朝服挂神武门，上表辞禄。事详《南史·隐逸传下·陶弘景》。后因之指辞官、弃官归隐。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6749_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
蓝田
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='1fa2010fa6624749b90c8e0e64a52a46_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1fa2010fa6624749b90c8e0e64a52a46");'><span id='1fa2010fa6624749b90c8e0e64a52a46_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>，32岁</div><div id='1fa2010fa6624749b90c8e0e64a52a46' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>经化感寺。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至清源寺，有诗。作品：《山竹枝》<div id='poem_6436' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6436' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6436?labeling=true' target='_blank'>山竹枝<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6436")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6436_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6436_0'>① 自化感寺携来，至清源，投之辋川耳。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6436'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6436'>深院虎溪竹，远公身自栽。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6436_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6436'>多惭折君节，扶我出山来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6436_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6436'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6436", 6436, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>贵宅</span>安危步，难将混俗材。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6436_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6436'>还投辋川水，从作老龙回。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6436_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6436'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6436_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>溯灞水，有诗。作品：《辋川》<div id='poem_6381' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6381' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6381?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辋川</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6381")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6381_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6381'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6381'>世累为身累，闲忙不自由。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6381'>殷勤辋川水，何事出山流。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6381'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6381_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='38257f22a5914e7cba6f8b79e04c3569_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("38257f22a5914e7cba6f8b79e04c3569");'><span id='38257f22a5914e7cba6f8b79e04c3569_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>，37岁</div><div id='38257f22a5914e7cba6f8b79e04c3569' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至蓝桥驿，题诗于柱，留呈刘禹锡、柳宗元、李景俭。作品：《留呈梦得子厚致用》<div id='poem_6597' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6597' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6597?labeling=true' target='_blank'>留呈梦得子厚致用<span class='inlineComment2'>（题蓝桥驿）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6597")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6597_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6597'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6597'>泉溜才通疑夜磬，烧<span class='inlineComment2'>（去声）</span>烟馀暖有春泥。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6597_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6597'>千层玉帐铺松盖，五出银区印虎蹄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6597_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6597'>暗落金乌山渐黑，深埋粉堠路浑迷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6597_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6597'>心知魏阙无多地，十二琼楼百里西。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6597_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6597'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6597_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至蓝田，宿窦晦之宅。元、窦约贞元、元和之际相识。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
商洛（上洛）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='b2be79d07ede4f63a00031940b779c3e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b2be79d07ede4f63a00031940b779c3e");'><span id='b2be79d07ede4f63a00031940b779c3e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>，32岁</div><div id='b2be79d07ede4f63a00031940b779c3e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　入商山路，有诗。作品：《春蝉》<div id='poem_6911' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6911' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6911?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春蝉</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6911")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6911_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6911'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6911'>我自东归日<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，厌苦春鸠声<span class='inlineComment2'>（春鸠：见本卷《春鸠》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6911'>作诗怜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6911", 6911, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>化工</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（化工：见本卷《春鸠》注。）</span>，不遣春蝉生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6911'>及来商山道<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，山深气不平。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6911'>春秋两相似，虫豸百种鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6911'>风松不成韵，蜩螗沸如羹<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6911'>岂无朝阳凤<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，羞与微物争。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6911'>安得天上雨，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6911", 6911, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>奔浑</span>河海倾。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6911'>荡涤反时气，然后好晴明。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6911'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_6911_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6911'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6911_0'>⑴ 东归：指元和五年春自东都洛阳被召回西京长安。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6911_0'>⑵ 商山道：商山在今陕西商州东。《旧唐书·地理一·商州上洛郡》：“贞元七年，刺史李西华自蓝田至内乡开新道七百馀里，回山取涂，人不病涉，谓之偏路。”元稹所经当即此路。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6911_0'>⑶ “蜩螗”句：《诗·大雅·荡》：“如蜩如螗，如沸如羹。”蜩螗，蝉之别名；沸如羹，即如沸如羹之省，形容声音噪杂喧闹，如水滚羹沸。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6911_0'>⑷ 朝阳凤：朝阳鸣凤之省，语出《诗·大雅·卷阿》：“凤凰鸣矣，于彼高岗；梧桐生矣，于彼朝阳。”比喻品德出众、正直敢谏之人。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6911_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　宿商山驿馆，有诗。作品：《感梦》（行吟坐歎知何極）《商州酬乐天》<span class='inlineComment2'>（（拟题））</span><div id='poem_6385' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6385' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6385?labeling=true' target='_blank'>感梦</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6385")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6385_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6385'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6385'>行吟坐叹知何极，影绝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6385", 6385, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>魂销</span>动隔年。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6385'>今夜商山馆中梦，分明同在后堂前。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6385'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6385_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　经四皓驿，有诗。作品：《四皓庙》<div id='poem_6786' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6786' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6786?labeling=true' target='_blank'>四皓庙</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6786")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6786_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6786'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6221, "poem_allusion_6786")'>茅焦脱衣谏</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6786_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6786'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6786'>巢由昔避世，尧舜不得臣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6786'>伊吕虽急病，汤武乃可君<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6786'>四贤胡为者，千载名氛氲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6786'>显晦有遗迹，前后疑不伦。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6786'>秦政虐天下<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6786", 6786, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>黩武</span>穷生民。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6786'>诸侯战必死，壮士眉亦嚬<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6786'>张良韩孺子，椎碎属车轮<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6786'>遂令英雄意，日夜思报秦。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6786'>先生相将去，不复婴世尘。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6786'>云卷在孤岫，龙潜为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6786", 6786, "Clauses/19/Comments/1")'>小鳞</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6786'>秦王转无道<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，谏者鼎镬亲<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6786'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6221, "poem_sentence_11_6786")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6786", 6786, "Clauses/22/Comments/2")'>茅焦</span>脱衣谏</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>，先生无一言。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6786'>赵高杀二世<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>，先生如不闻。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6786'>刘项取天下<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>，先生游白云。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6786'>海内八年战，先生全一身。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6786'>汉业日已定，先生名亦振。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6786'>不得为济世，宜哉为隐沦。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6786'>如何一朝起，屈作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_6786", 6786, "Clauses/35/Comments/1")'>储贰</span>宾<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6786'>安存孝惠帝，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_6786", 6786, "Clauses/37/Comments/1")'>摧悴</span>戚夫人<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6786'>舍大以谋细，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_6786", 6786, "Clauses/39/Comments/1")'>虬盘</span>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_6786", 6786, "Clauses/39/Comments/2")'>蠖伸</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒁</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6786'>惠帝竟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_6786", 6786, "Clauses/40/Comments/1")'>不嗣</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（不嗣：没有子嗣。）</span>，吕氏祸有因。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6786'>虽怀安刘志，未若周与陈<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒂</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6786'>皆落子房术<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒃</sup>，先生道何屯<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒄</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6786'>出处贵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_6786", 6786, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>明白</span>，故吾今有云。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6786'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_6786_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6786'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6786_0'>⑴ “巢由”二句：巢由，巢父、许由之并称，传说为唐尧时隐士。晋皇甫谧《高士传》卷上：“巢父者，尧时隐人也。山居，不营世利，年老以树为巢而寝其上，故时人号曰巢父。尧之让许由也，由以告巢父，巢父曰：‘汝何不隐汝形，藏汝光？若非吾友也。’击其膺而下之。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6786_0'>⑵ “伊吕”二句：伊吕，伊尹、吕尚之并称。伊尹名挚，又名阿衡，说商汤以王道，被委以国政，佐汤为相。事详《史记·殷本纪》；吕尚，本姓姜，封于吕。尚穷困年老，遇西伯（周文王）于渭阳，后辅佐周武王灭殷。事详《史记·齐太公世家》。虽，通惟，独。清王引之《经传释词》卷三：“惟，独也。亦作虽。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6786_0'>⑶ 秦政：即秦始皇。秦始皇姓嬴名政，故称秦政。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6786_0'>⑷ 嚬：通颦。皱眉头，表示忧愁或郁闷。《正字通·口部》：“嚬，眉蹙也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6786_0'>⑸ “张良”二句：张良，字子房，传为城父（今安徽亳县东南）人。其先祖五世相韩，秦灭韩，良结交刺客，在博浪沙谋刺秦始皇未遂。后更姓名，亡匿下邳，得黄石公兵法，辅佐刘邦建立西汉政权，被封为留侯。事详《史记·留侯世家》。孺子，古代称天子、诸侯、世卿之继承人。参钱大昕《十驾斋养新录·孺子》。属车，帝王出行时之侍从车。秦汉以来，皇帝大驾属车八十一乘，法驾属车三十六乘，分左中右三列行进。宋高承《事物纪原·舆驾羽卫·属车》：“周末诸侯有贰车九乘，贰车即属车也，亦周制所有。秦灭九国，兼其车服，故八十一乘。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6786_0'>⑹ 龙潜：《易·干》：“潜龙勿用。”唐孔颖达疏：“潜者，隐伏之名；龙者，变化之物……圣人作法言，于此潜龙之时，小人道盛，圣人虽有龙德，于此唯宜潜藏，勿可施用，故言勿用。”比喻圣人未遭其时或贤才未蒙知遇。小鳞：小鱼。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6786_0'>⑺ 王：蜀本、杨本、胡本、类苑作“皇”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6786_0'>⑻ 鼎镬亲：受鼎镬之刑。鼎镬，古代之酷刑，即用烹饪器具鼎镬烹人。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6786_0'>⑼ “茅焦”句：齐人茅焦冒死谏秦始皇，谓其迁母不孝，谏后即脱衣就刑。秦始皇纳其谏，尊为上卿。事详刘向《说苑·正谏》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6786_0'>⑽ “赵高”句：秦宦官赵高，本赵国贵族，入秦专权二十馀年。西元前二○七年，杀秦二世，立子婴为帝。事详《史记·秦始皇本纪》。何焯云：“茅焦谏始皇，在未并六国之前。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6786_0'>⑾ 刘项：刘邦、项羽之并称。秦末，刘、项等起兵反秦，后刘邦击败项羽，建立汉朝。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6786_0'>⑿ 储贰宾：太子之幕僚。储贰，太子。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_6786_0'>⒀ “安存”二句：孝惠帝，即太子刘盈，吕后所出。戚夫人，刘邦之宠姬，生赵王如意。刘邦以如意类己，欲废刘盈而立如意。吕后用张良计，召四皓辅佐刘盈，刘邦废立之意遂寝。后吕后鸩杀如意，断戚夫人手足，并去其眼，煇耳，饮以瘖药，使居厕中，命曰“人彘”。事详《史记·吕太后本纪》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_6786_0'>⒁ 虬盘：如虬龙般盘曲其体，比喻人生不得意。虬，传说中之无角龙。蠖伸：如尺蠖般伸延其体，比喻人生得意之时。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_21_6786_0'>⒂ 周与陈：周勃与陈平。周勃，沛（今江苏省沛县）人。为人质朴敦厚，刘邦以为可成大事，遗言“安刘氏者必勃也”。吕后死，诸吕谋夺朝政，勃以太尉之身份入主北军，诛灭诸吕，还政于刘氏。事详《史记·高祖本纪》、《吕太后本纪》、《绛侯世家》。陈平，阳武（今河南省原阳东南）人。因刘邦之遗言，于孝惠帝六年（前一八九）为左丞相，吕后元年迁右丞相。吕后死，平与周勃合谋诛诸吕，立文帝。事详《史记·陈丞相世家》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_22_6786_0'>⒃ “皆落”句：《史记·留侯世家》：“汉十二年，上从击破布军归，疾益甚，愈欲易太子。留侯谏，不听……及燕，置酒，太子侍。四人从太子……上乃大惊，曰：‘吾求公数岁，公辟逃我，今公何自从吾儿游乎？’四人皆曰：‘陛下轻士善骂，臣等义不受辱，故恐而亡匿。窃闻太子为人仁孝，恭敬爱士，天下莫不延颈欲为太子死者，故臣等来耳。’……竟不易太子者，留侯本招此四人之力也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_22_6786_0'>⒄ 屯：艰难。《说文·屮部》：“屯，难也，象草木之初生屯然而难。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6786_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　至曾峰馆，有诗。作品：《三月二十四日宿曾峰馆夜对桐花寄乐天》<span class='inlineComment2'>（曾峰馆在今陕西商州之东、武关之西。）</span>《桐花》《桐花落》<div id='poem_6740' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6740' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6740?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三月二十四日宿曾峰馆夜对桐花寄乐天</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年3月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6740")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6740_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6740'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6740'>微月照桐花，月微花漠漠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6740_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6740'>怨澹不胜情，低回拂帘幕。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6740_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6740'>叶新阴影细，露重枝条弱。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6740_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6740'>夜久春恨多，风清暗香薄。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6740_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6740'>是夕远思君，思君瘦如削。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6740_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6740'>但感事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6740", 6740, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>睽违</span>，非言官好恶。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6740_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6740'>奏书金銮殿<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6740", 6740, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>步屣</span>青龙阁<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6740_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6740'>我在山馆中，满地桐花落。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6740_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6740'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_6740_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6740'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6740_0'>⑴ 金銮殿：唐代宫殿名，为文人学士待诏之所。宋程大昌《雍录·唐翰苑位置》（卷四）：“寝殿既在翰苑之左，而金銮殿又在学士院之左，则金銮益近寝殿矣。自有金銮殿后，宣对多在金銮，则知其谨并寝殿矣，以其近也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6740_0'>⑵ 青龙阁：青龙寺之阁。青龙寺在长安朱雀门街之东第四街街东自北向南之第八坊新昌坊，本隋之灵感寺，龙朔二年城阳公主奏立为观音寺，景云二年改青龙寺，为城内登临之胜地。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6740_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6925' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6925' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6925?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桐花</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6925")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6925_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6925'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6925'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6925", 6925, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>胧月</span>上山馆，紫桐垂好阴<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6925'>可惜<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作怜）</span>暗澹色，无人知此心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6925'>舜没苍梧野<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，凤归丹穴岑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6925'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6925", 6925, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>遗落</span>在人世，光华那复深。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6925'>年年怨春意，不竞桃杏林。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6925'>唯占清明后，牡丹还复侵。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6925'>况此空馆闭，云谁恣幽寻。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6925'>徒烦鸟噪集，不语山嵚岑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6925'>满院青苔地，一树莲花簪。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6925'>自开还自落，暗芳终暗沈。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6925'>尔生不得所，我愿裁为琴<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6925'>安置君王侧，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6925", 6925, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>调和</span>元首音。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6925'>安问宫徵角<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，先辨<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作辩）</span>雅郑淫<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6925'>宫弦春以君，君若春日临。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6925'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_6925", 6925, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>商弦</span>廉以臣，臣作旱天霖。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6925'>人安角声畅，人困斗不任。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6925'>羽以类万物，祆<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作祅）</span>物神不歆。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6925'>徵以节百事，奉事罔不钦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6925'>五者苟不乱，天命乃可忱。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6925'>君若问孝理，弹作梁山吟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6925'>君若事宗庙，拊以和<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_6925", 6925, "Clauses/41/Comments/1")'>球琳</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6925'>君若不好谏，愿献触疏箴。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6925'>君若不罢猎，请听荒于禽。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6925'>君若侈台殿，雍门可沾襟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6925'>君若傲贤隽，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_6925", 6925, "Clauses/49/Comments/1")'>鹿鸣</span>有食芩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6925'>君闻祈招什，车马勿骎骎<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6925'>君若欲败度<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒁</sup>，中有式如金<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒂</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6925'>君闻薰风操<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒃</sup>，志气在愔愔<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒄</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6925'>中有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_6925", 6925, "Clauses/56/Comments/1")'>阜财</span>语<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒅</sup>，勿受来献琛<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒆</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6925'>北里当绝听<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒇</sup>，祸莫大于淫。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6925'>南风苟不竞，无往遗之擒<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(21)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6925'>奸声不入耳，巧言宁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_6925", 6925, "Clauses/63/Comments/1")'>孔壬</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(22)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6925'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_6925", 6925, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>枭音</span>亦云革，安得沴与祲。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6925'>天子既穆穆，群材亦森森。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6925'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_6925", 6925, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>剑士</span>还<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_6925", 6925, "Clauses/68/Comments/1")'>农野</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_6925", 6925, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>丝人</span>归<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_6925", 6925, "Clauses/69/Comments/1")'>织纴</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6925'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_6925", 6925, "Clauses/70/Comments/1")'>丹凤</span>巢阿阁<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(23)</sup>，文鱼游<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_6925", 6925, "Clauses/71/Comments/1")'>碧浔</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(24)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6925'>和气浃寰海，易若溉蹄涔<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(25)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6925'>改张乃可鼓，此语无古今。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6925'>非琴独能尔，事有谕因针<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(26)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_38_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6925'>感尔桐花意，闲怨杳难禁。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6925'>待我持斤斧，置君为大琛<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(27)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_40_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_6925'></div><div id='poem_sentence_41_6925_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6925'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6925_0'>⑴ 紫桐：桐树之一种。《本草·桐》集解：“颂曰：‘有紫桐，花如百合，实堪糖煮以啖。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6925_0'>⑵ “舜没”句：《山海经·海内经》：“南方苍梧之丘，苍梧之渊，其中有九疑山，舜之所葬，在长沙零陵界中。”郭璞注：“其山九溪皆相似，故云‘九疑’。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6925_0'>⑶ “凤归”句：《山海经·南山经》：“丹穴之山……有鸟焉，其状如鸡，五采而文，名曰凤凰。”凤凰非梧桐不栖，非炼食不食，故言梧桐而及凤凰。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6925_0'>⑷ 嵚岑：高峻貌。《楚辞·淮南小山〈招隐士〉》：“嵚岑埼礒兮，硱磳磈硊。”洪兴祖补注：“嵚岑，山高险也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6925_0'>⑸ “我愿”句：梧桐为制琴之良材。晋郭璞《梧桐赞》：“桐实嘉木，凤凰所栖。爰伐琴瑟，八音克谐。歌以永言，噰噰喈喈。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6925_0'>⑹ 宫徵角：古代五音中之三个音，此泛指五音。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6925_1'>⑺ 雅郑：古代儒家以郑声为淫邪之音，以雅声为雅正之声。语本汉扬雄《法言·吾子》：“或问：‘交五声十二律也，或雅或郑，何也？’曰：‘中正则雅，多哇则郑。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6925_0'>⑻ “宫弦”以下十句：《礼记·乐记》：“宫为君，商为臣，角为民，徵为事，羽为物。五者不乱，则无怗懑之音矣。”又，《史记·田敬仲完世家》：驺忌子见齐威王鼓琴，曰：“夫大弦浊以春温者君也，小弦廉折以清者相也。”祅，通妖。《资治通鉴·汉昭帝元平元年》：“王怒，谓胜为祅言，缚以属吏。”胡三省注：“祅，与妖同。”歆，保祐。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_6925_0'>⑼ 《梁山吟》：古乐曲名，传说曾子雪天思亲，乃作《梁山吟》以寄意焉。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_6925_0'>⑽ 拊：轻轻敲击。《尚书·益稷》：“予击石拊石。”蔡沈传：“重击曰击，轻击曰拊。”和：以声相应。球琳：皆美玉名，此泛指美玉。《尚书·禹贡》：“（雍州）厥贡惟球琳琅玕。”孔传：“球琳，皆玉名。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_6925_0'>⑾ “雍门”：汉刘向《说苑·善说》：战国齐人雍门子周善鼓琴，以悲声耸动人听。访孟尝君，先以言词，后“徐动宫徵，微挥羽角，切终而曲成。孟尝君涕浪污增欷而就之，曰：‘先生之鼓琴，令文立若破国亡邑之人也！’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_24_6925_0'>⑿ “《鹿鸣》”句：《诗·小雅》篇名，为君主宴群臣之什，有“呦呦鹿鸣，食野之蘋。我有嘉宾，鼓瑟吹笙。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_25_6925_0'>⒀ “君闻”二句：《左传·昭公十二年》：“昔穆王欲肆其心，周行天下……祭公谋父作《祈招》之诗，以止王心。”《诗·逸诗·祈招》今仅存六句，馀已亡佚。骎骎，马疾驰貌。《诗·小雅·四牡》：“驾彼四骆，载骤骎骎。”毛传：“骎骎，骤也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_26_6925_0'>⒁ 败度：败坏法度。《尚书·太甲中》：“予小子不明于德，自底不类，欲败度，纵败礼，以速戾于厥躬。”孔传：“言己放纵情欲，毁败礼仪、法度，以召罪于其身。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_26_6925_0'>⒂ 式：准则，指言行所依据之法则。《诗·大雅·下武》：“成王之孚，下土之式。”毛传：“式，法也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_27_6925_0'>⒃ 《薰风操》：相传舜唱《南风歌》，有“南风之薰兮”，因以“薰风”指《南风歌》。见《孔子家语·辨乐》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_27_6925_0'>⒄ 愔愔：和悦安舒貌。《左传·昭公十二年》：“祈招之愔愔，式招德音。”杜预注：“愔愔，安和貌。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_28_6925_0'>⒅ “中有”句：《南风歌》之歌辞有“南风之时兮，可以阜吾民之财兮”之语。阜财，积聚财物。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_28_6925_0'>⒆ 琛：通琛，珍宝。《集韵·侵韵》：“琛，《尔雅》：‘宝也。’或从贝。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_6925_0'>⒇ 北里：古乐舞名。《史记·殷本纪》：“帝纣……好酒淫乐，嬖于妇人。爱妲己，妲己之言是从。于是使师涓作新淫声，北里之舞，靡靡之乐。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_30_6925_0'>(21) “南风”二句：《左传·襄公十八年》：“晋人闻有楚师，师旷曰：‘不害，吾骤歌北风，又歌南风，南风不竞，多死声，楚必无功。’”杜预注：“歌者吹律以咏八风，南风音微，故曰不竞。师旷唯歌北风者，听晋、楚之强弱。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_6925_0'>(22) 孔壬：大奸佞。《后汉书·郅恽传》：“昔虞舜辅尧，四罪咸服，谗言弗庸，孔壬不行，故能作股肱，帝用有歌。”李贤注：“孔，甚也；壬，佞也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_35_6925_0'>(23) “丹凤”句：阿阁，四面均有檐溜之楼阁。《文选·〈西北有高楼〉》：“阿阁三重阶”，李善注：“《尚书中候》曰：‘昔黄帝轩辕，凤凰巢阿阁。’《周书》曰：‘明堂咸有四阿。’然则阁有四阿，谓之阿阁。郑玄《周礼》注：‘四阿，若今四注者也。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_35_6925_0'>(24) 文鱼：有斑彩之鱼。《山海经·中山经》：“荆山之首曰景山……雎水出焉，东南流注于江，其中多丹粟，多文鱼。”郭璞注：“有斑彩也。”浔：水边。《说文·水部》：“浔，旁深也。”段玉裁注：“今人用此字，取义于‘旁’而已。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_36_6925_0'>(25) 蹄涔：《淮南子·汜论训》：“夫牛蹄之涔，不能生鳣鲔。”高诱注：“涔，雨水也。满牛蹄迹中，言其小也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_38_6925_0'>(26) 谕因针：汉刘向《说苑》卷一一：“孟尝君寄客于齐王，三年而不见用，故客反谓孟尝君曰：‘君之寄臣也，三年而不见用，不知臣之罪也，君之过也？’孟尝君曰：‘寡人闻之，缕因针而入，不因针而急；嫁女因媒而成，不因媒而亲。夫子之材必薄矣，尚何怨乎寡人哉？”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_40_6925_0'>(27) 琛：珍宝。《尔雅·释言》：“琛，宝也。”邢炳疏：“谓珍宝也。”。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6925_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6926' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6926' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6926?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桐花落</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6926")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6926_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6926'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6926'>莎草遍桐阴，桐花满莎落。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6926_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6926'>盖覆相团圆，可怜无厚薄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6926_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6926'>昔岁幽院中，深堂下帘幕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6926_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6926'>同在后门前，因论花好恶。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6926_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6926'>君誇沈檀样，云是指撝作。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6926_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6926'>暗澹灭紫花，句连蹙金萼。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6926_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6926'>都绣六七枝，斗成双孔雀。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6926_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6926'>尾上稠叠花，又将金解络。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6926_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6926'>我爱看不已，君烦睡先著。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6926_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6926'>我作绣桐诗，系君裙带著。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6926_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6926'>别来苦修道，此意都萧索。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6926_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6926'>今日竟相牵，思量偶然错。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6926_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6926'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_6926_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　过武关，忆白居易，题诗道旁墙上。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　过青云驿，有诗。作品：《青云驿》<div id='poem_6900' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6900' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6900?labeling=true' target='_blank'>青云驿</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6900")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6900_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6900'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(531, "poem_allusion_6900")'>获麟</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3580, "poem_allusion_6900")'>三公灌蔬</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4918, "poem_allusion_6900")'>金张</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5896, "poem_allusion_6900")'>龙醢为臡</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7858, "poem_allusion_6900")'>噬脐</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6900_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6900'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6900'>岧峣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>青云岭，下有千仞溪。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6900'>裴回不可上，人倦马亦嘶。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6900'>愿<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作顾）</span>登青云路，若望<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6900", 6900, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>丹霞</span>梯<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6900'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6900", 6900, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>谓言</span>青云驿，绣户芙蓉闺。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6900'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6900", 6900, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>谓言</span>青云骑，玉勒黄金蹄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6900'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6900", 6900, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>谓言</span>青云具，瑚琏杂<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作并）</span>象犀<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6900'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6900", 6900, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>谓言</span>青云吏，的的颜如圭<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6900'>怀此青云望，安能复久稽<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作栖）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6900'>攀援<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作路途）</span>信不易，风雨正凄凄。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6900'>已怪杜鹃鸟<span class='inlineComment2'>（杜鹃：参卷1《思归乐》注。）</span>，先来山下啼。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6900'>才及青云驿<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作归家尘雾暗）</span>，忽遇蓬蒿妻。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6900'>延我开荜户<span class='inlineComment2'>（荜户：用竹荆编织之门户。）</span>，凿窦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6900", 6900, "Clauses/23/Comments/1")'>宛如</span>圭<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6900'>逡巡吏来谒<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作来叙别）</span>，头白颜色黧<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6900'>馈食频叫噪，假器仍乞醯<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6900'>向时延我者，共舍<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作拾）</span>藿与藜。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6900'>乘我牂牁马<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>，蒙茸大如羝<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6900'>悔为青云意，此意良<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7858, "poem_sentence_16_6900")'>噬脐</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6900'>昔游蜀门<span class='inlineComment2'>（一本缺，一作关）</span>下<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>，有驿名<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_6900", 6900, "Clauses/35/Comments/1")'>青泥</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6900'>闻名意惨怆，若坠牢与狴<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒁</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6900'>云泥异所称，人物一以齐。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6900'>复闻阊阖上<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒂</sup>，下视日月低。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6900'>银城蕊珠殿<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒃</sup>，玉版金字题<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒄</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6900'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_6900", 6900, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>大帝</span>直南北，群仙侍东西。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6900'>龙虎俨队仗，雷霆轰鼓鼙。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6900'>元君理庭内<span class='inlineComment2'>（元君：道教对女子成仙者之美称。）</span>，左右桃花蹊。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6900'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_6900", 6900, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>丹霞</span>烂成绮，景<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作素）</span>云轻若绨<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒅</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6900'>天池光滟滟，瑶草绿萋萋。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6900'>众真千万辈<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒆</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_6900", 6900, "Clauses/55/Comments/1")'>柔颜</span>尽如荑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒇</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6900'>手持凤尾扇，头戴翠羽笄。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6900'>云韶互铿戛<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(21)</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_6900", 6900, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>霞服</span>相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_6900", 6900, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>提携</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6900'>双双发皓齿，各各扬轻袿<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(22)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6900'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_6900", 6900, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>天祚</span>乐未极，溟波浩无堤。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6900'>秽贱灵所恶，安肯问黔黎<span class='inlineComment2'>（黔黎：黔首黎民，指百姓。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6900'>桑田变成海<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(23)</sup>，宇县烹为齑<span class='inlineComment2'>（宇县：犹天下。齑：细碎。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6900'>虚皇不愿见<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(24)</sup>，云雾重重翳。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6900'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_6900", 6900, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>大帝</span>安可梦，阊阖何由跻。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6900'>灵物可见者，愿以谕端倪。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6900'>虫蛇吐云气，妖氛变虹蜺<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(25)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6900'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(531, "poem_sentence_38_6900")'>获麟</span>书诸册<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(26)</sup>，豢<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5896, "poem_sentence_38_6900")'>龙醢为臡</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(27)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_38_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6900'>凤皇占梧桐<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(28)</sup>，丛杂百鸟栖。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6900'>野鹤啄腥虫，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_6900", 6900, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>贪饕</span>不如鸡。<div id='poem_sentence_40_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_6900'>山鹿藏窟穴，虎豹吞其麛<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(29)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_41_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_6900'>灵物比<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作此）</span>灵境<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(30)</sup>，冠履宁甚暌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(31)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_42_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_6900'>道胜即为乐，何惭居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_6900", 6900, "Clauses/87/Comments/1")'>稗稊</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（稗稊：稗草与稊草，比喻卑微。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_43_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_6900'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4918, "poem_sentence_44_6900")'>金张</span>好车马<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(32)</sup>，于陵亲灌畦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(33)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_44_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_6900'>在梁或在火，不变玉与鹈<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(34)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_45_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_6900'>上天勿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_6900", 6900, "Clauses/92/Comments/1")'>行行</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（行行：刚强负气貌。）</span>，潜穴勿悽悽。<div id='poem_sentence_46_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_6900'>吟此青云谕，达观终不迷。<div id='poem_sentence_47_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_6900'></div><div id='poem_sentence_48_6900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6900'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6900_0'>⑴ 岧峣：山峰高耸貌。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6900_0'>⑵ 丹霞梯：即丹梯，升仙之路。杜甫《赠特进汝阳王》：“鸿宝宁全秘，丹梯庶可凌。”邵宝之注：“丹梯，山上升仙之路。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6900_0'>⑶ 玉勒：玉饰之马衔。黄金蹄：《太平广记》卷三九七引《玉堂闲话》：“佛用金蹄银角犊儿由西合悬梯而上，其间千房万屋缘空蹑虚，登之者不敢回顾，将及绝顶，有万菩萨堂。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6900_1'>⑷ 瑚琏：皆宗庙盛黍稷之玉制礼器。《论语·公冶长》：“（孔子）曰：‘瑚琏也。’”何晏集解引包咸曰：“瑚琏，黍稷之器，夏曰瑚，殷曰琏。”并：蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗作“杂”。象犀：象与犀，此指象牙与犀牛角。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6900_0'>⑸ 的的：分明貌。《淮南子·说林训》：“的的者获。”高诱注：“的的，明也。”按，此“的”字本作“的”，后从俗体。《说文·日部》：“的，明也。从日，勺声。”段注：“的者，白之明也，故俗字作的。”圭：通圭，端玉。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6900_0'>⑹ “凿窦”句：在墙上凿洞如圭状以作窗户。圭，古代皇帝诸侯举行祭祀、丧葬等隆重仪式时所用之玉制礼器，长条形，上尖下方。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6900_0'>⑺ 黧：黑中带黄之色。《广韵·齐韵》：“黧，黑而黄也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6900_0'>⑻ 假：借。《广雅·释诂二》：“假，借也。”醯：醋类食物。《说文·皿部》：“醯，酸也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6900_0'>⑼ 乘我：给我乘。牂牁，国名，在今贵州省一带。晋常璩《华阳国志·南中志》：“周之季世，楚威王遣将军庄蹻，溯沅水出且兰，以伐夜郎，植牂牁系舡……因名且兰为牂牁国。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6900_0'>⑽ 蒙茸：形容马毛杂乱不整。羝：公羊。《诗·大雅·生民》：“取羝以軷。”毛传：“羝羊，牡羊也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_6900_0'>⑾ 噬脐：犹言自噬其脐，比喻后悔莫及。《左传·庄公六年》：“亡邓国者，必此人也。若不早图，后君噬脐。”杜预注：“若齧腹齐，喻不可及也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6900_1'>⑿ 蜀关：即剑门关，在今四川省剑阁县北。元稹元和四年入蜀，未经剑门，此泛指入蜀之通道。关，蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗作“门”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6900_0'>⒀ 青泥：驿名，在青泥岭。《元和郡县志·山南道三·兴州·长举县》（卷二二）：“青泥岭，在县西北五十三里接溪山东，即今通路也。悬崖万仞，山多云雨，行者屡逢泥淖，故号青泥岭。”元稹入蜀，并未行经此处，仅“闻名”而已。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_6900_0'>⒁ 狴：兽名，形似虎，有威力，常图其形于狱门，故以之代牢狱。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_6900_0'>⒂ 阊阖：传说中之天门。《楚辞·离骚》：“吾令帝阍开关兮，倚阊阖而望予。”王逸注：“阊阖，天门也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_21_6900_0'>⒃ 银城：《北堂书钞》卷一五八：“《大志经》云：‘大意初入海中，至白银城，次至黄金城，次至水精城，次至琉璃城，龙王各与明月珠。”蕊珠殿：道家、道教经籍中神仙所居之仙宫，亦指道教宫观建筑。《真灵位业图》中有太和殿、寥阳殿、蕊珠宫。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_21_6900_0'>⒄ 玉版：指上有图形或文字、象徵祥瑞或预示休咎之玉片。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_25_6900_1'>⒅ 绨：厚实光滑且有光泽之丝织品，以蚕丝为经，棉线为纬织成。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_27_6900_0'>⒆ 真：道教称修炼得道或成仙之人。《说文·匕部》：“真，仙人变形而登天也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_27_6900_0'>⒇ 荑：初生茅草之嫩芽。《玉篇·草部》：“荑，始生茅也。”《诗·卫风·硕人》：“手如柔荑，肤如凝脂。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_6900_0'>(21) 《云韶》：云指《卿云》，古歌名，传说虞舜将禅位于禹，卿云现，乃与百官同唱此歌。《尚书大传》卷二：“舜为宾客而禹为主人……于时卿云聚，俊乂集，百工相和而歌《卿云》，帝乃倡之曰：‘卿云烂兮，糺缦缦兮。日月光华，旦复旦兮。’”郑玄注：“卿，当为‘庆’。”韶，舜乐名。《说文·音部》：“韶，虞舜乐也。”铿戛：犹铿金戛玉，形容音乐洪亮动听。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_30_6900_0'>(22) 袿：古代女性所穿之上等长袍。《释名·释衣服》：“妇人上服曰袿，其下垂者，上广下狭，如刀圭也。”毕沅疏證：“上服，上等之服也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_33_6900_0'>(23) “桑田”句：晋葛洪《神仙传·麻姑》：“麻姑自说云：‘接待以来，已见东海三为桑田，向到蓬莱，水又浅于往昔会时略半也，岂将复还为陵陆乎？’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_34_6900_0'>(24) 虚皇：道教神名。南朝梁陶弘景《许长史旧馆坛碑》：“并證心清，俱漏身浊。离有离无，且华且朴。结号虚皇，筌法正觉。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_37_6900_0'>(25) 虹蜺：亦作虹霓，雨后、日出或日落之际，天空中所出现之七色圆弧。虹蜺常有内外二环，内环称虹，外环称蜺。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_38_6900_0'>(26) “获麟”句：鲁哀公十四年猎获麒麟，相传孔子作《春秋》至此而辍笔。《春秋·哀公十四年》：“春，西狩获麟。”杜预注：“麟者仁兽，圣王之嘉瑞也。时无明主出而遇获，仲尼伤周道之不兴，感嘉瑞之无应，故因《鲁春秋》而修中兴之教，绝笔于‘获麟’之一句。所感而作，固所以为终也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_38_6900_0'>(27) “豢龙”句：豢龙，古代名马。《左传》：“昔有飂叔安裔子曰董父实，甚好龙，能求其耆欲，饮食之龙多归焉，乃扰畜之以服事舜，舜赐姓曰董氏，曰豢龙。醢：古代酷刑，将受刑者剁为肉酱。此泛指剁为肉酱。臡：有骨之肉酱，此泛指肉酱。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_39_6900_0'>(28) “凤皇”句：《庄子·秋水》：“（鹓雏，即凤凰）非梧桐不止，非练实不食，非醴泉不饮。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_41_6900_0'>(29) 麛：幼鹿。《礼记·内则》：“秋宜犊麛，膳膏腥。”陆德明释文：“麛，鹿子也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_42_6900_1'>(30) 比：相接。《汉书·诸侯王表》：“诸侯北（比）境，周市（币）三垂，外接胡越。”颜师古注：“比谓相接次也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_42_6900_0'>(31) 暌：分开，有距离。《古今韵会举要·齐韵》：“暌，《玉篇》：违也，日月相违。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_44_6900_0'>(32) “金张”句：金张，汉代金日磾、张安世之并称。二氏子孙相继，七世荣显，后以为显宦之代称。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_44_6900_0'>(33) “于陵”句：于陵，战国时隐士，或谓即齐人陈仲子。《史记·鲁仲连邹阳列传》：“于陵子仲辞三公为人灌园。”裴骃集解：“《列士传》曰：‘楚于陵子仲，楚王欲以为相，而不许，为人灌园。’”司马贞索隐：“《孟子》云陈仲子，齐陈氏之族，兄为齐卿，仲子以为不义，乃适楚，居于于陵，自谓于陵仲子。楚王聘以为相，子仲遂夫妻相与逃，为人灌园。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_45_6900_0'>(34) “在梁”二句：《诗·曹风·候人》：“维鹈在梁，不濡其翼。”郑玄注：“鹈在梁，当濡其翼，而不濡者，非其常也。以喻小人在朝，亦非其常。”《淮南子·俶真训》：“譬若钟山之玉，炊以炉炭，三日三夜而色泽不变，则至德天地之精也。”玉在火而色不变，喻君子坚守其操守；鹈在梁非其常，喻小人暂时得志。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6900_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　过阳城驿，有诗。作品：《阳城驿》<span class='inlineComment2'>（阳城驿在今陕西商南东陕、豫交界处。）</span><div id='poem_6833' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6833' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6833?labeling=true' target='_blank'>阳城驿</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6833")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6833_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6833'><span "poem_allusion_6833")'>鸟哭杨震</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6833_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6833'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6833'>商有阳城驿，名同<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6833", 6833, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>阳道州</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6833'>阳公没已久，感我泪交流。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6833'>昔公孝父母，行与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6833", 6833, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>曾闵</span>俦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6833'>既孤善兄弟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，兄弟和且柔。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6833'>一夕不相见，若怀三岁忧。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6833'>遂誓不婚娶，没齿同衾裯。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6833'>妹夫死他县，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6833", 6833, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>遗骨</span>无人收。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6833'>公令<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6833", 6833, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>季弟</span>往，公与仲弟留。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6833'>相别竟不得，三人同远游。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6833'>共负他乡骨，归来藏故丘。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6833'>栖迟居夏邑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，邑人无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6833", 6833, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>苟媮</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6833'>里中竞长短<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，来问劣与优。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6833'>官刑一朝耻，公短终身羞<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6833'>公亦不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_6833", 6833, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>遗布</span>，人自不盗牛<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6833'>问公何能<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作德）</span>尔，忠信先自修。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6833'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_6833", 6833, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>发言</span>当道理，不顾党与雠。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6833'>声香渐翕习<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>，冠盖若云浮<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6833'>少者从公学，老者从公游。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6833'>往来相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_6833", 6833, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>告报</span>，县尹与公侯。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6833'>名落公卿口，涌如波荐<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作数万）</span>舟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6833'>天子得闻之，书下再三求。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6833'>书中愿一见，不异旱地<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作呈天）</span>虬。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6833'>何以持为聘，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_6833", 6833, "Clauses/45/Comments/1")'>束帛</span>藉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_6833", 6833, "Clauses/45/Comments/2")'>琳球</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6833'>何以持为御，驷马驾安辀<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6833'>公方伯夷<span id='poem_sentence_24_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6833'>我实唐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_6833", 6833, id='poem_sentence_25_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6833'>我闻天子忆，安敢专自由。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6833'>来为谏大夫<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒁</sup>，朝夕侍冕旒<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒂</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6833'>希夷惇薄俗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒃</sup>，密勿献良筹<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒄</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6833'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_6833", 6833, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>神医</span>不言术，人瘼曾暗瘳<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒅</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6833'>月请谏官俸，诸弟相对谋。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6833'>皆曰亲戚外，酒散目前愁。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6833'>公云不有尔，安得此嘉猷。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6833'>施馀尽酤酒，客来相献酬。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6833'>日旰不谋食<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒆</sup>，春深仍敝裘。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6833'>人心良戚戚，我乐独由由<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作油油）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6833'>贞元岁云暮，朝有曲如钩。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6833'>风波势奔蹙，日月光绸缪。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6833'>齿牙属为猾<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒇</sup>，禾黍暗生蟊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(21)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_38_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6833'>岂无司言者<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(22)</sup>，肉食吞其喉。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6833'>岂无司搏者<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(23)</sup>，利柄扼其<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作如）</span>鞲<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(24)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_40_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_6833'>鼻复势气塞，不得辩薰莸<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(25)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_41_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_6833'>公虽未显谏，惴惴如患瘤。<div id='poem_sentence_42_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_6833'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_6833", 6833, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>飞章</span>八九上，皆若珠暗投。<div id='poem_sentence_43_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_6833'>炎炎日将炽，积燎无人抽<span class='inlineComment2'>（燎：见卷1《赛神》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_44_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_6833'>公乃帅其属，决谏同报仇。<div id='poem_sentence_45_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_6833'>延英殿门外<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(26)</sup>，叩閤仍叩头。<div id='poem_sentence_46_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_6833'>且曰事不止，臣谏誓不休。<div id='poem_sentence_47_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_6833'>上知不可遏，命以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_6833", 6833, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>美语</span>酬。<div id='poem_sentence_48_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_6833'>降官司成署<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(27)</sup>，俾之为赘疣。<div id='poem_sentence_49_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_6833'>奸心不快活，击刺砺戈矛。<div id='poem_sentence_50_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_6833'>终为道州去，天道竟悠悠。<div id='poem_sentence_51_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_6833'>遂令不言者，反以言为尤<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(28)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_52_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_6833'>喉舌坐成木<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(29)</sup>，鹰鹯化为鸠<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(30)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_53_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_6833'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_6833", 6833, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>避权</span>如避虎，冠豸如冠猴<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(31)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_54_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_6833'>平生附我者，诗人称好逑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(32)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_55_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_6833'>私来一执手，恐若坠诸沟。<div id='poem_sentence_56_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_6833'>送我不出户，决我不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_6833", 6833, "Clauses/115/Comments/1")'>回眸</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(33)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_57_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_6833'>唯有太学生，各具粮与糇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(34)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_58_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_6833'>咸言公去矣，我亦去荒陬。<div id='poem_sentence_59_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_60_6833'>公与诸生别，步步驻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_6833", 6833, "Clauses/121/Comments/0")'>行驺</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_60_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_61_6833'>有生不可诀，行行过闽瓯<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(35)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_61_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_6833'>为师得如此，得为贤者不。<div id='poem_sentence_62_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_6833'>道州闻公来，鼓舞歌且讴。<div id='poem_sentence_63_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_64_6833'>昔公居夏邑，狎人如狎鸥。<div id='poem_sentence_64_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_65_6833'>况自为刺史，岂复援<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_6833", 6833, "Clauses/131/Comments/1")'>鼓桴</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(36)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_65_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_66_6833'>滋章一时罢，教化天下遒。<div id='poem_sentence_66_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_67_6833'>炎瘴不得老，英华忽已秋。<div id='poem_sentence_67_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_68_6833'>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6539, "poem_sentence_68_6833")'>鸟哭杨震</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(37)</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(870, "poem_sentence_68_6833")'>无儿悲邓攸</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(38)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_68_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_69_6833'>唯馀门弟子，列树松与楸。<div id='poem_sentence_69_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_70_6833'>今来过此驿，若吊汨罗洲<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(39)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_70_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_6833'>辞<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作祠）</span>曹讳羊祜<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(40)</sup>，此驿何不侔。<div id='poem_sentence_71_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_72_6833'>我愿避公讳，名为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_6833", 6833, "Clauses/145/Comments/0")'>避贤邮</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_72_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_73_6833'>此名有深意，蔽贤天所尤。<div id='poem_sentence_73_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_74_6833'>吾闻玄元教<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(41)</sup>，日月冥九幽<span class='inlineComment2'>（九幽：极深暗之处，即九泉之下。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_74_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_75_6833'>幽阴蔽翳者，永为幽翳<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作阴）</span>囚<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(42)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_75_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_76_6833'></div><div id='poem_sentence_76_6833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6833'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6833_0'>⑴ 阳道州：指阳城。道州，治所在今湖南道县。《元和郡县图志·道州》：“秦属长沙郡……贞观八年改为道州。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6833_0'>⑵ 曾、闵：曾参、闵损之并称。曾参，字子舆，孔子弟子，以事亲至孝闻。闵损，字子骞，孔子弟子，少为继母所苦，冬月衣芦花。其父知之，欲出继母，损劝阻之。孔子曾赞曰：“孝哉闵子骞！人不间于其父母昆弟之言。”事详《史记·仲尼弟子列传》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6833_0'>⑶ 孤：父母双亡。《管子·轻重》：“民生而无父母，谓之孤子。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6833_0'>⑷ “栖迟”句：《新唐书·阳城传》：“徙陕州夏县，世为宦族。”《元和郡县图志·陕州》：“夏县，望，西南至州一百二十里。本汉安邑县地……后魏孝文帝十八年改为夏县，因夏禹所都为名……乾元三年属陕州。”夏县今属山西省。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6833_0'>⑸ 里：古代地方行政组织，始自周代，其制不一。唐时以百户为里。《旧唐书·食货上》：“百户为里，五里为乡。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6833_0'>⑹ 公短：被阳城认为错误，或被阳城批评。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6833_0'>⑺ “公亦”二句：《后汉书·独行传》载，太原王烈以义行称名乡里，有盗牛者，主得之，盗请罪曰：“刑戮，乞不令王彦方（烈之字）知之。”烈闻，使遗布一端以激之。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_6833_0'>⑻ 翕习：《文选·左思〈蜀都赋〉》：“藏镪巨万，釽摫兼呈，亦以财雄，翕习边城。”吕延济注：“翕习，威盛貌。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_6833_0'>⑼ 冠盖：指官员之冠服与车乘。冠，礼帽。盖，车盖。此指仕宦荣显。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_6833_1'>⑽ 波荐：原作“数万”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_22_6833_0'>⑾ 束帛：捆为一束之五匹帛，古代作为聘问、馈赠之礼物。《周礼·春官·大宗伯》：“孤执皮帛。”汉郑玄注：“皮帛者，束帛而表以皮为之。”贾公彦疏：“束者十端，每端丈八尺，皆两端合卷，总为五匹，故云束帛也。”藉：古代祭祀朝聘时陈列礼品之垫物。琳球：参卷1《桐花》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_6833_0'>⑿ 驷马：驾一车之四马。驷马高车为尊贵者之所乘。辀：小车上之独辕，此泛指可坐乘之小车。此类车供年长官高德隆者乘用，属特殊礼遇。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_24_6833_0'>⒀ “公方”二句：方伯夷，原作“云自挺”，据蜀本、卢本、全诗、钱校改。伯夷，商孤竹君之长子，名允，后投西伯。西伯死，武王伐纣，其与叔齐叩马而谏。纣亡，二人逃入首阳山，不食周粟而死。事详《史记·伯夷列传》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_27_6833_0'>⒁ 谏大夫：即谏议大夫，正四品下，掌谏诤议论，侍从顾问，为清望之官。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_27_6833_0'>⒂ 冕旒：古代天子及士大夫以上之礼冠，顶有冕版称延，前有下垂之玉串称旒，故曰冕旒。天子之冕十二旒，诸侯九，上大夫七，下大夫五。见《周礼·夏官·弁师》。后专指皇帝之冠，此借指皇帝。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_28_6833_0'>⒃ 希夷：谓清静无为，任其自然。《老子》：“视之不见名曰夷，听之不闻名曰希。”惇：劝勉。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_28_6833_0'>⒄ 密勿：机密。清杭世骏《订讹类编》卷一《密勿》：“（《金壶二集》）又云：刘向传注：密勿，犹黾勉也。班固《典引》：前圣皋、夔、衡、旦，密勿之辅。注：密勿，犹黾勉也。《汉书》引诗：黾勉从事，改作密勿从事。……后人沿袭，遂作秘密解矣。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_6833_0'>⒅ 瘳：病愈。《说文·疒部》：“瘳，疾愈也。”徐锴系传：“忽愈若抽去之也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_34_6833_0'>⒆ 旰：原作“旴”，据蜀本、杨本、类苑、全诗改。《说文·日部》：“旰，晚也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_38_6833_0'>⒇ “齿牙”句：《国语·晋语一》：“遇兆，挟以衔骨，齿牙为猾，戎夏交捽。”韦昭注：“猾，弄也……骨在口中，齿牙弄之，以象谗口之为害也。”又，“若跨其国而得其君，虽逢齿牙，以猾其中，谁云不从？”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_38_6833_0'>(21) 蟊：吃苗根之害虫。《尔雅·释虫》：“食根，蟊。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_39_6833_0'>(22) 司言者：指谏议大夫等司谏诤之官吏。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_40_6833_0'>(23) 司搏者：指御史台等属官。司搏，伺机捕捉。《周礼·秋官·士师》：“以比追胥之事。”汉郑玄注：“胥，读如宿偦之偦。偦，谓司搏盗贼也。”孙诒让正义：“司搏，与‘伺捕’同。汉人多以‘司’为‘伺’，以‘搏’为‘捕’，《小司徒》注作‘伺捕’。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_40_6833_1'>(24) 其：原作“如”，据全诗、文粹、钱校及前文改。鞲：同“鞲”，革制臂套，射箭、架鹰时套在左臂或套于两臂，束衣袖以便操作，妇女时亦用作装饰。杜甫《见王监兵马使》诗之一：“一生自猎知无敌，百中争能耻下鞲。”仇兆鳌注：“鞲，捍臂也，以皮为之。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_41_6833_0'>(25) 辩：通“辨”，分别。清朱骏声《说文通训定声·坤部》：“辩，叚借为辨。”薰莸：香草与臭草，比喻善与恶。《左传·僖公四年》：“一薰一莸，十年尚犹有臭。”杜预注：“薰，香草；莸，臭草。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_46_6833_0'>(26) 延英殿：唐代宫殿名，在延英门内。《唐六典·尚书·工部》：“（大明宫）宣政（殿）之左曰东上閤，右曰西上閤，次西曰延英门，其内之左曰延英殿，右曰含象殿。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_49_6833_0'>(27) 司成署：国子监之别称。唐高宗龙朔二年（662）改国子监为司成馆，咸亨元年复旧。《新唐书·阳城传》：“然帝意不已，欲遂相延龄，城显语曰：‘延龄为相，吾当取白麻坏之，哭于廷。’帝不相延龄，城力也。坐是下迁国子司业。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_52_6833_0'>(28) 尤：通尤，过失，罪过。《说文·言部》：“尤，罪也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_53_6833_0'>(29) “喉舌”句：谓讽谏者存避祸之心，闭口不言，有如木偶。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_53_6833_0'>(30) “鹰鹯”句：《礼记·月令》：“（仲春之月）始雨水，桃始花，仓庚鸣，鹰化为鸠。”《左传·文公十八年》：“见无礼于其君者，诛之，如鹰鹯之逐鸟雀也。”鹰鹯，比喻忠勇之士，而化为鸠，则变为无所作为之懦夫矣。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_54_6833_0'>(31) “冠豸”句：冠豸，即戴豸冠。豸冠，即獬豸冠，古代御史所服。冠猴，沐猴而冠之略，谓猴戴人冠，徒具人形，而无其实。比喻徒居其位而不谋其政者。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_55_6833_0'>(32) “诗人”句：谓视之为同类、知己。《诗·周南·关雎》：“窈窕淑女，君子好逑。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_57_6833_0'>(33) 决：通诀，告别。《史记·外戚世家》：“姊去我西时，与我决于传舍中。”司马贞索隐：“决者，别也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_58_6833_0'>(34) 粮与糇：食粮，乾粮。糇，乾粮。《广韵·侯韵》：“糇，乾食。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_61_6833_0'>(35) 闽瓯：闽，古种族名，生活于今浙江省南部与福建一带，后因称福建为闽。瓯，古地名，在今浙江省温州一带，后为温州之别称。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_65_6833_0'>(36) “岂得”句：谓阳城实行无为而治，与民休息，教化为先。鼓桴：鼓槌。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_68_6833_0'>(37) “有鸟”句：杨震，字伯起，弘农华阴（今陕西省华阴市东）人。震年五十始仕于州郡，官至司徒、太尉，终以忠遭忌，免官自尽。传说震死时有大鸟飞临丧典，悲鸣落泪。事详《后汉书·杨震传》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_68_6833_0'>(38) “无儿”句：邓攸，字伯道，永嘉中为石勒所俘，后南逃江南，步行，担其子及侄，度不能两全，乃弃子全侄，后竟无子嗣。时人哀之，为之语曰：“天道无知，使邓伯道无儿。”事详《晋书·良吏传·邓攸》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_70_6833_0'>(39) 汨罗洲：在今湖南汨罗市。《元和郡县图志·岳州·湘阴县》：“汨水，东北自洪州建昌县流入，西经玉笥山，又西经罗国故城为屈潭，即屈原怀沙自沉之所，又西流入于湘水。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_71_6833_1'>(40) “辞曹”句：辞，原作“祠”，据卢本、《晋书·羊祜传》及白居易《和阳城驿》改。羊祜镇荆州，抚士卒，惠百姓，且立身清俭，家无馀财。祜卒，襄阳百姓为之立碑建庙。荆人尊之，避其名讳，屋室皆以门为称，户曹改为辞曹。事详《晋书·羊祜传》。阳城在道州，有惠于百姓，百姓感戴，以“阳”名其子。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_74_6833_0'>(41) 玄元教：即道教。唐初追崇老子为太上玄元皇帝，简称玄元。道教以老子为教祖，故云。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_75_6833_1'>(42) “幽阴”二句：谓蔽贤者，将永沉日月照临不到之深渊，世世为幽界之囚徒。阴，全诗、文粹、钱校作“翳”。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6833_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在阳城驿，寄书及《三月二十四日宿曾峰馆夜对桐花寄乐天》诗与白居易，其中书已亡佚。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='b50768409ccb4a758f3e6129217ca8fd_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b50768409ccb4a758f3e6129217ca8fd");'><span id='b50768409ccb4a758f3e6129217ca8fd_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>，37岁</div><div id='b50768409ccb4a758f3e6129217ca8fd' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　至曾峰馆，追思往事，有诗记之。作品：《桐孙诗》<div id='poem_6334' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6334' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6334?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桐孙诗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6334")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6334_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6334_0'>① 并序。此后元和十年诏召入京，及通州司马以后诗。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6334'>元和五年，予贬掾江陵。三月二十四日，宿曾峰馆。山月晓时，见桐花满地，因有八韵寄白翰林诗。当时草蹙，未暇纪题。及今六年，诏许西归。去时桐树上孙枝已拱矣，予亦白须两茎，而苍然斑鬓，感念前事，因题旧诗，仍赋桐孙诗一绝，又不知几何年复来商山道中。元和十年正月题。</div><div id='poem_preface_6334_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6334'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6334'>去日桐花半桐叶，别来桐树老桐孙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6334'>城中过尽无穷事，白发满头归故园。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6334'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6334_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
襄阳

id='poem_sentence_2_6694'>椒兰俱下世，城郭到今时<span class='inlineComment2'>（“城郭”句：参卷3《松鹤》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6694_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6694_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6694'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6694_0'>⑴ “羊公”二句：《晋书·杜预传》：“预好为后世名，常言‘高岸为谷，深谷为陵’，刻石为二碑，纪其勋绩，一沉万山之下，一立岘山之上，曰：‘焉知此后不为陵谷乎？’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6694_0'>⑵ “曹王”句：曹王即李皋，字子兰，唐宗室，天宝十一载嗣曹王。初，扶风马彝未知名，皋首辟之，卒以正直称于时。彝曾谏阻皋买张柬之林园，皋纳而称善。事详新、旧《唐书》本传。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6694_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年3月</a>　韩愈迁比部郎中、史馆修撰，请编甄济事入国史，作书寄之。作品：《与史馆韩侍郎书》<div id='poem_1372502' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372502' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372502?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与史馆韩侍郎书</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a
