class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372502_comment'></div>逢故刑部员外郎济之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372502_comment'></div>济天宝中隐于卫之青岩山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372502_comment'></div>采访使苗公等五人皆以状荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372502_comment'></div>凡十徵不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372502_comment'></div>末以左拾遗就拜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372502_comment'></div>适值禄山朝奏京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372502_comment'></div>恳于上前求为宾介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372502_comment'></div>玄宗可其奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372502_comment'></div>禄山还至卫县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372502_comment'></div>遣太守郑遵意诣山致命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372502_comment'></div>辍行信宿以俟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372502_comment'></div>甄生惧其难免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372502_comment'></div>俛首从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372502_comment'></div>至天宝十二载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372502_comment'></div>禄山反状潜兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372502_comment'></div>虑不得脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372502_comment'></div>乃伪瘖其口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372502_comment'></div>复隐青岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372502_comment'></div>踰年而禄山叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372502_comment'></div>即日遣伪节度使蔡希德缄刃逼召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372502_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372502_comment'></div>或不可强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372502_comment'></div>斩首来徇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372502_comment'></div>既而甄生噤闭无言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372502_comment'></div>延颈承刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372502_comment'></div>气色和定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372502_comment'></div>若甘心然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372502_comment'></div>希德义而舍之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372502_comment'></div>禄山亦终不能致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372502_comment'></div>庆绪继逆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372502_comment'></div>虏而囚之于东都安国观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372502_comment'></div>代宗复洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372502_comment'></div>甄生卧匡床诣元帅府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372502_comment'></div>至则号摽自治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372502_comment'></div>代宗为之动色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372502_comment'></div>遂命传置长安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372502_comment'></div>肃宗高其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372502_comment'></div>因授馆于三司治所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372502_comment'></div>令从贼官囚惭拜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372502_comment'></div>受污者莫不俯伏仰叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372502_comment'></div>恨不即死于其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372502_comment'></div>且夫辨所从于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1372502", 1372502, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>居易</span>之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372502_comment'></div>坚直操于利人之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372502_comment'></div>而犹褊浅巽懦者之所不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372502_comment'></div>盖怫人之心难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372502_comment'></div>而害己之避深也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372502_comment'></div>况乎天下乱矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372502_comment'></div>王泽竭矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372502_comment'></div>死忠者不必显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372502_comment'></div>从乱者不必诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372502_comment'></div>而能眷眷本朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372502_comment'></div>甘心白刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372502_comment'></div>难矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372502_comment'></div>是以治平则为公为卿为鹓为鹭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372502_comment'></div>世变则为蛇为豕为獍为枭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372502_comment'></div>十恒八九焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372502_comment'></div>若甄生冕弁不加于其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372502_comment'></div>禄食不进于其口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372502_comment'></div>于天宝末盖青岩之一<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1372502", 1372502, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>男子</span>耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372502_comment'></div>及乱则延颈受刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372502_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1372502", 1372502, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>分死</span>不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372502_comment'></div>不以不显而废忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372502_comment'></div>不以不诛而从乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372502_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1372502", 1372502, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>参合</span>古今之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372502_comment'></div>盖百一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372502_comment'></div>稹常读注记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372502_comment'></div>缺而未书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372502_comment'></div>谨备所闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372502_comment'></div>盖欲执事者编此义烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372502_comment'></div>以永永于来世耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372502_comment'></div>子逢始生之岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372502_comment'></div>颜太师崔太傅皆为歌诗以美贤者之有后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372502_comment'></div>且序甄生之本末云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372502_comment'></div>及逢既长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372502_comment'></div>耕先人旧田于襄之宜城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372502_comment'></div>读书为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372502_comment'></div>不诣州里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372502_comment'></div>岁馑则力穑节用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372502_comment'></div>以给足于亲戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372502_comment'></div>岁穰则施馀于邻里乡党之不能自持者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372502_comment'></div>前后斥家财排<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1372502", 1372502, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>患难</span>于朋友者数四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372502_comment'></div>由是以义闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372502_comment'></div>襄之守状为文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372502_comment'></div>始就羁于吏职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372502_comment'></div>稹闻风既久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372502_comment'></div>因与之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372502_comment'></div>逢每冤其父之名不在于史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372502_comment'></div>将欲抱所冤诣京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372502_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1372502", 1372502, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>告诉</span>于司史氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372502_comment'></div>盖行有日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372502_comment'></div>以愚料之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372502_comment'></div>甄子仆短马瘦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372502_comment'></div>言简行孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372502_comment'></div>得不为骄阍之所排诃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372502_comment'></div>则权力者疑诞以临之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372502_comment'></div>固无自而入矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372502_comment'></div>因晓甄生以无自入之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372502_comment'></div>且告以执事者辱与稹游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372502_comment'></div>愿得所冤之状告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372502_comment'></div>甄生厚相信待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372502_comment'></div>由是辍行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372502_comment'></div>既而自思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372502_comment'></div>滓贱之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372502_comment'></div>犹愿贡所闻于执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372502_comment'></div>得非愚且僭耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372502_comment'></div>然而诮笑之暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372502_comment'></div>幸垂察焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372502_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372502_comment'></div>某再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_110_1372502_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
荆州（江陵）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='318af42716e54c7581107be26673763b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("318af42716e54c7581107be26673763b");'><span id='318af42716e54c7581107be26673763b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=811')">810-811年</a>，32-33岁</div><div id='318af42716e54c7581107be26673763b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　至江陵，寄途中所作诗十七首与白居易，居易和答之。再寄《梦游春诗》与白居易，居易复答之。时江陵尹、荆南节度使为赵宗儒。作品：《梦游春七十韵》<div id='poem_6941' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6941' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6941?labeling=true' target='_blank'>梦游春七十韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6941")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6941_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6941'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6941'>昔岁<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作君）</span>梦游春，梦游何所遇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6941'>梦入深洞中，果遂平生趣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6941'>清泠浅漫流<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作溪）</span>，画舫兰篙渡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6941'>过尽万株桃，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6941", 6941, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>盘旋</span>竹林路。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6941'>长廊抱小楼，门牖相回互。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6941'>楼下杂花丛，丛边绕鸳鹭。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6941'>池光漾霞影<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作彩霞）</span>，晓日初<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6941", 6941, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>明煦</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6941'>未敢上阶行，频移曲池步。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6941'>乌龙不作声，碧玉曾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6941", 6941, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>相慕</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6941'>渐到帘幕间，裴回意犹惧。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6941'>闲窥东西閤，奇玩参差布。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6941'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6941", 6941, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>隔子</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6941", 6941, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>碧油</span>糊，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6941", 6941, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>驼钩</span>紫金镀。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6941'>逡巡日渐高，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6941", 6941, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>影响</span>人将寤。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6941'>鹦鹉饥乱鸣，娇娃睡犹怒。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6941'>帘开侍儿起，见我遥相谕。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6941'>铺设绣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_6941", 6941, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>红茵</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_6941", 6941, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>施张</span>钿妆具。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6941'>潜褰翡翠帷，瞥见珊瑚树。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6941'>不辨<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作见）</span>花貌人，空惊香若雾。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6941'>身回夜合偏，态敛晨霞聚。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6941'>睡脸桃破风，汗妆莲委露。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6941'>丛梳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_6941", 6941, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>百叶髻</span>，金蹙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_6941", 6941, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>重台屦</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6941'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_6941", 6941, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>纰软</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_6941", 6941, "Clauses/42/Comments/1")'>钿头</span>裙，玲珑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_6941", 6941, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>合欢裤</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6941'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_6941", 6941, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>鲜妍</span>脂粉薄，闇澹衣裳故。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6941'>最似红牡丹，雨来春欲暮。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6941'>梦魂良易惊，灵境难久寓。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6941'>夜夜望天河，无由重<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_6941", 6941, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>沿溯</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6941'>结念心所期，返如禅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_6941", 6941, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>顿悟</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6941'>觉来八九年，不向花回顾。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6941'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_6941", 6941, "Clauses/56/Comments/1")'>杂合</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（一作洽）</span>两京春，喧阗众禽护。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6941'>我到看花时，但作怀仙句。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6941'>浮生转经历，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_6941", 6941, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>道性</span>尤坚固。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6941'>近作梦仙诗，亦知劳肺腑。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6941'>一梦何足云，良时事<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作自）</span>婚娶。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6941'>当年二纪初，嘉节三星度。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6941'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_6941", 6941, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>朝蕣</span>玉佩迎，高松<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_6941", 6941, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>女萝</span>附。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6941'>韦门正全盛，出入多欢裕。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6941'>甲第涨清池，鸣驺引朱辂。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6941'>广榭舞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_6941", 6941, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>萎蕤</span>，长筵宾杂厝。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6941'>青春讵几日，华实潜幽蠹。<div id='poem_sentence_38_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6941'>秋月照潘郎，空山怀谢傅。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6941'>红楼嗟坏壁，金谷迷荒戍。<div id='poem_sentence_40_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_6941'>石压破阑干，门摧旧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_6941", 6941, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>梐枑</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_41_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_6941'>虽云觉梦殊，同是终难驻。<div id='poem_sentence_42_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_6941'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_6941", 6941, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>悰绪</span>竟何如，棼丝不成絇。<div id='poem_sentence_43_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_6941'>卓女白头吟，阿娇金屋赋。<div id='poem_sentence_44_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_6941'>重璧盛姬台，青冢明妃墓。<div id='poem_sentence_45_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_6941'>尽委<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_6941", 6941, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>穷尘</span>骨，皆随流波注。<div id='poem_sentence_46_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_6941'>幸有古如今，何劳缣比素。<div id='poem_sentence_47_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_6941'>况余当盛时，早岁谐如务。<div id='poem_sentence_48_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_6941'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_6941", 6941, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>诏册</span>冠贤良，谏垣陈好恶。<div id='poem_sentence_49_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_6941'>三十再登朝，一登还一仆。<div id='poem_sentence_50_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_6941'>宠荣非不早，邅回亦云屡。<div id='poem_sentence_51_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_6941'>直气在膏肓，氛氲日沈痼。<div id='poem_sentence_52_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_6941'>不言意不快，快意言多忤。<div id='poem_sentence_53_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_6941'>忤诚人所贼，性亦天之付。<div id='poem_sentence_54_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_6941'>乍可沈为香，不能浮作瓠。<div id='poem_sentence_55_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_6941'>诚为坚所守，未为明所措。<div id='poem_sentence_56_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_6941'>事事身已经，营营计何误。<div id='poem_sentence_57_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_6941'>美玉琢文圭，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_6941", 6941, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>良金</span>填武库。<div id='poem_sentence_58_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_6941'>徒谓自坚贞，安知受<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_6941", 6941, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>砻铸</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_59_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_60_6941'>长丝羁野马，密网罗阴兔。<div id='poem_sentence_60_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_61_6941'>物外各迢迢，谁能远相锢。<div id='poem_sentence_61_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_6941'>时来既若飞，祸速当如骛。<div id='poem_sentence_62_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_6941'>曩意自未精，此行何所诉。<div id='poem_sentence_63_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_64_6941'>努力去江陵，笑言谁与晤。<div id='poem_sentence_64_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_65_6941'>江花纵可怜，奈非心所慕。<div id='poem_sentence_65_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_66_6941'>石竹逞奸黠，蔓青誇亩数。<div id='poem_sentence_66_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_67_6941'>一种薄地生，浅深何足妒。<div id='poem_sentence_67_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_68_6941'>荷叶水上生，团团水中住。<div id='poem_sentence_68_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_69_6941'>泻水置叶中，君看不相污。<div id='poem_sentence_69_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_70_6941'></div><div id='poem_sentence_70_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_6941'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(6941)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年6月</a>　张季友、李景俭、王文仲、王众仲邀元稹月夜泛舟，有诗记之。作品：《泛江玩月十二韵（并序）》<div id='poem_6702' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6702' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6702?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泛江玩月十二韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6702")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6702_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6702'>予以元和五年，自监察御史贬授江陵士曹掾。六月十四日，张季友、李景俭二侍御。王文仲司录、王众仲判官两昆季，为予载酒炙，选声音。自府城之南桥（自府城之南淮），乘月泛舟（攀月泛舟），穷尽一夕，予因赋诗以纪之。</div><div id='poem_preface_6702_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6702'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6702'>楚塞分形势，羊公压大邦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6702'>因依<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作朋侪）</span>多士子，参画<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作量）</span>尽敦厖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6702'>岳璧闲相对，荀龙自有双。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6702'>共将船载酒<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作系泊）</span>，同泛<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作况是）</span>月临江。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6702'>远树悬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6702", 6702, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>金镜</span>，深潭倒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6702", 6702, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>玉幢</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6702'>委波添<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6702", 6702, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>净练</span>，洞照灭凝釭。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6702'>阗咽沙头市，玲珑竹岸窗。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6702'>巴童唱巫峡，海客话神泷。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6702'>已困连飞盏，犹催未倒缸。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6702'>饮荒情烂熳，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6702", 6702, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>风棹</span>乐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6702", 6702, "Clauses/19/Comments/1")'>峥摐</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6702'>胜事他年忆<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作尽）</span>，愁<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作雄）</span>心此夜降。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6702'>知君皆逸韵，须为应莛撞。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6702_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6702'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_6702_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　白居易寄信一封、诗一首，赞元稹和诗七章，元稹复次韵答之。作品：《书乐天纸》<div id='poem_6174' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6174' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6174?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书乐天纸</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6174")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6174_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6174'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6174'>金銮殿里书残纸，乞与荆州元判司。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6174'>不忍拈将等闲用，半封京信半题诗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6174'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6174_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，回忆与吴士矩元和五年三月六日相会事，有诗。作品：《寄吴士矩端公五十韵》<div id='poem_6935' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6935' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6935?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄吴士矩端公五十韵<span class='inlineComment2'>（此后并江陵士曹时作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6935")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6935_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6935'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6935'>昔在凤翔日，十岁即相识。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6935'>未有好文章，逢人赏颜色。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6935'>可怜何郎面<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，二十才冠饰。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6935'>短发予近梳，罗衫紫蝉翼。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6935'>伯舅各骄纵，仁兄未摧抑。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6935'>事业在<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作若）</span>杯盘<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，诗书甚徽纆<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6935'>西州戎马地<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，贤豪事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6935", 6935, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>雄特</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6935'>百万时可赢，十千良易借<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6935'>寒食桐阴下<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，春风柳林侧。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6935'>藉草送远游<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，列筵酬博塞<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6935'>萎蕤云幕翠，灿烂红茵赩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6935'>脍缕轻似丝<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>，香醅腻如膱<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6935'>将军频下城，佳人尽倾国<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6935'>媚语娇不闻，纤腰软无力。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6935'>歌辞妙宛转，舞态能剜刻。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6935'>筝弦玉指调，粉汗红绡拭。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6935'>予时最年少，专务酒中职。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6935'>未能解<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作愧）</span>生狞，偏矜任狂直。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6935'>曲庇桃根盏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>，横讲捎云式<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒁</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6935'>乱布斗分朋，惟新间谗慝<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒂</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6935'>耻作最先吐，羞言未朝食。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6935'>醉眼渐纷纷，酒声频餩餩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒃</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6935'>扣节参差乱，飞觥往来织<span class='inlineComment2'>（飞觥：传杯。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6935'>强起相维持，翻成两<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_6935", 6935, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>匍匐</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6935'>边霜飒然降，战马鸣不息。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6935'>但喜秋光丽，谁忧塞云黑。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6935'>常随猎骑走，多在豪家匿。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6935'>夜饮天既明，朝歌日还昃<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒄</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6935'>荒狂岁云久，名利心潜逼。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6935'>时辈多得途<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒅</sup>，亲朋屡相敕<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒆</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6935'>闲因适农野，忽复爱稼穑<span class='inlineComment2'>（爱：卢本作“忧”。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6935'>平生中圣人<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒇</sup>，翻然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_6935", 6935, "Clauses/63/Comments/1")'>腐肠贼</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(21)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6935'>亦从酒仙去，便被书魔惑。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6935'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_6935", 6935, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>脱迹</span>壮士场，甘心竖儒域<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(22)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6935'>矜持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_6935", 6935, "Clauses/68/Comments/1")'>翠筠管</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(23)</sup>，敲断黄金勒<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(24)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6935'>屡益兰膏灯<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(25)</sup>，犹研兔枝墨<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(26)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6935'>崎岖来掉荡，矫枉事沈默。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6935'>隐笑甚艰难，敛容还<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_6935", 6935, "Clauses/75/Comments/1")'>屴崱</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（屴崱：形容态度端正。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6935'>与君始分散，勉我劳修饰。<div id='poem_sentence_38_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6935'>岐路各营营，别离长恻恻。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6935'>行看二十载<span class='inlineComment2'>（行看：见卷3《遣兴十首》注。）</span>，万事纷<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作丝）</span>何极。<div id='poem_sentence_40_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_6935'>相值或须臾<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(27)</sup>，安能洞胸臆。<div id='poem_sentence_41_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_6935'>昨来陕郊<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作郏）</span>会，悲欢两难克。<div id='poem_sentence_42_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_6935'>问我新相知，但报长相忆。<div id='poem_sentence_43_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_6935'>岂无新知者<span class='inlineComment2'>（知者：蜀本、卢本作“新知”。）</span>，不及小相得。<div id='poem_sentence_44_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_6935'>亦有生岁游<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(28)</sup>，同年不同德。<div id='poem_sentence_45_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_6935'>为别讵几时，伊予坠沟洫。<div id='poem_sentence_46_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_6935'>大江鼓风浪，远道参荆棘。<div id='poem_sentence_47_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_6935'>往事返无期，前途浩难测。<div id='poem_sentence_48_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_6935'>一旦得自由，相求北山北<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(29)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_49_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_6935'></div><div id='poem_sentence_50_6935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6935'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6935_0'>⑴ （吴生小字何郎）。（可怜：可爱。《方言》卷一：“怜，爱也。汝颍之间曰怜。”）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6935_1'>⑵ 事业：才能。宋赵令畤《侯鲭录》卷四：“唐末五代，权臣执政，公然交赂，科第差除各有等差，故当时语云：‘及第不必读书，做官何须事业？’”在：原作“若”，据蜀本、卢本改。杯盘：此代指饮酒事。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6935_0'>⑶ 徽纆：绳索。《易·坎》：“上六，系用徽纆。”陆德明释文：“刘云：三股曰徽，两股曰纆，皆索名。”此比喻束缚。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6935_0'>⑷ 西州：指凤翔。凤翔府在长安之西，故云。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6935_0'>⑸ 借：蜀本、杨本作“惜”。何焯校：“宋板作惜者误。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6935_0'>⑹ 寒食：二十四节气之一清明前一、二日。相传春秋晋文公负其功臣介子推，介子推愤而隐于绵山。文公悔悟，烧山逼令出仕，介子推抱树焚死。后人悯其不幸，相约于其忌日禁火冷食，遂相沿成俗。而其实禁火乃周代之旧制，介子推事为后人所附会。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6935_0'>⑺ 藉草：坐卧于草地之上。《文选·孙绰〈游天台上赋〉》：“藉萋萋之纤草，荫落落之长松。”李善注：“以草荐地而坐曰藉。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6935_0'>⑻ 博塞：即六博、格五等博戏。《庄子·骈拇》：“问谷奚事，则博塞以游。”成玄英疏：“行五道而投琼（即骰子）曰博，不投琼曰塞。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6935_0'>⑼ 赩：大赤色。《玉篇·色部》：“赩，大赤色。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6935_0'>⑽ 鲙缕：细切之菜肴。鲙，《集韵·太韵》：“脍，《说文》：‘细切肉也。’或从鱼。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6935_0'>⑾ （一作织）。（香醅：茶水上所结之薄膜。膱：原作“织”，与下文韵重，据卢校及文意改）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6935_0'>⑿ 倾国：倾倒一国之人，形容女性极其美丽。《汉书·外戚传上·李夫人》：“延年侍上起舞，歌曰：‘北方有佳人，绝世而独立。一顾倾人城，再顾倾人国。宁不知倾城与倾国，佳人难再得。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_6935_0'>⒀ 桃根盏：酒杯名。桃根，晋王献之妾桃叶之妹。宋张敦颐《六朝事迹·桃叶渡》：“桃叶者，王献之爱妾名也，其妹曰桃根。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_6935_0'>⒁ 捎云式：疑为李捎(一作梢)云所创立之酒令。李肇《国史补》卷下：“国朝麟德中，璧州刺史邓弘庆始创平、索、看、精四字令，至李梢云而大备，自上及下以为宜然。大抵有律令、有头盘、有抛打，盖工于举场而盛于使幕。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_6935_0'>⒂ “乱布”二句：谓参与者分成不同小组，一比高低，为取胜而不断变化花样，暗耍手段。斗，比赛，争胜。分朋，分组。苏轼《上元过祥符僧可久房萧然无灯火》：“门前歌舞斗分朋，一室清风冷欲冰。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_21_6935_0'>⒃ （爱墨切）。（餩餩：打嗝声。《广韵·去夬》：“餩，通食气也。”）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_27_6935_0'>⒄ 昃：太阳偏西。《说文·日部》：“  （昃），日在西方时，侧也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_6935_0'>⒅ 时辈：当时有名之人物。《三国志·魏志·孙礼传》：“礼与卢毓同郡时辈，而情好不睦。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_6935_0'>⒆ 敕：告诫。《说文·  部》：“敕，诫也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_6935_0'>⒇ 中（zhòng）圣人：醉酒之隐语。《三国志·魏志·徐邈传》：“魏国初建，为尚书郎。时科禁酒，而邈私饮至于沈醉。校事赵达问以曹事，邈曰：‘中圣人。’达白之太祖，太祖甚怒。度辽将军鲜于辅进曰：‘平日醉客谓酒清者为圣人，浊者为贤人。邈性修慎，偶醉言耳。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_6935_0'>(21) 腐肠贼：腐蚀肠胃之贼，古人多指美酒佳肴。汉枚乘《七发》：“甘脆肥脓，命曰腐肠之药。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_33_6935_0'>(22) 竖儒域：指科举考试。竖儒，即竖儒，对儒生之鄙称。《史记·郦生陆贾列传》：“沛公骂曰：‘竖儒！夫天下同苦秦久矣，故诸侯相率而攻秦，何谓助秦攻诸侯乎？’”司马贞索隐：“竖者，僮仆之称。沛公轻之，以比奴竖，故曰‘竖儒’也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_34_6935_0'>(23) 翠筠管：竹管，此代指毛笔。翠筠，翠竹。毛笔之管用竹制成，故云。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_34_6935_0'>(24) 黄金勒：用黄金制成之衔勒，形容极其珍贵。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_35_6935_0'>(25) 兰膏灯：古代用泽兰子炼成油脂，用以点灯，故云。《楚辞·招魂》：“兰膏明烛，华容备些。”王逸注：“兰膏，以兰香炼膏也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_35_6935_0'>(26) 兔枝墨：《玉台新咏考异》：“兔枝二字未详，吴氏注谓当作兔皮，所引《晁氏墨经》，支离不切，当阙所疑。”吴均《古意》诗：“泪研兔枝墨，笔染鹅毛素。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_41_6935_0'>(27) 值：遇。五代徐锴《说文系传·人部》：“值，一曰逢遇。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_45_6935_0'>(28) 生岁：出生之年份，此处谓年龄相同。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_49_6935_0'>(29) 北山：即钟山。《文选·孔雉圭〈北山移文〉》吕向解题：“钟山在郡北，其先周彦伦隐于此山，后应诏出为海盐县令。今欲却过此山，孔生乃假山灵之意移之，使不许得至，故云‘北山移文’。”此代指归隐之地。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6935_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，依韵酬和白居易《赠元稹》一诗。作品：《种竹》<span class='inlineComment2'>（（与白居易））</span><div id='poem_6919' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6919' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6919?labeling=true' target='_blank'>种竹</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6919")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6919_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6919'>昔乐天赠予诗云：‘无波古井水，有节秋竹竿。’予秋来种竹厅下，因而有怀，聊书十韵。</div><div id='poem_preface_6919_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6919'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6919'>昔公怜我<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作有）</span>直<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，比之秋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6919", 6919, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>竹竿</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6919'>秋来苦相忆，种竹厅前看。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6919'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6919", 6919, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>失地</span>颜色改，伤根<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6919", 6919, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>枝叶</span>残。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6919'>清风犹淅淅，高节空团团。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6919'>鸣蝉聒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6919", 6919, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>暮景</span>，跳蛙集幽阑。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6919'>尘土复昼夜，梢云良独难<span class='inlineComment2'>（梢云：形容竹枝高耸入云。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6919'>丹丘信云远<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，安得临仙坛。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6919'>瘴江冬草绿<span class='inlineComment2'>（瘴江：文粹、钱校作“沿瘴”。）</span>，何人惊岁寒<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6919'>可怜亭亭干，一一青琅玕<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6919'>孤凤竟不至<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，坐伤时节阑。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6919'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_6919_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6919'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6919_1'>⑴ 我：原作“有”，据卢本、全诗、钱校改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6919_0'>⑵ 丹丘：传说中神仙所居没有黑暗之处。《楚辞·远游》：“仍羽人于丹丘兮，留不死之旧乡。”王逸注：“丹丘，昼夜常明也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6919_0'>⑶ 岁寒：《论语·子罕》：“子曰：‘岁寒，然后知松柏之后凋也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6919_0'>⑷ 琅玕：神话传说中一种仙树，此处藉以形容竹之青翠。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6919_0'>⑸ “孤凤”句：传说凤凰非梧桐不栖，非练食（竹实）不食。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6919_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，依韵酬和白居易《赠樊著作》一诗。作品：《和乐天赠樊著作》<div id='poem_6859' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6859' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6859?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和乐天赠樊著作</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6859")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6859_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6859'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6859'>君为著作诗，志激词且温。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6859'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6859", 6859, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>璨然</span>光扬者，皆以义烈闻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6859'>千虑竟一失，冰玉不断痕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6859'>谬予顽不肖，列在数子间。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6859'>因君讥史氏，我亦能具陈。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6859'>羲黄眇云远<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，载籍无遗文。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6859'>煌煌二帝道，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6859", 6859, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>铺设</span>在典坟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6859'>尧心惟舜会，因著为话言。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6859'>皋夔益稷禹<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，粗得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6859", 6859, "Clauses/17/Comments/1")'>无间</span>然<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6859'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6859", 6859, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>缅然</span>千载后，后圣曰孔宣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6859'>迥知皇王意，缀书为百篇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6859'>是时游夏辈<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，不敢措<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6859", 6859, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>舌端</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6859'>信哉作遗训，职在圣与贤。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6859'>如何至<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_6859", 6859, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>近古</span>，史氏为闲官。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6859'>但令识字者，窃弄刀笔权。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6859'>由心书曲直，不使当世观。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6859'>贻之千万代，疑信<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作言）</span>相并传<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6859'>人人异所见，各各私所偏。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6859'>以是曰褒贬，不如都无焉。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6859'>况乃丈夫志，用舍贵当年。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6859'>顾予<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作愿子）</span>有微尚，愿以出处论<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6859'>出非利吾已<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作己）</span>，其出贵道全。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6859'>全道岂虚设，道全当及人。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6859'>全则富与寿，亏则饥与寒。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6859'>遂我一身逸，不如万物安。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6859'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_6859", 6859, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>解悬</span>不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_6859", 6859, "Clauses/50/Comments/1")'>泽手</span>，拯溺无折旋。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6859'>神哉伊尹心<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>，可以冠古先。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6859'>其次有独善，善己不善民。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6859'>天地为一物，死生为一源。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6859'>合杂分万变，忽若风中尘。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6859'>抗哉巢由志<span class='inlineComment2'>（巢由：见卷1《四皓庙》注。）</span>，尧舜不可迁。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6859'>舍此二者外，安用名为宾<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6859'>持谢著书郎，愚不愿有云。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6859'></div><div id='poem_sentence_33_6859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6859'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6859_0'>⑴ 羲黄：伏羲氏与黄帝之并称。伏羲氏即古帝太昊。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6859_0'>⑵ 典坟：《三坟》、《五典》之省称。《左传·昭公十二年》：“子善视之，是能读《三坟》、《五典》、《八索》、《九丘》。”正义引孔安国《尚书序》云：“伏牺、神农、黄帝之书，谓之三坟，言大道也；少昊、颛顼、高辛、唐、虞之书，谓之五典，言常道也。”此泛指各种古代典籍。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6859_0'>⑶ “皋夔”句：皋陶，虞舜之司法官。夔，虞舜之典乐官。益，即伯益，佐禹治水有功，禹欲让位于益，益避居箕山之北。稷，即后稷，虞舜时之农官。禹，虞舜之治水官。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6859_0'>⑷ 间然：非议，异议。《论语·泰伯》：“子曰：‘禹，吾无间然矣。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6859_0'>⑸ 孔宣：即孔宣父，古代对孔丘之尊称。《新唐书·礼乐志第五》（卷一五）：“（贞观）十一年，诏尊孔子为宣父，作庙于兖州，给户二十以奉之。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6859_0'>⑹ 百篇：《文选·孔安国〈尚书序〉》：“典谟训诰誓命之文凡百篇。”张铣注：“如此之类，惣有百篇，此略举之。”后因为《尚书》之代称。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6859_0'>⑺ 游、夏：子游（言偃）与子夏（卜商）之并称。二人为孔子之学生，均长于文学。三国魏曹植《与杨德祖书》：“昔尼父之文辞，与人通流。至于制《春秋》，游夏之徒乃不能措一辞。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_6859_1'>⑻ 信：原作“言”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、何焯校改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_6859_0'>⑼ 出处：出仕与退隐。《易·系辞上》：“君子之道，或出或处，或默或语。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_26_6859_0'>⑽ 伊尹：伊尹名挚，又名阿衡，说商汤以王道，被委以国政，佐汤为相。事详《史记·殷本纪》</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_6859_0'>⑾ 名为宾：《庄子·逍遥游》：“名者，实之宾也，吾将为宾乎？”成玄英疏：“然实以生名，名从实起，实则是内是主，名便是外是宾。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6859_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，依韵酬和白居易《感鹤》一诗。作品：《和乐天感鹤》<div id='poem_6857' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6857' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6857?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和乐天感鹤</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6857")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6857_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6857'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1566, "poem_allusion_6857")'>大夫轩</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6857_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6857'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6857'>我有所爱鹤，毛羽霜雪妍。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6857'>秋霄<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作望）</span>一滴露，声闻<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作洞）</span>林外天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6857'>自随卫侯去，遂入<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1566, "poem_sentence_2_6857")'>大夫轩</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6857'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6857", 6857, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>云貌</span>久已隔，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6857", 6857, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>玉音</span>无复传。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6857'>吟君感鹤操，不觉心惕然。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6857'>无乃予所爱，误为微物迁。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6857'>因兹谕直质，未免柔细牵。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6857'>君看孤松树，左右萝茑缠<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6857'>既可习为鲍<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作饱）</span>，亦可薰为荃<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6857'>期君常善救，勿令终弃捐。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6857'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_6857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6857'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6857_0'>⑴ “自随”二句：《左传·闵公二年》：“狄人伐卫。卫懿公好鹤，鹤有乘轩者。将战，国人受甲者皆曰：‘使鹤，鹤实有禄位，余焉能战？’……卫师败绩。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6857_0'>⑵ 萝茑：女萝与茑之并称。女萝，见卷1《兔丝》注。茑，常绿寄生灌木名，茎蔓生，寄生于桑、枫等树之上。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6857_0'>⑶ “既可”二句：谓人性之化，在于游习。汉戴德《大戴礼记·曾子疾病》：“与君子游，苾乎如入兰芷之室，久而不闻，则与之化矣；与小人游，腻乎如入鲍鱼之次，久而不闻，则与之化矣。”鲍鱼，盐渍鱼，其气腥臭。荃，香草名，即菖蒲。《玉篇·草部》：“荃，香草也。”鲍，原作“饱”，据何焯校及文意改。蜀本、卢本作“匏”，亦疑误。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6857_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，次韵酬和白居易《初与元九别后忽梦见之及寤而书适至兼寄桐花诗怅然感怀因以此寄》一诗。作品：《酬乐天书怀见寄》<div id='poem_7001' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_7001' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/7001?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬乐天书怀见寄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_7001")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_7001_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_7001_0'>① 本题云：“初与微之别后，忽梦见之。及寤而微之书至，兼览《桐花》之什，怅然书怀。”此后五章，并次用本韵。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_7001'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_7001'>新昌北门外，与君从此分<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_7001'>街衢走车马，尘土不见君。<div id='poem_sentence_1_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_7001'>君为分手归，我行行不息<span class='inlineComment2'>（行行：蜀本作“为行”，似是。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_7001'>我上秦岭南，君直枢星北<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_7001'>秦岭高崔嵬，商山好颜色。<div id='poem_sentence_4_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_7001'>月照山馆花<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，裁诗寄相忆。<div id='poem_sentence_5_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_7001'>天明作诗罢，草草随<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作从）</span>所如。<div id='poem_sentence_6_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_7001'>凭人寄将去，三月无报书。<div id='poem_sentence_7_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_7001'>荆州白日晚，城上鼓鼕鼕。<div id='poem_sentence_8_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_7001'>行逢贺州牧<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，致书三四封。<div id='poem_sentence_9_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_7001'>封题乐天字<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作寄）</span>，未坼已沾裳。<div id='poem_sentence_10_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_7001'>坼书八九读，泪落千万行。<div id='poem_sentence_11_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_7001'>中有酬我诗，句句截我肠。<div id='poem_sentence_12_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_7001'>仍云得诗夜，梦我魂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_7001", 7001, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>凄凉</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_7001'>终言作书处，上直金銮东<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_7001'>诗书费一夕，万恨缄其中。<div id='poem_sentence_15_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_7001'>中宵宫中出，复见宫月斜。<div id='poem_sentence_16_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_7001'>书罢月亦落，晓灯垂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_7001", 7001, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>暗花</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_7001'>想君书罢时，南望劳所思。<div id='poem_sentence_18_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_7001'>况我江上立，吟君怀我诗。<div id='poem_sentence_19_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_7001'>怀我浩无极，江水秋正深。<div id='poem_sentence_20_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_7001'>清见万丈底，照我平生心。<div id='poem_sentence_21_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_7001'>感君求友什，因报壮士吟。<div id='poem_sentence_22_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_7001'>持谢众人口，销尽犹是金<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_7001'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_7001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_7001'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_7001_0'>⑴ “新昌”二句：新昌坊为长安朱雀门街之东第四街街东自北向南之第八坊，白居易所居在此。白居易《和答诗十首》序：“五年春，微之……左转为江陵士曹掾。诏下日，会予下内直归，而微之已即路，邂逅相遇于街衢中，自永寿寺南，抵新昌里北，得马上话别。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_7001_0'>⑵ “君直”句：时白居易为翰林学士、京兆户曹参军，上直翰林院，在中枢机构之北，故云。枢星，北斗七星之第一星。《星经》卷上：“北斗星……第一名天枢，为土星。”此借指中枢机构。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_7001_0'>⑶ 山馆：指曾峰馆。参前篇《三月二十四日宿曾峰馆夜对桐花寄乐天》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_7001_0'>⑷ 贺州牧：未详。贺州，今属广西。《元和郡县图志·贺州》：“汉苍梧郡地，今州即苍梧郡之临贺县也……隋开皇元年，以郡为贺州。大业二年废州……武德五年，复置贺州。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_7001_0'>⑸ 上直：上班，当值。直，《玉篇·L部》：“直，侍也。”金銮：见前篇《三月二十四日宿曾峰馆夜对桐花寄乐天》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_7001_0'>⑹ “持谢”二句：《战国策·魏策一》：“张仪为秦连横，说魏王曰：‘臣闻积羽沉舟，群轻折轴，众口铄金。’”此反其意而用之，谓虽遭众口谗毁，而我自持操如一。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_7001_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，寄诗与白居易。作品：《江陵三梦》（三首）《张旧蚊帱》《三遣悲怀》<div id='poem_6481' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6481' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_6481'>崩剥山门坏，烟绵坟草生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6481'>久依荒陇坐，却望远村行。<div "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>风波</span>江上声。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6481'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6481_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6482' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6482' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6482?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span id='poem_content_6482'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6482'>君骨久为土，我心长似灰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6482'>坐看朝日出，众鸟双裴回。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6827'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1289, "poem_allusion_6827")'>长安远于日</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6827_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6827'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6827'>平生每相梦，不省两相知。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6827'>况乃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6827", 6827, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>幽明</span>隔，梦魂徒尔为。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6827'>情知梦无益，非梦见何期。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6827'>依稀旧妆服，晻淡昔容仪。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6827'>不道间生死，但言将别离。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6827'>分张碎针线，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6827", 6827, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>襵叠</span>故屏帏。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6827'>抚稚再三嘱，泪珠千万垂。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6827'>嘱云唯此女，自叹总无儿。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6827'>尚念娇且騃，未禁寒与饥。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6827'>君复不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6827", 6827, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>憘事</span>，奉身犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6827", 6827, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>脱遗</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6827'>况有官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6827", 6827, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>缚束</span>，安能长顾私。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6827'>他人生间别，婢仆多谩欺。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6827'>君在或有托，出门当付谁。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6827'>言罢泣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_6827", 6827, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>幽噎</span>，我亦涕淋漓。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6827'>惊悲忽然寤，坐卧若狂痴。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6827'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_6827", 6827, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>月影</span>半床黑，虫声幽草移。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6827'>心魂生次第，觉梦久自疑。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6827'>寂默深想像，泪下如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_6827", 6827, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>流澌</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6827'>百年永已诀，一梦何太悲。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6827'>悲君所娇女，弃置不我随。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6827'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1289, "poem_sentence_21_6827")'>长安远于日</span>，山川云间之。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6827'>纵我生羽翼，网罗生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_6827", 6827, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>絷维</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6827'>今宵泪零落，半为生别滋。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6827'>感君下泉魄，动我临川思。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6827'>一水不可越，黄泉况无涯。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6827'>此怀何由极，此梦何由追。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6827'>坐见天欲曙，江风吟树枝。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6827_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6827'></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_6827_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6838' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6838' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6838?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_0_6838'>踰年间生死，千里旷南北。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6838'>家居无见期，况乃异乡国。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6838'>破尽裁缝衣，忘收遗翰墨。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6838'>独有缬纱帱，凭人远携得。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6838'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6838", 6838, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>施张</span>合欢榻，展卷双鸳翼。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6838'>已矣长空虚，依然旧颜色。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6838'>裴回将就寝，徙倚情何极。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6838'>昔透香<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6838", 6838, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>田田</span>，今无魂恻恻。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6838'>隙穿斜月照，灯背空床黑。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6838'>达理强开怀，梦啼还过臆。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6838'>平生贫寡欢，夭枉劳苦忆。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6838'>我亦距几时，胡为自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6838", 6838, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>摧逼</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6838'>烛蛾焰中舞，茧蚕丛上织。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6838'>燋烂各自求，他人顾何力。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6838'>多离因苟合，恶影当务息。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6838_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6838_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，闻张季友丧妻，有诗哀之。作品：《独夜伤怀赠呈张侍御》<div id='poem_6559' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6559' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6559?labeling=true' target='_blank'>独夜伤怀赠呈张侍御<span class='inlineComment2'>（张生近丧妻）</span></a><span class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6559'>秪应张侍御，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6559", 6559, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>潜会</span>我心情。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6559_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6559'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6559_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，次韵酬和白居易《代书诗一百韵寄微之》一诗。作品：《酬翰林白学士代书一百韵（并序）》<div id='poem_6736' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6736' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6736?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬翰林白学士代书一百韵<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序，此后江陵时作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6736")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6736_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6736'>玄元氏之下元日，会予家居至，枉乐天代书诗一百韵。鸿洞卓荦，令人兴起心情。且置别书，美予前和七章，章次用本韵，韵同意殊，谓为工巧。前古韵耳，不足难之；今复次排百韵，以答怀思之贶云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6736'>超遥望云雨，摆落占泉坻。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6736'>略削荒凉苑，搜求激直词。<div id='poem_sentence_40_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_6736'>那能<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4435, "poem_sentence_41_6736")'>作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_6736", 6736, "Clauses/82/Comments/1")'>牛后</span></span>，更拟助洪基<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_41_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_6736'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_6736", 6736, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>唱第</span>听鸡集，趋朝忘马疲。<div id='poem_sentence_42_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_6736'>内人舆御案，朝景丽神旗。<div id='poem_sentence_43_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_6736'>首被呼名姓，多惭冠等衰。<div id='poem_sentence_44_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_6736'>千官容<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_6736", 6736, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>眷盼</span>，五色照离披。<div id='poem_sentence_45_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_6736'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_6736", 6736, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>鹓侣</span>从兹洽，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_6736", 6736, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>鸥情</span>转自縻。<div id='poem_sentence_46_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_6736'>分张殊品命，中外却驱驰。<div id='poem_sentence_47_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_6736'>出入称金籍，东西侍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_6736", 6736, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>碧墀</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_48_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_6736'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_6736", 6736, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>斗班</span>云汹涌，开扇雉参差。<div id='poem_sentence_49_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_6736'>切愧寻常质，亲瞻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_6736", 6736, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>咫尺姿</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_50_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_6736'>日轮光照耀，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_6736", 6736, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>龙服</span>瑞葳蕤。<div id='poem_sentence_51_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_6736'>誓欲通愚謇，生憎效喔咿。<div id='poem_sentence_52_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_6736'>佞存真妾妇，谏死是男儿。<div id='poem_sentence_53_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_6736'>便殿承偏召，权臣惧挠私。<div id='poem_sentence_54_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_6736'>庙堂虽稷契，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1544, "poem_sentence_55_6736")'>城社有狐</span>狸。<div id='poem_sentence_55_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_6736'>似锦言应巧，如弦数易欺。<div id='poem_sentence_56_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_6736'>敢嗟身暂黜，所恨政无毗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_57_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_6736'>谬辱良由此，升腾亦在斯。<div id='poem_sentence_58_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_6736'>再令陪宪禁，依旧履阽危。<div id='poem_sentence_59_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_60_6736'>使蜀常绵远，分台更崄巇。<div id='poem_sentence_60_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_61_6736'>匿奸劳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_6736", 6736, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>发掘</span>，破党恶持疑。<div id='poem_sentence_61_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_6736'>斧刃迎皆碎，盘牙老未萎。<div id='poem_sentence_62_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_6736'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_6736", 6736, "Clauses/126/Comments/0")'>乍能</span>还帝笏，讵忍折<span class='inlineComment2'>（音浙）</span>吾支。<div id='poem_sentence_63_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_64_6736'>虎尾元来险，圭文却类疵。<div id='poem_sentence_64_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_65_6736'>浮荣齐壤芥，闲气咏江蓠。<div id='poem_sentence_65_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_66_6736'>阙下殷勤拜，樽前啸傲辞。<div id='poem_sentence_66_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_67_6736'>飘沈委蓬梗，忠信敌蛮夷。<div id='poem_sentence_67_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_68_6736'>戏诮青云驿，讥题皓发祠<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_68_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_69_6736'>贪过谷隐寺，留读岘山碑<span class='inlineComment2'>（寺在亭侧）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_69_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_70_6736'>草没章台阯，堤横楚泽湄。<div id='poem_sentence_70_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_6736'>野莲侵稻陇，亚柳压<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_6736", 6736, "Clauses/143/Comments/0")'>城陴</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_71_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_72_6736'>遇物伤凋换，登楼思漫㳽。<div id='poem_sentence_72_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_73_6736'>金攒嫩橙子，瑿泛远鸬鹚。<div id='poem_sentence_73_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_74_6736'>仰竹藤缠屋，苫茆荻补篱<span class='inlineComment2'>（南人以大竹为瓦，用荻为篱也）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_74_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_75_6736'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_6736", 6736, "Clauses/150/Comments/0")'>面梨</span>通蒂朽，火米带芒炊<span class='inlineComment2'>（面梨软烂无味，火米粗粝不精）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_75_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_76_6736'>苇笋针筒束，鳊鱼箭羽鬐。<div id='poem_sentence_76_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_77_6736'>芋羹真底可，鲈鲙漫劳思。<div id='poem_sentence_77_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_78_6736'>北渚销魂望，南风著骨吹。<div id='poem_sentence_78_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_79_6736'>度梅衣色渍，食稗马蹄羸<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_79_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_80_6736'>院榷和泥碱，官酤小曲醨。<div id='poem_sentence_80_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_81_6736'>讹音烦缴绕，轻<span class='inlineComment2'>（去声）</span>俗丑威仪。<div id='poem_sentence_81_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_82_6736'>树罕贞心柏，畦丰卫足葵。<div id='poem_sentence_82_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_83_6736'>坳洼饶尰矮，游惰压庸缁。<div id='poem_sentence_83_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_84_6736'>病赛乌称鬼，巫占瓦代龟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_84_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_85_6736'>连阴蛙张王，瘴疟雪治医<span class='inlineComment2'>（雨中井作蛙池，终冬往往无雪）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_85_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_86_6736'>我正穷于是，君宁念及兹。<div id='poem_sentence_86_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_87_6736'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_6736", 6736, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>一篇</span>从日下，双鲤送天涯。<div id='poem_sentence_87_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_88_6736'>坐捧迷前席，行吟忘结綦。<div id='poem_sentence_88_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_89_6736'>匡床铺错绣，几案踊灵芝。<div id='poem_sentence_89_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_90_6736'>形影同初合，参商喻此离。<div id='poem_sentence_90_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_91_6736'>扇因秋弃置，镜异月盈亏。<div id='poem_sentence_91_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_92_6736'>壮志诚难夺，良辰岂复追。<div id='poem_sentence_92_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_93_6736'>宁牛终夜永，潘鬓去年衰<span class='inlineComment2'>（予今年始三十二，去岁已生白发）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_93_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_94_6736'>溟渤深那测，穹苍意在谁。<div id='poem_sentence_94_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_95_6736'>驭方轻騕袅，车肯重辛夷。<div id='poem_sentence_95_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_96_6736'>卧辙希<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_6736", 6736, "Clauses/192/Comments/0")'>濡沫</span>，低颜受颔颐。<div id='poem_sentence_96_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_97_6736'>世情焉足怪，自省固堪悲。<div id='poem_sentence_97_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_98_6736'>溷鼠虚求洁，笼禽方讶饥。<div id='poem_sentence_98_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_99_6736'>犹胜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_6736", 6736, "Clauses/198/Comments/0")'>忆黄犬</span>，幸得早图之。<div id='poem_sentence_99_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_100_6736'></div><div id='poem_sentence_100_6736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6736'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6736_0'>⑴ 同年八人，乐天拔萃登科，予平判入等</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6736_0'>⑵ 予赠乐天诗云：皎彼鸾凤姿。乐天赠予诗云：无波古井水</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6736_0'>⑶ 予与乐天、杓直、拒非辈，多于月灯阁閒游，又尝与秘省同官醵宴昆明池</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_6736_0'>⑷ 昔予赋诗云：为见墙头拂面花。时唯乐天知此</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_24_6736_0'>⑸ 乐天每与予游从，无不书名屋壁。又尝于新昌宅，说一枝花话，自寅至巳，犹未毕词也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_26_6736_0'>⑹ 予有𥱊箕草筹箸小盏酒胡之辈，当时尝在书囊，以供饮备</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_41_6736_0'>⑺ 旧说：制策皆以恶讦取容为美。予与乐天，指病危言，不顾成败，意在决求高等。初就业时，今裴相公戒予，慎勿以策苑为美，予深佩其言。然而怪其多大拟取，有可取。遂切求潜览，功及累月，无所获。先是穆员、卢景亮同年应制，俱以词直见黜。予求获其策，皆手自写之，置在筐箧。乐天、损之辈，常诅予箧中有不第之祥，而又哂予决求高第之僭也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_57_6736_0'>⑻ 予元和元年任拾遗八十三日，延英对，九月十三贬授河南尉</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_68_6736_0'>⑼ 予途中作青云驿诗，病其云泥一致，作四皓庙诗，讥其出处不常</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_79_6736_0'>⑽ 南方衣服，经夏谓之度梅，颜色尽黦，马食菰蒋，盖北地稊稗之属</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_84_6736_0'>⑾ 南人染病，竞赛乌鬼，楚巫列肆，悉卖瓦卜</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6736_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，寄诗与李景俭。作品：《纪怀赠李六户曹崔二十功曹五十韵》<span
