id='poem_sentence_0_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6830'>公卿碧墀<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作鸡）</span>会，名姓白麻称。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6830'>日月光遥射，烟霄志渐弘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6830'>荣班联锦绣，谏纸<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作路）</span>赐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6830", 6830, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>笺藤</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6830'>便欲<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作务）</span>呈肝胆，何言犯股肱。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6830'>椎埋冲斗剑，消碎莹壶冰。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6830'>赤县才分务，青骢已迥乘。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6830'>因骑度海鹘，拟杀蔽天鹏。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6830'>缚虎声空壮，连鳌力未胜。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6830'>风翻波竟蹙，山压势逾崩。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6830'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6830", 6830, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>僇辱</span>徒相困，苍黄性不能。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6830'>酣歌离岘顶，负气入江陵。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6830'>华表当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6830", 6830, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>蟾魄</span>，高楼挂玉绳。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6830'>角声悲掉荡，城影暗棱层。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6830'>军幕威容盛，官曹礼数兢。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6830'>心虽出云鹤，身尚触笼鹰。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6830'>竦足良甘分，排衙苦未曾。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6830'>通名参将校，抵掌见亲朋。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6830'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_6830", 6830, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>喣沫</span>求涓滴，沧波怯斗升。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6830'>荒居邻鬼魅，羸马步殑㱥。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6830'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_6830", 6830, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>白草</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_6830", 6830, "Clauses/40/Comments/1")'>堂檐</span>短，黄梅雨气蒸。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6830'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_6830", 6830, id='poem_sentence_21_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6830'>夜怯餐肤蚋，朝烦拂面蝇。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6830'>过从愁厌贱，专静畏猜仍。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6830'>旅寓谁堪托，官联自可凭。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6830'>甲科崔并骛，柱史李齐升。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6830'>共展排空翼，俱遭激远矰。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6830'>他乡元易感，同病转相矜。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6830'>投分多然诺，忘言少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_6830", 6830, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>爱憎</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6830'>誓将探肺腑，耻更辨淄渑。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6830'>会宿形骸远，论交意气增。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6830'>一心吞渤澥，戮力拔嵩恒。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6830'>语到磨圭角，疑消破弩症。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6830'>吹嘘期指掌，患难许檐簦。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6830'>铩翮鸾栖棘，藏锋箭在弸。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6830'>雪中方睹桂，木上莫施罾。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6830'>且泛夤沿水，兼过被病僧。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6830'>有时鞭<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(405, "poem_sentence_37_6830")'>款段</span>，尽日醉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_6830", 6830, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>儚僜</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6830'>蹑屐看秧稻，敲船和采菱。<div id='poem_sentence_38_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6830'>叉鱼江火合，唤客谷神应。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6830'>啸傲虽开口，幽忧复满膺。<div id='poem_sentence_40_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_6830'>望云鳍拨剌，透匣色腾凌。<div id='poem_sentence_41_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_6830'>每想<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4310, id='poem_sentence_44_6830'>逐鸟忠潜奋，悬旌意远凝。<div id='poem_sentence_44_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_6830'>韬弓思彻札，绊骥闷牵縆。<div id='poem_sentence_47_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_6830'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_6830", 6830, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>班笔</span>行看掷，黄陂莫漫澄。<div id='poem_sentence_48_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_6830'>骐驎高阁上，须及壮时登。<div id='poem_sentence_49_6830_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_6830'></div><div id='poem_sentence_50_6830_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，次韵胡灵之诗，原诗已经亡佚。作品：《答姨兄胡灵之见寄五十（二）韵》<div id='poem_6949' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6949' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6949?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答姨兄胡灵之见寄五十韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6949")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6949_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6949'>九岁解赋诗，饮酒至斗馀乃醉。时方依倚舅族，舅怜，不以礼数检，故得与姨兄胡灵之之辈十数人，为昼夜游，日月跳掷，于今馀二十年矣。其间悲欢合散，可胜道哉。昨枉是篇，感彻肌骨，适白翰林又以百韵见贻。余因次酬本韵，以答贯珠之赠焉，于吾兄不敢变例，复自城至生。凡次五十一字，灵之本题兼呈李六侍御，是以篇末有云。</div><div id='poem_preface_6949_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6949'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(105, "poem_allusion_6949")'>五鼎</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6949_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6949'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6949'>忆昔凤翔城，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6949", 6949, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>龆年</span>是事荣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6949_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6949_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6949'>诗律蒙亲授，朋游忝自迎。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6949_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6949'>题头<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6949", 6949, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>筠管</span>缦，教射角弓骍<span class='inlineComment2'>（灵之善笔札，习骑射）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6949_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6949'>对谈依赳赳，送客步盈盈。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6949_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_6949_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_6949'>此生如未死，未拟变平生<span class='inlineComment2'>（一本云今日负平生）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_51_6949_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_6949'></div><div id='poem_sentence_52_6949_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6949'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6949_0'>⑴ 军大夫张生好属词，多妓乐，歌者华奴，善歌《淅淅盐》。又有舞者媚子，每觥令禁言，张生常令相挠</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_6949_0'>⑵ 予宅在靖安北街，灵之时寓居永乐南街庙中，予宅又南邻弩营</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_25_6949_0'>⑶ 开元观古松五株，靖安宅牡丹数本，皆曩时游行之地</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_28_6949_0'>⑷ 时灵之作吏平阳，予酬校秘阁，自兹分散</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_41_6949_0'>⑸ 此后多述李君定交之由，用报灵之兼呈之意</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6949_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，依韵酬和白居易《八月十五夜禁中独直对月忆元九》一诗。作品：《酬乐天八月十五夜禁中独直玩月见寄》<div id='poem_6662' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6662' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_1_6941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6941'>清泠浅漫流<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作溪）</span>，画舫兰篙渡。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6941'>池光漾霞影<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作彩霞）</span>，晓日初<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6941", 6941, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>明煦</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6941'>乌龙不作声，碧玉曾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6941", 6941, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>相慕</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6941_comment'></div></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，有诗。作品：《楚歌十首》<div id='poem_6636' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6636' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6636?labeling=true' target='_blank'>楚歌十首<span class='inlineComment2'>（江陵时作）</span><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6636")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6636_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6636'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6636'>楚人千万户，生死系时君。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6636'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6636", 6636, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>当璧</span>便为嗣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，贤愚安可分。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6636'>干戈长浩浩，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6636", 6636, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>篡乱</span>亦纷纷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6636'>纵有明在下<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，区区何足云。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6636'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6636'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6636_0'>⑴ “当璧”句：《左传·昭公十三年》：“初，共王无冢适，有宠子五人，无适立焉。乃大有事于群望，而祈曰：‘请神择于五人者，使主社稷。’乃遍以璧见于群望，曰：‘当璧而拜者，神所立也，谁敢违之？’既，乃与巴姬密埋璧于大室之庭，使五人齐，而长入拜，康王跨之，灵王肘加焉。子干、子皙皆远之。平王弱，抱而入，再拜，皆厌纽。”平王遂为冢嫡。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6636_0'>⑵ 在下：蜀本、卢本作“君在”，似是。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6636_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6637' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6637' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6637?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6637_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6637'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6637'>陶虞事已远<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，尼父独将明<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6637'>潜穴龙无位，幽林兰自生<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6637'>楚王谋授邑，此意复中倾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6637'>未别子西语，纵来何所成<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6637'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6637'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6637_0'>⑴ 陶虞：古代传说之圣君陶唐与虞舜之并称。陶唐即唐尧，帝喾之子，姓伊祁，名放勋，初封于陶，后徙封于唐；虞舜，姓姚，名重华，因其先国于虞，故称。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6637_0'>⑵ 尼父：对孔子之尊称。《礼记·檀弓上》：“鲁哀公诔孔丘曰：‘……呜呼哀哉，尼父！’”郑玄注：“尼父，因其字以为之谥。”父，同‘甫’，对丈夫之美称。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6637_0'>⑶ “潜穴”二句：谓孔子空有其德而无权位，不能发明先圣之大业，只能怀德自处。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6637_0'>⑷ “楚王”四句：《史记·孔子世家》：“（楚）昭王将以书社地七百里封孔子，楚令尹子西曰：‘王之使使诸侯有如子贡者乎？’曰：‘无有。’‘王之辅相有如颜回者乎？’曰：‘无有。’‘王之将率有如子路者乎？’曰：‘无有。’‘王之官尹有如宰予者乎？’曰：‘无有。’‘且楚之祖封于周，号为子男五十里。今孔丘述三王之法，明周召之业，王若用之，则楚安得世世堂堂方数千里乎？夫文王在丰，武王在镐，百里之君卒王天下。今孔丘得据土壤，贤弟子为佐，非楚之福也。’昭王乃止。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6637_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6638' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6638' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6638?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6638_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6638'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(764, "poem_allusion_6638")'>鞭尸</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6638_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6638'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6638'>平王渐昏惑，无极转承恩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6638'>子建犹相贰，伍奢安得存<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6638'>生居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6638", 6638, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>宫雉</span>閟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，死葬寝园尊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6638'>岂料奔吴士，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(764, "poem_sentence_3_6638")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6638", 6638, "Clauses/7/Comments/2")'>鞭尸</span></span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6638", 6638, "Clauses/7/Comments/3")'>郢市</span>门<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6638'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6638'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6638_0'>⑴ “平王”二句：楚平王为楚共王之第五子，以诈杀子比及令尹子皙而自立，恐国人及诸侯叛，乃施惠百姓。后听信无忌之谗言，疏太子建，杀建太傅伍奢及其子尚。无极，即楚大夫费无忌，以善谗著名。事详《史记·楚世家》。王，原作“生”，据蜀本、卢本、全诗、胡本及何焯校改。极，原作“复”，据蜀本、杨本、董本、马本、全诗及文意改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6638_0'>⑵ “子建”二句：平王六年，使太子建居城父，守边。无忌日夜谗太子建于平王，平王召建太子太傅伍奢而责之。伍奢知无忌之谗，乃曰：“王奈何以小臣疏骨肉？”无忌曰：“今不制，后悔也。”于是平王遂囚伍奢，杀之。事详《史记·楚世家》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6638_0'>⑶ 宫雉：皇宫之围墙。雉，古代计算城墙面积之单位。此代指皇宫。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6638_0'>⑷ 寝园：皇帝之陵园。古代帝王之陵园皆有寝殿，故云。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6638_0'>⑸ “岂料”二句：楚平王囚伍奢，使召其二子，奢曰：“尚之为人，廉，死节，慈孝而仁，闻召而免父，必至，不顾其死；胥之为人，智而好谋，勇而矜功，知来必死，必不来。然为楚国忧者必此子。”伍尚赴召，而伍胥出奔吴。后伍胥佐吴王阖闾伐楚，“及吴兵入郢，伍子胥求昭王，既不得，乃掘楚平王墓，出其尸，鞭之三百然后已。”奔吴士，指伍子胥。郢，楚之都城，故城在今湖北省江陵市西北。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6638_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6639' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6639' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6639?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6639_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6639'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1414, "poem_allusion_6639")'>襄王</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2281, "poem_allusion_6639")'>邓曼</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2754, "poem_allusion_6639")'>樊姬断肥鲜</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6639_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6639'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6639'>惧盈因<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2281, "poem_sentence_0_6639")'>邓曼</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，罢猎为樊姬<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6639'>盛德留金石，清风鉴薄帷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6639'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1414, "poem_sentence_2_6639")'>襄王</span>忽妖梦，宋玉复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6639", 6639, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>淫辞</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6639'>万事捐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6639", 6639, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>宫馆</span>，空山云雨期<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6639'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6639_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6639'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6639_0'>⑴ “惧盈”句：《左传·庄公四年》：“王三月，楚武王荆尸，授师孑焉，以伐随。将斋，入告夫人邓曼曰：‘余心荡。’邓曼叹曰：‘王禄尽矣。盈而荡，天之道也，先君其知之矣，故临武事，将发大命，而荡王心焉。若师徒无亏，王薨于行，国之福也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6639_0'>⑵ “罢猎”句：楚庄王即位，好狩猎，樊姬谏，不听，姬乃不食禽兽之肉。王改过，勤于政事，尝听朝罢宴，姬问之，曰：“与贤者虞丘子语。”姬掩口而笑。王曰：“所笑何也？”姬曰：“虞丘子相楚十馀年，未闻进贤退不肖，是蔽君而塞贤路，是以笑也。”于是，虞丘子乃迎孙叔敖而进之，王以为令尹。三年而霸，樊姬之力也。樊姬，楚庄王夫人。事详汉刘向《列女传·贤明传》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6639_0'>⑶ “襄王”四句：战国楚宋玉《高唐赋》：“昔者楚襄王与宋玉游于云梦之台，望高唐之观，其上独有云气……王问玉曰：‘此何气也？’玉对曰：‘所谓朝云者也。’王曰：‘何谓朝云？’玉曰：‘昔者先王尝游高唐，怠而昼寝，梦见一妇人曰：妾，巫山之女也，为高唐之客，闻君游高唐，愿荐枕席。王因幸之。去而辞曰：妾在巫山之阳，高丘之阻，旦为朝云，暮为行雨，朝朝暮暮，阳台之下。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6639_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6640' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6640' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6640?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6640_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6640'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6640'>宜僚南市住，未省食人恩。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6640'>临难忽相感，解纷宁用言<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6640'>何如晋夷甫，坐占紫微垣。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6640'>看著五胡乱，清谈空自尊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6640'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6640_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6640'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6640_0'>⑴ “宜僚”四句：春秋时楚国勇士宜僚，姓熊，居于市南，因号市南子。楚白公胜谋作乱，将杀令尹子西，以宜僚可敌五百人，遣使屈之。宜僚正上下弄丸，既不为利谄，亦不为威惕，卒不从命。白公胜不得宜僚，反事遂寝，而白公胜、子西两家之难解。事详《左传·哀公十六年》。市南，原作“南市”，据何焯校及《左传》改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6640_0'>⑵ “何如”四句：晋王衍，字夷甫，好庄老之言，常执玉柄麈尾，清谈玄理。衍虽位居三公，而不以国事为念，北方五胡扰乱中原，无所措置。及为石勒所俘，将死，顾而言曰：“呜呼！吾曹虽不如古人，向若不祖尚浮虚，戮力以匡天下，犹可不至今日。”紫微垣，指中书省。开元元年，改中书省曰紫微省，中书令曰紫微令；五胡，指东晋至南朝初在北方先后建立政权之匈奴、鲜卑、羯、氐、羌。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6640_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6641' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6641' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6641?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6641_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6641'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(494, "poem_allusion_6641")'>哭秦兵</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6641_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6641'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6641'>谁恃王深宠，谁为楚上卿<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6641'>包胥心独许，连夜<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(494, "poem_sentence_1_6641")'>哭秦兵</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6641'>千乘徒虚尔<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，一夫安可轻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6641'>殷勤聘名士，莫但倚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6641", 6641, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>方城</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6641'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6641_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6641'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6641_0'>⑴ 上卿：古官名。周制，天子及诸侯皆有卿，分上、中、下三等，最尊者为上卿。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6641_0'>⑵ “包胥”二句：楚昭王十年（前506），吴王阖闾用伍子胥之计攻破楚国，楚大夫申包胥到秦国请求救兵，遇阻，在秦庭痛哭七日夜，终于使秦国发兵救楚。十一年六月，大败吴国军队。事详《左传·定公四年》及《史记·楚世家》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6641_0'>⑶ 千乘：兵车千辆。古代以一车四马为一乘。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6641_0'>⑷ 方城：春秋楚国北部之长城，由今之河南方城县循伏牛山北至今邓县，为古九塞之一。此泛指防御工事。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6641_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6642' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6642' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6642?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6642_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6642'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6642'>梁业雄图尽，遗孙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6642", 6642, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>世运</span>消。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6642'>宣明徒有号，江汉不相朝<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6642'>碑碣高临路，松枝半作樵。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6642'>唯馀开圣寺，犹学武皇妖<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6642'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6642'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6642_0'>⑴ “宣明”二句：宣指后梁宣帝萧察，明指后梁明帝萧岿。察为南朝梁武帝萧衍孙、照明太子萧统第三子，降魏后被立为梁王，寻即位于江陵，史称后梁。察卒，谥曰宣皇帝。察传位于其子岿，岿卒，谥曰孝明皇帝。传位至岿子萧琮，为隋文帝所灭。后梁仅有江陵一带狭小之地，故云。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6642_0'>⑵ “唯馀”二句：武皇指梁武帝萧衍。衍治国乏术，佞佛有加，广建佛寺，并多次舍身，终困饿而死。事详《梁书》本纪。开圣寺，在荆州四望山。《续高僧传·隋初荆州四望山开圣寺释智旷传》：“以开皇二十年九月二十四日，终于四望开圣寺，春秋七十有五。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6642_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6643' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6643' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6643?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6643_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6643'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6643'>江陵南北道，长有远人来。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6643'>死别登舟去，生心上马回<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6643'>荣枯诚异日，今古尽同灰。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6643'>巫峡朝云起，荆王安在哉<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6643'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6643'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6643_0'>⑴ “死别”二句：谓江陵地处蛮荒，自京城贬谪此地，与亲友有死生之别，而自江陵被召还京城，顿有起死回生之心。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6643_0'>⑵ “巫峡”二句：谓楚襄王梦巫山神女事已成遥远之历史。荆王，指楚襄王，楚地即古之荆州之地，故云。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6643_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6644' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6644' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6644?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6644_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6644'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6644'>三峡连天水，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6644", 6644, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>奔波</span>万里来。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6644'>风涛各自急，前后苦相推。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6644'>倒入黄牛漩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，惊冲滟滪堆<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6644'>古今流不尽，流去不曾回。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6644'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6644_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6644'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6644_0'>⑴ 黄牛漩：指黄牛滩。南朝宋盛弘之《荆州记》：“宜都西陵峡中有黄牛山，江湍纡回，途经信宿犹望见之，行者语曰：‘朝发黄牛，暮宿黄牛。三朝三暮，黄牛如故。’”北魏郦道元《水经注·江水》：“江水又东，经黄牛山，下有滩。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6644_0'>⑵ 滟滪堆：长江瞿塘峡口之险滩。宋乐史《太平寰宇记·山南东道七·夔州》（卷一四八）：“滟滪堆，周围二十丈，在州西南二百步蜀江中心瞿唐峡口。冬水浅，屹然露百馀尺；夏水涨，没数十丈。其状如马，舟人不敢进。……谚曰：‘滟滪大如襆，瞿唐不可触。滟滪大如马，瞿唐不可下。滟滪大如鳖，瞿唐行舟绝。滟滪大如龟，瞿唐不可窥。’”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6644_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6645' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6645' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6645?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6645_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6645'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6645'>八荒同日月<span class='inlineComment2'>（八荒：见卷3《竞渡》注。）</span>，万古共山川。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6645'>生死既由命，兴衰还付天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6645'>栖栖王粲赋<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，愤愤屈平篇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6645'>各自埋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6645", 6645, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>幽恨</span>，江流终宛然。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6645'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6645'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6645_0'>⑴ “栖栖”句：王粲，字仲宣，山阳高平（今山东邹县西南）人，建安七子之一。汉末，关中大乱，王粲赴荆州依刘表，不被重用，郁郁寡欢，游当阳城楼，眺望远方而作《登楼赋》，抒发久滞他乡而才能不得施展之情。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6645_0'>⑵ 屈平篇：指屈原《哀郢》。清王夫之《楚辞通解》认为，《哀郢》为楚国郢都（即江陵）被秦将白起攻破而东迁于陈之事作，“哀故都之弃捐，宗社之丘墟，人民之离散，顷襄之不能效死以拒秦，而亡可待也。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6645_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，呈诗与李景俭。作品：《江边四十韵》《哀病骢呈致用》<div id='poem_6826' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6826' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6826?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江边四十韵<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6826")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6826_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6826_0'>① 官为修宅，卒然有作，因招李六侍御，此后并江陵时作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6826'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6826'>官借江边宅，天生地势坳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6826'>敧危饶坏构，迢递接长郊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6826'>怪鵩频栖息，跳蛙颇混殽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6826'>总无篱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6826", 6826, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>缴绕</span>，尤怕虎咆哮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6826'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6826", 6826, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>停潦</span>鱼招獭，空仓鼠敌猫。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6826'>土虚烦穴蚁，柱朽畏藏蛟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6826'>蛇虺吞檐雀，豺狼逐野麃。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6826'>犬惊狂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6826", 6826, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>浩浩</span>，鸡乱响嘐嘐。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6826'>濩落贫甘守，荒凉秽尽包。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6826'>断帘飞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6826", 6826, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>熠耀</span>，当户网蟏蛸。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6826'>曲突翻成沼，行廊却<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6826", 6826, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>代庖</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6826'>桥横老颠蘖，马病裛刍茭。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6826'>一一床头点，连连砌下泡。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6826'>辱泥疑在绛，避雨想经崤。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6826'>相顾忧为鳖，谁能复系匏。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6826'>誓心来利往，卜食过安爻。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6826'>何计逃昏垫，移文报旧交。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6826'>栋梁存伐木，苫盖愧分茅。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6826'>金琯排<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_6826", 6826, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>黄荻</span>，琅玕袅翠梢。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6826'>花塼水面斗，鸳瓦玉声敲。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6826'>方础荆山采，修椽郢匠刨。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6826'>隐锥<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作椎）</span>雷震蛰，破竹箭鸣骹。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6826'>正寝初停午，频眠欲转胞。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6826'>囷圆收<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作故）</span>薄禄，厨敝备嘉肴。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6826'>各各人宁宇，双双燕贺巢。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6826'>高门受车辙，华厩称蒲捎。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6826'>尺寸皆随用，毫釐敢浪抛。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6826'>篾馀笼白鹤，枝<span class='inlineComment2'>（集本缺）</span>剩架<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_6826", 6826, "Clauses/55/Comments/1")'>青鵁</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6826'>制榻容筐篚，施关拒斗筲。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6826'>栏干防汲井，密室待持胶。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6826'>庭草佣工薙，园蔬稚子掊。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6826'>本图闲种植，那要择肥硗。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6826'>绿柚勤勤数，红榴个个抄。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6826'>池清漉螃蟹，瓜蠹拾𧏘蟊。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6826'>晒篆看沙鸟，磨刀绽海鲛。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6826'>罗灰修药灶，筑垛阅弓弰。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6826'>散诞都由习，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_6826", 6826, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>童蒙</span>剩懒教。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6826'>最便陶静饮，还作解愁嘲。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6826'>近浦闻归楫，遥城罢晓铙。<div id='poem_sentence_38_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6826'>王孙如有问，须为并挥鞘。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6826_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6826'></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_6826_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，依韵酬和白居易《曲江感秋》一诗。作品：《和乐天秋题曲江》<div id='poem_6705' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6705' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6705?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和乐天秋题曲江</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6705")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6705_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6705'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6705'>十载定交契，七年镇相随<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6705'>长安最多处，多是曲江池。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6705'>梅杏春尚小，芰荷秋已衰。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6705'>共爱寥落境，相将偏此时。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6705'>绵绵红蓼水<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，飏飏白鹭鸶<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6705'>诗句偶未得，酒杯聊久持。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6705'>今来云雨旷<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，旧赏魂梦知。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6705'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6705", 6705, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>况乃</span>江枫夕，和君秋兴诗。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6705'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_6705_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6705'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6705_0'>⑴ 七：蜀本作“六”。镇：经常。明胡震亨《唐音癸签·诂笺九》：“镇，有常之义，约略用之代常字。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6705_0'>⑵ 红蓼：蓼之一种，多生水边，花呈淡红色。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6705_0'>⑶ 飏飏：迎风飞舞貌。《说文·风部》：“飏，风所飞扬也。”鹭鸶：水鸟名，因其头顶、胸、肩、背皆长毛如丝，故称。其中以白、苍二色为最常见。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6705_0'>⑷ 云雨：汉王粲《赠蔡子笃诗》：“风流云散，一别如雨。”因以之比喻分别。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6705_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，次韵酬和白居易《春暮寄元九》一诗。作品：《酬乐天早夏见怀》<div id='poem_7003' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_7003' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/7003?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬乐天早夏见怀</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_7003")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_7003_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_7003'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_7003'>庭柚有垂实，燕巢无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_7003", 7003, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>宿雏</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_7003_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_7003'>我亦辞社燕<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，茫茫焉所如。<div id='poem_sentence_1_7003_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_7003'>君诗夏方早，我叹秋已徂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_7003_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_7003'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_7003", 7003, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>食物</span>风土异，衾裯时节殊。<div id='poem_sentence_3_7003_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_7003'>荒草满田地，近移江上居。<div id='poem_sentence_4_7003_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_7003'>八日复切九<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，月明侵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_7003", 7003, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>半除</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_7003_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_7003'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_7003_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_7003'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_7003_0'>⑴ “我亦“句：燕子春社来，秋社去，如今秋天已届，而自己仍被贬异乡，不得北返，故云。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_7003_0'>⑵ 徂：去，往。《尔雅·释诂上》：“徂，往也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_7003_0'>⑶ 日：何焯校：“‘日’疑作‘月’。”切：何焯校：“‘切’疑作‘初’。”切：近，迫。《广韵·屑韵》：“切，近也，迫也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_7003_0'>⑷ 除：台阶。宋李诫《营造法式·总释下·阶》：“除谓之阶。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_7003_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，次韵酬和白居易《劝酒寄元九》一诗。作品：《酬乐天劝醉》<div id='poem_7002' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_7002' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/7002?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬乐天劝醉</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_7002")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_7002_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_7002'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_7002'>神曲清浊酒<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，牡丹深浅花。<div id='poem_sentence_0_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_7002'>少年欲相饮，此乐何可涯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_7002'>沈机造<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_7002", 7002, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>神境</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（沈机：亦作“沉机”，犹深谋。）</span>，不必悟楞伽<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_7002'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_7002", 7002, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>酡颜</span>返童貌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，安用成丹砂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_7002'>刘伶称酒德，所称良未多<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_7002'>愿君听此曲，我为尽称嗟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_7002'>一杯颜色好，十盏胆气加。<div id='poem_sentence_6_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_7002'>半酣得自恣，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_7002", 7002, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>酩酊</span>归太和<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_7002'>共醉真可乐，飞觥撩乱歌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_7002'>独醉亦有趣，兀然无与他。<div id='poem_sentence_9_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_7002'>美人醉灯下，左右流横波。<div id='poem_sentence_10_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_7002'>王孙醉床上，颠倒眠绮罗。<div id='poem_sentence_11_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_7002'>君今劝我醉，劝醉意如何。<div id='poem_sentence_12_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_7002'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_7002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_7002'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_7002_0'>⑴ 清浊酒：古代酒分清浊，清酒为优质酒，浊酒为劣质酒。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_7002_0'>⑵ 《楞迦》：即《楞伽》，佛经有《楞伽阿跋多罗宝经》（或译《大乘入楞伽经》），相传为佛在师子国楞伽山所说，故名。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_7002_0'>⑶ 酡颜：饮酒后脸红貌。酡，《玉篇·酉部》：“酡，饮酒朱颜貌。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_7002_0'>⑷ 丹砂：即朱砂，矿物名，色深红，古代道教徒用以化汞炼丹，此指用丹砂炼就之丹药。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_7002_0'>⑸ “刘伶”二句：刘伶字伯伦，沛国（今江苏省沛县）人。司马氏擅权，伶沉湎于酒，著《酒德颂》，历数饮酒之美。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_7002_0'>⑹ 酩酊：大醉貌。大和：亦作太和，天地间冲和之气。《易·乾》：“保合大和，乃利贞。”朱熹本义：“太和，阴阳会合冲和之气也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_7002_0'>⑺ 飞觥：见卷六《寄吴士矩端公五十韵》注。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_7002_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，次韵酬和白居易《初授户曹喜而言志》一诗。作品：《酬乐天初授户曹喜而言志》<div id='poem_6853' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6853' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6853?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和乐天初授户曹喜而言志</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6853")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6853_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6853'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6853'>王爵无细大，得请即为恩。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6853'>君求户曹掾，贵以禄奉亲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6853'>闻君得所请，感我欲沾巾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6853'>今人重轩冕，所重华与纷。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6853'>矜誇仕台阁<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，奔走无朝昏。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6853'>君衣不盈箧，君食不满囷。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6853'>君言养既薄，何以荣我门。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6853'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6853", 6853, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>披诚</span>再三请，天子怜俭贫。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6853'>词曹直文苑，捧诏荣且忻<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6853'>归来高堂上，兄弟罗酒尊。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6853'>各称千万寿，共饮三四巡。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6853'>我实知君者，千里能具陈。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6853'>感君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6853", 6853, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>求禄</span>意，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6853", 6853, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>求禄</span>殊众人。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6853'>上以奉颜色，馀以及亲宾。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6853'>弃名不弃实，谋养不谋身。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6853'>可怜白华士<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，永愿凌青云。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6853'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_6853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6853'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6853_0'>⑴ 台阁：汉时指尚书台，后泛指中央政府机构。《后汉书·仲长统传》：“光武皇帝  数世之失权，忿强臣之窃命，矫枉过直，政不任下，虽置三公，事归台阁。”李贤注：“台阁，谓尚书也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6853_0'>⑵ “词曹”二句：指白居易以京兆户曹参军充翰林学士，上值翰林院。词曹，见卷2《阳城驿》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6853_0'>⑶ 白华士：指白居易。《诗经·小雅》有《白华》之篇，其诗已佚，其诗序曰：“《白华》，孝子之洁白也……有其义而亡其词。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6853_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，酬和白居易《赠吴丹》一诗。作品：《和乐天赠吴丹》<div id='poem_6858' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6858' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6858?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和乐天赠吴丹</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6858")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6858_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6858'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6858'>不识吴生面，久知吴生道。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6858'>迹虽染世名，心本奉天老<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6858'>雌一守命门<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，回九填血脑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6858'>委气荣卫和<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，咽津颜色好<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6858'>传闻共甲子<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，衰隤尽枯槁。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6858'>独有冰雪容<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6858", 6858, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>纤华</span>夺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6858", 6858, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>鲜缟</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6858'>问人何能尔，吴实旷怀抱。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6858'>弁冕徒挂身，身外非所宝。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6858'>伊予固<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6858", 6858, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>童昧</span>，希真亦云早<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6858'>石坛玉晨尊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>，昼夜长自埽。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6858'>密印视丹田<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>，游神梦三岛<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6858'>万过黄庭经<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>，一食<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6858", 6858, "Clauses/23/Comments/1")'>青精稻</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6858'>冥搜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6858", 6858, "Clauses/24/Comments/1")'>方朔桃</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒁</sup>，结念<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6858", 6858, "Clauses/25/Comments/1")'>安期枣</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒂</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6858'>绿发幸未改<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒃</sup>，丹诚自能保。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6858'>行当摆尘缨，吴门事探讨。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6858'>君为先此词，终期搴瑶草<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒄</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6858'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_6858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6858'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6858_0'>⑴ 天老：传为黄帝辅佐之臣，著《杂子阴道》二十五卷，为道家祖师之一。《后汉书·张衡传》：“方将师天老而友地典，与之乎高睨而大谈。”李贤注：“《帝王纪》曰：‘黄帝以风后配上台，天老配中台，五圣配下台，谓之三公。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6858_0'>⑵ 雌一：处阴柔之势而心专一守。命门：指右肾，以其精神所舍，元气所系，男子藏精，妇人系胞，故名。《杂经·三十六难》：“左者为肾，右者为命门。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6858_0'>⑶ 回九：古代一种吸纳阳气的修炼方法。九，《说文·九部》：“九，阳之变也。”《黄庭内景经》：“转降适斗藏初九，知雄守雌可无老。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6858_0'>⑷ 荣卫：中医学名词，荣指血之回圈，卫指气之周流。荣气行于脉中，属阴；卫气行于脉外，属阳。荣卫二气散布全身，内外相贯，运行不已，对人体起著滋养与保卫作用。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6858_0'>⑸ “咽津”句：参卷5《韦氏馆与周隐客杜归和泛舟》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6858_0'>⑹ 共甲子：即同龄人。甲为天干之首位，子为地支之首位，以天干、地支递次相配，如甲子、乙丑、丙寅之类，统称甲子。从甲子起至癸亥止，共六十个。此借指年岁、年龄。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6858_0'>⑺ 冰雪容：形容肌肤光滑洁白。《庄子·逍遥游》：“藐姑射之山，有神人居焉，肌肤若冰雪，绰约若处子。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6858_0'>⑻ 希真：向往得道或成仙。真，道家谓得道或成仙之人。《说文·匕部》：“真，仙人变形而登天也。”段玉裁注：“此真之本义也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6858_0'>⑼ 玉晨尊：玉晨之塑像。玉晨，仙人之号。南朝梁陶弘景《真灵位业图》：“第二中位，上清高圣太上玉晨玄皇大道君，为万道之主。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6858_0'>⑽ 密印：佛教认为，诸佛菩萨各有本誓，为标志此本誓，以两手十指结种种之相，是为印象印契，故云“印”；其理趣深奥秘密，故云“密”。密宗多修密印法门，以身、口、意三密相应，手结印，心观想，口持咒，以求證佛果。此借指道教修炼之秘诀。丹田：道教认为，人体有三丹田，即两眉之间者为上丹田，心下者为中丹田，脐下者为下丹田。见葛洪《抱朴子·地真》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6858_0'>⑾ 三岛：指神话传说中之三神山蓬莱、方丈、瀛洲。此泛指仙境。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6858_0'>⑿ 《黄庭经》：道教经典著作之一，宣讲养生修炼之道，认为脾为中央黄庭，于五脏中特重脾土，故名。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6858_0'>⒀ 青精稻：即青精饭，立夏所吃之乌米饭。相传首为太极真人所制，服之可延年益寿。宋林洪《山家清供》卷上：“青精饭，首以此重谷也。按《本草》：南烛木（米），今名黑饭草，又名旱莲草，即青精也。采枝叶，捣叶，浸上白好粳米，不拘多少，候一二时，蒸饭。曝乾，坚而碧色，收贮。如用时，先用滚水，量以米数，煮一滚，即成饭矣……久服，延年益颜。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6858_0'>⒁ 方朔桃：《汉武故事》：“东郡献短人，呼东方朔至，短人因指朔谓上曰：‘西王母种桃，三千岁为一子，此而（儿）不良也，已三过偷之也。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6858_0'>⒂ 安期枣：传说中之仙果名。《史记·封禅书》：“臣尝游海上，见安期生，安期生食巨枣，大如瓜。”安期生，秦汉间齐人，传说他曾从河上丈人习黄帝、老子之说，卖药东海边。秦始皇东游，与语三日夜，赐金璧数千万，皆置之阜乡亭而去，留书及赤玉舄一双为报。后始皇遣使入海求之，未至蓬莱山，遇风波而返。事详旧题汉刘向《列仙传》等。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6858_0'>⒃ 绿发：年少貌，指乌黑而有光泽之头发。黑色而有光泽似浓绿，故云。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6858_0'>⒄ 瑶草：传说中之香草。瑶通  。《文选·江淹〈别赋〉》：“君结绶兮千里，惜瑶草之徒芳。”李善注：“《山海经》曰：‘姑瑶之山，帝女死焉，名曰女尸，化为  （瑶）草。其叶胥成，其花黄，其色如兔丝，服者媚于人。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6858_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，依韵酬和白居易《别舍弟后月夜》一诗。作品：《和乐天别弟后月夜作》<div id='poem_6854' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6854' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6854?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和乐天别弟后月夜作</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6854")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6854_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6854'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6854'>闻君别爱弟，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6854", 6854, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>明天</span>照夜寒<span class='inlineComment2'>（明天：月光满天，照亮空际。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6854'>秋雁拂檐影，晓琴当砌弹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6854'>怅望天澹澹，因思路漫漫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6854'>吟为别弟操<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，闻者为辛酸。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6854'>况我兄弟远，一身形影单。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6854'>江波浩无极，但见时岁阑。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6854'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_6854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6854'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6854_0'>⑴ 操：清薛雪《一瓢诗话》：“乐府凡用‘引’、‘操’等名，皆是琴曲。”《后汉书·曹褒传》：“歌诗曲操”李贤注引刘向《别录》：“君子因雅琴之适，故从容以致思焉。其道闭塞悲愁而作者，名其曲曰操，言遇灾害不失其操也。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6854_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，酬和白居易《秋题牡丹丛》。作品：《和乐天秋题牡丹丛》<div id='poem_6856' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6856' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6856")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6856_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6856'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6856'>敝宅艳山卉<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，别来长叹息。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6856'>吟君晚丛咏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，似见摧隤色。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6856'>欲识别后容，勤过晚丛侧。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6856'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_6856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6856'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6856_0'>⑴ 敝宅：指元稹靖安坊之宅，中有牡丹数株。靖安坊为长安朱雀门街之东第一街街东自北向南之第五坊。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6856_0'>⑵ 晚丛咏：白居易《秋题牡丹丛》有“晚丛白露夕”之句。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6856_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，与白居易书，有诗。作品：《江陵寄乐天书》（拟题，诗已佚）<div id='poem_6550' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6550' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6550?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贬江陵途中寄乐天杓直杓直以员外郎判盐铁乐天以拾遗在翰林<span
