id='poem_content_6550'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6550'>想到江陵无一事，酒杯书卷缀新文。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6550'>紫芽嫩茗和枝采，朱橘香苞数瓣分。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6550'>暇日上山狂逐鹿，凌晨过寺饱看云。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6550'>算缗草诏终须解，不敢将心远羡君。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6550'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6550_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　在江陵，与李景俭酬别，有诗。作品：《酬别致用》<div id='poem_6965' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6965' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6965?labeling=true' target='_blank'>詶别致用</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6965")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6965_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6965'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6965'>风行自委顺，云合非有期。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6965'>神哉心相见，无眹安得离。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6965'>我有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6965", 6965, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>恳愤</span>志，三十无人知。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6965'>修身不言命，谋道不择时。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6965'>达则济<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6965", 6965, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>亿兆</span>，穷亦济毫氂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6965'>济人无大小，誓不空济私。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6965'>研几未<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6965", 6965, "Clauses/12/Comments/1")'>淳熟</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，与世忽参差。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6965'>意气一为累，猜仍良已随。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6965'>昨来窜荆蛮，分与平生隳。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6965'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6965", 6965, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>那言</span>返为遇，获见心所奇。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6965'>一见肺肝尽，坦然无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6965", 6965, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>滞疑</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6965'>感念交契定，泪流如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6965", 6965, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>断縻</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6965'>此交定生死，非为论盛衰。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6965'>此契宗会极，非为同路岐<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6965'>君今虎在柙<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，我亦鹰就羁。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6965'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_6965", 6965, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>驯养</span>保性命，安能奋殊姿。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6965'>玉色深不变，井水挠不移。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6965'>相看各年少，未敢深自悲<span class='inlineComment2'>（悲：蜀本、卢本作“非”。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6965'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_6965_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6965'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6965_0'>⑴ 毫氂：后作毫釐。唐玄应《一切经音义》卷三：“十毫曰氂，今皆作釐。”清赵翼《陔馀丛考》卷二二：“按豪氂本权度之数。《孙子算术》：‘蚕吐丝为忽，十忽为杪，十杪为豪，十豪为氂，十氂为分，十分为寸。’后人又移之于称，是权度皆以毫毛起数，其字本应从毛。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6965_0'>⑵ 研机：亦作“研几”，穷究精微之理。《易·系辞上》：“夫易，圣人所以极深知研几也。”韩康伯注：“极未形之理则曰深，动适微之会则曰几。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6965_0'>⑶ 同路歧：指自己与李景俭均被贬江陵。李景俭元和三年贬为江陵户曹参军。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_6965_0'>⑷ （一作匣）。（虎在柙：关押猛兽之木笼。《说文·木部》：“柙，槛也，以藏虎兕。”《论语·季氏》：“虎兕出于柙，龟玉毁于椟中，是谁之过欤？”）</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6965_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　本年，作诗寄管儿，兼诲其弟子铁山。作品：《琵琶歌》<div id='poem_6947' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6947' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6947?labeling=true' target='_blank'>琵琶歌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6947")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6947_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6947_0'>① 寄管儿，兼诲铁山，此后并新题乐府。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6947'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6947'>琵琶宫调八十一，旋宫三调弹不出。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6947'>玄宗偏许贺怀智，段师此艺还相匹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6947'>自后流传<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6947", 6947, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>指拨</span>衰<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作哀）</span>，昆崙善才徒尔为。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6947'>澒声少得似雷吼，缠<span class='inlineComment2'>（去声）</span>弦不敢弹羊皮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6947'>人间奇事会相续，但有卞和无有玉。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6947'>段师弟子数十人，李家管儿称上足。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6947'>管儿不作供奉儿，抛在东都双鬓丝。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6947'>逢人便请送<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6947", 6947, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>杯盏</span>，著尽工夫人不知。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6947'>李家兄弟皆爱酒，我是酒徒为密友。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6947'>著作曾邀连夜宿，中碾春<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作清）</span>溪华新绿。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6947'>平明船载管儿行，尽日听弹无限曲。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6947'>曲名无限<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6947", 6947, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>知者</span>鲜，霓裳羽衣偏宛转。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6947'>凉州<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6947", 6947, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>大遍</span>最<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6947", 6947, "Clauses/24/Comments/1")'>豪嘈</span>，六么散序多笼撚。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6947'>我闻此曲深赏奇，赏著奇处惊管儿。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6947'>管儿为我双泪垂，自弹此曲长自<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作长）</span>悲。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6947'>泪垂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_6947", 6947, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>捍拨</span>朱弦湿，冰泉呜咽流莺涩。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6947'>因兹弹作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_6947", 6947, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>雨霖铃</span>，风雨萧条鬼神泣。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6947'>一弹既罢又一弹，珠幢夜静风<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_6947", 6947, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>珊珊</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6947'>低回慢弄关山思，坐对燕然秋月寒。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6947'>月寒一声深殿磬，骤弹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_6947", 6947, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>曲破</span>音繁并。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6947'>百万金铃旋<span class='inlineComment2'>（去声）</span>玉盘，醉客满船皆暂醒。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6947'>自兹听后六七年，管儿在洛我朝天。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6947'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_6947", 6947, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>游想</span>慈恩杏园里，梦寐仁风花树前。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6947'>去年御史留东台，公私<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_6947", 6947, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>蹙促</span>颜不开。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6947'>今春<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_6947", 6947, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>制狱</span>正撩乱，昼夜推囚心似灰。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6947'>暂辍归时寻著作，著作南园花坼萼。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6947'>胭脂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_6947", 6947, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>耀眼</span>桃正红，雪片满溪梅已落。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6947'>是夕青春值三五，花枝向月云含吐。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6947'>著作施樽命管儿，管儿久别今方睹。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6947'>管儿还为弹六么，六么依旧声迢迢。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6947'>猿鸣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_6947", 6947, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>雪岫</span>来三峡，鹤唳晴空闻九霄。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6947'>逡巡弹得六么彻，霜刀破竹无残节。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6947'>幽关<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_6947", 6947, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>鸦轧</span>胡雁悲，断弦砉騞层冰裂。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6947'>我为含悽叹奇绝，许作长歌始终说。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6947'>艺奇思寡尘事多，许来寒暑又经过。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6947'>如今左降在閒处，始为管儿歌此歌。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6947'>歌此歌，寄管儿，管儿管儿忧尔衰。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6947'>尔衰之后继者谁，继之无乃在铁山。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6947'>铁山已近曹穆间<span class='inlineComment2'>（二善才姓）</span>，性灵甚好功犹浅。<div id='poem_sentence_38_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6947'>急处未得臻幽閒，努力铁山勤学取，莫遣后来无所祖。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_6947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_6947'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(6947)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=810&endYear=810')">810年</a>　本年，作书诲侄等。作品：《诲侄等书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（具体交游的对象无考。）</span><div id='poem_1372504' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372504' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372504?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诲侄等书</a><span class='authorDate'>（810年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372504")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372504_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372504'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372504'>告崙等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372504_comment'></div>吾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>谪窜</span>方始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372504_comment'></div>见汝未期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372504_comment'></div>粗以所怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372504_comment'></div>贻诲于汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372504_comment'></div>汝等心志未立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372504_comment'></div>冠岁行登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372504_comment'></div>古人讥十九童心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372504_comment'></div>能不自惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372504_comment'></div>吾不能远谕他人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372504_comment'></div>汝独不见吾兄之奉家法乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372504_comment'></div>吾家世俭贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372504_comment'></div>先人遗训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372504_comment'></div>常恐置产怠子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372504_comment'></div>故家无樵苏之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372504_comment'></div>尔所详也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372504_comment'></div>吾窃见吾兄自二十年来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372504_comment'></div>以下士之禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372504_comment'></div>持<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>窘绝</span>之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372504_comment'></div>其间半是乞丐𮊠游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372504_comment'></div>以相给足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372504_comment'></div>然而吾生三十二年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372504_comment'></div>知衣食之所自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372504_comment'></div>始东都为御史时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372504_comment'></div>吾常自思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372504_comment'></div>尚不省受吾兄正色之训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372504_comment'></div>而况于鞭笞诘责乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372504_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372504_comment'></div>吾所以幸而为兄者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372504_comment'></div>则汝等又幸而为父矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372504_comment'></div>有父如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372504_comment'></div>尚不足为汝师乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372504_comment'></div>吾尚有血诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372504_comment'></div>将告于汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372504_comment'></div>吾幼乏岐嶷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372504_comment'></div>十岁知方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372504_comment'></div>严毅之训不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372504_comment'></div>师友之资尽废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372504_comment'></div>忆得初读书时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372504_comment'></div>感<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>慈旨</span>一言之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372504_comment'></div>遂志于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372504_comment'></div>是时尚在凤翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372504_comment'></div>每借书于齐仓曹家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372504_comment'></div>徒步执卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372504_comment'></div>就陆姊夫师授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372504_comment'></div>栖栖勤勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372504_comment'></div>其始也若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372504_comment'></div>至年十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372504_comment'></div>得明经及第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372504_comment'></div>因捧先人旧书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372504_comment'></div>于西窗下钻仰沉吟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372504_comment'></div>仅于不窥园井矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372504_comment'></div>如是者十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372504_comment'></div>然后粗沾一命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372504_comment'></div>粗成一名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372504_comment'></div>及今思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372504_comment'></div>上不能及乌鸟之报复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372504_comment'></div>下未能减亲戚之饥寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372504_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>抱衅</span>终身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372504_comment'></div>偷活今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372504_comment'></div>故李密云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372504_comment'></div>生愿为人兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372504_comment'></div>得奉养之日长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372504_comment'></div>吾每念此言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372504_comment'></div>无不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>雨涕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372504_comment'></div>汝等又见吾自为御史来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372504_comment'></div>效职无避祸之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372504_comment'></div>临事有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>致命</span>之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372504_comment'></div>尚知之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372504_comment'></div>吾此意虽吾弟兄未忍及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372504_comment'></div>盖以往岁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>忝职</span>谏官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372504_comment'></div>不忍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>小见</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372504_comment'></div>妄干朝听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372504_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>谪弃</span>河南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372504_comment'></div>泣血西归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372504_comment'></div>生死无告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372504_comment'></div>不幸馀命不殒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372504_comment'></div>重戴冠缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372504_comment'></div>常誓效死君前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372504_comment'></div>扬名<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>后代</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372504_comment'></div>殁有以谢先人于地下耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372504_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372504_comment'></div>及其时而不思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372504_comment'></div>既思之而不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372504_comment'></div>尚何言哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372504_comment'></div>今汝等父母天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372504_comment'></div>兄弟成行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372504_comment'></div>不于此时佩服诗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372504_comment'></div>以求荣达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372504_comment'></div>其为人耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372504_comment'></div>其曰人耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372504_comment'></div>吾又以吾兄所识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372504_comment'></div>易涉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_92_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>悔尤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372504_comment'></div>汝等出入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_93_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>游从</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372504_comment'></div>亦宜切慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372504_comment'></div>吾诚不宜言及于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372504_comment'></div>吾生长京城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372504_comment'></div>朋从不少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372504_comment'></div>然而未尝识<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>倡优</span>之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372504_comment'></div>不曾于喧哗纵观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372504_comment'></div>汝信之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372504_comment'></div>吾终鲜姊妹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372504_comment'></div>陆氏诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372504_comment'></div>念之倍汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372504_comment'></div>小婢子等既抱吾殁身之恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372504_comment'></div>未有吾克已之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372504_comment'></div>日夜思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372504_comment'></div>若忘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_107_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>生次</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372504_comment'></div>汝因便录吾此书寄之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372504_comment'></div>庶其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_109_1372504", 1372504, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>自发</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372504_comment'></div>千万努力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372504_comment'></div>无弃斯须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372504_comment'></div>稹付崙郑等。</div><div id='poem_sentence_112_1372504_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年2月</a>　窦巩赴黔州窦群处，途径江陵，与元稹相会并酬和，有诗。作品：《酬窦校书二十韵》《酬友封话旧叙怀二十韵》《和友封题开善寺十韵》<div id='poem_6735' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6735' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6735?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬窦校书二十韵<span class='inlineComment2'>（次本韵）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6735")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6735_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6735'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6735'>鸥鹭元相得，杯觞每共传。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6735'>芳游春烂熳，晴望月团圆。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6735'>调笑风流剧，论文属对全。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6735'>赏<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作咏）</span>花珠并缀，看雪璧常连。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6735'>竹寺荒唯好，松斋小更怜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6735_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　春，有诗吟好光景。作品：《梦井》《有酒十章》<div id='poem_6940' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6940' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_20_6940'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_6940_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6813' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6813' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6813?labeling=true' target='_blank'>有酒十章<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6813")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6813_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6813'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6813'>有酒有酒鸡初鸣，夜长睡足神虑清。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6813_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6813'>悄然危坐心不平，浩思一气初彭亨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6813_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6813'>澒洞浩汗真无名，胡不终浑成。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6813_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6813'>胡为沈浊以升清，矗然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6813", 6813, id='poem_sentence_6_6813_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6814' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6814' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6814?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span id='poem_content_6814'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6814'>有酒有酒东方明，一杯既进吞元精。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6814_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6814'>尚思天地之始名，一元既二分浊清。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6814_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6814'>地居<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6814", 6814, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>方直</span>天体明，胡不八荒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6814", 6814, id='poem_sentence_3_6814_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6814'>呜呼不得真宰情，我可奈何兮杯再倾。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6814_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6815' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6815' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6815?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6815_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6815'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6815'>有酒有酒兮湛渌波，饮将愉兮气弥和。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6815'>念万古之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6815", 6815, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>纷罗</span>，我独慨然而浩歌。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6815'>歌曰：天耶，地耶。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6815'>肇万物耶，储胥大庭之君耶。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6815'>恍耶，忽耶。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6815'>有耶，传而信耶。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6815'>久而谬耶，文字生而羲农作耶。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6815'>仁义别而圣贤出耶，炎始暴耶。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6815'>蚩尤炽耶，轩辕战耶。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6815'>不得已耶，仁耶。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6815'>圣耶，悯人之毒耶。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6815'>天荡荡耶，尧穆穆耶。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6815'>岂其让耶，归有德耶。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6815'>舜其贪耶，德能嗣耶。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6815'>岂其让耶，授有功耶。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6815'>禹功大耶，人戴之耶。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6815'>益不逮耶，启能德耶。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6815'>家天下耶，荣后嗣耶。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6815'>于后嗣之荣则可耶，于天下之荣其可耶。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6815'>呜呼远尧舜之日耶，何弃舜之速耶。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6815'>辛癸虐耶，汤武革耶。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6815'>顺天意耶，公天下耶。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6815'>踵夏荣嗣，私其公耶。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6815'>并建万国，均其私耶。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6815'>专征递伐，斗海内耶。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6815'>秦埽其类，威定之耶。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6815'>二代而陨，守不仁耶。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6815'>汉魏而降，乘其机耶。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6815'>短长理乱，系其术耶。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6815'>尧耶，舜耶。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6815'>终不可逮耶，将德之者不位。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6815'>位者不逮其德耶，时耶。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6815_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6815'>时耶，时其可耶，我可奈何兮一杯又进歌且歌。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_6815_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6816' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6816' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6816?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6816_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6816'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6816'>有酒有酒兮黯兮溟，仰天大呼兮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6816_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6816'>天漫漫兮高兮青，高兮漫兮吾孰知天否与灵。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6816_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6816'>取人之仰者，无乃在乎昭昭乎曰与夫日星。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6816_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6816'>何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6816", 6816, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>三光</span>之并照兮，奄云雨之冥冥。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6816_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6816'>幽妖倏忽兮水怪族形，鼋鼍岸走兮海若斗鲸。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6816_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6816'>河溃溃兮愈浊，济翻翻兮不宁。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6816_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6816'>蛇喷云而出穴，虎啸风兮屡鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6816_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6816'>污高巢而凤去兮，溺厚地而芝兰以之不生。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6816_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6816'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6816", 6816, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>葵心</span>倾兮何向，松影直而孰明。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6816_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6816'>人惧愁兮戴荣，天寂默兮无声。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6816_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6816'>呜呼！<div id='poem_sentence_10_6816_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6816'>天在云之上兮，人在云之下兮。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6816_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6816'>又安能决云而上征，呜呼。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6816_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6816'>既上征之不可兮，我奈何兮杯复倾。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_6816_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6817' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6817' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6817?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6817_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6817'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6817'>有酒有酒香满尊，君宁不饮开君颜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6817_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6817'>岂不知君饮此心恨，君今独醒谁与言。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6817_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6817'>君宁不见飓风翻海火燎原，巨鳌唐突高燄延。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6817_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6817'>精卫衔芦塞海溢，枯鱼喷沫救池燔。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6817_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6817'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6817", 6817, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>筋疲力竭</span>波更大，鳍燋甲裂身已乾。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6817_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6817'>有翼劝尔升九天，有鳞劝尔登龙门。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6817_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6817'>九天下视日月转，龙门上激雷雨奔。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6817_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6817'>螗螂虽怒谁尔惧，鹖旦虽啼谁尔怜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6817_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6817'>抟空意远风来壮，我可奈何兮一杯又进消我烦。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6817_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6817'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_6817_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6818' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6818' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6818?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6818_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6818'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6818'>有酒有酒歌且哀，江春例早多早梅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6818'>樱桃桃李<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6818", 6818, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>相续</span>开，间以木兰之秀香裴回。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6818'>东风吹尽南风来，莺声渐涩花摧隤。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6818'>四月清和艳残卉，芍药翻红蒲映水。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6818'>夏龙痡毒雷雨多，蒲叶离披艳红死。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6818'>红艳犹存榴树花，紫苞欲绽高笋牙。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6818'>笋牙成竹冒霜雪，榴花落地还销歇。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6818'>万古盈亏相逐行，君看夜夜当窗月。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6818'>荣落亏盈可奈何，生成未遍霜霰过。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6818'>霜霰过兮复<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作无）</span>奈何，灵芝夐绝荆棘多。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6818'>荆棘多兮可奈何，可奈何兮终奈何。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6818'>秦皇尧舜俱腐骨，我可奈何兮又进一杯歌复歌。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6818'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_6818_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6819' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6819' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6819?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6819_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6819'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6819'>有酒有酒方烂漫，饮酣拔剑心眼乱。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6819_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6819'>声若雷砰目流电，醉舞翻环身<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6819", 6819, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>眩转</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6819_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6819'>乾纲倒轧坤维旋，白日横空星宿见，一夫心醉万物变。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6819_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6819'>何况蚩尤之蹴蹋，安得不以熊罴战。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6819_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6819'>呜呼！<div id='poem_sentence_4_6819_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6819'>风后力牧得亲见，我可奈何兮又进一杯除健羡。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_6819_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6820' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6820' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6820?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6820_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6820'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6820'>有酒有酒兮告临江，风<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6820", 6820, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>漫漫</span>兮波长。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6820_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6820'>渺渺兮注海，海苍苍兮路茫茫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6820_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6820'>彼万流之混入兮，又安能分若畎浍淮河与夫岷吴之巨江。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6820_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6820'>味作咸而若一，虽甘淡兮谁谓尔为良。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6820_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6820'>济涓涓而缕贯，将奈何兮万里之浑黄。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6820_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6820'>鲸归穴兮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6820", 6820, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>渤溢</span>，鳌载山兮低昂。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6820_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6820'>阴火然兮众族沸渭，飓风作兮昼夜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6820", 6820, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>猖狂</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6820_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6820'>顾千珍与万怪兮，皆委润而深藏。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6820_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6820'>信天地之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6820", 6820, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>潴蓄</span>兮，我可奈何兮一杯又进兮包大荒。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6820_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6820'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_6820_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6821' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6821' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6821?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6821_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6821'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6821'>有酒有酒兮日将落，馀光委照在林薄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6821_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6821'>阳乌撩乱兮屋上栖，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6821", 6821, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>阴怪</span>跳趫兮水中跃。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6821_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6821'>月争光兮星又繁，烧横空兮燄仍烁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6821_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6821_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6822' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6822' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6822?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6822_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6822'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6822'>有酒有酒兮再祝，祝予心兮何欲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6822'>欲天泰而地宁，欲人康而岁熟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6822'>欲凤翥而鹓随兮，欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6822", 6822, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>龙亨</span>而骥逐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6822'>欲日盛而星微兮，欲滋兰而歼毒。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6822_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6822'>欲人欲而天从，苟天未从兮，我可奈何兮一杯又进聊自足。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6822_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　春，有感春之诗。作品：《遣春十首》<div id='poem_6976' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6976' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6976?labeling=true' target='_blank'>遣春十首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6976")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6976_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6976'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6976'>晓月笼云影，莺声馀雾中<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6976_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6976'>暗芳飘露气，轻寒生柳风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6976_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6976'>冉冉一趋府<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，未为劳我躬。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6976_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6976'>因兹得晨起，但觉情兴隆。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6976_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6976'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6976_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6976'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6976_0'>⑴ 声：董本、马本、类苑、胡本、季本作“深”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6976_0'>⑵ 冉冉：雍容和缓貌。《日出东南隅行》：“盈盈公府步，冉冉府中趋。”趋府：趋赴公府参见长官。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6976_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6977' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6977' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6977?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6977_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6977'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6977'>久雨怜霁景，偶来堤上行。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6977_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6977'>空濛天色嫩，杳淼江面平。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6977_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6977'>百草短长出，众禽高下鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6977_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6977'>春阳各有分，予亦澹无情。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6977_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6977'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6977_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6978' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6978' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6978?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6978_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6978'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6978'>镜皎碧潭水，微波粗成文。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6978_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6978'>烟光垂碧草<span class='inlineComment2'>（垂碧：蜀本、卢本作“委繁”。）</span>，琼脉散纤云<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6978_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6978'>岸柳好<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6978", 6978, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>阴影</span>，风裾遗垢氛。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6978_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6978'>悠然送春目，八荒谁与群<span class='inlineComment2'>（八荒：见卷3《竞渡》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6978_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6978'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6978_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6978'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6978_0'>⑴ 琼脉：玉石之纹理，形容纤云飘散之状。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6978_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6979' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6979' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6979?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6979_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6979'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6979'>低迷笼树烟，明净当霞日。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6979_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6979'>阳燄波春空<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，平湖漫凝<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作疑）</span>溢。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6979_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6979'>雪鹭远近飞，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6979", 6979, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>渚牙</span>浅深出<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6979_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6979'>江流复浩荡，相为坐纡郁。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6979_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6979'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6979_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6979'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6979_0'>⑴ 阳焰：指春日近地空气受热上升时所呈现远望如水似雾之自然景象。语本《楞伽经》卷二上：“譬如群鹿为渴所逼，见春时焰而作水想，迷乱驰趣不知非水。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6979_0'>⑵ 渚牙：亦作渚芽，洲上初生之草芽。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6979_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6980' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6980' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6980?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6980_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6980'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6980'>暄寒深浅春<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，红白前后花<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6980_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6980'>颜色讵相让，生成良有涯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6980_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6980'>梅芳勿自早，菊秀勿自赊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6980_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6980'>各将一时意，终年无再华。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6980_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6980'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6980_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6980'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6980_0'>⑴ 暄：温暖。《素问·五运行大论》：“东方生风……其性为暄，其德为和。”张介宾注：“暄，温暖也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6980_0'>⑵ 白：原作“日”，据杨本、全诗、季本改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6980_0'>⑶ 赊：迟缓。《字汇·贝部》：“赊，迟缓为赊。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6980_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6981' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6981' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6981?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6981_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6981'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6981'>高屋童稚少，春来归燕多。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6981_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6981'>葺旧良易就，新院亦已罗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6981_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6981'>俯怜雏化卵<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，仰愧鹏无窠<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6981_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6981'>巢栋与巢幕，秋风俱奈何。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6981_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6981'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6981_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6981'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6981_0'>⑴ 罗：排列，分布。《广雅·释诂一》：“罗，列也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6981_0'>⑵ 雏化卵：即卵化雏之倒用。《法苑珠林·奖导》（卷一四）：“如《菩萨处胎经》云：‘佛告喜见菩萨曰：汝欲知过去诸佛灭不灭，刹土不耶当知我过去身，其无数不可称，不可量，即以神足入湿生界。众相具足，与无数阿僧，祇为湿识众生说法，令湿识随意所愿，各得解脱入化卵，等生随意所愿，各得解脱，亦复如前。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6981_0'>⑶ 鹏无窠：大鹏翔游天空，不筑巢，亦不为巢所累，故云。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6981_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6982' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6982' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6982?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6982_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6982'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6982'>撩乱扑树蜂，摧残恋房蕊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6982'>风吹雨又频，安得繁于绮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6982'>酒杯沈易过，世事纷何已。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6982'>莫倚颜似花，君看岁如水。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6982'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6982_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6983' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6983' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6983?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6983_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6983'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6983'>绕郭高高冢，半是荆王墓<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6983_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6983'>后嗣炽阳台<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，前贤甘荜路<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6983_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6983'>善恶徒自分，波流尽东注。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6983_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6983'>胡然不饮酒，坐落桐花树。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6983_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6983'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6983_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6983'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6983_0'>⑴ 荆王：即楚王。《春秋·庄公十年》：“荆败蔡于莘。”杜预注：“荆，楚本号，后改为楚。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6983_0'>⑵ “后嗣”句：指楚襄王梦遇巫山神女事。后嗣，指楚襄王。炽，沉湎于某事。阳台，参卷4《楚歌十首》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6983_0'>⑶ “前贤”句：指楚国开国之君筚路蓝缕，建立楚国。《史记·楚世家》：“昔我先王熊绎辟在荆山，筚路蓝缕，以处草莽。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6983_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6984' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6984' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6984?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6984_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6984'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6984'>花阴莎草长<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，藉莎闲自酌<span class='inlineComment2'>（藉莎：以莎草为垫而坐于其上。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6984_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6984'>坐看莺斗枝，轻花满尊杓。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6984_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6984'>葛巾竹稍挂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，书卷琴上阁<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6984_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6984'>沽酒过此生，狂歌眼前乐。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6984_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6984'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6984_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6984'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6984_0'>⑴ 莎草：多年生草本植物，茎直立，三棱形，叶细长，深绿质硬有光泽，夏季开穗状小花，地下有葡萄茎与膨大块茎，俗称香附子，可入药，多生于湿地。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6984_0'>⑵ 葛巾，用葛布制成之头巾，形如帕而横者，尊卑皆服。参卷5《元和五年予官不了罚俸西归》注。稍，清朱骏声《说文通训定声·小部》：“稍，按此字常训禾末。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6984_0'>⑶ 阁：置放。清朱骏声《说文通训定声·豫部》：“阁，凡止而不动皆谓之阁。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6984_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6985' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6985' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6985?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6985_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6985'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6985'>梨叶已成阴，柳条纷起絮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6985'>波绿紫屏风，螺红碧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6985", 6985, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>筹箸</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6985'>三杯面上热，万事心中去。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6985'>我意风散云，何劳问行处。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6985'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6985_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6985'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6985_0'>⑴ “螺红”句：镶有红色环之碧色筷子。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6985_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　寒食节，作诗悼念韦丛。严绶为江陵尹、荆节度使。春末或夏初，李景俭为元稹卜姓安氏。作品：《六年春遣怀八首》<div id='poem_6177' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6177' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年7月</a>　遣侄某至下邽祭白居易之母，有文。白氏丁忧期间，三次分己之俸以济之。裴垍卒，东山在起希望渺茫。作品：《祭翰林白学士太夫人文》<div id='poem_1372543' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372543' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372543?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭翰林白学士太夫人文</a><span class='authorDate'>（811年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372543")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372543_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372543'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372543'>维元和六年七月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372543_comment'></div>文林郎守江陵府士曹参军元稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372543_comment'></div>谨遣弟某侄男。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372543_comment'></div>祗酌捧馔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372543_comment'></div>敢昭告于白氏太夫人之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372543_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372543_comment'></div>分同<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372543", 1372543, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>伯仲</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372543_comment'></div>古则拜亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372543_comment'></div>既陪长幼之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372543_comment'></div>遂生骨肉之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372543_comment'></div>礼由情展。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372543_comment'></div>情以义殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372543_comment'></div>情至则尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372543_comment'></div>岂独古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372543_comment'></div>况稹早岁而孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372543_comment'></div>资性<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1372543", 1372543, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>疏愚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372543_comment'></div>既不得为达识者所顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372543_comment'></div>亦不愿与顺俗者同趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372543_comment'></div>行过二十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372543_comment'></div>块然无徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372543_comment'></div>及太夫人令子艺成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372543_comment'></div>学茂德馨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372543_comment'></div>一举而搴芳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1372543", 1372543, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>兰署</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372543_comment'></div>再举而振藻彤庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372543_comment'></div>愚亦乘喧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1372543", 1372543, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>滥吹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372543_comment'></div>谬列茎英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372543_comment'></div>迹由情合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372543_comment'></div>言以心诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372543_comment'></div>遂定死生之契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372543_comment'></div>期于日月可盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372543_comment'></div>谊同金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372543_comment'></div>爱等弟兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372543_comment'></div>每均捧檄之禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372543_comment'></div>迭庆循陔之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372543_comment'></div>用至于二门之童孺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372543_comment'></div>莫不达<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1372543", 1372543, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>广孝</span>之深情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372543_comment'></div>逮稹谪居东洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372543_comment'></div>泣血西归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372543_comment'></div>无天可告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372543_comment'></div>无地可依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372543_comment'></div>喘息将尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372543_comment'></div>心魂以飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372543_comment'></div>太夫人推济壑之念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372543_comment'></div>岂由礼而当尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372543_comment'></div>盖感深之所萦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372543_comment'></div>呜呼。<div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　夏，有诗感怀。作品：《表夏十首》<div id='poem_6890' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6890' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6890?labeling=true' target='_blank'>表夏十首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6890")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6890_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6890'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6890'>夏风多暖暖，树木有繁阴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6890'>新笋紫长短，早樱红浅深。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6890'>楝花云幕重<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，榴艳朝景侵。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6890'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6890", 6890, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>华实</span>各自好，讵云芳意沈。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6890'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6890'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6890_0'>⑴ 楝花：楝为落叶乔木，四五月间开淡紫色小花，有清香。宋陈元靓《岁时广记》卷一《花信风》引《东皋杂录》：“江南自初春至初夏，五日一番风，谓之花信风。梅花风最先，楝花风最后，凡二十四番，以为寒绝也。”楝，原作“烟”，据卢校改。花：蜀本、杨本作“光”。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6890_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6893' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6893' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6893?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6893_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6893'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6893'>玉委有馀润，飙驰无去踪。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6893'>何如捧云雨，喷毒随蛟龙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6893'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6891'>心到物自闲，何劳远<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1413, "poem_sentence_3_6891")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6891", 6891, "Clauses/7/Comments/2")'>箕颍</span></span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6891_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6891'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6891_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6891'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6891_0'>⑴ “旬时”句：见卷五《元和五年予官不了罚俸西归》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6891_0'>⑵ 鸦轧：象声词，形容汲水辘轳转动之声音。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6891_0'>⑶ 箕颍：箕山与颍水。相传尧时贤者许由曾隐居箕山之下，颍水之阳。后因称隐居之地。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6891_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6892' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6892' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6892?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6892_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6892'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6892'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6892", 6892, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>江瘴</span>炎夏早，蒸腾信难度。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6892_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6892'>今宵好风月，独此荒庭趣<span class='inlineComment2'>（趣：见卷4《虻三首》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6892_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6892'>露叶倾暗光，流星委馀素。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6892_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6892'>但恐清夜徂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，讵悲朝景暮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6892_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6892'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6892_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6892'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6892_0'>⑴ 徂：往，去。《尔雅·释名》：“徂，往也。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6892_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6894' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6894' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6894?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6894_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6894'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6894'>流芳递炎景，繁英尽寥落。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6894'>公署香满庭，晴霞覆阑药。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6894'>裁红起高燄，缀绿排新萼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6894'>凭此遣幽怀，非言念将谑<span class='inlineComment2'>（将：蜀本、卢本作“谁”。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6894'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6894_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6895' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6895' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_6895_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6895'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6895'>红丝散芳树，旋转光风急。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6895'>烟泛被笼香<span class='inlineComment2'>（被：蜀本、卢本作“绣”。）</span>，露浓妆面湿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6895'>佳人不在此，恨望阶前立。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6895'>忽厌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6895", 6895, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>夏景</span>长，今春行已及<span class='inlineComment2'>（今春：蜀本、卢本作“合昏”。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6895_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6895'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6895_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6896' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6896' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6896?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6896_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6896'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6896'>百舌渐吞声<span onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6896", 6896, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>云鸿</span>方警夜，笼鸡已鸣晓。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6896_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
