onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6896", 6896, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>夏虫</span>多，蜩螗定相扰<span class='inlineComment2'>（蜩螗：见卷1《春蝉》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6896_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6896'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6896_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6897' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6897' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6897?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6897_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6897'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6897'>翩翩帘外燕，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6897", 6897, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>戢戢</span>巢内雏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6897_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6897'>啖食筋力尽，毛衣成紫襦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6897_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6897'>朝来各飞去，雄雌梁上呼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6897_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6897'>养子将备老，恶儿那胜无。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6897_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6897'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6897_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6897'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6897_0'>⑴ 戢戢：象声词，形容乳燕细弱之鸣叫声。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6897_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6898' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6898' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6898?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6898_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6898'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6898'>西山<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6898", 6898, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>夏雪</span>消，江势东南泻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6898_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6898'>风波高若天，滟滪低于马<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6898_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6898'>正被黄牛旋<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，难期白帝下<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6898_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6898'>我在平地行，翻忧济川者。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6898_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6898'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6898_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6898'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6898_0'>⑴ “滟滪”句：见卷4《楚歌十首》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6898_0'>⑵ 黄牛：指黄牛滩。南朝宋盛弘之《荆州记》：“宜都西陵峡中有黄牛山，江湍纡回，途经信宿犹望见之，行者语曰：‘朝发黄牛，暮宿黄牛。三朝三暮，黄牛如故。’”北魏郦道元《水经注·江水》：“江水又东，经黄牛山，下有滩。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6898_0'>⑶ 白帝：指白帝城，故阯在今重庆市奉节东瞿塘峡口。北魏郦道元《水经注·江水》：“江水又东，经鱼腹故城南，古鱼国也……公孙述名之为白帝，取其王色。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6898_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6899' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6899' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6899?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6899_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6899'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6899'>灵均死波后<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，是节常浴兰<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6899'>䌽缕碧筠粽<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，香粳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6899", 6899, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>白玉团</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6899'>逝者良自苦，今人反为欢。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6899'>哀哉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6899", 6899, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>徇名</span>士<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，没命求所难。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6899'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6899'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6899_0'>⑴ 灵均：屈原之字。《离骚》：“皇览揆余于初度兮，肇锡余以嘉名：名余曰正则兮，字余曰灵均。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6899_0'>⑵ “是节”句：南朝梁吴均《续齐谐记·五花丝粽》：“屈原五月五日投汨罗水，楚人哀之，至此日，以竹筒子贮米，投水以祭之……今世五月五日作粽，并带楝叶五色丝，皆汨罗遗风也。”宋吴自牧《梦粱录·五月》：“（五月）五日重午节，又曰浴兰令节。”浴兰，浴于兰汤。古人以为兰草可祛除不祥，故以兰汤洁斋祭祀。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6899_0'>⑶ 彩缕：指缠粽子之五色丝线。碧筠：指包裹粽子之竹叶。缕，原作“楼”，据杨本、全诗改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6899_0'>⑷ 徇名：舍身以求名。徇，通殉。《集韵·线韵》：“徇，以人从死。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6899_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　秋，有伤秋之诗。作品：《解秋十首》<div id='poem_6955' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6955' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6955?labeling=true' target='_blank'>解秋十首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6955")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6955_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6955_0'>① 约元和六年作于江陵，时为江陵士曹参军。蜀本、卢本第二首、第六首次序互易。清程晋芳有仿效之作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6955'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6955'>清晨颒寒水<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，动摇襟袖轻。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6955'>翳翳林上叶，不知秋暗生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6955'>回悲镜中发，华白三四茎。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6955'>岂无满头黑，念此衰已萌。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6955'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6955'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6955_0'>⑴ 颒：洗脸。《玉篇·水部》：“颒，洒面也。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6955_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6956' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6956' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6956?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6956_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6956'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6956'>微霜才结露，翔鸠初变鹰<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6956_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6956'>无乃天地意，使之行小惩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6956_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6956'>鸱鸮诚可恶<span class='inlineComment2'>（鸱鸮：卷1《赛神》注。）</span>，蔽日有高鹏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6956_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6956'>舍大以擒细，我心终不能。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6956_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6956'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6956_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6956'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6956_0'>⑴ “翔鸠”句：《礼记·王制》：“鸠化为鹰，然后设罻。”京房占曰：“七月鸠化为鹰。”翔，蜀本作“鸣”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6956_0'>⑵ “蔽日”句：《庄子·逍遥游》：“鹏之背，不知其几千里也。怒而飞，其翼若垂天之云。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6956_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6957' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6957' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6957?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6957_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6957'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6957'>往岁学仙侣，各在无何乡<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6957'>同时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6957", 6957, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>骛名</span>者，次第鹓鹭行<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6957'>而我两不遂，三十鬓添霜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6957'>日暮江上立，蝉鸣枫树黄。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6957'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6957'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6957_0'>⑴ 无何乡：“无何有之乡”之省，即空无所有之域。《庄子·逍遥游》：“今子有大树，患其无用，何不树之于无何有之乡，广莫之野？”此借指道教。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6957_0'>⑵ 鹓鹭：鹓，传说为凤类之鸟。鹭，俗称鹭鸶。二鸟群飞有序，因喻朝班行列。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6957_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6958' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6958' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6958?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6958_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6958'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6958'>后伏火犹在<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，先秋蝉已多。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6958'>云色日夜白，骄阳能几何。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6958'>壤隙漏江海，丝微成网罗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6958'>勿言时不至，但恐岁蹉跎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6958'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6958'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6958_0'>⑴ 后伏：即三伏之末伏，自立秋后第一个庚日起，共计十天。《初学记》卷四引《阴阳书》：“从夏至后第三庚为初伏，第四庚为中伏，立秋后初庚为后伏，谓之三伏。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6958_0'>⑵ 丝：原作“忽”，据蜀本、卢本改。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6958_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6959' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6959' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6959?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6959_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6959'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6959'>新月才到地，轻河如泛云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6959'>萤飞高下火，树影参差文。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6959'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6959", 6959, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>露簟</span>有微润，清香时暗焚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6959'>夜闲心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6959", 6959, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>寂默</span>，洞庭无垢氛<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6959'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6959'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6959_0'>⑴ 洞庭：广阔无垠之空际。《庄子·天运》：“帝张《咸池》之乐于洞庭之野。”成玄英疏：“洞庭之野，天池之间，非太湖之洞庭也。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6959_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6960' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6960' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6960?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6960_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6960'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6960'>霁丽床前影，飘萧帘外竹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6960_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6960'>簟凉朝睡重，梦觉茶香熟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6960_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6960'>亲烹园内葵<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，凭买家家曲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6960_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6960'>酿酒并毓蔬，人来有棋局。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6960_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6960'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6960_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6960'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6960_0'>⑴ 葵：葵菜。元王祯《农书》卷八：“葵为百菜之主，备四时之馔，本丰而奈旱，味甘而无毒……子若根则能疗疾，咸无弃材，诚蔬茹之上品，民生之资助也。”《诗·豳风·七月》：“七月烹葵及菽。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6960_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6961' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6961' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6961?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6961_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6961'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6961'>寒竹秋雨重，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6961", 6961, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>凌霄</span>晚花落<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6961'>低回翠玉梢，散乱栀黄萼<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6961'>颜色有殊异，风霜无好恶。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6961'>年年百草芳，毕意同萧索。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6961'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6961'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6961_0'>⑴ 凌霄：花名，落叶藤本植物，攀援茎，花冠漏斗形，其花、茎、叶均可入药。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6961_0'>⑵ 栀黄：用栀子染成之黄色。栀子，常绿灌木或小乔木，夏秋结果，生青熟黄，可做黄色颜料。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6961_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6962' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6962' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6962?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6962_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6962'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6962'>春非我独春，秋非我独秋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6962'>岂念百草死，但念霜满头。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6962'>头白古所同，胡为坐烦忧。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6962'>茫茫百年内，处身良未休。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6962'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6962_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6963' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6963' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6963?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6963_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6963'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6963'>西风冷衾簟，展转布华茵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6963_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6963'>来者承玉体，去者流芳尘<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6963_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6963'>适意丑为好，及时疏亦亲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6963_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6963'>衰周仲尼出，无乃为妖人<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6963_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6963'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6963_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6963'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6963_0'>⑴ “来者”二句：秋天来临，天气转冷，衾簟（去者）换成华茵（来者）。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6963_0'>⑵ “衰周”二句：孔子生于春秋，为周朝之末，末世而生圣人，是为怪异之事。仲尼，孔子之字。孔子名丘，春秋鲁国人。《史记·孔子世家》：“纥与颜氏女野合而生孔子，祷于尼丘，得孔子。鲁襄公二十二年而孔子生，生而首上圩顶，故因名曰丘云，字仲尼。”妖人，反时而生之怪异之人。《左传·宣公十五年》：“天反时为灾，地反时为妖。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6963_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6964' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6964' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6964?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6964_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6964'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6964'>漠漠江面烧<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，微微枫树烟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6964_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6964'>今日复今夕，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6964", 6964, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>秋怀</span>方浩然。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6964_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6964'>况我头上发，衰白不待年。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6964_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6964'>我怀有时极，此意何由诠。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6964_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6964'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6964_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6964'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6964_0'>⑴ 江面烧：谓夕阳返照江面，如同着火一般。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6964_0'>⑵ 枫：原作“风”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗改。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6964_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='ccc5ea570a9c470a8fc8b61af7691d60_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ccc5ea570a9c470a8fc8b61af7691d60");'><span id='ccc5ea570a9c470a8fc8b61af7691d60_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>，33岁</div><div id='ccc5ea570a9c470a8fc8b61af7691d60' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年10月</a>　吕温篙葬于江陵之野。元稹有诗哭之。刘禹锡作诗伤吕温，柳宗元酬唱刘禹锡，并寄元稹。作品：《哭吕衡州六首》<div id='poem_6585' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6585' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6585?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哭吕衡州六首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6585")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6585_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6585'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6585'>气敌三人杰<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，交深一纸书<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6585'>我投冰莹眼，君报水怜鱼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6585'>髀股惟夸瘦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，膏肓岂暇除<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6585'>伤心死诸葛，忧道不忧馀<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6585'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6585'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6585_0'>⑴ 三人杰：三位杰出人物。《史记·高祖本纪》（卷八）：“高祖曰：‘……夫运筹策帷帐之中，决胜于千里之外，吾不如子房；镇国家，抚百姓，给馈饟，不绝粮道，吾不如萧何；连百万之军，战必胜，攻必取，吾不如韩信。此三者，皆人杰也，吾能用之，此吾所以取天下也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6585_0'>⑵ “交深”句：《晋书·刘弘传》：“弘每有兴废，手书守相，丁宁款密，所以人皆感悦，争赴之。咸曰：‘得刘公一纸书，贤于十部从事。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6585_0'>⑶ “髀股”句：《三国志·蜀志·先主传》：“荆州豪杰归先主者日益多，表疑其心，阴御之。”裴松之注引晋司马彪《九州春秋》曰：“备住荆州数年，尝于表坐起至厕，见髀里肉生，慨然流涕。还坐，表怪问备，备曰：‘吾常身不离鞍，髀肉皆消。今不复骑，髀里肉生。日月若驰，老将至矣，而功业不建，是以悲耳。’”此谓吕温胸怀大志。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6585_0'>⑷ 膏肓：古代医学以心尖脂肪为膏，以心脏与隔膜之间为肓，认为乃药力不可及之处。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6585_0'>⑸ “伤心”二句：诸葛亮，字孔明，琅琊阳都（今山东省沂南县南）人，辅佐刘备及刘禅，鞠躬尽瘁，死而后已，而北伐大业未完，中道崩殂。此以诸葛亮比吕温，谓其志业未及成就而中年弃世。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6585_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6586' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6586' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6586?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年10月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6586_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6586'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(510, "poem_allusion_6586")'>虔收宰相刀</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6586_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6586'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6586'>望有经纶钓<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(510, "poem_sentence_0_6586")'>虔收宰相刀</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6586'>江文驾风远<span class='inlineComment2'>（江文：英华、钱校作“鹏心”。）</span>，云貌接天高。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6586'>国待<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6586", 6586, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>球琳器</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，家藏虎豹韬<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6586'>尽将千载宝，埋入五原蒿<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6586'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6586'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6586_0'>⑴ “望”句：太公望吕尚，姜姓，吕氏，名尚，周初齐人。《史记·齐太公世家》载，尚穷困年老，钓于渭滨，文王出猎，遇之，与语，大悦，曰：“吾太公望子久矣。”故称太公望。吕望佐文王，奠定周王朝基业。经纶：整理丝缕，理出思绪，与编成丝绳，统称经纶。引申为筹谋国家大事。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6586_0'>⑵ “虔收”二句：《晋书·王览传》（卷三三）：“初，吕虔有佩刀，工相之，以为必登三公可服此刀。虔谓祥曰：‘苟非其人，刀或为害。卿有公辅之量，故以相与。’祥固辞，强之，乃受。祥临薨，以刀授览曰：‘汝后必兴，足称此刀。’览后奕世多贤，才兴于江左矣。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6586_0'>⑶ 球琳器：比喻经国治邦之大才。球琳，见卷1《桐花》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6586_0'>⑷ 《虎豹韬》：相传吕尚（号太公望）所撰兵书《六韬》篇名之二。《六韬》，一曰《文韬》，二曰《武韬》，三曰《龙韬》，四曰《虎韬》，五曰《豹韬》，六曰《犬韬》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6586_0'>⑸ 五原：地名合称，在今陕西省境内。杜甫《喜闻官军已临贼境》：“五原空壁垒。”仇兆鳌注引《长安志》：“长安、万年二县之外，有毕原、白鹿原、少陵原、高阳原、细柳原，谓之五原。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6586_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_6586'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(6586)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><div id='poem_6587' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6587' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6587?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年10月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6587_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6587'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1366, "poem_allusion_6587")'>系虏</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6587_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6587'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6587'>白马双旌队<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，青山八阵图<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6587'>请缨期<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1366, "poem_sentence_1_6587")'>系虏</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6587", 6587, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>枕草</span>誓捐躯<span class='inlineComment2'>（枕草：谓刻苦自励，发奋有为。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6587'>势激三千壮<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，年应四十无。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6587'>遥闻不瞑目，非是不怜吴<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6587'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6587_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6587'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6587_0'>⑴ 白马：古代凶丧舆服。《史记·秦始皇本纪》：“楚将沛公破秦军入武关，遂至霸上，使人约降子婴。子婴即系颈以组，白马素车，奉天子玺符，降轵道旁。”裴骃集解引应劭曰：“素车白马，丧人之服也。”双旌：唐代节度使领刺史者出行时之仪仗。唐李商隐《为怀州李中丞谢上表》：“赐以竹符之重，遂使霍氏固辞之第，早建双旌。”徐烱注：“双旌唯节度领刺史者有之，诸州不与焉，今则通用为太守之故事矣。”吕温死前为衡州刺史，故云。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6587_0'>⑵ 八阵图：古代用兵阵法之一。《晋书·桓温传》：“初，诸葛亮造八阵图于鱼腹平沙之上，垒石为八行，行相去二丈。温见之，谓‘此常山蛇势也’。”八阵图之遗迹有多处，世人莫能辨之。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6587_0'>⑶ “请缨”句：《汉书·终军传》：“南越与汉和亲，乃遣军使南越，说其王，欲令入朝，比内诸侯。军自请：‘愿受长缨，必羁南越王而致之阙下。’”吕温贞元二十年以副使奉命出使吐蕃。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6587_0'>⑷ “势激”：《庄子·逍遥游》：“鹏之徙于南溟也，水击三千里。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6587_0'>⑸ “遥闻”二句：《三国志·吴志·孙坚传》：“坚曰：‘卓（董卓）逆天无道，荡覆王室，今不夷汝三族，县示四海，则吾死不瞑目。’”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6587_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6588' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6588' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6588?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年10月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6588_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6588'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6588'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6588", 6588, "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>雕鹗</span>生难敌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，沉檀死更香<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6588_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6588'>儿童喧巷市，羸老哭碑堂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6588_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6588'>雁起沙汀闇，云连海气黄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6588_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6588'>祝融峰上月<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，几照北人丧。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6588_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6588'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6588_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6588'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6588_0'>⑴ 雕鹗：鹰鹫类猛禽，嘴呈钩状，视力好，捕获能力强。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6588_0'>⑵ 沈檀：亦作“沉檀”，指名贵香木沉香木与檀木。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6588_0'>⑶ 碑堂：在江陵府西北纪山。宋祝穆《方舆胜览·江陵府》：“纪山：在府北四十里，自荆门西山而来，盖州治主山。《江陵志》：后梁宣、明二帝陵，林木郁然。”宋赵明诚《金石录》卷二六：“唐立《梁宣帝明帝二陵碑》……开元二十一年，其裔孙嵩追建。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6588_0'>⑷ 祝融峰：南岳衡山七十二峰之最高峰，在今湖南省衡山县西北。据《路史》载，祝融死葬衡山之阳，是以名之。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6588_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6589' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6589' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6589?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年10月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6589_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6589'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6589'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6589", 6589, "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>回雁峰</span>前雁<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，春回尽却回。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6589_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6589'>联行四人去<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，同葬一人来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6589_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6589'>铙吹临江返<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，城池隔雾开。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6589_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6589'>满船深夜哭，风棹楚猿哀。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6589_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6589'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6589_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6589'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6589_0'>⑴ 回雁峰：衡山七十二峰之一，在今湖南省衡阳县南。相传雁南至衡阳而止，遇春北返，故称。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6589_0'>⑵ 四人：疑指刘禹锡、柳宗元、凌准、程异。永贞革新失败后，刘被贬朗州司马，柳被贬永州司马，凌被贬连州司马，程被贬郴州司马，均在洞庭湖以南。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6589_0'>⑶ 铙吹：演奏铙歌之乐队。铙歌本军乐，后卤簿、殿庭、道路亦用之。晋崔豹《古今注》卷中：“汉乐有黄门鼓吹，天子所以宴乐群臣；短萧铙歌，鼓吹之一章耳，亦以赐有功诸侯。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6589_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6590' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6590' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6590?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（811年10月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6590_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6590'><span id='poem_content_6590'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6590'>杜预<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1841, "poem_sentence_0_6590")'>春秋癖</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，扬雄著述精<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6590_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6590'>在时兼不语，终古定归名<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6590_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6590'>耒水波文细<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，湘江竹叶轻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6590_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6590'>平生思风月，潜寐若为情<span class='inlineComment2'>（潜寐：深眠，此为死亡之讳辞。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6590_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6590'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6590_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6590'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6590_0'>⑴ “杜预”句：杜预字元凯，京兆杜陵（今陕西省西安市南）人，好《左传》，自称有“《左传》癖”，尝著《春秋左氏传集解》三十卷，为现存《左传》之最早注本。《晋书·杜预传》：“预尝称王济有马癖，和峤有钱癖。武帝问之，谓预曰：‘卿有何癖？’对曰：‘臣有《左传》癖。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6590_0'>⑵ “扬雄”句：扬雄字子云，成都（今属四川省）人，早年作《甘泉》、《羽猎》、《长杨》等赋，晚年仿《论语》而作《法言》，仿《易》而作《太玄》等。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6590_0'>⑶ “在时”二句：犹桃李不言、下自成蹊之意。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6590_0'>⑷ 耒水：与下文之“湘江”均为湖南省境内之主要河流。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6590_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　冬，安氏生子，名荆。约本年或稍前，识崔倰。约本年，元稹患痰、头风，裴垍教服橘皮朴消丸，数月而愈。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　是年，与李景俭酬唱，留诗。作品：《酬李六醉后见寄口号》<div id='poem_6732' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6732' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6793' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6793?labeling=true' target='_blank'>有鸟二十章<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span id='poem_sentence_0_6793_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6793'>似鹰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6793", 6793, id='poem_sentence_1_6794'>主人但见闲慢容，许占蓬莱最高阁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6794_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6794'>弱羽长忧俊鹘拳，<span class='link' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6794'>千年不死伴灵龟，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6794", 6794, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>枭心鹤貌</span>何人觉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6807_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6807'>先春尽学百鸟啼，真伪不分听者悦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6807_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6807'>伶伦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6807", 6807, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>凤律</span>乱宫商，盘木天鸡误时节。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6807_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6807'>朝朝暮暮主人耳，桃李无言管弦咽。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6807_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6807'>五月炎光<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6807", 6807, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>朱火</span>盛，阳燄烧阴幽响绝。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6807_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6807'>安知不是卷舌星，化作刚刀一时截。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6807_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6808'>雄鸣一声雌鼓翼，夜不得栖朝不食。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6808_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6808'><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_0_6810_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6810'>主人曾问私所闻，因说妖姬暗欺主。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6810_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6810'>主人方惑翻见疑，趁归陇底双翅垂。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6810_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6810'>山鸦野雀怪<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_4_6810'>君不见隋朝陇头姥，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6810", 6810, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>娇养</span>双鹦嘱新妇。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6810_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6810'>一鹦曾说妇无仪，悍妇杀鹦欺主母。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6810_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6810_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6810'>当时主母信<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作听）</span>尔言，顾尔微禽命何有。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6810_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6810'>今之主人翻尔疑，何事笼中漫开口。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6810_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6812_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6812'>司晨守夜悲鸡犬，啄腐吞腥笑雕鹗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6812_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6812'>尧年值雪度关山，晋室闻琴下寥廓。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6812_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6812'>辽东尽尔千岁人，怅望桥边旧城郭。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年4月</a>　窦群改容管经略使，自开州赴容州，途径江陵，与元稹相会，有诗。作品：《奉和窦容州》<div id='poem_6543' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6543' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6543?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉和窦容州</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6543")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6543_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6543'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6543'>明公莫讶容州远，一路潇湘景气浓。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6543'>斑竹初成二妃庙，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6543", 6543, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>碧莲</span>遥耸九疑峰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6543'>禁林闻道长倾凤，池水那能久滞龙。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6543'>自叹风波去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6543", 6543, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>无极</span>，不知何日又相逢。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6543'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6543_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='5c042ca3f98a4b80ae37f2b63aca558b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5c042ca3f98a4b80ae37f2b63aca558b");'><span id='5c042ca3f98a4b80ae37f2b63aca558b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>，35岁</div><div id='5c042ca3f98a4b80ae37f2b63aca558b' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>秋，元稹患疟，日久未愈，有诗。作品：《遣病十首》《痁卧闻幕中诸公征乐会饮因有戏呈三十韵》《晨起送使病不行因过王十一馆居二首》<div id='poem_6988' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6988' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6988?labeling=true' target='_blank'>遣病十首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6988")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6988_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6988'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6988'>服药备江瘴<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，四年方一疠<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6988'>岂是药无功，伊予久留滞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6988'>滞留人固薄，瘴久药难制。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6988'>去日良已甘，归途奈无际。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6988'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6988'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6988_0'>⑴ 瘴：古代称我国南方山林间致人疾病之毒气。宋周去非《岭外代答·瘴》（卷四）：“南方凡病，皆谓之瘴，其实似中州伤寒。盖天气郁蒸，阳多宣泄，冬不闭藏，草木水泉，皆禀恶气。人生其间，日受其毒，元气不固，发为瘴疾。轻者寒热往来，正类痁疟，谓之冷瘴；重者纯热无寒。更重者蕴热沉沉，无昼无夜，如卧灰火，谓之热瘴。最重者一病则失音，莫知所以然，谓之哑瘴。冷瘴未必死，热瘴久必死，哑瘴治得其道间亦可生。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6988_0'>⑵ 疠：疫病。《左传·哀西元年》：“天有菑疠。”杜预注：“疠，疾疫也。”此处指染病。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6988_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6989' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6989' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6989?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6989_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6989'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6989'>弃置何所任，郑公怜我病<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6989_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6989'>三十九万钱<span class='inlineComment2'>（岁入之大率）</span>，资予养<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6989", 6989, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>顽瞑</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6989_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6989'>身贱杀何益，恩深报难罄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6989_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6989'>公其万千年，世有天之郑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6989_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6989'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6989_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6989'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6989_0'>⑴ 郑公：指严绶。据卷55《严绶行状》，绶节度江陵时进封郑国公。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6989_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6990' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6990' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6990?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span id='poem_content_6990'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6990'>忆作孩稚初<span class='inlineComment2'>（作：卢校“疑昨”，似是。）</span>，健羡成人列。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6990_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6990'>倦学厌日长，嬉游念佳节。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6990_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6990'>今来渐讳年，顿与前心别。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6990_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6990'>白日速如飞，佳晨亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6990", 6990, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>骚屑</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（骚屑：凄清愁苦貌。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6990_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6990'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6990_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6991' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6991' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6991?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6991_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6991'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6991'>昔在痛饮场，憎人病辞醉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6991'>病来身怕酒，始悟他人意。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6991'>怕酒岂不闲，悲无少年气。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6991'>传语少年儿，杯盘莫回避。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6991'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6991_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6992' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6992' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6992?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6992_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6992'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6992'>忆初头始白，昼夜惊一缕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6992'>渐及鬓与须，多来不能数。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6992'>壮年等闲过，过<span class='inlineComment2'>（上如字，下音戈）</span>壮年已五。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6992'>华发不再青，劳生竟何补<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6992'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6992'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6992_0'>⑴ 劳生：《庄子·大宗师》：“夫大块载我以形，劳我以生，俟我以老，息我以死。”后因指辛劳之生活。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6992_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6993' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6993' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6993?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6993_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6993'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6993'>在家非不病，有病心亦安。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6993_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6993'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6993", 6993, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>起居</span>甥侄扶，药饵兄嫂看。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6993_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6993'>今病兄远路，道遥书信难。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6993_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6993'>寄言娇小弟，莫作官家官。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6993_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6993'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6993_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6994' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6994' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6994?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6994_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6994'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6994'>燕巢官舍内，我尔俱为客。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6994_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6994'>岁晚我独留，秋深尔安适。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6994_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6994'>风高翅羽垂，路远烟波隔。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6994_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6994'>去去玉山岑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，人间网罗窄。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6994_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6994'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6994_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6994'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6994_0'>⑴ 玉山：神话传说中之仙山。《山海经·西山经》：“又西三百五十里曰玉山，是西王母所居也。”郭璞注：“此山多玉石，因以名云。《穆天子传》谓之群玉之山。”岑：山险峻貌。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6994_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6995' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6995' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6995?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span id='poem_content_6995'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6995'>檐宇夜来旷，暗知秋已生。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6995'>卧悲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6995", 6995, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>衾簟</span>冷，病觉支体轻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6995'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6995", 6995, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>炎昏</span>岂不勌，时去聊自惊。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6995'>浩叹终一夕，空堂天欲明。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6995'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6995_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6996' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6996' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6996?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span id='poem_content_6996'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6996'>秋依静处多，况乃凌晨趣<span class='inlineComment2'>（趣：见卷4《虻三首》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6996'>深竹蝉昼风，翠茸衫晓露。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6996'>庭莎病看长<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，林果闲知数。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6996'>何以强健时，公门日劳骛。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6996'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6996'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6996_0'>⑴ 莎：单子叶植物纲莎草科植物之通称，多年生草本，较少一年生。常生于湿地或沼泽中，叶细长，通常排成三列。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6996_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_6996'><a id='poem_title_6997_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6997'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6997'>朝结故乡念，暮作空堂寝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6997'>梦别泪亦流，啼痕暗横枕。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6997'>昔愁凭酒遣，今病安能饮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6997'>落尽秋槿花<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，离人病犹甚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6997'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6997'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6997_0'>⑴ 槿花：即木槿花，其花如葵，朝开夕陨，因喻青春之短暂。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6997_comment'></div></div><div gray;'>▪</span>白居易寄药给元稹，附诗。元稹依韵酬和白居易《闻微之江陵卧病以大通中散碧腴垂云膏寄之因题四韵》。作品：《予病瘴乐天寄通中散碧腴垂云膏仍题四韵以慰远开坼之间因有酬答》<div id='poem_6437' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6437' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6437?labeling=true' target='_blank'>予病瘴乐天寄通中散碧腴垂云膏仍题四韵以慰远怀开坼之间因有酬答</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6437'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6437'>紫河变鍊红霞散，翠液煎研碧玉英。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6437'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6437", 6437, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>金籍</span>真人天上合，盐车病骥轭前惊。<div class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6791?labeling=true' target='_blank'>后湖</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6791")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6791_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6791'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6791'>荆有泥泞水<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，在荆之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6791", 6791, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>邑郛</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6791'>郛前水在后，谓之为后湖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6791'>环湖十馀里，岁积潢与污。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6791'>臭腐鱼鳖死，不植菰与蒲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6791'>郑公理三载<span class='inlineComment2'>（严司空绶）</span>，其理用喣愉。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6791'>岁稔民四至，隘廛亦隘衢。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6791'>公乃署其地，为民先矢谟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6791'>人人傥自为<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，我亦不庀徒<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6791'>下里得闻之<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，各各相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6791", 6791, "Clauses/17/Comments/1")'>俞俞</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6791'>提携翁及孙，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6791", 6791, "Clauses/19/Comments/1")'>捧戴</span>妇与姑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6791'>壮者负<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6791", 6791, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>砾石</span>，老亦捽茅刍。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6791'>斤磨片片雪<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>，椎隐连连珠<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6791'>朝餐布<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6791", 6791, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>庭落</span>，夜宿完<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6791", 6791, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>户枢</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6791'>邻里近相告，亲戚远相呼。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6791'>鬻者自为鬻<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>，酤者自为酤<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6791'>鸡犬丰中市<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>，人民岐下都<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒁</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6791'>百年<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_6791", 6791, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>废滞</span>所，一旦奥浩区<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒂</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6791'>我实司水土<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒃</sup>，得为官事无。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6791'>人言贱事贵，贵直不贵谀。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6791'>此实公所小，安用歌裤襦<span class='inlineComment2'>（歌裤襦：见本卷《茅舍》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6791'>答云潭及广<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒄</sup>，以至鄂与吴<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒅</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6791'>万里尽泽国，居人皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_6791", 6791, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>垫濡</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6791'>富者不容盖<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒆</sup>，贫者不庇躯。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6791'>得不歌此事，以我为楷模。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6791'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_6791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6791'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6791_0'>⑴ 荆：蜀本、卢本作“问”，卢校“问，疑是闻”，似是。泥：蜀本、卢本作“涽”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6791_0'>⑵ 邑郛：犹城郭。郛，外城。《说文·邑部》：“郛，郭也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6791_0'>⑶ “公乃”二句：谓严绶把办公地点搬到后湖施工现场，为百姓先行谋划。矢谟：施布计画。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6791_0'>⑷ 傥：原作“谠”，据蜀本、杨本、董本、全诗改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6791_0'>⑸ 庀徒：雇用工匠、役夫。参前篇《茅舍》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6791_0'>⑹ 里：蜀本、杨本、董本、马本、类苑、胡本、季本作“俚”，似是。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6791_0'>⑺ 俞俞：和乐愉悦貌。俞，通愉。《庄子·天道》：“无为则俞俞，俞俞者忧患不能处，年寿长矣。”成玄英疏：“俞俞，从容和乐之貌也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6791_0'>⑻ 姑：婆婆。宋赵彦卫《云麓漫钞》卷五：“妇谓夫之父曰舅，夫之母曰姑。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6791_0'>⑼ 斤：古代斫木之工具，与斧似，但形小而刃横。《说文·斤部》：“斤，斫木也。”段玉裁注：“凡用砍物者皆曰斧，砍木之斧，则谓之斤。”徐灏笺：“斧斤同物，斤小于斧。”王筠句读：“斤之刃横，斧之刃纵，其用与钁相似，不与刀锯相似。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6791_0'>⑽ 椎：捶击之器具。椎，通槌。《集韵·脂韵》：“椎，通作槌。”隐：筑。《集韵·焮韵》：“隐，筑也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_6791_0'>⑾ 鬻：卖。《玉篇·  部》：“鬻，鬻卖也。”此泛指买卖。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_6791_0'>⑿ 酤：卖酒。《说文·酉部》：“酤，卖酒也。”此泛指买卖。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6791_0'>⒀ 丰：周国都名，在今陕西省西安市西南。《尚书·武成》：“王来自商，至于丰。”孔颖达疏：“丰……文王旧都也。”市：交易。《尔雅·释言》：“贸、贾，市也。”邢炳疏：“谓市，买卖物也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6791_0'>⒁ 岐：岐山，在今陕西省岐山县境，周代曾建都于此。岐与上文丰皆借指江陵。都：汇聚，聚集。《尔雅·释诂三》：“都，聚也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_6791_0'>⒂ 奥浩：大片可定居之地。奥通墺，可定居之所。《汉书·地理志上》：“九州逌同，四奥既宅。”颜师古注：“奥，读曰墺，谓土之可居也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6791_0'>⒃ “我实”句：《唐六典》卷三○：“士曹、司士参军掌津梁、舟车、舍宅、百工众艺之事。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_6791_0'>⒄ 潭及广：潭州与广州，均在江陵之南，此泛指江陵以南地区。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_6791_0'>⒅ 鄂与吴：鄂州与苏州，均在江陵之东，此泛指江陵以东地区。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_22_6791_0'>⒆ 盖：本指盖屋之茅苫，此借指房屋。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6791_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>本年，杜嗣业迁杜甫之柩归葬河南府偃师县首阳山前，元稹为其撰墓志铭。安氏生女降真。作品：《唐故工部员外郎杜君墓系铭》<div id='poem_1372519' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372519' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372519?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故工部员外郎杜君墓系铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（813年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372519")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372519_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372519'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372519'>予读诗至杜子美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372519_comment'></div>而知古人之才有所总萃焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372519_comment'></div>始尧舜时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372519_comment'></div>君臣以赓歌相和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372519_comment'></div>是后诗人继作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372519_comment'></div>历夏殷周千馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372519_comment'></div>仲尼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>缉拾</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>选练</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372519_comment'></div>取其干预教化之尤者三百篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372519_comment'></div>其馀无闻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372519_comment'></div>骚人作而怨愤之态繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372519_comment'></div>然犹去风雅日近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372519_comment'></div>尚相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>比拟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372519_comment'></div>秦汉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>以还</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372519_comment'></div>采诗之官既废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372519_comment'></div>天下俗谣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>民讴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372519_comment'></div>歌颂讽赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372519_comment'></div>曲度嬉戏之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372519_comment'></div>亦随时间作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372519_comment'></div>逮至汉武赋柏梁诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372519_comment'></div>而七言之体具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372519_comment'></div>苏子卿李少卿之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372519_comment'></div>尤工为五言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372519_comment'></div>虽句读文律各异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372519_comment'></div>雅郑之音亦杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372519_comment'></div>而词意<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>简远</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372519_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>指事</span>言情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372519_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>自非</span>有为而为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372519_comment'></div>则文不妄作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372519_comment'></div>建安之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372519_comment'></div>天下文士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372519_comment'></div>遭罹兵战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372519_comment'></div>曹氏父子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>鞍马</span>间为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372519_comment'></div>往往<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>横槊赋诗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372519_comment'></div>故其遒文壮节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372519_comment'></div>抑扬怨哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372519_comment'></div>悲离之作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372519_comment'></div>尤极于古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372519_comment'></div>晋世风槩稍存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372519_comment'></div>宋齐之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372519_comment'></div>教失根本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372519_comment'></div>士以简慢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>歙习</span>舒徐相尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372519_comment'></div>文章以风容<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>色泽</span>放旷精清为高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372519_comment'></div>盖吟写性灵流连光景之文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372519_comment'></div>意义格力无取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372519_comment'></div>陵迟至于梁陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372519_comment'></div>淫艳<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>刻饰</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/45/Comments/1")'>佻巧</span>小碎之词剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372519_comment'></div>又宋齐之所不取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372519_comment'></div>唐兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372519_comment'></div>学官大振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372519_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>历世</span>之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372519_comment'></div>能者互出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372519_comment'></div>而又沈宋之流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372519_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>研练</span>精切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372519_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>稳顺</span>声势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372519_comment'></div>谓之为律诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372519_comment'></div>由是而后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372519_comment'></div>文体之变极焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372519_comment'></div>然而好古者遗近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372519_comment'></div>务华者去实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372519_comment'></div>效齐梁则不逮于晋魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372519_comment'></div>工乐府则力屈于五言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372519_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>律切</span>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/61/Comments/1")'>骨格</span>不存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372519_comment'></div>閒暇则纤秾莫备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372519_comment'></div>至于子美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372519_comment'></div>盖所谓上薄风骚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372519_comment'></div>下该沈宋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372519_comment'></div>言夺苏李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372519_comment'></div>气吞曹刘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372519_comment'></div>掩颜谢之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>孤高</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372519_comment'></div>杂徐庾之流丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372519_comment'></div>尽得古今之体势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372519_comment'></div>而兼昔人之所独专矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372519_comment'></div>使仲尼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>考锻</span>其旨要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372519_comment'></div>尚不知贵其多乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372519_comment'></div>苟以为能所不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372519_comment'></div>无可无不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372519_comment'></div>则诗人以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372519_comment'></div>未有如子美者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372519_comment'></div>时山东人李白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372519_comment'></div>亦以奇文取称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372519_comment'></div>时人谓之李杜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372519_comment'></div>子观其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>壮浪</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/81/Comments/1")'>纵恣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372519_comment'></div>摆去拘束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372519_comment'></div>模写物象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372519_comment'></div>及乐府歌诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372519_comment'></div>诚亦差肩于子美矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372519_comment'></div>至若铺陈终始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372519_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>排比</span>声韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372519_comment'></div>大或千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372519_comment'></div>次犹数百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372519_comment'></div>词气豪迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372519_comment'></div>而风调清深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372519_comment'></div>属对<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_92_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>律切</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372519_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_93_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>脱弃</span>凡近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372519_comment'></div>则李尚不能历其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>藩翰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372519_comment'></div>况堂奥乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372519_comment'></div>予尝欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1372519", 1372519, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>条析</span>其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372519_comment'></div>体别相附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372519_comment'></div>与来者为之准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372519_comment'></div>特病懒未就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372519_comment'></div>适子美之孙嗣业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372519_comment'></div>启子美之柩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372519_comment'></div>襄祔事于偃师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372519_comment'></div>途次于荆楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372519_comment'></div>雅知予爱言其大父之为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372519_comment'></div>拜予为志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372519_comment'></div>辞不可绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372519_comment'></div>予因系其官阀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372519_comment'></div>而铭其卒葬云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372519_comment'></div>系曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372519_comment'></div>晋当阳成侯姓杜氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372519_comment'></div>审言生闲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372519_comment'></div>闲生甫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372519_comment'></div>闲为奉天令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372519_comment'></div>甫字子美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1372519_comment'></div>天宝中献三大礼赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1372519_comment'></div>明皇奇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1372519_comment'></div>命宰相试文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1372519_comment'></div>文善。<div id='poem_sentence_125_1372519_comment'></div>步谒行在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1372519_comment'></div>拜左拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1372519_comment'></div>岁馀。<div id='poem_sentence_132_1372519_comment'></div>参谋军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1372519_comment'></div>旋又弃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1372519_comment'></div>扁舟下荆楚间。<div id='poem_sentence_137_1372519_comment'></div>享年五十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1372519_comment'></div>夫人宏农杨氏女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1372519_comment'></div>父曰司农少卿怡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1372519_comment'></div>四十九年而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1372519_comment'></div>嗣子曰宗武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1372519_comment'></div>病不克葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1372519_comment'></div>殁命其子嗣业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1372519_comment'></div>嗣业以家贫无以给丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1372519_comment'></div>收拾乞丐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1372519_comment'></div>焦劳昼夜。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年3月30日</a>　月末程氏馆送杜元颖归京，有诗。杜以赵宗儒之提携入荆南节度使幕为掌书记，现征为右拾遗。作品：《三月三十日程氏馆饯杜十四回京》<div id='poem_6695' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6695' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6695?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三月三十日程氏馆饯杜十四归京</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年3月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6695")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6695_comment'></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元稹还江陵，为安氏作志。彰义节度使吴少阳卒，子元济自领军务。作品：《葬安氏志》<div id='poem_1372518' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372518' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372518?labeling=true' target='_blank'>葬安氏志</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372518")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372518_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372518'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372518'>予稚男荆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372518_comment'></div>母曰安氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372518_comment'></div>字仙嫔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372518_comment'></div>卒于江陵之金隈乡庄敬坊沙桥外二里妪乐之地焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372518_comment'></div>始辛卯岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372518_comment'></div>予友致用悯予愁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372518_comment'></div>为予卜姓而授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372518_comment'></div>四年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372518_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1372518", 1372518, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>供侍</span>吾宾友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372518_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1372518", 1372518, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>主视</span>吾巾栉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372518_comment'></div>无违命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372518_comment'></div>近岁婴疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372518_comment'></div>秋方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372518", 1372518, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>绵痼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372518_comment'></div>适予与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372518", 1372518, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>信友</span>约浙行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372518_comment'></div>不敢私废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372518_comment'></div>及还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372518_comment'></div>果不克见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372518_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1372518", 1372518, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>大都</span>女子由人者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372518_comment'></div>虽妻人之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372518_comment'></div>常自不得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372518", 1372518, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>舒释</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372518_comment'></div>况不得为人之妻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372518_comment'></div>则又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1372518", 1372518, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>闺衽</span>不得专妒于其夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372518_comment'></div>使令不得专命于其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372518_comment'></div>外已子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372518_comment'></div>不得以尊卑长幼之序加于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372518_comment'></div>疑似逼侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372518_comment'></div>以居其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372518_comment'></div>其常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372518_comment'></div>况予贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372518_comment'></div>性复事外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372518_comment'></div>不甚知其家之无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372518_comment'></div>苟视其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1372518", 1372518, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>头面</span>无蓬垢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372518_comment'></div>语言不以饥寒告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372518_comment'></div>斯己矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372518_comment'></div>今视其箧笥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372518_comment'></div>无盈丈之帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372518_comment'></div>无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1372518", 1372518, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>成袭</span>之衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372518_comment'></div>无帛里之衾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372518_comment'></div>予虽贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372518_comment'></div>不使其若是可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372518_comment'></div>彼不言而予不察耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372518_comment'></div>以至于其生也不足如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372518_comment'></div>而其死也大哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372518_comment'></div>稚子荆方四岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372518_comment'></div>望其能念母亦何时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372518_comment'></div>幸而立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372518_comment'></div>则不能使不知其卒葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372518_comment'></div>故为志且铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372518_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372518_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1372518'>复土之骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372518_comment'></div>归天之魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372518_comment'></div>亦既墓矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372518_comment'></div>又何为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372518_comment'></div>且曰有子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372518_comment'></div>异日庸知其无求墓之哀焉。</div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　约本年，剑南东川从事马逢经江陵，元稹以诗送之。作品：《送东川马逢侍御使回十韵》<div id='poem_6712' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6712' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_0_6712_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6712'>眼青宾礼重，眉白众情高。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6712_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6712'>思勇曾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6712", 6712, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>吞笔</span>，投虚惯用刀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6712_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6712'>词锋倚天剑，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9512, "poem_sentence_3_6712")'>学海</span>驾云涛。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6712_comment'></div></div><div
