id='poem_sentence_10_6712_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　约本年，送王行周游越、王师鲁赴湖南使幕，有诗。作品：《送王十一南行》《送王十一郎游剡中》<div id='poem_6922' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6922' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6922?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送王十一南行</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6922")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6922_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6922'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6922'>夏水漾天末<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，晚旸依岸<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作映遥）</span>村。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6922'>风调<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作翻）</span>乌尾<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>劲，眷恋馀芳尊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6922'>解袂方瞬息，征帆已翩翻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6922'>江豚涌高浪，枫树摇去魂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6922'>远戍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6922", 6922, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>宗侣</span>泊，暮烟洲渚昏。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6922'>离心讵几许，骤若移寒温<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6922'>此别信非久，胡为坐忧烦。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6922'>我留石难转，君泛云无根。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6922'>万里湖南月，三声山上猿。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6922'>从兹耿幽梦，夜夜湘与沅<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6922'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_6922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6922'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6922_0'>⑴ 夏水：传说此水冬流夏竭，故名。其故道自今湖北省沙市东南分长江水东出，流经今监利县北，折东北至沔阳县治附近注入汉水。王师鲁赴湖南，当先沿此水东行，至洞庭湖北折南入湖南境。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6922_1'>⑵ 乌尾：桅杆上之乌形风向仪。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6922_0'>⑶ 枫树：木名，其叶经霜变红，故古代常以之描绘伤悲之景。《楚辞·招魂》：“湛湛江水兮上有枫，目极千里兮伤春心。”枫，原作“槐”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、英华、胡本、全诗改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6922_0'>⑷ 骤若移：原作“归苦复”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、英华、全诗改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6922_0'>⑸ 湘与沅：湘水与沅水。湘水发源于广西，北流注入洞庭湖；沅水发源于贵州，东北流注入洞庭湖。此借指湖南地区。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6922_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6573' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在江陵时，王师范前往杭越，有《去杭州》以赠别，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6782' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6782' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6782?labeling=true' target='_blank'>去杭州<span class='inlineComment2'>（送王师范）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6782")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6782_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6782'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6782'>房杜王魏之子孙，虽及百代为清门。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6782'>骏骨凤毛真可贵，冈头泽底何足论<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6782'>去年江上识君面，爱君风貌情已敦。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6782'>与君言语见君性，<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_4_6782'>自兹心洽迹亦洽，居常并榻游并轩。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6782'>柳阴覆岸郑监水，李花压树韦公园。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6782'>今君别我欲何去，自言远结迢迢婚。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6782'>简书五府已再至，波涛万里酬一言。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6782'>为君再拜赠君语，愿君静听君勿喧。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6782'>君名师范欲何范，君之烈祖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6782", 6782, id='poem_sentence_12_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6782'>君今取友由取士，得不别白清与浑。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6782'>昔公事主尽忠谠，虽及死谏誓不谖。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6782'>今君佐藩如佐主，得不陈露詶所恩。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6782'>昔公为善日不足，假寐待旦朝至尊。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6782'>今君三十朝未与，得不寸晷倍玙璠。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6782'>昔公令子尚贵主，公执舅礼妇执笲。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6782'>返拜之仪自此绝，关雎之化皎不昏。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6782'>君今远娉奉明祀，得不齐励亲蘋蘩。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6782'>斯言皆为书佩带，然后别袂乃可扪。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6782'>魂摇江树鸟飞没，帆挂樯竿鸟尾翻。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6782'>翻风驾浪拍何处，直指杭州由上元。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6782'>上元萧寺基址在，杭州<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_6782", 6782, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>潮水</span>霜雪屯。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6782'><span class='link' "Clauses/52/Comments/1")'>潮鼓</span>，潮平潮退有潮痕。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6782'>得得为题<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_6782", 6782, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>罗刹石</span>，古来非独伍员冤。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6782'></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_6782_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6782'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6782_0'>⑴ 近世不以勋贤之胄为令族，而以冈卢泽李为甲门</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6782_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　在江陵时，王师范前往杭越，有《送王协律游杭越十韵》以赠别，姑系于此。作品：《送王协律游杭越二十韵》<div id='poem_6711' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6711' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6711?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送王协律游杭越十韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6711")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6711_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6711'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6711'>去去莫悽悽，馀杭接会稽。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6711'>松门天竺寺，花洞若耶溪。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6711'>浣渚逢新艳，兰亭识旧题。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6711'>山经秦帝望<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作葬）</span>，垒辨越王栖<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作堤）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6711'>江树春常早，城楼月易低。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6711'>镜呈<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作澄）</span>湖面出<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作嵽）</span>，云叠海潮齐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6711'>章甫官人戴，莼丝姹女提。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6711'>长干迎客闹，小市隔烟迷。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6711'>纸乱红蓝压，瓯凝碧玉泥。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6711'>荆南无抵<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作底）</span>物，来日为侬携。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6711'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_6711_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元稹在江陵曾与崔侍御交游，留《送崔侍御至岭南二十韵》诗，姑系于此。作品：《送崔侍御之岭南二十韵》<div id='poem_6923' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6923' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6923?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送崔侍御之岭南二十韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6923")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6923_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6923'>古朋友别，皆赠以言，况南方物候饮食，与北土异。其甚者，夷民喜聚蛊，秘方云：「以含银变黑为验，攻之重雄黄。海物多肥腥，啖之好呕泄。」验方云：「备之在咸食，岭外饶野菌，视之虫蠹者无毒。罗浮生异果，察其鸟啄者可餐。」大抵珠玑玳瑁之所聚，贵洁廉；湮郁暑湿之所蒸，避溢欲。其馀道途所慎，离怆之怀，尽之二百言矣，叙不复云。</div><div id='poem_preface_6923_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6923'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3085, id='poem_sentence_10_6731_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《说剑》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6920' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6920' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6920?labeling=true' target='_blank'>说剑</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6920")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6920_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6920'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(222, "poem_allusion_6920")'>人情挂剑</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(514, "poem_allusion_6920")'>一旦为龙</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3241, "poem_allusion_6920")'>干将</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1694, "poem_allusion_6920")'>荆卿歌</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5180, "poem_allusion_6920")'>卷地图</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9010, "poem_allusion_6920")'>武王击纣</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9173, "poem_allusion_6920")'>相如缶</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6920_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6920'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6920'>吾友有宝剑，密之如密友。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6920'>我实<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6920", 6920, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>胶漆交</span>，中堂共杯酒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6920'>酒酣肝胆露，恨不眼前剖。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6920'>高唱<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1694, "poem_sentence_3_6920")'>荆卿歌</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，乱击<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9173, "poem_sentence_3_6920")'>相如缶</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6920'>更击复更唱，更酌<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作舞）</span>亦更寿<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6920'>白虹坐上飞<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，青蛇匣中吼<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6920'>我闻音响异，疑是<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3241, "poem_sentence_6_6920")'>干将</span>偶<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6920'>为君再拜言，神物可见不。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6920'>君言我所重，我自为君取。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6920'>迎箧已焚香，近鞘先泽手。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6920'>徐抽寸寸刃，渐屈弯弯肘。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6920'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6920", 6920, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>杀杀</span>霜在锋<span class='inlineComment2'>（杀杀：刀剑寒光四射貌。）</span>，团团月临纽<span class='inlineComment2'>（纽：剑柄上用以悬系饰物之襻纽。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6920'>逡巡潜虬跃<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6920", 6920, "Clauses/25/Comments/1")'>郁律</span>惊左右<span class='inlineComment2'>（郁律：屈曲夭矫貌。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6920'>霆电满室光，蛟龙绕身<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作逐奋）</span>走<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6920'>我为捧之泣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>，此剑别来久<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作何人为铸之，干将别来久）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6920'>铸时菫<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作近）</span>山<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>破，藏在松桂朽。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6920'>幽匣<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作质）</span>狱底<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作中）</span>埋<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>，神人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_6920", 6920, "Clauses/33/Comments/1")'>水心</span>守<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6920'>本是稽泥<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作泥稽）</span>淬<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>，果非雷焕有<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒁</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6920'>我欲评剑功，愿君良听受。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6920'>剑可剸犀兕<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒂</sup>，剑可切琼玖<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒃</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6920'>剑决天外云，剑冲日中斗。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6920'>剑隳妖蛇腹，剑拂佞臣首。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6920'>太古初断鳌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒄</sup>，武王亲击纣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒅</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6920'>燕丹<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5180, "poem_sentence_23_6920")'>卷地图</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒆</sup>，陈平绾花绶<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒇</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6920'>曾被桂树枝，寒光射林薮<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(21)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6920'>曾经铸农器，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_6920", 6920, "Clauses/51/Comments/1")'>利用</span>剪稂莠<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(22)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6920'>神物终变化，复为龙牝牡<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(23)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6920'>晋末武库烧，脱然排户牖<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(24)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6920'>为欲埽群胡，散作弥天帚。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6920'>自兹失所往<span class='inlineComment2'>（往：卢本作“在”。）</span>，豪英共为诟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(25)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6920'>今复谁人铸，挺然千载后。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6920'>既非古风胡<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(26)</sup>，无乃近<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_6920", 6920, "Clauses/63/Comments/1")'>鸦九</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(27)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6920'>自我与君游，平生益自负。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6920'>况擎宝剑出，重以雄心扣。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6920'>此剑何太奇，此心何太厚。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6920'>劝君慎所用<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(28)</sup>，所用无或苟。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6920'>潜将辟魑魅，勿但防<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作惊）</span>妾妇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(29)</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6920'>留斩泓下蛟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>(30)</sup>，莫试街中狗。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6920'>君<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作古）</span>今困泥滓，我亦坌尘垢。<div id='poem_sentence_38_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6920'>俗耳惊大言，逢人少开口。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6920'></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_6920_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6920'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6920_0'>⑴ 荆卿歌：《史记·刺客列传》：“至易水之上，既祖，取道，高渐离击筑，荆轲和而歌，为变徵之声，士皆垂泪涕泣。又前而为歌曰：‘风萧萧兮易水寒，壮士一去兮不复还！’复为羽声慷慨，士皆瞋目，发尽上指冠。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6920_0'>⑵ 相如缶：《史记·廉颇蔺相如列传》：“秦王饮酒酣，曰：‘寡人窃闻赵王好音，请奏瑟。’赵王鼓瑟，秦御史前书曰：‘某年月日，秦王与赵王会饮，令赵王鼓瑟。’蔺相如前曰：‘赵王窃闻秦王善为秦声，请奉盆缶秦王，以相娱乐。’……秦王不怿，为一击缶。相如顾召赵御史书曰：‘某年月日，秦王为赵王击缶。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6920_1'>⑶ 酌：原作“舞”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6920_0'>⑷ 白虹：宝剑名。晋崔豹《古今注·舆服》：“吴大帝有……宝剑六：一曰白虹，二曰紫电，三曰辟邪，四曰流星，五曰青冥，六曰百里。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6920_0'>⑸ 青蛇：古宝剑名。白居易《汉高皇帝亲斩白蛇赋》：“彼戮鲸鲵与截犀兕，未若我提青蛇而斩白蛇。”此泛指宝剑。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6920_0'>⑹ （一作斗）。（干将：汉赵晔《吴越春秋·阖闾内传》（卷四）：“干将者，吴人也，与欧冶子同师，俱能为剑。越前来献三枚，阖闾得而宝之，以故使剑匠作为二枚，一曰干将，二曰莫耶。莫耶，干将之妻也。”）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6920_0'>⑺ 潜虬：潜伏深处之龙。虬，参卷2《阳城驿》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6920_1'>⑻ 绕身：原作“逐奋”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_6920_0'>⑼ “我为“句：董本、马本、类苑、胡本作“何人为铸之”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6920_1'>⑽ 堇山：在今浙江省绍兴市境内。宋施苏等《会稽志·山·府城·会稽县》（卷九）：“赤堇山，在县东三十里。旧经云：‘欧冶子为越王铸剑之所。’《越绝》云：‘赤堇之山破而出锡，若耶之溪涸而出铜。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_6920_2'>⑾ “幽匣”句：《晋书·张华传》载：张华见斗牛之间有紫气，问于雷焕，雷焕告之以宝剑之精上彻于天，后张华果于丰城狱中掘得双剑，一曰龙泉，一曰太阿。匣，原作“质”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗改；中，卢本、杨本、全诗作“底”，蜀本作“边”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_6920_0'>⑿ “神人”句：南朝梁吴均《续齐谐记·曲水》：“秦昭王三月上巳置酒河曲，见金人自河而出奉水心剑，曰：‘令君制有西夏。’及秦霸诸侯，乃因此处立为曲水。”水心，双关，既明谓水中央，又暗喻宝剑。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6920_1'>⒀ “本是”句：张华得雷焕所取剑，以稽山之泥淬之。是，蜀本、卢本、文粹作“用”，似是。淬，见卷1《箭镞》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6920_0'>⒁ “果非”句：《晋书·张华传》载，丰城令雷焕得龙泉、太阿二剑，以其一与张华。后华被诛，剑遂失所在。雷焕死，其子持剑行之延平津，剑忽跃出坠水中。使人入水取之，但见两龙蟠萦，波浪惊沸。焕，原作“涣”，据蜀本、卢本、全诗及《晋书》改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_6920_0'>⒂ 剸：割，截断。唐玄应《一切经音义》卷一四引《通俗文》：“截断曰剸。”犀兕：犀牛与兕之并称。犀牛，哺乳类动物，形略似牛，吻上多有一角，皮厚而韧，产于热带森林。兕，古代犀牛类动物，一说即雄犀牛，皮厚，可以制甲。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_6920_0'>⒃ 琼玖：琼与玖，此泛指玉石。《诗·卫风·木瓜》：“投我以木瓜，报之以琼玖。”毛传：“琼、玖，玉名。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_22_6920_0'>⒄ “太古”句：《淮南子·览冥训》：“往古之时，四极废，九州裂，天不兼覆，地不周载……于是女娲氏炼五色石以补苍天，断鳌足以立四极。”东汉高诱注：“鳌，大龟。天废顿以鳌足柱之。”太古，上古，远古。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_22_6920_0'>⒅ “武王”句：牧野之战，纣王战败自焚，武王至纣王死所，以剑击之，断其首，悬大白之旗。事详《史记·周本纪》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_6920_0'>⒆ “燕丹”句：燕太子丹使荆轲藏短剑于督亢地图之中以献秦王，欲借机行刺。事详《史记·刺客列传》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_6920_0'>⒇ “陈平”句：《史记·陈丞相世家》载，陈平投项羽，以功受官赐金。项羽因部下战败，怒欲杀将，陈平惧及祸，“乃封其金与印，使使归项王，而平身间行杖剑亡。”花绶，织有花彩用于系官印之丝带，绾绶即辞官言归。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_24_6920_0'>(21) （一作莽）。（“曾被”二句：《史记·吴太伯世家》：“季札之初使，北过徐君。徐君好季札剑，口弗敢言。季札心知之，为使上国，未献。还至徐，徐君已死，于是乃解其宝剑，系之徐君冢树而去。从者曰：‘徐君已死，尚谁予乎？’季子曰：‘不然。始，吾心已许之，岂以死倍吾心哉！’”薮：卢本、文粹、钱校作“莽”，卢校“‘莽’有某音，自叶。”）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_25_6920_0'>(22) “曾经”二句：《孔子家语·致思》：“销剑戟以为农器，放牛马于原薮，室家无离旷之思，千岁无战斗之患。”《史记》卷六《秦始皇本纪》：“收天下兵，聚之咸阳，销以为钟鐻，金人十二，重各千石，置迁宫中。”后因用作销兵偃武之典。稂莠：泛指对禾苗有害之杂草。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_26_6920_0'>(23) 牝牡：鸟兽之雌性与雄性。《荀子·非相》：“夫禽兽有父子而无父子之亲，有牝牡而无男女之别。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_27_6920_0'>(24) “晋末”二句：南朝宋刘定叔《异苑》载，晋惠帝元康五年，武库火灾，烧汉高祖斩白蛇剑、孔子履、王莽头等三物。皆见此剑穿屋飞去，莫知所终。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_6920_0'>(25) 诟：音苟。《玉篇·言部》：“诟，耻辱也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_6920_0'>(26) （一作壶）。（风胡：亦称风壶，春秋楚人，精于铸剑、识剑。汉袁康《越绝书·外传记宝剑》（卷十一）：楚昭王召风胡子求宝剑，“风胡子奏之楚王。楚王见此三剑之精神，大悦风胡子……风胡子对曰：‘一曰龙渊，二曰泰阿，三曰工布。”）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_6920_0'>(27) 鸦九：亦作鸦九，姓张，唐人，善铸剑。白居易《鸦九剑》：“欧冶子死千年后，精灵暗授张鸦九。鸦九铸剑吴山中，天与日时神借功。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_35_6920_0'>(28) （一作宝）。（用：原作“宝”，据卢本、全诗、文粹、钱校改）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_36_6920_1'>(29) 防：原作“惊”，据蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗作改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_37_6920_0'>(30) “留斩”句：佽飞，亦作佽非，春秋楚国勇士。《淮南子·道应》：“荆有佽非，得宝剑于干队，还反渡江，至于中流。阳侯之波，两蛟夹绕其船。佽非谓枻船者曰：‘尝有如此而得活者乎？’对曰：‘未尝见也。’于是佽非瞋目，勃然攘臂拔剑曰：‘武士可以仁义之礼说也，不可劫而夺也。此江中之腐肉朽骨，弃剑而已，予有奚爱焉！’赴江刺蛟，遂断其头。船中人尽活，风波毕除。荆爵为执圭。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6920_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《闲二首》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6512' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6512' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6512?labeling=true' target='_blank'>闲二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6512")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6512_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6512'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6512'>晻澹洲烟白，篱筛日脚红。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6512'>江喧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6512", 6512, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>过云雨</span>，船泊打头风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6512'>艇子收鱼市，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6512", 6512, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>鸦儿</span>噪荻丛。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6512'>不堪堤上立，满眼是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6512", 6512, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>蚊虫</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6512'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6512_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6513' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6513' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6513?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6513_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6513'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6513'>青衫经夏黕，白发望乡稠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6513'>雨冷新秋簟，星稀欲曙楼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6513'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6513", 6513, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>连鸿</span>尽南去，双鲤本东流。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6513'>北信无人寄，蝉声满树头。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6513'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6513_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《塞马》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6630' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6630' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6630?labeling=true' target='_blank'>塞马</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6630")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6630_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6630'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6630'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6630", 6630, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>塞马</span>倦江渚，今朝神彩生。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6630'>晓风寒猎猎，乍得草头行。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6630'>夷狄寝烽候<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，关河无战声。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6630'>何由当阵面，从尔四蹄轻<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6630'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6630'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6630_0'>⑴ 烽候：即烽火台，设烽墩举火报警或报平安。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6630_0'>⑵ 从：同纵，放任。《论语·八佾》：“从之纯如也。”邢炳疏：“从，读曰纵，谓放纵也。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6630_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《谕宝二首》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6943' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6943' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6943?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谕宝二首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6943")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6943_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6943_0'>① 元和五年至九年作于江陵，时为江陵士曹参军。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6943'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2280, "poem_allusion_6943")'>邓林</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6943_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6943'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6943'>沈玉在弱泥，泥弱玉易沈。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6943_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6943'>扶桑寒日薄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，不照万丈心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6943_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6943'>安得潜渊虬<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，拔壑超<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2280, "poem_sentence_2_6943")'>邓林</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6943_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6943'>泥封泰山阯<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，水散旱天霖。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6943_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6943'>洗此泥下玉，照耀台殿深。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6943_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6943'>刻为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6943", 6943, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>传国宝</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，神器人不侵。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6943_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6943'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_6943_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6943'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6943_0'>⑴ 扶桑：日出之处。《山海经·海外东经》：“汤谷上有扶桑，十日所浴。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6943_0'>⑵ 潜渊虬：犹潜龙，喻富有才德而未被重用之人。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6943_0'>⑶ 邓林：古代传说中之树林。《山海经·海外北经》：“夸父与日逐走，入日，渴，欲得饮，饮于河渭，河渭不足，北饮大泽。未至，道渴而死。弃其杖，化为邓林。”喻荟萃之所。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6943_0'>⑷ “泥封”句：古代帝王封禅之礼一般在泰山举行，封禅时所用之玉牒有玉检、石检，检用金缕缠住，用水银和金屑泥封。事详《后汉书·祭祀志上》。此借指封禅。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6943_0'>⑸ 传国宝：即传国玺，秦以后皇帝世代相传之印章，唐武则天时一度改称传国宝。相传秦始皇得蓝田玉，雕为印，上纽交五龙，正面刻李斯所书篆文“受命于天，既寿永昌”八字，后历代王朝争以得玺为拥有天下之徵。秦玺已亡，汉以后多有刻制，文字有同有异。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6943_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6944' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6944' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6944?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6944_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6944'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(246, "poem_allusion_6944")'>卞和</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3265, "poem_allusion_6944")'>秦镜</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6430, "poem_allusion_6944")'>镆铘</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6944_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6944'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6944'>冰置白玉壶，始见清皎洁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6944'>珠穿殷红缕，始见明洞彻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6944'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6430, "poem_sentence_2_6944")'>镆铘</span>无人淬<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，两刃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6944", 6944, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>幽壤</span>铁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6944'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3265, "poem_sentence_3_6944")'>秦镜</span>无人拭<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，一片埋雾月。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6944'>骥跼环堵中<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，骨附筋入节。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6944'>虬蟠尺泽内，鱼贯<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作众）</span>蛙同穴。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6944'>艅艎无巨海<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，浮浮矜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6944", 6944, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>瀎潏</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6944'>栋梁无广厦，颠倒卧霜雪。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6944'>大鹏无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6944", 6944, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>长空</span>，举翮受<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6944", 6944, class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，危柢真卼臲<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6944'>圭璧无<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(246, "poem_sentence_10_6944")'>卞和</span>，甘与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6944", 6944, id='poem_sentence_11_6944'>舜禹无陶尧，名随腐草灭。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6944'>神功伏神物，神物神乃别。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6944'>神人不世出<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>，所以神功绝。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6944'>神物岂徒然，用之乃<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作有）</span>施设。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6944'>禹功九州理，舜德天下悦。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6944'>璧充传国玺<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作璧用充传玺）</span>，圭用祈太折<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6944'>千寻豫樟干，九万大鹏歇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6944'>栋梁庇生民，艅艎济来哲。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6944'>虬腾旱天雨，骥骋流电掣。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6944'>镜悬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_6944", 6944, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>奸胆</span>露，剑拂妖蛇裂。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6944'>珠生<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作玉）</span>照乘光<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_6944", 6944, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>冰莹</span>环坐热。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6944'>此物比在泥，斯言为谁发。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6944'>于今尽凡耳<span class='inlineComment2'>（于：蜀本、卢本、杨本作“凡”。）</span>，不为君不<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作陈）</span>说<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒁</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6944'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_6944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6944'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6944_0'>⑴ 镆铘：亦作莫邪，春秋时吴国名匠干将所铸宝剑之一，以其妻莫邪之名为名。此泛指宝剑。淬：见卷1《箭镞》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6944_0'>⑵ 秦镜：传说秦始皇有镜，能照见人心之善恶。《西京杂记》卷三：“高祖初入咸阳宫，周行库府……有方镜，广四尺，高五尺九寸，表里有明，人直来照之，影则倒见；以手扪心而来，则见肠胃五脏，历然无碍。人有疾病在内，掩心而照之，则知病之所在。又女子有邪心，则胆张心动。秦始皇常以照宫人，胆张心动者则杀之。高祖悉封闭以待项羽，羽并将以东，后不知所在。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6944_0'>⑶ 环堵：四周环着每面一丈见方之土墙，形容空间极其狭小。《礼记·儒行》：“儒者有一亩之宫，环堵之室。”郑玄注：“环堵，面一堵也。五版为堵，五堵为雉。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6944_0'>⑷ 艅艎：船名，此泛指大型船只。《广雅·释水》：“艅艎，舟也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6944_0'>⑸ 瀎潏：水流迅疾貌。《文选·张衡〈南都赋〉》：“潜㕎洞出，没滑瀎潏。”刘良注：“没滑瀎潏，疾流之貌。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6944_0'>⑹ 羁绁：羁束犬马之具。马曰羁，犬曰绁。比喻行动受束缚、牵制。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6944_0'>⑺ 豫樟：亦作豫章，枕木与樟木之并称。此比喻栋梁之材。《南史·王俭传》：“丹阳尹袁粲闻其名，及见之曰：‘宰相之门也，栝柏豫章虽小，已有栋梁气矣，终当任人家国事。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6944_0'>⑻ 危柢：扎根不牢。卼臲：动摇不安貌。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6944_0'>⑼ “圭璧”二句：相传春秋楚国人卞和得玉璞，先后献于楚厉王与楚武王，以欺诈罪论被砍去双脚。楚文王即位，卞和抱璞哭于荆山之下，文王使人琢璞，得美玉，名为和氏璧。事详《韩非子·和氏》等。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6944_0'>⑽ 神人：蜀本、杨本、类苑作“人神”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_6944_0'>⑾ 祈太折：谓供封禅泰山所用。折，封土为祭之处。《礼记·祭法》：“燔柴于泰坛，祭天也；瘗埋于泰折，祭地也。”郑玄注：“坛、折，封土为祭处也。坛之言坦也，坦明貌也。折，照晢也。必为照明之名，尊神也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6944_0'>⑿ “九万”句：《庄子·逍遥游》：“鹏之徙于南溟也，水击三千里，抟扶摇而上者九万里。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_21_6944_1'>⒀ “珠生”句：相传古代有照乘珠，能照亮车乘前后。《史记·田敬仲完世家》：“魏王曰：‘若寡人之小国，尚有径寸之珠照车前后各十二乘者十枚。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_6944_1'>⒁ 不说：原作“陈说”，据蜀本、卢本、全诗及文意改。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6944_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《饮新酒》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6260' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6260' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6260?labeling=true' target='_blank'>饮新酒</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6260")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6260_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6260'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6260'>闻君新酒熟，况值菊花秋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6260_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6260'>莫怪平生志，图销尽日愁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6260_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6260'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6260_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《书异》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6748' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6748' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6748?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书异</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6748")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6748_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6748'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6748'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6748", 6748, "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>孟冬</span>初寒月<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6748", 6748, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>渚泽</span>蒲尚青。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6748'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6748", 6748, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>飘萧</span>北风起，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6748", 6748, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>皓雪</span>纷满庭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6748'>行过冬至后，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6748", 6748, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>冻闭</span>万物零。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6748'>奔浑驰暴雨，骤鼓轰雷霆<span class='inlineComment2'>（鼓轰：蜀本、卢本作“若随”。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6748'>传云不终日，通宵曾莫停<span class='inlineComment2'>（宵：蜀本、卢本作“夕”。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6748'>瘴云愁拂地，急霤疑注瓶<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6748'>汹涌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6748", 6748, "Clauses/12/Comments/1")'>潢潦</span>浊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，喷薄鲸鲵腥<span class='inlineComment2'>（鲸鲵：见卷1《赛神》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6748'>跳趫井蛙喜，突兀水怪形。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6748'>飞蚋奔不死<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，修蛇蛰再醒。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6748'>应龙非时出<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，无乃岁不宁。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6748'>吾闻阴阳户，启闭各有扃。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6748'>后时无肃杀<span class='inlineComment2'>（后时：失时，没有按照正常时间。）</span>，废职乃玄冥<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6748'>座配五天帝<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，荐用百品珍<span class='inlineComment2'>（珍：蜀本、卢本作“馨”，似是。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6748'>权为祝融夺<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>，神其焉得灵<span class='inlineComment2'>（焉：蜀本、卢本作“安”。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6748'>春秋雷电异<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>，则必书诸经<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6748'>仲冬雷雨苦，愿省蒙蔽刑。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6748'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_6748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6748'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6748_0'>⑴ 孟冬：指十月。古代以孟、仲、叔、季为序，十月为冬季之首月，故云。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6748_0'>⑵ 霤：屋檐下流之水。《玉篇·雨部》：“霤，雨屋水流下。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6748_0'>⑶ 潢潦：地上流淌之雨水。《文选·陆机〈赠尚书郎顾彦先〉》之二：“丰注溢修溜，潢潦侵阶除。”张铣注：“潢潦，雨水流于地者。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6748_0'>⑷ 蚋：蚊类昆虫，蚋科，头小，色黑，胸背隆起，吸人及牲畜血液。不：蜀本、卢本作“未”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6748_0'>⑸ 应龙：古代传说中一种有翼之飞龙。南朝梁任昉《述异记》：“龙，五百年为角龙，千年为应龙。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6748_0'>⑹ 玄冥：古代神话传说中之冬神、水神。《礼记·月令》：“（孟冬、仲冬、季冬之月）其帝颛顼，其神玄冥。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6748_0'>⑺ 五天帝：明王志长《周礼注疏删翼》卷十二：“王氏曰：帝即《易》‘帝出乎震’之帝，所以主乎元气，革而为五：春青、夏赤、夏季黄、秋白、冬黑，是为五天帝。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6748_0'>⑻ 祝融：古代神话传说中之夏神、火神。《吕氏春秋·孟夏》：“其神祝融。”《周礼》：“南方以立夏谓赤精之帝，而炎帝祝融食焉。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_6748_0'>⑼ 春秋：相传孔子据鲁史修订而成之《春秋》，纪事自周平王四十九年至周敬王三十九年（西元前722年至前481年），计二百四十二年，史称春秋时期。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_6748_0'>⑽ 经：指《春秋》。古人认为自然界之灾变，与人事之当否密切相关，故孔子作《春秋》，录灾变，使后世君臣爱令名而有所惧焉。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6748_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《饮致用神曲酒》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6703' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6703' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6703")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6703_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6703'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(43, "poem_allusion_6703")'>穷途哭</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6703_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6703'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6703'>七月调<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6703", 6703, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>神曲</span>，三春酿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6703", 6703, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>绿醽</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6703'>行当遣俗累，便得造禅扃。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6703'>髣髴中圣日，希夷夹大庭。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6703'>刮骨都无痛，如泥未拟停。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6703'>残觞犹漠漠，华烛已荧荧。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6703'>真性临时见，狂歌半睡听。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6703'>喧阗争意气，调笑学娉婷。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6703'>酩酊焉知极，羁离忽暂宁。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6703'>鸡声催欲曙，蟾影照初醒。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6703'>咽绝鹃啼竹，萧撩雁去汀。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6703'>遥城传漏箭，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_6703", 6703, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>乡寺</span>响<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_6703", 6703, "Clauses/51/Comments/1")'>风铃</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《小胡笳饮》诗，姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《陪诸公游故江西韦大夫通德湖旧居有感题四韵兼呈李六侍郎即韦大夫旧僚也》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6600' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6600' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6600?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陪诸公游故江西韦大夫通德湖旧居有感题四韵兼呈李六侍御即韦大夫旧寮也</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6600")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6600_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6600'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6600'>高墉行马接通湖，巨壑藏舟感大夫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6600_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>堤岸</span>斜，诘屈檐楹亚<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6889'>篱落不蔽肩，街衢不容驾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6889'>南风五月盛，时雨不来下。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6889'>竹蠹茅亦乾，迎风自焚灺<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6889'>防虞集邻里，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6889", 6889, id='poem_sentence_8_6889'>号呼怜<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6889", 6889, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>谷帛</span>，奔走伐桑柘。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6889'>旧架已新焚，新茅又初架。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6889'>前日洪州牧<span class='inlineComment2'>（韦大夫丹）</span>，念此常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6889", 6889, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>嗟讶</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6889'>牧民未及久，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6889", 6889, id='poem_sentence_12_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6889'>旗亭红粉泥，佛庙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_6889", 6889, id='poem_sentence_14_6889'>斯事才未终，斯人久云谢。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6889'>有客自洪来，洪民至今藉。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6889'>惜其心太亟，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_6889", 6889, id='poem_sentence_17_6889'>台观亦已多，工徒稍冤咤<span class='inlineComment2'>（冤咤：因有所不满而抱怨。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6889'>我欲他郡长，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_6889", 6889, "Clauses/37/Comments/1")'>三时</span>务耕稼<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6889'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_6889", 6889, class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_6889", 6889, "Clauses/43/Comments/1")'>庀役</span>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_6889", 6889, "Clauses/43/Comments/2")'>定价</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（庀役：雇用工匠、役夫。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6889'>不使及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_6889", 6889, "Clauses/44/Comments/1")'>僭差</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>，粗得御寒夏。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6889'>火至殊陈郑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>，人安极嵩华<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6889'>谁能继此名，名流袭兰麝。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6889'>五裤有前闻<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>，斯言我非诈。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6889'></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_6889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6889'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6889_0'>⑴ 茅苫：编成片状以覆盖屋顶之草席。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6889_0'>⑵ 亚：低。低垂。张相《诗词曲辞汇释》卷五：“亚，犹低也；俯也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6889_0'>⑶ 焚灺：燃烧。灺，馀烬。《说文·火部》：“灺，烛烬也。”灺，蜀本作“化”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6889_0'>⑷ 原作“邻”，据蜀本、杨本、董本、马本、全诗改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6889_0'>⑸ （去声）。（“前日”八句：《新唐书·韦丹传》（卷一九七）：“（元和二年）徙为江南西道观察使，……始，民不知为瓦屋，草茨竹椽，久燥则戛而焚。丹召工教为陶，聚材于场，度其费为估，不取赢利。人能为屋者，受材瓦于官，免半赋，徐取其偿。逃未复者，官为为之。贫不能者，畀以财，身往劝督。”飞甍，甍之两端扬起，有飞举之势，故曰飞甍。旗亭，酒楼悬旗为酒招，故称。青鸳瓦，黑色之屋瓦，一俯一仰，如鸳鸯然，故称。瓦，蜀本、杨本、全诗下有“去声”）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_6889_0'>⑹ 三时：指春、夏、秋三季农作之时。《左传·桓公六年》：“洁粢丰盛，谓其三时不害而民和年丰也。”杜预注：“三时，春、夏、秋。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_6889_0'>⑺ 启闭：古代称立春、立夏为启，立秋、立冬为闭。《左传·僖公五年》：“凡分、至、启、闭，必书云物，为备故也。”杜预注：“启，立春，立夏；闭，立秋，立冬。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_21_6889_0'>⑻ 略：掠夺，强取。《方言》卷二：“略，强取也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_22_6889_0'>⑼ 僭差：僭越失度。僭，原作“潜”，据蜀本、杨本、全诗、胡本、何焯校改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_6889_0'>⑽ “火至“句：失火时不祸及邻家，损失与陈、郑迥异。《左传·昭公十七年》：“若火作，其四国当之，在宋、卫、陈、郑乎？宋，大辰之虚也；陈，大皞之虚也；郑，祝融之虚也。皆火房也。……卫，颛顼之虚也，故为帝丘，其星为大水。水，火之牡也。其以丙子若壬午作乎！水火所以合也。若火入而伏，必以壬午，不过其见之月。郑裨灶言于子产曰：‘宋、卫、陈、郑将同日火，若我用瓘斝玉瓒，郑必不火。’子产弗与。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_6889_0'>⑾ “人安”句：意谓居陶瓦之屋，风雨不动，安如嵩山、华山。嵩华，嵩山与华山之并称。杜甫《茅屋为秋风所破歌》：“风雨不动安如山”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_25_6889_0'>⑿ 五裤：据《后汉书·廉范传》，廉范字叔度，为蜀郡太守，政治清明，百姓富足。旧制，禁民夜作，以防火灾，而更相隐蔽，烧者日属。范乃毁削先令，但严使储水而已。百姓为便，乃歌之曰：‘廉叔度，来何暮？不禁火，民安作。平生无襦今五裤。’”此指官吏惠施于民之德政。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6889_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《奉和严司空重阳日同崔常侍郎郎中及诸公登龙山落帽台佳宴》诗，姑系于此。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《过襄阳楼呈上府主严司空楼在江陵节度使宅北隅》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6507' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6507' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_6574_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6574'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6574'>红树蝉声满夕阳，白头相送倍相伤。<div
