id='poem_sentence_2_6574'>顾我亲情皆远道，念君兄弟欲他乡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6574_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6574'>红旗满眼襄州路，此别泪流千万行。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6574_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6574'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6574_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《苦雨》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6888' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6888' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6888?labeling=true' target='_blank'>苦雨</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6888")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6888_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6888'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6888'>江瘴气候恶，庭空田地芜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6888'>烦昏一日内，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6888", 6888, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>阴暗</span>三四殊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6888'>巢燕污床席，苍蝇点肌肤。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6888'>不足生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6888", 6888, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>诟怒</span>，但苦寡欢娱。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6888'>夜来稍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6888", 6888, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>清晏</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6888", 6888, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>放体</span>阶前呼<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6888'>未饱风月思，已为蚊蚋图<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6888'>我受簪组身，我生天地炉<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6888'>炎蒸安敢勌，虫豸何时无。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6888'>凌晨坐堂庑，努力泥中趋。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6888'>官家事不了，尤悔亦可虞。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6888'>门外竹桥折，马惊不敢踰。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6888'>回头命僮御，向我色踟蹰。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6888'>自顾方濩落<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，安能相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6888", 6888, "Clauses/25/Comments/1")'>诘诛</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6888'>隐忍心愤恨，翻为声<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_6888", 6888, "Clauses/27/Comments/1")'>喣<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作煦）</span>愉</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6888'>逡巡崔嵬日，杲曜东南隅<span class='inlineComment2'>（杲曜：日光明亮貌。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6888'>已复云<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_6888", 6888, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>蔽翳</span>，不使及泥涂。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6888'>良农尽蒲苇，厚地积潢污。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6888'>三光不得照<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，万物何由苏。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6888'>安得飞廉车<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_6888", 6888, "Clauses/37/Comments/1")'>磔裂</span>云将躯<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6888'>又提精<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作旌）</span>阳剑，蛟螭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_6888", 6888, "Clauses/39/Comments/1")'>支节</span>屠<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6888'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_6888", 6888, "Clauses/40/Comments/1")'>阴沴</span>皆电埽<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>，幽妖亦雷驱。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6888'>煌煌启阊阖<span class='inlineComment2'>（阊阖：见卷2《青云驿》注。）</span>，轧轧掉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_6888", 6888, "Clauses/43/Comments/1")'>乾枢</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6888'>东西生日月，昼夜如转珠。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6888'>百川朝巨海，六龙蹋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_6888", 6888, "Clauses/47/Comments/1")'>亨衢</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6888'>此意倍寥廓，时来本须臾。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6888'>今也泥鸿洞<span class='inlineComment2'>（鸿洞：漫无际涯，状水势之盛。）</span>，鼋鼍真得途<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6888'></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_6888_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6888'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6888_0'>⑴ 呼：清胡文英《吴下方言考》卷三：“案，呼，鼻息也，吴中谓鼾声曰打呼。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6888_0'>⑵ 蚊蚋：即蚊子。蚋，蚊类昆虫，蚋科，头小，色黑，胸背隆起，吸人及牲畜血液。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6888_0'>⑶ 天地炉：《庄子·大宗师》：“今一以天地为大炉，以造化为大冶。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6888_0'>⑷ 濩落：亦作瓠落。《庄子·逍遥游》：“惠子谓庄子曰：‘魏王贻我大瓠之种，我树之成而实五石，以盛水浆，其坚不能自举也；剖之以为瓢，则瓠落无所容。非不呺然大也，吾为其无用而掊之。’庄子曰：‘夫子固拙于用大矣……今子有五石之瓠，何不虑以为大樽而浮乎江湖，而忧其瓠落无所容？则夫子犹有蓬之心也夫！’”本义为廓落，后引申为感叹落魄失意或怀才不遇。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6888_0'>⑸ 诘诛：诘问其过，加以惩罚。《礼记·月令》：“（孟秋之月）诘诛暴慢，以明好恶。”郑玄注：“诘，谓问其罪，穷治之也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6888_0'>⑹ 三光：指日、月、星。汉班固《白虎通·封公侯》：“天有三光日月星，地有三形高下平。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_6888_0'>⑺ 飞廉：风神，一说能致风之神禽名。《楚辞·离骚》：“前望舒使先驱兮，后飞廉使奔属。”王逸注：“飞廉，风伯也。”洪兴祖补注：“《吕氏春秋》曰：‘风师曰飞廉。’应劭曰：‘飞廉，神禽，能致风气。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_6888_0'>⑻ 磔裂：古代酷刑，车裂人体。《后汉书·董卓传》：“恨不得磔裂奸贼于都市，以谢天地。”李贤注：“磔，车裂之也。”云将：寓言中云之主将。《庄子·在宥》：“云将东游，遇扶摇之枝，而适遭鸿蒙。”成玄英疏：“云将，云主将也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_6888_0'>⑼ “又”二句：《朝野签载》卷三：“西晋末，有旌阳县令许逊者，得道于豫章西山。江中有蛟为患，旌阳没水，剑斩之，后不知所在。顷渔人网得一石，甚鸣，击之声闻数十里。唐朝赵王为洪州刺史，破之，得剑一双。视其铭，一有‘许旌阳’字，一有‘万仞’字，遂有万仞师出焉。”蛟螭：蛟与龙之并称，古代传说中之两种水居动物。相传蛟能发洪水，龙能兴云雨。旌，原作“精”，据胡本及文意改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_6888_0'>⑽ 阴沴：天地四时阴气不和而产生之灾难。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_21_6888_0'>⑾ 乾枢：犹乾轴，天轴。古人认为天体之运行如车之有轴，故云。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_6888_0'>⑿ 六龙：指太阳。神话传说中日神乘车，驾以六龙，羲和为御者。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_25_6888_0'>⒀ 鼋鼍：大鳖与猪婆龙。见卷1《赛神》注。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6888_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《松鹤》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6886' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6886' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6886?labeling=true' target='_blank'>松鹤</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6886")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6886_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6886'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6886'>渚宫本坳下<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，佛庙有台阁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6886'>台下三四松，低昂势前却。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6886'>是时晴景丽，松梢残雪薄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6886'>日色相玲珑，纤云映罗幕。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6886'>逡巡九霄外，似振风中铎。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6886'>渐见尺帛光，孤飞唳空鹤。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6886'>裴回耀霜雪，顾慕下寥廓<span class='inlineComment2'>（顾慕：声音停住不散貌。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6886'>蹋动樛盘枝<span class='inlineComment2'>（樛盘：见卷1《松树》注。）</span>，龙蛇互跳跃<span class='inlineComment2'>（龙蛇：喻指松树屈曲之枝干。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6886'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6886", 6886, "Clauses/16/Comments/1")'>俯瞰</span>九江水<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6886", 6886, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>旁瞻</span>万里壑。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6886'>无心眄乌鸢<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，有字悲城郭<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6886'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6886", 6886, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>清角</span>已沈绝，虞韶亦冥寞<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6886'>鶱<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作骞）</span>翻勿重留，幸及钧天作<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6886'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_6886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6886'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6886_0'>⑴ 渚宫：春秋楚国之别宫，故阯在今湖北省江陵县境内。此代指江陵。《方舆胜览·湖北路·江陵府》（卷二七）：“《郡县志》：楚别宫。《左传》：楚子西沿汉溯江，将入郢，王在渚宫。今之城，楚船宫地也，梁元帝名以渚宫。唐高从诲凿城西南隅，为池筑亭，名曰渚宫。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6886_0'>⑵ 九江：长江在出峡后流经平坦地区，分为众多支流，故有荆江“九派”之称。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6886_0'>⑶ 乌鸢：乌鸦与老鹰，均为贪食之鸟。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6886_0'>⑷ “有字”句：《艺文类聚》卷九○《鸟部上》引《列仙传》：“苏耽去后，忽有白鹤十数只，夜集郡东门楼上，一只口画作书字，言曰：‘城郭是，人民非，三百甲子当复归。’咸谓是耽。”又，晋陶潜《搜神后记》卷一：“丁令威，本辽东人，学道于灵虚山。后化鹤归辽，集城门华表柱。时有少年，举弓欲射之，鹤乃飞，徘佪空中而言曰：‘有鸟有鸟丁令威，去家千年今始归。城郭如故人民非，何不学仙冢垒垒。’遂高上冲天。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6886_0'>⑸ 《虞韶》：虞舜时之乐曲名。汉班固《幽通赋》：“《虞韶》美而仪凤兮，孔忘味于千载。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6886_0'>⑹ 钧天：钧天广乐之省。《史记·赵世家》：“赵简子疾，五日不知人……居二日半，简子寤，语大夫曰：‘我之帝所，与百神游于钧天，广乐九奏万舞，不类三代之乐，其声动人心。’”后因指天上之音乐。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6886_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《竞渡》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6929' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6929' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6929?labeling=true' target='_blank'>竞渡</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6929")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6929_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6929'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6929'>吾观竞舟子，因测大竞源。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6929'>天地昔将竞，蓬勃昼夜昏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6929'>龙蛇相嗔薄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，海岱俱崩奔<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6929'>群动皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6929", 6929, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>搅挠</span>，化作流浑浑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6929'>数极斗心息，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6929", 6929, "Clauses/9/Comments/2")'>太<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作大）</span>和</span>蒸混元<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6929'>一气忽为二，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6929", 6929, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>矗然</span>画乾坤<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6929'>日月复照耀，春秋递寒温。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6929'>八荒坦以旷<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，万物罗以<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作亦）</span>繁。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6929'>圣人中间立，理世了不烦。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6929'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6929", 6929, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>延绵</span>复几岁，逮及羲与轩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6929'>炎皇炽如炭<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，蚩尤扇其燔<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6929'>有熊竞心起<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>，驱兽出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6929", 6929, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>林樊</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6929'>一战波委燄，再战火燎原。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6929'>战讫天下定，号之为轩辕。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6929'>自是岂无竞，琐细不复言。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6929'>其次有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_6929", 6929, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>龙竞</span>，竞渡龙之门<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6929'>龙门浚如泻，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_6929", 6929, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>漴射</span>不可援。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6929'>赤鳞化时至<span class='inlineComment2'>（赤鳞：鳞片呈赤色之鱼，即鲤鱼。）</span>，唐突鳍鬣掀。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6929'>乘风瞥然去，万里黄河翻。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6929'>接瞬电烻出<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>，微吟霹雳喧。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6929'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_6929", 6929, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>傍瞻</span>旷宇宙，俯瞰卑昆崙<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6929'>庶类咸在下，九霄行易扪。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6929'>倏辞蛙黾穴<span class='inlineComment2'>（蛙黾：即蛙。古人认为蛙与鱼同穴）</span>，遽<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作递）</span>排天帝阍<span class='inlineComment2'>（天帝阍：天宫之门。阍，门。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6929'>回悲曝鳃者<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>，未免鲸鲵吞<span class='inlineComment2'>（鲸鲵：见卷1《赛神》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6929'>帝命泽诸夏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒁</sup>，不弃虫与昆。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6929'>随时布<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_6929", 6929, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>膏露</span>，称物施厚恩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒂</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6929'>草木沾我润，豚鱼望我蕃。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6929'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_6929", 6929, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>向来</span>同竞辈，岂料由我存。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6929'>壮哉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_6929", 6929, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>龙竞</span>渡，一竞身独尊。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6929'>舍此皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_6929", 6929, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>蚁斗</span>，竞舟何足论。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6929'></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_6929_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6929'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6929_0'>⑴ 嗔薄：忿怒搏击。嗔，通瞋。薄，搏击。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6929_0'>⑵ 海岱：今山东省渤海至泰山之间之地区。海，渤海。岱，泰山。崩奔：杜甫《阆州东楼筵奉送十一舅往青城》：“高贤意不暇，王命久崩奔。”仇兆鳌注：“山下堕曰崩，水急流曰奔。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6929_1'>⑶ 大和：一作太和，天地间阴阳会合冲和之气。混元：天地之元气，此指天地。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6929_0'>⑷ “一气”二句：大和之气分为阴阳二气，阳清者升而为天，阴浊者沉而为地。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6929_0'>⑸ 八荒：八方僻远之地。《汉书·项籍传赞》：“并吞八荒之心。”颜师古注：“八荒，八方荒忽极远之地也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6929_0'>⑹ 羲与轩：伏羲氏与轩辕氏（黄帝），均为华夏族之始祖。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6929_0'>⑺ 炎皇：指传说中之炎帝神农氏。《初学记》卷九引《帝王世纪》曰：“炎帝神农氏……人身牛首，长于姜水，有圣德，以火承木位，在南方，主夏，故谓之炎帝。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6929_0'>⑻ 蚩尤：古代神话传说中东方九黎族之首领。《史记·五帝本纪》：“蚩尤作乱，黄帝徵师诸侯，与蚩尤战于涿鹿之野，遂擒杀蚩尤。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6929_0'>⑼ 有熊：黄帝之国号。《史记·五帝本纪》：“自黄帝至舜禹，皆同姓而异其国号，以章明德，故黄帝为有熊。”此借指黄帝。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6929_0'>⑽ 龙之门：即龙门，在今陕西省韩城与山西省河津之间。黄河至此，两岸峭壁对峙，形如门阙，故云。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_19_6929_0'>⑾ 接瞬：眨眼之间。电烻：闪电。烻，闪光貌。《集韵·仙韵》：“烻，光也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_6929_0'>⑿ 昆崙：古代神话传说中之仙山，上有瑶池、阆苑等。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_6929_0'>⒀ 曝鳃者：指未登上龙门而化龙之鱼。《艺文类聚》卷九六引辛氏《三秦记》：“河津，一名龙门，大鱼集龙门数千，不得上。上者为龙，不上者鱼，故云曝鳃龙门。”《后汉书·郡国志五》：“（交趾郡）封溪，建武十九年置。”刘昭注引晋刘欣期《交州记》：“有堤防龙门，水深百寻，大鱼登此门化为龙，不得过，曝鳃点额，血流此水，恒如丹池。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_24_6929_0'>⒁ 诸夏：诸夏所住之地，指中原。《尚书·康诰》：“用肇造我区夏。”孔传：“始为政于我区域诸夏。”诸夏，周代分封之中原各诸侯国。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_25_6929_0'>⒂ 称物：根据众物之个体特点，做到施与得当。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6929_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《寺院新竹》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6792' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6792' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6792?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寺院新竹</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6792")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6792_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6792'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5710, "poem_allusion_6792")'>伶伦</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10957, "poem_allusion_6792")'>子猷</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6792_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6792'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6792'>宝地琉璃坼<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，紫苞琅玕踊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6792'>亭亭巧于削，一一大如拱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6792'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6792", 6792, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>冰碧</span>林外寒，峰峦眼前耸。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6792'>槎枒矛戟合<span class='inlineComment2'>（槎枒：错杂不齐貌。）</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6792", 6792, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>屹仡</span>龙蛇动<span class='inlineComment2'>（屹仡：挺拔雄劲貌。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6792'>烟泛翠光流，岁馀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6792", 6792, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>霜彩</span>重。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6792'>风朝竽籁过<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，雨夜鬼神恐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6792'>佳色有鲜妍，修茎无拥<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作臃）</span>肿。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6792'>节高迷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6792", 6792, "Clauses/14/Comments/1")'>玉镞</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，箨缀疑花捧<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6792'>讵必太山根<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，本自仙坛种<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6792'>谁令植幽壤，复此依闲冗。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6792'>居然霄汉姿，坐受藩篱壅。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6792'>噪集勌鸱乌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>，炎昏繁蠛蠓<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6792'>未遭<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5710, "poem_sentence_12_6792")'>伶伦</span>听<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>，非安<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10957, "poem_sentence_12_6792")'>子猷</span>宠<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6792'>威凤来有时<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>，虚心岂无奉<span class='inlineComment2'>（虚：蜀本作“灵”。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6792'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_6792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6792'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6792_0'>⑴ 琉璃坼：形容地表如琉璃炸裂般裂开。坼，《说文·土部》：“坼，裂也。”又，寺院称琉璃地。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6792_0'>⑵ 紫苞：指刚出土之笋苞。琅玕：见卷2《种竹》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6792_0'>⑶ 竽籁：竽与箫。《文选·宋玉〈高唐赋〉》：“纤条悲鸣，声似竽籁。”吕向注：“竽，笙属。籁，箫也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6792_0'>⑷ 玉镞：玉质之箭头，此处喻指笋尖。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6792_0'>⑸ 箨：竹笋皮，笋壳。《集韵·铎韵》：“箨，竹皮也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6792_0'>⑹ “讵”句：太山，即泰山，在今山东泰安市境内。《古诗十九首》之八：“冉冉孤生竹，结根泰山阿。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6792_0'>⑺ “本”句：《穆天子传》卷二：“天子西征，休于玄池之上，乃奏广乐，三日而终，是曰乐池。乃树之竹，是曰竹林。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6792_0'>⑻ 鸱乌：即鸱鸮（猫头鹰）与乌鸦，古人以为不祥之鸟。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6792_0'>⑼ 蠛蠓：蚊类虫名，体微细，将雨，群飞塞路。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6792_0'>⑽ 伶伦：黄帝时之乐官，曾订正乐律。《吕氏春秋·古乐》（卷五）：“昔黄帝令伶伦为律，伶伦自大夏之西，乃之阮隃之阴，取竹于嶰溪之谷，以生空窍厚钧者，断两节间，其长三寸九分，而吹之以为黄钟之宫。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6792_0'>⑾ 子猷宠：东晋王徽之字子猷。据《晋书》本传，子猷嗜竹，曾云“何可一日无此君”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6792_0'>⑿ 威凤：旧说凤有威仪，故称。《关尹子·九药》：“威凤以难见为神，是以圣人以深为根。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6792_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《八骏图诗（并序）》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6739' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6739' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6739?labeling=true' target='_blank'>八骏图诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6739")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6739_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6739'>良马无世无之，然而终不得与八骏并名，何也？吾闻八骏日行三万里，夫车行三万里而无毁轮毁辕之患<span class='comment'>（毁辕：蜀本、杨本、董本、马本、全诗作“坏辕”，似是。）</span>，盖神车也<span class='comment'>（也：类苑作“者”。卢校：“宋本脱也字，有一者字。文弨案：下云三神，而各本止有神车、神人二神而已。详序与诗，并是三神，当有御者一段，而宋本亦脱去，今窃为补之云：御者日行三万里，而无绝靷委辔之患，盖神御也。乘者日行三万里，而无丧精褫魄之患，亦神人也。共增二十一字，去一之字。”）</span>。行三万里而无丧精褫魄之患<span class='comment'>（褫魄：丧失胆魄。褫，《字汇·衣部》：“褫，夺也，解也，脱也。”）</span>，亦神之人也。无是三神而得是八马，乃破车掣御踬人之乘也<span class='comment'>（踬：跌倒。《六书故·人九》：“踬，行有罥戾失足也。”）</span>，世焉用之？今夫画古者，画马而不画车驭，不画所以乘马者，是不知夫古者也，予因作诗以辩之<span class='comment'>（辩：通“辨”，分别。清朱骏声《说文通训定声·坤部》：“辩，叚借为辨。”）</span>。</div><div id='poem_preface_6739_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6739'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8602, "poem_allusion_6739")'>王良</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6739_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6739'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6739'>穆满志<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6739", 6739, "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>空阔</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，将行九州野。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6739'>神驭四来归，天与八骏马。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6739'>龙种无凡性<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，龙行无暂舍。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6739'>朝辞扶桑底<span class='inlineComment2'>（扶桑：见卷2《谕宝二首》注。）</span>，暮宿昆崙下<span class='inlineComment2'>（昆崙：见本卷《竞渡》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6739'>鼻息吼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6739", 6739, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>春雷</span>，蹄声裂寒瓦。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6739'>尾掉沧波黑，汗染白<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作浮）</span>云赭<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6739'>华辀本修密<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，翠盖尚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6739", 6739, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>妍冶</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（翠盖：饰以翠鸟羽毛之车盖。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6739'>御者挽不移<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，乘者寐不假。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6739'>车无轮扁斲<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，辔无<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8602, "poem_sentence_8_6739")'>王良</span>把<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6739'>虽有万骏来，谁是敢骑者。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6739'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_6739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6739'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6739_0'>⑴ 穆满：即周穆王，姬姓名满，周昭王之子。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6739_0'>⑵ 龙种：骏马。《魏书·吐谷浑传》：“青海周回千馀里，海内有小山，每冬冰合后，以良马置此山，至来春收之，马皆有孕，所生得驹，号为龙种。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6739_1'>⑶ “汗染”句：《汉书·武帝纪》：“四年春，贰师将军广利斩大宛王首，获汗血马来。”颜师古注引应劭曰：“大宛旧有天马种，蹋石汗血，汗从前肩膊出，如血，号一日千里。”赭，赤褐色。宋王谠《唐语林·补遗一》：“赭，黄色之多赤者。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6739_0'>⑷ 华辀：刻画华彩之车辕，此借指车乘。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6739_0'>⑸ 挽：原作“腕”，据蜀本、卢本改。清段玉裁《说文解字注·车部》：“挽，引车曰挽，引申之凡引皆曰挽……俗作挽。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6739_0'>⑹ 轮扁：名扁，春秋时齐国著名造车工匠。《庄子·天道》：“桓公读书于堂上，轮扁斫轮于堂下。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6739_0'>⑺ 王良：春秋时著名善驾车之人。《淮南子·览冥训》：“昔者王良造父之御也，上车摄辔，马为整齐而敛谐，投足调匀，劳逸若一，心怡气和，体便轻毕，安劳乐进，驰骛若灭。”高诱注：“王良，晋大夫邮无恤子良也，所谓御良也。一名孙无政，为赵简子御，死而托精于天驷星。天文有王良星是也。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6739_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《春月》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6906' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6906' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6906?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春月</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6906")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6906_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6906'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6906'>春月虽至明，终有霭霭光。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6906'>不似秋冬色，逼人寒带霜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6906'>纤粉澹虚壁，轻烟笼半床。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6906'>分晖间林影，馀照上虹梁<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6906'>病久尘事隔，夜闲清兴长。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6906'>拥抱<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作袍）</span>颠倒领<span class='inlineComment2'>（颠倒领：适情任意，不整衣裳。）</span>，步屣东西厢。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6906'>风柳结柔援<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，露梅飘暗香。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6906'>雪含樱绽蕊，珠蹙桃缀房。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6906'>杳杳有馀思，行行安可忘。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6906'>四邻非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6906", 6906, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>旧识</span>，无以话<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6906", 6906, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>中肠</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6906'>南有居士俨<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，默坐调心王<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6906'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6906", 6906, "Clauses/22/Comments/1")'>款关</span>一问讯<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，为我披衣裳。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6906'>延我入深竹，暖我于小堂。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6906'>视身琉璃莹<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，谕指芭蕉黄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6906'>复有比丘溢<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>，早传龙树方<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6906'>口中秘丹诀<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>，肘后悬青囊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6906'>锡杖虽独振<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>，刀圭期共尝<span class='inlineComment2'>（刀圭：量药之器具，此代指药物。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6906'>未知仙近远，已觉神轻翔<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6906'>夜久魂耿耿，月明露苍苍。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6906'>悲哉沈眠士，宁见兹夕良。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6906'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_6906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6906'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6906_0'>⑴ 虹梁：高架而拱曲之屋梁。《文选·班固〈西都赋〉》：“因环材而究奇，抗应龙之虹梁。”李善注：“应龙虹梁，梁形如龙，而曲如虹也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6906_0'>⑵ （一作楥）。（援：篱笆。清桂馥《札朴·览古·援》：“援，《集韵》作楥，篱也。”）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6906_0'>⑶ 居士俨：疑指陈俨。元稹《赠孝甫见赠十首》之八：“巷南唯有陈居士，时学文殊一问来。”“居士俨”与“陈居士”俱与元稹相识于江陵，住处相同，身份相同，疑为一人。居士，梵语grhapati之意译，原指古印度吠舍种姓工商业中之商人，因信佛教者颇多，故佛教用以称呼在家佛教徒之受过“三归”、“五戒”者。俨，蜀本、卢本作“岩”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6906_0'>⑷ 心王：佛教认为，心为人身之主宰，一切精神现象之主体，故云。《涅盘经》卷一：“是身如城……手足以为却敌楼橹，目为窍孔，头为殿堂，心王居中。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_6906_0'>⑸ 款关：叩门。关，门。此谓己闻风来访。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6906_0'>⑹ “视身”句：《佛说长阿含经》卷一：“又告比丘诸佛常法。毗婆尸菩萨从兜率天降神母胎，专念不乱，母身安隐，无众恼患，智慧增益。母自观胎，见菩萨身诸根具足，如紫磨金，无有瑕秽。犹如有目之士观净琉璃，内外清澈，无众障翳。诸比丘，此是诸佛常法。尔时，世尊而说偈，言如净琉璃珠，其明如日月。仁尊处母胎，其母无恼患。智慧为增益，观胎如金像。母怀妊安乐，此诸佛常法。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6906_0'>⑺ “喻指”句：用“芭蕉”宣扬佛教之教义。佛教徒常以芭蕉比喻身体之易灭，人生之短暂。《涅盘经》：“譬如芭蕉，生实则枯。一切众生，身亦如是。”谕指：阐明旨意。指通旨。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_6906_0'>⑻ 比丘：梵语Bhiksu之音译，意为乞士，以上从诸佛乞法、下就俗众乞食而得名，为佛教出家“五众”之一，指已受具足戒之男性，即和尚。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_6906_0'>⑼ 龙树：古印度高僧，释迦灭后七百年出生于南天竺，为马鸣菩萨弟子迦毗摩罗尊者之弟子。其母于树下生之，因字阿周陀那（树名）；以龙成其道，故以龙配字，号曰龙树。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6906_0'>⑽ 丹诀：原指炼丹成仙之秘诀，此借指佛教成佛之要诀。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6906_0'>⑾ “肘后”句：《晋书·葛洪传》（卷七二）：“自号抱朴子，因以名书。其馀所著……《肘后要急方》四卷。”后因以“肘后方”喻指仙方。青囊：原指古代医家与术数家盛放书籍及卜具之口袋。《晋书·郭璞传》：“有郭公者，客居河东，精于卜筮，璞从之受业。公以《青囊中书》九卷与之，由是遂洞五行、天文、卜筮之术，攘灾转祸，通致无方，虽京房、管辂不能过也。”此借指佛教典籍。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_6906_0'>⑿ 锡杖：僧人所持之禅杖，梵名Khakhara，取锡锡作声之义。其杖端有一铁卷，中段用木，下安铁纂，振时作声。《得道梯橙锡杖经》：“是锡杖者，名为智杖，亦名德杖。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6906_0'>⒀ 神：原作“人”，据蜀本、杨本、董本、全诗及文意改。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6906_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《月临花》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6754' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6754' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6754?labeling=true' target='_blank'>月临花<span class='inlineComment2'>（即林檎花）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6754")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6754_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6754'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6754'>临<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作凌）</span>风<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6754", 6754, "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>飏飏</span>花，透影胧胧月。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6754_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6754'>巫峡隔波云，姑峰漏霞雪<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6754_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6754'>镜匀娇面粉，灯泛高笼缬<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6754_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6754'>夜久清露多，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6754", 6754, "Clauses/7/Comments/1")'>啼珠</span>坠还结<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6754_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6754'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6754_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6754'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6754_0'>⑴ “姑峰”句：姑峰，姑射山之峰，在山西临汾境内。《庄子·逍遥游》：“藐姑射之山，有神人居焉，肌肤若冰雪，绰约若处子。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6754_0'>⑵ 高笼缬：古代妇女之高鬟发式。缬，有文彩之丝织物。以花缯束发名缬子髻。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6754_0'>⑶ 啼珠：比喻露珠。李贺《苏小小墓》：“幽兰露，如啼眼。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6754_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《红芍药》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_7021' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_7021' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/7021?labeling=true' target='_blank'>红芍药</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_7021")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_7021_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_7021'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_7021'>芍药绽红绡，巴篱织<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_7021", 7021, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>青琐</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_7021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_7021'>繁丝蹙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_7021", 7021, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>金蕊</span>，高燄当炉火。<div id='poem_sentence_1_7021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_7021'>剪刻彤云片，开张赤霞裹<span class='inlineComment2'>（霞：杨本、董本、类苑作“霜”。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_7021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_7021'>烟轻琉璃叶，风亚珊瑚朵<span class='inlineComment2'>（亚：见卷3《茅舍》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_7021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_7021'>受露色<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_7021", 7021, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>低迷</span>，向人娇婀娜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_7021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_7021'>酡颜醉后泣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，小女妆成坐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_7021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_7021'>艳艳锦不如，夭夭桃未可<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_7021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_7021'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_7021", 7021, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>晴霞</span>畏欲散，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_7021", 7021, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>晚日</span>愁将堕。<div id='poem_sentence_7_7021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_7021'>结植本为谁，赏心期在我。<div id='poem_sentence_8_7021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_7021'>采之谅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_7021", 7021, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>多思</span>，幽赠何由果。<div id='poem_sentence_9_7021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_7021'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_7021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_7021'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_7021_0'>⑴ 巴篱：即笆篱。巴同笆。青琐：刻镂成格状之窗户。《汉书·元后传》：“曲阳侯根骄奢僭上，赤墀青琐。”颜师古注：“青琐者，刻为连环文，而青涂之也。”此喻指篱笆。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_7021_0'>⑵ （一作并）。（酡颜：饮酒后脸红貌，此泛指脸红。泣：原作“并”，据卢本、蜀本、杨本、全诗改）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_7021_0'>⑶ “夭夭”句：谓红芍药之美艳，盛开之桃花亦无能为比。夭夭，美盛貌。《诗·周南·桃夭》：“桃之夭夭，灼灼其花。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_7021_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《遣昼》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6986' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6986' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6986?labeling=true' target='_blank'>遣昼</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6986")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6986_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6986'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6986'>密竹有清阴，旷怀无尘滓。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6986'>况乃秋日光，玲珑晓窗里。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6986'>旬休聊自适<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，今辰日高起。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6986'>栉沐坐前轩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，风轻镜如水。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6986'>开卷恣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6986", 6986, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>咏谣</span>，望云闲徙倚。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6986'>新菊媚鲜妍，短萍怜靃靡<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6986'>埽除田地静，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6986", 6986, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>摘掇</span>园蔬美。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6986'>幽玩惬诗流，空堂称居士<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6986'>客来伤寂寞，我念遗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6986", 6986, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>烦鄙</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6986'>心迹两相忘，谁能验行止。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6986'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_6986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6986'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6986_0'>⑴ 旬休：见卷5《元和五年予官不了罚俸西归》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6986_0'>⑵ 栉沐：梳洗。栉，梳子、篦子等梳发用具。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6986_0'>⑶ 靃靡：弱草、浮萍类植物随风摆动貌。靃，同霍。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6986_0'>⑷ “空堂”句：《维摩诘所说经·文殊师利问疾品第五》（卷中）：“尔时长者维摩诘心念：今文殊师利与大众俱来，即以神力空其室内，除去所有，及诸侍者，唯置一床，以疾而卧。文殊师利既入其舍，见其室空无诸所有，独寝一床。……文殊师利言：‘居士，此室何以空无侍者？’维摩诘言：‘诸佛国土亦复皆空。’”居士，见卷6《春月》注。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6986_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《寒》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6946' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6946' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6946?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寒</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6946")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6946_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6946'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6946'>江瘴节候暖，腊初梅已残。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6946'>夜来北风至，喜见今日寒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6946'>扣冰浅塘水，拥雪深竹阑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6946'>复此满尊醁<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，但嗟谁与欢。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6946'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6946'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6946_0'>⑴ 醁：美酒。《广韵·烛韵》：“醁，美酒。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6946_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《春六十云》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6904' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6904' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_6904'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6904'>节应<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6904", 6904, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>寒灰</span>下，春生返照中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6904'>未能消积雪，已渐少回风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6904'>九霄浑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6904", 6904, id='poem_sentence_13_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6904'>度岭梅甘坼，潜泉脉暗洪。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6904'>既蒸难发地，仍送懒归鸿。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6904'>约略环区宇，殷勤绮镐酆。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6904'>华山青黛扑，渭水碧沙蒙。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6904'>俊造欣<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作兴）</span>时用，闾阎贺岁丰。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6904'>贵主骄矜盛，豪家恃赖雄。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_6904'>瑞云低𢈈𢈈，香雨润濛濛。<div id='poem_sentence_53_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_6904'>药溉分窠数，篱栽备幼冲。<div id='poem_sentence_54_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_6904'>种莎怜见叶，护笋冀成筒。<div id='poem_sentence_55_6904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='/Writing/6402?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6402_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6402'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6402'>无事抛棋侵虎口，几时开眼复联行。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6402'>终须杀尽缘边敌，四面<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6402", 6402, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>通同</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（一作流）</span>掩大荒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6402_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6402'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6402_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6403' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6403' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6403?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6403_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6403'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6403'>原宪甘贫每自开，子春伤足少人哀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6403_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6403'>巷南唯有陈居士，时学文殊一问来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6403_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6403'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6403_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6404' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6404' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6404?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6404_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6404'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6404'>每识闲人如未识，与君相识更相怜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6404'>经旬不解来过宿，忍见空床夜夜眠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6404'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6404_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6405' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6405' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6405?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6405_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6405'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6405'>开坼新诗展大璆，明珠炫转<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6405", 6405, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>玉音</span>浮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6405'>酬君十首三更坐，减却常<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作当）</span>时半夜愁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6405'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6405_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《雨声》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6299' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6299' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6299?labeling=true' target='_blank'>雨声</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6299")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6299_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6299'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6299'>风吹竹叶休还动，雨点荷心暗复明。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6299_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6299'>曾向西江船上宿，惯闻寒夜滴篷声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6299_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6299'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6299_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《野节鞭》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6945' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6945' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6945?labeling=true' target='_blank'>野节鞭</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6945")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6945_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6945'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6945'>神鞭鞭宇宙，玉鞭鞭骐骥。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6945'>紧綛野节鞭，本用鞭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6945", 6945, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>赑屃</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6945'>使君鞭甚长<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，使君马亦利。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6945'>司马并马行<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，司马马憔悴。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6945'>短鞭不可施，疾步无由致。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6945'>使君驻马言，愿以长鞭遗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6945'>此遗不寻常，此鞭不容易<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6945'>金坚无缴绕，玉滑无尘腻。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6945'>青蛇坼生石<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，不刺山阿地。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6945'>乌龟旋眼斑，不染红<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作江）</span>头泪<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6945'>长看雷雨痕，未忍驽骀试<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6945'>持用换所持，无令等闲弃。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6945'>答云君何奇，赠我君所贵。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6945'>我用亦不凡，终身保明义。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6945'>誓以鞭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_6945", 6945, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>奸顽</span>，不以鞭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_6945", 6945, "Clauses/29/Comments/1")'>蹇踬</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6945'>指撝狡兔踪<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_6945", 6945, "Clauses/31/Comments/2")'>决挞</span>怪<span class='inlineComment2'>（平声）</span>龙<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>睡。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6945'>借<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作惜）</span>令寸寸折<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>，节节不虚坠。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6945'>因作换鞭诗，诗成谓同志<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6945'>而我得闻之，笑君年少意。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6945'>安用换长鞭，鞭长亦奚为。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6945'>我有鞭尺馀，泥抛风雨渍。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6945'>不拟闲赠行，唯将烂誇醉。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6945'>春来信马头，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_6945", 6945, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>款缓</span>花前辔。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6945'>愿<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作愿）</span>我迟似挛，饶君疾如翅。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6945'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_6945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6945'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6945_0'>⑴ 赑屃：亦作赑屃，龟之别名，古代石碑之石座相沿雕作赑屃状，取其力大能负重之义。明焦竑《玉堂丛语·文学》：“一曰赑屃，形似龟，好负重，今石碑下龟趺是也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6945_0'>⑵ 使君：汉朝对州刺史之尊称，后世因之，尊称州郡之长官。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6945_0'>⑶ 司马：古代州郡之佐官，与别驾、长史并为州郡之上佐，名义上纪纲众务，通判列曹，品高俸厚，唐后期实际无具体职事，多用以安置贬谪之官吏或用作迁转官阶及寄禄官。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6945_0'>⑷ 遗（wèi）：给与。《六书故·人九》：“遗，有所留与，因谓之遗。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6945_0'>⑸ 不：蜀本、卢本作“未”。易：替代。《汉书·赵尧传》：“（高祖）熟视尧曰：‘无以易尧。’遂拜尧为御史大夫。”颜师古注：“言尧可为之，馀人不能胜也。易，代也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6945_0'>⑹ 青蛇：见卷2《说剑》注。青，蜀本、卢本作“龙”。坼：本卷《寺院新竹》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6945_1'>⑺ “乌龟”二句：宋赵汝适《诸蕃志》卷下：“玳瑁，形似乌龟，背甲十三片，黑白斑纹间错，……鬣与首斑文如甲。……世传鞭血成斑，妄也。”红：杨本、董本、全诗、类苑、胡本作江。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6945_0'>⑻ 驽骀：指劣马。驽，即骀，劣马。《玉篇·马部》：“驽，最下马也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_6945_0'>⑼ 蹇踬：处境困顿。蹇，跛足。踬，跌倒。此指处境困顿之人。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6945_0'>⑽ 指撝：亦作指挥，谓有意安排。撝，通挥。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6945_1'>⑾ 怪龙：深潜于水中之龙。《国语·鲁语下》：“木石之怪，曰夔、蝄蜽；水之怪，曰龙、罔象；土之怪，曰羵羊。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_16_6945_1'>⑿ 借：原作“惜”，据蜀本、卢本及文意改。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_6945_0'>⒀ 同志：志趣相同。《国语·晋语四》：“同德则同心，同心则同志。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6945_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　元和五年至九年在江陵作《杨子华画三首》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6843' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6843' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6843?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杨子华画三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6843")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6843_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6843'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6843'>皓腕卷红袖，锦鞲臂苍鹗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6843_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6843'>故人断弦心<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6843", 6843, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>稚齿</span>从禽乐<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6843_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6843'>当年惜贵游，遗形寄丹雘<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6843_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6843'>骨象或依稀<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，铅华已寥落。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6843_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6843'>似对古人民，无复昔城郭<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6843_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6843'>子亦观病身<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，色空俱寂寞<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6843_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6843'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_6843_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6843'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6843_0'>⑴ 鞲：见卷2《阳城驿》注。苍鹗：鸟名，即鱼鹰。《本草纲目·禽部·鹗》：“鹗，雕类也，似鹰而土黄色，深目，好峙……能翱翔水上，捕食鱼，江表人呼为食鱼鹰。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6843_0'>⑵ “故人”句：相传伯牙善鼓琴，琴声高妙，唯钟子期能知其音。子期死，伯牙感慨于知音难觅，遂破琴绝弦，终身不复操琴。事详《吕氏春秋·本味》。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6843_0'>⑶ 从禽：追逐禽兽，即田猎。《易·屯卦》：“六三……往吝象曰：‘即鹿无虞，以从禽也。君子舍之，往吝穷也。’”孔颖达疏：“即鹿当有虞官，即有鹿也；若无虞官，以从逐于禽，亦不可得也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6843_0'>⑷ “遗形”句：用画记录下当时人物之神采。遗形，超脱形骸，描摹精神。丹艧，即丹雘，可供涂饰之红色颜料。《尚书·梓材》：“若作梓材，既勤朴斲，惟其涂丹雘。”孔颖达疏：“雘是彩色之名，有青色者，有朱色者。”此借指绘画。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6843_0'>⑸ 骨象：骨骼相貌。《文选·曹植〈洛神赋〉》：“奇服旷世，骨像（象）应图。”吕向注：“骨法人像，皆应图相。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6843_0'>⑹ “似对”二句：参卷3《松鹤》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6843_0'>⑺ 观病：佛教语，谓观察妄惑之智力。《大乘义章》卷二：“粗思曰觉，细思曰观。”宋王安石《读维摩经有感》：“宴坐世间观此理，维摩虽病有神通。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_6843_0'>⑻ 色空：色即是空之省称。佛教谓一切有形之物为色，而万物皆由业缘而生，本非实有，故云。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6843_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6842' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6842' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6842?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6842_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6842'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6842'>杨画远于展<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，何言今在兹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6842'>依然古妆服，但感时节移。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6842'>念君一朝意，遗我千载思。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6842'>子亦几时客，安能长苦悲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6842'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6842'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6842_0'>⑴ 展：指展子虔，渤海（今山东省阳信）人，历北齐、北周、隋，善画道释人物故实。所画人物意度俱足，神采如生，为唐代绘画之祖。事详《历代名画记》等。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6842_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6844' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6844' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6844?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span -----title
松滋
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='5d592343c9ed46a88fa928b8d7f0eebe_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5d592343c9ed46a88fa928b8d7f0eebe");'><span id='5d592343c9ed46a88fa928b8d7f0eebe_link' id='poem_6434' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6434' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6434?labeling=true' class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_7013_0'>⑵ 黄字新诗：以“黄”字为韵之诗，即题中所云“黄字五十韵”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_7013_0'>⑶ “纵使”二句：羊叔子：即羊祜，魏晋间政治家，晋泰始五年出镇荆州。《晋书·羊祜传》：祜年五岁，令乳母取所弄金环，乳母曰：“汝先无此物。”祜即诣邻人李氏东垣桑树中探得之。东邻主人惊曰：“此吾亡儿所失物也。”时人异之，谓李氏子即祜之前身。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_7013_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

当阳

id='poem_6564' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6564' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6564?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诮卢戡与予数约游三寺戡独沈醉而不行</a><span class='inlineComment2'>（三寺中碧涧寺在今湖北松滋，其余两寺均在今湖北当阳。）</span><div id='poem_6625' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6625' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6625?labeling=true' -----title
公安
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='00a58fb11f644828860eadfdfd1fc3d1_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("00a58fb11f644828860eadfdfd1fc3d1");'><span id='00a58fb11f644828860eadfdfd1fc3d1_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　春夏之交，游公安县远安寺，忆僧如展，有诗。作品：《公安县远安寺水亭见展公题壁漂然泪流因书四韵》<div id='poem_6439' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6439' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6439?labeling=true' target='_blank'>公安县远安寺水亭见展公题壁漂然泪流因书四韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（812年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6439")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6439_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6439'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6439'>碧涧去年会<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，与师三两人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6439_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6439'>今来见题壁，师已是前身。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6439_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6439'>芰叶迎僧夏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，杨花度俗春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6439_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6439'>空将数行泪，洒遍塔中尘<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6439_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6439'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6439_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6439'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6439_0'>⑴ 碧涧：即碧涧寺，见本卷《僧如展及韦载同游碧涧寺》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6439_0'>⑵ 僧夏：指僧尼受戒之年数。僧尼以七月十六日为岁首，七月十五日为除夕，出家后以夏腊计算年岁，犹常人称年龄为春秋。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6439_0'>⑶ 塔：身塔，见本卷《僧如展及韦载同游碧涧寺》注。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6439_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

id='poem_sentence_9_6737_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6737'>浸淫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6737", 6737, id='poem_sentence_10_6737_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6737'>自叹生涯看转烛，更悲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6737", 6737, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>商旅</span>哭沈财。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6737_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6737'>樯乌㪷折头仓掉，水狗斜倾尾缆开。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6737_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6737'>在昔讵惭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_6737", 6737, id='poem_sentence_14_6737_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6737'>闭目唯愁满空电，冥心真类不然灰。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6737_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6737'>那知否极<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_6737", 6737, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>休徵</span>至，渐觉宵分曙气催。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6737_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6737'>怪族潜收湖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_6737", 6737, id='poem_sentence_1_6361_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6361'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6361_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6615' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6615'>谁能问帝子<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，何事宠<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9669, "poem_sentence_2_6615")'>阳侯</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6615'>渐恐鲸鲵大<span class='inlineComment2'>（鲸鲵：见卷1《赛神》注。）</span>，波涛及九州。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6615'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6615_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6615'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6615_0'>⑴ 帝子：指湘水之神湘夫人，相传湘夫人为帝尧之女，故称。《楚辞·九歌·湘夫人》：“帝子降兮北渚，目眇眇兮愁予。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6615_0'>⑵ 阳侯：古代传说中波涛之神。《战国策·韩策二》：“塞漏舟而轻阳侯之波，则舟覆矣。”鲍彪注：“说阳侯多矣。今按《四八目》：伏羲六佐，一曰阳侯，为江海，盖因此为波神欤？”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6615_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>经岳阳，宿石矶，有诗。作品：《宿石矶》<div id='poem_6345' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6345' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6345?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宿石矶</a><span /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6345_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6345'><div class='poemSentence' -----title
石首
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='3f654fe05cc641358d8ce5ac97c5a76c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3f654fe05cc641358d8ce5ac97c5a76c");'><span id='3f654fe05cc641358d8ce5ac97c5a76c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>，36岁</div><div id='3f654fe05cc641358d8ce5ac97c5a76c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　前往潭州，经石首县，有诗。作品：《竹部》<div id='poem_6828' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6828' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6828?labeling=true' target='_blank'>竹部<span class='inlineComment2'>（石首县界）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6828")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6828_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6828'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6828'>竹部竹山近，岁伐竹山竹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6828'>伐竹岁亦深，深林隔深谷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6828'>朝朝冰雪行，夜夜豺狼宿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6828'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6828", 6828, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>科首</span>霜断蓬<span class='inlineComment2'>（科首：谓芟除竹梢。科，砍，剪。）</span>，枯形烧<span class='inlineComment2'>（去声）</span>馀木。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6828'>一束十馀茎，千钱百馀束。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6828'>得钱盈千百，得粟盈斗斛。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6828'>归来不买食，父子分<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6828", 6828, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>半菽</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6828'>持此欲何为，官家<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6828", 6828, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>岁输</span>促<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6828'>我来荆门掾<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，寓食公堂肉。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6828'>岂惟遍妻孥，亦以及僮仆。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6828'>分尔有限资，饱我无端腹。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6828'>愧尔不复言，尔生何太蹙。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6828'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_6828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6828'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6828_0'>⑴ 半菽：半菜半粮，此泛指粗劣之饭食。《汉书·项籍传》：“今岁饥民贫，卒食半菽。”颜师古注：“孟康曰：‘半，五升器名也。’臣瓒曰：‘士卒食蔬菜以菽杂拌之。’瓒说是也。菽谓豆也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6828_0'>⑵ 岁输：每岁运送京师或其他指定地点之贡赋，以粮米为主，多由水路运输。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6828_0'>⑶ 荆门掾：指江陵士曹参军。荆门，荆州，此借指江陵。唐王维《寄荆州张丞相》：“所思意何在？怅望涉荆门。”赵殿成笺注：“唐人多呼荆州为荆门。文人称谓如此，不仅指荆门一山矣。”掾，属官佐贰之统称。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6828_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
长沙
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='5a826929dfc04f77894eae74f66d8825_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5a826929dfc04f77894eae74f66d8825");'><span id='5a826929dfc04f77894eae74f66d8825_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>，36岁</div><div id='5a826929dfc04f77894eae74f66d8825' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至潭州，谒张正甫，有诗。作品：《陪张湖南宴望岳楼稹为监察御史张中丞知杂》<div id='poem_6344' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6344' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6344?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陪张湖南宴望岳楼稹为监察御史张中丞知杂事</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6344")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6344_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6344'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6344'>观象楼前奉末班，绛峰只似殿庭间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6344_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6344'>今日高楼重陪宴，雨笼衡岳是南山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6344_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6344'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6344_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>席间，听唐有态歌，有诗。作品：《何满子歌》<div id='poem_6834' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6834' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6834?labeling=true' target='_blank'>何满子歌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（814年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6834")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6834_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6834_0'>① 张湖南座为唐有态作，有态一作有熊。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6834'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6834'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6834", 6834, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>何满</span>能歌能宛转，天宝年中世称罕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6834'>婴刑系在囹圄间，水调哀音歌愤懑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6834'>梨园弟子奏玄宗，一唱承恩羁网缓。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6834'>便将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6834", 6834, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>何满</span>为曲名，御谱亲题乐府纂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6834'>鱼家入内本领绝，叶氏有年声气短。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6834'>自外徒烦记得词，点拍才成已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6834", 6834, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>夸诞</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6834'>我来湖外拜君侯，正值灰飞仲春琯。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6834'>广宴江亭为我开，红妆逼坐花枝暖。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6834'>此时有态蹋华筵，未吐芳词貌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_6834", 6834, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>夷坦</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6834'>翠蛾转盼摇雀钗，碧袖歌垂翻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6834", 6834, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>鹤卵</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6834'>定面凝眸一声发，云停尘下何劳算。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6834'>迢迢击磬远玲玲，一一贯珠匀款款。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6834'>犯羽含商移调态，留情度意抛弦管。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6834'>湘妃宝瑟水上来，秦女玉箫空外满。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6834'>缠绵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_6834", 6834, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>叠破</span>最慇勤，整顿衣裳颇<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作事）</span>閒散。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6834'>冰含远溜咽还通，莺泥晚花啼渐懒。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6834'>敛黛吞声若自冤，郑袖见捐西子浣。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6834'>阴山鸣雁晓断行，巫峡哀猿夜呼伴。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6834'>古者诸侯飨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_6834", 6834, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>外宾</span>，鹿鸣三奏陈圭瓒。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6834'>何如有态一曲终，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_6834", 6834, "Clauses/39/Comments/1")'>牙筹</span>记令红螺碗<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作盏）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6834'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_6834_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在潭州，见释道泉，有诗。作品：《卢头陀诗并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（释道泉即卢士衍。）</span>《醉别卢头陀》<div id='poem_6448' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6448' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6448?labeling=true' target='_blank'>卢头陀诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6448")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6448_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6448'>道泉头陀字源一，姓卢氏，本名士衍。弟曰起郎士玟，则官阀可知也。少力学，善记忆（善能忆），戡解职仕，不三十馀，历八诸侯府，皆掌剧事。性强迈，不录幽琐，为吏所搆，谪官建州，无何，有异人密授心契，冥失所在。卢氏既为大门族，兄弟且贤豪，惶骇求索无所得。胤子某，积岁穷无荒僻，一夕于衡山佛舍众头陀中，灯下识之，号叫泣血无所顾。然而先是众以为姜头陀，自是知其为卢头陀矣。尔后往来湘潭间，不常次舍，祇以衡山为诣极。元和九年，张中丞领潭之岁，予拜张公于潭，适上人在焉，即日诣所舍东寺一见。蒙念不碍小劣，尽得本末其事，列而序之，仍以四韵七言为赠尔。</div><div id='poem_preface_6448_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6448'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6448'>卢师深话出家由，剃尽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6448", 6448, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>心花</span>始剃头。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6448'>马哭青山别车匿，鹊飞螺髻见罗睺。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6448'>还来旧日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6448", 6448, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>经过</span>处，似隔前身梦寐游。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6448'>为向八龙兄弟说，他生缘会此生休。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6448'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6448_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6681' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6681' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6681?labeling=true' 丹江口（郧乡）

淅阳：《旧唐书·地理二·山南东道》卷三九：“均州下，隋淅阳郡之武当县。”元稹有庄在此，参卷19《西归绝句十二首》。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6887_comment'></div></div><br /></div>

泌阳（比阳）
