class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372445_comment'></div>德被万方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372445_comment'></div>下蜀无束马之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372445_comment'></div>平吴但斩鲸而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372445_comment'></div>百蛮述职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372445_comment'></div>九有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1372445", 1372445, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>怀仁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372445_comment'></div>凡在生成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372445_comment'></div>孰不柔茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372445_comment'></div>而蕞尔元济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372445_comment'></div>天将剿除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372445_comment'></div>寘蟊贼于其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372445_comment'></div>假蝼蚁以为聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372445_comment'></div>父死不葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372445_comment'></div>王命未临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372445_comment'></div>擅胁师徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372445_comment'></div>偷侵县道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372445_comment'></div>此诚仁人孝子决愤激忠之日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372445_comment'></div>陛下尚先<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1372445", 1372445, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>含垢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372445_comment'></div>未忍加诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372445_comment'></div>曲示绥怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372445_comment'></div>俾臣招抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372445_comment'></div>臣诚虽恳到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372445_comment'></div>性本<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1372445", 1372445, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>孱愚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372445_comment'></div>任重忧深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372445_comment'></div>惊惶失据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372445_comment'></div>然以苗心可化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372445_comment'></div>舜舞方兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372445_comment'></div>仰荷威灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372445_comment'></div>冀其柔服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372445_comment'></div>臣即日与邻道计会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372445_comment'></div>奉宣诏旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372445_comment'></div>诱谕顽凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372445_comment'></div>威爱并施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372445_comment'></div>使之来格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372445_comment'></div>如或尚驱枭獍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372445_comment'></div>不袭椒兰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372445_comment'></div>臣则誓死剪除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372445_comment'></div>俾无遗孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372445_comment'></div>其归投百姓等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372445_comment'></div>臣并准诏别加优恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372445_comment'></div>置在安全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372445_comment'></div>仰副圣情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372445_comment'></div>不令惊扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372445_comment'></div>臣先奉恩诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372445_comment'></div>令臣发赴唐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372445_comment'></div>不获奔走伏谢阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372445_comment'></div>无任恐惧之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1372445_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年10月21日</a>　在唐州，代严绶表彰将士军吏及百姓作文。作品：《代谕淮西书》<div id='poem_1372505' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372505' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372505?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代谕淮西书</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年10月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372505")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372505_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372505'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372505'>某月日。山南东道节度兼申光蔡等州招抚使检校司空严某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372505_comment'></div>致书前彰义军兵马使吴侍御及淮西将士官吏申光蔡等州百姓等。奉十月十九日诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372505_comment'></div>以某充申光蔡招抚使。某月日遣使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>赍敕</span>送付界首布告讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372505_comment'></div>某顷镇太原。与吴侍御伯父相国公同受恩寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372505_comment'></div>交问岁时。欢好不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372505_comment'></div>仅十馀年。可谓至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372505_comment'></div>及吴侍御先尚书继当宠命。某又领镇荆南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372505_comment'></div>前好复修。款密如旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372505_comment'></div>吊丧问疾。礼无不时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372505_comment'></div>亦可谓勤矣。某与吴侍御伯父先父既等夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372505_comment'></div>于吴侍御实丈人行。固已私矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372505_comment'></div>况朝廷以吴侍御因丧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>扰惑</span>。迷误诏旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372505_comment'></div>欲思致训。未忍加兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372505_comment'></div>仍以某为招抚之使。是吴尚书之嗣既绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372505_comment'></div>而由某有复联之望。捧诏以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372505_comment'></div>夙夜忧叹。不任怜痛之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372505_comment'></div>某欲上徵古类。恐引谕不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372505_comment'></div>切为诸公以近事灼然在耳目者言之。今吴侍御弃丧背礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372505_comment'></div>舍父干君。诱聚师徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372505_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>希求</span>爵位者。岂不以贞元末年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372505_comment'></div>天下方镇物故。往往依凭众请而得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372505_comment'></div>十恒二三。以此为自偷之證耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372505_comment'></div>甚不然也。德宗皇帝御天下日久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372505_comment'></div>春秋高。理务便安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372505_comment'></div>不欲生事。或谋及卒伍而置师长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372505_comment'></div>盖一时之权也。今天子二十八即皇帝位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372505_comment'></div>控一海内。臣妾夷狄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372505_comment'></div>赫然皇威。熏灼白日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372505_comment'></div>初杨惠琳刘辟李锜犹守故态。谓朝廷未即诛擒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372505_comment'></div>曾不知逾月之间。皆头悬稿街。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372505_comment'></div>腰斩都市。此诸公之所闻见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372505_comment'></div>自是蛮夷慑窜。戎臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>震惕</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372505_comment'></div>相与奔走朝阙之不暇。今庙堂之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372505_comment'></div>命将择帅。容易于授卿长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372505_comment'></div>即吴侍御<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>希求</span>非望之志。安得复行于今日哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372505_comment'></div>此众不可凭位不可取之明验也。今吴侍御蓄聚糗粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372505_comment'></div>缮完城垒。偷侵县邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372505_comment'></div>不自危亡者。岂不以贞元中吴相国为谗邪所斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372505_comment'></div>错误朝章。韩太保率众奉词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372505_comment'></div>而吴相国终以宥免。又以此为自偷之證耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372505_comment'></div>又不然也。日者谋议之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372505_comment'></div>算画不审。韩太保行阵之将耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372505_comment'></div>总统非所长。而又徵天下乌合之众以授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372505_comment'></div>是以迁延进退。不时成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372505_comment'></div>然犹吴相国悔过乞降。深自咎责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372505_comment'></div>朝廷多之。仅乃全活。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372505_comment'></div>且吴相国躬服节俭。衣食与士卒同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372505_comment'></div>蓄货力耕。向三十载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372505_comment'></div>然后粗能支一战耳。今吴尚书驭众日浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372505_comment'></div>吴侍御<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>年位</span>俱卑。诸将之在下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372505_comment'></div>皆怏怏苟容。非有威怀信服之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372505_comment'></div>百姓日蹙。赋敛月加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372505_comment'></div>天兵四临。耕织尽废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372505_comment'></div>窃闻壮者劫而为兵。老弱妻孥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372505_comment'></div>吞声于道路。而欲以吴相国三十年拊循积聚之力为自比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372505_comment'></div>甚相悬矣。况国家命全军之将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372505_comment'></div>用不竭之资。乌尚书董怀汝之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372505_comment'></div>李尚书举陈许之众。柳中丞以鄂之全军军于安陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372505_comment'></div>令狐中丞以淮南之锐旅屯于寿春。某以襄阳之劲卒数万集于唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372505_comment'></div>而又益之以魏博之骁骑。江陵之强弩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372505_comment'></div>以攻则彼有压卵之危。以守则我无出疆之费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372505_comment'></div>用三州之赋。敌天下四海之饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372505_comment'></div>以一旅之师。抗天下无穷之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372505_comment'></div>虽妾妇騃孩。犹知笑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372505_comment'></div>而况于义夫壮士哉。若圣天子推含垢之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372505_comment'></div>图不战之功。使环而守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372505_comment'></div>塞其飞走。则男不得耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372505_comment'></div>女不得织。盐茗之路绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372505_comment'></div>仓廪之积空。不三数月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372505_comment'></div>求诸公于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>枯鱼之肆</span>矣。傥或神算风驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372505_comment'></div>天威电激。使齐攻四面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372505_comment'></div>各裂一隅。彼若聚而待之则自穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372505_comment'></div>分而应之则不足。东抗则西入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372505_comment'></div>南备则北侵。腹背受攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372505_comment'></div>首尾皆畏。赤族之刑既迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372505_comment'></div>舆榇之计方施。则固难期于曩时之宥免矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372505_comment'></div>此又力不可支势不可久之明验也。今吴侍御厚利买交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372505_comment'></div>严刑劫质。谓王师可敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372505_comment'></div>谓已众不离者。岂不以大将李义等言甘约重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372505_comment'></div>许以死生之为耶。又不然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372505_comment'></div>夫李锜据吴楚之雄。兼榷管之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372505_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/162/Comments/0")'>选才</span>养士。向十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372505_comment'></div>独以张子良为腹心不贰之将。故授以锐健先锋之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372505_comment'></div>又以裴行立为骨肉不欺之亲。故授以敢死酬恩之卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372505_comment'></div>然而一朝迁延王命称疾不朝。子良朝倒戈以攻于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372505_comment'></div>而行立夕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/170/Comments/0")'>纵火</span>以应于内。锜则戮死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372505_comment'></div>而张裴甚荣。此又诸公之所闻见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372505_comment'></div>刘辟乘韦令饶衍之后。廪藏谷帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372505_comment'></div>以亿万计。啖养士卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372505_comment'></div>凭恃阻固。以仇良辅有朴厚不摇之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372505_comment'></div>是以成其要害而授之兵。然而天兵一麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372505_comment'></div>因垒来下。席卷馀孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372505_comment'></div>巴蜀大定。辟则戮死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372505_comment'></div>而良辅甚荣。此又诸公之所闻见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372505_comment'></div>卢从史内蕴私邪。外张<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/189/Comments/0")'>威武</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372505_comment'></div>荧惑天听。逗留王师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372505_comment'></div>以乌尚书有委用亲信之恩。故授之以爪牙卫已之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372505_comment'></div>然而睿略潜施。元凶就执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372505_comment'></div>乌尚书清垒整旅以俟命。从史放死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372505_comment'></div>而尚书甚荣。此又诸公之所见闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372505_comment'></div>此数君子者。岂受利不厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372505_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_101_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/202/Comments/0")'>誓约</span>不明哉。盖逆顺之理殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372505_comment'></div>而子孙之祸大也。且田太保季安藉累代继袭之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372505_comment'></div>身没之后。允子不肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372505_comment'></div>将卒聚谋而请之天子。天子嘉其忠而与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372505_comment'></div>赉百万之财以赡军。复三年之赋以励俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372505_comment'></div>辍郎署之英以荣其宾介。而坐专席操郡国者又相继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372505_comment'></div>彼魏博三军之士。岂独不受恩于田氏父子耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372505_comment'></div>盖苦其束缚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_108_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/216/Comments/0")'>禁闭</span>。终日以城门为战场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372505_comment'></div>思复泰然游泳于王泽耳。今国家用乌尚书为重镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372505_comment'></div>所以警诸将囚缚受赏之功。用仇大夫为先驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372505_comment'></div>所以警城堡降下宠荣之利。使田大夫统魏博向义之旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372505_comment'></div>所以励三军去邪附正之机。奈何吴侍御碎六尺之躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372505_comment'></div>为李义辈求福之费。绝公侯之嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1372505_comment'></div>为淮西军受赏之资。其为人谋也则厚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1372505_comment'></div>自谋何薄哉。此又将不可恃而兵不可保之明验也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372505_comment'></div>今天子垂恻隐之诏。建招抚之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372505_comment'></div>吴侍御若束身归朝。将吏等继踵向阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372505_comment'></div>纵不得与乌尚书张金吾分封并位。受立功之赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372505_comment'></div>独不得与田怀谏命服趋朝。奉先人之家嗣乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1372505_comment'></div>且张伯靖五溪之蛮隶耳。聚徒杀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1372505_comment'></div>为恶甚大。圣上怜其愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1372505_comment'></div>诏某招致之。而犹据戎行之右职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1372505_comment'></div>忝佐郡之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_123_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/246/Comments/0")'>清员</span>。岂独于吴侍御洎淮西之将吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1372505_comment'></div>而阻其自新之路哉。谚曰天不可违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1372505_comment'></div>又曰时不可失。书至之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1372505_comment'></div>善自图之。如或违天失时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1372505_comment'></div>寝而不报。则王师<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_127_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/255/Comments/0")'>进击</span>于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1372505_comment'></div>义士潜谋于中。身首之戮指期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1372505_comment'></div>肘腋之危坐见。异日为天下戮笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1372505_comment'></div>而李义等成封侯之利。岂不大哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1372505_comment'></div>戎事方殷。未获周尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1372505_comment'></div>感念<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_132_1372505", 1372505, "Clauses/264/Comments/0")'>平昔</span>。兴然动怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1372505_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_133_1372505_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年10月21日</a>　在淮水流域，祭淮渎之神，有文记之。作品：《祭淮渎文》<div id='poem_1372539' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372539' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372539?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭淮渎文</a><span class='authorDate'>（814年10月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372539")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372539_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372539'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372539'>维元和九年岁次甲午十二月朔甲辰某日辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372539_comment'></div>使谨遣某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372539_comment'></div>用少牢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372539", 1372539, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>醴酒</span>之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372539_comment'></div>昭祷于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372539", 1372539, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>淮渎</span>长源公之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372539_comment'></div>浩浩灵源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372539_comment'></div>滔滔不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372539_comment'></div>流谦处顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372539_comment'></div>润下表德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372539_comment'></div>清辉可鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372539_comment'></div>浮秽不匿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372539_comment'></div>月映澄鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372539_comment'></div>霞明焕赩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372539_comment'></div>经界区夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372539_comment'></div>左右万国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372539_comment'></div>百川<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372539", 1372539, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>委输</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372539_comment'></div>万灵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1372539", 1372539, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>受职</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372539_comment'></div>越海贡诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372539_comment'></div>载舟竭力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372539_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1372539", 1372539, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>明哲</span>用兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372539_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372539", 1372539, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>凶戾</span>潜殛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372539_comment'></div>眇尔吴顽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372539_comment'></div>蔑然蟊贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372539_comment'></div>鸱张蔡郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372539_comment'></div>蚁聚淮侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372539_comment'></div>丧父礼亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372539_comment'></div>干君志愎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372539_comment'></div>天子命我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372539_comment'></div>涤除妖慝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372539_comment'></div>卒乘桓桓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372539_comment'></div>戈鋋嶷嶷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372539_comment'></div>电率爪牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372539_comment'></div>雷胸臆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372539_comment'></div>王心示怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372539_comment'></div>士剪犹抑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372539_comment'></div>柔叛诱衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372539_comment'></div>取顺舍逆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372539_comment'></div>咨尔有神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372539_comment'></div>逮尔有极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372539_comment'></div>彼暴我仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372539_comment'></div>彼枉我直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372539_comment'></div>归我者昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372539_comment'></div>倍我者辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372539_comment'></div>不斩祠祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372539_comment'></div>不湮沟洫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372539_comment'></div>不殄渠魁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372539_comment'></div>不虐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1372539", 1372539, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>畏逼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372539_comment'></div>不进梯冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372539_comment'></div>不耀矛戟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372539_comment'></div>火灭燎原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372539_comment'></div>人归寿域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372539_comment'></div>然后洁神牛羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372539_comment'></div>奉神黍稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372539_comment'></div>告神有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372539_comment'></div>谓神不忒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372539_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1372539_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

渠县

-----title

-----title
达州（涪陵）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='5b787d48da93406a8be92e48107f9fde_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5b787d48da93406a8be92e48107f9fde");'><span id='5b787d48da93406a8be92e48107f9fde_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　经巴南道中，作诗五十一首，已亡佚。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　赴通州途中，曾次韵酬和白居易诗《雨夜忆元九》一诗，姑系于此。作品：《酬乐天雨后见忆》<div id='poem_6389' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6389' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6389", 6389, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>黄泉</span>便是通州郡，渐入深泥渐到州。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6389'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6389_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年6月</a>　至通州，时通州刺史为李进贤。见白居易诗，作诗一首告之。作品：《见乐天诗》<div id='poem_6191' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6191' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_6672'>定觉身将囚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6672", 6672, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>一种</span>，未知生共死何如。<div "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>失水鱼</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6672_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6672'>苦境万般君莫问，自怜方寸本来虚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6672_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6672'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6672_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=815')">815年</a>　寄信与白居易，自述为文经历。作品：《叙诗寄乐天书》<div id='poem_1372503' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372503' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372503?labeling=true' target='_blank'>叙诗寄乐天书</a><span class='authorDate'>（815年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372503")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372503_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372503'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372503'>稹九岁学赋诗。长者往往惊其可教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372503_comment'></div>年十五六。粗识<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>声病</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372503_comment'></div>时贞元十年已后。德宗皇帝春秋高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372503_comment'></div>理务因人。最不欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>文法吏</span>生天下罪过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372503_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>外阃</span>节将。动十馀年不许朝觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372503_comment'></div>死于其地不易者十八九。而又将豪卒愎之处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372503_comment'></div>因丧负众。横相贼杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372503_comment'></div>告变骆驿。使者迭窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372503_comment'></div>旋以状闻天子曰。某邑将某能遏乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372503_comment'></div>乱众宁附。愿为其帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372503_comment'></div>名为众情。其实逼诈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372503_comment'></div>因而可之者又十八九。前置介倅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372503_comment'></div>因缘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>交授</span>者亦十四五。由是诸侯敢自为旨意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372503_comment'></div>有罗列儿孙以自固者。有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>开导</span>蛮夷以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/27/Comments/1")'>自重</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372503_comment'></div>省寺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>符篆</span>。固于几阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372503_comment'></div>甚者拟诏旨。视一境如一室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372503_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>刑杀</span>其下。不啻仆畜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372503_comment'></div>厚加剥夺。名为进奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372503_comment'></div>其实贡入之数百一焉。京城之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372503_comment'></div>亭第邸店。以曲巷断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372503_comment'></div>侯甸之内。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>水陆</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/41/Comments/1")'>腴沃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372503_comment'></div>以乡里计。其馀奴婢资财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372503_comment'></div>生生之备称之。朝廷大臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372503_comment'></div>以谨慎不言为朴雅。以时进见者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372503_comment'></div>不过一二<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>亲信</span>。直臣义士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372503_comment'></div>往往抑塞。禁省之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372503_comment'></div>时或缮完隤坠。豪家大帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372503_comment'></div>乘声相扇。延及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>老佛</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372503_comment'></div>土木妖炽。习俗不怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372503_comment'></div>上不欲令有司备宫闼中。小碎须求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372503_comment'></div>往往持币帛以易饼饵。吏缘其端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372503_comment'></div>剽夺百货。势不可禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372503_comment'></div>仆时孩騃。不惯闻见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372503_comment'></div>独于书传中初习理乱萌渐。心体<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>悸震</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372503_comment'></div>若不可活。思欲发之久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372503_comment'></div>适有人以陈子昂感遇诗相示。吟玩激烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372503_comment'></div>即日为寄思元子诗二十首。故郑京兆于仆为外诸翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372503_comment'></div>深赐怜奖。因以所赋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>呈献</span>京兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372503_comment'></div>翁深相骇异。秘书少监王表在座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372503_comment'></div>顾谓表曰。使此儿五十不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372503_comment'></div>其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>志义</span>何如哉。惜吾辈不见其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>成就</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372503_comment'></div>因召诸子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>训责</span>泣下。仆亦窃不自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372503_comment'></div>由是勇于为文。又久之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372503_comment'></div>得杜甫诗数百首。爱其浩荡津涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372503_comment'></div>处处<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>臻到</span>。始病沈宋之不存<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>寄兴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372503_comment'></div>而讶子昂之未暇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>旁备</span>矣。不数年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372503_comment'></div>与诗人杨巨源友善。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>日课</span>为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372503_comment'></div>性复僻懒。人事常有閒暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372503_comment'></div>閒则有作。识足下时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372503_comment'></div>有诗数百首矣。习惯性灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372503_comment'></div>遂成<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>病蔽</span>。每公私感愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372503_comment'></div>道义激扬。朋友<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>切磨</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372503_comment'></div>古今成败。日月<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>迁逝</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372503_comment'></div>光景惨舒。山川胜势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372503_comment'></div>风云景色。当花对酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372503_comment'></div>乐罢哀馀。通滞屈伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372503_comment'></div>悲欢合散。至于疾恙穷身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372503_comment'></div>悼怀惜逝。凡所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>对遇</span>异于常者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372503_comment'></div>则欲赋诗。又不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372503_comment'></div>年三十二时有罪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/118/Comments/0")'>谴弃</span>。今三十七矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372503_comment'></div>五六年之间。是丈夫心力壮时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372503_comment'></div>常在閒处。无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>役用</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372503_comment'></div>性不近道。未能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/125/Comments/0")'>淡然</span>忘怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372503_comment'></div>又复懒于他欲。全盛之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372503_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>注射</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/128/Comments/1")'>语言</span>。杂糅精粗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372503_comment'></div>遂成多大。然亦未尝缮写。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372503_comment'></div>适值河东李明府景俭在江陵时。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/133/Comments/0")'>僻好</span>仆诗章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372503_comment'></div>谓为能解。欲得尽取<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>观览</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372503_comment'></div>仆因撰成卷轴。其中有旨意<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>可观</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372503_comment'></div>而词近古往者。为古讽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372503_comment'></div>意亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/140/Comments/0")'>可观</span>。而流在乐府者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372503_comment'></div>为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>乐讽</span>。词虽近古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372503_comment'></div>而止于吟写性情者。为古体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372503_comment'></div>词实乐流。而止于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>模象</span>物色者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372503_comment'></div>为新题乐府。声势沿顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372503_comment'></div>属对稳切者。为律诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372503_comment'></div>仍以七言五言为两体。其中有稍存<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/153/Comments/0")'>寄兴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372503_comment'></div>与讽为流者。为律讽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372503_comment'></div>不幸少有伉俪之悲。抚存感往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372503_comment'></div>成数十诗。取潘子悼亡为题。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372503_comment'></div>又有以干教化者。近世妇人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372503_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/162/Comments/0")'>晕淡</span>眉目。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/163/Comments/0")'>绾约</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/163/Comments/1")'>头鬓</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372503_comment'></div>衣服修广之度。及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/165/Comments/0")'>匹配</span>色泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372503_comment'></div>尤剧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/166/Comments/0")'>怪艳</span>。因为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/167/Comments/0")'>艳诗</span>百馀首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372503_comment'></div>词有古今又两体。自十六时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372503_comment'></div>至是元和七年。已有诗八百馀首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372503_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/172/Comments/0")'>色类</span>相从。共成十体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372503_comment'></div>凡二十卷。自笑冗乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372503_comment'></div>亦不复置之于行李。昨来京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372503_comment'></div>偶在筐箧。及通行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372503_comment'></div>尽置足下。仅亦有说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372503_comment'></div>仆闻上士立德。其次立事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372503_comment'></div>不遇立言。凡人急位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372503_comment'></div>其次急利。下急食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372503_comment'></div>仆天与不厚。既乏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/189/Comments/0")'>全然</span>之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372503_comment'></div>命与不遇。未遭可为之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372503_comment'></div>性与不惠。复无垂范之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372503_comment'></div>兀兀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_97_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/194/Comments/0")'>狂痴</span>。行近四十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372503_comment'></div>侥名取位。不过于第八品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372503_comment'></div>而冒宪已六七年。授通之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372503_comment'></div>有习通之熟者。曰通之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372503_comment'></div>湿垫卑褊。人士稀少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372503_comment'></div>近荒札。死亡过半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372503_comment'></div>邑无吏。市无货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372503_comment'></div>百姓茹草木。刺史以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372503_comment'></div>计粒而食。大有虎豹蛇虺之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372503_comment'></div>小有蟆蚋浮尘蜘蛛●94FB蜂之类。皆能钻齧肌肤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372503_comment'></div>使人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_107_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/214/Comments/0")'>疮痏</span>。夏多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_107_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/215/Comments/0")'>阴霪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372503_comment'></div>秋为痢疟。地无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_108_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/217/Comments/0")'>医巫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372503_comment'></div>药石万里。病者有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_109_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/219/Comments/0")'>百死一生</span>之虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372503_comment'></div>夫何以仆之命不厚也如此。智不足也又如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372503_comment'></div>其所诣之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_111_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/222/Comments/0")'>忧险</span>也又复如此。则安能保持万全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372503_comment'></div>与足下必复京辇。以须他日立言事之验耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372503_comment'></div>但恐一旦与急食相符。而终使足下受天下友不如已之诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1372503_comment'></div>是用悉所为文。留秽箱笥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1372503_comment'></div>比夫格奕樗塞之戏。犹曰愈于饱食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372503_comment'></div>仆所为不又愈于格奕樗塞之戏乎。昨行巴南道中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372503_comment'></div>又有诗五十一首。文书中得七年以后所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372503_comment'></div>向二百篇。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_118_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/237/Comments/0")'>繁乱</span>冗杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372503_comment'></div>不复置之。执事前所为寄思元子者小岁云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1372503_comment'></div>为文不能自足其意。贵其起予之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1372503_comment'></div>且志京兆翁见遇之由。今亦写为古讽之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1372503_comment'></div>移诸左右。仆少时授<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_122_1372503", 1372503, "Clauses/245/Comments/0")'>吹嘘</span>之术于郑先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1372503_comment'></div>病懒不就。今在閒处思欲怡神保和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1372503_comment'></div>以求其病。异日亦不复费词于无用之文矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1372503_comment'></div>省视之烦。庶亦已于是乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1372503_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_126_1372503_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年12月</a>　至通州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年</a>　是年，回忆初至通州患病之事，有诗。作品：《瘴塞》<div id='poem_6423' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6423' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6423?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瘴塞</a><span class='authorDate'>（817年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6423")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6423_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6423'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6423'>瘴塞巴山哭鸟悲，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6423", 6423, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>红妆</span>少妇敛啼眉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6423'>殷勤奉药来相劝，云是前年欲病时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6423'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6423_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年12月</a>　年末，献诗文于李逢吉，与之唱和。作品：《酬东川李相公十六韵（并（启）》<div id='poem_6998' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6998' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6998?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬东川李相公十六韵<span class='inlineComment2'>（次用本韵，并启）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（817年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6998")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6998_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6998'>稹启：今月十二日，州吏回，伏受相公书，示知小生所献《和慈竹》等诗，关达鉴览<span class='comment'>（关达：用文书告知。鉴览：审阅。）</span>，不蒙罪退。而又赐诗一十韵，并首序一百二十三言。废名位之常数，比朋友以字之<span class='comment'>（字：用表字称呼。表字即在本名之外所取与本名意义相关之另一名字。）</span>，饰扬涓埃<span class='comment'>（饰扬：赞美称扬。涓埃：细流与微尘，比喻微不足道之渺小人物，此为元稹自谦之辞。）</span>，投掷珠玉，幸甚！幸甚！至于《庙议》末学<span class='comment'>（《庙议》：指元稹《迁庙议状》，见卷34。）</span>，《江花》陋词<span class='comment'>（《江花》：指元稹《使东川·江花落》，见卷17。）</span>，无不记在雅章，以备光宠，不胜惶骇惊惭之至。昔楚人始交，必有乘车戴笠不忘相揖之誓，诚以为贵富不相忘之难也<span class='comment'>（“昔楚”三句：《初学记》卷一八引晋周处《风土记》：“越俗性率朴，初与人交有礼，封土坛，祭以犬鸡，祝曰：‘卿虽乘车我戴笠，后日相逢下车揖；我步行，卿乘马，后日相逢卿当下。’”因指友谊深厚，不因贫富贵贱而态度改变。）</span>，况贵贱之隔不啻于车笠之相悬！而相公投贶珍重<span class='comment'>（贶：赐予，赠予。《尔雅·释诂》：“贶，赐也。”）</span>，又岂唯一揖之容易哉！稹独何人，享是嘉惠，辄复牵课拙劣<span class='comment'>（牵课拙劣：勉强写作而成之粗劣作品，为元稹自称己作之谦辞。）</span>，酬献所赐，是犹百兽与凤凰同舞于《箫韶》之中<span class='comment'>（[10]《箫韶》：见卷7《和东川李相公慈竹十二韵》注。）</span>，各极其欢心耳，又何暇自审其形容之不类哉！庆岁专人封用上献<span class='comment'>（庆岁：指元和十二年。因本年朝廷平定淮西吴元济叛乱，故云。）</span>，死罪！死罪！谨启。</div><div id='poem_preface_6998_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6998'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3697, "poem_allusion_6998")'>骇鸡宝</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6998_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6998'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6998'>昔附赤霄羽<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，葳蕤游紫垣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6998'>斗班香案上<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，奏语玉晨尊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6998'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6998", 6998, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>戆直</span>撩忌讳，科仪惩<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_6998", 6998, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>傲顽</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6998'>自从真籍除<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，弃置勿复论。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6998'>前时共游者，日夕黄金轩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6998'>请帝下巫觋<span class='inlineComment2'>（巫觋：见卷1《赛神》注。）</span>，八荒求我魂<span class='inlineComment2'>（八荒：见卷3《竞渡》注。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6998'>鸾凤屡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6998", 6998, "Clauses/12/Comments/1")'>鸣顾</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>，燕雀尚篱藩<span class='inlineComment2'>（燕雀：元稹自称之谦辞。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6998'>徒令霄汉外，往往尘念存。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6998'>存念岂虚设，并投琼与璠<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6998'>弹珠古所讶<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>，此用何太敦。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6998'>邹律寒气变<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6998", 6998, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>郑琴</span>祥景奔<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6998'>灵芝绕身出，左右光彩繁。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6998'>碾玉无俗色<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>，蕊珠非世言<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒁</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6998'>重惭前日句，陋若莸并荪<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒂</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6998'>腊月巴地雨，瘴江愁浪翻。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6998'>因持<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3697, "poem_sentence_15_6998")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_6998", 6998, "Clauses/30/Comments/1")'>骇鸡</span>宝</span>，一照浊水昏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒃</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6998'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_6998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6998'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6998_0'>⑴ 赤霄羽：大鹏之翅羽。《庄子·逍遥游》：“北冥有鱼，其名为鲲。鲲之大，不知其几千里也。化而为鸟，其名为鹏。鹏之背，不知其几千里也。怒而飞，其翼若垂天之云。是鸟也，海运则将徙于南冥。南冥者，天池也。”此藉以称美李逢吉。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6998_0'>⑵ 紫垣：即紫微垣，星官名。紫微垣有星十五颗，分两列，以北极为中枢，成藩屏状。此借指朝廷。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6998_0'>⑶ 斗班：唐制，皇帝御殿日，天将微明，宰相及两省官等斗班于香案前，俟开扇，同时赞拜。朝班分左右侍立，合时称斗班。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6998_0'>⑷ 玉晨：道观名，在大明宫紫宸殿后。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6998_0'>⑸ 科仪：犹科式。此处指用相应律条加以惩处。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6998_0'>⑹ 真籍除：指被贬为地方官江陵士曹参军。真籍，本指仙人或仙家之花名册，此借指朝籍，即在朝官员之花名册。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6998_0'>⑺ 黄金轩：犹黄阁。汉卫宏《汉旧仪》卷上：“丞相车黑两幡……听事阁曰黄阁，无钟铃。”《宋书·礼志二》（卷一五）：“三公黄阁，前史无其义。史臣按……夫朱门洞启，当阳之正色也。三公之与天子，礼秩相亚，故黄其阁，以示谦不敢斥天子，盖是汉来制也。”此泛指高官显宦。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6998_0'>⑻ 鸾凤：鸾鸟与凤凰，吉祥之鸟，此借美李逢吉。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6998_0'>⑼ 琼与璠：琼，赤色玉，一说美玉。《说文·玉部》：“琼，赤玉也。”王筠句读：“赤当依《诗传》作美。”璠，宝玉。《说文·玉部》：“璠，玙璠，鲁之宝玉也。”此处借美李逢吉之诗文。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6998_0'>⑽ 弹珠：《庄子·让王》：“今且有人于此以隋侯之珠，弹千仞之雀，世必笑之，是何也？则其所用者重，而所要者轻也。”比喻轻重倒置，得不偿失。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6998_0'>⑾ “邹律”句：相传战国齐人邹衍，精于音律，吹律能使地暖而禾黍滋生。《列子·汤问》：“微矣子之殚也！虽师旷之清角，邹衍之吹律，亡以加之。”张湛注：“北方有地，美而寒，不生五谷。邹子吹律暖之，而禾黍滋生也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6998_0'>⑿ “郑琴”句：《列子·汤问》载，郑国乐师师文琴技高超，“当春而叩商弦，以召南吕，凉风忽至，草木成实；及秋而叩角弦，以激夹钟，温风徐回，草木发荣；当夏而叩羽弦，以召黄钟，霜雪交下，川池暴冱；及冬而叩徵弦，以激蕤宾，阳光炽烈，坚冰立散；将终命宫而总四弦，则景凤翔，庆云浮，甘露降，沣（醴）泉涌。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6998_0'>⒀ 碾玉：经磨治之玉。碾，车磨玉石。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_6998_0'>⒁ 蕊珠：指《蕊珠经》，道教经籍名。唐鲍溶《寄峨嵋山杨炼师》：“道士夜诵《蕊珠经》，白鹤下绕香烟听。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6998_0'>⒂ 莸并荪：臭草与香草。莸，参卷2《阳城驿》注。荪，香草名。《说文新附·草部》：“荪，香草也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6998_0'>⒃ “因持”二句：《抱朴子》内篇卷四《登涉》：“又通天犀角，有一赤理如綖，自本彻末，以角盛米置群鸡中，鸡欲啄之，未至数寸，即惊却退，故南人或名通天犀为骇鸡犀。以此犀角著谷积上，百鸟不敢集；大雾重露之夜，以置中庭，终不沾濡也。此犀兽在深山中，晦冥之夕，其光正赫然如炬火也。”《埤雅》卷三《犀》：“骇鸡，盖犀之美者，有光，故鸡见影而惊。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6998_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年</a>　是年，次韵酬和李逢吉，李逢吉原唱已亡佚。作品：《和东川李相公慈竹十二韵》<div id='poem_6851' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6851' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6851?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和东川李相公慈竹十二韵<span class='inlineComment2'>（次本韵）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（817年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6851")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6851_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6851'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6851'>慈竹不外长，密比青<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6851", 6851, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>瑶华</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6851'>矛攒有森束，玉立<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作粒）</span>无蹉跎<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6851'>纤粉妍腻质，细琼交翠柯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6851'>亭亭霄汉近，霭霭雨露多。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6851'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_6851", 6851, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>冰碧</span>寒夜耸，箫韶风昼罗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6851'>烟含胧胧影<span class='inlineComment2'>（含：蜀本、英华作“涵”。）</span>，月泛鳞鳞<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作鲜鲜）</span>波。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6851'>鸾凤一已顾<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，燕雀永不过。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6851'>幽姿媚庭实，颢气爽<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作陵）</span>天涯<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6851'>峻节高转露，贞筠寒更佳。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6851'>托身仙坛上<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，灵物神所呵。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6851'>时与天籁合<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，日闻阳春歌<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6851'>应怜孤生者，摧折成病<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作沈，一作卧）</span>痾。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6851'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_6851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6851'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6851_0'>⑴ 瑶华：美玉。晋葛洪《抱朴子·勖学》：“故瑶华不琢，则耀夜之景不发。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6851_1'>⑵ 立：原作“粒”，据蜀本、杨本、董本、英华、全诗一作改。蹉跎：跌倒，倒伏。《楚辞·王褒〈九怀·株昭〉》：“骥垂两耳兮，中阪蹉跎。”洪兴祖补注：“蹉跎，失足。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_6851_0'>⑶ 《箫韶》：舜乐名。《尚书·虞书·益稷》：“《箫韶》九成，凤凰来仪。”孔传：“《韶》，舜乐名。言‘箫’见细器之备。”孔颖达疏：“箫是乐器之小者，‘言箫见细器之备’，谓作乐之时，小大之器皆备也。”此处形容风吹过竹丛所发出美妙之声响。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_6851_0'>⑷ “鸾凤”句：《庄子·秋水》：“夫鹓雏，发于南海而飞于北海，非梧桐不止，非练实不食，非醴泉不饮。”成玄英疏：“练实，竹实也。”《庄子·秋水》：“鹓雏，鸾凤之属，亦言凤子也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_6851_1'>⑸ 颢气：秋天之气。《吕氏春秋·有始》：“西方曰颢天。”爽：卢本、钱校、英华、钱校、全诗一作“陵”，季本一作“凌”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6851_0'>⑹ “托身”句：《穆天子传》卷二：“庚戌，天子西征，至于玄池。天子三日休于玄池之上，乃奏广乐，三日而终，是曰乐池。天子乃树之竹，是曰竹林。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6851_0'>⑺ （音閤）。（天籁：自然界天然之声响。《庄子·齐物论》：“女闻地籁而未闻天籁夫？”疏：“籁，箫也。……夫箫管参差，所受各足，况之风物，咸禀自然。”合：蜀本、卢本、杨本、全诗、英华下有小注“音閤”）</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6851_0'>⑻ 《阳春歌》：战国宋玉《对襄王问》：“客有歌于郢中者，其始曰《下俚巴人》，国中属而和者数千人……其为《阳春白雪》，国中属而和者不过数十人……是其曲弥高，其和弥寡。”郢，春秋战国时楚国之都城。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6851_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年12月</a>　杨巨源寄诗元稹、白居易，预祝元、白明年大赦时脱离谪籍。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年</a>　是年，作《通州》诗，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6341' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6341' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6341?labeling=true' target='_blank'>通州</a><span class='authorDate'>（817年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6341")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6341_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6341'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6341'>平生欲得山中住，天与通州绕郡山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6341'>睡到日西无一事，月储三万买教闲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6341'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6341_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　春，元稹致书裴度，希望得以任用。作品：《上门下裴相公书》<div id='poem_1372506' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372506' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372506?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上门下裴相公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372506")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372506_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372506'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372506'>通州司马元稹谨再拜献书相公阁下。昔者相公之掾洛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372506_comment'></div>稹获陪侍道途。不以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>妄庸</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372506_comment'></div>咨及章启。则固窃闻阁下以文皇敕起居郎书居安思危四字于笏上为至戒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372506_comment'></div>今陛下当晋武平吴之后。阁下即周公东征而还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372506_comment'></div>安孰甚焉。思岂可废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372506_comment'></div>况今四邸并开。扫门之宾竞至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372506_comment'></div>碣石馀沴。束身之款未坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372506_comment'></div>则阁下推食握发之意。何遽移之于高枕击钟之逸乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372506_comment'></div>且夫得人则理之谈。实老生之常语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372506_comment'></div>至于切近。犹饥者欲食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372506_comment'></div>不可恶熟俗而不言也。若稹之末学浅见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372506_comment'></div>又安敢引喻古昔于阁下。独忆得近日故裴兵部之为人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372506_comment'></div>甄辨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>清净</span>。号为名流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372506_comment'></div>及其为相也。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>构致</span>群材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372506_comment'></div>栋梁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>榱桷</span>。咸适其用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372506_comment'></div>人颇隘之。至于激浊扬清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372506_comment'></div>亦无所爱吝。是以秉政不累月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372506_comment'></div>阁下自外僚为起居郎。韦相自巴州知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372506_comment'></div>张河南自邕幕为御史。李西川自饶州为杂端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372506_comment'></div>密勿津梁之地。半得其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372506_comment'></div>如故韦简州勋及稹等。拔于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>疑碍</span>置之朝行者又十数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372506_comment'></div>然后排异已之巨敌。引协心之至交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372506_comment'></div>当时一二年间。几至于奸无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>蹊隧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372506_comment'></div>而政有根本矣。及山东沴作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372506_comment'></div>上以兵事咨之。则对以禁暴息人之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372506_comment'></div>不能有以佐震耀。是以樽俎之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372506_comment'></div>不专于廊庙。盖廉善精微之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372506_comment'></div>素熟于心胸。而泛驾乘桴之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372506_comment'></div>未尝校量于左右也。比于阁下今日之雄材大略为短矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372506_comment'></div>然而即世之后。虽无李严廖立之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372506_comment'></div>而十载之内。备将相号名卿者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372506_comment'></div>多其引拔。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372506_comment'></div>方鲍叔之功。斯不细矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372506_comment'></div>昨者阁下方事淮蔡。独当炉锤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372506_comment'></div>内蕴深谋。外排群议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372506_comment'></div>始以追韩信拔吕蒙为急务。固非叔孙通荐儒之日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372506_comment'></div>今殊勋既建。王化方行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372506_comment'></div>亦常念魏郑公守成之难。而三复文皇帝思危之诏乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372506_comment'></div>以愚揆之。欲人之不怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372506_comment'></div>莫若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>迁授</span>之有常。欲人之竭诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372506_comment'></div>莫若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>援拯</span>于焚溺。何谓有常而不怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372506_comment'></div>以省言之。由后行为前行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372506_comment'></div>以台言之。自察院转殿院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372506_comment'></div>苟不如是则怨矣。苟能如是何怨哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372506_comment'></div>何谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>援拯</span>而竭诚。某又不敢移之于他人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372506_comment'></div>借如小生之庸且昧也。固不及班行之中辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372506_comment'></div>又敢自让于郎吏之末者乎。向使元和中一年为拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372506_comment'></div>二年为补阙。不三四年为员外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372506_comment'></div>又三四年为正郎。则宰物者虽朝许之以纶诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372506_comment'></div>暮许之以专席。厚则厚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372506_comment'></div>遽责其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>隳肝沥胆</span>。同厮养之用力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372506_comment'></div>亦难哉。及夫为计不良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372506_comment'></div>困于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>沟渎</span>者十年矣。苟有舒其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>胝挛</span>置之趋走者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372506_comment'></div>又安敢爱气力吝心髓于和扁耶。是犹龟鼍之有泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372506_comment'></div>乌鸟之有林。何尝愧于水木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372506_comment'></div>苟或絷而笼之。锁而槛之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372506_comment'></div>其或放之投之者。则必啁啾顾慕以报之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372506_comment'></div>报其免于难也。今天下病<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>沟渎</span>困笼槛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372506_comment'></div>思阁下药之养之投之放之者。岂特小生而已哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372506_comment'></div>且曩时之窒阁下及小生者。岂不以阁下疏有居安思危之字为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>抵忌</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372506_comment'></div>对上以河南县尉非贬官为说乎。向非裴兵部一二明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372506_comment'></div>则某终老于穷贱。固其宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372506_comment'></div>傥阁下复三二年迟回于外任。则少阳邀望之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372506_comment'></div>固未得奉煌煌之命。以周知其巢穴矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372506_comment'></div>当元济讨除之始。又安能定已成之策于上前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372506_comment'></div>排未亡之疑于众口哉。今天下能不有万一于阁下之才略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372506_comment'></div>而犹跼足帖胁。私自怜爱其志力哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372506_comment'></div>况当今陛下在宥四海。与人为天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372506_comment'></div>特降<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>含垢弃瑕</span>之书。且授随才任能之柄于阁下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372506_comment'></div>阁下若能荡涤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/138/Comments/0")'>痕累</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_69_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>洞开</span>嫌疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372506_comment'></div>弃仇如振尘。爱士如救馁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372506_comment'></div>使恃才薄行者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>自赎</span>于烦辱。以能见忌者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1372506", 1372506, "Clauses/143/Comments/0")'>骋力</span>于通衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372506_comment'></div>上以副陛下咸与惟新之怀。次以广阁下好善救人之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372506_comment'></div>使千百年外。谓阁下与裴兵部为交相短长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372506_comment'></div>亦足为贤相矣。未尽善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372506_comment'></div>且夫当陛下肇临宇宙之初。与得天久照之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372506_comment'></div>愈光明矣。安有裴兵部拔群才于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372506_comment'></div>则尽行。阁下拔群才于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372506_comment'></div>则尽废。以阁下沐浴恩波之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372506_comment'></div>与徽猷克壮之秋。愈汪洋矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372506_comment'></div>又安有救裴寰之罪。换禹锡之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372506_comment'></div>则尽易。振天下之穷滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372506_comment'></div>行涣汗之条目。则尽难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372506_comment'></div>某虽至愚。未敢然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372506_comment'></div>某自十年遭罹多故。每欲发书朋旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372506_comment'></div>尚不敢尽陈其情。岂不知干宰相有不测之罪耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372506_comment'></div>熟自计之。与其瘴死蛮夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372506_comment'></div>自题不遇之榜。比夫尘秽尊重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372506_comment'></div>伏危言之。刑无异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372506_comment'></div>聊因所善。缄献鄙诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372506_comment'></div>翘企刑书。不敢逃让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372506_comment'></div>不宣。稹顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372506_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_92_1372506_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　春，崔绍派人自果州带来白居易之诗与信。追和白《东南行一百韵寄通州元九侍御澧州李十一舍人果州崔二十二使君开州韦大员外庾三十二补阙杜十四拾遗李二十助教员外窦七校书》诗，托李景信寄白氏。作品：《酬乐天东南行诗一百韵并序》<div id='poem_6723' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6723' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6723?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬乐天东南行诗一百韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6723")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6723_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6723'>元和十年三月二十五日，予司马通州。二十九日，与乐天于鄠东蒲池村别，各赋一绝。到通州后，予又寄一篇。寻而乐天贶予八首，予时疟病将死，一见外不复记忆。十三年，予以赦当迁，简省书籍，得是八篇。吟叹方极，适崔果州使至，为予致乐天去年十二月二日书，书中寄予百韵至两韵凡二十四章，属李景信校书自忠州访予，连床递饮之间，悲吒使酒，不三两日，尽和去年已来三十二章皆毕，李生视草而去。四月十三日，予手写为上下卷，仍依次重用本韵，亦不知何时得见乐天，因人或寄去，通之人莫可与言诗者，唯妻淑在旁知状。（案：其本卷寻时于峡州面付乐天，别本都在唱和卷中，此卷唯五言大律诗二首而已。）</div><div id='poem_preface_6723_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6723'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3702, "poem_allusion_6723")'>寿陵失步</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9425, "poem_allusion_6723")'>朽株</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6723_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6723'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6723'>我病方吟越，君行已过湖<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6723'>去应缘直道，哭不为穷途。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6723'>亚竹寒惊牖，空堂夜向隅。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6723'>暗魂思背烛，危梦怯乘桴<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6723'>坐痛筋骸憯，旁嗟物候殊。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6723'>雨蒸虫沸渭，浪涌怪睢盱。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6723'>索绠飘蚊蚋，蓬麻甃舳舻。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6723'>短檐苫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6723", 6723, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>稻草</span>，微俸封<span class='inlineComment2'>（去声）</span>渔租。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6723'>泥<span class='inlineComment2'>（去声）</span>浦喧捞蛤，荒郊险斗䝙。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6723'>鲸吞近溟涨，猿闹接<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6723", 6723, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>黔巫</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6723'>芒屩泅牛妇，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6723", 6723, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>丫头</span>荡桨夫。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6723'>酢醅荷裹卖，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_6723", 6723, "Clauses/23/Comments/1")'>醨酒</span>水淋沽<span class='inlineComment2'>（巴民造酒如淋醋法）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6723'>舞态翻鸲鹆，歌词咽鹧鸪。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6723'>夷音啼似笑，蛮语谜相呼。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6723'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_6723", 6723, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>江郭</span>船添店，山城木竖郛。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6723'>吠声沙市犬，争食墓林乌。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6723'>犷俗诚堪惮，妖神甚可虞。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6723'>欲令仁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_6723", 6723, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>渐及</span>，已被疟潜图。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6723'>膳减思调鼎，行稀恐蠹枢。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6723'>杂莼多剖鳝，和黍半蒸菰。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6723'>绿粽新菱实，金丸小<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_6723", 6723, "Clauses/41/Comments/1")'>木奴</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（巴橘酸涩，大如弹丸）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6723'>芋羹真暂淡，䶉炙漫涂苏。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6723'>炰鳖那胜羜，烹鯄只似鲈<span class='inlineComment2'>（通州俗以鯄鱼为鲙）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6723'>楚风轻似蜀，巴地湿如吴。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6723'>气浊星难见，州斜日易晡。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6723'>通宵但云雾，未酉即桑榆<span class='inlineComment2'>（此后并言巴中风俗）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6723'>瘴窟蛇休蛰，炎溪暑不徂。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6723'>伥魂阴<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_6723", 6723, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>叫啸</span>，鵩貌昼踟蹰。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6723'>乡里家藏蛊，官曹世乏儒。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6723'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_6723", 6723, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>敛缗</span>偷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_6723", 6723, "Clauses/58/Comments/1")'>印信</span>，传箭作符繻。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6723'>椎髻抛巾帼，镩刀代辘轳。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6723'>当心鞙铜鼓，背弝射桑弧<span class='inlineComment2'>（巴民尽射木弓，仍于弓左安箭）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6723'>岂复民氓料，须将鸟兽驱。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6723'>是非浑并漆，词讼敢研朱。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6723'>陋室鸮窥伺，衰形蟒觊觎。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6723'>鬓毛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_6723", 6723, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>霜点</span>合，襟泪血痕濡。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6723'>倍忆京华伴，偏忘我尔躯<span class='inlineComment2'>（此后并言与乐天同科、共游处等事）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6723'>谪居今共远，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_6723", 6723, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>荣路</span>昔同趋。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6723'>科试铨衡局，衙参典校厨<span class='inlineComment2'>（书判同年，校正司省）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_38_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6723'>月中分桂树，天上识昌蒲。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6723'>应召逢鸿泽，陪游值赐酺。<div id='poem_sentence_40_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_6723'>心唯撞卫磬，耳不乱齐竽<span class='inlineComment2'>（此后并言同应制时事）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_41_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_6723'>海岱词锋截，皇王笔阵驱。<div id='poem_sentence_42_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_6723'>疾奔凌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_6723", 6723, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>騕袅</span>，高唱轧吴歈。<div id='poem_sentence_43_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_6723'>点检张仪舌，提携傅说图。<div id='poem_sentence_44_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_6723'>摆囊看<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_6723", 6723, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>利颖</span>，开颔出明珠。<div id='poem_sentence_45_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_6723'>并取千人特，皆非十上徒。<div id='poem_sentence_46_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_6723'>白麻云色腻，墨诏电光粗。<div id='poem_sentence_47_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_6723'>众口贪归美，何颜敢妒姝。<div id='poem_sentence_48_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_6723'>秦台纳红旭，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_6723", 6723, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>酆匣</span>洗黄垆。<div id='poem_sentence_49_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_6723'>谏猎宁规避，弹豪讵嗫嚅。<div id='poem_sentence_50_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_6723'>肺肝憎巧曲，蹊径绝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_6723", 6723, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>萦迂</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_51_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_6723'>誓遣朝纲振，忠饶翰苑输<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_52_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_6723'>骥调方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_6723", 6723, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>汗血</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_6723", 6723, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>蝇点</span>忽成卢。<div id='poem_sentence_53_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_6723'>遂谪栖遑掾，还飞送别盂。<div id='poem_sentence_54_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_6723'>痛嗟亲爱隔，颠望友朋扶。<div id='poem_sentence_55_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_6723'>狸病翻随鼠，骢羸返作驹。<div id='poem_sentence_56_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_6723'>物情良<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_6723", 6723, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>徇俗</span>，时论太诬吾。<div id='poem_sentence_57_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_6723'>瓶罄罍偏耻，松摧柏自枯。<div id='poem_sentence_58_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_6723'>虎虽遭陷阱，龙不怕泥涂<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_59_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_60_6723'>重喜登贤苑，方欣佐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_6723", 6723, "Clauses/121/Comments/1")'>伍符</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_60_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_61_6723'>判身入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_6723", 6723, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>矛戟</span>，轻敌比锱铢。<div id='poem_sentence_61_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_6723'>驿骑来千里，天书下九衢。<div id='poem_sentence_62_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_6723'>因教罢飞檄，便许到皇都<span class='inlineComment2'>（十年春，自唐州诏予召入京）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_63_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_64_6723'>舟败罂浮汉，骖疲杖过邘。<div id='poem_sentence_64_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_65_6723'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_6723", 6723, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>邮亭</span>一萧索，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_6723", 6723, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>烽候</span>各崎岖。<div id='poem_sentence_65_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_66_6723'>馈饷人推辂，谁何吏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_6723", 6723,
