"Clauses/135/Comments/1")'>连锁</span>责<span class='inlineComment2'>（音债）</span>逋诛。<div id='poem_sentence_67_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_68_6723'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_6723", 6723, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>防戍</span>兄兼弟，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_6723", 6723, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>收田</span>妇与姑。<div id='poem_sentence_68_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_69_6723'>缣缃工女竭，青紫使臣纡。<div id='poem_sentence_69_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_70_6723'>望国参云树，归家满地芜。<div id='poem_sentence_70_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_6723'>破窗尘𡋯𡋯，幽院鸟呜呜<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_71_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_72_6723'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_6723", 6723, "Clauses/144/Comments/0")'>祖竹</span>丛新笋，孙枝压旧梧。<div id='poem_sentence_72_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_73_6723'>晚花狂蛱蝶，残蒂宿茱萸。<div id='poem_sentence_73_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_74_6723'>始悟摧<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_6723", 6723, "Clauses/148/Comments/0")'>林秀</span>，因衔避缴芦。<div id='poem_sentence_74_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_75_6723'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_6723", 6723, "Clauses/150/Comments/0")'>文房</span>长遣闭，经肆未曾铺。<div id='poem_sentence_75_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_76_6723'>鹓鹭方求侣，鸱鸢已吓雏。<div id='poem_sentence_76_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_77_6723'>徵还何郑重，斥去亦须臾。<div id='poem_sentence_77_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_78_6723'>迢递投<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_6723", 6723, "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>遐徼</span>，苍黄出奥区。<div id='poem_sentence_78_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_79_6723'>通川诚有咎，湓口定无辜<span class='inlineComment2'>（三月稹之通州，八月乐天之江州）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_79_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_80_6723'>利器从头匣，刚肠<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_6723", 6723, "Clauses/161/Comments/0")'>到底</span>刳。<div id='poem_sentence_80_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_81_6723'>薰莸任<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_6723", 6723, "Clauses/162/Comments/0")'>盛贮</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_6723", 6723, "Clauses/163/Comments/0")'>稊稗</span>莫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_6723", 6723, "Clauses/163/Comments/1")'>超踰</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_81_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_82_6723'>公干经时卧，钟仪几岁拘。<div id='poem_sentence_82_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_83_6723'>光阴流似水，蒸瘴热于炉。<div id='poem_sentence_83_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_84_6723'>薄命知然也，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_6723", 6723, inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_86_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_87_6723'>李多嘲蝘蜓，窦数集蜘蛛<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_6723", 6723, "Clauses/183/Comments/0")'>嗟吁</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_91_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_93_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_94_6723'>近喜司戎健，寻伤掌诰徂<span class='inlineComment2'>（今日得乐天书，六年闻席八殁）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_94_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_95_6723'>士元名位屈，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_95_6723", 6723, id='poem_sentence_98_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_99_6723'>此篇应绝倒，休漫捋髭须<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_99_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_100_6723'></div><div id='poem_sentence_100_6723_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6723'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6723_0'>⑴ 元和十年闰六月至通州，染瘴危重，八月，闻乐天司马江州</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6723_0'>⑵ 此后每联之内，半述巴蜀土风，半述江乡物产</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_52_6723_0'>⑶ 元和四年为监察御史，乐天为翰林学士</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_59_6723_0'>⑷ 此已上并述五年贬掾江陵，乐天亦遭罹谤铄</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_60_6723_0'>⑸ 九年，乐天除太子赞善，予从事唐州也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_71_6723_0'>⑹ 此已下并言靖安里无人居，触目荒凉</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_85_6723_0'>⑺ 本题云：寄澧州李十一舍人、果州崔二十二员外、开州韦大员外、通州元九侍御、庾三十二补阙、杜十四拾遗、李二十助教、窦七校书，兼投吊席八舍人</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_86_6723_0'>⑻ 庾三十二、杜十四并居北省，李十一、崔二十二、韦大各典方州</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_87_6723_0'>⑼ 李二十雅善歌诗，固多咏物之作，窦七频改官衔，屡有蜘蛛之喜</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_99_6723_0'>⑽ 乐天戏题篇末云：此篇拟打足下寄容州诗，故有戏誉</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6723_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_3_1372535_comment'></div>以报于三阳神之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372535_comment'></div>越九月始践朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372535_comment'></div>霖雨既旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372533_comment'></div>无复芬苾。豺虎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372533", 1372533, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>号噪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372533_comment'></div>麋鹿幽噎。厉鬼瘅人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372533_comment'></div>贪吏殄物。阛阓邱墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372533_comment'></div>门户蒿荜。神又何情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372533_comment'></div>受人祈乞。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372533_comment'></div>罔天轴地。罗星走日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372533_comment'></div>水火炎润。原隰生出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372533_comment'></div>古不独加。今不独屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372533_comment'></div>化由人兴。胡不为率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372533_comment'></div>我贰兹邑。星岁三卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372533_comment'></div>熟视民病。饱闻政失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372533_comment'></div>自丧守后。月环其七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372533_comment'></div>弊深力薄。未暇纤悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372533_comment'></div>都卢虚持。先后排比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372533_comment'></div>附防风俗。简用纪律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372533_comment'></div>功不甚农。虚不胜实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372533_comment'></div>乃劝州人。大课芟铚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372533_comment'></div>人人自利。若受<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1372533", 1372533, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>鞭抶</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372533_comment'></div>旋六十里。功旬半毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372533_comment'></div>呜呼。教则人功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372533_comment'></div>理有阴骘。农劝事时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372533_comment'></div>赏信罚必。市无欺夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372533_comment'></div>吏不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1372533", 1372533, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>侵轶</span>。非神敢烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372533_comment'></div>在我有术。雷蛰雨枯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372533_comment'></div>蒸顽曝郁。□导百来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372533_comment'></div>呵厉四逸。非我敢知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372533_comment'></div>有神之吉。惟我惟神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372533_comment'></div>各恤其恤。神永是邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372533_comment'></div>我非常秩。继我者谁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372533_comment'></div>为神斯慄。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372533_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1372533_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1372534' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372534' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372534?labeling=true' target='_blank'>告畬竹山神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372534'>稹闻天好平施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372534_comment'></div>而特累山岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372534_comment'></div>许其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372534", 1372534, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>嵩崇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372534_comment'></div>圣王亦视之公侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372534_comment'></div>不惜牲币。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372534_comment'></div>盖以其镇定区宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372534_comment'></div>舒贮风云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372534_comment'></div>毓栎栌栋础。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372534_comment'></div>洎百谷万货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372534_comment'></div>以资养于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372534_comment'></div>至于蒙翳荟罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372534_comment'></div>恶木穴窟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372534_comment'></div>虺蜥虎豺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372534_comment'></div>迎碍吞噬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372534_comment'></div>以遂其高傲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372534", 1372534, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>坚顽</span>之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372534_comment'></div>非天意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372534_comment'></div>按通之载号神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372534_comment'></div>为名山川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372534_comment'></div>且迩邑屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372534_comment'></div>而扶道途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372534_comment'></div>然而不砟不穫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372534_comment'></div>不础不柱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372534_comment'></div>丛集䝙蟒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372534_comment'></div>蔽弊道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372534_comment'></div>将五十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372534_comment'></div>实人力之不足于山也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372534_comment'></div>非神之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372534_comment'></div>今天子斩三叛之明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372534_comment'></div>通民毕赋用其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372534_comment'></div>馀夹津而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372534_comment'></div>开山三十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372534_comment'></div>为来年<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1372534", 1372534, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>农种</span>张本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372534_comment'></div>自十月季旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372534_comment'></div>周甲癸而功半就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372534_comment'></div>郡司马元稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372534_comment'></div>率属攸置酒肴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372534_comment'></div>以告于神曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372534_comment'></div>通之邑居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372534_comment'></div>才二百室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372534_comment'></div>一旦为神剪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1372534", 1372534, id='poem_sentence_41_1372534_comment'></div>亦足为用力于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372534_comment'></div>神其戒哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372534_comment'></div>敬用嘉祝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372534_comment'></div>祝曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372534_comment'></div>为山输力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372534_comment'></div>风雨不式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372534_comment'></div>豭麋不比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372534_comment'></div>俾民无得。<div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6280'>伤心最是江头月，莫把书将上庾楼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6280'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6280_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　是年，胡灵之患病，元稹感伤之，有诗。作品：《三兄以白角巾寄遗发不胜冠因有感叹》<div id='poem_6435' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6435' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6435?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三兄以白角巾寄遗发不胜冠因有感叹</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6435")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6435_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6435'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6435'>病瘴年深浑秃尽，那能胜置<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6435", 6435, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>角头巾</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6435'>暗梳蓬发羞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6435", 6435, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>临镜</span>，私戴莲花耻见人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6435'>白发过于冠色白，银钉少校颔中银。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6435'>我身四十犹如此，何况吾兄六十身。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6435_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6435'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6435_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　元和十二年十月至十三年七月间作《连昌宫词》，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6847' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6847' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6847?labeling=true' target='_blank'>连昌宫词</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_19_6847'>庄园烧尽有枯井，行宫门闭<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作闼）</span>树宛然。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6847'>尔后相传六皇帝<span class='inlineComment2'>（肃、代、德、顺、宪、穆）</span>，不到离宫门久闭。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6847'>尘埋粉壁旧花钿，乌<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作鸟）</span>啄风筝碎珠玉。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6847'>上皇偏爱临砌花，依然御榻临阶斜。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6847'>蛇出燕巢盘斗栱，菌生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_6847", 6847, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>香案</span>正当衙。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6847'>寝殿相连端正楼，太真梳洗楼上头。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6847'>晨光未出帘影黑<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作动）</span>，至今反挂珊瑚钩。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6847'>指似<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作向）</span>傍人因恸哭，却出<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作立）</span>宫门泪相续。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6847'>自从此后还闭门，夜夜狐狸上门屋。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6847'>我闻此语<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_6847", 6847, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>心骨</span>悲，太平谁致乱者谁。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6847'>翁言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_6847", 6847, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>野父</span>何分别，耳闻眼见为君说。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6847'>姚崇宋璟作相公，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_6847", 6847, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>劝谏</span>上皇言语切。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6847'>燮理阴阳禾黍丰，调和中外无兵戎。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6847'>长官<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_6847", 6847, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>清平</span>太守好，拣选皆言由相<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作至）</span>公。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6847'>开元之末姚宋死，朝廷渐渐由妃子。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6847'>禄山宫里养作<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作为）</span>儿，虢国门前闹如市。<div id='poem_sentence_38_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_6847'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_6847", 6847, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>弄权</span>宰相不记名，依稀忆得<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作忆得依稀）</span>杨与李。<div id='poem_sentence_39_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_6847'>庙谟<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作谋）</span>颠倒四海摇，五十年来作<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_6847", 6847, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>疮痏</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_40_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_6847'>今皇神圣丞相明，诏书才下吴蜀平。<div id='poem_sentence_41_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_6847'>官军又取淮西贼，此贼亦除天下宁。<div id='poem_sentence_42_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_6847'>年年耕种宫前道，今年不遣子孙耕。<div id='poem_sentence_43_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_6847'>老翁此意深望幸，努力庙谋<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作谟）</span>休用兵。<div id='poem_sentence_44_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_6847'></div><div id='poem_sentence_45_6847_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6847'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6847_0'>⑴ 念奴，天宝中名倡，善歌。每岁楼下酺宴，累日之后，万众喧隘，严安之、韦黄裳辈辟易不能禁，众乐为之罢奏。明皇遣高力士大呼于楼上曰：“欲遣念奴唱歌，邠二十五郎吹小管逐，看人能听否。”未尝不悄然奉诏，其为当时所重也如此。然而明皇不欲夺侠游之盛，未尝置在宫禁。或岁幸汤泉，时巡东洛，有司潜遣从行而已。又明皇尝于上阳宫夜后按新翻一曲，属明夕正月十五日，潜游灯下，忽闻酒楼上有笛奏前夕新曲，大骇之。明日密遣捕捉笛者，诘验之，自云：“其夕窃于天津桥玩月，闻宫中度曲，遂于桥柱上插谱记之，臣即长安少年善笛者李谟也。”明皇异而遣之</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6847_0'>⑵ 贵妃三姊，帝呼为姨，封韩、虢、秦国三夫人</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6847_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_6847'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(6847)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　是年，次韵酬和白居易《梦亡友刘太白同游章敬寺》一诗。作品：《和乐天梦亡友刘太白同游二首》<div id='poem_6285' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6285' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6285?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和乐天梦亡友刘太白同游二首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6285")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6285_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_6285_0'>① 元和十三年作于通州，时为通州司马。白居易原唱为《梦亡友刘太白同游章敬寺》，次韵唱和。白诗云：“十五年前哭老刘”，刘卒于贞元二十年，故当元和十三年作。刘太白：指刘敦质，参本卷《和乐天刘家花》注。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6285'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6285'>君诗昨日到通州，万里知君一梦刘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6285'>闲坐思量小来事，秪应元<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>是梦中游。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6285'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6285_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6285'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6285_0'>⑴ 秖：同“祇”，仅。元：本来，原来，后作原。清顾炎武《日知录》卷三二：“元者，本也。本官曰元官，本籍曰元籍，本来曰元来。唐宋人多此语，后人以‘原’字代之。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6285_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6286' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6286' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6286?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6286_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6286'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6286'>老来东郡复西州<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，行处生尘为丧刘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6286_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6286'>纵使刘君魂魄在，也应至死不同游。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6286_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6286'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6286_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6286'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6286_0'>⑴ 东郡：指江州，白居易元和十年被贬此处。西州：指通州，元稹元和十年被贬此处。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6286_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　是年，次韵酬和白居易《忆微之伤仲远》一诗。作品：《酬乐天见忆兼伤仲远》<div id='poem_6722' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6722' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6722?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬乐天见忆兼伤仲远</a><span class='authorDate'>（818年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6722")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6722_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6722'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6722'>死别重泉閟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，生离万里赊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6722'>瘴侵新病骨，梦到故人家。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6722'>遥泪陈根草<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，闲收落地花。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6722'>庾公楼怅望<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，巴子国生涯<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6722'>河任天然曲，江随峡势斜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6722'>与君皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_6722", 6722, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>直戆</span>，须分老泥<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作长）</span>沙。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6722'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_6722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6722'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6722_0'>⑴ 重泉：犹九泉，旧指死者所归之处。閟：关闭，闭门。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6722_0'>⑵ 赊：遥远。《正字通·贝部》：“赊，俗从佘，作赊。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6722_0'>⑶ 陈根草：逾年之宿草。《礼记·檀弓上》：“曾子曰：‘朋友之墓，有宿草而不哭焉。’”汉郑玄注：“宿草，谓陈根也。”此反其意而用之。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6722_0'>⑷ 庾公楼：在今江西省九江市北江滨，相传乃晋庾亮镇守江州时所建。宋陆游《入蜀记》卷二：“（庾楼）正对庐山之双剑峰，北临大江，气象雄丽。……庾亮尝为江荆、豫州刺史，其实则治武昌。若武昌南楼名庾楼，犹有理，今江州治所在晋特柴桑县之湓口关耳，此楼附会甚明。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_6722_0'>⑸ 巴子国：即古代巴国，在今四川东部与重庆地区。《左传·桓公九年》：“巴子使韩服告于楚。”晋杜预注：“巴国，在巴郡江州县。”晋常璩《华阳国志·巴志》：“武王既克殷，以其宗姬封于巴，爵之以子。古者远国虽大，爵不过子，故吴、楚及巴皆曰子。其地东至鱼复，西至僰道，北接汉中，南极黔涪。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6722_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　是年，收到白居易书信，有诗。作品：《得乐天书》<div id='poem_6356' class='_poem'><div id='poem_content_6219'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6219'>庭中栽得红荆树，十月花开不待春。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6219_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　本年，在通州南方建戛云亭。与韦处厚唱和。贬官通州期间，作诗数百首。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年12月</a>　元稹移虢州长史，白居易移忠州刺史。<br /></div>
-----end

"Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>轻沤</span>风复惊，偶来何事去何情。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6330_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6330'>浮生未到无生地，暂到人间又一生。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年9月</a>　元秬以疾去职，九月，卒于虢州，年六十七，元稹作墓志铭。时夫人崔氏已卒，长子易简为荥阳尉，次子从简为曲沃尉，次子行简为太乐丞，幼子弘简未仕。作品：《唐故朝议郎侍御史内拱奉盐铁转运河阴留后河南元君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1372527' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372527' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372527?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故朝议郎侍御史内供奉盐铁转运河阴留后河南元君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372527")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372527_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372527'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372527'>有魏昭成皇帝十一代而生我隋朝兵部尚书府君讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372527_comment'></div>后五代而生我比部郎中舒王府长史府君讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372527_comment'></div>君即府君之第二子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372527_comment'></div>讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372527_comment'></div>字元度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372527_comment'></div>娶清河崔邻女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372527_comment'></div>生四子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372527_comment'></div>长曰易简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372527_comment'></div>荥阳尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372527_comment'></div>次从简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372527_comment'></div>曲沃尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372527_comment'></div>次行简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372527_comment'></div>太乐丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372527_comment'></div>幼宏简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372527_comment'></div>长女适刘中孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372527_comment'></div>中孚早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372527_comment'></div>次婴疾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>室居</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372527_comment'></div>次适苏京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372527_comment'></div>举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372527_comment'></div>次适李殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372527_comment'></div>殊妻早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372527_comment'></div>君始以恒王参军附太学治春秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372527_comment'></div>中授左清道府录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372527_comment'></div>历湖丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372527_comment'></div>秩罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372527_comment'></div>丁比部府君忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372527_comment'></div>服阕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372527_comment'></div>调兴平长安万年尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372527_comment'></div>丁荥阳太君忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372527_comment'></div>服阕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372527_comment'></div>除万年丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372527_comment'></div>迁监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372527_comment'></div>知转运永丰院事殿中侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372527_comment'></div>留务河阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372527_comment'></div>加侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372527_comment'></div>赐绯鱼袋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372527_comment'></div>元和十四年以疾去职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372527_comment'></div>九月二十六日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372527_comment'></div>殁于季弟虢州长史稹之官舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372527_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372527_comment'></div>我尚书府君有大勋烈于周隋氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372527_comment'></div>我比部府君积大学行搢绅间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372527_comment'></div>我诸父法尚严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372527_comment'></div>家极贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372527_comment'></div>而事事于丧祭宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372527_comment'></div>虽帚除<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>薪水</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372527_comment'></div>不免于吾兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372527_comment'></div>贞元初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372527_comment'></div>蝗且俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372527_comment'></div>我先太君白府君货<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>女奴</span>以足食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372527_comment'></div>君泣曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372527_comment'></div>太夫人专门户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372527_comment'></div>不宜乏使令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372527_comment'></div>取新妇氏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>媵婢</span>以给货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372527_comment'></div>向是三十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372527_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>养育</span>八男女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372527_comment'></div>始元和中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372527_comment'></div>乃复奴婢之籍焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372527_comment'></div>先府君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>丛集</span>群言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372527_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>裁成</span>百叶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/59/Comments/1")'>书抄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372527_comment'></div>君惧不得授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372527_comment'></div>乃日一食以斋其心者一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372527_comment'></div>先太君怜而请焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372527_comment'></div>由是尽付其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372527_comment'></div>是岁货婢足食之一日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372527_comment'></div>日一粥而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>课写</span>千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372527_comment'></div>三岁乃卒业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372527_comment'></div>先府君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>违养</span>之岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372527_comment'></div>前累月而季父侍御史府君捐馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372527_comment'></div>子伯兄由官阻于蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372527_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>叔季</span>皆十年而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372527_comment'></div>遗其家唯环堵之宫耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372527_comment'></div>皆曰货是以襄二事可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372527_comment'></div>君跪言于先太君曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372527_comment'></div>斯宇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372527_comment'></div>尚书府君受赐于隋氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372527_comment'></div>乃今传七代矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372527_comment'></div>敢有守失以贻太夫人忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372527_comment'></div>死无以见先人于地下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372527_comment'></div>由是匍匐乞以终其丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372527_comment'></div>自兴平长安万年尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372527_comment'></div>俸不过三四万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372527_comment'></div>然奉颜色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372527_comment'></div>絜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>礿祀</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372527_comment'></div>备吉凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372527_comment'></div>来宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372527_comment'></div>无遗焉均也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372527_comment'></div>已虽游千里<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/87/Comments/0")'>贸费</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372527_comment'></div>毫未尝不疏之于书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372527_comment'></div>还启先太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372527_comment'></div>下示仲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_90_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>叔季</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372527_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372527_comment'></div>尊夫人慈不我责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372527_comment'></div>不如是自束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372527_comment'></div>陷不义矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372527_comment'></div>其在于京邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372527_comment'></div>专捕盗者八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372527_comment'></div>破囊橐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372527_comment'></div>掘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>盘牙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372527_comment'></div>不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372527_comment'></div>莫不刑者不恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372527_comment'></div>强者不暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372527_comment'></div>其在河阴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372527_comment'></div>朝廷有事于淄蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372527_comment'></div>累百万之费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372527_comment'></div>一出于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372527_comment'></div>朝令朝具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372527_comment'></div>夕发夕至者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372527_comment'></div>周五星岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372527_comment'></div>而后功成役罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372527_comment'></div>凡主<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>供馈</span>之百一于君者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372527_comment'></div>皆以课迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372527_comment'></div>唯君终不言赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372527_comment'></div>赏亦不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1372527_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1372527_comment'></div>君之生六七十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372527_comment'></div>四十年事亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372527_comment'></div>无一日之怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372527_comment'></div>三十年养下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372527_comment'></div>无一词之倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1372527_comment'></div>抚诸弟无正色之训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1372527_comment'></div>而亦不至于不恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1372527_comment'></div>教诸子无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_122_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>鞭笞</span>之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1372527_comment'></div>而亦不至于不令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1372527_comment'></div>以閒处剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1372527_comment'></div>而吏不忍欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1372527_comment'></div>以直立诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1372527_comment'></div>而忤不及物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1372527_comment'></div>没之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1372527_comment'></div>三子不侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1372527_comment'></div>无一言之念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1372527_comment'></div>知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_131_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>叔季</span>之可以教侄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1372527_comment'></div>室空墙壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1372527_comment'></div>无一顾之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1372527_comment'></div>知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_134_1372527", 1372527, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>叔季</span>之可以任丧祭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1372527_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1372527_comment'></div>爱我者张仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1372527_comment'></div>知我者鲍叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1372527_comment'></div>予生几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1372527_comment'></div>惧不克报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1372527_comment'></div>或不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1372527_comment'></div>记之斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1372527_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1372527_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_143_1372527'>唐元和之己亥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1372527_comment'></div>惟孟年十一月十六日仲月之良辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1372527_comment'></div>合葬我元君于咸阳县之洪渎川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1372527_comment'></div>从先太君之后域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1372527_comment'></div>而共閟于夫人崔之坟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_147_1372527_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　是年秋，次韵酬和白居易《酬微之》。作品：《酬乐天叹损伤见寄》<div id='poem_6665' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6665' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6665?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬乐天叹损伤见寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6665'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6665'>前途何在转茫茫，渐老那能不自伤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6665_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6665'>病为怕风多睡月，起因花<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作行）</span>药暂扶床。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6665_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6665'>函关气索迷真侣，峡水波翻碍故乡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6665_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6665'>唯有秋来两行泪，对君新赠远诗章。<div 大荔（冯翊）

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年6月</a>　元稹至同州，上疏论党项事宜。作品：《同州刺史谢上表》<div id='poem_1372441' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372441' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372441?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同州刺史谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372441")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372441_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372441'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372441'>臣稹言。伏奉今月三日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372441_comment'></div>授臣使持节同州诸军事守同州刺史兼本州防御使。臣罪重责轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372441_comment'></div>忧惶失据。虑为台府迫逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372441_comment'></div>不敢徘徊阙廷。便自朝堂匍匐进发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372441_comment'></div>谨以今月九日到州上讫。臣某辜负圣朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372441_comment'></div>辱累恩奖。便合自求死所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372441_comment'></div>岂宜尚忝官荣。诚恐诚惭死罪死罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372441_comment'></div>臣八岁丧父。家贫无业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372441_comment'></div>母兄乞丐。以供资养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372441_comment'></div>衣不布体。食不充肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372441_comment'></div>幼学之年。不蒙师训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372441_comment'></div>因感邻里儿稚。有父兄为开学校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372441_comment'></div>涕咽发愤。愿知诗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372441_comment'></div>慈母哀臣。亲为教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372441_comment'></div>年十有五。得明经出身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372441_comment'></div>自是苦心为文。夙夜强学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372441_comment'></div>年二十四登吏部乙科。授校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372441_comment'></div>年二十八蒙制举首选。授左拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372441_comment'></div>始自为学。至于升朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372441_comment'></div>无朋友为臣吹嘘。无亲党为臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372441", 1372441, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>援庇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372441_comment'></div>莫非苦巳。实不因人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372441_comment'></div>独立成性。遂无交结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372441_comment'></div>任拾遗日。屡陈时政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372441_comment'></div>蒙先皇帝召问延英。旋为宰相所憎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372441_comment'></div>贬臣河南县尉。及为监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372441_comment'></div>又不敢规避。专心纠绳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372441_comment'></div>复为宰相怒臣不庇亲党。因以他事贬臣江陵判司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372441_comment'></div>废弃十年。分死沟渎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372441_comment'></div>元和十四年。宪宗皇帝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1372441", 1372441, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>开释</span>有罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372441_comment'></div>始授臣膳部员外郎。与臣同省署者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372441_comment'></div>多是臣初登朝时举人。任卿相者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372441_comment'></div>半是臣同谏院时拾遗补阙。愚臣既不能低心曲就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372441_comment'></div>辈流亦以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1372441", 1372441, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>望风</span>怒臣。不料陛下天听过卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372441_comment'></div>知臣薄艺。朱书授臣制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372441_comment'></div>延英召臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1372441", 1372441, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>赐绯</span>。宰相恶臣不出其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372441_comment'></div>由是百计侵毁。陛下察臣无罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372441_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1372441", 1372441, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>宠奖</span>逾深。召臣面授舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372441_comment'></div>遣充承旨学士。金章紫服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372441_comment'></div>光饰陋躯。生人之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372441_comment'></div>臣亦至矣。然臣益遭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1372441", 1372441, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>诽谤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372441_comment'></div>日夜忧危。唯陛下圣鉴照临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372441_comment'></div>弥加保任。竟排群议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372441_comment'></div>擢备台司。臣忝有肺肝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372441_comment'></div>岂并寻常宰相。况当行营退散之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372441_comment'></div>牛元翼未出之间。每闻陛下轸念之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372441_comment'></div>微臣恨不身先士卒。所问于方计策遣王友明等<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1372441", 1372441, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>救解</span>深州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372441_comment'></div>盖欲上副圣情。岂是别怀他意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372441_comment'></div>不料奸人疑臣杀害裴度。妄有告论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372441_comment'></div>尘黩圣聪。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1372441", 1372441, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>愧羞</span>天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372441_comment'></div>臣本待<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1372441", 1372441, "Clauses/98/Comments/0")'>辨明</span>一了。便拟杀身谢责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372441_comment'></div>岂料圣慈尚在。薄贬同州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372441_comment'></div>虽违咫尺之颜。不远郊畿之境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372441_comment'></div>伏料必是宸衷独断。乞臣此官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372441_comment'></div>若遣他人商量。乍可与臣远处藩镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372441_comment'></div>岂肯遣臣俯近阙庭。臣所恨今月三日尚蒙召对延英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372441_comment'></div>此时不解泣血仰辞天颜。便至今日窜逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372441_comment'></div>臣自离京国。目断魂销。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372441_comment'></div>每至五更朝谒之时。臣实制泪不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372441_comment'></div>臣若馀生未死。他时万一<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1372441", 1372441, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>归还</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372441_comment'></div>不敢更望得见天颜。但得再闻京城钟鼓之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372441_comment'></div>臣虽黄土覆面。无恨九原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372441_comment'></div>臣某无任自恨自惭攀恋圣慈之至。然臣一日未死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372441_comment'></div>亦合有所陈论。或闻党项小有动摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372441_comment'></div>臣今谨具手疏陈奏。伏望恕臣死罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372441_comment'></div>特留圣览。臣此表并臣手疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372441_comment'></div>并请留中不出。谨遣差知衙官试殿中监马宏直奉表谢罪以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372441_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_66_1372441_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年6月</a>　追制削元稹长春宫使。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年11月</a>　进乌马一匹，有状。作品：《进马状》<div id='poem_1372465' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372465' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372465?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进马状<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（822年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372465")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372465_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1372465_0'>① 同州防御使供进乌马一匹八岁堪打毬及猎</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372465'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372465'>右。臣窃闻道路相传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372465_comment'></div>车驾欲暂游幸温汤。未知虚实者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372465_comment'></div>臣职居守土。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372465", 1372465, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>侍从</span>无由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372465_comment'></div>羡魏阙之埃尘。犹随<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372465", 1372465, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>日御</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372465_comment'></div>恨新丰之鸡犬。亦听车音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372465_comment'></div>目断魂销。形留神往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372465_comment'></div>又得进奏官状。知河中华州京兆府并于昭应排比进献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372465_comment'></div>臣当州素乏所出。无以粗展丹诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372465_comment'></div>臣既别受恩私。又不合独无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1372465", 1372465, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>壤奠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372465_comment'></div>伏以前件马北方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1372465", 1372465, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>正色</span>。东道奇踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372465_comment'></div>调习多时。备谙材色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372465_comment'></div>解击毬者。每嘉其环回斗转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372465_comment'></div>动可惬心。善猎射者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372465_comment'></div>皆叹其度堑踰沟。走不换足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372465_comment'></div>欲随正至献贺。窃虑群众混同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372465_comment'></div>徘徊瞻顾。蓄锐斯久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372465_comment'></div>今者宸游近甸。地降灵泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372465_comment'></div>施展是时。戢藏何益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372465_comment'></div>伏望陛下扬鞭顿辔。取验其驯良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372465_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372465", 1372465, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>结尾</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372465", 1372465, "Clauses/38/Comments/1")'>络头</span>。试观其神彩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372465_comment'></div>臣某深恩未报。愚志空存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372465_comment'></div>自惭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1372465", 1372465, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>驽钝</span>之姿。莫展<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1372465", 1372465, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>驱驰</span>之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372465_comment'></div>扪心恋主。因马喻身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372465_comment'></div>轻冒天威。无任战汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372465_comment'></div>其马谨随状进。谨进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372465_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1372465_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年11月</a>　进乌鹘、双鸡各两联，有状。作品：《进双鸡等状》<div id='poem_1372464' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372464' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372464?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进双鸡等状<span class='inlineComment2'>（同州防御使供进乌鹘并双鸡共四联）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（822年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372464")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372464_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372464'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372464'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372464_comment'></div>臣当州元和十五年奉宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372464_comment'></div>令采双鸡五联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372464_comment'></div>各重四斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372464_comment'></div>频年采取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372464_comment'></div>一联不获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372464_comment'></div>自臣到州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372464_comment'></div>询问采捕人等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372464_comment'></div>皆云二十年前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372464_comment'></div>采得一联双鸡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372464_comment'></div>尔后更不曾采得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372464_comment'></div>昨旬日之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372464_comment'></div>并获两联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372464_comment'></div>斤两轻重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372464_comment'></div>稍符诏旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372464_comment'></div>况浚郊初启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372464_comment'></div>既以大剪豺狼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372464_comment'></div>鸷鸟自来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372464_comment'></div>可以助清枭獍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372464_comment'></div>臣所恨身无羽翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372464_comment'></div>不获陪奉属车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372464_comment'></div>擒狡兔之根源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372464_comment'></div>破妖狐之群党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372464_comment'></div>臣某无任忘躯思奋睹物感恩之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372464_comment'></div>谨遣某官某乙随状奉进谨进。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1372464_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　秋或冬，推荐进士李景述，有诗。作品：《和王侍郎酬广宣上人观放榜后相贺》<div id='poem_sentence_2_6517_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6517'>珍重<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5807, "poem_sentence_3_6517")'>刘繇</span>因首荐<span class='inlineComment2'>（严公具体身份不详。）</span><div id='poem_1372532' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372532' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372532?labeling=true' id='poem_content_1372532'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372532'>曾祖方约，皇利州司功参军赠太常少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372532_comment'></div>祖挹之，皇徐州符离县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372532_comment'></div>父丹，皇殿中侍御史东川租庸盐铁青苗等使赠礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372532_comment'></div>某州某县某乡某里严某字某年七十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372532_comment'></div>公少好学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372532_comment'></div>始以大历八年举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372532_comment'></div>礼部侍郎张谓妙选时彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372532_comment'></div>在选中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372532_comment'></div>不数年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372532_comment'></div>补太子正字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372532_comment'></div>历栎阳尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372532_comment'></div>试为大理评事福州支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372532_comment'></div>使复以监察里行为宣歙观察判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372532_comment'></div>转殿中兼侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372532_comment'></div>充团副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372532_comment'></div>加检校著作郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372532_comment'></div>赐章服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372532_comment'></div>入拜尚书刑部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372532_comment'></div>一年转太原少尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372532_comment'></div>赐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372532", 1372532, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>金紫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372532_comment'></div>寻加北都副留守兼御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372532_comment'></div>又加行军司马检校司封郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372532_comment'></div>特命为银青光禄大夫检校工部尚书河南节度支度营田观察处置等使兼太原尹御史大夫北都留守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372532_comment'></div>再命加检校尚书右仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372532_comment'></div>三命加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1372532", 1372532, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>金紫</span>光禄大夫检校尚书左仆射扶风郡开<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1372532", 1372532, "Clauses/27/Comments/1")'>国公</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372532_comment'></div>食邑二千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372532_comment'></div>四命加检校司空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372532_comment'></div>始特命至是凡九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372532_comment'></div>朝京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372532_comment'></div>真拜尚书右仆射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372532_comment'></div>依前检校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372532_comment'></div>寻以检校司空拜荆南节度观察支度等使兼江陵尹御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372532_comment'></div>进封郑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1372532", 1372532, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>国公</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372532_comment'></div>食邑三千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372532_comment'></div>后累岁迁山南东道节度观察处置支度营田等使兼襄州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372532_comment'></div>司空大夫皆如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372532_comment'></div>就加淮西招抚使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372532_comment'></div>徵拜太子少保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372532_comment'></div>依前检校司空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372532_comment'></div>换检校司徒兼太子少保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372532_comment'></div>判光禄卿事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372532_comment'></div>复换太子少傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372532_comment'></div>依前检校司徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372532_comment'></div>疾告久之。<div id='poem_sentence_46_1372532_comment'></div>长庆二年五月二十七日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372532_comment'></div>薨于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372532_comment'></div>上为一日不听朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372532_comment'></div>诏赠太保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372532_comment'></div>出内帛以赠赙之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372532_comment'></div>恩有加也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372532_comment'></div>初贞元中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372532_comment'></div>宣歙观察使刘赞以公勤信精尽。<div id='poem_sentence_55_1372532_comment'></div>十年之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372532_comment'></div>政无细大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372532_comment'></div>一以咨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372532_comment'></div>及赞府除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372532_comment'></div>掌赞馀务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372532_comment'></div>德宗皇帝善公之所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372532_comment'></div>是有刑曹之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372532_comment'></div>且欲任用焉。<div id='poem_sentence_65_1372532_comment'></div>其实将代说矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372532_comment'></div>公事说愈谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372532_comment'></div>待下愈谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372532_comment'></div>及说薨而人人皆愿为帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372532_comment'></div>德宗皇帝因人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372532_comment'></div>元和初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372532_comment'></div>杨惠琳反于夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372532_comment'></div>公上言曰。<div id='poem_sentence_183_1372532_comment'></div>公之先自两汉至隋氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1372532_comment'></div>郡守列侯驸马御史郡丞将军刺史著作郎。<div class='inline' 1372532, "Clauses/190/Comments/0")'>更践</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1372532_comment'></div>位与寿极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1372532_comment'></div>其上无如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1372532_comment'></div>高祖协。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1372532_comment'></div>贞观中文皇征辽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1372532_comment'></div>为海东运粮使洮州都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1372532_comment'></div>自高祖至王考礼部府君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1372532_comment'></div>为政皆严明无畏避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1372532_comment'></div>初府君为松滋江陵令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1372532_comment'></div>恃豪赖军目气势者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1372532_comment'></div>比比皆杖杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1372532_comment'></div>安之尉京剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1372532_comment'></div>挺之更右职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1372532_comment'></div>破坏豪黠如神明。<div id='poem_sentence_204_1372532_comment'></div>先严氏焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1372532_comment'></div>自公始用儒素<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_206_1372532", ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　是年，逆贼李岕被诛，有文记之。作品：《贺汴州诛李岕表》<div id='poem_1372442' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372442' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372442?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺汴州诛李㝏表</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372442")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372442_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372442'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372442'>臣某言。伏见逆贼李㝏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372442_comment'></div>已就诛夷。韩充入汴州讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372442_comment'></div>一方既定。率土无虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372442_comment'></div>凡在臣僚。实增欣抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372442_comment'></div>臣某中贺。伏以汴州抱吴楚之津梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372442_comment'></div>据咽喉之要地。将骄卒悍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372442_comment'></div>易动难安。急攻则越逸是忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372442_comment'></div>缓取则迁延易变。自非陛下尽排群议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372442_comment'></div>独断宸衷。外委将臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372442_comment'></div>内敷睿算。风行号令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372442_comment'></div>天助机谋。则何以斩此鲸鲵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372442_comment'></div>破兹枭獍。臣摧凶志切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372442_comment'></div>受国恩深。仰荷威灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372442_comment'></div>倍万常品。限以符守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372442_comment'></div>不获称庆阙庭。无任踊跃屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372442_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1372442_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　是年，唐穆宗卧病在床，之后身体康复朝见百官，有文贺之。作品：《贺圣体平复御紫宸殿受朝贺状》<div id='poem_1372443' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372443' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372443?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺圣体平复御紫宸殿受朝贺表</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372443'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372443'>臣某言。今日得上都进奏官报称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372443_comment'></div>昨日陛下御紫宸殿。受群臣朝贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372443_comment'></div>伏审圣躬万福。亲见百寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372443_comment'></div>率土皆欢。溥天同庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372443_comment'></div>臣某臣闻两曜有晦明。所以成其不巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372443_comment'></div>四渎有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372443", 1372443, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>盈缩</span>。所以成其不竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372443_comment'></div>不有燎火。无以辨玉质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372443_comment'></div>不有霜霰。无以见松心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372443_comment'></div>是以轩辕神倦。然后梦华胥之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372443_comment'></div>秦穆疾寐。然后享钧天之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372443_comment'></div>尧以癯瘠而为圣。禹以胼胝而称功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372443_comment'></div>斯皆因疾成妍。以劳逢福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372443_comment'></div>昨者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372443", 1372443, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>圣体</span>不安。才经旬日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372443_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372443", 1372443, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>穆卜</span>言吉。勿药有瘳。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　是年，有祭祀曾祖文。作品：《告祀曾祖文》<div id='poem_1372542' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372542' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1372542'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372542'>孝曾孙稹。谨以清酌庶馐之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372542_comment'></div>敢昭告于曾祖岐州参军府君。礼称礿禘烝尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372542_comment'></div>一岁用是。四者而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372542_comment'></div>唐制位五品皆庙祀。庙祀亦以求吉日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372542_comment'></div>其馀未庙祀者。各奉家传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372542_comment'></div>疏数每异。昔我先府君深惟孝思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372542_comment'></div>终已不怠。每岁换正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372542_comment'></div>至涉佳辰。睹儿孙宾游相会聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372542_comment'></div>未尝无悲。是用日至暨正旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372542_comment'></div>仲夏之五日。季秋之初九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372542_comment'></div>莫不修奉祠祀。以达事生之意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372542_comment'></div>逮小子稹。冒华腼荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372542_comment'></div>未果<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372542", 1372542, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>修构</span>。宗子积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372542_comment'></div>牧民于金。复不克以上牲陪祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372542_comment'></div>每衣裘葛。酸伤五情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372542_comment'></div>今谨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372542", 1372542, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>依约</span>庙则。每岁以一至二分暨正旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372542_comment'></div>与宗积彼此奉祀于治所。始用变礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372542_comment'></div>不敢不告。伏惟尚飨。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　是年，有祭祀黄祖祖妣文。作品：《告赠黄祖祖妣文》<div id='poem_1372541' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372541' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372541_comment'></div>选建贤善。俾公彭城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372541_comment'></div>公实能德。延于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372541", 1372541, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>后嗣</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372541_comment'></div>降及兵部。为隋巨人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372541_comment'></div>抑扬直声。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372541", 1372541, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>扶卫</span>衰俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372541_comment'></div>户部<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372541", 1372541, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>绩绍</span>。传于魏州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372541_comment'></div>蕴郁懿粹。族用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372541", 1372541, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>繁昌</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372541_comment'></div>始兵部赐第于靖安里。下及天宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372541_comment'></div>五世其居。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1372541", 1372541, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>冕弁</span>骈比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372541_comment'></div>罗列<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1372541", 1372541, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>省寺</span>。一日秉朝烛者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372541_comment'></div>凡十四五。叔仲伯季。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372541_comment'></div>姊妹诸姑。洎友婿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372541", 1372541, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>弥孙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372541_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1372541", 1372541, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>岁时</span>与会聚者。百有馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372541_comment'></div>冠冕之盛。重于一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372541_comment'></div>燕寇突来。人士骇散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372541_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372541", 1372541, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>荫籍</span>朘削。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1372541", 1372541, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>龟绳</span>用稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372541_comment'></div>我曾我祖。仍世不偶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372541_comment'></div>先尚书盛德大业。屈于郎署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372541_comment'></div>小子稹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372541", 1372541, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>蒙幸</span>馀福。据有方州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372541_comment'></div>今皇帝嗣位之初。泽被幽显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372541_comment'></div>尚书府君洎荥阳郡太夫人。当进封赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372541_comment'></div>小子稹伏念先尚书尝以比部郎乞换追命。朝列不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372541_comment'></div>大孝莫申。是用追述先志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372541_comment'></div>乞回恩于祖父祖妣。是岁八月十八日诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372541_comment'></div>以兵部员外郎晋昌县太君来告第。摧慕感咽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372541_comment'></div>五情<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1372541", 1372541, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>伤殒</span>。谨以仲冬日至。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　是年，作《论党项疏》，但已亡佚。（已亡佚）<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　春，杨巨源路过同州，与元稹相会，有诗。时杨为国子司业。作品：《酬杨司业十二兄早秋述情见寄》<div id='poem_7009' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_7009' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/7009?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬杨司业十二兄早秋述情见寄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_7009")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_7009_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_7009_0'>① 今春与杨兄会于冯翊，数日而别，此诗同州作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_7009'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_7009'>白发故人少，相逢意弥远。<div id='poem_sentence_0_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_7009'>往事共销沈，前期各衰晚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_7009'>昨来遇弥苦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，已复云离巘<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_7009'>秋草古<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_7009", 7009, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>胶庠</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，寒沙废宫苑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_7009'>知心岂忘鲍<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，咏怀难和阮<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_7009'>壮志日萧条，那能竞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_7009", 7009, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>朝幰</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_7009'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_7009'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_7009_0'>⑴ 遇弥：蜀本、杨本、董本、马本作“弥遇”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_7009_0'>⑵ 云离巘：古人以为石为云根，云触石而出，故云。巘，险峻之山峰。《广韵·狝韵》：“巘，山峰。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_7009_0'>⑶ 胶庠：周代学校名。周代胶为大学，庠为小学，后世通称学校为胶庠。语本《礼记·王制》：“周人养国老于东胶，养庶老于虞庠。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_7009_0'>⑷ 宫苑：指沙苑与兴德宫。沙苑在今陕西大荔县南，南临渭水，东西八十里，南北三十里，唐于此置沙苑监。《元和郡县图志·同州》：“沙苑，一名沙阜，在（冯翊）县南十二里，南北三十里……今以其处，宜六畜，置沙苑监。”兴德宫，《元和郡县图志·同州》：“兴德宫，在（冯翊）县南三十里。义旗将趣京师，军次于忠武园，因置亭子，名兴德宫，属家令寺。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_7009_0'>⑸ “知心”句：见5卷《别李三》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_7009_0'>⑹ “咏怀”句：阮籍有《咏怀诗》八十馀首，多借古讽今，词旨隐约，归趣难求。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_7009_0'>⑺ 朝幰：朝廷大臣所乘之车辆。幰，车前帷幔。隋朝曾规定，六品以下官员乘车不得施幰。此借指高官。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_7009_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年3月</a>　祈雨九龙神，有文。作品：《祈雨九龙神文》<div id='poem_1372536' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372536' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372536?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祈雨九龙神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_1372536_comment'></div>愁惭焦劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372536_comment'></div>求念人隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372536_comment'></div>思有以报陛下莫大之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372536_comment'></div>涉岁于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372536_comment'></div>理用不效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372536_comment'></div>冬不时雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372536_comment'></div>春不时雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372536_comment'></div>越二月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372536_comment'></div>宿麦不滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372536_comment'></div>耒耜不利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372536_comment'></div>大惧兹岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372536_comment'></div>患成于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372536_comment'></div>以羞陛下之奖寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372536_comment'></div>刻责罪悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372536_comment'></div>罔识攸咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372536_comment'></div>大凡天降疵厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372536_comment'></div>必因于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372536_comment'></div>岂予心之虚削孤独。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372536_comment'></div>依倚气势耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372536_comment'></div>将予刑之僭滥失所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372536_comment'></div>冤哀无告耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372536_comment'></div>或予政之抑塞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372536", 1372536, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>开泄</span>闭藏耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372536_comment'></div>举动云为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372536_comment'></div>罔不在我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372536_comment'></div>神怒天谴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372536_comment'></div>降灾于我身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372536_comment'></div>我不敢让。<div "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>长理</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372536_comment'></div>而灾害随至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372536_comment'></div>无乃天之降罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372536_comment'></div>不得其所耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372536_comment'></div>痛毒恻怛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372536_comment'></div>无所赴露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372536_comment'></div>惟龙司水于同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372536_comment'></div>同人神之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372536_comment'></div>谨斋戒沐浴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372536_comment'></div>叩首挥泪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372536_comment'></div>愿以小子稹为<span
