id='poem_sentence_50_1372536_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年3月</a>　雨下，报雨九龙神，有文。作品：《报雨九龙神文》<div id='poem_1372537' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372537' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372537?labeling=true' target='_blank'>报雨九龙神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372537")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372537_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372537'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372537'>同州刺史元稹。谨以清酌庶馐之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372537_comment'></div>敬祭于九龙之神。是月己巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372537_comment'></div>刺史稹以二从事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372537", 1372537, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>蒙受</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1372537", 1372537, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>尘露</span>。百里诣龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372537_comment'></div>为七邑民<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372537", 1372537, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>赴诉</span>不雨。予固<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372537", 1372537, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>惭恻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372537_comment'></div>言讫涕下。亲为龙言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372537_comment'></div>龙意享若。是夕而应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372537_comment'></div>庚午而降。辛未而洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372537_comment'></div>癸酉而饫。甲戌而霁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372537_comment'></div>乙亥而报。报典不渝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372537_comment'></div>龙祐宜永。讫是嘉谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372537_comment'></div>勿旱勿霪。岁其有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372537_comment'></div>无忘龙德。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372537_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1372537_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年5月</a>　友人刘颇卒，元稹为其作墓志铭。作品：《唐故使持节万州诸军事万州刺史赐绯鱼袋刘君墓志铭》<div id='poem_1372522' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372522' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372522?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故使持节万州诸军事万州刺史赐绯鱼袋刘君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372522")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372522_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372522'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372522'>岁长庆之癸卯五月日乙亥。处士禄汾以予友保极丧讣于予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372522_comment'></div>且告保极遗意。欲予志卒葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372522_comment'></div>子哭泣受妻子宾友吊。又哭泣退叙事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372522_comment'></div>保极讳颇。姓刘氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372522_comment'></div>汉燕王子孙之在其国者。皆称昌平人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372522_comment'></div>后世有清夷军使拯。为清夷军使时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372522_comment'></div>会侯希逸叛。辽海侧近军郡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>守将</span>皆弃走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372522_comment'></div>拯独不弃军。军乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372522_comment'></div>害及拯。朝廷忠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372522_comment'></div>以平州刺史告其第。平州生表里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372522_comment'></div>表里官至深州长史。亦用忠战死于军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372522_comment'></div>长史生子骞。子骞官至银青光禄大夫唐州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372522_comment'></div>与周增等谋溃李希烈。觉皆杀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372522_comment'></div>君实唐州之长子。希烈不忍其幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372522_comment'></div>养之麾下。凡攻战必携去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372522_comment'></div>年十四五。始读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372522_comment'></div>希烈死。得脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372522_comment'></div>举进士。文咏词调。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372522_comment'></div>有古时人气候。不肯学<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>蹙蹙</span>近一题者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372522_comment'></div>试一不中。遂不复试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372522_comment'></div>复田于唐。唐刺史愿得君为婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372522_comment'></div>君不愿为刺史婿。刺史怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372522_comment'></div>暴租其田。君乃大集里中诸老曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372522_comment'></div>刺史谓田足以累我耶。由是火其居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372522_comment'></div>出契书投火中。尽诸老田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372522_comment'></div>弃去汝上。读书赋诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372522_comment'></div>厚自期待。刺史陆长源器异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372522_comment'></div>三十馀<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>试授</span>秘书省校书郎。复以协律郎从事于鄜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372522_comment'></div>元和初。高崇文方下蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372522_comment'></div>宰相杜黄裳以君为大理评事画于君。后为寿安主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372522_comment'></div>适乌重允以怀汝之师来伐蔡。请君为监察御史判怀汝营田事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372522_comment'></div>寻改节度判官。赐章服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372522_comment'></div>是时贼始盛。陈许怀汝之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372522_comment'></div>怯怯未振举。都统韩宏在大梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372522_comment'></div>君乃请于乌曰。青陵故城地高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372522_comment'></div>要得之。可以据贼矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372522_comment'></div>公能使我于韩。可以得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372522_comment'></div>乌使之。韩一见奇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372522_comment'></div>竟夕与语。遂命陈许怀汝大梁之众据青陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372522_comment'></div>尅日遂据之。自是官军乃大振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372522_comment'></div>凡乌之战阵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>谋取</span>案牍书奏之事。皆咨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372522_comment'></div>常为乌启事京师。宪宗皇帝语及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/83/Comments/0")'>阵法</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372522_comment'></div>曰。卿何以知战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372522_comment'></div>对曰。臣固淮西之战者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372522_comment'></div>读书馀事耳。遭太夫人丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372522_comment'></div>服阕。以从来所赋诗投宰相令狐楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372522_comment'></div>楚屡吟赏于有文章者。宰相段文昌在蜀时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372522_comment'></div>爱君之磊落。善<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>呼吸</span>人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372522_comment'></div>遂相奏天子。以君为殿中侍御史银州长史知刺史事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372522_comment'></div>先时银之长不命于朝数十年矣。诸将摄理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372522_comment'></div>夺其马牛。夷人苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372522_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>益复</span>叛远。君始受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372522_comment'></div>指<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>赢输</span>之白四足者谓予曰。君为我识之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372522_comment'></div>此马苟无死。不复易矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372522_comment'></div>至所治。党项诸羌来会聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372522_comment'></div>君告以忠信廉俭。皆出涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372522_comment'></div>无敢违告者。岁馀受代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372522_comment'></div>酋长拓拔建宗等七百馀众<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>遮拥</span>不欲去。君驰去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372522_comment'></div>建宗等稍稍随至境。果以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>赢输</span>之白四足者归京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372522_comment'></div>自外无馀畜。及君之没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372522_comment'></div>诸羌之长不绝聘。寻授河西令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372522_comment'></div>侍中宏方在蒲。得君喜甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372522_comment'></div>因请自贰。朝廷以水部员外郎兼侍御史充河中节度副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372522_comment'></div>又岁馀。君所善元稹为宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372522_comment'></div>朝谓君曰。君将展矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372522_comment'></div>亟荐之。稹竟不能用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372522_comment'></div>寻除万州刺史。病于汝竟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372522_comment'></div>以长庆三年某月日卒所寓。年若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372522_comment'></div>以某月日葬某所。君五男二女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372522_comment'></div>李氏妇洎处子。皆女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372522_comment'></div>统明既明越明坎明聪明。皆男也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372522_comment'></div>处士禄汾。始终视其丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372522_comment'></div>始君善交人。凡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/145/Comments/0")'>气志</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/145/Comments/1")'>豪健</span>尚功名者多师之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372522_comment'></div>投分誓且死。为收长用慈俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372522_comment'></div>闾里皆爱惜。少为陆尚书长源李尚书元素郑司徒馀庆杜司空黄裳所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372522_comment'></div>群公更处<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/150/Comments/0")'>重位</span>。君亦不能遂所欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372522_comment'></div>乌之知且委也。事以丧废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372522_comment'></div>韩之器且荐也。卒不获用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372522_comment'></div>命也已。予为监察御史时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372522_comment'></div>始与君更相许与为将相。予果为相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372522_comment'></div>而不能毫发加于君。非命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372522_comment'></div>予罪也。抑不能专善善恶恶之柄耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372522_comment'></div>不然。何二世死忠之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372522_comment'></div>既生如是之杰。而卒不能成就之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372522_comment'></div>呜呼。铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372522_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_85_1372522'>气成<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1372522", 1372522, "Clauses/170/Comments/0")'>郁噎</span>。必为风云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372522_comment'></div>有志不泄。死当能神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372522_comment'></div>神固不昧。故吾有云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372522_comment'></div>天子思我。朋嫉我恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372522_comment'></div>虽我悴戚。心我不泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372522_comment'></div>誓致尧舜。封山侍巡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372522_comment'></div>恸告君墓。报君知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372522_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_92_1372522_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　春，游同州杏园，有诗。作品：《杏花》<div id='poem_6251' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6251' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_6251'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6251'>常年出入右银台，每怪春光例早回。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6251_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6251'>惭愧杏园行在景，同州园里也先开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6251_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6251'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6251_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　春，元稹寄诗与白居易。作品：《寄乐天二首》<div id='poem_6603' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6603' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6603?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄乐天二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_6603", 6603, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>荣辱</span>升沈影与身，世情谁是旧雷陈。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6603_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6603'>唯应<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6603", 6603, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>鲍叔</span>犹怜我，自保曾参不杀人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6603_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6603'>山入白楼沙苑暮，潮生沧海野塘春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6603_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6603'>老逢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6603", 6603, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>佳景</span>唯惆怅，两地各伤何限神。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6603_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6603'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6603_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_6604' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6604' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6604?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6604_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6604'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6604'>论才赋命不相干，凤有文章雉有冠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6604'>羸骨欲销犹被刻，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6604", 6604, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>疮痕</span>未没又遭弹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6604'>剑头已折藏须盖，丁字虽刚屈莫难。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6604'>休学州前罗刹石，一生身敌海波澜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6604'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6604_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　春或夏，均定同州稅籍，有文。作品：《同州奏均田状》<div id='poem_1372479' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372479' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372479?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同州奏均田状</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372479")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372479_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372479'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372479'>当州自于七县田地数内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372479_comment'></div>均配两税元额顷亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372479_comment'></div>便请分给诸色职田州使田官田与百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372479_comment'></div>其草栗脚钱等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372479_comment'></div>便请于万户上均率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372479_comment'></div>又<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>均摊</span>左神策合阳镇军田粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372479_comment'></div>及特放百姓税麻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372479_comment'></div>及除去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>斛斗</span>钱草零数等利宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372479_comment'></div>分析如后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372479_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1372479'>其一当州两税地/右件地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372479_comment'></div>并是贞元四年检责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372479_comment'></div>至今已是三十六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372479_comment'></div>其间人户<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>逃移</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372479_comment'></div>田地荒废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372479_comment'></div>又近河诸县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372479_comment'></div>每年河路吞侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372479_comment'></div>沙苑侧近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372479_comment'></div>日有沙砾填掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372479_comment'></div>百姓税额已定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372479_comment'></div>皆是虚额徵率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372479_comment'></div>其间亦有豪富兼并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372479_comment'></div>广占阡陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372479_comment'></div>十分田地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372479_comment'></div>才税二三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372479_comment'></div>致使穷独逋亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372479_comment'></div>赋税不办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372479_comment'></div>州县转破。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372479_comment'></div>实在于斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372479_comment'></div>臣自到州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372479_comment'></div>便欲遣官检量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372479_comment'></div>又虑疲人烦扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372479_comment'></div>昨因农务稍暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372479_comment'></div>臣遂设法各令百姓自通手实状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372479_comment'></div>又令里正<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>书手</span>等傍为稳审。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372479_comment'></div>并不遣官吏擅到村乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372479_comment'></div>百姓等皆知臣欲一例均平所通田地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372479_comment'></div>略无欺隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372479_comment'></div>臣便据所通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372479_comment'></div>悉与除去逃户荒地及河侵沙掩等地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372479_comment'></div>其馀见定顷亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372479_comment'></div>然取两税元额地数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372479_comment'></div>通计七县沃瘠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372479_comment'></div>一例作分抽税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372479_comment'></div>自此贫富彊弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372479_comment'></div>一切均平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372479_comment'></div>徵敛赋租。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372479_comment'></div>庶无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>逋欠</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372479_comment'></div>三二年外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372479_comment'></div>此州实冀稍校完全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372479_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1372479'>其二当州京官及州县官职田公廨田并州使官田驿田等/右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372479_comment'></div>臣当州百姓田地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372479_comment'></div>每亩只税粟九升五合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372479_comment'></div>草四分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372479_comment'></div>地头榷酒钱共出二十一文已下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372479_comment'></div>其诸色职田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372479_comment'></div>每亩约税粟三斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372479_comment'></div>草三束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372479_comment'></div>脚钱一百二十文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372479_comment'></div>若是京官上司职田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372479_comment'></div>又须百姓变米雇车般送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372479_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>比量</span>正税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372479_comment'></div>近于四倍加徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372479_comment'></div>既缘差税至重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372479_comment'></div>州县遂逐年抑配百姓租佃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372479_comment'></div>或有隔越乡村被配一亩二亩之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372479_comment'></div>或有身居市井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372479_comment'></div>亦令虚额出税之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372479_comment'></div>其公廨田官田驿田等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372479_comment'></div>所税轻重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372479_comment'></div>约与职田相似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372479_comment'></div>亦是抑配百姓租佃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372479_comment'></div>疲人患苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372479_comment'></div>无过于斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372479_comment'></div>伏准长庆元年七月赦文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372479_comment'></div>京兆府职田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372479_comment'></div>令于万户上均配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372479_comment'></div>与臣当州事宜相类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372479_comment'></div>臣今因重配原额税地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372479_comment'></div>便请尽将此色田地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372479_comment'></div>一切给与百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1372479_comment'></div>任为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_80_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>永业</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372479_comment'></div>一依正税粟草及地头榷酒钱数纳税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372479_comment'></div>其馀所欠职田<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>斛斗</span>钱草等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372479_comment'></div>只于夏税地上每亩加一合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1372479_comment'></div>秋税地上每亩各加六合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1372479_comment'></div>草一分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1372479_comment'></div>其馀脚钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1372479_comment'></div>只收地头榷酒钱上分釐充数便足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1372479_comment'></div>百姓元不加配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1372479_comment'></div>其上司职田合变米送城者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1372479_comment'></div>比缘百姓自出车牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1372479_comment'></div>及零碎舂碾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1372479_comment'></div>动逾春夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1372479_comment'></div>送纳不得到城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1372479_comment'></div>臣今便于当州近城县纳粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1372479_comment'></div>官为变碾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1372479_comment'></div>取<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_96_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>本色</span>脚钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1372479_comment'></div>州司和雇情愿车牛搬载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1372479_comment'></div>差纲送纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1372479_comment'></div>计万户所加至少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1372479_comment'></div>使四倍之税永除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1372479_comment'></div>上司职禄及时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1372479_comment'></div>公私俱受其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1372479_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_103_1372479'>其三当州供左神策合阳镇军田粟二千石/右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1372479_comment'></div>自置军镇日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1372479_comment'></div>伏准敕令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1372479_comment'></div>取百姓蒿荒田地一百顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1372479_comment'></div>给充军田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1372479_comment'></div>并缘田地零碎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1372479_comment'></div>军司佃用不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1372479_comment'></div>遂令县司每亩出粟二斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372479_comment'></div>其粟并是一县百姓税上加配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372479_comment'></div>偏当重敛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372479_comment'></div>事实不均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1372479_comment'></div>臣今已于七县应税地上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1372479_comment'></div>量事配率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372479_comment'></div>自此亦冀均平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372479_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_117_1372479'>其四当州朝邑等三县代纳夏阳韩城两县率钱/右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372479_comment'></div>准元和十三年敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372479_comment'></div>绿夏阳韩城两县残破。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1372479_comment'></div>量减逃户<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_120_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>率税</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1372479_comment'></div>每年摊配朝邑澄城合阳三县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1372479_comment'></div>代纳钱六百七十九贯九百二十一文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1372479_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_123_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>斛斗</span>三千一百五十二硕一斗三升三合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1372479_comment'></div>草九千九束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1372479_comment'></div>零并不计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1372479_comment'></div>臣今因令百姓自通田地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1372479_comment'></div>落下两县蒿荒之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1372479_comment'></div>并据见定顷亩一例徵率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1372479_comment'></div>自然两县已减元额税地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1372479_comment'></div>请更不令三县代纳差科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1372479_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_131_1372479'>其五当州税麻/右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1372479_comment'></div>当州从前税麻地七十五顷六十七亩四垄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1372479_comment'></div>每年计麻一万一千八百七十四两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1372479_comment'></div>充州司诸色公用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1372479_comment'></div>臣昨因均配地税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1372479_comment'></div>寻检三数十年两税文案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1372479_comment'></div>只见逐年配率麻地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1372479_comment'></div>并不言两税数内为复数外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1372479_comment'></div>既无条敕可凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1372479_comment'></div>臣今一切放免不税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1372479_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_141_1372479'>其六当州所徵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_141_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/141/Comments/1")'>斛斗</span>草及地头等钱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_141_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/141/Comments/2")'>畸零</span>分数/右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1372479_comment'></div>从前所徵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_142_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>斛斗</span>升合之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1372479_comment'></div>又有抄勺圭撮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1372479_comment'></div>钱草即有分釐毫铢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1372479_comment'></div>案牍交加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1372479_comment'></div>不可勘算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1372479_comment'></div>人户输纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1372479_comment'></div>元无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_148_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/148/Comments/0")'>畸零</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1372479_comment'></div>蹙数所成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1372479_comment'></div>尽是奸吏欺没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1372479_comment'></div>臣今所徵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_151_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/151/Comments/0")'>斛斗</span>并请成合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1372479_comment'></div>草并请成分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1372479_comment'></div>钱并请成文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1372479_comment'></div>在百姓纳数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1372479_comment'></div>元无所加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1372479_comment'></div>于官司簿书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1372479_comment'></div>永绝奸诈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1372479_comment'></div>其蹙数粟麦草等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1372479_comment'></div>便充填所欠职田等数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1372479_comment'></div>其钱当州每亩元税二十文三分六釐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1372479_comment'></div>人户元纳二十一文整数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1372479_comment'></div>臣今只收纳二十一文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1372479_comment'></div>内分釐零数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1372479_comment'></div>将充职田脚钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1372479_comment'></div>二千六百馀贯便足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1372479_comment'></div>更不分外摊徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1372479_comment'></div>回奸吏隐欺之赃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1372479_comment'></div>除百姓重敛之困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1372479_comment'></div>如此处置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1372479_comment'></div>庶有利宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1372479_comment'></div>以前件谨具利宜如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1372479_comment'></div>逐县两税元额顷亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1372479_comment'></div>并摊配职田分数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1372479_comment'></div>及蹙成文分合等钱草<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_174_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>斛斗</span>数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1372479_comment'></div>谨具分析在前件状如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1372479_comment'></div>伏以当州田地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1372479_comment'></div>咸卤瘠薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1372479_comment'></div>兼带山原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1372479_comment'></div>通计十亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1372479_comment'></div>不敌京畿一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1372479_comment'></div>加以检责年深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1372479_comment'></div>贫富偏并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1372479_comment'></div>税额已定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1372479_comment'></div>徵率转难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1372479_comment'></div>臣昨所奏累年逋悬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1372479_comment'></div>其弊实由于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1372479_comment'></div>臣今并已均融抽税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1372479_comment'></div>又免配佃职田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1372479_comment'></div>闾里之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1372479_comment'></div>稍令苏息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1372479_comment'></div>伏缘请配职田地充百姓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_191_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/191/Comments/0")'>永业</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1372479_comment'></div>事须奉敕处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1372479_comment'></div>然冀永有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_193_1372479", 1372479, "Clauses/193/Comments/0")'>遵凭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1372479_comment'></div>伏望圣慈允臣所奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1372479_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1372479_comment'></div>伏听敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_196_1372479_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年7月</a>　自去年冬至今年秋，同州少雨雪，故作诗自责。作品：《旱灾自咎贻七县宰》<div id='poem_6840' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6840' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6840?labeling=true' target='_blank'>旱灾自咎贻七县宰<span class='inlineComment2'>（同州时）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（823年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6840")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6840_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6840'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6840'>吾闻上帝心，降命明且仁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6840'>臣稹苟有罪，胡不灾我身。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6840'>胡为旱一州，祸此千万人。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6840'>一旱犹可忍，其旱亦已频。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6840'>腊雪不满地，膏雨不降春。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6840'>恻恻诏书下，半减麦与缗。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6840'>半租岂不薄，尚竭力与筋。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6840'>竭力不敢惮，惭戴天子恩。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6840'>累累妇拜姑<span class='inlineComment2'>（姑：见卷3《后湖》注。）</span>，呐呐翁语孙<span class='inlineComment2'>（呐呐：形容说话迟缓，含混不清。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6840'>禾黍日夜长，足得盈我囷。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6840'>还填折粟税<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6840", 6840, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>酬偿</span>贳麦邻<span class='inlineComment2'>（贳：见卷1《赛神》注）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6840'>苟无公私责，饮水不为贫。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6840'>欢言未盈口，旱气已再振。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6840'>六月天不雨，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_6840", 6840, "Clauses/27/Comments/1")'>秋孟</span>亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_6840", 6840, "Clauses/27/Comments/2")'>既旬</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6840'>区区昧陋积，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_6840", 6840, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>祷祝</span>非不勤。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6840'>日驰衰白颜，再拜泥甲鳞<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6840'>归来重<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_6840", 6840, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>思忖</span>，愿告诸邑君。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6840'>以彼天道远，岂如人事亲。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6840'>团团囹圄中<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，无乃冤不申。<div id='poem_sentence_18_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_6840'>扰扰食廪内<span class='inlineComment2'>（食廪：食俸禄之人。廪，俸禄。）</span>，无乃奸有因。<div id='poem_sentence_19_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_6840'>轧轧输送车<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，无乃使不伦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_6840'>遥遥负担卒，无乃役不均。<div id='poem_sentence_21_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_6840'>今年无大麦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，计与珠玉滨<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_22_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_6840'>村胥与里吏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>，无乃求取繁。<div id='poem_sentence_23_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_6840'>符下敛钱急<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>，值官因酒嗔。<div id='poem_sentence_24_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_6840'>诛求与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_6840", 6840, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>挞罚</span>，无乃不逡巡。<div id='poem_sentence_25_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_6840'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_6840", 6840, "Clauses/52/Comments/1")'>生小</span>下里住<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>，不曾州县门。<div id='poem_sentence_26_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_6840'>诉词千万恨，无乃不得闻。<div id='poem_sentence_27_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_6840'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_6840", 6840, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>强豪</span>富酒肉，穷独无刍薪<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑿</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_28_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_6840'>俱由案牍吏，无乃移祸屯。<div id='poem_sentence_29_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_6840'>官分市井户，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_6840", 6840, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>迭配</span>水陆珍。<div id='poem_sentence_30_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_6840'>未蒙所偿直<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒀</sup>，无乃不敢言。<div id='poem_sentence_31_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_6840'>有一于此事，安可尤苍旻<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒁</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_32_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_6840'>借使漏刑宪，得不虞鬼神<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒂</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_33_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_6840'>自顾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_6840", 6840, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>顽滞</span>牧，坐贻灾沴臻。<div id='poem_sentence_34_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_6840'>上羞朝廷寄，下愧闾里民。<div id='poem_sentence_35_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_6840'>岂无神明宰，为我同苦辛。<div id='poem_sentence_36_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_6840'>共布慈惠语，慰此衢客尘<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⒃</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_37_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_6840'></div><div id='poem_sentence_38_6840_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6840'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_6840_0'>⑴ 折粟税：《册府元龟·邦计部·赋税》(卷四八七)：“九月，诏曰：‘大河南北人户殷繁，衣食之原，租赋尤广。顷年水旱，廒庾尚虚，今岁属和平，时遇丰稔，而租所入水陆运漕缘脚钱杂必甚伤农，务在优饶，惠彼黎庶，息其转输，大实仓储。今年河南、河北应送含嘉、太原等仓租米，宜折粟留纳本州。’”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_6840_0'>⑵ 秋孟：即孟秋。孟，始，指四季中每季之第一个月。《玉篇·子部》：“孟，始也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_6840_0'>⑶ 泥甲鳞：泥塑之龙，古代用以祈雨。《淮南子·地形训》：“土龙致雨。”高诱注曰:汤遭旱，作土龙，以像龙。云从龙，故致雨也。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_6840_0'>⑷ 囹圄：监狱。《礼记·月令》：“（仲春之月）命有司，省囹圄，去桎梏。”孔颖达疏：“囹，牢也；圄，止也。所以止出入，皆罪人所舍也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_6840_0'>⑸ 轧轧：象声词，车轮转动时与车轴摩擦所发出之声音。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_6840_0'>⑹ 伦：匹敌，均等。《人物志·释争》：“则光辉焕而日新，德声伦于古人矣。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_22_6840_0'>⑺ 大麦：关中一带以夏季作物为重，故称大麦。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_22_6840_0'>⑻ “计与”句：谓粮食之价格因灾害而骤升，几与珠玉之价格接近。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_23_6840_0'>⑼ 村胥：犹村正，古代基层官吏。白居易《人之困穷由君之奢欲策》：“盖以君之命行于左右，左右颁于方镇，方镇布于州牧，州牧达于县宰，县宰下于乡吏，乡吏传于村胥，然后至于人焉。”里吏：里中之官吏。里，见卷2《阳城驿》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_24_6840_0'>⑽ 符：古代盖有官府印信之下行公文。《新唐书·百官志一》：“凡上之逮下，其制有六：一曰制……六曰符，省下于州，州下于县，县下于乡。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_26_6840_0'>⑾ 里，蜀本、杨本、董本、马本、类苑、胡本作“俚”，似是。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_28_6840_0'>⑿ 独：无子孙之老人。《释名·释亲属》：“老而无子曰独。独，只独也，言无所依也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_6840_0'>⒀ 直：通“值”。《正字通·目部》：“直，物价曰直。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_32_6840_0'>⒁ 尤：责怪，怨恨。《玉篇·乙部》：“尤，责也，怨也。”苍旻：苍天。旻，天空。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_33_6840_0'>⒂ 虞：忧虑，担心。《左传·昭公四年》：“君若苟无四方之虞。”王引之述闻：“虞，忧也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_37_6840_0'>⒃ 衢客：市民。衢，四通八达之道路，借指都市。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6840_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　在同州，杨巨源曾寄诗与元稹，故有酬答诗，姑系于此。作品：《酬杨司业十二兄早秋述情见寄》<div id='poem_7009' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_7009' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/7009?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬杨司业十二兄早秋述情见寄<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_7009")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_7009_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_7009_0'>① 今春与杨兄会于冯翊，数日而别，此诗同州作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_7009'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_7009'>白发故人少，相逢意弥远。<div id='poem_sentence_0_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_7009'>往事共销沈，前期各衰晚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_7009'>昨来遇弥苦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，已复云离巘<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_7009'>秋草古<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_7009", 7009, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>胶庠</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>，寒沙废宫苑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_7009'>知心岂忘鲍<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，咏怀难和阮<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_7009'>壮志日萧条，那能竞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_7009", 7009, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>朝幰</span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_7009'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_7009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_7009'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_7009_0'>⑴ 遇弥：蜀本、杨本、董本、马本作“弥遇”。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_7009_0'>⑵ 云离巘：古人以为石为云根，云触石而出，故云。巘，险峻之山峰。《广韵·狝韵》：“巘，山峰。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_7009_0'>⑶ 胶庠：周代学校名。周代胶为大学，庠为小学，后世通称学校为胶庠。语本《礼记·王制》：“周人养国老于东胶，养庶老于虞庠。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_7009_0'>⑷ 宫苑：指沙苑与兴德宫。沙苑在今陕西大荔县南，南临渭水，东西八十里，南北三十里，唐于此置沙苑监。《元和郡县图志·同州》：“沙苑，一名沙阜，在（冯翊）县南十二里，南北三十里……今以其处，宜六畜，置沙苑监。”兴德宫，《元和郡县图志·同州》：“兴德宫，在（冯翊）县南三十里。义旗将趣京师，军次于忠武园，因置亭子，名兴德宫，属家令寺。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_7009_0'>⑸ “知心”句：见5卷《别李三》注。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_7009_0'>⑹ “咏怀”句：阮籍有《咏怀诗》八十馀首，多借古讽今，词旨隐约，归趣难求。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_7009_0'>⑺ 朝幰：朝廷大臣所乘之车辆。幰，车前帷幔。隋朝曾规定，六品以下官员乘车不得施幰。此借指高官。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_7009_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　在同州，见乌鸦有感，作诗记之。作品：《树上乌》<div id='poem_6912' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6912' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6912?labeling=true' target='_blank'>树上乌</a><span class='authorDate'>（癸卯）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6912")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6912_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6912'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6912'>树上乌，洲中有树巢若铺。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6912'>百巢一树知几乌，一乌不下三四雏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6912'>雏又生雏知几雏，老乌未死雏已乌。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6912'>散向人间何处无，攫麑啄卵方可食。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6912'>男女群强最多力，灵蛇万古唯一珠。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6912'>岂可抨弹千万亿，吾不会天教尔辈多子孙，告诉天公天不言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_6912_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　长庆二年至三年间在同州作《送公度之福建》，姑系于此。<div id='poem_6311' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6311' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6311?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送公度之福建<span class='inlineComment2'>（此后并同州刺史时作）</span></a><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　长庆二年至三年间在同州作《喜五兄自泗州至》》，姑系于此。<span class='inlineComment2'>（“五兄”似为元稹胞兄。）</span><div id='poem_6369' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6369' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6369?labeling=true' target='_blank'>喜五兄自泗州至</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_6369_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6369'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6369'>眼中三十年来泪，一望南云一度垂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6369_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6369'>惭愧临淮李常侍，远教形影暂相随。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6369_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6369'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6369_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年8月</a>　改越州刺史兼御史大夫、浙东观察史。妻裴淑不乐，作诗安慰之。在同州期间，有惠于民，离同州时，民不忍其去。作品：《初除浙东妻有阻色因以四韵晓之》<div id='poem_6509' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6509' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6509?labeling=true' target='_blank'>初除浙东妻有阻色因以四韵晓之</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6509")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6509_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6509'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6509'>嫁时五月归巴地，今日双旌上越州。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6509'>兴庆首行千命妇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，会稽旁带六诸侯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6509'>海楼翡翠闲相逐，镜水鸳鸯煖共游。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6509'>我有主恩羞未报，君于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6509", 6509, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>此外</span>更何求。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6509'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6509'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6509_0'>⑴ 予在中书日，妻以郡君朝太后于兴庆宫，猥为班首</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6509_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
泗洪（临淮）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='109d7a3f8d5b43ff925eb0370107939c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("109d7a3f8d5b43ff925eb0370107939c");'><span id='109d7a3f8d5b43ff925eb0370107939c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>，45岁</div><div id='109d7a3f8d5b43ff925eb0370107939c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　至泗州，得知管内明州每年贡淡菜、海蚶，民不堪命。<br /></div>

镇江（丹徒）
-----detail

苏州（吴县）

-----title
绍兴（永兴）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='dcf1b242e93a433a82fc09460ea7c91b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("dcf1b242e93a433a82fc09460ea7c91b");'><span id='dcf1b242e93a433a82fc09460ea7c91b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=829')">823-829年</a>，45-51岁</div><div id='dcf1b242e93a433a82fc09460ea7c91b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　至西陵驿，登高晚眺，感慨万分，故有诗。作品：《别后西陵晚眺》《上西陵留别》<div id='poem_6238' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6238' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6238?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别后西陵晚眺</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6238")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_6238_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6238'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6238'>晚日未抛诗笔砚，夕阳空望郡楼台。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6238_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6238'>与君后会知何日，不似潮头暮却回。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6238_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6238'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6238_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_7023' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_7023' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/7023?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上西陵留别</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_7023")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_7023_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_7023'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_7023'>□忧去国三千里，遥指江南一道云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_7023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_7023'></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_7023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_7023'><span class='label'>按：</span>（同前《离别部·留别》）。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_7023_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　至越州，下车伊始，奏罢明州岁贡海味一事。作品：《论浙东罢进海味状》<div id='poem_1372480' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372480' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372480?labeling=true' target='_blank'>浙东论罢进海味状<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>钱货议状</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372480")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372480_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372480'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372480'>奉进止。当今百姓之困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372480_comment'></div>众情所知。减税则国用不充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372480_comment'></div>欲依旧则人困转甚。皆由货轻钱重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372480_comment'></div>徵税暗加。宜令百寮各陈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>意见</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372480_comment'></div>以革其弊。右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372480_comment'></div>闰正月十七日。宰相奉宣进止如前者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372480_comment'></div>臣以为当今百姓之困。其弊数十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372480_comment'></div>不独在于钱货徵税之谓也。既圣问言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372480_comment'></div>又以为黎庶之重困。不在于赋税之闇加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372480_comment'></div>患在于剥夺之不已。钱货之轻重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372480_comment'></div>不在于议论之不当。患在于法令之不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372480_comment'></div>今天下赋税一法也。厚薄一概也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372480_comment'></div>然而廉能莅之则生息。贪愚莅之则败伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372480_comment'></div>盖得人则理之明验也。岂徵税暗加之谓乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372480_comment'></div>自岭已南。以金银为货币。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372480_comment'></div>自巴已外。以盐帛为交易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372480_comment'></div>黔巫溪峡。大抵用水银朱砂缯帛巾帽以相市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372480_comment'></div>然而前人以之理。后人以之扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372480_comment'></div>东郡以之耗。西郡以之赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372480_comment'></div>又得人则理之明验也。岂钱重货轻之谓乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372480_comment'></div>自国家置两税以来。天下之财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372480_comment'></div>限为三品。一曰上供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372480_comment'></div>二曰留使。三曰留州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372480_comment'></div>皆量出以为入。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>定额</span>以给资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372480_comment'></div>然而节将有进献以市国恩者。有赂遗以买私名者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372480_comment'></div>有藏镪滞帛以贻子孙者。有高楼广榭以炽第宅者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372480_comment'></div>彼之俸入有常也。公私有分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372480_comment'></div>此何从而得之。又国家置度支转运以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372480_comment'></div>一则管盐以易货。一则受财以轻费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372480_comment'></div>近制有年进月进之名。有正至三节之献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372480_comment'></div>彼之管盐有常也。受财有数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372480_comment'></div>此又何从而得之。且百姓国家之百姓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372480_comment'></div>货财国家之货财也。不足则取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372480_comment'></div>有馀则舍之。在我而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372480_comment'></div>又何必授之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>重柄</span>。假之利权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372480_comment'></div>徇彼之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>徼恩</span>。成我之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/71/Comments/0")'>怨府</span>哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372480_comment'></div>今陛下初临亿兆。首问群寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372480_comment'></div>诚能禁藩镇大臣不时之献。罢度支转运别进之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372480_comment'></div>绝赂遗之私。节侈靡之俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372480_comment'></div>峻风宪之举。深赃罪之刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372480_comment'></div>精覈考课之条。慎选字人之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372480_comment'></div>若此则不减税而人安。不改法而人理矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372480_comment'></div>至于古今言钱币之轻重者熟矣。或更大钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372480_comment'></div>或放私铸。或龟或贝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372480_comment'></div>或皮或刀。或禁埋藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372480_comment'></div>或禁销燬。或禁器用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372480_comment'></div>或禁滞积。皆可以救一时之弊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372480_comment'></div>然而或损或益者。盖法有行不行之谓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372480_comment'></div>臣不敢远徵古證。窃见元和以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372480_comment'></div>初有公私器用禁铜之令。次有交易钱帛兼行之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372480_comment'></div>近有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>积钱</span>不得过数之限。每更守尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372480_comment'></div>则必有用钱不得加除之榜。然而铜器备列于公私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372480_comment'></div>钱帛不兼于卖鬻。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>积钱</span>不出于墙垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372480_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1372480", 1372480, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>欺滥</span>遍行于市井。亦未闻鞭一夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372480_comment'></div>黜一吏。赏一告讦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372480_comment'></div>坏一蓄藏岂法不便于时耶。盖行之不至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372480_comment'></div>陛下诚能采古今救弊之方。施赏罚必行之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372480_comment'></div>则圣祖仁宗之法制何限。前贤后智之议论何穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372480_comment'></div>岂待愚臣盗窃古人之见。自称革弊之术哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372480_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。伏听敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372480_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1372480_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　张籍寄新诗与白居易，白转寄与元稹，元有酬答诗。作品：《酬乐天吟张员外诗见寄因思上京每与乐天于居敬兄升平里咏张新诗》<div id='poem_6666' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6666' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6666?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬乐天吟张员外诗见寄因思上京每与乐天于居敬兄升平里咏张新诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6666")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6666_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6666'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6666'>乐天书内重封到，居敬堂前共读时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6666'>四友一为泉路客，三人两咏浙江诗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6666'>别无远近皆难见，老减心情自各知。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6666'>杯酒与他年少隔，不相酬赠欲何之。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6666'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_6666_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　岁末，编辑自己的文集，作《叙奏》。<span class='inlineComment2'>（杨军《元稹集编年笺注》中系为长庆四年（824）所作。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　岁末，编辑自己的文集，有诗寄白居易，与白居易寄和诗已数百首。作品：《郡务稍简因得整比旧诗并连缀焚削封章繁委箧笥仅逾百轴偶成自叹因寄乐天》<div id='poem_6577' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6577' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6577?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郡务稍简因得整比旧诗并连缀焚削封章委箧仅逾百轴偶成自叹因寄乐天</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_5_6729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6729'>满空飞舞应为瑞，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_6729", 6729, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>寡和</span>高歌只自娱。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6729'>莫遣拥帘伤思妇，且将盈尺慰农夫。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6729'>称觞彼此情何异，对景东西事有殊。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6729'>镜水绕山山尽白，琉璃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_6729", 6729, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>云母</span>世间无。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6729'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_6729_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　年初，编辑自己的文集时回忆其改革制诰的经历，有文记之，姑系于此。作品：《制诰序》<div id='poem_1372511' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372511' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372511?labeling=true' target='_blank'>制诰自序</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372511")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372511_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372511'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372511'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1372511", 1372511, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>制诰</span>本于书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372511_comment'></div>书之诰命训誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372511_comment'></div>皆一时之约束也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372511_comment'></div>自非训导职业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372511_comment'></div>则必指言美恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372511_comment'></div>以明诛赏之意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372511_comment'></div>是以读说命则知辅相之不易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372511_comment'></div>读允征则知废怠之可诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372511_comment'></div>秦汉以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372511_comment'></div>未之或改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372511_comment'></div>近世以科试取士文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372511_comment'></div>司言者苟务<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1372511", 1372511, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>刓饰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372511_comment'></div>不根事实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372511_comment'></div>升之者美溢于词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372511_comment'></div>而不知所以美之之谓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372511_comment'></div>黜之者罪溢于纸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372511_comment'></div>而不知所以罪之之来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372511_comment'></div>而又拘以属对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372511_comment'></div>跼以圆方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372511_comment'></div>类之于赋判者流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372511_comment'></div>先王之约束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372511_comment'></div>盖扫地矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372511_comment'></div>元和十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372511_comment'></div>余始以祠部郎中知<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372511", 1372511, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>制诰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372511_comment'></div>初约束不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372511_comment'></div>及后累月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372511_comment'></div>辄以古道干丞相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372511_comment'></div>丞相信然之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372511_comment'></div>又明年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372511_comment'></div>召入禁林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372511_comment'></div>专掌内命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372511_comment'></div>上好文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372511_comment'></div>一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372511_comment'></div>从容议及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372511_comment'></div>上曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372511_comment'></div>通事舍人不知书便其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372511_comment'></div>宣赞之外无不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372511_comment'></div>自是司言之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372511_comment'></div>皆得追用古道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372511_comment'></div>不从中覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372511_comment'></div>然而余所宣行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372511_comment'></div>文不能自足其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372511_comment'></div>率皆浅近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372511_comment'></div>无以变例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372511_comment'></div>追而序之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372511_comment'></div>盖所以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1372511", 1372511, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>表明</span>天子之复古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372511_comment'></div>而张后来者之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1372511", 1372511, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>趣尚</span>耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1372511_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年1月1日</a>　苏州刺史李谅寄诗元稹、白居易，元、白各以诗答之。作品：《酬复言长庆四年元日郡斋感怀见寄》《寄浙西李大夫四首》<div id='poem_6733' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6733' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　春，次韵唱和白居易《早春西湖闲游怅然兴怀忆与微之同赏因思在越官重事殷镜湖之游或恐未暇偶成十八韵寄微之》。作品：《酬乐天早春西湖闲游怅然兴怀忆与微之同赏因思在越官重事殷镜湖之游或恐未暇偶成十八韵见寄乐天前篇到时适会予宴镜湖南亭因述目前所睹以成酬答末章亦示暇诚则势使之然亦欲粗为恬养之赠耳》<div id='poem_6724' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6724' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6724?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬乐天早春闲游西湖颇多野趣恨不得与微之同赏因思在越官重事殷镜湖之游或恐未暇因成十八韵见寄乐天前篇到时适会予亦宴镜湖南亭因述目前所睹以成酬荅末章亦示暇诚则势使之然亦欲粗为恬养之赠耳<span class='inlineComment2'>（浙东时作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6724")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_6724_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6724'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6724'>雁思欲回宾，风声乍变新。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6724'>各携红粉伎，俱伴紫垣人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6724'>水面波疑縠，山腰虹<span class='inlineComment2'>（音降）</span>似巾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6724'>柳条黄大带，<span onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_6724", 6724, "Clauses/7/Comments/2")'>文茵</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>墨池</span>怜嗜学，丹井羡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_6724", 6724, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>登真</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（逸少墨池、稚川丹井，皆越中异迹）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6724'>雅叹游方盛，聊非意所亲。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6724'>白头辞北阙，沧海是东邻。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6724'>问俗烦江界，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_6724", 6724, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>蒐畋</span>想渭津。<div id='poem_sentence_10_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_6724'>故交音讯少，归梦往来频。<div id='poem_sentence_11_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_6724'>独喜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_6724", 6724, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>同门</span>旧，皆为列郡臣。<div id='poem_sentence_12_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_6724'>三刀连地轴，一苇碍车轮。<div id='poem_sentence_13_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_6724'>尚阻青天雾，空瞻白玉尘。<div id='poem_sentence_14_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_6724'>龙因雕字识，犬为送书驯。<div id='poem_sentence_15_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_6724'>胜事无穷境，流年有限身。<div id='poem_sentence_16_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_6724'>懒将闲气力，争斗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_6724", 6724, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>野塘</span>春。<div id='poem_sentence_17_6724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_6724'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_6724_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年4月11日</a>　游永福寺，有文记之。作品：《永福寺石壁法华经记》<div id='poem_1372514' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372514' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372514?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永福寺石壁法华经记</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年4月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372514")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372514_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372514'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372514'>按沙门释惠皎自状其事云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372514_comment'></div>永福寺一名<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1372514", 1372514, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>孤山寺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372514_comment'></div>在杭州钱塘湖心孤山上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372514_comment'></div>石壁法华经在寺之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372514_comment'></div>始以元和十二年严休复为刺史时惠皎萌厥心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372514_comment'></div>卒以长庆四年白居易为刺史时成厥事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372514_comment'></div>上下其石六尺有五寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372514_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372514", 1372514, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>短长</span>其石五十七尺有六寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372514_comment'></div>座周于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372514_comment'></div>盖周于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372514_comment'></div>堂周于石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372514_comment'></div>砌周于堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372514_comment'></div>凡买工凿经六万九千二百有五十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372514_comment'></div>钱十经之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372514_comment'></div>经既讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372514_comment'></div>又成二石为二碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372514_comment'></div>其一碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372514_comment'></div>凡输钱于经者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372514_comment'></div>由十而上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372514_comment'></div>皆得名于碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372514_comment'></div>其输钱之贵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372514_comment'></div>若杭州刺史吏部郎中严休复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372514_comment'></div>中书舍人杭州刺史白居易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372514_comment'></div>刑部郎中湖州刺史崔元亮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372514_comment'></div>刑部郎中睦州刺史韦文悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372514_comment'></div>处州刺史韦行立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372514_comment'></div>衢州刺史张聿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372514_comment'></div>御史中丞苏州刺史李谅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372514_comment'></div>御史大夫越州刺史元稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372514_comment'></div>右司郎中处州刺史陈岵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372514_comment'></div>九刺史之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372514_comment'></div>搢绅之由杭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372514_comment'></div>若宣慰使库部郎中知制诰贾餗以降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372514_comment'></div>鲜不附于经石之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372514_comment'></div>必以输钱先后为次第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372514_comment'></div>不以贵贱老幼多少为先后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372514_comment'></div>其一碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372514_comment'></div>僧之徒思得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1372514", 1372514, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>声名人</span>文其事以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1372514", 1372514, "Clauses/37/Comments/1")'>自广</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372514_comment'></div>予始以长庆二年相先帝无状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372514_comment'></div>谴于同州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372514_comment'></div>明年徙会稽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372514_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1372514", 1372514, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>路出</span>于杭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372514_comment'></div>杭民竞相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1372514", 1372514, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>观睹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372514_comment'></div>刺史白怪问之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372514_comment'></div>皆曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372514_comment'></div>非欲观宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372514_comment'></div>盖欲观曩所闻之元白耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372514_comment'></div>由是僧之徒误以予为名声人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372514_comment'></div>相与日夜攻刺史白乞予文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372514_comment'></div>予观僧之徒所以经于石文于碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372514_comment'></div>盖欲相与为不朽计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1372514_comment'></div>且欲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1372514", 1372514, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>自大</span>其本术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1372514_comment'></div>今夫碑既文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1372514_comment'></div>经既石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1372514_comment'></div>而又九诸侯相率贡钱于所事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1372514_comment'></div>由近而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372514_comment'></div>亦可谓来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1372514", 1372514, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>异宗</span>而成不朽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372514_comment'></div>由远而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372514_comment'></div>则不知几万千岁而外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1372514_comment'></div>地与天相轧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1372514_comment'></div>阴与阳相荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1372514_comment'></div>火与风相射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1372514_comment'></div>名与形相灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1372514_comment'></div>则四海九州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1372514_comment'></div>皆大空中一微尘耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1372514_comment'></div>又安知其朽与不朽哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372514_comment'></div>然而羊叔子识枯树中旧环。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372514_comment'></div>张僧繇世世为画师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1372514_comment'></div>历阳之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1372514_comment'></div>至今为城郭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1372514_comment'></div>狗一叱而异世卒不可化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1372514_comment'></div>锻之子学数息则易成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1372514_comment'></div>此又性与物一相游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1372514_comment'></div>而终不能两相忘矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1372514_comment'></div>又安知夫六万九千之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1372514_comment'></div>刻石永永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1372514_comment'></div>因<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1372514", 1372514, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>众性</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1372514", 1372514, "Clauses/76/Comments/1")'>合成</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1372514_comment'></div>独不能为千万劫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1372514", 1372514, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>含藏</span>之不朽耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1372514_comment'></div>由是思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1372514_comment'></div>则僧之徒得计矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1372514_comment'></div>僧当为予言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1372514_comment'></div>予不当为僧言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1372514_comment'></div>况斯文止于纪石刻。<div id='poem_sentence_85_1372514_comment'></div>浙江东道都团练观察处置等使通议大夫使持节都督越州诸军事越州刺史兼御史大夫上柱国赐紫金鱼袋元稹记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1372514_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年5月</a>　白居易离开杭州，元稹有诗记之。作品：《代杭民作使君一朝去二首》<div id='poem_6778' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6778' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6778?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代杭人作使君一朝去二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（824年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6778")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6778_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6778'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6778'>使君一朝去，遗爱在人<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作民）</span>口。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6778'>惠化境内春，才名天下首。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6778'>为问龚黄辈<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，兼能作诗否。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6778'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_6778_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6778'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6778_0'>⑴ 龚黄：龚遂与黄霸之并称。遂曾为渤海太守，霸曾为颍川太守，均为汉宣帝时以理郡著称之循吏。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6778_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_6779' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6779' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6779?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（824年5月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6779_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6779'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6779'>使君一朝去，断肠如剉檗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6779'>无复见冰壶<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，唯应镂金石<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6779'>自此一州人<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作民）</span>，生男尽名白<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6779'></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_6779_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6779'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_6779_0'>⑴ 剉：用锉磋磨。檗：黄柏，芸香科，落叶乔木，树皮味苦。《类篇·木部》：“檗，黄木。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6779_0'>⑵ 冰壶：比喻品德洁白无瑕。《文选·鲍照〈代白头吟〉》：“直如朱丝绳，清如玉壶冰。”李周翰注：“玉壶冰，取其洁也。”唐姚崇《冰壶诫序》：“冰壶者，清洁之至也。君子对之，示不忘清也……内怀冰清，外涵玉润，此君子冰壶之德也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_6779_0'>⑶ 镂金石：在钟鼎碑碣等上镌刻文字以颂功纪事。《吕氏春秋·求人》云：“功绩铭乎金石。”高诱注：“金，钟鼎也；石，丰碑也。”</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_6779_0'>⑷ “自此”二句：古代地方官吏有惠政于民，去职后百姓每以其姓为子孙之名，以为永久之纪念。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6779_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年5月</a>　次韵酬和白居易《别州民》一诗。作品：《代杭民答乐天》<div id='poem_6447' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6447' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年9月</a>　宴望海亭，与郑鲂唱和。作品：《酬郑从事四年九月宴望海亭次用旧韵》<div id='poem_7010' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_7010' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a
