class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_7010", 7010, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>湖山</span>四面争气色，旷望不与人间同。<div id='poem_sentence_1_7010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_7010'>一拳墺伏东武小<span class='inlineComment2'>（龟山别名）</span>，两山<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_7010", 7010, "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>斗构</span>秦望雄<span inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，突兀怪石疑防风。<div id='poem_sentence_3_7010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_7010'>舟船骈比<span class='inlineComment2'>（毗必反）</span>有<span class='link' "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>滃泱</span>无始终。<div id='poem_sentence_4_7010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_7010'>雪花布遍稻陇白，日脚插入秋波红。<div id='poem_sentence_5_7010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_7010'>兴馀望剧酒四坐，歌声舞艳烟霞中。<div id='poem_sentence_6_7010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_7010'>酒酣从事歌送我，歌云此乐难再逢。<div id='poem_sentence_7_7010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_7010'>良时年少犹健羡，使君况是头白翁。<div id='poem_sentence_8_7010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_7010'>我闻此曲深叹息，唧唧不异秋草虫。<div id='poem_sentence_9_7010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_7010'>忆年十五学<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_7010", 7010, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>构厦</span>，有意<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_15_7010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_7010'>劝君莫学虚富贵，不是贤人难变通<span class='inlineComment2'>（一本，富贵不是贤人通）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_16_7010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_7010'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_7010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年12月</a>　编排白居易长庆二年以前之作《白氏长庆集》五十卷，并作序记之。作品：《白氏长庆集序》<div id='poem_1372513' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372513' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372513?labeling=true' target='_blank'>白氏长庆集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372513")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372513_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372513'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372513'>白氏长庆集者。太原人白居易之所作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372513_comment'></div>居易字乐天。乐天始言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372513_comment'></div>试指之无二字。能不误<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注具乐天与予书）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372513_comment'></div>始既言。读书勤敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372513_comment'></div>与他儿异。五六岁识声韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372513_comment'></div>十五志诗赋。二十七举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372513_comment'></div>贞元末进士。尚驰竞不尚文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372513_comment'></div>就中六籍尤摈落。礼部侍郎高郢始用经艺为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>进退</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372513_comment'></div>乐天一举擢上第。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>明年</span>拔萃甲科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372513_comment'></div>由是性习相近。远求元珠斩白蛇剑等赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372513_comment'></div>洎百节判。新进士竞相传于京师矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372513_comment'></div>会宪宗皇帝册召天下士。乐天对诏称旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372513_comment'></div>又登甲科。未几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372513_comment'></div>入翰林掌制诰。比比上书言得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372513_comment'></div>因为喜雨诗秦中吟等数十章。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>指言</span>天下事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372513_comment'></div>时人比之风骚焉。予始与乐天同校秘书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372513_comment'></div>前后多以诗章相赠答。会予谴掾江陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372513_comment'></div>乐天犹在翰林。寄予百韵律诗及杂体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372513_comment'></div>前后数十章。是后各佐江通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372513_comment'></div>复相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>詶寄</span>。巴蜀江楚间洎长安中少年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372513_comment'></div>递相仿效。竞作新词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372513_comment'></div>自谓为元和诗。而乐天秦中吟贺两讽谕闲适等篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372513_comment'></div>时人罕能知者。然而二十年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372513_comment'></div>禁省<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>观寺</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/46/Comments/1")'>邮堠</span>墙壁之上无不书。王公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>妾妇</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/47/Comments/1")'>牛童马走</span>之口无不道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372513_comment'></div>至于缮写<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>模勒</span>。衒卖于市井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372513_comment'></div>或持之以交酒茗者。处处皆是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372513_comment'></div>其甚者有至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>盗窃</span>名姓。苟求自售。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372513_comment'></div>杂乱閒厕。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>无可奈何</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372513_comment'></div>予尝于平水市中。见村校诸童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372513_comment'></div>竞习歌咏。召而问之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372513_comment'></div>皆对曰。先生教我乐天微之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372513_comment'></div>固亦不知予之为微之也。又鸡林贾人求市颇切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372513_comment'></div>自云本国宰相每以一金换一篇。其甚伪者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372513_comment'></div>宰相辄能辨别之。自篇章已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372513_comment'></div>未有如是流传之广者。长庆四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372513_comment'></div>乐天自杭州刺史以右庶子诏还。予时刺郡会稽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372513_comment'></div>因得尽徵其文。手自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>排缵</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372513_comment'></div>成五十卷。凡二千二百五十一首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372513_comment'></div>前辈多以前集中集为名。予以为国家改元长庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372513_comment'></div>讫于是。因号曰白氏长庆集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372513_comment'></div>大凡人之文各有所长。乐天之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372513_comment'></div>可以为多矣夫。讽谕之诗长于激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372513_comment'></div>閒适之诗长于遣。感伤之诗长于切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372513_comment'></div>五字律诗百言而上长于赡。五字七字百言而下长于情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372513_comment'></div>赋赞箴戒之类长于当。碑记叙事制诰长于实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372513_comment'></div>启奏表状长于直。书檄词策剖判长于尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372513_comment'></div>总而言之。不亦多乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372513_comment'></div>至于乐天之官秩景行。与予之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>交分</span>浅深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372513_comment'></div>非叙文之要也。故不书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372513_comment'></div>长庆四年冬十二月十日。微之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372513_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1372513_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年12月</a>　编排白居易长庆二年以前之作《白氏长庆集》五十卷，有诗记之。作品：《为乐天自勘诗集因思顷年城南醉归马上递唱艳曲十余里不绝长庆初俱以制诰侍宿南郊斋宫夜后偶吟数十篇两掖诸公洎翰林学士三十余人惊起就听逮至卒吏莫不众观群公直至侍从行礼之时不复聚寐予于乐天吟哦竟亦不绝因书于乐天卷后越中冬夜风雨不觉将晓诸门互启关锁即事成篇》<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6707' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6707?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和乐天重题别东楼</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　是年，酬和白居易《寄李苏州兼示杨琼》一诗。作品：《和乐天示杨琼》<div id='poem_6852' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6852' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6852?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和乐天示杨琼</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6852")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_6852_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6852'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6852'>我在江陵少年日，知有杨琼初唤出。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6852'>腰身瘦小歌圆紧，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_6852", 6852, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>依约</span>年应十六七。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6852'>去年十月过苏州，琼来拜问郎不识。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6852'>青衫玉貌何处去，安得红旗遮头白。<div id='poem_sentence_3_6852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_6852'>我语杨琼琼莫语，汝虽笑我我笑汝。<div id='poem_sentence_4_6852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_6852'>汝今无复小腰身，不似江陵时好女。<div id='poem_sentence_5_6852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_6852'>杨琼为我歌送酒，尔忆江陵县中否。<div id='poem_sentence_6_6852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_6852'>江陵王令骨为灰，车来嫁作尚书妇。<div id='poem_sentence_7_6852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_6852'>卢戡及第严涧在，其馀死者十八九。<div id='poem_sentence_8_6852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6852'>我今贺尔亦自多，尔得老成余<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作亦）</span>白首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_6852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_6852'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_6852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_6852'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_6852_1'>⑴ 杨琼本名播，少为江陵酒妓，去年姑苏过琼叙旧，及今见乐天此篇，因走笔追书此曲</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_6852_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　是年，曾咏二十四节气，有诗，但有可能为后人依托，姑系于此。作品：《咏廿四气诗》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　是年，裴淑从兄裴乂去世，元稹为其作墓志铭。作品：《唐故福建等州都圃练观察处置等使中大夫持节都督福州诸军事守福州刺史兼御史中丞上柱国赐紫金鱼袋赠左散骑常侍裴公墓志铭》<div id='poem_1372531' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372531' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372531?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐故福建等州都团练观察处置等使中大夫使持节都督福州诸军事守福州刺史兼御史中丞上柱国赐紫金鱼袋赠左散骑常侍裴公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372531")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372531_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372531'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372531'>公讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372531_comment'></div>字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372531_comment'></div>河东闻喜其望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372531_comment'></div>唐故长安县令讳安期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372531_comment'></div>赠左散骑常侍讳后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372531_comment'></div>赠工部尚书讳郜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372531_comment'></div>其父祖其曾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372531_comment'></div>赠晋阳县太君王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372531_comment'></div>其母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372531_comment'></div>故清河县君房氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372531_comment'></div>其室也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372531_comment'></div>昭应县令稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372531_comment'></div>虔州刺史逊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372531_comment'></div>盩厔县令及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372531_comment'></div>其季也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372531_comment'></div>进士诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372531_comment'></div>进士警。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372531_comment'></div>其子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372531_comment'></div>辛少穆孝尧一阳观李及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372531_comment'></div>其婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372531_comment'></div>参军于彭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372531_comment'></div>尉于雒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372531_comment'></div>丞于湖城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372531_comment'></div>复尉于奉先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372531_comment'></div>主簿于太常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372531_comment'></div>录事于华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372531_comment'></div>户曹于京兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372531_comment'></div>检校水部员外郎侍御史佐于襄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372531_comment'></div>令于醴泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372531_comment'></div>检校库部员外郎侍御史兼中丞团练观察于福建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372531_comment'></div>其官也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372531_comment'></div>岁某月之某日癸卯某月之某日甲辰某月之某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372531_comment'></div>其始其薨其葬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372531_comment'></div>某县某乡某里之某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372531_comment'></div>其墓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372531_comment'></div>少好学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372531_comment'></div>家贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372531_comment'></div>甘役劳于师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372531_comment'></div>雨则负诸弟以往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372531_comment'></div>卒能通开元礼书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372531_comment'></div>中甲科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372531_comment'></div>在湖城时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372531_comment'></div>杖刺史若初宠卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1372531_comment'></div>新换帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1372531_comment'></div>公为新帅均驰抚其师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1372531_comment'></div>会众卒将食旧帅宾。<div 1372531, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>廪库</span>空少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1372531_comment'></div>不数年皆羡溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1372531_comment'></div>在郑时。<div 1372531, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>重官</span>人皆以经惯吏理为美谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1372531_comment'></div>不如是安能富贵其身哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1372531_comment'></div>铭曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1372531_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_113_1372531'>实而无文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1372531_comment'></div>行则不振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1372531_comment'></div>不有好辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1372531_comment'></div>安知令闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1372531_comment'></div>我有禄位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1372531_comment'></div>荣于子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1372531_comment'></div>亦又记志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1372531_comment'></div>其期不泯。</div><div id='poem_sentence_120_1372531_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　秋，白居易请元稹代访《霓裳羽衣舞》舞者，有诗。作品：《霓裳羽衣曲》<span class='inlineComment2'>（（亡佚））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　道士郭虚舟来访。离越州赴苏州时，有诗赠别，并让郭捎信与白居易。作品：《赠别郭虚舟炼师五十韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（（亡佚））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　越州新楼初建成，作诗报白居易。作品：《开拆新楼初毕报乐天》<span class='inlineComment2'>（（亡佚））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　是年，兴修水利。使人访刻石山韦夫人碑，不获。与李德裕次韵酬和。作品：《奉和浙西李大夫霜夜听小童薛阳陶觱篥歌》<span class='inlineComment2'>（（亡佚））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　是年，李德裕请元稹代访青田胎化鹤，并有酬和诗。作品：《和浙西李大夫晚下北固山喜径成荫怅然怀古偶题临江亭》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=826&endYear=826')">826年</a>　李德裕作《述梦诗四十韵》。春，元稹、刘禹锡和之。约本年春，章孝标投诗元稹。作品：《奉和浙西大夫李德裕述梦四十韵大夫本题言赠于梦中诗赋以寄一二僚友故今所和者亦止述翰院旧游而已次本韵》<div id='poem_6709' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_8_6709_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_6709'>金刚锥透玉，镔铁剑吹毛<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=826&endYear=826')">826年9月</a>　游龙瑞宫，有诗。作品：《拜禹庙》<div id='poem_6710' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6710' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_2_6280'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_6280_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年</a>　春，派周师范赴京贺大赦元年。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年</a>　夏，周师范返越。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年9月</a>　与李德裕同时加检校礼部尚书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年</a>　是年，追和《白氏长庆集》中未对答者五十七首，合一百一十四首，题为《因继集》卷一，有序。刘蔚赴浙东为元稹从事，来时带来刘禹锡文卷。作品：《因继集序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（（亡佚））</span><div id='poem_1372513' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372513' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372513?labeling=true' target='_blank'>白氏长庆集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372513")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372513_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372513'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372513'>白氏长庆集者。太原人白居易之所作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372513_comment'></div>居易字乐天。乐天始言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372513_comment'></div>试指之无二字。能不误<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注具乐天与予书）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372513_comment'></div>始既言。读书勤敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372513_comment'></div>与他儿异。五六岁识声韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372513_comment'></div>十五志诗赋。二十七举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372513_comment'></div>贞元末进士。尚驰竞不尚文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372513_comment'></div>就中六籍尤摈落。礼部侍郎高郢始用经艺为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>进退</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372513_comment'></div>乐天一举擢上第。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>明年</span>拔萃甲科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372513_comment'></div>由是性习相近。远求元珠斩白蛇剑等赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372513_comment'></div>洎百节判。新进士竞相传于京师矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372513_comment'></div>会宪宗皇帝册召天下士。乐天对诏称旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372513_comment'></div>又登甲科。未几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372513_comment'></div>入翰林掌制诰。比比上书言得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372513_comment'></div>因为喜雨诗秦中吟等数十章。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>指言</span>天下事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372513_comment'></div>时人比之风骚焉。予始与乐天同校秘书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372513_comment'></div>前后多以诗章相赠答。会予谴掾江陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372513_comment'></div>乐天犹在翰林。寄予百韵律诗及杂体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372513_comment'></div>前后数十章。是后各佐江通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372513_comment'></div>复相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>詶寄</span>。巴蜀江楚间洎长安中少年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372513_comment'></div>递相仿效。竞作新词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372513_comment'></div>自谓为元和诗。而乐天秦中吟贺两讽谕闲适等篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372513_comment'></div>时人罕能知者。然而二十年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372513_comment'></div>禁省<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>观寺</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/46/Comments/1")'>邮堠</span>墙壁之上无不书。王公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>妾妇</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/47/Comments/1")'>牛童马走</span>之口无不道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372513_comment'></div>至于缮写<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>模勒</span>。衒卖于市井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372513_comment'></div>或持之以交酒茗者。处处皆是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372513_comment'></div>其甚者有至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>盗窃</span>名姓。苟求自售。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372513_comment'></div>杂乱閒厕。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>无可奈何</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372513_comment'></div>予尝于平水市中。见村校诸童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372513_comment'></div>竞习歌咏。召而问之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372513_comment'></div>皆对曰。先生教我乐天微之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372513_comment'></div>固亦不知予之为微之也。又鸡林贾人求市颇切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372513_comment'></div>自云本国宰相每以一金换一篇。其甚伪者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372513_comment'></div>宰相辄能辨别之。自篇章已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372513_comment'></div>未有如是流传之广者。长庆四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372513_comment'></div>乐天自杭州刺史以右庶子诏还。予时刺郡会稽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372513_comment'></div>因得尽徵其文。手自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>排缵</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372513_comment'></div>成五十卷。凡二千二百五十一首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372513_comment'></div>前辈多以前集中集为名。予以为国家改元长庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372513_comment'></div>讫于是。因号曰白氏长庆集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372513_comment'></div>大凡人之文各有所长。乐天之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372513_comment'></div>可以为多矣夫。讽谕之诗长于激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372513_comment'></div>閒适之诗长于遣。感伤之诗长于切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372513_comment'></div>五字律诗百言而上长于赡。五字七字百言而下长于情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372513_comment'></div>赋赞箴戒之类长于当。碑记叙事制诰长于实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372513_comment'></div>启奏表状长于直。书檄词策剖判长于尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372513_comment'></div>总而言之。不亦多乎哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372513_comment'></div>至于乐天之官秩景行。与予之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1372513", 1372513, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>交分</span>浅深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372513_comment'></div>非叙文之要也。故不书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372513_comment'></div>长庆四年冬十二月十日。微之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1372513_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1372513_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=827&endYear=827')">827年</a>　是年，寄诗与白居易，白居易和诗为《和微之诗二十三首·和晨兴因报问龟儿》作品：《问龟儿》<span class='inlineComment2'>（（亡佚））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>　春，白居易作诗贺元稹加检校礼部尚书，又作诗颂扬元稹政绩。元稹为白寂然卜筑禅院于剡县沃洲山。寄越州缯纱于国子司业张籍。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>　秋，白居易编次长庆三年以后诗文为《白氏长庆集·后集》二十卷，寄元稹。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>　冬，《因继集》二、三卷成，白居易重撰序。是年，女保子已与韦绚结婚。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>　白居易于大和二三年间在《和微之诗二十三首》中酬和元稹《顺之琴者》诗，姑系于此。<span class='inlineComment2'>（（亡佚））</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=828&endYear=828')">828年</a>　是年，元稹有诗《春深二十首》，白居易酬和《和春深二十首》，刘禹锡亦有《同乐天和微之深春二十首》。<span class='inlineComment2'>（（亡佚））</span><div id='poem_6450' class='_poem'><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=829&endYear=829')">829年</a>　夏，邀请白居易游越州，白氏思一访之，未果。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=829&endYear=829')">829年</a>　是年，重修桐柏崇道观，有文记之。作品：《重修桐柏观记》<div id='poem_1372516' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1372516' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1372516?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重修桐柏观记</a><span class='authorDate'>（829年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_1372516")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1372516_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1372516'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1372516'>岁太和己酉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1372516_comment'></div>修桐柏观讫事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1372516_comment'></div>道士徐灵府以其状乞文于余曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1372516_comment'></div>有葛氏子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1372516_comment'></div>昔仙于吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1372516_comment'></div>乃观桐柏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1372516_comment'></div>以神其居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1372516_comment'></div>葛氏既去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1372516_comment'></div>复荒于墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1372516_comment'></div>墟有犯者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1372516_comment'></div>神犹祸诸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1372516_comment'></div>实唐睿祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1372516_comment'></div>悼民之愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1372516_comment'></div>乃诏郡县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1372516_comment'></div>厉其封隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1372516_comment'></div>环四十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1372516_comment'></div>无得樵苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1372516_comment'></div>复观桐柏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1372516_comment'></div>用承厥初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1372516_comment'></div>俾司马氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1372516_comment'></div>宅时灵都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1372516_comment'></div>马亦勤止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1372516_comment'></div>率合其徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1372516_comment'></div>兵执锯铝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1372516_comment'></div>独持斧鈇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1372516_comment'></div>手缔上清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1372516_comment'></div>实劳我躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1372516_comment'></div>棱棱巨幢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1372516_comment'></div>粲粲流珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1372516_comment'></div>万五千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1372516_comment'></div>体三其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1372516_comment'></div>置之妙台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1372516_comment'></div>以永厥图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1372516_comment'></div>不及百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1372516_comment'></div>忽焉而芜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1372516_comment'></div>芜久将坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1372516_comment'></div>坏其反乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1372516_comment'></div>神启密命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1372516_comment'></div>命友余徐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1372516_comment'></div>徐实何力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1372516_comment'></div>敢告俸馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1372516_comment'></div>侯用俞止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1372516_comment'></div>俾来不虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1372516_comment'></div>曾未讫岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1372516_comment'></div>奂乎于于。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1372516_comment'></div>乃殿乃阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1372516_comment'></div>以廪以厨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1372516_comment'></div>始自础栋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1372516_comment'></div>周于墁圬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1372516_comment'></div>事有终始。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=829&endYear=829')">829年</a>　长庆三年至大和三年间在越州疑作《赠毛先翁并序》，姑系于此。<span class='inlineComment2'>（（疑伪））</span><div id='poem_6684' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_6684' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/6684?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠毛仙翁</a><span class='authorDate'>（829年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 中唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(14615, "中唐", "元稹", "poem_title_6684")'>元稹</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_6684_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_6684'>余廉问浙东岁，毛仙翁惠然来顾，越之人士识之者，相与言曰：「仙翁尝与叶法善、吴筠游于稽山，迨兹多历年所，而风貌愈少，盖神仙者也。」余因得执弟子之礼，师其道焉。余尝见圆冠方领之士，读道书，疑其绝智弃仁，又谓其书不足以经世理国，殊不知至仁无兼爱，大智无非灾。大乐同天地之和，大礼同天地之节，其可臻乎上德，冥乎大道之致。华胥终北之化，熙熙然也。又以徐韨、文成之事，谓方士之流，诞妄于世，不足以为教也。殊不知峒山高卧，汾水凝神，纵心傲世，邈然外物，王侯不可得师友也。若然，则徐氏之莠，不足以害嘉谷；文成之诞，不足以伤大教。今我仙翁真风遗骨，玄格高情，冥鸿孤鹤，不可方喻，盖峒山、汾水之俦也。一言道合，止于山亭三日，而南栖天台。谓余曰：「入相之年，相候于安山里。」余拜而言曰：「果如仙约，燃香拂榻，以俟云驾焉。」抒诗一章，以为他日之志也。</div><div id='poem_preface_6684_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_6684'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2368, "poem_allusion_6684")'>盐梅</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_6684_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_6684'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_6684'>仙驾初从蓬海来，相逢又说向天台。<div id='poem_sentence_0_6684_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_6684'>一言亲授希微诀，三夕同倾沆瀣杯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_6684_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_6684'>此日临风飘羽卫，他年嘉约指<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2368, "poem_sentence_2_6684")'>盐梅</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_6684_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_6684'>花前挥手迢遥去，目断霓旌不可陪。<div
